column12: Service platform and method based on algorithm enabling and data value mining, and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a service platform and method based on algorithm enabling and data value mining and a storage medium, the service platform comprises a server and a user side, and the server comprises the following modules: a demand analysis module, which is used for obtaining a user demand of the user side, the identity information of the user side is analyzed and confirmed; the demand matching analysis module is used for carrying out suitability analysis on actual user demands of a plurality of user sides, finding out suitable demands and carrying out relation networking; and the processing module is also used for analyzing and processing the preprocessed metadata according to a relational networking process after the relational networking is completed, so as to obtain respective service delivery schemes. According to the invention, a barrier-free information exchange platform can be provided for multiple parties such as a data provider, an AI algorithm provider and an AI algorithm facility associated party, so that the data and the AI algorithm can obtain timely benefit conversion, and the safety of the data is ensured, thereby facilitating the benign sustainable development of the artificial intelligence AI market.
column14: CHENGDU XINJIN DIGITAL TECH INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT GROUP CO LTD;;CHENGDU FULIMENG ENVIRONMENTAL PROT BIG DATA CO LTD

column12: Method for monitoring in-situ leaching mining process of ion adsorption type rare earth mine
column13: The invention discloses an ion adsorption type rare earth mine in-situ leaching mining process monitoring method, which comprises the following steps: S1, according to mine geology and hydrogeology conditions, in combination with ore body and terrain distribution characteristics, laying a high-density electrical method measurement grid profile; s2, high-density electrical method measurement is carried out according to the laid measurement grid section, and a mine apparent resistivity cross-section diagram is obtained; s3, according to the resistivity cross-section diagram of each section, geological data correction and inversion are combined to obtain a geological model of each section, and a liquid injection and collection system is arranged according to the geological model of each section; s4, performing high-density electrical method measurement on each section according to a certain time interval after liquid injection, and obtaining an apparent resistivity cross-section diagram corresponding to each section at different time; and S5, inverting the permeation process of the mother liquor along with time according to the rule that the apparent resistivity of each section changes along with time, and correspondingly adjusting a liquid injection and collection system. The mining efficiency of mine in-situ ore leaching is improved, and potential safety hazards are reduced.

column12: Method for calculating critical liquid injection intensity of in-situ ore leaching of long-strip-shaped bare-foot type rare earth mine
column13: The invention discloses a long-strip-shaped bare-foot type rare earth mine in-situ leaching critical liquid injection intensity calculation method which comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out production ore block engineering geological exploration to obtain topographic and geological data of production ore blocks, and drawing a typical geological profile map; s2, performing production ore block liquid injection process design on the typical geological profile map, determining topographic conditions according to topographic and geological data, and determining liquid injection conditions according to liquid injection process design data; s3, a production ore block liquid injection infiltration line is calculated, and a production ore block liquid injection stable infiltration line equation is obtained; s4, according to the production ore block liquid injection stable infiltration line equation, a liquid injection infiltration line on the typical section of the production ore block is obtained; s5, according to the typical geological profile map and the liquid injection infiltration line, the safety coefficient of the mine slope, the critical liquid injection strength of the ore blocks and the critical liquid injection water level of the ore blocks are obtained through calculation. According to the method, accurate calculation of the in-situ leaching critical liquid injection intensity of the long-strip-shaped bare-foot type rare earth mine is achieved.

column12: Method and system for monitoring and predicting performance of gyratory crusher based on digital twinning
column13: The invention relates to a digital twinning-based gyratory crusher monitoring and performance prediction method and system, and belongs to the field of mining mechanical equipment performance prediction. A plurality of sensors are used for collecting key parameters of the crusher in real time and monitoring the state of the crusher; establishing a dynamics and discrete element analysis model of the gyratory crusher by combining real parameters and working conditions, carrying out analogue simulation on the crushing process of the gyratory crusher, and obtaining related performance parameter data of the crusher; the working state of the gyratory crusher is monitored in real time by comparing and judging data acquired by the sensor; state data obtained by a sensor serves as twinborn data and is input into a prediction model to predict performance parameters of equipment in real time; the real-time state data of the crusher are used as input and are input into the crusher dynamics and discrete element coupling simulation model, and dynamic simulation of the crushing process is carried out. Performance parameters of the gyratory crusher can be quickly and accurately predicted, and the working state of the equipment can be reflected in real time.
column15: ZHANG HAOYAN;;WANG GUOQIANG;;WU GUOHUA;;LIU ZHENGBIN;;GUAN WEI;;GUO JIANBO;;WU SHUWEI

column12: Method for judging drill hole based on self-encoding and gradient lifting tree combination algorithm
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of Internet, and particularly discloses a method for judging a drill hole based on a self-encoding and gradient lifting tree combination algorithm, which comprises the following steps of: 1, performing normalization processing on drill hole sample data; 2, dividing a drilling data set D = {X1, X2,..., Xn-1, Xn} into a training set D1 and a test set D2; 3, on the basis of the training set D1 without labels, carrying out stack type self-coding layer trainin on the training set D1, carrying out dimension reduction processing on drilling data, and outputting data of a hidden layer; 4, processing the data of the hidden layer and the training set D1 with the label, training the data and the training set D1 together in a gradient lifting decision tree, and setting a residual function; and 5, enabling an output layer to be an optimal model after output decision tree training. According to the method, the drilling qualification batch judgment function can be achieved, the in-situ leaching well site drilling design workload is reduced for in-situ leaching mining personnel, the in-situ leaching well site drilling design quality is improved, and the efficiency and accuracy of drilling judgment in logging data can be improved through the algorithm model.

column12: Numerical simulation method for leaching process of weathering crust illuviation type rare earth ore
column13: The invention provides a numerical simulation method for a leaching process of a weathering crust illuviation type rare earth ore. The numerical simulation method comprises the following steps: constructing a physical model of the leaching process of the weathering crust illuviation type rare earth ore; constructing a mathematical model of the leaching process of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore according to the physical model of the leaching process of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore; and solving the rare earth ore leaching process liquid-solid two-phase flow multi-field coupling flow equation, the rare earth ore bed skeleton deformation equation and the rare earth ore leaching process mass transfer equation to obtain data information of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore leaching process. According to the method, the coupling action mechanism of three physical fields, namely a seepage field, a stress field and a concentration field in the leaching process of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore can be quickly described; and the problems that a traditional analysis method for the leaching process of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore is long in time period, and the coupling mechanism of multiple physical fields in the leaching process of the weathering crust elution-deposited rare earth ore is difficult to describe are solved.

column12: Simulation system for ore grinding classification process
column13: The invention provides a simulation system for an ore grinding grading process, and relates to the technical field of process industry modeling, and the system comprises: a data transmission module which is used for transmitting the working parameters of target equipment to an edge calculation module and a simulation module according to a preset communication protocol; the edge calculation module which is used for filtering the working parameters of the instrument by using a preset algorithm to obtain filtered working parameters; the simulation module which is used for simulating the ore grinding grading process by utilizing the configuration of the ore grinding grading process sent by a user, the target model, the filtered working parameters, the state value of the ore grinding grading equipment at the previous moment and the state value of the ore grinding grading equipment at the current moment to obtain a simulation result; and a data storage and visualization module which is used for storing and displaying target parameters, and the technical problem that an existing simulation system for the ore grinding classification process is poor in universality is solved.
column15: WANG QINGKAI;;YANG TIANHAO;;ZHOU JUNWU;;SONG TAO;;ZOU GUOBIN;;YU GANG;;YANG JIAWEI;;ZHAO JIANJUN

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR THE BATCH DELIVERY OF MATERIAL TO A CONTINUOUS MATERIAL PROCESSOR
column13: Methods and systems of directing the movement of a plurality of batch delivery systems between a loading area and a continuous material processor determine a location of each of at least two of the plurality of batch delivery systems; determine a state of each of the located batch delivery systems; predict an estimated time of arrival at the continuous material processor of a loaded batch delivery system in transit from the loading area to the continuous material processor; predict a number of loaded batch delivery systems that will be located at the continuous material processor at a future time; estimate an idle time for the predicted number of loaded batch delivery systems at the continuous material processor; predict a time when the continuous material processor will be in a No-Material state; and direct the movement of at least one of the plurality of batch delivery systems to minimize at least one of the estimated idle time and the time when the continuous material processor will be in the No-Material state.

column12: GRINDING MEDIA, SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR OPTIMISING COMMINUTION CIRCUIT
column13: A freely moving grinding media adapted to measure one or more physical characteristics of a comminution apparatus during operation or a charge therein is disclosed. The grinding media comprises a freely moving grinding body with a bore disposed in an outer body portion of the body. A sensor body is configured to be received in the bore. The sensor body comprises a rigid sleeve, a resilient core and a sensor array embedded in the core of resilient material. A system of optimising performance of a comminution circuit is also disclosed. The system comprises a comminution apparatus in response to one or more physical characteristics of the comminution apparatus or the charge contained therein, measured during operation of the comminution apparatus. The system comprises a plurality of the freely moving grinding media. A method of optimising performance of a comminution circuit is also disclosed.

column12: CONTROLLING BITUMEN RECOVERY FROM AN OIL SANDS ORE BODY BY USING A PREDICTIVE ORE PROCESSABILITY MODEL IN PRODUCING A BLENDED ORE FEEDSTOCK
column13: A method is provided for controlling bitumen recovery from an oil sands ore body in a bitumen extraction process by establishing and using a predictive ore processability model that accounts for multiple ore characteristics in planning ore deliveries from different locations of the ore body to produce a blended ore feedstock.
column14: SYNCRUDE CANADA LTD IN TRUST FOR THE OWNERS OF THE SYNCRUDE PROJECT

column12: Real-time monitoring method for ion-type rare earth dump leaching seepage efficiency
column13: The invention discloses a real-time monitoring method for ion-type rare earth dump leaching seepage efficiency, and belongs to the technical field of ion type rare earth ore leaching mining. The real-time monitoring method for the ion-type rare earth dump leaching seepage efficiency comprises the steps of embedding a moisture sensor (5) in an ore body, calculating a saturation degree of the ore body through utilizing the moisture content, calculating a permeability coefficient according to a relation between the saturation degree obtained through an indoor test and the permeability coefficient, and knowing the seepage efficiency in real time. By adopting the real-time monitoring method disclosed by the invention, the seepage efficiency in dump leaching mining of the ionic rare earth can be monitored in real time, so that the mining efficiency of the dump leaching of the ionic rare earth is monitored, the mining condition in the mining process is mastered, and a decision basis is provided for efficiently extracting and leaching ore. The problem that the ion-type rare earth dump leaching seepage efficiency cannot be effectively monitored in the prior art can be effectively solved.
column32: XIAOJUN WANG ET AL.: "Permeability and Adsorption-Desorption Behavior of Rare Earth in Laboratory Leaching Tests", 《MDPI》, pages 1 - 14;;周贺鹏 等: "离子型稀土矿渗流溶浸行为研究", 《稀有金属》, vol. 42, no. 5, pages 531 - 536

column12: Ball mill ore discharge granularity control method and system based on digital twinning technology
column13: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent control of the ore grinding process, and particularly relates to a ball mill ore discharge granularity control method and system based on a digital twinning technology. Comprising the following steps: S1, collecting industrial field data; S2, establishing an ore discharge granularity mechanism model; s3, a state and output deviation compensation model is established according to historical data and the mechanism model, and the data-driven deviation compensation model and the mechanism model jointly form a digital twinborn model of the ore grinding system; s4, training parameters of a reinforcement learning controller by using the digital twinborn model of the ore grinding system; s5, the trained controller parameters are transmitted to a field controller, and the field controller gives out a control instruction according to the predicted particle size distribution; and S6, when the performance of the control system is deteriorated or the process indexes are changed, retraining the parameters of the controller and online updating the data driving model. By outputting a deviation compensation model, ore discharge particle size distribution is introduced into a control system as feedback information.
column15: YAN GAOWEI;;WEI YUJIA;;LI RONG;;WANG FANG;;XIAO SHUYI

column12: Urban agglomeration combination trip chain extraction method and system based on mobile phone signaling big data
column13: The invention discloses an urban agglomeration combined trip chain extraction method based on mobile phone signaling big data, and the method comprises the following specific steps: obtaining mobile phone signaling big data in an urban agglomeration range from a communication operator, and designing different types of abnormal data preprocessing algorithms, the method comprises the following steps: respectively processing four types of abnormal mobile phone signaling data including repeated data, default data, ping-pong data and drift data, designing an automatic machine learning algorithm to identify a travel mode of each travel track point in the mobile phone signaling big data, and setting a corresponding parameter table for five different travel modes, and finally, the purpose of extracting the urban agglomeration multimode combined trip chain from the mobile phone signaling big data is achieved. The method provided by the invention is beneficial to further mining the data value of the current mobile phone signaling big data, thereby realizing further practical application in the fields of traffic, urban planning and the like.
column15: ZHANG CONGWEI;;YANG MIN;;LI HONGWEI;;HOU YIQI;;YANG YUYUAN;;TAN BAIZHAN;;HUANG SHIYU

column12: CONCENTRATE GRADE OPTIMIZATION ENGINE IN A MATERIAL PROCESSING SYSTEM
column13: Methods, systems, and computer storage media for providing a concentrate grade recommendation using a concentrate grade optimization engine in a material processing engine of a material processing system. The concentrate grade recommendation refers to a quantified value for concentrate grade that corresponds to an economic value for ore of a mining process. In operation, input data comprising material processing planning data and economic data associated with a recovery process are accessed. The input data is analyzed using a grade recovery relationship machine learning model. The grade recovery relationship machine learning model is trained on historical material processing data features associated with concentrate grade and recovery of the material recovery process. The historical data includes data on produced concentrate (e.g., achieved grades and corresponding recovery). Based on analyzing the input data, a concentrate grade that corresponds to an economic value is generated. The concentrate grade and the economic value are communicated.
column15: WOOD ROHIN;;PORTEOUS RIC ZONG-YANG;;VLADIMIROV ARTEM;;WALSH MALCOLM JAMES;;COOPER JULIAN EDWIN LOVETT

column12: A METHOD FOR MINING AND PROCESSING OF AN ORE
column13: The invention relates to a method for mining and processing of an ore. The method comprises at least one mobile comminution device (26) comprising at least one mobile crusher unit and at least one mobile grinding unit located proximate to an ore body that is being mined (20), fragmented ore (22) from the ore body is comminuted in the mobile comminution device (26) to a size which can be readily pumped (28) without the use of special carrier fluids, preferably to a particle size p50 in the range between 0.05 to 1 mm and the comminuted ore is combined with water to form a slurry.
column16: ANGLO AMERICAN TECHNICAL & SUSTAINABILITY SERVICES LTD (2022-04-08)

column12: Well drilling control method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mining, in particular to a well drilling control method, which can accurately and efficiently control drilling of an in-situ leaching mining horizontal well, and comprises the following steps: on the basis of surface monitoring data, logging-while-drilling data and surface logging data in a selected time period, determining the correlation degree between the gamma logging-while-drilling data and other parameters by utilizing IAGA; determining high correlation degree parameters through a grey correlation analysis method to form a training set and a test set, and training and testing the LSTM stratigraphic radioactivity feature prediction model until the prediction precision meets the requirement; on the basis of the data within the previous time t, predicting a predicted gamma value at the subsequent time t by using a model; if the error of the predicted gamma value and the actually measured while-drilling gamma logging data at the subsequent time t is smaller than an error threshold value, continuing to drill for the time t along the original direction; otherwise, the drill bit is controlled to drill for t time in the direction with the highest value of the gamma logging-while-drilling data in combination with the multidirectional gamma logging-while-drilling data, and then prediction is repeated based on the data in the previous (t + t) time.
column14: BEIJING RES INST CHEMICAL ENG & METALLURGY

column12: Apparatus, System And Method For Comminution
column13: A roller crushing machine for progressively crushing solid particulate material into finer size particulates is disclosed. It has a plurality of spaced-apart crushing stages arranged so that, a flow path of particulates travels consecutively from one crushing stage to the next, in between the outer peripheral surfaces of the rollers, which are adjustably displaceable from each other by a lateral distance not greater than a desired maximum particulate size from that crushing stage. When a flow of solid particulate material passes between cach of the pairs of rollers, the predetermined lateral distance encountered by the flow path can be controlled to be of a dimension which is sufficiently operably narrow to only apply a sufficient compression breakage force to just the topsize of the particulates at that size range of preselected solid particulate material, and a mono-layer flow of particles passing therethrough, to minimize energy consumption in that stage.

column12: LEACHING AGENT MIGRATION TEST SYSTEM AND LEACHING AGENT MIGRATION CONVERSION TEST SYSTEM
column13: A leaching agent migration test system (100) and a leaching agent migration conversion test system, relating to the field of metal ore leaching mining. An accommodating space (1103) near the bottom of a columnar container (111) is used for filling to form an anti-filtration layer (200); other accommodating spaces of the columnar container (111) are used for accommodating target ore field soil (300); a leaching simulation device (130) leaches the surface of the target ore field soil (300) sprayed with a leaching agent to be tested; then, a data collection device (120) collects water content data, temperature data, salinity data, and leaching agent residual content data of the target ore field soil (300) under leaching at different soil depths; a data processing device (140) summarizes the data collected by the data collection device (120), thereby completing the migration simulation test of the leaching agent in the target ore field soil (300), accurately testing the leaching migration rule of the target leaching agent in the target ore field soil (300), and providing data support for formulation of a pollution treatment scheme having a high treatment effect.
column15: ZHANG QIUYING;;REN FUTIAN;;BAI YANGWEI;;LI FADONG;;ZHANG YIZHANG;;LI BIN;;YANG GUANG;;WANG FAN

column12: Analysis and early warning method and system for data collection of Internet of Things equipment
column13: The invention provides an analysis and early warning method and system for data collection of Internet of Things equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining real-time report information of the Internet of Things equipment, and carrying out the unified definition; performing classification based on the real-time reported information of the Internet of Things equipment; performing data preprocessing on the classified data; performing association mining on the preprocessed data in corresponding different scenes, and determining association information of the Internet of Things equipment data; and carrying out real-time early warning according to the association information between the Internet of Things equipment data and a set equipment report information triggering condition. The method supports multiple types of data sources to acquire data and flow directions, and has extremely high safety reliability and data recovery capability.

column12: A HEADSET
column13: Disclosed is a headset configured to be worn by a user, the headset comprising a first ear cup configured to be worn at a first ear of the user, and a second ear cup configured to be worn at the respective other, second ear of the user; wherein the first ear cup comprises one or more first output transducers for provision of sound to the first ear in dependence on a first audio input signal; wherein the second ear cup comprises one or more second output transducers for provision of sound to the second ear in dependence on a second audio input signal; wherein the first ear cup comprises a first communication interface configured for connecting to a first external device, the first communication interface comprising a wireless transceiver and/or a first device connector configured to detachably connect to a first device cable; wherein the second ear cup comprises a second communication interface comprising a second device connector, wherein the second device connector is configured to detachably connect to a second device cable for connecting to a second external device; wherein the first ear cup and the second ear cup are interconnected by one or more interconnection cables; wherein the headset comprises one or more electronic circuits configured to enable the first external device, being connected to the first communication interface of the first ear cup, to exchange non-audio data with the second external device, being connected to the second device connector of the second communication interface of the second ear cup, via the one or more interconnection cables.

column12: Method and device for vulnerability mining and target range building of firmware of Internet of Things
column13: The invention belongs to the field of vulnerability mining of the Internet of Things, and particularly relates to a method and a device for vulnerability mining and target range building of firmware of the Internet of Things. The method mainly comprises the five steps of firmware collection and information extraction, firmware simulation and container management, automatic message analysis, fuzzy testing and vulnerability mining. The technical innovation points and the beneficial effects of the invention mainly comprise the following three aspects: a self-checking and error correction technology combining firmware static analysis and trial and error operation is proposed, and automatic configuration and improvement of a firmware file system are carried out, so that the success rate of simulation operation is ensured; a virtualized container technology is introduced, cluster management of IoT device firmware is achieved, parallel simulation and mining are achieved, and computing resources are efficiently utilized; the structured message analysis and the tropism variation algorithm do not destroy the exchange grammar and utilize the tropism score to guide the variation strategy and direction on the premise of ensuring the data deformity, so that the efficiency and the detection rate are improved.

column12: GOLF ASSISTING DEVICE AND METHOD WHICH CAN MEASURE PUTTING DISTANCE AND PUTTING DIRECTION
column13: A golf assisting device includes a distance measurement unit for measuring a distance from a user to the target point, a slope measurement unit for measuring a slope of a path from a main terminal to a target point, a putting information calculator for calculating putting information (putting distance and putting direction) necessary for the user from the measured distance and slope data, and an output unit for providing the calculated putting information to the user through a screen or voice.

column12: Multi-scale data acquiring and processing device and method for aluminum oxide production process
column13: A multi-scale data acquiring and processing device and method for an aluminum oxide production process. The device includes a production index and variable configuring module, a data acquiring module, a data storing module, a main control module, a display module, a data processing module and a data transmitting module. The main control module is used for emitting a command, acquiring production indexes and variables generated in the aluminum oxide production process by different process control devices, and is used for performing unified processing, storage and display on the data, and further the data is transmitted through a transmitting module to systems or devices using the data.

column12: Method and device for grinding and screening barite ore
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a barite ore grinding and screening method and device.The method comprises the steps that attribute data of barite ore are collected, data classification is conducted on the attribute data, and classified data of the attribute data are obtained; establishing a particle size distribution model of the barite ore according to the classification data; determining an efficiency factor of the screening efficiency of the barite ore, and generating a screening efficiency function of the barite ore according to the efficiency factor and the particle size distribution model; performing parameter initialization on the screening efficiency function to obtain an initialized efficiency function of the screening efficiency function; target data of a target barite ore are obtained, and the screening efficiency of the target barite ore is generated according to the target data and the initialization efficiency function; and grinding and screening the target barite ore according to the screening efficiency and a preset efficiency threshold value. The barite ore grinding and screening device can improve the barite ore grinding and screening efficiency.
column14: PINGLI LANTAI BARITE IND AND TRADE CO LTD
column32: 谢向东 等: "振动筛筛孔形状和筛网材料对筛分效率影响的仿真研究", 《中国矿业》, vol. 31, no. 02, pages 135 - 140;;郑桂霞 等: "自同步概率筛效率研究", 《机械科学与技术》, vol. 29, no. 07, pages 944 - 952

column12: Iron-zinc ore grinding and grading automation system
column13: The invention discloses an iron-zinc ore grinding and grading automation system which comprises an overflow type ball mill and a spiral classifier which are arranged in parallel, and further comprises a first conveying unit, a second conveying unit, a third conveying unit, a fourth conveying unit, a fifth conveying unit and a sixth conveying unit, and the first conveying unit is used for conveying ore ground by the overflow type ball mill into the spiral classifier; and the second conveying unit is used for conveying the ore washed and classified by the spiral classifier into the overflow type ball mill. The number of ores conveyed into the spiral classifier by the overflow type ball mill is adjusted through the arranged first conveying unit, and meanwhile, the number of ores conveyed into the overflow type ball mill by the spiral classifier is adjusted through the second conveying unit; therefore, the overflow type ball mill and the spiral classifier are always in the best production state, the production efficiency is improved, and meanwhile the situation that the overflow type ball mill and the spiral classifier produce in an overload mode or produce capacity is excessive is avoided.
column14: INNER MONGOLIA XINGYE GROUP RONGGUAN MINING IND CO LTD
column15: LIU YUNXIN;;PENG MINJIE;;HU WEILI;;HAO JIANJUN;;SUN PEIGANG;;SUN HAIBO;;BAI ZHICHAO

column12: Dump leaching in-heap sampling monitoring system device
column13: The utility model provides a heap leaching in-heap sampling monitoring system device which comprises extraction detection modules positioned at different heights in a heap and an on-line monitoring module externally connected with the extraction detection modules, the extraction and detection module comprises an extraction device and/or a detection device which are located at the same height; the online monitoring module comprises a data terminal and a collection device, the data terminal is electrically connected with a detection device, the detection device is used for detecting in-pile state parameters and transmitting the collected state parameters to the data terminal, the collection device is connected with an extraction device, and the online monitoring device further comprises a fixing and supporting module used for fixing and supporting the device. During ore dump leaching, the sampling and monitoring device is pre-embedded into an ore heap, so that air or solution at different heights at the position can be sampled, and process parameters such as temperature, pH value, potential and the like can be monitored on line.
column15: RUAN RENMAN;;JIA XIANBING;;JIA YAN;;TAN QIAOYI;;SUN HEYUN

column12: Natural enhanced leaching system and method for simulating and repairing arsenic and cadmium in soil of karst lead-zinc mining area
column13: The invention provides a natural enhanced leaching system and method for simulating restoration of arsenic and cadmium in soil of a karst lead-zinc mining area, and the method comprises the steps: building a mining area simulation model according to experimental requirements, arranging a leacheate preparation module, a leaching module, a confluence monitoring module, a sewage recovery processing module and an electric power restoration module at designated positions of the mining area simulation model, performing leacheate configuration operation through the leacheate configuration module to obtain a leacheate configuration operation result, performing leaching operation on the mining area simulation model through the leaching module to obtain a leaching operation result, and performing electric power restoration operation on the mining area simulation model through the electric power restoration module to obtain an electric power restoration operation result. According to the natural enhanced leaching system and method for simulating and repairing arsenic and cadmium in the soil of the karst lead-zinc mining area, the structure is simple, implementation is convenient, leaching repairing of harmful elements such as arsenic and cadmium in the soil of the karst lead-zinc mining area can be simulated, and reference is provided for actual soil repairing.

column12: Slope stability determination method and system based on digital twinning, medium and terminal
column13: The invention discloses a side slope stability determination method and system based on digital twinning, a medium and a terminal, relates to the technical field of digital twinning and the field of ionic rare earth ores, and mainly aims at solving the problem that when a liquid ore leaching agent is injected into an ore body, the stress condition of a mine side slope is changed, and then the stability of the mine side slope is affected. Comprising the steps that a determination instruction for target mine slope stability parameters is received, and the determination instruction carries a target moment; determining underground water level data of the target mine at the target moment from the water potential field time distribution data of the target mine; based on a strength reduction method, three-dimensional slope stability calculation is carried out according to the underground water level data, and a mine slope stability prediction result of the target mine at the target moment is obtained.

column12: Systems and methods for industrial robotics
column13: Systems and methods for industrial robotic platforms. Squads of industrial robots autonomously communicate and work together. A control center may monitor the autonomous operations. Software at the control center, squad, and robot levels forms a distributed control system that analyzes various data related to the platform for monitoring of the various systems. Artificial intelligence, such as machine learning, is implemented at the control center, squad, and/or robot levels for swarm behavior driven by intelligent decision making. Each robot includes a universal platform attached to a task-specific tooling system. The robots may be mining robots, with a mining-specific tooling system attached to the universal framework, and configured for mining tasks. The platform is modular and may be used for other industrial applications and/or robot types, such as construction, satellite swarms, fuel production, disaster recovery, communications, remote power, and others.

column12: Data interaction method based on Internet of Things equipment acquisition
column13: The invention discloses a data interaction method based on Internet of Things equipment acquisition. The data interaction method is realized by utilizing a gateway, Internet of Things equipment and an Internet of Things informatization system. The Internet of Things informatization system is connected with the gateway, the Internet of Things equipment is connected with the gateway, and the gateway, the Internet of Things equipment and the Internet of Things informatization system jointly form an Internet of Things network; the Internet of Things informatization system is used for receiving the sensing data acquired by various types of Internet of Things equipment, providing a unified informatization platform for acquisition, convergence, processing, fusion and mining analysis of the sensing data, and simultaneously providing a sharing distribution service of the sensing data; and the gateway is used for realizing data analysis on the heterogeneous network modules, so that the data forwarding coordinators among the heterogeneous networks exchange information with each other through the serial port modules of the gateway. Through cooperation of communication network module interface capabilities of a gateway, an intelligent terminal and other devices, the Internet of Things device can select a proper mode according to the network environment condition.

column12: Method for predicting relative size of wear rate of lining plate under different ore grinding parameters based on discrete element method
column13: The invention relates to a method for predicting the relative wear rate of a lining plate under different ore grinding parameters based on a discrete element method, and belongs to the technical field of ore grinding of mineral processing. Different ore grinding parameter schemes are set according to the production requirements of a selection plant; drawing a barrel lining plate model, an ore grinding medium model and an ore particle model, and importing the models into an EDEM model; setting material attributes and contact parameters; setting other ore grinding parameters consistent with the field; and the accumulated tangential collision energy of the cylinder lining plate under different schemes is obtained, and the relative size of the abrasion rate under different ore grinding parameters is compared according to the Akard abrasion law, so that the optimal ore grinding parameters for improving the abrasion of the lining plate are determined. According to the method, the relative size of the wear rate of the lining plate under different ore grinding parameters of the ball mill is predicted based on the Acade wear law and the discrete element method, so that the optimal ore grinding parameters are determined.

column12: Leaching Agent Migration Test System and Leaching Agent Migration Conversion Test System
column13: Abstract A leaching agent migration test system (100) and a leaching agent migration conversion test system, relating to the field of metal leaching mining. An accommodating space (1103) near the bottom of a columnar container (111) is used for filling to form an anti-filtration layer (200); other accommodating spaces of the columnar container (111) are used for accommodating target ore field soil (300); a leaching simulation device (130) leaches the surface of the target ore field soil (300) sprayed with a leaching agent to be tested; then, a data collection device (120) collects water content data, temperature data, salinity data, and leaching agent residual content data of the target ore field soil (300) under leaching at different soil depths; a data processing device (140) summarizes the data collected by the data collection device (120), thereby completing the migration simulation test of the leaching agent in the target ore field soil (300), accurately testing the leaching migration rule of the target leaching agent in the target ore field soil (300), and providing data support for formulation of a pollution treatment scheme having a high treatment effect. column12: Mining Boost power supply and mining data exchange system
column13: The utility model relates to a mining Boost power supply and a mining data exchange system, which are used for supplying power to a load module, and the mining Boost power supply comprises a direct current power supply module which outputs direct current voltage to be boosted to a Boost circuit module; the Boost circuit module is used for boosting the input direct-current voltage to target voltage; a protection switch module; the circuit protection module is used for sampling a voltage signal in the circuit network and comparing the voltage signal with a reference voltage, and/or sampling a current signal in the circuit network and comparing the current signal with a reference current, and controlling the protection switch module to open or close according to a comparison result; when the cold start control module monitors that the direct-current power supply module supplies power, the protection switch module is controlled to be open, and the Boost circuit module controls the protection switch module to be closed until the output end of the Boost circuit module reaches target voltage. According to the utility model, the problem of impact current during cold start of the mining Boost power supply can be solved with low cost.

column12: Blockage cleaning robot for secondary crushing of lump ores in mine draw shaft
column13: The utility model discloses a secondary crushing and plug cleaning robot for mine draw shaft lump ores, and belongs to the technical field of robots. The device comprises an AI identification assembly, a base, a large arm, a small arm and a hydraulic breaking hammer, the AI identification assembly is connected with the base through a bus, one end of the base is rotationally connected with the large arm through a rotating shaft, one end of the large arm is rotationally connected with the small arm through a rotating shaft, and one end of the small arm is rotationally connected with the hydraulic breaking hammer through a rotating shaft; the AI recognition assembly comprises an AI camera and a CAN bus support, the AI camera recognizes large ore transmission and uses the CAN bus support, and the CAN bus support is connected with the AI camera and the base. The device can replace manual operation to complete equipment operation, so that the working intensity of operators on duty is reduced, the investment of operators is reduced, the labor cost is reduced, the working efficiency is improved, and the device has the characteristic of high practicability.

column12: Crushing production line based on Internet of Things control
column13: The utility model discloses a crushing production line based on internet of things control, which comprises a crusher, a first belt conveyor for conveying materials to the crusher and a second belt conveyor for outputting crushed materials. The feeding hopper, the first belt conveyor and the second belt conveyor are provided with dust concentration sensors for detecting the dust concentration in air and spray nozzles for spraying dust removal water mist to materials in the feeding hopper, the first belt conveyor and the second belt conveyor, and the spray nozzles are installed on dust removal water pipes. The crushing production line based on the control of the internet of things has the beneficial effects that the crushing production line based on the control of the internet of things utilizes the technology of the internet of things, can automatically monitor the dust pollution condition in air in real time, and can automatically and rapidly perform dust removal operation on ore materials, inhibit dust flying and protect the ecological environment in case of strong wind weather; the automation and intelligence degree is high, and the practicability is good.

column12: Ionic type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area calculation method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of mining, and particularly relates to a method for calculating the area of an ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area, a relation model of the ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area S and infiltration time t is established, and the flow is shown in Figure 13. On the premise that the initial ore leaching blind area Sa, the wetting front initial intersection time t1, the end point ore leaching blind area Sb and the maximum wetting front forming time t2 are calculated through a numerical simulation method, the blind area S can be directly obtained according to the infiltration time t. According to the method, the change rule of the ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area is converted into a mathematical problem to be solved and analyzed, then a calculation model of the ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area is established, a certain basis is provided for quantification of the ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching blind area, and then a reference is provided for arrangement optimization of an ion type rare earth hole net (well).

column12: Distribution design method and system for rare earth ore in-situ leaching liquid extraction wells and medium
column13: The invention discloses a distribution design method and system for rare earth ore in-situ leaching liquid extraction wells and a medium. The method comprises the steps that ore body geologic characteristics, rare earth distribution characteristics and hydrogeologic characteristics are obtained; screening a slope body from the mine as a target slope body; constructing a rare earth element leaching model; predicting the number of target liquid extraction wells of the target slope body through the rare earth element leaching model; the position of a liquid pumping well on the target slope body is determined; a target liquid pumping well arrangement mode is determined; and generating a liquid pumping well distribution design scheme. According to the method, the distribution number, the positions and the arrangement mode of the liquid extraction wells are designed, the geologic characteristics of the ore body, the distribution characteristics of rare earth and the hydrogeologic characteristics are comprehensively considered, the applicability of the distribution of the liquid extraction wells to working conditions is improved, the design cost is reduced, and the design efficiency is improved. The method can be widely applied to the technical field of in-situ ore leaching.

column12: Ore granularity detection method and system based on autonomous learning and deep learning
column13: The invention relates to an ore granularity detection method and system based on autonomous learning and deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: 1) obtaining and labeling ore image data, and constructing an ore granularity grading training sample set and a test sample set; 2) performing image preprocessing on the ore granularity training sample data set to enhance the image effectand reduce the image noise; 3) identifying the working state of the rubber belt conveyor: establishing a ResNet50 model to identify and distinguish three working states of rubber belt stopping, idling and normal material loading; 4) establishing a convolutional neural network model by using a convolutional neural network algorithm in deep learning to classify the ore granularity sample data set;5) establishing an autonomous learning mechanism to carry out model iteration and optimization; and 6)using trained model to carry out on-line real-time detection on ore granularity. The ore granularity online real-time detection method has the advantages that the granularity detection precision can be remarkably improved, and the purposes of improving the crusher efficiency and reducing the crushing energy consumption are achieved.

column12: Method of recovering Pt or Ag or Pt and Ag from sulfate based metal solutions
column13: The invention relates to a method of recovering Pt or Ag or Pt and Ag from a sulfate solution on an electrode. In particular, the invention concerns a method for recovering Pt or Ag or Pt and Ag from base metal bearing process solution, particularly from a hydrometallurgical sacrificial metal bearing solution containing Zn and/or Ni. In general, the method of the present invention can be used for recovery of precious metals, which are dissolvable in sulfuric acid, from sulfate media based solutions. In addition to Pt and Ag, especially Pd should be mentioned.Deposited precious metal(s) can be recovered from the electrode or the deposition containing electrode can be used as such.

column12: Method for calculating critical liquid injection intensity of in-situ ore leaching of round bare-foot type rare earth mine
column13: The invention discloses a muddy round bare-foot type rare earth mine in-situ leaching critical liquid injection intensity calculation method, which comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out production ore block engineering geological exploration to obtain topographic geological data of production ore blocks, and drawing a typical geological profile map; s2, performing production ore block liquid injection process design on the typical geological profile map, determining topographic conditions according to topographic and geological data, and determining liquid injection conditions according to liquid injection process design data; s3, a production ore block liquid injection infiltration line is calculated, and a production ore block liquid injection stable infiltration line equation is obtained; s4, according to the production ore block liquid injection stable infiltration line equation, a liquid injection infiltration line on the typical section of the production ore block is obtained; s5, according to the typical geological profile map and the liquid injection infiltration line, the safety coefficient of the mine slope, the critical liquid injection strength of the ore blocks and the critical liquid injection water level of the ore blocks are obtained through calculation. According to the method, accurate calculation of the critical liquid injection intensity of in-situ ore leaching of the muddy and round bare-foot type rare earth mine is realized.

column12: MEASUREMENT SYSTEM AND MEASUREMENT METHOD
column13: A measurement system 50 measures a grade of an excavated material generated from an underground tunnel including a plurality of mining points. The underground tunnel is constructed based on a mining plan of a mine planned based on primary grade data and primary position data corresponding to the primary grade data measured in a preliminary geological survey. The measurement system includes a measuring unit (grade measuring unit) 61 that measures the grade of the excavated material generated from the underground tunnel, a secondary grade data acquisition unit (grade data acquisition unit) 72 that acquires secondary grade data indicating the grade of the excavated material from the measuring unit 61, and a secondary position data acquisition unit (position data acquisition unit) 73 that acquires secondary position data corresponding to the secondary grade data.

column12: DYNAMIC MAPPING OF NODES RESPONSIBLE FOR MONITORING TRAFFIC OF AN EVOLVED PACKET CORE
column13: Introduced here are visibility platforms able to process the traffic handled by the gateways of an Evolved Packet Core (EPC) with Control and User Plane Separation (CUPS). A visibility platform can include a control processing node (CPN) and one or more user processing nodes (UPNs). The visibility platform may populate a data structure in which the CPN and UPNs are associated with locations along an interface on which Sx/N4 traffic is exchanged between the control and user planes. Each location may be representative of the point on the Sx/N4 interface at which Sx/N4 traffic processed by the corresponding node is acquired. The CPN can use the data structure to program session flows that impact how user traffic is handled by the UPNs.

column12: AN ADJUSTABLE ROLLER MILL MACHINE FOR GRAINS AND DERIVATIVES THEREOF
column13: The invention is a roller mill machine (100) which enables grinding said grains by means of approaching and moving away the grinding elements (4) according to the grain sizes that enter through the product inlet port (5) by means of the piston (1) and the eccentric rod (2) included within the main body (6) and by means of the compression of the cup springs (3), characterized in that it comprises the following; a force sensor (10) which measures the pressure force over the cup spring (3) created by the grinding elements (4) during grinding process of the grain and thereby determines the required pressure force for grinding process according to the grain size, a power control element (20) which enables determining the position of the grinding elements (4) according to the grain size, by means of enabling the pressure force determined with said force sensor (10) to be kept in a continuous and stable manner during the process.

column12: ORE DRESSING MULTI-PRODUCTION-INDEX OPTIMIZATION DECISION MAKING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON CLOUD AND MOBILE TERMINAL
Sandstone particle size distribution curve detection method based on deep learning
column13: The invention discloses a gravel particle size distribution curve detection method based on deep learning, relates to a gravel particle size detection method, and belongs to the technical field of tiny target detection. The invention aims to solve the technical problem that a watershed algorithm is easy to cause under-segmentation for an image which is seriously stacked and has high ore density. The method comprises the following steps: 1, data acquisition; 2, constructing a training data set; 3, model training; and 4, predicting particle size distribution. According to the method, the technical problem of under-segmentation caused by the watershed algorithm for the image with serious stacking and high ore density is solved. Real-time, automatic and intelligent ore particle size detection is realized, and particle size distribution of gravel generated by crushing can be monitored in real time. And the production operation is guided through the particle size distribution condition, so that intelligent production is realized.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ONLINE CONTROL OF A CHEMICAL TREATMENT SOLUTION USING SCALE SATURATION INDICES
column13: Systems and methods for applying a chemical treatment solution to a process stream in an industrial processing system while the system is online. The method includes measuring a real-time pH of the process stream, determining a dosage of the chemical treatment solution based on a relationship between the dosage and a scale saturation parameter that is calculated based on the real-time pH of the process stream, and controlling application of the chemical treatment solution to the process stream based on the determined dosage.

column12: SYSTEM, APPARATUS AND/OR PROCESS
column13: A process for remote localization of an object including: receiving/determining two or more magnetic field measurements using at least one magnetometer of a magnetic field generated by a magnetic field source (MFS) in a marker apparatus remote from the magnetometer and in/on an opaque medium such that the magnetic field extends through the opaque medium and/or through a navigable medium between the MFS and the magnetometer; receiving/determining two or more respective measurement locations of the magnetic field measurements in 3D by determining locations of the magnetometer when the magnetic field measurements are/were determined; and numerically estimating a location of the MFS in 3D using the magnetic field measurements, the measurement locations, and a mathematical model representing the system as a magnetic dipole (the MFS) in the navigable and opaque media and the resulting magnetic fields. The measurements can be made while a speed of the magnetometer is substantially non-zero travelling along a path including the measurement locations.

column12: Flotation recovery rate prediction method based on ore gene characteristics
column13: The invention provides a flotation recovery rate prediction method based on ore gene characteristics, and relates to the field of mineral processing. The method comprises the following steps: determining at least one target mineral in ore to be selected and a content influence coefficient of each target mineral; calculating an influence coefficient of an ore structure presented by the target mineral; determining a particle size influence coefficient of the target mineral; and predicting the recovery rate of the ore to be selected based on the content influence coefficient, the influence coefficient of the ore structure presented by the target mineral and the particle size influence coefficient. According to the method, the flotation recovery rate can be directly predicted according to the ore property difference, theoretical recovery rate prediction does not need to be carried out through related data such as ore grinding, a mineral separation process and a production process, the recovery rate prediction efficiency is improved, and a basis can be provided for subsequent design, production and optimization of a mineral separation plant.

column12: Sectional dump leaching test stock column
column13: The utility model provides a sectional dump leaching test stock column which is characterized by comprising a stock column which is provided with a feed port, a liquid inlet, a discharge port and a liquid outlet and is internally provided with a dump leaching cavity, a hoisting mechanism is arranged above the stock column, a filter plate matched and connected with the discharge port is arranged in the dump leaching cavity of the stock column and is positioned above the liquid outlet, and a discharge port is formed in the stock column. The material column is formed by sequentially connecting a plurality of sections of subsection bodies in a lap joint mode, a heap leaching liquid spraying assembly is arranged in the subsection body located on the uppermost layer, a spiral slag removing machine connected with a slag removing assembly is arranged in the subsection body located on the lowermost layer, and a liquid outlet of the material column is formed in the spiral slag removing machine. The liquid outlet is respectively connected with a dump leaching liquid circulating tank and a slag-containing dump leaching liquid storage tank through a liquid outlet pipeline, and the dump leaching liquid circulating tank is connected with a dump leaching liquid spraying assembly through a circulating pipeline. The height of the stock column is flexibly adjusted through multiple sections of segmented bodies, so that the device is suitable for different types of ore dump leaching tests, accurate test data are obtained, and reliable technical support is provided for design of an ore dump leaching production process.
column14: KUNMING ENGINEERING & RES INSTITUTE OF NONFERROUS METALLURGY CO LTD

column12: Intelligent ore positioning and crushing control method and device
column13: The invention provides an intelligent ore positioning and crushing control method and device. The method comprises the following steps: synchronously shooting a draw shaft area by adopting two binocular cameras; identifying the image through a deep learning instance segmentation algorithm to obtain a large ore and a breaking hammer; extracting matching feature points from the identified target image areas of the large ore and the breaking hammer, and performing three-dimensional point cloud reconstruction on the matching feature points; calculating the position of a crushing point of the large ore; the action information of moving the breaking hammer to the large ore breaking point is calculated; sending a movement control signal to an electric control device of the crusher according to the action information, and controlling the crusher to move a crushing hammer to a crushing point of the large ore; and a crushing control signal is sent to crush the large ore. According to the intelligent ore positioning and crushing control method and device provided by the invention, the implementation links are rapid and stable, the visual detection range is wide, the image resolution is high, and accurate positioning and efficient and rapid secondary crushing of the ore at the ore pass under the mine shaft are ensured.
column14: SHENZHEN AOSHI DEBEI TECH CO LTD

column12: MULTIDIMENSIONAL PRIVACY CONTROL
column13: Systems and methods are disclosed that enable multidimensional privacy control for consumers, to more effectively control their privacy, even while accepting some targeted marketing that provides time-savings, monetary savings, and other benefits. Agreements may involve smart contracts implemented on a blockchain, to provide time-limited access to marketing data, such as purchase histories recorded in receipts held by a digital wallet. The access may be specified in differing tiers of visibility, with certain classes of information withheld, and different types of recipients allowed or blocked. This permits consumers to intelligently select a trade-off between sharing information and receiving value resulting from that sharing, with the consumers in control of the specific type of information shared, and the types of entities that my receive particular information. Thus, privacy may be controlled in a multidimensional manner that is advantageous to consumers.

column12: Automatic lithotripsy method and equipment based on three-dimensional laser radar and camera and medium
column13: The invention discloses an automatic stone crushing method and device based on a three-dimensional laser radar and a camera and a medium, relates to the field of stone crushers, and obtains three-dimensional point cloud data and image data of ores in real time by installing the three-dimensional laser radar and the camera on the device. And the calculation unit is used for processing and analyzing the data of the three-dimensional laser radar and the camera, so that the ore is segmented and positioned, and the position coordinates of the shape center of the ore are obtained. The control system converts the coordinate information into motion information and transmits the motion information to the execution mechanism, and the execution mechanism achieves automatic stone crushing operation on ore. The ore position is automatically recognized through data fusion of images and radar point clouds, and the ore position is converted into motion information of an execution mechanism through inverse kinematics analysis, so that the breaking hammer automatically breaks stones. And the safety and the production efficiency of ore extraction are improved.
column14: SHANDONG XINYIDAI INFORMATION INDUSTRY TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: POWER OPTIMIZATION THROUGH ORCHESTRATION AND PRIORITIZATION OF MACHINES AND FUNCTIONS
column13: Systems and methods are provided for managing power usage in mining environments. The amount of power needed to operate a set of electrical machines that are to run simultaneously is determined. Power usage by the electrical machines during a time period can be predicted based on how much power is expected to be needed by each machine. If the predicted power usage exceeds a threshold power usage, power to one or more electrical machines in the mining environment is restricted so that actual power usage in the mining environment does not exceed the threshold power usage during the specified time period. The electrical machines which will have power restricted thereto can be selected based at least in part on relative priorities for the electrical machines in the set. Power can be restricted to machines as a whole (an effective shutdown), or to specific operations of the machines.

column12: Photoelectric energy method for promoting biological metallurgical leaching rate of microorganisms Ar-4
column13: The invention discloses a photoelectric energy method for promoting the biological metallurgical leaching rate of microorganisms Ar4. The invention provides an application of photoelectron catalysis or external constant potential electrons in improving a leaching rate of target metal or target metal ions leached from sulfide metal ore by using Metallospharomyces acidophilus sp. Ar4CGMCC NO.3402 ora culture thereof or a fermentation product thereof or a suspension thereof. According to the photoelectric energy method for promoting the biological metallurgical leaching rate of the microorganisms Ar-4, under the catalytic action of simulated photoelectrons, the leaching rate of the M.cuprina Ar4 to copper ions and iron ions in the chalcopyrite is increased, and the good biological metallurgical capacity is achieved.
column15: JIANG CHENGYING;;LIU SHUANGJIANG;;SONG JINLONG;;FAN HUA;;ZHOU NAN;;LIU CHANG

column12: FLUIDIZED-BED FLOTATION UNIT, MINERAL PROCESSING APPARATUS, AND FLUIDIZED-BED FLOTATION METHOD
column13: This disclosure relates to a fluidized-bed flotation unit (1000), its use, a mineral processing apparatus, and a fluidized-bed flotation method. The fluidized-bed flotation unit (1000) comprises a tank (1100) for holding a volume of slurry (1001). The tank (1100) comprises a launder (1101) with a launder lip (1102), a fine slurry outlet (1110) below the launder lip (1102), and a coarse slurry outlet (1106) below the fine slurry outlet (1110) for discharging coarse output slurry (1107) from the volume of slurry (1001). The fluidized-bed flotation unit (1100) comprises a solid- liquid separation arrangement (1700) con figured to collect output slurry (1701) from the volume of slurry (1001) via the fine slurry outlet (1110) and to separate suspended solids and flotation liquid from the output slurry (1701) to form a solids portion (1702) and a liquid portion (1703).

column12: Ion-type rare earth ore leaching blind area detection method and system
column13: The invention relates to an ion-type rare earth ore leaching blind area detection method and system, and the method comprises the steps: enabling a plurality of test lines of a resistivity meter to be arranged in a ridge direction, carrying out the detection of an ore body through the plurality of test lines, and obtaining the apparent resistivity data detected by each test line, wherein each test line comprises a plurality of electrodes, the distance between every two adjacent electrodes on each test line is set according to different topographic features of a mountain, and the ore body is arranged in the mountain body; performing inversion on the apparent resistivity data to obtain an apparent resistivity profile map of each test line; and determining the ore body region corresponding to the resistivity greater than a set threshold value in the apparent resistivity profile map as a high-resistance abnormal region, wherein the high-resistance abnormal region is the position of an ore leaching blind region. According to the method, the high-density resistivity meter detection technology is mainly used for carrying out measuring line fixed point, data acquisition and data inversion on the ore body for ore leaching, so that the position of the detected ore leaching blind area is obtained, and accurate positioning of the ore leaching blind area is realized.
column14: JIANGXI IONIC RARE EARTH ENGINEERING RES CO LTD;;UNIV JIANGXI SCI & TECHNOLOGY

column12: Computer-based system for providing psychological therapy
column13: Apparatus for use in a computer-based system for providing psychological therapy, the apparatus comprising: an access system configured to control access to features and data by users of remote devices, wherein the users comprise patients, therapists and supervisors; and a therapy system configured to enable text-based instant messages to be sent between patients and therapists; wherein the access system is configured to allow patients to retrieve messages sent and received by the patient, therapists to retrieve messages sent and received by the therapist, and supervisors to retrieve messages sent and received by particular patients and/or therapists.

column12: Molybdenum selection process production technology and method based on industry big data
column13: The invention provides a molybdenum selection process production process based on industry big data and a method thereof. Molybdenum is subjected to coarse crushing treatment through a jaw crusher, ore is crushed to the crushing particle size of 20-30 mm through a fine crusher, and crushed materials are fed into a stock bin through an elevator; uniformly conveying the finely ground material to a ball mill for finely grinding, wherein the grinding time is 1-2 hours; feeding the crushed fine mineral material into a rotary classifier, and washing and classifying the mixed ore by utilizing different solid particle proportions and different liquid settling velocities; after being stirred in a stirrer, the ore is conveyed to a flotation machine for flotation, bubbles and ore grains are combined and statically separated through dynamic collision of the bubbles and the ore grains, and the needed ore is separated from other substances; and roasting is conducted, concentrate is roasted in a rotary kiln, the temperature ranges from 500 DEG C to 650 DEG C, moisture contained in fine ore obtained after flotation is removed, in the process that the fine ore is stirred in a stirrer and then conveyed to a flotation machine for flotation, preferential flotation aluminum powder and gangue powder are mixed with a flotation agent, inflation is conducted, and molybdenum concentrate is obtained in the flotation machine.

column12: DIVERGENCE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM FOR ION BEAM SUBSTRATE PROCESSING SYSTEMS
column13: A divergence measurement system includes an ion beam sensor including an enclosure including a first aperture on a first surface of the enclosure. A Faraday cup is arranged in the enclosure and includes a second aperture to receive ions generated by a plasma source and to generate a current signal based thereon. A first positioning device moves the Faraday cup within the enclosure.

column12: Ore grindability obtaining method and device and prediction model
column13: The invention discloses an ore grindability obtaining method and device and a prediction model. According to the method, production data of ore grinding of the current batch of ore in the current production period of the ball mill are obtained, wherein the production data include the feeding amount, the water adding amount, the sand returning amount, the ball adding amount of the ball mill, the ore grinding granularity, the overflow granularity, the mill power and the production efficiency of products with the qualified granularity; the current production data is processed by using a pre-constructed ore grindability prediction model, in the processing process, a key feature extraction model in the ore grindability prediction model extracts ore grinding key features from the current production data, and a regression prediction model performs fitting extraction on the relationship between the ore grinding key features and the ore grindability; and outputting a predicted value of the grindability of the ore, namely the grindability of the ore in the current production period. According to the method, the grindability of the ore can be obtained on line in the current production period, so that the ore grinding process of subsequent batches of ore can be guided, and the real-time requirement of ore grinding process control is met.
