column12: Electric power data sharing system, method and equipment based on artificial intelligence and block chain, and medium
column13: The invention discloses an electric power data sharing system, method and equipment based on artificial intelligence and a block chain, and a medium. The system comprises an electric power data collection module, an electric power data storage module, a user identity authentication module, an electric power data authentication module, an electric power data downloading module, an artificial intelligence module, a block chain infrastructure and an intelligent contract thereof. According to the system, various intelligent algorithms are provided to process original data so as to solve the problems of information exchange and data sharing of all electric power departments, effective technical means and platform support are provided for intelligentization of a power grid, and technical support is provided for further analysis and mining of electric power system characteristics from the original electric power data; and meanwhile, the security and confidentiality of the original power data can be ensured by using the block chain technology.
column14: GUANGZHOU POWER SUPPLY BUREAU GUANGDONG POWER GRID CO LTD

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATED INTENT MINING, CLASSIFICATION AND DISPOSITION
column13: An agent automation system includes a memory configured to store a corpus of utterances and a semantic mining framework and a processor configured to execute instructions of the semantic mining framework to cause the agent automation system to perform actions, wherein the actions include: detecting intents within the corpus of utterances; producing intent vectors for the intents within the corpus; calculating distances between the intent vectors; generating meaning clusters of intent vectors based on the distances; detecting stable ranges of cluster radius values for the meaning clusters; and generating an intent/entity model from the meaning clusters and the stable ranges of cluster radius values, wherein the agent automation system is configured to use the intent/entity model to classify intents in received natural language requests.
column15: SAPUGAY EDWIN;;MADAMALA ANIL KUMAR;;NABOKA MAXIM;;SUNKARA SRINIVAS SATYASAI;;SANTOS LEWIS SAVIO LANDRY;;SUBBARAO MURALI B

column12: Urban agglomeration operation state knowledge graph construction method, system and equipment
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of big data, particularly relates to an urban agglomeration operation state knowledge graph construction method, system and equipment, and aims to solve the problems that an existing method lacks comprehensive quantitative analysis of operation states of urban agglomeration in all fields and cannot meet the requirement for deep mining of operation rules of the urban agglomeration. The method comprises the steps of obtaining multi-source heterogeneous urban agglomeration operation data, converting the multi-source heterogeneous urban agglomeration operation data into an urban agglomeration operation spatio-temporal data set and dividing the urban agglomeration operation spatio-temporal data set into subsets, and determining a general urban agglomeration operation state index based on the spatio-temporal data subset, and calculating an index weight based on the general urban agglomeration operation state index in combination with urban characteristics, and constructing an urban agglomeration operation state index system so as to construct an urban agglomeration operation state knowledge graph. According to the method, the extraction of the potential relationship among the operation elements in the urban agglomeration is realized, and technical improvement is provided for the deep mining of the operation rule of the urban agglomeration.

column12: Beneficiation method for ore blending
column13: The invention belongs to the field of mining industry, and relates to a beneficiation method for ore blending, which comprises the following steps: sampling in a stope, manually selecting a sample, crushing the sample, screening and preparing the sample, carrying out first-stage ore grinding, carrying out first-stage magnetic separation, carrying out second-stage ore grinding, carrying out second-stage magnetic separation, demagnetizing magnetic concentrate, carrying out third-stage magnetic separation, carrying out flotation experiment preparation on magnetic separation tailings, and carrying out flotation experiment and sample assay analysis. Experimental concentrate products are obtained through experiments, the experimental concentrate is subjected to element test analysis, and grading experiment data serves as a product index pre-judgment basis after ore of all stopes enters ore dressing production.
column14: ANHUI LUJIANG LONGQIAO MINING CO LTD
column32: 苏兴国: "某高碳酸铁硅酸铁铁矿石可选性及配矿试验研究", 现代矿业, no. 4, pages 8 - 11;;A.L.穆拉尔等: "《碎磨回路的设计和装备》", 冶金工业出版社, pages: 4

column12: Ore crushing method based on binocular stereoscopic visual perception
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of ore crushing, in particular to an ore crushing method based on binocular stereoscopic visual perception, which comprises the following steps of: shooting left and right images by using a binocular camera, and performing stereoscopic correction on the images to remove distortion; then segmenting an ore area, removing irrelevant pixels, and calculating a two-dimensional centroid of the ore; carrying out stereo matching on the image to obtain a disparity map; performing three-dimensional reconstruction on the disparity map to obtain a three-dimensional point cloud of the ore, and converting the three-dimensional point cloud into a manipulator coordinate; searching the three-dimensional point cloud and performing plane fitting by adopting an RANSAC (Random Sample Consensus) algorithm to obtain a crushing point and a crushing direction of a crushing hammer; and finally, the crushing hammer is controlled to crush the ore. According to the method, the ore is accurately positioned, the centroid of the ore is efficiently obtained, the three-dimensional matching effect is good, the crushing point and the crushing direction of the crushing hammer can be rapidly obtained, the automation degree is high, precision is high, real-time performance is good, and the method is efficient, reliable and low in cost.

column12: Method for determining grinding granularity of ore based on ore properties
column13: The invention discloses a method for determining the grinding granularity of ores based on the properties of the ores, and relates to the technical field of mineral processing, the method comprises the following steps: S1, selecting five groups of ores with similar elements and mass sizes, and marking, S2, crushing the five groups of ores through a crusher, recording the energy consumption and time of testing, and determining the grinding granularity of the ores according to the recorded energy consumption and time. S3, putting the five groups of crushed ores into the grinding machine, and recording the test time and energy consumption, and S4, calculating the recorded time and energy consumption, and calculating the size of the particles entering the grinding machine with lower average number of energy consumption and time. According to the method, due to the fact that the weights of the ores are similar, the time of the ores is recorded on the X axis of a data graph through the ratio of the recorded energy consumption to the used time, then the energy consumption is recorded on the Y axis, arrangement is conducted according to the serial numbers of the ores, and the maximum value of the ratio of the energy consumption to the speed can be calculated through the five sets of data graphs; therefore, the crushing power of the crusher is calculated, and the energy loss of device work is reduced.

column12: Method for predicting semi-autogenous grinding hard rock crushing effect and determining steel ball grading based on Tavaries crushing model
column13: The invention relates to a method for predicting a semi-autogenous grinding hard rock crushing effect and determining steel ball grading based on a Tavaries crushing model, and belongs to the technical field of semi-autogenous grinding ore grinding optimization. Performing a uniaxial compression test on the raw ore; the method comprises the following steps: calculating fracture energy of ores with different size fractions through an integral force-displacement curve, fitting a logarithmic normal distribution function of the fracture energy of the ores, fitting a damage accumulation constant solved by a power function of a damage variable and displacement, and carrying out statistics on crushing particle size distribution under different stress energy to fit a crushing distribution function; the semi-autogenous grinding fed ore is subjected to whole-fraction particle size screening analysis, and the distribution conditions of ore media, hard rock and qualified fractions of the fed ore are determined; determining a grading ratio scheme of the semi-autogenous grinding steel balls; the method comprises the following steps: calibrating related parameters of a Tavaries fragmentation model in EDEM software; calculating and setting the number of added steel balls and the number of ore particles of different size fractions, and calibrating material attribute parameters of the barrel lining plate, the steel balls and the ore and contact parameters among the particles; setting operation parameters and starting simulation; and after the simulation is finished, predicting an optimal steel ball scheme for eliminating hard rock accumulation of the industrial production semi-autogenous mill. According to the invention, visual analysis of the motion state of the semi-autogenous mill in the ore grinding process can be realized.
column15: XIAO QINGFEI;;XIE HAOSONG;;LUO ZHONG;;WANG YONG;;WANG XIAOJIANG;;NIU GUIQIANG;;ZHOU QIANG;;LIU XIANGYANG
column32: 马帅;肖庆飞;张谦;杨森;: "钢球配比及充填率的对比试验研究", 有色金属(选矿部分), no. 05, 15 September 2020 (2020-09-15), pages 64 - 67;;吴桂义;安站东;薛钢琴;李同清;尹自信;常向东;: "钢球级配对铁矿石的磨矿动力学研究", 有色金属工程, no. 03, 15 June 2018 (2018-06-15), pages 95 - 99;;夏节: "基于离散单元法的立式同轴离心球磨机介质优化研究", 中国优秀硕士学位论文全文数据库工程科技Ⅰ辑, no. 1, 15 January 2019 (2019-01-15), pages 021 - 421

column12: A METAL AGGLOMERATE PRODUCTION CONFIGURATION
column13: The present invention concerns a metal agglomerate production configuration (1) comprising an induration apparatus (3) configured to provide a metal oxide material manufacturing thermal process (MTE) comprising indurating a metal ore material (5) into a metal oxide material (7) and a method of production of metal agglomerates. A cooler device (9) is configured for cooling the metal oxide material (7) discharged from the induration apparatus (3) and comprises a first heat transferring arrangement (11) configured for transferring a first heat energy content (HE') to the induration apparatus (3), which first heat energy content (HE') is recovered from the metal oxide material (7) holding said thermal energy (TE). The configuration (1) comprises a second heat transferring arrangement (13) configured for transferring a second heat energy content (HE'') from the induration apparatus (3) to the cooler device (9) for cooling of the metal oxide material (7), which second heat energy content (HE'') is recovered from the metal oxide material manufacturing thermal process (MTE).

column12: THE PRODUCTION METHOD OF LITHIUM CARBONATE USED IN THE CATHODE MATERIAL OF LITHIUM-ION BATTERIES FROM BUXITE ORE
column13: The invention relates to the production method of lithium carbonate (Li2CO3) from bauxite ore, which provides lithium recovery for use in the cathode material of rechargeable li-ion batteries that enable the operation of portable computers, tablet computers, smartphones, electric vehicles by removing lithium with negative effects from the process in facilities where aluminum hydroxide (Al(OH)3) production process is performed using bauxite ore.

column12: METHOD FOR MULTI-INFORMATION FUSION OF GAS SENSITIVITY AND CHROMATOGRAPHY AND ON-SITE DETECTION AND ANALYSIS OF FLAVOR SUBSTANCES BASED ON ELECTRONIC NOSE INSTRUMENT
column13: Provided is a method for multi-information fusion of gas sensitivity and chromatography and on-site detection and analysis of flavor substances using an electronic nose instrument. The electronic nose instrument includes a gas sensor array module (I), a capillary gas chromatographic column module (II), an automatic headspace sampling module (III), a computer control and data analysis module (IV), an automatic lifter (V) for headspace sampling, a large-volume headspace vapor generation device (VI) and two auxiliary gas sources (VII-1, VII-2). The electronic nose instrument detects a large number of odorous samples to establish a big odor data. On this basis, the normalization fusion preprocessing is done, and the cascade machine learning model realizes both an on-site recognition of many foods, condiments, fragrances and flavors, and petroleum waxes and a real-time quantitative prediction of their odor quality grades and many key component concentrations.
column15: WANG ZEJIAN;;GAO DAQI;;LI BO;;ZHANG XIAOQIN;;CAI FANG;;LI JIANHUA;;CHENG MINGJIAN

column12: PREDICTIVE MODELING TOOL
column13: A system and method of simulating and optimizing industrial and other processes includes a computer that performs multivariate analysis of input variables and output variables to generate a data model of the operation of the process. For industrial applications, the input variables include process variables and the output variables include result variables from the operation of the industrial process. The data model determines contributions to changes in the output or result variables by the respective input or process variables and is provided to a predictive algorithm to identify parameter values for input or process variables expected to have a most significant impact on the output or result variables during performance of the process. The outputs of the predictive algorithm are parameter values that are provided as input or process variables to the industrial process for simulation or performance optimization or product recommendations/optimizations.
column15: GIVOT MAIKEN;;JOHANSSON MATS E;;TACKE LOTHAR N;;WISTRAND LARS M;;WILLCOCK JOHN N

column12: Verification method of power consumer portrait information
column13: The invention discloses a power consumer portrait information verification method, which belongs to the technical field of power management, and comprises the following steps: obtaining an initial user portrait of a power consumer, the initial user portrait comprising historical power consumption information, basic attributes, payment information and appeal attributes; defining a label and setting a label weight for the initial user portrait to generate a user label data source; carrying out random extraction on the obtained label data sources, carrying out model training and model verification on a part of the label data sources through a deep learning algorithm, taking the part of the label data sources as training samples, and taking the rest of the data as prediction samples; writing into a prediction database; and training the training sample, establishing a prediction model, and performing data classification mining analysis on the prediction sample by using the prediction model to obtain a power consumer portrait. The method is beneficial to predicting customer behaviors, reducing enterprise loss, being capable of finding problems in time, and improving the electricity charge recovery efficiency and effect.

column12: Experimental device and method for enhancing copper sulphide ore leaching by utilizing seawater-based solution
column13: The invention provides an experimental device and method for enhancing copper sulphide ore leaching by utilizing a seawater-based solution, and belongs to the technical field of copper sulphide ore leaching. The device comprises a liquid storage tank, a liquid outlet valve, a reflux liquid valve, a stirring motor, stirring blades, ionic solution tanks, a seawater storage tank, a liquid flow meter,a confluence valve, a pH sensor, an oxidation-reduction potential sensor, a Cu <2+> ion sensor, a Fe <3+> ion sensor, a water bath temperature control layer, a flow guide straight pipe, a fixed plate, fixed bolts, a reaction column top plate, a data integration computer, a reaction column, a porous partition plate, a liquid discharge valve, a liquid collection tank, a peristaltic pump, a water inlet, a water bath temperature controller and a water outlet. The device is simple in structure and high in visualization degree, an effective device and method are provided for revealing the influencemechanism of key ions such as Fe <3+> and Cu <2+> on leaching, and a good reference is provided for enhancing copper sulphide ore leaching by utilizing the industrial seawater-based solution.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR A MILLING SYSTEM
column13: A milling system comprising: a feed assembly configured to transport materials; a milling station in communication with the feed assembly and arranged to process the materials to smaller sizes; a separating assembly in communication with the milling station and arranged to produce a mineral concentrate, and a control system arranged to control operation of at least one of the feed assembly, the milling station and the separating assembly, based on a target flow rate of the separating assembly.
column32: MORKUN VOLODYMYR, SAVYTSKYI OLEKSANDR, TYMOSHENKO MAXYM: "Multiagent Control and Predictive Diagnostics of Distributed Iron Ore Enrichment System Based on CPS", ADVANCES IN CYBER-PHYSICAL SYSTEMS, vol. 1, no. 2, 23 February 2016 (2016-02-23), pages 119 - 124, XP093136529, ISSN: 2524-0382, DOI: 10.23939/acps2016.02.119;;SAVYTSKYI A.I., TYMOSHENKO M.A.: "AUTOMATED CONTROL OF CLASSIFICATION IN A HYDROCYCLONE WITH INCOMPLETE INFORMATION", COMPUTER SCIENCE, INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY, AUTOMATION, vol. 3, no. 2, 1 January 2017 (2017-01-01), pages 4 - 6, XP093136530, ISSN: 2414-9055, DOI: 10.31721/2414-9055.2017.3.2.4;;PUTLAND, B: "HARD ROCK – CRUSH IT OR LET IT BREAK ITSELF? - CEEC (Coalition for Eco Efficient Comminution)", SAG CONFERENCE 2019, 22 September 2019 (2019-09-22), XP093136531, Retrieved from the Internet <URL:https://www.ceecthefuture.org/resources/hard-rock-crush-it-or-let-it-break-itself-brian-putland1-rebecca-sciberras1-1orway-mineral-consultants-wa-pty-ltd-omc> [retrieved on 20240229]

column12: Grinding and filing area planning method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to a file grinding area planning method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining medical image data of a hip joint part of a target object; inputting the medical image data into a pre-trained deep learning model to obtain bone tissue data output by the deep learning model and position information of the acetabular fossa center point; based on the bone tissue data, generating a pelvic bone model to be filed; and according to the pelvis model, the position information and a preset acetabular cup model, determining a filing area of the pelvis model, and visually displaying the pelvis model and the filing area. Through the method and the device, the problems of low segmentation efficiency and low segmentation precision caused by dependence on experience and proficiency of operators on manual segmentation based on pelvic bone tissue in related technologies are solved, automatic segmentation of the medical image data based on the pre-trained deep learning model is realized, the segmentation precision and efficiency can be improved, and the segmentation efficiency is improved. And the pelvis model and the filing area are visually displayed.
column14: WUHAN UNITED IMAGING ZHIRONG MED TECH CO LTD

column12: Crusher ore feeding control method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a crusher ore feeding control method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps that the predicted working state of a crusher is determined according to a final crusher working state model; according to the predicted working state of the crusher, the material level of a crushing cavity, the power of the crusher and the normal power fluctuation interval of the crusher, a crusher feeding frequency mathematical model is constructed; constructing a crusher feeding frequency expert experience model according to the expert experience data; the crusher feeding frequency mathematical model and the crusher feeding frequency expert experience model are fused, and a final feeding frequency prediction model is determined; and determining an ore feeding frequency prediction value according to the real-time working parameters of the crusher through the final ore feeding frequency prediction model, and controlling the ore feeding frequency of the crusher according to the ore feeding frequency prediction value. Therefore, the ore feeding frequency prediction value is determined based on the final ore feeding frequency prediction model, the ore feeding frequency prediction value of the crusher is output to the control system, ore feeding control over the crusher is achieved, and the ore feeding control effect is improved.

column12: Metallic ore mining, grinding and separating method
column13: The invention discloses a metallic ore mining, grinding and separating method, and relates to the technical field of ore mining, the metallic ore mining, grinding and separating method comprises the following steps: S1, ore mining: mining an ore base material by using mining equipment, and conveying the ore base material to a flat ground by using a conveying device after mining; and S2, ore grinding, wherein the mined ore is ground through grinding equipment. Mineral aggregate is fed through the top of the transferring feeding frame in advance, the mineral aggregate can slowly slide in an inner cavity of an inclined groove under the influence of gravity, at the moment, an electromagnet body is controlled to be powered on to generate magnetic force, iron ore in the mineral aggregate can be adsorbed through the magnetic force, and the function of automatically separating the iron ore is achieved; the problem that other ore materials are mixed into the iron ore to bring troubles to users is avoided, meanwhile, through the design of a tension sensor, the content of the iron ore on the magnetic suction plate can be monitored through tension, and after the content reaches a preset value, feedback is conducted to the users.

column12: Beneficiation process for efficiently recovering iron and rare earth from bayan obo medium-lean oxidized heaped ore
column13: The invention discloses a mineral processing technology for efficiently recovering iron and rare earth from bayan obo medium-lean oxidation stacking ore. The mineral processing technology comprises the following steps that S1, raw ore is directly subjected to dry separation after being crushed; s2, the dry separation concentrate is subjected to coarse grinding through a ball mill; coarse grinding products are subjected to weak magnetic separation; weak magnetic tailings are subjected to strong magnetic separation; weak magnetic concentrate and strong magnetic concentrate are mixed and then are subjected to fine grinding through an Ai sand mill, fine grinding products are subjected to weak magnetic separation, weak magnetic tailings are subjected to strong magnetic separation, and the strong magnetic concentrate is subjected to reverse flotation iron separation to obtain iron concentrate. And the first-section strong magnetic tailings and the second-section strong magnetic tailings are subjected to one-roughing and three-concentration rare earth flotation correspondingly, and rare earth concentrates are obtained. The comprehensive iron ore concentrate with the TFe grade being 64.5% or above and the recovery rate being 65% or above and the comprehensive rare earth ore concentrate with the REO grade being 60% or above and the recovery rate being 45% or above can be finally obtained through the dry separation-stage grinding separation-iron reverse flotation-rare earth forward flotation technology, and the effect is outstanding.

column12: Automatic ore crushing and humidifying equipment
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of mining mechanical equipment, and particularly relates to automatic ore smashing and humidifying equipment which comprises a smashing bin and a plurality of sets of smashing mechanisms, a feeding port and a discharging port are formed in the upper end and the lower end of the smashing bin respectively, and the multiple sets of smashing mechanisms are vertically installed in the smashing bin at intervals. Spacing nets are mounted on the two sides of the crushing mechanism in the crushing bin, the crushing bin is divided into a crushing cavity and a humidifying cavity by the spacing nets, and humidifying mechanisms are mounted on the two opposite sides of the crushing bin. The ore crushing and humidifying device has the technical characteristics of simple structure, convenience in use, capability of uniformly humidifying ores at different positions in the ore crushing process and high automation degree.
column14: GUANGXI KETONG BUILDING MATERIAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Mining and metallurgy beneficiation device and using method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a mining and metallurgy mineral separation device and a using method thereof.The mining and metallurgy mineral separation device comprises a feeding frame, a conveying belt and a plurality of transmission rollers, extension shafts are coaxially and fixedly connected to the two ends of each transmission roller, and the multiple transmission rollers are rotationally connected between the inner walls of the feeding frame through the corresponding extension shafts; the outer end of one extension shaft is coaxially and fixedly connected with a first transmission block, the upper end face of the feeding frame is fixedly connected with a pair of supporting plates in a symmetrical structure, the same ore screening mechanism is arranged above the pair of supporting plates, a mounting frame is arranged on the outer wall of the side face of the ore screening mechanism, a motor is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the mounting frame, and a transmission mechanism is arranged in the mounting frame. And an ore crushing mechanism is arranged above the ore screening mechanism. Ore crushing is achieved through the ore crushing mechanism, ore screening is achieved through the ore screening mechanism, ore conveying is achieved through the conveying belt, and therefore automation and simplified operation of ore crushing, screening and conveying are achieved, and the working efficiency is improved.
column14: GANSU TUJIE INFORMATION ENG CO LTD

column12: Ore classification and size grading method and device based on deep learning network
column13: The invention provides an ore classification and particle size grading method and device based on a deep learning network in order to solve the problem that in the prior art, an image recognition technology for analyzing ore categories and particle size distribution at the same time needs to be improved, and belongs to the technical field of ore dressing. According to the method, the improved Faster-RCNN target detection network in computer vision is applied to extract features, classification and positioning of ores are completed at the same time, and an artificially designed feature extractor is replaced; through the ore position extracted by the target detection network, segmenting the ore by using an FCN semantic segmentation network to obtain granularity information of the ore; moreover, the high-quality image information is obtained by carrying out the data preprocessing work of contrast-limited adaptive histogram equalization, white noise removal and the like on the image; and meanwhile, the ore is classified and segmented by combining target detection and semantic segmentation technologies, so that the efficiency of the crusher is improved, the crushing energy consumption is reduced, and guidance is provided for subsequent processes.
column14: YANG STEEL GROUP MINING INDUSTRY LTD COMPANY

column12: Full-intelligent sintering fuel granularity control method
column13: The invention relates to a full-intelligent sintering fuel particle size control method. The method comprises the following steps: calculating the weight ratio of to-be-measured fuel with the particle size greater than 5mm; when the weight ratio exceeds a weight ratio threshold value, parameters of the four-roller crusher are readjusted to control particle size distribution; when the weight ratio does not exceed the weight ratio threshold value, the to-be-detected material is dried, and a high-definition high-speed industrial camera is used for shooting and collecting falling motion data of the to-be-detected material; processing the motion data by utilizing a machine vision technology and an artificial intelligence technology to obtain the size grading distribution of the to-be-detected material; and the size grading distribution information is transmitted to the four-roller crusher, and parameters of the four-roller crusher are automatically adjusted according to the difference value between the weight ratio of the ore grains with the grain size larger than 5 mm and the required ratio. In the prior art, the distance between lower rollers of a four-roller crusher is difficult to adjust by comparing the weight proportion of large-particle-size ore grains with the required proportion, so that the problem that the large-particle-size ore grains of the sintering fuel cannot reach the required proportion and the control effect is poor is solved.

column12: HYBRID SYSTEM FOR CONTAMINANTS CONTROL OF INDUSTRIAL PROCESS
column13: This Invention Patent application provides a comprehensive program for control of organic and inorganic contaminants from paper production processes and other potentially pollutant industries through the integrated action of three continuous treatment systems, referenced herein as “3WAY”, with a first system aimed at the treatment of process waters for reuse, more specifically “white or clarified water” present in the “wet end” of paper and cellulose machines, allied to a second system based on the use of an adsorbent clay mix equipment that enables treatment of the cellulose pulp in previous phases of the process up to the machine circuit, in addition to a third system that carries out the cleaning of contaminant deposits present in clothing (felts and wires) or other machine parts through application of a heated and pressurized cleaning solution with a high detergency power.

column12: Automatic filling mining system
column13: The invention discloses an automatic filling mining system which comprises an equipment assembly system and further comprises a data acquisition module, a data processing module, a record storage module, a feedback control module and a management detection module. The data information of the whole equipment assembly system is acquired in real time, and the control quantity of each part is calculated, so that the automation degree and the working efficiency are improved, the workload of front-line operators is reduced, and the safety is improved. Meanwhile, the mining equipment can complete secondary crushing and preliminary screening operation while crushing mining is performed through the crushing rollers, and has the advantages of being simple in structure, low in cost and the like.

column12: AVOIDING PROHIBITED SEQUENCES OF MATERIALS PROCESSING AT A CRUSHER USING PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS
column13: A method may include receiving, from at least one first machine, telemetry data. The at least one first machine may be operable to transport materials from at least one material source location to at least one material destination location. The method may further include sending at least one command to at least one machine based on whether a predicted sequence of processing of materials by at least one second machine at the at least one material destination location violates at least one prohibited sequence of processing. The predicted sequence of processing may be based on at least one of: a predicted sequence of arrival of the at least one first machine at the at least one material destination location, material attribute data, destination queue data, or a score for the predicted sequence of arrival.

column12: Superfine grinding quality control method for high-sulfur micro-fine particle disseminated gold concentrate
column13: The invention discloses a superfine grinding quality control method for high-sulfur micro-fine particle disseminated gold concentrate, which comprises the following steps: detecting the particle size composition of gold mineral particles in the gold concentrate and the particle size composition of a grinding product, and calculating the probability of'exposure 'of the gold mineral particles of each particle size in the mineral particles of each particle size of the grinding product. And respectively listing the three groups of data in the form of matrixes, and carrying out continuous multiplication on the three matrixes to obtain the gold mineral exposure degrees of different ore grinding products, so as to obtain the leaching benefits of the different ore grinding products. And the difference value between the leaching'income 'and the ore grinding energy consumption cost is compared, and the ore grinding time corresponding to the maximum point of the difference value, namely the maximum point of the'income', is the optimal ore grinding time. Therefore, the optimal ore grinding time can be determined, namely, the optimal ore grinding fineness is determined, so that the control of related parameters in the superfine ore grinding process is guided, the ore grinding quality is improved, and under-grinding and over-grinding are avoided.

column12: Method for monitoring and evaluating soil moisture in mining disturbance area of well and application thereof
column13: The invention provides a method for monitoring and evaluating soil moisture in a mining disturbance area of a well and application of the method. The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: S1, collecting mining area data, and determining a mining boundary and a working face position of a well mine; s2, predicting the earth surface disturbance dynamic state, setting a soil moisture monitoring area in a predicted disturbance generation area, and carrying out point distribution; s3, full-period soil moisture monitoring is carried out before disturbance, in the disturbance process and after disturbance; and S4, calculating and evaluating the dynamic change of the soil moisture of the mining disturbance area of the well according to the monitoring data obtained in the step S3. By adopting the method provided by the invention, the moisture dynamic data can be obtained more effectively and accurately, so that the influence of mining disturbance on the soil moisture self-recovery capability can be judged more accurately and comprehensively, and related work of ecological recovery of a mining disturbance area is guided.

column12: ORTHOTIC SOLE AND INSOLE DEVICES, SYSTEMS, METHODS, AND COMPUTER READABLE MEDIA FOR USE WITH HIGH HEEL FOOTWEAR
column13: Orthotic sole devices, systems, methods, and computer readable media are for use with footwear. Three-dimensional scans are used to shape the devices to match the user's feet with the footwear. Each of the devices includes a sunken heel portion, a stopper portion, an arch portion, metatarsal pads, a bunion-cut out shape, and a built-in toe crest portion, all to help redistribute the user's weight away from their forefoot. The devices are infused with eucalyptus oils and silver ions. The devices are automatically manufactured via computer numerical control (“CNC”) software on a computer readable medium. Milling machines and 3D printers can be used in association with the systems, methods, and computer readable media.

column12: Method and apparatus for risk mining
column13: A computer implemented method for mining risks includes providing a set of risk-indicating patterns on a computing device; querying a corpus using the computing device to identify a set of potential risks by using a risk-identification-algorithm based, at least in part, on the set of risk-indicating patterns associated with the corpus; comparing the set of potential risks with the risk-indicating patterns to obtain a set of prerequisite risks; generating a signal representative of the set of prerequisite risks; and storing the signal representative of the set of prerequisite risks in an electronic memory. A computing device or system for mining risks includes an electronic memory; and a risk-identification-algorithm based, at least in part, on the set of risk-indicating patterns associated with a corpus stored in the electronic memory.

column12: AUTOMATIC RESTARTING AND RECONFIGURATION OF PHYSICS-BASED MODELS IN EVENT OF MODEL FAILURE
column13: A simulation model recovery method, system, and computer program product include initiating a simulation model, during an operation of a model, periodically writing a solution space of the model to a checkpoint restart file, during an operation of the model, periodically writing diagnostic information on model progression to a log file, detecting a failure of the model, based on the log of the model, determining a time of the failure, based on the model outputs and restart files, determining a period of a numerical instability preceding the failure, selecting a checkpoint of the model preceding the period of the numerical instability, based on the numerical instability and diagnostic information in log files, modifying a configuration of the model, and restarting the model based on the selected checkpoint and the modified configuration.

column12: Mechanical automatic ore crushing device
column13: The utility model discloses a mechanical automation ore smashing device which comprises a box body and a sieve plate, a feeding port is formed in the top face of the box body, a fixed smashing plate is welded to the portion, located in the box body, of one side below the feeding port, and a swing smashing plate is rotatably connected to the portion, located in the box body, of the other side belowthe feeding port. Beneficial effects are as follows. The output end of the motor drives the disc to push the push rod; therefore, the swing crushing plate is pushed to reciprocate close to the fixedcrushing plate; extrusion comminution of ore, screening is conducted through a screen plate slidably connected in the box body; the crushed large ores are guided out through an inclined plate welded at one end of the sieve plate; small ores enter the filter material cavity through the first screen on the surface of the screen plate and are discharged through the discharge hopper, and small ores penetrate through the second screen in the filter material cavity and are discharged through the discharge port in the bottom surface of the box body, so that multi-stage screening and discharging of crushed ores are facilitated, and the screening effect is good.

column12: Ore metallic mineral content prediction method based on high-voltage electric pulse crushing
column13: The invention provides an ore metallic mineral content prediction method based on high-voltage electric pulse crushing. The method comprises the following steps: selecting an ore particle sample with a specific size fraction, crushing the sample with a high-voltage electric pulse, detecting the electric pulse in the crushing process to obtain pulse waveform signal data, determining the element content of a crushed product, establishing a mathematical model according to the element content, the particle physical property and the detection data of the electric pulse, and predicting the metallic mineral content in the to-be-detected ore particles through the mathematical model; According to the method, ores are selectively crushed by virtue of the induction effect of metallic minerals on electric breakdown, so that an electric breakdown channel is in direct contact with the metallic minerals in ore particles, the overall metallic mineral content information in the ore particles can be converted into process signals such as electric pulse waveforms capable of being detected on line, and indirect measurement of the metallic mineral content of the ore particles based on the electric breakdown process signals is realized.
column15: ZUO WEIRAN;;SUN RUI;;LIU SHUAI;;GUO BAO;;GUO JINGYI

column12: Mill ore feeding amount prediction method based on image recognition technology
column13: The invention relates to a mill ore feeding amount prediction method based on the image recognition technology. Under the condition that the granularity of an ore grinding product is kept stable, image information corresponding to ore feeding amounts (t/h) of different mills on a mill ore feeding belt conveyor is acquired through a CCD (Charge Coupled Device) industrial camera and is transmitted to a computer control system. The online effective recognition of the ore grindability is realized by using a deep learning DenseNet model and a transfer learning method, so that the relationship between the ore grindability of ore fed by a mill and the ore feeding amount of the mill is established, and the online effective recognition method has the advantages that the change of the ore grindability is judged through an image recognition technology, the ore feeding amount of the mill is judged in advance, and the ore grinding efficiency is improved. A foundation is laid for pre-controlling andadjusting the ore feeding amount of the mill according to the change of the ore grindability, and the ore grinding machine-hour handling capacity can be stabilized and improved on the basis of efficient ore grinding.

column12: DISH ORDERING DINING TABLE BASED ON AR TECHNOLOGY, AND METHOD FOR USING SAME
column13: The present invention relates to the technical field of smart restaurants. Disclosed are a dish ordering dining table based on AR technology, and a method for using same, which aim to solve the existing problem of how to improve the dining experience of customers on the basis of AR technology. A plurality of cup holders, which are evenly distributed along the circumference, are arranged at the upper end of a table top, a temperature display device and a change-over switch are arranged at the rear end of each cup holder, a touch screen is installed on one side of each cup holder, a supporting column is fixedly arranged in the middle of the lower end of the table top, a recovery channel is provided in the middle of the interior of the table top, a movable board is installed at the upper end of the recovery channel, a placement board is installed inside the recovery channel, acoustic devices are installed on two sides of the lower end of the table top, an AR projection device is installed on one side above the table top, and an AR dish ordering module performs control by means of a host, thereby achieving the effect of improving the dining experience of customers on the basis of AR technology.
column14: NANJING XUANSHI QIYUAN SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD

column12: METHOD FOR DEVELOPMENT OF COMPLEX-STRUCTURE SOLID MINERAL DEPOSITS
column13: FIELD: mining.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to mining industry and can be used in open-cast development of complex-structure deposits of solid minerals by means of production complex. Method for development of complex-structure deposits of solid minerals, involving excavation of ore mass by mining complex based on quarry hydraulic excavator, unloading of ore mass from ladle into receiving hopper, automation of processes to convert cyclic nature of digging into continuous flow of submerged ore mass with separation of lumpy ore mass for further crushing. Control of conditionality of ore mass to ensure selectivity of extraction is carried out by means of sensors installed on ladle. At extraction of standard ore rotary device reduces width of classifier slits by means of partial overlapping, oversize product is directed for crushing, and undersize product of classifier through intermediate hopper and material from grinder are directed to vibrating screen equipped with set of sieves. Fine fractions enriched with the useful component are sent to the accumulator, and the remaining ore mass is directed through the feeder and conveyor into the dump truck for transportation to lump separation and subsequent enrichment, or to the temporarily off-grade ore storage. Fractions enriched with the useful component are fed from the accumulator to the tight bin of the vehicle and transported for enrichment by means of the pneumatic conveying system.EFFECT: method increases efficiency, provides for expansion of functionality and increased technological efficiency due to reduction of losses of valuable components during loading and transportation, and also – reduction of environmental load on environment in area of mining operations.1 cl, 6 dwg

column12: Intelligent speed regulating system of belt conveyor
column13: The utility model discloses an intelligent speed regulating system of a belt conveyor, and relates to mining communication and mining control equipment. The system comprises an AI intelligent analysis camera, a mining intrinsic safety type speed sensor, a mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type access gateway, a mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type monitoring substation, a mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type frequency conversion control cabinet and an upper computer configuration system, wherein the AI intelligent analysis camera and the mining intrinsic safety type speed sensor are output to the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type access gateway, and the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type access gateway is connected with the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type monitoring substation and the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type frequency conversion control cabinet. The upper computer configuration system exchanges data with the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type monitoring substation through the Ethernet, and the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type frequency conversion control cabinet controls the running speed of the belt conveyor.

column12: Mining double-wire network control system
column13: The invention provides a mining double-wire network control system. The mining double-wire network control system comprises the following steps: S1, supplying power to a mining double-wire network transmission system; s2, performing configuration operation; s3, carrying out addressing operation; and S4, entering a normal operation state. The mining double-wire network control system is provided with two system topology structures, controllers are grouped, cascaded in the groups and communicated through the data conversion equipment, the data transmission and communication efficiency is improved, and the forwarding times of the controllers are reduced; the groups are communicated through a gigabit/10 gigabit network, so that the data bandwidth is improved; hierarchical management of data in the system is realized, control data and video data are separated, and big data are transmitted through an optical fiber; the upper layer data exchange (data conversion equipment) can realize wired and wireless data exchange and transmission.

column12: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DISTRIBUTED STORAGE SYSTEM
column13: Provided is an artificial intelligence (AI) distributed storage system which has a form in which general users provide storage and videos of a plurality of video content creators are operated in the storage by a storage controller, thereby reducing cost of building a distributed storage. According to the present invention, the AI distributed storage system comprises: a plurality of storage nodes provided from a plurality of users, configured to store a plurality of video content provided by a plurality of content providers to stream data in a scheme of transmitting the video content requested by a viewer in real-time in block unit of an appropriate size according to an environment of a system in accordance with a throttle BPS of a video and communicate with each other to exchange files; a front-end server receiving a request storing the video content from the content provider and displaying the video content read from the storage node on a screen in response to a video content request of the viewer; a back-end API server mining coins while the viewer accesses the front-end server to play the requested video content, thereby providing rewards to each storage node storing the video content and providing streaming to the viewer according to compensation rules; and the storage controller monitoring the connection status of the plurality of storage nodes in real-time and periodically checking seeds and capacity which represent the content transmission amount and the number of distributed videos of the plurality of storage nodes.

column12: Tantalum-niobium ore ball mill
column13: According to the technical scheme, the tantalum-niobium ore ball mill is characterized in that the tantalum-niobium ore ball mill comprises a base, two lifting bins are fixedly installed on the top face of the base, adjusting blocks are movably connected into the lifting bins in a sleeved mode, and a grinding bin is arranged between the two adjusting blocks; the recording assembly is arranged on one side of the adjusting block located on the left side and used for recording the number of rotation turns of the grinding bin, and by arranging a grinding ball, when the grinding ball is attached to the inner wall of the grinding bin and driven by the grinding bin under the action of inertia, centrifugal force and friction force, the rotation turns of the grinding bin can be recorded. When the tantalum-niobium ore is taken to a certain height and thrown under the action of gravity, the sponge strip can touch the striking counter when the sponge strip rotates, the striking counter transmits data to the electronic control screen to be displayed at the moment, the tantalum-niobium ore can be crushed once when the grinding bin rotates by a half circle, and the tantalum-niobium ore is crushed once when the grinding bin rotates by a half circle. And a worker can conveniently control the grinding time.

column12: Ore grinding optimization treatment system based on large model
column13: The invention discloses an ore grinding optimization processing system based on a large model, and the system comprises a semi-autogenous mill optimization algorithm processing module which is used for carrying out the processing of a semi-autogenous mill optimization algorithm through an optimization algorithm, and obtaining an optimization node; the semi-autogenous mill preprocessing module is used for realizing man-machine interaction front-end semi-autogenous mill parameter and variable iteration, remote semi-autogenous mill automatic monitoring, semi-autogenous mill input variable preprocessing and normal operation semi-autogenous mill connection; the large model fuzzy expert system module is used for providing a deep learning optimization algorithm and empirical rules of semi-autogenous mill fuzzy logic for data processing; the semi-autogenous mill parameter configuration selection module is used for configuring the working mode of the semi-autogenous mill optimization algorithm under different parameters, the urgent requirement of the mine industry for the efficient and intelligent ore grinding technology is met, and a solid foundation is laid for development of the ore grinding optimization technology in the future.

column12: Pressurized multi-channel column leaching test device and test method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a pressurized multi-channel column leaching test device and a test method thereof, and relates to the technical field of column leaching test equipment.The pressurized multi-channel column leaching test device comprises a leaching column, a liquid storage mechanism, a liquid injection power mechanism, an auxiliary infiltration mechanism and a liquid collection mechanism, an ore sample is arranged in the leaching column, and a containing cavity is formed in the top of the ore sample; the liquid storage mechanism, the liquid injection power mechanism and the containing cavity are sequentially communicated through liquid conveying pipes, the auxiliary infiltration mechanism is communicated with the containing cavity through a gas conveying pipe and used for introducing gas into the containing cavity, and a liquid leakage opening is formed in the bottom of the leaching column and communicated with the liquid collecting mechanism; the containing cavity is formed in the top of the ore sample in the leaching column, and the liquid injection power mechanism and the auxiliary infiltration mechanism are arranged, so that an ore leaching agent solution has a certain water head, meanwhile, different pressure values can be set above the ore sample according to different conditions, pressure seepage in the actual leaching process can be simulated, the test accuracy is guaranteed, and the test efficiency is improved. And a certain theoretical reference is provided for continuous efficient and green development of the mining process of the ionic rare earth ore.

column12: Method for predicting the life expectancy of a component of an observed vehicle and processing unit
column13: The life expectancy of a component of a vehicle that is being observed is predicted. A processing unit is fed with status data of components of selected vehicles. Moreover, the processing unit is fed with an operating parameter for each of the components of the selected vehicles. The operating parameter influences the status data of the respective component. The processing unit determines a function between the operating parameter and the status data for each of the selected components. One function, which fits best for the component of the observed vehicle, is selected by an algorithm. The processing unit is fed with an operating parameter of the component of the observed vehicle. The processing unit predicts the life expectancy of the component of the observed vehicle using the selected function and the operating parameter of the component of the observed vehicle.

column12: Ionic type rare earth in-situ ore leaching system
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching, and provides an ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching system which comprises a sensing system and a control system. In the sensing system, the process parameter sensing system comprises an NH4 < + > ion concentration monitoring sensor, a pH meter and a liquid level meter in the liquid preparation tank, a pH meter and a liquid level meter in the liquid collection tank and a pH meter in the sedimentation tank, and the flow sensing system comprises linear electromagnetic flow meters between the liquid preparation tank and the liquid injection pump and between the mother liquid tank and the sedimentation tank; the control system comprises a server and an online electric adjusting ball valve in a liquid injection pipe network; the sensing system, the liquid injection pump, the liquid extraction pump and the on-line electric adjusting ball valve are electrically connected with the server, and the server is used for automatically controlling the liquid injection pump, the liquid injection area, the liquid injection flow and the liquid extraction pump. According to the method, remote online intelligent control over the whole process of in-situ ore leaching from liquid injection to liquid collection can be achieved, and the leaching rate, the leaching efficiency, the environmental protection property, the safety and the stability of ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching are greatly improved.

column12: Assessing the benefits of automatic grinding control using PST technology for true on-line particle size measurement
column13: A mineral extraction system features at least one hydrocyclone, each having input piping, underflow piping, a cyclone portion and overflow piping; a particle size measurement device arranged on some part of the at least one hydrocyclone and configured to sense particles flowing in a process medium, and providing signaling containing information about the size of the particles in the process medium; and a controller having a signal processor configured to receive the signaling, and determine control signaling to control some part of the mineral extraction system, based upon the signaling received.

column12: Matching method and device for ore grinding control parameters and electronic equipment
column13: The invention provides a matching method and device for ore grinding control parameters and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of ore grinding, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining historical data corresponding to a pre-selected ore grinding grading state parameter set and current data to be matched; determining working condition categories in the ore grinding classification process based on historical data; and matching ore grinding control parameters corresponding to the working condition types and corresponding parameter values for the current data. The problem that the parameter control limit of an intelligent control system in the ore grinding process cannot be adjusted in time along with working condition changes is solved.

column12: Copper ore column leaching-extraction linkage test system
column13: The utility model relates to a copper ore column leaching-extraction linkage test system which comprises a leaching column, a heat preservation water bath circulator, a peristaltic pump, a liquid collection barrel, an extraction mixer, a liquid separation device and an organic phase storage barrel, the liquid collecting barrel is connected with a liquid inlet of the leaching column through a peristaltic pump; the heat preservation water bath circulator is used for controlling the temperature in the leaching column; a liquid outlet in the bottom of the leaching column is connected with a liquidinlet of a liquid collection barrel, a liquid outlet of the liquid collection barrel is connected with an extraction mixer, a liquid outlet of the extraction mixer is connected with a liquid separation device, residual liquid obtained after layering of the liquid separation device is transferred into the liquid collection barrel, and an organic phase enters an organic phase storage barrel. According to the utility model, the phenomenon that the leaching effect is inhibited due to over-high copper ion concentration of a leaching solution in a closed-loop leaching cycle is prevented; and copperleaching weakness caused by the fact that the concentrations of acid and iron in an open-circuit leaching cycle cannot be maintained is avoided, the actual situation of biological leaching-extractionproduction can be effectively simulated, and first-hand test data with direct guiding significance is obtained to be used for copper ore leaching production optimization.

column12: Gannan ionic rare earth acquisition device and reserve calculation method
column13: The invention discloses a Gannan ionic rare earth acquisition device and a reserve calculation method, and the method comprises the steps: firstly building a geological database according to geological exploration data, carrying out the imaging of geological engineering information, then interpreting the boundary of an ore body according to the geological database, giving different attribute values to different boundaries, establishing an ore body three-dimensional model and a grade model according to the same boundary line by adopting a TIN and Sect ion mixing method, and then dynamically analyzing the ore deposit by establishing a database and the ore body grade model. The method has the advantages that intelligent analysis of grade distribution of Gannan ionic rare earth ore deposits can be achieved, reserves are calculated without the adoption of average grade, and a regional variation function is calculated. The mining fast reserve is accurately and efficiently calculated, the production scheme of a mine enterprise is convenient to adjust and manage, the acquisition device is simple in structure, convenient to operate and indirect in installation mode, the installation efficiency is improved, the stability is improved, the lifting function is automatically achieved through the lifting mechanism, the mechanical automation degree is improved, and use is convenient.

column12: Mining apparatus and methods
column13: A method of determining the grindability of rock at a site 10 being excavated, comprises collecting a sample of rock from a location at or near at least one planned or actual first blasting hole 30 within the site being excavated; determining from the collected sample at least one first grindability value of the sample; analysing drilling data obtained during the drilling of the or each first blasting hole to determine at least one first drill penetration rate; comparing the or each first grindability value to the first drill penetration rate to determine a correlation; analysing drilling data obtained during the drilling of at least one second blasting hole 40 to determine at least one second drill penetration rate; and determining at least one second grindability value from the second drill penetration rate and the correlation of the first grindability value and the first drill penetration rate. The grindability values may comprise a Bond work index (BWi) value. The method may include determining a predicated throughput of the comminution phase. A method of at a specific mining site is also claimed.
column32: (PARK) Use of drilling performance to improve rock-breakage efficiencies

column12: Soft measurement modeling method for overflow granularity in multi-working-condition ore dressing process
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ore grinding granularity measurement, and particularly relates to a soft measurement modeling method for overflow granularity in a multi-working-condition ore dressing process. Comprising the steps that S1, m ore dressing process variables related to overflow granularity are collected and stored to serve as an ore dressing process data set; s2, adopting a sliding window method to cut the data according to a time sequence to obtain a plurality of window sub-data sets with the same size; s3, selecting a part of beneficiation process variables as process variables to be measured; s4, establishing a regression model for predicting the to-be-tested process variable selected in the step S3; s5, predicting the process variables to be measured in all the window subdata sets by using the regression model in the S4; s6, predicting deviation according to the process variable in each window obtained in the S5, comparing the deviation with a set threshold value, and performing modal division to obtain a modal identification result; s7, obtaining characteristics of each mode according to a mode identification result, and establishing a soft measurement model; and S8, completing the prediction of the overflow granularity.

column12: Spatial audio monauralization via data exchange
column13: A device includes a memory configure to store instructions and one or more processors configured to execute the instructions to obtain spatial audio data at a first audio output device. The one or more processors are further configured to perform data exchange, between the first audio output device and a second audio output device, of exchange data based on the spatial audio data. The one or more processors are also configured to generate first monaural audio output at the first audio output device based on the spatial audio data.

column12: Ore crushing and grinding device
column13: The utility model discloses an ore crushing and grinding device. A grinding hopper and a grinding body which are matched with each other are arranged in a grinding cavity. An inner cavity of the grinding hopper is in a big-end-up circular truncated cone shape, and a plurality of first grinding teeth are fixed to the inner wall of the grinding hopper. The side wall surface of the grinding body is gradually reduced from top to bottom; a plurality of second grinding teeth matched with the first grinding teeth are fixed to the outer wall of the grinding body. And a plurality of blanking holes are formed in the periphery of the grinding hopper base plate. The bottom side of the grinding body is located and installed on the grinding hopper chassis through a bearing mechanism and is in transmission connection with a grinding motor fixedly installed on the bottom side of the box body. According to the utility model, ore crushing, grinding and dust discharging are integrated on the same equipment, and the tooth-aligning type grinding can ensure that materials are always in a moving state and do not cake or flake, so that the grinding efficiency is higher.
column14: SANSHANDAO GOLD MINE SHANDONG GOLD MINING LAIZHOU CO LTD

column12: Automatic power supply control method and system based on artificial intelligence and storage medium
column13: The invention discloses an automatic power supply control method and system based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of power supply control. A power supply system can aim at a mining anti-explosion lithium ion storage battery power supply, and the power supply can be carried in a mine car; the power supply control system comprises a data acquisition module, a data analysis module, a power supply control module, an electric energy calculation module and a battery monitoring module; according to the technical key points, an interval constant-speed driving mode is designed, power supply regulation and control work is automatically carried out in the mode, and whether power supply driving is carried out on the electric vehicle or not is regulated and controlled according to two end points of a vehicle speed attenuation interval, so that electric energy consumption can be reduced, and the running stability of the vehicle is ensured; and then the artificial intelligence technology is used for monitoring the stability of the intermittent power supply battery, whether the power supply control module can continue to operate is judged according to the stability degree of the battery, and it is ensured that the power supply control system can adapt to the battery state for use.

column12: Ore grinding granularity automatic detection device
column13: The utility model discloses an ore grinding granularity automatic detection device, which comprises a laser particle analyzer, a sealing ring and a motor, the fixed edge of the upper surface of the laser particle analyzer is fixedly connected with a limiting frame, the inner wall of the limiting frame is movably connected with a mixing cup, and the outer wall of the mixing cup is fixedly provided with a limiting clamping strip; a positioning arm is fixedly arranged at the upper end of the outer wall of the mixing cup, a cup cover is movably arranged on the inner wall of the upper end of the mixing cup, the cup cover is connected with the upper end face of the mixing cup through a sealing ring, a stirring mechanism is installed in the middle of the cup cover, and a gear cover is fixedly connected to the end of an output shaft of the motor; and a power gear is fixedly mounted at the upper end of the inner wall of the gear cover. According to the automatic ore grinding granularity detection device, water and ore samples can be fully mixed conveniently, the accuracy of detection data is prevented from being influenced, meanwhile, a mixing container is convenient to clean, and the influence on reuse of the device is avoided.

column12: Ore detection method, server, terminal and system
column13: The invention discloses an ore detection method, a server, a terminal and a system, and belongs to the technical field of data processing. The method comprises the following steps: receiving ore sound data sent by a sound acquisition terminal, wherein the ore sound data is sound data generated when ore is crushed; according to the ore sound data and a preset sound threshold value, determining whether target ore exists or not, wherein the size of the target ore is larger than a preset size; and when it is determined that the target ore exists, sending an alarm message to a preset management terminal, wherein the alarm message is used for indicating the management terminal to adjust the ore crushing working parameters. According to the method, the target ore can be conveniently and accurately screened out without being influenced by the definition of the visual field, and the alarm message is sent to the management terminal under the condition that the target ore is detected out, so that the management terminal adjusts the ore crushing working parameters in time according to the alarm message, and the service life of the crusher is prolonged.

column12: Systems and methods for using an attention buffer to improve resource allocation management
column13: Systems and methods for assessing resource allocation are provided. In some exemplary embodiments, the system uses an attention buffer to classify glances by a person and/or automated system, the buffer determining the impact the glances have on the person and/or automated system's situation awareness level. The attention buffer calculates on a continuous basis a buffer value that is representative of the situation awareness level for the person and/or automated system at a particular moment in time. The calculated buffer values, referred to as moment-to-moment buffer values, among other names, can be used as data points, and/or they can also be used to direct action by the system and/or person to alter the situation awareness level of the person and/or automated system.

column12: Laterite nickel ore leaching flash tank-preheater heat exchange automatic blending system
column13: The invention discloses an automatic blending system for laterite nickel ore leaching flash tank-preheater heat exchange. The automatic blending system comprises a preheating mechanism, an autoclave, a flash mechanism, a monitoring mechanism and a blending controller. The preheating mechanism comprises a plurality of preheaters which are sequentially connected in series; the flash evaporation mechanism comprises a plurality of flash evaporation tanks which are sequentially connected in series. The system has the beneficial effects that the operation data of each preheater and each flash tank are monitored in real time through the monitoring mechanism; the allocation controller obtains the optimal set pressure and the optimal set temperature of each flash tank according to the monitoring data obtained by the monitoring mechanism, so that the temperature and the pressure in the flash tank can be conveniently adjusted to the optimal set temperature and the optimal set pressure by the temperature and pressure control system of the flash tank, the heat exchange efficiency is improved, and the service life of the flash tank is prolonged. And the energy consumption and the operation cost of the laterite-nickel ore high-pressure leaching process are reduced.

column12: Privacy-protected cloud-edge collaborative frequent project mining method
column13: The invention discloses a privacy-protected cloud edge collaborative frequent project mining method. The method comprises the following steps: encoding a real project domain into a virtual project domain; the cloud edge end cooperatively excavates k1 frequent virtual items; constructing a cloud frequency representation matrix based on the frequent virtual items; grouping and pairing the cloud frequency representation matrix and all edge ends; each side end obtains an information representation matrix based on the side end group where the side end is located and the corresponding frequency sub-matrix, and carries out vectorization representation on the information representation matrix; each side end disturbs the local vector to obtain a disturbance value and a disturbance sequence number; the cloud end aggregates the disturbance value and the disturbance serial number of each side end group to obtain a corresponding frequency recovery sub-matrix, and then a frequency recovery matrix is obtained; and mining frequent projects by cloud edge-end collaborative fusion privacy protection technology. According to the method, a local differential privacy technology is adopted, so that under the condition that the cloud is not credible, the privacy of side end data is ensured, and meanwhile, safe and reliable cloud side end collaborative frequent project mining is realized.
column14: ELECTRIC POWER RES INST SICHUAN ELECTRIC POWER CORP
