column12: Saw blade pickup method and system based on digital image processing
column13: The invention discloses a saw blade picking method and system based on digital image processing, and relates to the field of machinery and the field of artificial intelligence manufacturing, in particular to improvement of the saw blade picking method and system based on digital image processing. The specific working process is as follows: an image recognition system projects a saw blade through a projector under the control of a computer, and grating stripes are projected on the saw blade through coded codes; the camera transmits grating stripes projected on the saw blade and an image of the saw blade back to the computer, and after the computer processes the image transmitted back by the camera, data exchange of a saw blade grabbing position is carried out through a communication interface of software and a communication interface of a robot control system; after data exchange, the robot control system writes data of a saw blade grabbing position into a controller through an ROS system; the robot controls the detection end to suck the saw blade through the suction cup through the controller and place the saw blade on a designated position. Through research on automatic identification and positioning of the saw blade, artificial intelligence processing is carried out on the saw blade to be picked up, the point location when the robot picks up the saw blade is obtained in real time, and the robot is controlled to accurately grab the saw blade; therefore, the stability of the quality of the saw blade in the production and detection process can be guaranteed, and the current requirement for the precision of the saw blade is met.
column14: GUILIN ELECTRONICS SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY UNIV

column12: Method, device and equipment for measuring ore discharge port of rough crushing machine
column13: The invention discloses a method, device and equipment for measuring an ore discharge port of a rough crushing machine, and the method comprises the steps: responding to a terminal computer which judges that the shutdown time length of the rough crushing machine exceeds a first time length threshold value, and controlling a camera to start a snapshot function, so as to obtain an ore discharge port picture of the rough crushing machine; on the basis of the ore discharge port picture, ore discharge port feature data are obtained, and the ore discharge port feature data are used for measuring the size of an ore discharge port; and determining the actual size of the ore discharge port based on the feature data of the ore discharge port. According to the invention, the technical problem that the ore discharge port of the rough crushing machine cannot be automatically measured is solved.
column15: LI CHANGJIANG;;ZHANG YANBING;;GAO DAWEI;;LI LINGXIAO;;LI JIAQI

column12: Intelligent park personnel congestion dredging management system and method
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent park personnel congestion dredging management system and method, and relates to the technical field of park management, the intelligent park personnel congestion dredging management system comprises a sensing module, a service module and an application module, the sensing module obtains sensing data through arranging monitoring sensing equipment on a park road; a service layer of the service module covers data acquisition, protocol analysis, data storage, data calculation, data governance, mining analysis and sharing exchange service content, and the application module realizes unified management and unified command of the personnel congestion dredging management system through interaction of an engineer station and data, and realizes unified management of the personnel congestion dredging management system by using two-dimensional and three-dimensional geographic information and virtual reality technologies. Information of all the systems is visually and clearly presented, a management layer is assisted to make decisions, and crowds crowded in the park are dredged. According to the intelligent park personnel congestion dredging management system and method, the response speed is high.
column14: SOUTHWEST MUNICIPAL ENGINEERIGN DESIGN & RES INSTITUTE OF CHINA

column12: METHOD FOR FULL RESOURCE UTILIZATION OF GRAPHITE ORES
column13: A method for full resource utilization of graphite ores, comprising: performing preliminary sorting on raw graphite ores to obtain crystalline graphite ores/aphanitic graphite ores and low-grade graphite ores, and then separately performing treatment, comprising: sequentially performing stage grinding and stage flotation on the low-grade graphite ores to obtain graphite concentrates and graphite tailings, and then sequentially purifying and filtering the graphite concentrates to obtain the crystalline graphite ores/aphanitic graphite ores; sequentially performing flotation and concentration on the crystalline graphite ores to obtain graphite tailings and crystalline graphite concentrates, and purifying the crystalline graphite concentrates to obtain crystalline graphite; or sequentially crushing, grinding, and grading the aphanitic graphite ores to obtain graphite tailings and aphanitic graphite concentrates, and purifying the aphanitic graphite ores to obtain aphanitic graphite. The obtained graphite tailings can be used as raw materials for the preparation of 3D printed building components, composite plates, or mineral compound fertilizers.
column15: ZHANG YIHE;;ZHANG NA;;DI XIANGYUN;;WANG XINKE;;ZHANG SHUAI

column12: Blasting fragmentation prediction method based on ore rock crushing mechanism
column13: The invention discloses a blasting lumpiness prediction method based on an ore rock crushing mechanism. The method comprises the steps that mine blasting parameters conforming to optimal training are selected as training samples according to the ore rock crushing mechanism; the collected blasting parameters serve as input values of training, and blasting parameters needing to be predicted serve as input values of testing; an FA-SSA-BP neural network optimization model is constructed; calculating and updating the weight and threshold of the neural network by using an improved sparrow search algorithm; inputting data of a test set into the model, predicting the mine blasting lumpiness, analyzing an ore rock crushing mechanism, combining influence factors of an existing surface mine blasting site and the influence of rock mass strength parameters, and adopting a new prediction index to predict the blasting lumpiness of the mine; the improved sparrow search algorithm with the global search capability is utilized to optimize the connection weight and threshold in the BP neural network system, the convergence speed, stability and solving precision of the original BP neural network are improved, and the average lumpiness and boulder rate after blasting can be quickly and accurately obtained.
column15: XU ZHENYANG;;WANG DAKUN;;LI ZHENG;;LIU XIN;;MO HONGYI;;JIANG XIAHANG

column12: Intelligent market automatic clearing system and implementation method therefof
column13: The present invention relates to an intelligent market automatic clearing system comprises a device part and a system part, wherein the device part comprises commodity electronic price tags, a self-service weighing apparatus, a shopping ring, a mobile phone, a shopping basket and a market automatic clearing device. The system part comprises intelligent market automatic clearing APP software, an intelligent market clearing system and an intelligent market clearing system data cloud service platform. The market automatic clearing device comprises a shopping basket moving frame, a visual recognition apparatus, a mechanical commodity picking apparatus, a bar code and RFID recognition apparatus table, an anti-theft decoding apparatus, a mechanical packaging apparatus table, a clearing table, an anti-theft detection door and an automatic channel door.
column15: XIAO DAN;;NIU GUANGTAO;;XIAO YUANMING;;HUANG YAN;;WANG XIAOYU

column12: Crushed ore sample holder with annular pressure and ore sample column leaching pretreatment method
column13: The invention provides a crushed ore sample holder with annular pressure and an ore sample column leaching pretreatment method. Relates to the technical field of crushed ore sample leaching simulation tests, and comprises a pressure applying cavity, an ore sample container and an anti-swelling cover, a liquid outlet channel is arranged on the ore sample container, a test cavity is arranged in the ore sample container, the circumferential side wall of the test cavity is made of an elastic material, the test cavity is arranged in the pressure applying cavity, and the anti-swelling cover is arranged in the pressure applying cavity. The side wall of the test cavity is covered with an anti-expansion cover, and the anti-expansion cover is provided with a uniform water-permeable and air-permeable structure and can resist outward expansion of the circumferential side wall of the test cavity. According to the scheme provided by the invention, the defects that confining pressure cannot be applied to a metal sand filling pipe, the filling density of an ore sample is not uniform and channeling can be generated in a test process are overcome.
column14: BEIJING RES INST CHEMICAL ENG & METALLURGY

column12: Helmet Accessory Mounting System
column13: A helmet accessory mounting system includes a mounting device configured to couple to an outer surface of a side of a helmet. The mounting device includes a plurality of mounting locations configured to removeably couple to at least one accessory. A plurality of the plurality of mounting locations each includes an electrical node. A power supply is coupled to the mounting device. An electrical supply line electrically couples the power supply to each of the electrical nodes and the electrical supply line is contained at least partially within the mounting device.

column12: Full-automatic lump ore sample preparation system and full-automatic lump ore sample preparation method
column13: The invention discloses a full-automatic lump ore sample preparation system and a full-automatic lump ore sample preparation method. The system comprises a sample storage device, a moving device, a first crushing device, a first division device, a dichotomy device, a second crushing device, a second division device, a grinding device, a third division device, a rejected sample storage device, an analysis sample storage device and a stored and checked sample storage device. According to the full-automatic lump ore sample preparation system and the full-automatic lump ore sample preparation method, manual lump ore sample preparation is improved into full-automatic sample preparation, full automation of the lump ore sample preparation process is achieved, human participation is not needed, the lump ore sample preparation precision is improved, the working intensity is reduced, the production efficiency is improved, and the influence of human factors is completely eradicated.

column12: Crusher feed metering device
column13: The utility model provides a feeding metering device of a crusher, which relates to the technical field of mining crushing and comprises a support, a conveying mechanism and a stock bin, a mounting plate is fixed on the surface of the stock bin, the stock bin is mounted on the top of the support through the mounting plate, a hopper is fixed at the bottom of the stock bin, two cylinders are symmetrically fixed on the surface of the hopper, and the two cylinders are fixed on the top of the support. A U-shaped connecting plate is fixed to the output ends of the two air cylinders. By arranging the baffle, the metering device, the air cylinder, the connecting plate, the limiting block and the limiting groove, the conveying mechanism intermittently conveys ore materials into the material bin, after a motor of the conveying mechanism stops working, the metering device can meter and weigh the ore in the material bin and the hopper, and after weighing, the material bin can normally feed the crusher by moving the baffle. And data of the meter is fed back to a control terminal of people in real time, so that people can conveniently obtain real-time working data of the crusher.

column12: Acetabular cup screw mounting position evaluation and simulation method
column13: The invention relates to an acetabular cup screw mounting position evaluation and simulation method. The acetabular cup screw mounting position evaluation and simulation method comprises the following steps: S1, loading a patient operation scheme: shooting ct of a patient before an operation, and importing the electronic ct to generate point cloud data of a hip bone of the patient for hip bone registration and acetabular cup mounting; S2, performing hip bone registration: wherein firstly, a surgeon needs to fix a tracker on the hip bone of a patient, a probe is used for collecting a specific quantity of feature points on the surface of the hip bone of the patient, and the next operation is allowed only when the collected data meets a set error threshold after calculation and verification; S3, grinding the hip bone: calculating ground acetabular point cloud data, deleting part of the ground data, and generating new point cloud data; S4, mounting an acetabular cup: detecting the thickness of the bone at the acetabular bottom through thickness measurement; and S5, performing thickness measurement, wherein a thickness measurement module calculates the distance between a virtual extension line of the probe penetrating into the surface of the bone and penetrating out of the other surface of the bone in real time, so that the thickness of the bone is obtained, and evaluating the screw mounting effect at any angle and position in real time.

column12: Precious metal acid leaching ore pulp acid-base neutralization stirring tank
column13: The utility model provides a precious metal acid leaching ore pulp acid-base neutralization stirring tank which comprises a stirring barrel and an automation mechanism, a fixing frame is installed above the stirring barrel, a speed regulator is installed above the fixing frame, a speed reducer is installed above the speed regulator, a motor is installed above the speed reducer, and the automation mechanism is installed above the motor. An automatic mechanism is arranged on the periphery of the stirring barrel, a monitor is fixed to the surface of the fixing frame, a circuit is connected to the top of the monitor, a sensor is connected to the other end of the circuit, a controller is installed on the right side of the stirring barrel, and a push rod is installed in the controller; according to the precious metal acid leaching ore pulp acid-base neutralization stirring tank, the speed regulator and the speed reducer which are arranged in the device can control the speed of the stirrer to reach a proper speed, so that precious metal acid leaching ore pulp is uniformly stirred, and the quality is improved.

column12: Power equipment knowledge graph application system
column13: The invention provides a power equipment knowledge graph application system. The power equipment knowledge graph application system comprises a basic data module, a big data technology platform layermodule, a fault analysis model layer module and an information real-time reflection application layer module. The basic data module is used for recombining and constructing the big data technology platform layer module. The big data technology platform layer module is used for constructing a big data sharing resource pool, extracting and mining the big data shared resource pool to generate a knowledge graph of the fault analysis model layer module. The knowledge graph comprises a knowledge ontology and a fault diagnosis service flow. The power equipment knowledge graph application system provided by the invention can realize power grid real-time monitoring, prediction and early warning analysis, shorten troubleshooting time, greatly improve the efficiency of eliminating power equipment faults, and ensure rapid recovery of normal operation of power.

column12: Real-time abundance detection system and method for deep sea polymetallic nodule minerals
column13: The invention discloses a real-time abundance detection system and method for deep sea polymetallic nodule minerals. The system comprises a forward-scan sonar FLS acoustic backscattering level analysis module, a forward-looking sonar FLS processing saliency detection and analysis module, an image processing module, a side-looking sonar SLS processing module, a multi-dimensional tuberculosis counting and size measuring module, a machine learning module, an abundance mapping module and a machine sensor. According to the method, a local polymetallic nodule mineral abundance change trend chart is detected and measured in a deep-sea polymetallic nodule mining operation area, pre-scanning before surveying and mapping is carried out by a working-level ROV or AUV, and nodule ores are scanned and mapped in real time while a deep-sea polymetallic nodule mining vehicle carries out mining operation; real-time abundance detection is used for automatically controlling the walking path, speed and collection operation of the deep-sea mining vehicle, and plays an important role in guaranteeing the yield and recovery efficiency of a deep-sea polymetallic nodule mining system.

column12: Ore grinding and blending method based on hard rock grade
column13: The invention discloses an ore grinding and blending method based on hard rock grade, and relates to the technical field of ore dressing. The ore grinding and blending method based on the hard rock grade is carried out on the basis of an ore feeding grade analysis model and a dynamic ore blending model and comprises the following steps that firstly, information of a raw ore grade, a concentrate grade, a tailing grade, a hard rock grade, a hard rock belt and an ore feeding belt is transmitted to the ore feeding grade analysis model; secondly, after the feeding grade analysis model carries out data analysis, a hard rock raw ore grade predicted value and the feeding grade are output, the hard rock raw ore grade predicted value is used for guiding flotation feed-forward control and copper hydrometallurgy feed-forward control in the next link, and the feeding grade is conveyed to the dynamic ore blending model. And the dynamic ore blending model outputs a starting signal and a frequency signal of the vibrating feeder below the ketone chamber 7, a starting signal and a frequency signal of the vibrating feeder below the ketone chamber 8, a starting signal and a frequency signal of the vibrating feeder below the ketone chamber 9 and a starting signal and a frequency signal of the vibrating feeder below the ketone chamber 10.

column12: Novel efficient ore grinding equipment
column13: The utility model discloses novel efficient ore grinding equipment, which relates to the technical field of ore grinding equipment and comprises a crushing box, a ball milling box, a conveyor belt and a fixed base, the conveyor belt is welded on one side of the top of the crushing box through a welding rod, a sliding support seat and a welding seat are welded on the top of the fixed base, and sliding wheels are arranged on the top of the sliding support seat. A welding seat is welded to the bottom of the grinding box, a driving motor is welded to the top of the welding seat, the ball-milling box is movably installed on the sliding supporting seat, one end of the ball-milling box is installed on an output shaft of the driving motor, grinding balls are arranged in the ball-milling box, and a reinforcing seat is welded to the bottom of the grinding box. The device is simple in structure, high in automation degree and high in overall working efficiency, meanwhile, dust disintegrating slag can be filtered during smashing, the dust disintegrating slag is prevented from entering a ball milling box, the dust disintegrating slag is prevented from being attached to ores, the damping effect is achieved, and the ball milling effect is affected.

column12: METHOD FOR UTILIZING GRAPHITE ORE RESOURCES
column13: The invention relates to a method for utilizing graphite ore resource, which comprises the following steps: judging whether a graphite raw ore is rich in crystalline graphite or aphanitic graphite, obtaining first crystalline graphite ore, aphanitic graphite ore and low-grade graphite ore, carrying out stage grinding and stage flotation on the low-grade graphite ore to obtain graphite concentrate and first graphite tailings, and purifying and filtering the graphite concentrate to obtain second crystalline graphite ore and second aphanitic graphite ore; Flotation and beneficiation are carried out on the first crystalline graphite ore and the second crystalline graphite ore to obtain the second graphite tailings and crystalline graphite concentrate; Purifying crystalline graphite concentrate to obtain refined graphite, crushing, grinding and classifying the first aphanitic graphite ore and the second aphanitic graphite ore to obtain the third stone ink tailings and aphanitic graphite concentrate, and purifying aphanitic graphite concentrate to obtain aphanitic graphite; Graphite tailings are prepared into 3D printed building components, composite plates or mineral compound fertilizers to realize the utilization of graphite ore resources.
column15: ZHANG YIHE;;ZHANG NA;;DI XIANGYUN;;WANG XINKE;;ZHANG SHUAI

column12: Method for predicting temperature of exploitation fluid of well exploitation and irrigation system by karst terrestrial heat
column13: The invention relates to a method for predicting the temperature of exploiting fluid of a karst terrestrial heat pair well exploiting and irrigating system. The method comprises the steps that relevant geological data of a terrestrial heat system and relevant data of operation of the exploiting and irrigating system are collected in the earlier stage, tracer agent components are determined, the putting amount is calculated, a tracer test is carried out in the karst pair well exploiting and irrigating system, a tracer test result is obtained, and a curve is drawn; according to a tracing test result, Qtracer2 software is used for calculating the tracer recovery rate, the cross sectional area and the height of a karst channel; determining boundary conditions of a karst geothermal heat transfer model, setting a time period, and calculating temperature change of the mining well according to the heat transfer model. The method for predicting the fluid temperature of the mining well is accurate and reliable in result, high in operability, convenient and rapid, solves the problem of predicting the fluid temperature of the mining well of a mining and recharging system under the condition of long-term recharging of the well, and has an important guiding effect on selection of karst geothermal mining and recharging schemes and later project well position arrangement.
column14: SHAANXI COAL GEOLOGY GROUP CO LTD

column12: 3D printing equipment for lunar soil resources in lunar pit
column13: The utility model discloses 3D printing equipment for lunar soil resources in a lunar pit, which comprises a traveling device and a lunar soil mining device, and is characterized in that the lunar soil mining device is mounted on a traveling frame and is used for mining lunar soil; the soil crusher is installed on the walking frame, the lunar soil mining device transports lunar soil to the soil crusher after mining the lunar soil, and the soil crusher carries out material treatment; a 3D printing execution unit; the Fresnel lens is fixedly installed above the 3D printing execution part, and the Fresnel lens is focused on the printing platform; wherein the first reflector is fixedly installed outside the walking device, and the second reflector is fixedly installed on the walking frame or the 3D printing execution part. The 3D printing equipment can be used in a moon pit of a moon, existing resources on the moon are used for 3D printing operation, in-situ resource utilization is achieved, and then the cost and cycle problems that materials needed for building a permanent base need to be manufactured and transported from the earth and the like are solved.

column12: Gas sensor
column13: In a gas sensor having a gas sensor element, a solid electrolyte body has a cylindrical cup shape, one end of which is closed to form a bottom part, and the other end of which is open. The solid electrolyte body has oxygen ion conductivity. A reference electrode is arranged on an interior surface of the solid electrolyte body. An atmosphere is in contact with the reference electrode. The measurement electrode is arranged on an exterior surface of the solid electrode body. Exhaust gas as a detection target is in contact with the measurement electrode. At least one of the measurement electrode and the reference electrode contains thallium particles, within a range of 0.1 ppm and not more than 150 ppm.

column13: A method to separate and recover at least one metal from a source of oxidized and/or primary and secondary sulfide ores by determining and modifying the values of the dielectric constant of the minerals source.

column12: METHOD FOR PROCESSING POTASH ORES
column13: The present invention relates to a method for processing potash ores, comprising the following steps: - underground mining of potash ores (S1) by way of cutting and/or by way of boring and shot-firing, - grinding and/or sieving the obtained potash ores (S1) by means of a grinding and/or sieving device (16), and - sorting , with the aid of sensors, the ground and/or sieved potash ores (S2) into an intermediate fraction (S7) and a second oversize product (S9) by means of a sensor-aided sorting device (30).

column12: Automatic positioning mechanism and ore unloading device of mining automatic dumping car
column13: The utility model relates to an automatic positioning mechanism and an ore unloading device of a mining self-dumping car, which comprise a mining self-dumping car transportation track, a stock bin opening and an ore unloading device which are correspondingly arranged on two sides of the mining self-dumping car transportation track, and a programmable logic controller (PLC) automatic control system, and is characterized in that a longitudinal locking positioning mechanism is arranged on a hydraulic track of the mining self-dumping car; the longitudinal lock positioning mechanism comprises four sets of mining automatic dumping car hydraulic rail lock mechanisms, steel rope lock frames and positioning lock steel ropes, and every two sets of mining automatic dumping car hydraulic rail lock mechanisms and steel rope lock frames are arranged on a mining automatic dumping car transportation rail from inside to outside with the center line of a stock bin opening as the center. The device has the advantages that the problem of accurate positioning of the rollover at the rail transportation position is effectively solved, the mixture can be ensured not to scatter outside the crushed material, the production efficiency is improved, and the production automation is promoted.

column12: Ultrasonic guided wave permeation enhancing method and system for ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching
column13: According to the ultrasonic guided wave permeation enhancing method and system for ion type rare earth in-situ ore leaching, an ultrasonic transducer is installed on the portion, exposed out of the earth surface, of a waveguide to release ultrasonic waves to a rare earth ore leaching area, and the generated ultrasonic waves are spread to the periphery along the waveguide in a guided wave mode; an ultrasonic cavitation effect is generated in a rare earth ore aquifer, and mechanical energy generated by cavitation acts on rare earth ore, so that the permeability coefficient of the rare earth ore is increased. The method comprises the following steps: preparing a penetration test sample according to an environment in which ionic rare earth ore is located, and performing test simulation to screen a proper transducer working frequency; through the existing infiltration intensity monitoring means of the rare earth ore, the relation between the rare earth ore and the power adjusting base station is established, and the energy converter is adjusted to be stopped and started according to the intensity of seepage. The permeability of the ionic rare earth ore can be enhanced, and the ore leaching efficiency is enhanced.
column15: LU BOKAI;;HE WEN;;WANG MANMAN;;ZHU SIYU;;SHI WENFANG;;SHI JINGTAO;;HUANG CHONGJIE;;ZHU ZHICHENG;;LI GANG

column12: Method for selecting ball diameter and grading of grinding ball of horizontal stirring mill
column13: The invention discloses a ball diameter and grading selection method for grinding balls of a horizontal stirring mill, and relates to the field of ore grinding. The selection method comprises the following steps: carrying out particle size analysis on a milled raw material of the horizontal stirring mill, calculating the yield of each screen residue sample and measuring a wet friction angle between the grinding ball and the screen residue sample; calculating the theoretical ball diameter of the grinding ball corresponding to each screen residue sample; calculating a crushing distribution function of the raw material according to an ore grinding dynamic experiment to obtain a crushing characteristic value k of the raw material; and adjusting the theoretical ball diameter of the grinding ball corresponding to each screen residue sample, and sorting theoretical ball diameter data of the grinding ball, wherein the mass grading of each ball diameter grinding ball is equal to the ratio of the raw material yield corresponding to each ball diameter grinding ball. According to the method for selecting the ball diameter and grading of the grinding ball of the horizontal stirring mill, the surface roughness of the raw material and the grinding ball is considered, the dynamic change rule of the granularity in the raw material crushing process is also considered, and the accurate ball diameter and grading of the grinding ball of the horizontal stirring mill can be obtained.
column32: DENIZ V等: "Investigation of the breakage kinetics of pumice samples as dependent on powder filling in a ball mill", 《INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF MINERAL PROCESSING》;;何书明等: "利用球径半理论公式和作图法确定某选矿厂粗磨装补球方案", 《现代矿业》;;陈城等: "钢球级配对钒钛磁铁矿磨矿产品粒度分布的影响", 《现代矿业》

column12: Prediction method for recovery rate of associated noble metal in ore and application thereof
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mineral processing, in particular to a method for predicting the recovery rate of associated precious metal in ore and application of the method. The prediction method comprises the following steps: carrying out detection and statistics on to-be-predicted ores containing noble metal minerals to obtain the microstructure of each noble metal mineral, the noble metal content in each noble metal mineral and the area of each noble metal mineral; dividing the precious metal minerals in the to-be-predicted ore according to the distribution characteristics and the continuous generation relation, and calculating to obtain the precious metal content in each kind of precious metal minerals; the sum of the mass percent of the precious metal content in the various precious metal minerals related to the chalcopyrite in the total precious metal content in the to-be-predicted ore is obtained, and the sum is the predicted value of the recovery rate of the precious metal, entering the copper concentrate, of the associated precious metal in the to-be-predicted ore. The prediction method can effectively predict the recovery rate of gold and silver entering the copper concentrate from the associated noble metal in the to-be-predicted ore, and is high in accuracy and small in error.

column12: Online crushing and screening equipment and process for large-particle-size nickel ore
column13: The invention discloses large-particle-size nickel ore online crushing and screening equipment and process, the equipment comprises a drying and screening device, a crushing device and a conveying device, the conveying device is used for conveying ore to be crushed from the drying and screening device to the crushing device, and the equipment further comprises a control system and a distance sensor; the distance sensor is arranged above a feeding port of the crushing device and used for sensing the height of materials in the crushing device. The control system is respectively connected with the conveying device and the distance sensor, the distance sensor transmits sensed material height data to the control system, and the control system controls the conveying device to accelerate, decelerate, start or stop according to the received material height data. The ore feeding amount of the crushing device can be automatically controlled, so that it is ensured that the ore feeding amount of the crushing device is not too low or too high, and the situation that the crushing efficiency of the crushing device is reduced or the crushing device is damaged is avoided.
column32: 李小明等: "《铁合金生产概论》", vol. 1, 冶金工业出版社, pages: 148

column12: Mine fully-mechanized mining automation equipment based on Internet of Things control
column13: The utility model discloses a mine fully-mechanized mining automation device based on Internet of Things control, which structurally comprises a support, a saddle, an automatic crusher, a motor and a console, the top surface of the support is welded with the bottom surface of the saddle, the bottom surface of the automatic crusher is fixedly mounted on the top surface of the saddle, and the bottom surface of the motor is welded with the top surface of the saddle. After air is sucked in and heat is taken away, the air is discharged through the exhaust plate, and in the discharging process, a filter handle of the exhaust plate can be opened only through certain air pressure, so that the air is stacked at the exhaust plate, the speed of the air is reduced, and the bearing capacity is reduced; and the dust is further decelerated through the vortex grooves in the filter handle in the process of passing through the air exhaust plate, and meanwhile, the dust is adhered to the adhesion head, so that the dust content of the exhausted air is greatly reduced, and serious dust pollution cannot be brought to the air around the air exhaust port.
column14: UNIV SOUTH CHINA;;MINGCHUANG HUIYUAN TECH GROUP CO LTD;;GUIZHOU MINGCHUANGHUIYUAN TECH CO LTD

column12: Sensing device, nursing bra, and manufacturing method thereof
column13: A sensing device for sensing ion concentration of a solution, including a first substrate, a second substrate, a sensing layer, and two electrodes. The material of the first substrate includes cellulose. The second substrate is located on the first substrate. The sensing layer is located on the second substrate. The two electrodes are separately disposed on the sensing layer to expose the sensing layer and bring a solution in contact with the sensing layer so as to measure the resistance value of the solution and convert the resistance value into the ion concentration of the solution.

column12: CYBERNETIC DEVICE FOR CONTROL OF UNDERGROUND LEACHING AND METHOD OF ITS OPERATION
column13: FIELD: mining.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to mining, namely to underground leaching of useful ore components using automated control systems. Cybernetic device for control of process of underground leaching of useful components of ore, which includes self-adjustment unit as part of computer system and tuning unit, process stabilization unit as part of meter, converter, actuating unit and controller. At that, the self-adjustment unit contains sensors of input process parameters presented by the controllers of the leaching agent composition, its concentration, flow rate, pressure and temperature, output process parameters sensors, which are represented by controllers of the composition of the productive solution, its concentration, inlet, pressure, temperature and output of target priority useful component of ore, and in unit of process stabilization actuating unit and regulator contain scheme of leaching mode, decolmitation scheme, rock destruction scheme connected in series-parallel.EFFECT: technical result consists in implementation of cybernetic approach to geotechnical development of deposit of solid minerals in uncrowded, efficient and ecological way.10 cl, 4 dwg

column12: Ore granularity identification method and system based on crushed product particle size distribution characteristics
column13: The invention discloses an ore granularity identification method and system based on crushed product particle size distribution characteristics, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a to-be-detected crushed product image, and carrying out the statistics of the total mass of a crushed product; the crushed product image is identified, and crushed ore particles with the particle size larger than the boundary particle size are identified; counting the particle size of the identified crushed ore particles with the particle size larger than the boundary particle size and the on-sieve cumulative yield of the corresponding particle size; performing linear regression analysis on the statistical data to obtain a particle size characteristic equation and a curve of the crushed ore particles with the particle size larger than the boundary particle size, and obtaining a particle size characteristic curve of all crushed products according to the particle size characteristic equation and the curve; and integrating the data, and calculating to obtain related data required by the subsequent production process. By adopting the scheme of the invention, the particle size distribution, the on-sieve cumulative yield, the yield of each particle fraction, the P80 value and other important data required by subsequent production of the crushed product can be obtained without screening the crushed product, and the real-time detection of the data can be realized.
column15: LIU ZHENGYU;;YANG ZHIGUANG;;SUN CHUNBAO;;KOU JUE;;QU FUMING;;WANG XIAOLI

column12: Wear detection method for lining plate of mining crusher
column13: The invention relates to a wear detection method for a lining plate of a mining crusher, and belongs to the technical field of mining machinery crushing. Binocular vision is adopted to obtain three-dimensional information of the surface of the lining plate in a regional mode, a digital speckle pattern is projected on the surface of the lining plate during obtaining, the texture information amount of the surface of the lining plate is increased while light is supplemented under the condition that light in a crushing cavity is insufficient, and the speckle pattern provides higher parallax estimation when a depth map is obtained through a binocular image. And higher-precision point cloud information of the surface of the lining plate is obtained. According to the method, inertial measurement unit information is introduced, reference is provided for primary splicing of the surface point cloud of the lining plate after region division, secondary splicing with higher precision is carried out after primary splicing, and the data acquisition efficiency is improved while the acquisition precision is ensured. According to the method, the point clouds of the lining plate are aligned through an improved normal transformation algorithm, the nearest point of each point of the point clouds after abrasion in the point clouds obtained after abrasion is found, the distance between the two points in the unit normal direction is calculated, the abrasion loss of the lining plate with higher precision is obtained, and the abrasion distribution of the lining plate is obtained.

column12: METHOD FOR OPTIMIZING MINERAL RECOVERY PROCESS
column13: Disclosed is a method for optimizing a mineral recovery process from ore material using a flotation chamber. The method comprises implementing a machine learning model to determine operational parameters of the flotation chamber, for the mineral recovery process based on a geometry of the flotation chamber and properties of the ore material. The method further comprises simulating the mineral recovery process using ranges of the determined operational parameters to determine a factor representative of a relationship between a gas hold-up value and a bubble diameter value. The method further comprises calculating the gas hold-up value and the bubble diameter value based on determined the operational parameters and the determined factor. The method further comprises utilizing the determined gas hold-up value and bubble diameter value to determine optimized values of the operational parameters for the mineral recovery process by implementing a virtual sensor, to achieve higher throughput of recovered minerals from the ore material.

column12: Pulverizing mill for mineral aggregate treatment
column13: The invention relates to the related technical field of mineral aggregate processing, and discloses a pulverizer for mineral aggregate processing. A first hopper and a second hopper are arranged, two sets of crushing and grinding mechanisms are driven at the same time through the same motor, and graded grinding is achieved; according to the invention, the first hopper and the second hopper are arranged, so that fine mineral powder is obtained, and then the fine mineral powder is automatically conveyed into the second hopper for fine grinding, so that the grinding efficiency can be effectively improved, the manual participation degree is reduced, the automation degree is improved, and the cost is reduced; the ore powder with the particle size reaching the standard enters the second hopper through the side leakage sieve plate to be finely ground, the ore powder which does not reach the standard returns to the first hopper to be coarsely ground again, circulation is conducted continuously till the particle size of the ore powder reaches the standard, manual sorting is not needed, and the machining efficiency is higher.

column12: Mineral aggregate distribution method and device and computer readable storage medium
column13: The invention discloses a mineral aggregate distribution method and device and a computer readable storage medium. The mineral aggregate distribution method is used for feeding distribution of an oregrinding process, and the method comprises the following steps: establishing a mineral aggregate database; obtaining identity information of each mineral aggregate to be distributed; according to theidentity information of each to-be-distributed mineral aggregate, obtaining a corresponding first mineral aggregate packet number and mineral aggregate component data in each packet from the mineral aggregate database; and according to the number of the first mineral aggregate bags and the mineral aggregate component data in each bag, distributing each to-be-distributed mineral aggregate, obtaining a mineral aggregate distribution scheme so as to determine feeding used for the ore grinding procedure each time, wherein the difference value between the content of the same components in every twoadjacent times of feeding is smaller than a first difference value threshold value. Therefore, the mineral aggregate distribution method can stabilize the feeding amount of the ore grinding process,so that the leaching rate of the mineral aggregate is stabilized and improved.

column12: Mechanical automatic ore crushing device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mechanical automation. The utility model further discloses a mechanical automatic ore crushing device. Crushing device, a crushing plate is movablyconnected to the interior of the crushing device; the bottom of the crushing plate is fixedly connected with a crushing block; and a hydraulic rod is movably connected to the top of the crushing plate, a torsion spring is fixedly connected to the top of the hydraulic rod, the top of the torsion spring is fixedly connected with the inner side wall of the crushing device, a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the inner side wall of the crushing device, and a connecting spring is fixedly connected to the top of the fixing plate. The utility model discloses a mechanical automatic ore crushing device. According to the ore crushing device, large-size ores can be crushed and then crushed, so that the working efficiency of ore crushing can be reduced, the problem that a common ore crushing devicecannot crush the large ores is solved, the working intensity of workers is reduced to a certain extent, and the use requirements of ore crushing are met.

column12: Gold ore grinding-floating process energy consumption prediction method
column13: The invention belongs to the field of beneficiation production, and particularly relates to a gold ore grinding-floating process energy consumption prediction method. The method for predicting the energy consumption of the gold ore grinding-floating process comprises the following steps: (1) analyzing the influence factors of the energy consumption of the gold ore grinding-floating process; (2) establishing an energy consumption prediction model; (3) comparing the prediction precision of the energy consumption prediction model; (4) determining an energy consumption prediction model with the highest prediction precision; the model prediction precision is verified through actual production data, the energy consumption prediction model most conforming to actual production is selected, powerful model support is provided for energy conservation and consumption reduction in the actual production process, production indexes can be dynamically and timely corrected or optimized, and the energy-saving efficiency and the intelligent level of mineral separation production are improved.

column12: System for optimizing high-pressure leaching retention time of laterite-nickel ore
column13: The invention discloses a laterite-nickel ore high-pressure leaching residence time optimization system. The system comprises a data acquisition module, an actual residence time calculation module, an optimal residence time determination module and a residence time control module, the actual residence time calculation module is used for obtaining the actual residence time of the ore pulp in the autoclave in the high-pressure acid leaching process; and the optimal residence time determination module is used for obtaining the optimal residence time corresponding to the maximum profit value. The method has the beneficial effects that the actual residence time and the optimal residence time are obtained by inputting operation conditions such as real-time incoming ore components, the acid leaching temperature and the acid-ore ratio into the calculation model, so that the residence time of the laterite-nickel ore high-pressure leaching link can be adjusted according to production fluctuation; the high-pressure acid leaching process is always in a dynamic optimal state with the optimal retention time, and compared with a traditional method for optimizing the retention time through a small experiment, the method has the advantages of being high in response speed and accurate in optimization.

column13: The invention discloses a full-automatic ore sample preparation and moisture determination system comprising a robot A, a robot B, a sample crushing and preparing unit arranged around the robot A, anda sample grinding and moisture determination unit arranged around the robot B. A primary division machine is arranged between the robot A and the robot B. The sample crushing and preparing unit includes a sample barrel inlet and outlet belt conveyor, a jaw crusher, a double-roller crusher, a sample barrel cleaning device, a pre-drying oven and a pre-drying sample measuring scale. The sample grinding and moisture determination unit includes a full-water determination drying oven, a full-water analysis measurement scale, a secondary division machine, a sample disc cleaning device, a plane disctype grinding machine, a vertical disc type grinding machine, a sample tank capping machine I and a sample tank inlet and outlet belt conveyor. The disclosed system has advantages of high sample preparation representativeness, high automation degree and high sample preparation efficiency.

column12: Mineral processing production quality monitoring system and method based on multiple data sources
column13: The invention relates to an ore dressing production quality monitoring system and method based on multiple data sources. The ore dressing production quality monitoring system comprises a raw material monitoring unit, a crushing monitoring unit, a ball milling monitoring unit, a flotation monitoring unit, a tailing monitoring unit and a concentrate monitoring unit. Carrying out quality monitoring on the production process of ore dressing in a multi-data collaboration mode; in the ore dressing process, quality evaluation and monitoring are conducted on each process, the next process is predicted according to the score of the previous process, a corresponding expected value is set, and when the next process is not within the expected value range, early warning is given out, and people are reminded to check factors, such as the process, mechanical parameters and the environmental process, influencing the process. According to the invention, the decision parameters of each flow are selected in a targeted manner, and the decision parameters are acquired by the acquisition equipment, so that the production flow of ore separation can be remotely monitored, the quality of each flow of ore separation can be monitored, the production condition of each flow can be visually displayed by data, and people can conveniently know the working condition of each flow.

column12: Detection system and method for spiral stirrer of vertical stirring mill
column13: The invention belongs to the technical detection field of ore grinding equipment, and particularly discloses a detection system and method for a spiral stirrer of a vertical stirred mill, and the detection system comprises a data acquisition system, a driving system and a data processing system, the driving system is in transmission connection with a low-speed shaft coupler at the top of a stirring shaft of the spiral stirrer for driving the spiral stirrer to rotate; the data acquisition system comprises a laser three-dimensional scanner and coordinate positioning bodies, a plurality of coordinate positioning bodies are arranged at the upper end of a stirring shaft of the spiral stirrer and the bottom of a spiral stirring blade at intervals, and the laser three-dimensional scanner is arranged at the position right facing a grinding door of a barrel of the spiral stirrer. The three-dimensional scanning system is used for conducting three-dimensional scanning on the spiral stirrer to obtain point cloud data of the spiral stirrer, the data processing system is used for conducting splicing, fusion processing and quantitative analysis on the point cloud data, a complete three-dimensional model of a detected object is generated, and finally quantitative detection on the abrasion condition of the spiral stirrer is achieved. The residual life of the spiral stirrer is accurately speculated, and cost is reduced and efficiency is increased for mine enterprises.

column12: Advanced process control system and method for alumina ore pulp mill
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of ore grinding process control, in particular to an advanced process control system and method for an aluminum oxide ore pulp mill. The method comprises the following steps: S1, a data acquisition module acquires data in an aluminum oxide ore grinding process; s2, modeling is conducted in the ore grinding process, and the output characteristics and the response curve of a mill are obtained; s3, by means of the soft instrument technology, the ore pulp specific gravity is calculated through a soft instrument algorithm according to the auxiliary variables; s4, estimating values of dominant variables alpha K pulp and ore pulp specific gravity rho pulp on line by the soft measurement model, combining the values with an ore grinding quality controller, and dynamically controlling liquid-solid ratio data to realize stable control of production indexes; and S5, adjusting input parameters of the mill in real time according to a liquid-solid ratio parameter prediction result and an optimization target set by the quality controller by using a model prediction control algorithm. According to the invention, the liquid-solid ratio data can be dynamically controlled to realize stable control of production indexes, and the robustness and adaptability of the control system are enhanced.

column12: Drilling non-submerged jet flow fluidized mining process parameter design method
column13: The invention discloses a well drilling non-submerged jet flow fluidization mining process parameter design method. The method comprises the steps of jet pump structure size design, fluidization mining process parameter design, process matching degree verification and the like. The method considers the influence of the jet pump on the efficiency of the jet pump when the jet pump lifts the particles in the ore pulp, perfects the basic equation of the performance of the liquid-solid jet pump, designs the structure size of the jet pump based on the improved basic equation of the performance of the liquid-solid jet pump, and determines the corresponding structure size of the jet pump when the working efficiency of the jet pump is close to the peak efficiency. On the basis, fluidized mining process parameters are designed in a matched mode, the actual flow ratio of the jet pump is compared with the cavitation flow ratio, the optimal matched matching parameters are obtained, the design result can meet the requirement that high-pressure water jet completes ore body crushing operation in the non-submerged state in the fluidized mining process, and then the fluidized mining efficiency is improved; and theoretical guidance and data support can be provided for popularization and application of the non-submerged jet flow fluidization mining method.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR COOLING
column13: The present disclosure provides systems and method for cooling a heat source. The system may include a container comprising a container wall and a heat source, a baffle disposed between the heat source and the container wall, and one or more of a heat exchanger or recirculation loop. The heat exchanger may be a liquid-liquid heat exchanger configured to remove heat from a liquid contacting the heat source. The recirculation loop may be configured to flow a liquid contacting the heat source to cool the heat source. Methods may use the systems described herein to cool a heat source.

column12: Distributed ore grinding expert system model prediction control method
column13: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of model predictive control, and particularly discloses a distributed ore grinding expert system model predictive control method. According to the embodiment of the invention, a mathematical model of an ore grinding expert subsystem is constructed; constructing a mathematical model of the output quantity of the ore grinding expert subsystem; designing a distributed random model prediction controller; designing a quantizer; determining iteration feasibility of a probability constraint processing strategy and an optimization problem; and performing problem optimization and distributed implementation processing. According to the method, distributed model prediction control can be carried out aiming at random disturbance obeying probability constraints and coupling probability constraints among multiple independent ore grinding expert subsystems, the time-varying and time-delay problems existing in the ore grinding expert system can be solved, and network congestion can be effectively relieved by adding a quantization strategy; the prediction function of the model prediction control unit is used for processing the time delay problem, and it is guaranteed that all ore grinding expert subsystems in the distributed ore grinding expert system can be efficiently and orderly carried out.

column12: In-situ ore leaching method for variable-net-degree liquid injection
column13: The invention discloses an in-situ ore leaching method for variable-net-degree liquid injection. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining grade distribution data of valuable elements of an ionic rare earth mine according to a mine exploration result; arranging liquid injection and collection projects of the ionic rare earth mine according to an in-situ ore leaching process; sparse liquid injection is conducted on the mine; measuring the flow of the leachate collected in the liquid collection project and the concentration of valuable elements; establishing the relationship between the valuable element concentration of the leachate and the ore body mass, the ore leaching agent volume, the valuable element grade and the initial concentration of the ore leaching agent; respectively calculating the average grade of valuable elements of the overlying ore body, the average flow of the leachate and the average concentration of the valuable elements of the leachate in each liquid collection engineering control area; and comparing the flow average value and the actual value of the lixivium collected in the liquid collection project, and comparing the value relationship between the valuable element concentration average value and the actual value, and regulating and controlling according to the comparison result. According to the method, the liquid injection process can be effectively regulated and controlled, the leaching rate of valuable elements is increased, and the landslide risk is reduced.

column12: Device for monitoring deep-sea sediment environment in mining polymetallic nodules
column13: The present invention relates to the technical field of long-term in-situ monitoring of sediment disturbance in deep-sea surface mineral mining, and more particularly to a device for monitoring deep-sea sediment environment in mining polymetallic nodules. The monitoring system comprises: acoustic Doppler flow profilers, a spontaneous potential probe, a turbidity meter and an underwater camera. The invention can realize long-term in-situ observation of sediment disturbance, and can realize the mechanical recovery of probe rod-type equipment without large-scale mechanical devices, thereby reducing the overall weight of the recovery equipment and increasing the probability of successful equipment recovery. Compared with the existing long-term in-situ observation equipment on the seabed, it is more environmentally friendly, efficient, energy-saving and reliable.

column12: Compound molecular fingerprint prediction algorithm based on learning structural relationship
column13: The invention relates to compound molecular fingerprint prediction, and belongs to the technical field of mass spectrum data analysis. From the perspective of fully mining implicit information of mass spectrum data, neutral loss information is added behind a corresponding ion peak when vector representation of the mass spectrum data is constructed, and a natural language processing technology is adopted; and learning the relationship between peaks and between the peak and neutral loss in the mass spectrum, constructing a multi-dimensional spectrum vector, and predicting molecular fingerprints. Due to the addition of the neutral loss of the corresponding ion peak in the spectrum vector, richer structure information is contained, and the accuracy of molecular fingerprint prediction can be effectively improved.

column12: Determining the Average Frequency of a Series of Pulses
column13: A method and device for determining an average frequency of a series of ion detection pulses (P) in a spectrometer can be applied to a measurement interval (MI). The method may comprise determining the duration of an auxiliary interval (AI1, AI2, . . . ), wherein the auxiliary interval overlaps the measurement interval, the auxiliary interval starts at the last pulse (P0) preceding the measurement interval (MI), and the auxiliary interval ends at the last pulse (PN) within the measurement interval. The method may further comprise determining the number of pulses during the auxiliary interval and dividing the number of pulses by the duration of the auxiliary interval so as to produce the average frequency. The method may be applied to a series of ion pulses produced by a voltage-to-frequency converter connected to a Faraday cup.

column12: Multi-size-fraction mineral preparation machine
column13: The utility model discloses a multi-size-fraction mineral preparation machine. The ore grinding and screening device comprises a mounting platform, an ore grinding and screening device body and an overturning device arranged on the mounting platform and used for driving the ore grinding and screening device body to be switched between a horizontal state and a vertical state. The ore grinding and screening device comprises an ore grinding barrel, a screen, a barrel shell and an ore grinding motor. The ore grinding motor can drive the ore grinding barrel to rotate around the shaft; ore grinding,the ore grinding motor is mounted on the turnover device; ore grinding operation is finished, the ore grinding barrel body is turned from a horizontal state to a vertical state through the turnover device; rotation process, according to the ore grinding device, minerals in the ore grinding barrel body can be gradually moved out of the discharging opening and screened through the screen, after screening is finished, the ore grinding barrel body is rotated to the horizontal state through the overturning device, then the ore grinding, overturning, screening and overturning operations are repeated till the preparation operation is finished, pure minerals of different particle grades are obtained, the preparation automation degree is high, the efficiency is high, and the cost is low.

column12: Method and device for mining influence factors of energy recovery efficiency of electric vehicle
column13: The invention provides an electric vehicle energy recovery efficiency influence factor mining method and device. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring deceleration interval data of a vehicle; calculating energy recovery efficiency according to the deceleration interval data; performing feature extraction on the deceleration interval data to generate a candidate feature set; constructing a regression model according to the candidate feature set and the energy recovery efficiency; sorting the features in the candidate feature set through a regression model to obtain a sorting result; working condition quantitative analysis is conducted according to the sorting result, and an energy recovery efficiency influence factor mining result is obtained; wherein the energy recovery efficiency influence factor mining result at least comprises energy recovery efficiency potential influence factors. Therefore, the method can be used for further mining other potential factors influencing the energy recovery efficiency, so that a more comprehensive analysis basis is provided for energy recovery.

column12: Method and device for controlling single stone crusher, storage medium and electronic equipment
column13: An embodiment of the invention provides a method and device for controlling a single stone crusher, a storage medium and electronic equipment. The method includes the following steps that point clouddata of ore on a draw shaft grizzly screen are collected under the condition that the control authority of the single stone crusher is obtained; feature extraction is performed on the point cloud datato determine whether an ore heap and/or ore parameters exist or not; under the condition that the ore pile exists and the height of the ore pile is larger than or equal to a first preset height, a pushing and scattering operation instruction is generated, and the pushing and scattering operation instruction is sent to the single stone crusher, so that the single stone crusher pushes and scattersthe ore pile according to the pushing and scattering operation instruction; and under the condition that the ore parameters are smaller than the preset parameters, a crushing operation instruction isgenerated, and the crushing operation instruction is sent to the single stone crusher, so that the single stone crusher can crush the ore according to the crushing operation instruction. By means of the technical scheme, the labor cost can be reduced, and the crushing efficiency can be improved.

column12: Multifunctional financial monitoring and analysis platform based on intelligent big data and algorithm
column13: The invention relates to a multifunctional financial monitoring and analysis platform based on intelligent big data and algorithms, the platform comprises a data acquisition module, a data storage module, a data analysis module, a data visualization module and an intelligent decision module, and the platform collects and processes a large amount of data in the field of finance by using a big data technology. And analysis and mining are carried out through a WTAT algorithm, so that comprehensive, timely and accurate monitoring and analysis services are provided for financial supervision institutions, financial enterprises and investors. column12: Method and device for measuring ore grinding granularity
column13: The invention provides a method and a device for measuring the ore grinding granularity. Comprising the following steps: determining standard parameters of a mill according to mill working parameters of the mill in at least one preset time period; determining a differentiation coefficient corresponding to the mill according to the mill working parameters of the mill at the current moment and the standard parameters; when the differentiation coefficient is within a preset range, taking the particle size data and the granularity data of the ore grinding particles at the current moment as to-be-trained sample data; for each algorithm in a preset algorithm database, inputting the to-be-trained sample data into a data training model corresponding to the algorithm for training to obtain a measurement model corresponding to the algorithm; and determining a modeling error value with the minimum error value from the modeling error values of the measurement models corresponding to all algorithms, taking the measurement model corresponding to the modeling error value with the minimum error value as a target measurement model, and inputting the particle size data of the ore grinding particles into the target measurement model to obtain a measurement result of the particle size of the ore grinding particles. And the measurement accuracy is improved.

column12: Full-automatic ore sample preparation and moisture determination system
column13: The utility model discloses a full-automatic ore sample preparation and moisture determination system. The system comprises a robot A and a robot B, the sample crushing and preparing unit is arrangedaround the robot A; the sample grinding and moisture measuring unit is arranged around the robot B; wherein a primary division machine is arranged between the robot A and the robot B; the sample crushing and preparing unit comprises a sample barrel inlet and outlet belt conveyor, a jaw crusher, a double-roller crusher, a sample barrel cleaning device, a pre-drying oven and a pre-drying sample measuring scale; wherein the sample grinding moisture determination unit comprises a full-water determination drying oven, a full-water analysis measurement scale, a secondary division machine, a sample disc cleaning device, a plane disc type grinding machine, a vertical disc type grinding machine, a sample tank capping machine I and a sample tank inlet and outlet belt conveyor; the system further comprises a control center for uniformly controlling the equipment to operate. The system disclosed by the utility model is strong in sample preparation representativeness, high in automation degree andhigh in sample preparation efficiency.

column12: Orthopedic surgery robot intelligent file grinding control method and device based on deep learning
column13: The invention provides an intelligent filing control method and device for an orthopedic surgery robot based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a plurality of pieces of parameter information used for reinforcement learning network model training, and the plurality of pieces of parameter information comprise the parameter information of a mechanical arm of the orthopedic surgery robot, the acetabulum parameter information and the acetabular cup parameter information; performing iterative training on the reinforcement learning network model based on the multiple pieces of parameter information to obtain a trained reinforcement learning network model; and inputting the target parameter information into the trained reinforcement learning network model, and controlling intelligent movement of a mechanical arm of the orthopedic surgery robot so as to realize file grinding operation. According to the method, the target parameters are processed through the trained deep learning network model, and then the mechanical arm is controlled to move intelligently, so that file grinding operation is achieved. Thus, the mechanical arm can move autonomously, and file grinding operation is autonomously achieved, so that file grinding errors caused by misoperation of operators are reduced, and the file grinding precision is improved.
column14: BEIJING CHANGMUGU MEDICAL TECHNOLOGY CO LTD;;ZHANG YILING

column12: Intelligent sinter particle counting method based on image multi-level feature matching
column13: The invention is suitable for the technical field of image processing, and provides a sinter particle intelligent counting method based on image multistage feature matching, which comprises the following steps: acquiring video data of free falling motion of ore particles crushed by a crusher; extracting morphological characteristics of each ore grain in the Kth frame of ore grain image and the (K + 1) th frame of ore grain image in the video data, and tracking the morphological characteristics of each ore grain in the Kth frame of ore grain image in the (K + 1) th frame of ore grain image through multi-stage characteristic matching based on the dynamic model and the extracted morphological characteristics, obtaining an area preliminary determination result corresponding to each ore grain in the video data; for each ore grain in the video data, determining the maximum area of the ore grain according to all area preliminary determination results corresponding to the ore grain; and according to a preset ore particle area threshold value and the maximum area of each ore particle, performing particle size division on each ore particle, and counting the number of the ore particles in different particle sizes. The method can improve the counting accuracy of sintered ore particles.
column15: WANG YALIN;;TAN XUJIE;;PENG YUBIN;;LIN BIN;;ZHOU ZEXIONG;;LIU CHENLIANG;;CHEN TAO;;DONG MINGJIANG;;WANG KAI

column12: Closed-loop modeling optimization control method and equipment for multiple groups of vertical mills
column13: The invention relates to a multi-group vertical mill closed-loop modeling optimization control method and equipment thereof, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the stationary processing of sampling data through Kalman filtering, and carrying out the prediction modeling of the particle size of a certain vertical mill in the ore grinding process through a time convolution network model. The ore grinding granularity of a plurality of vertical mills is predicted through transfer learning and a knowledge distillation framework, meanwhile, the prediction result of the ore grinding granularity of the vertical mills is visually displayed, and then closed-loop ore grinding real-time prediction optimization control of the vertical mills is achieved through a sparse reward reinforcement learning method. According to the method, the problems of comprehensive complexity such as difficulty in establishing a mathematical model, different characteristics along with different industrial processes, incapability of monitoring operation indexes on line and the like existing in a control method at the present stage are solved. Related set values of multiple groups of vertical mills are dynamically and accurately adjusted in real time, so that the real-time prediction control optimization of controlling the granularity of operation indexes within a target value range has theoretical and practical significance.
column15: WANG PING;;WANG JIAN;;FU GUANGLONG;;WANG XUEPING;;KAN YUNXI;;ZHENG YANHUI

column12: Unloading type sinking rescue device of subsea mining vehicle and use method thereof
column13: An unloading type sinking rescue device of a subsea mining vehicle and a use method thereof are provided. The unloading type sinking rescue device includes an assembly support, an unloading system, an ejection system and a control system. The assembly support is box-shaped, fixed to a subsea mining vehicle, and provided with a plurality of enclosed cavities. The unloading system includes a counterweight, a counterweight cable, a counterweight fixing bracket and a counterweight recovery cavity. The ejection system includes an anchor, an ejection cavity, an anchor cable, an anchor recovery shaft, a pulley, a spring and a boosting device. The control system controls the operation of the unloading system and the ejection system. The use method includes: (1) unloading; (2) ejection; (3) recovery of a part of counterweights; (4) recovery of the anchor; and (5) recovery of remaining counterweights.

column12: Hydrogen fluidization reduction reaction device and iron ore powder agglomeration motion monitoring and inhibiting method
column13: The invention discloses a hydrogen fluidization reduction reaction device and an iron ore powder agglomeration movement monitoring and inhibiting method, and belongs to the technical field of iron ore powder reduction. The device comprises a double-layer tube reaction unit and a heating unit, an electrical capacitance tomography device is installed outside an external sleeve of the double-layer tube reaction unit, and the electrical capacitance tomography device comprises an electrical capacitance tomography sensor, a signal acquisition unit and a computer data processing and imaging display unit. Wherein the electrical capacitance tomography sensor is installed outside the external sleeve and used for conducting capacitance detection on the outer side of the double-layer tube reaction unit, and the electrical capacitance tomography sensor is connected with the computer data processing and imaging display unit through the signal acquisition unit. By adopting the technical scheme, the particle agglomeration motion state of the hydrogen fluidized reduced iron ore powder can be monitored online in real time, so that the real-time regulation and control of reaction conditions can be guided, and the reduction effect of the iron ore powder can be continuously improved.

column12: Transition method for converting stratified caving method into downward horizontal drift stratified filling method
column13: The invention relates to a transition method for converting a stratified caving method into a downward horizontal drift stratified filling method, and belongs to the technical field of mining, the transition method comprises the following steps: (1) making a preliminary stoping scheme; (2) simulating and selecting a stoping scheme; (3) further optimizing a recovery scheme; (4) stoping work is carried out; (5) filling a goaf; by implementing the transition method, safe and stable transition of the downward horizontal drift layered filling method through the layered caving method is completed, and after the mining method is successfully changed, the mining cost, the ore dilution rate and the loss rate are all reduced, and the ore mining efficiency is improved.

column12: Ion source energy detection system and vacuum coating machine
column13: The utility model relates to an ion source energy detection system and a vacuum coating machine. The ion source energy detection system comprises a data acquisition device arranged in a vacuum cavity, at least one Faraday cup connected with the data acquisition device, and a data receiving device arranged outside the vacuum cavity, the Faraday cup is used for detecting energy data of the ion source; the data acquisition device acquires ion source energy data of each Faraday cup and sends the ion source energy data to the data receiving device in a wireless mode; the data receiving device processes the received energy data of the ion source and then sends the data to the control computer for recording; according to the technical scheme, the influence of circuit design is avoided, the energy distribution condition of the ion source can be detected under the dynamic condition through rotation of the working turntable and layout distribution of the Faraday cups, and the energy detection effect of the ion source is improved.

column12: Automated support of a gate entry for underground full extraction mining
column13: An apparatus, system, and method for automated support of a gate entry for underground full extraction mining that includes gathering entry data for a condition of a gate entry by way of a gate entry support. The method also includes determining, by way of the gate entry support, the condition of the gate entry, advancing the gate entry support in response to determining that the condition satisfies an entry condition threshold. The method may also signal a halt condition for a production cycle, if the condition fails to satisfy the entry condition threshold.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR BENEFICIATING AND COLLECTING LITHIUM USING A FLUIDIZED BED REACTOR
column13: A method for concentrating and collecting lithium and lithium compounds via a fluidized bed reactor is disclosed. A hopper receives crushed and pulverized lithium ore, and a feeder tube transfers the crushed and pulverized lithium ore to a fluidized bed reactor. An air mixing chamber receives pressurized air from a pressurized gas inlet and a distributor plate is positioned between the air mixing chamber and the fluidized bed reactor to distribute air pressure across the bottom of the fluidized bed reactor. A cyclone receives a material from the fluid bed reactor and transmits the material to a flume for collection or redistribution through a series of fluid bed reactors for further refinement.
