column12: DYNAMIC NETWORK ROAMING
column13: A method, network node, system, and computer program for management of a transfer of network service for a user equipment, UE, from a first to a second mobile telecommunication network cell. The method comprises: a) a step of at least one mobile network operator, MNO, storing transfer-related data of the first and/or the second network cell operated by the MNO in a distributed ledger, DL; and b) a step of the MNO operating the first network cell retrieving said transfer-related data of the second network cell from the DL and providing said transfer-related data to the UE, wherein the UE is connected to the first network cell and/or providing said transfer-related data to a hardware of the first network cell that communicates with the UE. Wherein the second network cell is neighboring and/or overlapping the first network cell and the UE is to be transferred from the first network cell to the second network cell. Wherein the DL is shared between MNOs operating neighboring and/or overlapping network cells.

column12: Automatic ore dressing monitoring method and system
column13: The invention provides an automatic ore dressing monitoring method and system, and relates to the field of automation. The automatic mineral separation monitoring method comprises the steps that the working state of a belt conveyor is monitored and operated, and it is determined that logistics of mineral aggregate is normal; the flow, the pressure and the liquid level are detected according to instruments and meter equipment; the material level condition of the ore storage bin is detected in real time, a material distribution program of a related operation process is compiled in combination with field process requirements and operation condition information of upstream and downstream equipment, automatic material distribution, optimized material distribution and automatic adjustment of the storage amount of the ore storage bin are implemented, and balance optimization control over feeding of equipment in front and back procedures is achieved; the operation state of the fine crusher is detected in real time, judgment and analysis are carried out in combination with decision conditions, and the ore feeding amount of the crusher is controlled and adjusted. By controlling the water adding amount and the ore feeding amount of each water adding point, controlling the ore grinding concentration of the first-section ball mill and coordinately controlling the overflow concentration of the grader, the operation indexes of the ball mill and the overflow grading granularity of the grader are confirmed to be qualified and stable.
column14: DAZHONG MINING CO LTD INNER MONGOLIA

column12: Top Plate for Laser Welded Lithium-Ion Button Cell Battery
column13: A rechargeable lithium-ion button cell battery having a sealed housing includes a top flat plate and a round or oval cup sealed by laser at the rim of top plate whereas connecting the opening end of the cup sidewall. The top plate has a centered sandwiched structure including two outer plates at upper and lower position, that clamping one inner pin-like conductive plate by its flange, insulated by a gasket. The upper plate of the outer plates has an asymmetric shape to its center line, which allows asymmetric sealing force applied on the inner pin-like plate flange to act as a safety vent. Inside the sealed housing the anode and cathode electrodes are either spiral wound or stacked with separator to be a round or oval roll, one electrode is connected to the cup, the other electrode is connected to the inner pin-like conductive plate of the top plate.
column14: ZHUHAI ZHI LI BATTERY CO LTD
column15: SUN FAJIONG;;WANG FANG;;YANG YOUQING;;YANG ZUI;;LI ZHEN;;WANG YIHENG

column12: Rice hulling and crushing all-in-one machine
column13: The rice hulling and smashing all-in-one machine comprises a machine body, and a rice hulling discharging hopper, a rubber roller, an adjusting button, a smashing receiving hopper and a smashing grinding cavity are sequentially arranged on the front side of the machine body from top to bottom. One side of the rubber roller is connected with a small bran receiving cup and a large bran receiving cup, the small bran receiving cup is located on the front side of the machine body, and the large bran receiving cup is located on the left side of the machine body; a rubber roller adjuster is arrangedon the right side of the machine body, and a rice hulling and receiving box is arranged on the right side of the smashing and receiving hopper in parallel; the machine body further comprises a dust cover, the dust cover is buckled on the crushing and receiving hopper and the crushing and grinding cavity, and a crushing and powder receiving cup is arranged on the right side of the dust cover; according to the rice hulling and smashing all-in-one machine, rice hulling and smashing are combined together, automation and miniaturization of rice hulling and smashing are achieved, complex proceduresand manual operation are omitted, and the occupied area of the machine is saved while the working efficiency is improved.

column12: Method for intelligently controlling load of rod mill
column13: The invention discloses a method for intelligently controlling the load of a rod mill. The method comprises the following steps that 1, the correlation coefficient of each state parameter and the loadchange of the rod mill in the ore grinding process of the rod mill are calculated according to historical ore grinding data, and a group of state parameters with the maximum correlation coefficient is selected as a state variable set; 2, the ore feeding amount of the rod mill is changed through an online step, and a time delay parameter when the state variable selected in the step 1 correspondingly changes is recorded; 3, clustering analysis is carried out on the ore grinding historical data to obtain the working state grade of the rod mill; 4, the similarity between the ore grinding real-time data and the state variable in the working state grade of the rod mill is calculated, and the current load of the rod mill is determined; and 5, control parameters of the rod mill under the currentload are calculated according to the current load to control the rod mill. According to the method, the effect that working state of the rod mill is detected on line in real time can be realized, andfluctuation of the working state of the rod mill in the ore grinding production process can be effectively reduced through closed loop for the operating parameters.

column12: Experimental device and method for solvent-assisted heavy oil in-situ thermal cracking coking
column13: The invention discloses an experimental device and method for solvent-assisted heavy oil in-situ thermal cracking coking. The device comprises an injection system, an experimental model system, a data monitoring system, a sample collection system and a sample analysis system, the injection system is connected with the inlet end of the reaction simulation system; a charging cup and a sand adding cup are arranged in a reaction model in the reaction simulation system; the data monitoring system is used for monitoring the temperature and two-end pressure of the reaction model; the sample collection system is connected with the outlet end of the experimental model system; obtaining a coke sample in the charging cup after the reaction is ended; according to the invention, the deasphalting process of heavy oil can be completed, a high-temperature oxidation thermal cracking experiment of heavy components such as deposited asphaltene and the like can be carried out, and the change of physicochemical properties generated in the thermal cracking reaction process of the heavy components after solvent extraction can be further deeply known by detecting related components; and a theoretical support is provided for alternative development and process design of the oil reservoir after solvent extraction.

column12: Method for optimizing ore grinding overflow particle size interval by automatically controlling parameters
column13: The invention discloses a method for optimizing an ore grinding overflow particle size interval by automatically controlling parameters, and belongs to the technical field of ore grinding particle size control. During production, production data are obtained through a sensor and are sent to a central control computer; in the early stage, a deep forest model is trained through long-term data accumulation and stored in a central control computer; an overflow granularity value obtained by a sensor is judged, optimal parameters suitable for each device in the current production state are obtained under a deep forest model through a grid method under the condition that the overflow granularity value is not in a specified interval, a parameter adjustment result is fed back to a production system through a sending module, and finally parameter adjustment is completed through a control module. According to the method, automatic adjustment and correction of parameters in the ore grinding process are achieved, and the stability of overflow granularity and the production efficiency in ore grinding are greatly improved.

column12: Fuzzy optimization control method and equipment for ore grinding classification process
column13: The invention discloses a fuzzy optimization control method and equipment for an ore grinding grading process, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining historical operation data of the ore grinding grading process, and carrying out the preprocessing, thereby obtaining a standard data set; wherein the operation data comprises a time sequence of a plurality of controlled and control variables; according to the standard data set, working conditions are divided in the ore grinding classification process, and the optimal working condition is determined; selecting part of controlled variables, calculating trend characteristics of the controlled variables, optimizing samples according to the trend characteristics and the optimal working condition, and generating an optimization database; a weighted optimization WM algorithm is adopted to extract fuzzy rules under different working conditions in the process, and an offline fuzzy rule base is generated; and acquiring real-time operation data, identifying a working condition online, activating the working condition rule base, performing rule reasoning according to the real-time operation data to obtain control output, and extracting an online control rule to perform online updating on the fuzzy rule base. According to the method, fluctuation in the ore grinding grading process can be reduced and stabilized in the optimal working condition, and the self-adaptive capacity of the process optimization control system is improved.

column12: Server apparatus, client apparatus, and data processing system
column13: A server apparatus transmits information including a hash value of a previous block, data of a current block, and a search range with regard to one blockchain system to a client apparatus in a mining pool. The client apparatus calculates a Nonce value based on the information transmitted from the server apparatus and transmits the calculated Nonce value to the server apparatus. The server apparatus can transmit information regarding a plurality of blockchain systems to the client apparatus. The server apparatus decides one blockchain system based on a predetermined condition, transmits information related to the decided blockchain system to the client apparatus, and causes the client apparatus to perform mining.
column32: Japanese Office Action dated Feb. 25, 2020 issued in Japanese Application No. 2018-24957, Total 9 pages.;;Aso Jiro, ‘Complete ingenuity of Linux’, Nikkei Linux, Nikkei BP, Apr. 8, 2016, vol. 18, No. 5, Total 6 pages.

column12: Hydrogen explosion ore crushing equipment and crushing method
column13: The invention provides hydrogen explosion ore crushing equipment and a crushing method. The equipment comprises a control system, an explosion pipeline used for loading ores, a vacuumizing system connected with the explosion pipeline, a gas supply system connected with the explosion pipeline and used for providing hydrogen-air for the explosion pipeline, and a hydrogen concentration sensor arranged in the explosion pipeline and used for detecting the concentration of hydrogen in the explosion pipeline, the ignition system is connected with the explosion pipeline and used for igniting combustible gas in the explosion pipeline, and the inclined discharging device enables the explosion pipeline to incline to discharge materials. The ore is crushed by means of shock waves generated by hydrogen explosion, so that the technological process of the crushing system is simplified; multiple times of explosion crushing can be performed to crush the ore into finer particles, so that the crushing efficiency is improved, the grinding granularity is reduced, and the granularity required by an ore product is easy to achieve; and the inclination angle of the explosion pipeline can be automatically adjusted through the inclined discharging device, so that the ore powder can be rapidly poured out and collected after explosion is completed.

column12: Secret image sharing and recovering method based on block chain
column13: The invention discloses a block chain-based secret image sharing and recovery method, which comprises two parts of sharing and recovery of a secret image, and is characterized in that: 1) the secret image generates a group of shadow images, and the shadow images are sent to corresponding users; 2) partitioning each shadow image, and encrypting each image block; and 3) uploading the encrypted shadow image to an IPFS (Internet Protocol File System) and a block chain. The recovery comprises the following steps: 1) a certain user sends a recovery application to the smart contract; 2) the smart contract broadcasts a recovery application event to other users; 3) the secret image sharer selectively authorizes the access right to the smart contract; 4) the smart contract issues a recovery task to the block chain; 5) selecting an agent mining machine by the intelligent contract; (6) the proxy mining machine recovers the secret image in the ciphertext domain, and an encrypted secret image is obtained; and 7) the intelligent contract forwards the encrypted secret image to the application user for decryption. According to the method, the problems of stealing, tampering and losing of the shadow image can be completely prevented.

column12: Ore grinding process fault diagnosis method and device based on convolution auto-encoder
column13: The invention provides an ore grinding process fault diagnosis method and device based on a convolutional auto-encoder, relates to the technical field of fault diagnosis, and can diagnose faults in the ore grinding process in real time. Comprising offline modeling and online fault diagnosis. In the off-line modeling, fault-free data including slurry pump frequency, pump pool liquid level, cyclone feeding concentration, cyclone feeding pressure and cyclone feeding flow data are used to establish a fault diagnosis model based on a convolution auto-encoder. In online fault diagnosis, the data are collected online, and a data residual value and a monitoring quantity are solved by using a model; judging whether the monitoring quantity is greater than or equal to a fault detection threshold value; if yes, faults exist, fault types are analyzed and output, and the fault types include sensor faults and equipment faults (the faults include unstable ore feeding amount of a fine ore bin, blockage of an ore feeding opening of a slurry pump and blockage of a sand settling opening of a cyclone); and if not, carrying out fault diagnosis at the next moment.

column12: Mine intelligent whole production process management and control system
column13: The invention discloses a mine intelligent whole production process management and control system, and relates to the technical field of intelligent mines. The system comprises a production data management module, a scheduling management module, an accurate mining management module, a medium-length hole management module, a recovery management module, a production scheduling management module, a geological record management module, a support management module, an acceptance management module, a sampling management module, a test management module, a transportation management module and a ventilation management module. And the public auxiliary management module comprises fourteen modules. According to the system, an existing mine network, a mine cloud data center, a CAD geologic survey and mining production execution system and a mining production APP are utilized, various element data of mine production are integrated and displayed according to the actual situation of mine production and the management and control process, production design and planning are scientifically optimized, accurate execution of a production plan is ensured, and the production efficiency is improved. Production data of all technological processes are organically connected, and finally the management and control system of the whole process of design, planning, execution and acceptance can be effectively optimized.

column12: FLOTATION RECOVERY RATE PREDICTION DEVICE, FLOTATION RECOVERY RATE PREDICTION METHOD, AND PROGRAM
column13: This flotation recovery rate prediction device, for predicting the recovery rate of a metal subject to sorting in flotation sorting in which the metal subject to sorting is separated from an ore in which a plurality of ores containing a plurality of minerals are mixed, comprises: a receiving unit for receiving a desired recovery rate of the metal subject to sorting; an acquisition unit for acquiring information representing the relationship between soluble metal ratio and mineral content, and information representing the recovery rate of the metal subject to sorting and the mineral content of each of the ores; a calculation unit for calculating, on the basis of the information representing the relationship between soluble metal ratio and mineral content and the information representing the recovery rate of the metal subject to sorting and the mineral content of each of the ores, the mixing ratio of the ores to achieve the desired recovery rate of the metal subject to sorting; and an output unit for outputting information indicating the calculated mixing ratio of the ores.

column12: Prediction method for yield and recovery rate of pyrrhotite and application thereof
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mineral processing, in particular to a prediction method for the yield and recovery rate of pyrrhotite and application of the prediction method. The prediction method comprises the following steps: judging the crystal structure type of pyrrhotite in to-be-treated ore, and calculating the content Md of monoclinic pyrrhotite and/or the content M1 of hexagonal pyrrhotite in the to-be-predicted ore; counting the number of monoclinic pyrrhotite and/or hexagonal pyrrhotite particles in the to-be-predicted ore in different particle size ranges, counting the maximum particle size value and the minimum particle size value in each particle size range, and then calculating a variable D according to the counting result; the content Kd of monoclinic pyrrhotite with the particle size smaller than 0.02 mm and/or the content K1 of hexagonal pyrrhotite with the particle size smaller than 0.02 mm in the to-be-predicted ore are/is calculated; and respectively calculating the maximum yield and the maximum recovery rate of the pyrrhotite. The error of the theoretical maximum yield and the theoretical maximum recovery rate calculated by the prediction method is small.

column12: Mineral pre-enrichment method based on solid microwaves
column13: The invention relates to a mineral pre-enrichment method based on solid microwaves, which comprises the following steps: selecting pre-enriched raw ores as selected raw ores, carrying out coarse crushing on the selected raw ores, screening to obtain screened ores, and carrying out microwave heating on the screened ores; acquiring temperature field pictures obtained after screening and microwave heating, making minerals and barren rocks in the pictures, on the basis of a large number of experiments, constructing an intelligent mineral recognition training model based on deep learning, recognizing and positioning the minerals and the barren rocks, and obtaining spatial three-dimensional coordinates of grabbing points; and constructing an automatic mineral sorting system, achieving separation of the ores and the barren rocks based on the spatial three-dimensional coordinates of the grabbing points, and completing pre-enrichment of the minerals. The method can be used for directly detecting whether the target mineral exists in a certain volume of mineral or not, can be used for quantitatively detecting the content of the mineral in the ore, and has a relatively high resolution ratio.
column14: HUNAN SIFUMAI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for determining enrichment form of ion adsorption type thorium and co-associated elements
column13: The invention belongs to the field of nuclear geology research, and particularly relates to a method for determining the enrichment form of ion adsorption type thorium and co-associated elements, which comprises the following steps of: 1, collecting and sorting the existing exploration and research data of a known ion adsorption type thorium ore deposit; step 2, preliminarily determining enrichment forms of thorium and co-associated elements of the known ion adsorption type thorium deposit; 3, field geological survey and sample collection and analysis are conducted on the known ion adsorption type thorium deposit; step 4, determining enrichment forms of thorium and associated elements by utilizing analysis test data and field survey data; and 5, comprehensively researching and constructing a known ion adsorption type thorium deposit geochemical enrichment model. According to the method, key geological information of the enrichment form of the thorium and the co-associated elements of the ion adsorption type thorium ore deposit is determined, the geological process of ion adsorption type thorium mineralization is simulated, and the enrichment form of the thorium and the co-associated elements of the known typical ion adsorption type thorium ore deposit is determined for the first time.

column12: Downhole nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) tool for one- dimensional NMR imaging
column13: A nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) tool includes an antenna assembly and a magnet assembly. The NMR tool also includes a motional sensor comprising at least one radio frequency (RF) antenna disposed about a tool axis and about at least a portion of the magnet assembly, in which the motional sensor is operable to generate readings for lateral motion of the antenna assembly and the magnet assembly. The at least one RF antenna has a soft magnetic core and a coil winding disposed around the soft magnetic core. The motional sensor can determine a one-dimensional NMR image indicating a lateral displacement of the NMR tool based on one or more spatial positions of NMR excitation volumes in the region of interest that correspond to respective excitation frequencies in the at least one RF antenna.

column12: Live browsing of granular mailbox data
column13: Systems and methods for providing and/or facilitating live browsing of granular mail or mailbox data, such as data stored within Exchange mailboxes, are described. For example, the systems and methods may provide mechanisms for browsing and/or restoring granular data (e.g., email data) from an Exchange database backup copy (or other secondary copy), without having to restore the entire database from the backup copy.

column12: Automatic crushing control equipment for mineral separation
column13: The utility model discloses crushing automation control equipment for mineral separation, and belongs to the technical field of mineral separation crushing. The crushing automatic control equipment for mineral separation comprises a crushing frame, a crushing pressing block is arranged in the crushing frame, movable grooves are symmetrically formed in the side faces of the crushing pressing block, a transmission frame is fixedly arranged in the movable grooves, a shifting column is arranged in the transmission frame, a rotating rod is fixedly arranged at the outer end of the shifting column, a first motor is arranged outside the rotating rod, and two abutting blocks are symmetrically and fixedly arranged in the middle of the inner wall of the crushing frame. According to the ore crusher, the crushing pressing block of the triangular structure is designed to be matched with the abutting block of the triangular structure, ore can be crushed through small-amplitude reciprocating motion of the crushing pressing block, the inner end of the abutting block is of the triangular structure, the angle of the inner end is smaller than that of the lower end of the crushing pressing block, the ore can be gradually crushed from large to small, and the crushing effect is better. The ore crusher is simple and reasonable in design and good in crushing effect, and the problem that crushed ores are too large when the ores are crushed by a crushing roller with a gear structure in the prior art is solved.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PREDICTING COVERAGE RATE OF ACETABULAR CUP PROSTHESIS
column13: Provided in the present invention are a method and apparatus for predicting the coverage rate of an acetabular cup prosthesis. The method comprises: combining a coordinate system of an acetabular cup prosthesis model with a coordinate system of a hip bone model, wherein the outer surface of the acetabular cup prosthesis model is a hemispherical surface; in the coordinate system of the hip bone model, moving the acetabular cup prosthesis model to a preset pose of an acetabulum part; calculating a pose transformation matrix of the acetabular cup prosthesis model during the movement process, and updating the coordinates of each point in the acetabular cup prosthesis model according to the pose transformation matrix; gradually moving the updated acetabular cup prosthesis model in the normal direction from the preset pose towards the acetabulum part on the hip bone model, and simulating a bone grinding process; and calculating a predicted coverage rate of the acetabular cup prosthesis according to the hip bone model which has been subjected to bone grinding simulation. By means of the present solution, the coverage rate of a postoperative acetabular cup prosthesis model is predicted by simulating a bone grinding process before an operation, such that the coverage rate can be predicted in advance; and an operation process is guided according to the predicted coverage rate, such that the coverage rate after the operation is higher.

column12: Method for rapidly delineating porphyry ore deposit and ore body by using chlorite trace element content
column13: The invention discloses a method for quickly delineating an ore body of a porphyry ore deposit by utilizing the trace element content of chlorite, and relates to the technical field of ore deposit exploration. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out multiple three-dimensional space sampling from a known porphyry deposit mining area to obtain a plurality of samples; grinding a plurality of samples into slices, and screening the slices containing chlorite; performing scanning electron microscope analysis, and screening out a to-be-detected sample; carrying out electron probe analysis to obtain the content of major elements; performing LA-ICP-MS analysis to obtain the content of the trace elements; screening target data; according to the relation between the microelements in the target data and the spatial information of the corresponding samples, the porphyry deposit chlorite exploration mark equation is constructed, the amplitude and range of element abnormity are greatly improved, the porphyry deposit prospecting efficiency and accuracy are improved, prospective prediction is effectively provided for deposit deep edge prospecting, and the prospecting efficiency and accuracy of the porphyry deposit chlorite exploration mark equation are improved. The exploration cost and time are reduced, and mineral resources are efficiently and reasonably utilized.

column12: Ore grinding granularity soft measurement method, system, medium, equipment and terminal
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ore grinding particle size measurement, and discloses an ore grinding particle size soft measurement method and system, a medium, equipment and a terminal.The establishment of a soft measurement model is divided into a linear part and a nonlinear part, linear regression is conducted on time sequence expanded training data through an LASSO algorithm, and a linear soft measurement model is established; analyzing the time sequence characteristics according to the model weight, and selecting the time sequence characteristics related to the output as the input of the SCN; the residual error of the true value and the predicted value of the LASSO algorithm is used as the output of the SCN, the SCN is trained, and a nonlinear soft measurement model is established; the linear soft measurement model weight of the LASSO algorithm and the SCN model output weight are synchronously optimized through an elastic network, an optimal soft measurement model is obtained, and soft measurement of the ore grinding granularity is achieved through the optimal soft measurement model. According to the method, the model complexity is reduced while the prediction precision of the soft measurement model is improved by using the elastic network, so that the storage cost of the model is lower, and the application effect is better.

column12: Method for predicting heavy metal migration risk of slag-soil-water system in mining and metallurgy area
column13: The invention discloses a mining and metallurgy area'slag-soil-water 'system heavy metal migration risk prediction method, which comprises the following steps: collecting a rainwater leaching solution and each soil layer sample, and detecting the content of various heavy metals in each sample; detecting the depth of each soil layer and various parameters of soil; performing Monte Carlo simulation according to the detected data characteristics of the heavy metal content, the soil layer depth and each parameter of the soil; taking the rainwater leaching solution and the heavy metal content of the soil layer as an upper boundary condition and an initial input item of a mass balance model respectively, taking the depth of the soil layer and each parameter of the soil as input parameters of the mass balance model, and predicting the heavy metal output flux of the lower boundary of the soil layer from a probability perspective to obtain the corresponding heavy metal content; and according to a single factor index method and a Nemero pollution index method, representing each heavy metal pollution risk and heavy metal comprehensive pollution risk of the underground water in the target prediction time. The method can quickly, accurately and economically evaluate the underground water heavy metal pollution risk of the slag storage yard in the mining and metallurgy area.

column12: Ore feeder of centrifugal concentrator
column13: The utility model discloses an ore feeder of a centrifugal concentrator, which belongs to the field of mineral equipment and comprises an ore feeder body, a support frame is fixedly connected to the upper end of the ore feeder body, an ore box is fixedly connected to the upper end of the support frame, and an auger and a crushing rod are arranged in the ore box of the ore feeder body. The packingauger and the crushing rod are arranged on the same rotating rod and are matched with each other, so that the packing auger pushes and transports ores rightwards while the crushing rod crushes the moved ores, the blanking automation is realized, and the effects of uniform-speed blanking and blockage prevention of the ore feeding pipe are achieved; according to the centrifugal ore separator, the centrifugal ore separator is provided with the centrifugal ore separator, the centrifugal ore separator is internally provided with the blanking groove doing left-right reciprocating motion, through thearrangement of the blanking groove, ore can be filtered, small ore subjected to smashing treatment falls into the ore separator, large ore is clamped in the blanking groove, and therefore the purposeof ore separation is achieved; and later workers do not need to select the device, so that the working intensity of the workers is reduced, and the device is convenient to use.

column12: Spark big data platform-based log information type extraction method and spark big data platform-based log information type mining method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of computer information systems, and discloses a spark big data platform-based log information type extraction method, which comprises the following steps of: preprocessing offline log data, filtering log entries which cannot be identified, and storing the log entries into an HDFS (Hadoop Distributed File System); replacing a conventional variable with a wildcard character, normalizing a log entry to complete simple wildcard processing, and temporarily storing data subjected to wildcard processing into the HDFS; filtering time of the universalized data according to a time window, filtering and splitting log data into a valid log set and an invalid log set, and temporarily storing the valid log set and the invalid log set into the HDFS after duplicate removal; and respectively calculating log information types of the valid logs and the invalid logs by using an iterative grouping mining method, and storing results into the HDFS. According to the scheme, the logs are automatically analyzed and processed, data recovery and use are facilitated, and different log information types can be efficiently and accurately recognized. Meanwhile, the invention also discloses a time window filtering method and an iterative grouping mining method.

column12: Mining area fire monitoring system and automatic fire extinguishing device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining area underground safety intelligent monitoring, in particular to a mining area fire monitoring system and an automatic fire extinguishing device, which comprise an underground fire monitoring assembly arranged in an underground area of a mining area and used for identifying and detecting various detection targets so as to monitor a fire. The input end of the data exchange unit is connected to the underground fire monitoring assembly, and the ground monitoring terminal is connected with the data exchange unit and used for receiving detection data collected by the data exchange unit and sending instruction information to the data exchange unit so as to trigger the alarm device to give an alarm, control the electric control switch valve to be switched on and spray fire extinguishing on a fire area. The effects of intelligent fire monitoring and rapid response, alarm and fire extinguishing are achieved.

column12: Secondary crushing and plug cleaning robot based on AI
column13: The invention discloses a secondary crushing and plug cleaning robot based on AI, and belongs to the technical field of robots. The device comprises an AI recognition assembly, a base, a large arm, a small arm and a hydraulic breaking hammer, the AI recognition assembly is connected with the base through a bus, one end of the base is rotationally connected with the large arm through a rotating shaft, one end of the large arm is rotationally connected with the small arm through a rotating shaft, and one end of the small arm is rotationally connected with the hydraulic breaking hammer through a rotating shaft; the AI recognition assembly comprises an AI camera and a CAN bus support, the AI camera recognizes large ore transmission through a CAN bus, and the CAN bus is connected with the AI camera and the base. The device can replace manpower to complete equipment operation, so that the working intensity of operators on duty is relieved, the investment of operators is reduced, the labor cost is reduced, the working efficiency is improved, and the device has the characteristic of high practicability.

column12: Method for recording and analyzing mill medium dynamics by using induction ball
column13: A method for recording and analyzing medium dynamics of a mill by using an induction ball specifically comprises the following steps: 1) ore grinding experiment and data acquisition: placing the induction ball in the mill, setting corresponding mill parameters, enabling the induction ball to operate along with the mill when the mill rotates, taking out a memory card in an acceleration recorder after the test is finished, and storing the memory card in the acceleration recorder; extracting relative space three-dimensional acceleration data in the memory card; and 2) data analysis: repeating the experiment step 1) under different mill parameters to obtain a plurality of groups of relative space three-dimensional acceleration data, and then processing and analyzing each group of relative space three-dimensional acceleration data to obtain dynamic conditions of the induction ball under different mill parameters. By analyzing the data recorded by the induction ball and combining the ore grinding theory, a set of high-efficiency mill operation parameters can be found, so that a specific quantification scheme for saving energy consumption and reducing production cost can be provided for ore grinding enterprises.
column15: LI HENGJUN;;YANG JINLIN;;MA SHAOJIAN;;WANG GUIFANG;;FENG JINPENG;;MO WEI;;LEE JONG-WOOK;;HUO XINGNAN

column12: Silver mineral quantification method for oxidized silver-containing ore
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of process mineralogy, and particularly relates to a method for quantifying silver minerals in oxidized silver-containing ore. Comprising the following steps of ore grinding, reselection, flotation, automatic mineralogy analysis, data correction and conversion quantification. The method is beneficial to the silver mineral quantification work of the oxidized silver-containing ore, the blank of existing research is filled, the operation is reasonable, and the data is representative.

column12: A/F sensor and method of manufacturing the same
column13: An A/F sensor includes a solid electrolyte body and a heater. The A/F sensor is disposed downstream of a purification device in a flow of exhaust gas g. The purification device purifies the exhaust gas g. The solid electrolyte body is in a cup shape. The solid electrolyte body has an outer surface provided with a measurement electrode 4 contacting the exhaust gas g, and an inner surface provided with a reference electrode contacting reference gas. The solid electrolyte body is made of zirconia. The solid electrolyte body includes a detection part sandwiched between the measurement electrode and the reference electrode and conducted with oxygen ions. The detection part has a cubic phase ratio of 88 mol % or more.

column12: METHOD FOR DISCRIMINATING ORE PROSPECTING TYPES BASED ON COMPOSITIONAL CHANGE OF EPIDOTE
column13: Disclosed is a method for discriminating ore prospecting types based on compositional change of epidote, in particular including the following steps: metallogenic zone delineation; sample collection and analysis: collecting bedrock samples containing epidote from the metallogenic zone according to certain sampling units; trace element analysis and testing; data processing and interpretation: processing obtained initial recorded data using LADRlib software; and ore prospecting type discrimination. The method has the advantages that the description of epidote altered minerals in a magma-hydrothermal metallogenic system is improved from macroscopic characterization to microscopic quantitative interpretation of trace element change in the epidote altered minerals by using an LA-ICP-MS in-situ analysis technology, and the trace element change is linked with the response of the ore prospecting type at an ore concentration area scale, thus overcoming the difficulties of low efficiency, long period and high cost in the traditional method for discriminating the ore prospecting type.

column12: IDENTIFYING COMPUTING DEVICES IN A MANAGED NETWORK THAT ARE INVOLVED IN BLOCKCHAIN-BASED MINING
column13: An example embodiment relates to discovering computing devices in a managed network that are involved in blockchain-based mining. The example embodiment may involve a proxy server application that is disposed within the managed network, controlled by a remote network management platform, and configured to: provide, to a computing device disposed within the managed network, one or more instructions to identify one or more applications executing on the computing device; determine, for an application of the one or more applications that were identified, a command string used to invoke the application to execute on the computing device; compare the command string to a plurality of identifiers indicative of blockchain-based mining; determine that the command string includes an identifier from the plurality of identifiers indicative of blockchain-based mining; and based on determining that the command string includes the identifier, store, in a database, an indication that the application is associated with blockchain-based mining.

column12: Ore screening device for phosphorite mining
column13: The utility model discloses an ore screening device for phosphorite mining, which comprises a spiral feeding machine, a crushing cabin and a screening cabin, a spiral driving motor is arranged outside the spiral feeding machine, the output end of the spiral driving motor is connected with a spiral cutting mechanism through a rotating shaft, a crushing driving motor is arranged outside the crushing cabin, and the output end of the crushing cabin is connected with the screening cabin through a rotating shaft. The output end of the crushing driving motor is connected with a crushing roller through a rotating shaft, the interior of the crushing bin communicates with the interior of the screening bin through a notch, a screening driving motor and a conveying driving motor are installed outside the screening bin, and the output end of the screening driving motor is connected with a screening plate. The output end of the conveying driving motor is connected with conveying rollers through a rotating shaft, and the conveying rollers are connected through a conveying belt. Phosphorite raw materials are prefabricated, cut and crushed and are conveyed and screened by the automatic conveying device, so that mineral particles can be automatically screened, the whole automation degree is high, the operation is convenient, and the labor cost is saved.
column14: HUBEI SHENNONG PHOSPHORUS INDUSTRY TECH CO LTD

column12: Full-automatic alloy ore sample preparation, screening and determination system
column13: The utility model relates to a full-automatic sample preparation, screening and determination system. The full-automatic alloy ore sample preparation, screening and determination system comprises an incoming sample weighing and conveying unit, a screening and determination unit, a sample preparation unit and a PLC control unit which are connected in sequence, wherein the incoming sample weighing and conveying unit is used for opening a sample bag, weighing a sample and conveying the sample to the screening and measuring unit; the screening and measuring unit is used for automatically screeningthe alloy ore samples, automatically collecting the screened samples, automatically weighing and metering and uploading weighing data to the PLC control unit; the sample preparation unit is used forautomatically crushing the collected alloy ore sample, and splitting and collecting the crushed sample; the PLC control unit is used for controlling the flow work of each unit equipment in the system;and the incoming sample weighing and conveying unit comprises an automatic unpacking and weighing device. According to the full-automatic sample preparation, screening and determination system for the alloy ore, all the unit devices are controlled by the PLC, the automation degree of the system is high, and the working efficiency and the determination accuracy are effectively improved.

column12: Automatic ore polished section grinding and polishing equipment and polished section grinding and polishing method
column13: The invention provides automatic ore polished section grinding and polishing equipment and a polished section grinding and polishing method, and relates to the technical field of polished section grinding and polishing. The automatic ore polished section grinding and polishing equipment comprises a grinding and polishing component, a detection component, a transfer component, an interaction device and a controller; the grinding and polishing component and the detection component are arranged at intervals; the transfer part is used for picking up the X-ray plate and transferring the X-ray plate between the grinding and polishing part and the detection part; the grinding and polishing part, the detection part, the transfer part and the interaction device are respectively connected with the controller; the interaction device is used for inputting ore types, and the controller is used for configuring process parameters of the grinding and polishing component according to the ore types. According to the ore polished section automatic grinding and polishing equipment and the polished section grinding and polishing method, suitable grinding and polishing conditions can be automatically selected according to different ore characteristics, grinding and polishing and quality detection are carried out, unqualified samples continue to be ground and polished until the unqualified samples are qualified, automation of the whole process is achieved, the polished section grinding and polishing quality is guaranteed, and the grinding and polishing machining efficiency is improved.
column14: MINING AND METALLURGY SCIENCE AND TECH GROUP LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Sampling device for lead zinc ore component detection
column13: The utility model discloses a sampling device for lead zinc ore component detection. The sampling device comprises a clamping ore taking mechanism, an overturning adjusting mechanism, a crushing roller, a crushing driving motor, a sliding taking-out through hole, an auxiliary sliding block, a sliding containing shell, a shell connecting plate, a crushing generation shell and a device base. The utility model belongs to the technical field of lead-zinc ore detection, and particularly relates to a sampling device for lead-zinc ore component detection, which improves the sampling effect of the sampling device for lead-zinc ore component detection by arranging a clamping ore taking mechanism, a turnover adjusting mechanism and a crushing roller, realizes the integrated function of automatically taking ore and crushing into powder, and improves the working efficiency. According to the sampling device for detecting the lead zinc ore components, the working efficiency of the sampling device for detecting the lead zinc ore components is improved, the automation degree of the sampling device for detecting the lead zinc ore components is improved, the use experience of the sampling device for detecting the lead zinc ore components is improved, and the maintenance cost of the sampling device for detecting the lead zinc ore components is reduced; and the service life of the sampling device for lead zinc ore component detection is prolonged.

column12: Ore sample crushing device for geological mineral exploration
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of ore sample crushing devices, in particular to an ore sample crushing device for geological mineral exploration. The device comprises a supporting frame, a screening structure and a second motor, a crusher is welded to the surface of the supporting frame, the input end of the crusher is in transmission connection with a conveying belt, the surface of the conveying belt is in transmission connection with the second motor, and the screening structure is arranged on the arc face of the supporting frame and comprises four sliding rods. The arc surfaces of the four sliding rods are slidably connected with the supporting frame, a movable frame is welded to one ends of the sliding rods, sliding holes are formed in the surface of the movable frame, and movable rods are movably connected to the inner walls of the sliding holes. The problems that in traditional ore sample crushing in the prior art, due to the fact that ore sample powder obtained after crushing of a crushing machine still contains a certain amount of large-size particle samples, errors are caused to detection of the ore samples, and detection data are inaccurate are solved.

column12: Mine equipment operation state data visualization system
column13: The invention provides a mining equipment operation state data visualization system. The mining equipment operation state data visualization system comprises a field acquisition main controller, a server, a display terminal and an execution mechanism, the execution mechanism is arranged on the mining equipment to monitor the operation condition of the mining equipment and obtain the operation parameters of the mining equipment, and the field collection main controller is in signal connection with the execution mechanism to be used for collecting the operation parameters monitored by the execution mechanism, processing, packaging and sending the operation parameters to the server; the server is used for storing data from the on-site acquisition main controller. The display terminal is used for carrying out a display request to the server, and the server distributes operation state data of the corresponding mine equipment. The mining equipment operation state data visualization system provided by the invention can monitor the operation state of the equipment in real time, perform operation state data acquisition on mining equipment such as a feeder, a crusher and screening equipment, and monitor key data of each piece of equipment.

column12: Ore granularity grading method and system based on image and deep neural network
column13: The invention relates to an ore granularity grading method and a system based on an image and a deep neural network, and the system comprises a crusher, a belt conveyor and a control system, and is characterized in that a camera electrically connected with the control system is arranged above the belt conveyor; the method comprises the following steps: 1) collecting ore image data by the camera and transmitting the data to a control system, and constructing an ore granularity training sample set by a computer; 2) performing image preprocessing on the training sample set to enhance the image and reduce the noise; 3) optimizing the training sample set to obtain a model; 4) performing ore granularity segmentation on the ore image by applying the obtained optimized U-NET network model; and 5)performing granularity statistical calculation on the image segmentation result to obtain ore diameter and granularity distribution. The method has the advantages that the ore granularity can be detected and displayed on line in real time, and a foundation is laid for efficient production of an automatic control crusher.
column14: ANSTEEL GROUP MINING IND CO LTD

column12: Testing device and testing method for simulating ocean energy soil-well coupling effect caused by hydrate mining
column13: The invention belongs to the field of ocean energy soil mining mechanical testing, and particularly relates to a testing device and a testing method for simulating an ocean energy soil-well coupling effect caused by hydrate mining. The testing device comprises a triaxial pressure chamber, a stress loading system, a gas supply pressurization system, a thermostatic water bath system, a mining well,a back-pressure valve, a gas-liquid separation and recovery system and a data acquisition system; the stress loading system is connected with the triaxial pressure chamber, and loading in different stress modes is achieved; the gas supply pressurization system is connected with the triaxial pressure chamber to provide a gas source and control the gas pressure to generate a hydrate; the thermostatic water bath system seamlessly surrounds the triaxial pressure chamber to control the indoor temperature; the mining well is placed in a sample and installed in the triaxial pressure chamber to simulate the soil-well coupling effect caused by mining; the back-pressure valve is connected with the triaxial pressure chamber to reduce the pressure to achieve hydrate decomposition; the gas-liquid separation and recovery system is connected with the back-pressure valve to measure and recover the gas and liquid; and the data acquisition system acquires test data regularly and stores the test data. According to the testing device, the generation of ocean hydrate energy soil can be achieved, and the energy soil-well coupling effect caused by ocean hydrate mining can be accurately test.

column12: Feeding device capable of accurately controlling feeding amount and control method thereof
column13: According to the ore feeding device capable of accurately controlling the ore feeding amount and the control method of the ore feeding device, a pendulum type ore feeder is arranged below a discharging opening of a stock bin, an ore homogenizing device is arranged on a conveying belt, and a nuclear scale is arranged behind the ore homogenizing device, so that the ore feeding amount is accurately controlled by obtaining the deviation between the metering data of the nuclear scale and the set ore feeding amount; and the swing amplitude and the operation frequency of the swing type ore feeder are controlled, and accurate closed-loop control is conducted on the ore feeding amount. According to the method, ore grinding operation stability is improved through balanced and stable ore feeding, so that ore grinding operation efficiency is improved.

column12: Method for evaluating ore grinding cost in magnetic separation-fine screening regrinding process
column13: The invention relates to a method for evaluating the ore grinding cost in a magnetic separation-fine screening regrinding process, which is characterized by comprising the following steps of: 1) firstly, under the condition that an mth concentrate grade product is obtained in the process flow, calculating the utilization coefficient qn of each section of grinding machine by measuring the ore feeding granularity and the product granularity of each section of grinding ore; (2) calculating the ore feeding yield gamma n of each section of ore grinding operation by measuring the raw ore grade and the concentrate grade and the tailing grade of each grading operation; 3) calculating the comprehensive utilization coefficient q < comprehensive > m of the mill when the concentrate grade product is obtained under the condition through qn and gamma n; and (4) comparing q comprehensive 1 when m is equal to 1 with q comprehensive m of different schemes to judge the ore grinding cost. The method has the advantages that the ore grinding cost is predicted through the method of calculating q and m, and the method can be used for guiding field production and dressing plant design, reasonably determining the ore grinding granularity of each section of mill, reasonably determining the concentrate grade, reducing the production cost and improving the economic benefit.

column12: Multi-probe particle size detector for ore pulp
column13: The invention discloses a multi-probe particle size detector for ore pulp, which comprises an ore pulp particle size detection assembly, the ore pulp particle size detection assembly is communicated with a drying and crushing device through a first discharge pipe, the drying and crushing device is used for drying and crushing the ore pulp, and the drying and crushing device is communicated with a lower guide screening assembly. The material guiding and screening assembly is used for screening dry ore particles, the dry ore particles screened by the material guiding and screening assembly enter the first dry ore particle size detection device and the second dry ore particle size detection device, and the first dry ore particle size detection device and the second dry ore particle size detection device detect the particle sizes of the dry ore particles. The first dry ore grain size detection device comprises a detection box, and a rotary base is fixed to the detection box. The multi-probe particle size detector for the ore pulp has the advantages of detecting different heights and multiple probes of the ore pulp, drying and screening the ore pulp, shooting screened dry ore grains and comparing data, and ensuring that the particle size of the dry ore grains is accurately detected.

column12: Intelligent optimization control method for ore grinding process
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent optimization control method for an ore grinding process, and the method comprises the steps: S1, obtaining mill sound and mill power data in past H hours as sample data, calculating a sample data clustering center through employing an improved fuzzy-C-means clustering algorithm, and initializing a current moment t to 0; s2, updating the discourse domain and membership function parameters of the input variables of the fuzzy controller according to the clustering center; s3, mill sound and power data at the moment t are obtained, the mill sound trend is extracted, and the mill sound deviation is calculated; s4, the mill sound deviation, the mill sound trend and the mill power are input into a fuzzy controller, and set values of the ore feeding amount and the water feeding amount are obtained; s5, after a control period T, t = t + T; s6, judging whether t is smaller than H or not; if yes, returning to S3; and if not, returning to S1. The actual production data is used for testing, the result shows that the ore grinding process is stable compared with that under manual control, and the ore handling capacity is improved by 4.3%.

column12: Electric shovel positioning method based on density clustering
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of strip mine production, and particularly relates to a density clustering-based electric shovel positioning method, which comprises the following steps of: calculating a vehicle-shovel corresponding relation by utilizing a scheduling operation plan of each shift and GPS (Global Positioning System) dynamic positioning data according to operation time and tracks of a shovel where a transport vehicle is located, a rock crushing turnover point and an ore crushing turnover point; and the preliminary positioning information of the electric shovel is obtained by using a DBSCAND algorithm. Performing trajectory prediction on the failure positions of the electric shovel and the transport vehicle by using a GPR algorithm, analyzing data of a signal vanishing point of the electric shovel and a signal vanishing point of the transport vehicle, performing least square method curve fitting on a plurality of predicted values, and performing mapping on each intersection point of the predicted trajectory on a connecting line of the failure positions of the electric shovel and the transport vehicle; and taking the point with the maximum mapping density as the accurate operation position of the electric shovel. According to the method, on the basis of existing equipment, a proper algorithm is used for calculation, the accurate position of the electric shovel can be obtained without re-investment of the equipment, reference data is provided for production scheduling, and lean production of mines is further achieved.

column12: MILKING ARRANGEMENT, SET OF EXCHANGEABLE EXPENDABLE PARTS AND METHOD FOR A MILKING ARRANGEMENT
Mechanical-electrical integrated ore processing equipment
column13: The invention discloses mechanical-electrical integrated ore processing equipment. The mechanical-electrical integrated ore processing equipment comprises an equipment box body, wherein a partition plate is mounted in the middle inside the equipment box body; the left side of the bottom of the equipment box body is equipped with a first motor protective cover; the bottom end inside the first motoris equipped with a first motor; the top of the first motor is connected to a first motor shaft; the top of the first motor shaft penetrates through the equipment box body and is connected to a rotaryrod; and the top of the rotary rod penetrates through a crushing barrel body and is connected to a fixed block. According to the mechanical-electrical integrated ore processing equipment disclosed bythe invention, a first crushing wheel is arranged on the rotary rod and a second crushing wheel is arranged on the crushing barrel body, and the first crushing wheel can be utilized to drive the second crushing wheel for distinguishing small ores from big ores to add, so that the equipment can process ores of different sizes once, and more practical mechanical-electrical integrated ore processingequipment is favorably achieved. The mechanical-electrical integrated ore processing equipment is relatively practical, and is suitable for being widely popularized and used.

column12: Experimental device and method for simulating in-situ fluidized mining of deep metal ore
column13: The invention provides an experimental device and method for simulating in-situ fluidized mining of deep-ground metal ore, and belongs to the technical field of deep-ground resource fluidized mining.The device comprises a reflux opening, a liquid storage tank, a liquid outlet, a pumping motor, a fluid flow meter, an electric control airtight valve, a sealing ring, a safety valve, a pressure gauge, a pressure release valve, a reaction tank top cover, an electric heating temperature control layer, a fixing bolt, a sealing washer, a reaction tank body, a liquid injection pipeline, a liquid injection hole, a porous partition plate, a liquid collection curved surface, a liquid collection bin, a pH sensor, a redox potential sensor, an ion concentration sensor, a liquid collection tank, a data centralized control visualization terminal, a temperature sensor, an oxygen concentration sensor, an air pressure sensor, an electric control temperature changer, a gas flowmeter, an O2 storage tank and a CO2 storage tank. According to the device and method of the invention, the temperature and the air pressure of the experimental device are visible and adjustable; and the pH value, the oxidation-reduction potential, the ion concentration and other parameters are measurable and controllable; and a research device and a method reference are provided for in-situ fluidized mining of the deep metalore.

column12: Element analysis method based on ore grinding image
column13: The invention relates to an element analysis method based on an ore grinding image. The method comprises the steps of ore pretreatment, ore energy spectrum data acquisition, energy spectrum data pretreatment and ore element analysis. When the pretreatment method is used for pretreating the ore energy spectrum data, the data dimension is improved, and the training time is shortened; by using the LDropout layer provided by the invention, discarding is triggered on the basis of original random discarding, so that the neural network model has stronger robustness, and the situations of over-fitting and gradient disappearance are not easy to occur; and the exponential dynamic method provided by the invention is used for dynamically adjusting the training step length and label punishment to train the model, so that the model can reach the training ending condition more quickly in the training process, the risk that the model falls into the local minimum is reduced, and the convergence speed is increased.

column12: Selective information extraction from network traffic traces both encrypted and non-encrypted
column13: A system and method are described for information extraction from network traffic traces that are both encrypted and non-encrypted. The system includes a client computer and a remote computer, where the client computer communicates data over a network. The client computer sets a session key log file environment variable, such that when the client computer launches a supported browser, a session key log file (KLF) is created, computer network traffic traces are captured by retrieving data from encrypted traffic, and the KLF and captured traffic are periodically transferred to a remote server. A remote computer performs traffic mining to analyze the captured traffic traces and extract sensitive pieces of information.

column12: METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC CONTROL OF TECHNOLOGICAL GRADES OF CRUSHED ORE IN FLOW
column13: FIELD: data processing; measurement technology.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to methods of controlling technological grades of crushed ore in a stream and can be used in concentration of mineral ores. Method of automatic control of technological grades of crushed ore in flow, including measurement of element and general material composition of ore and computer processing of obtained data. Prior to measurement of elementary and general material composition of ore, sample preparation involves extraction of dust from ore flow formed during disintegration of material. Dust is filtered from extraneous foreign inclusions, accumulated in an aqueous medium, forming a suspension, setting the suspension density limit value, sufficient for performing the subsequent analysis by instrumental method, elemental and total composition thereof is analyzed using an X-ray fluorescent analyzer and the obtained data are transmitted to a controller, in which information on the amount of technological grades of ore of the given deposit, which differ significantly from each other with respect to beneficiation properties, is also transmitted. For each kind of ore there created are archives of data obtained during periods of time, during which supply for processing of the same process ore grade was performed. In compliance with Shewhart's statistical theory, control charts are constructed inside each archive for all monitored components, finding central lines, upper and lower control boundaries, finding, for all recovered technological grades of ore, common ranges of change of content of each of the monitored components for the entire period of data accumulation, dividing the general ranges of variation of content of each of the monitored components into subbands, within which conditions of statistical stability of measurement processes are observed and number of which corresponds to the number of recovered technological grades of ore, serial numbers are assigned to subbands in accordance with conditional serial numbers of technological grades of ore, method includes forming a table of compliance of subbands of statistical stability of measurement processes of all controlled components to selected process grades of ore and containing a composite decimal code of ore grade, each digit of which corresponds to the number of its sub-range of measurement of the monitored component. Upon completion of the mapping table, the next cycle of measurement of the monitored components is carried out, determining the belonging of the measured component values to the corresponding subbands, according to the matching table, the subband numbers are found, a process ore summary code is formed, found code is used to determine the current flow ore belonging to a specific process grade and to transmit the obtained information to the operator panel or to the automatic process control system.EFFECT: technical result consists in improvement of representativeness and accuracy of automatic control of technological grades of crushed ore in flow.3 cl, 7 dwg, 1 tbl

column12: All-plastic lens edge grinding device for VR visual system research and development

column12: Crushing mechanism for automatic gold ore dressing system
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of nonferrous metal ore dressing industry, in particular to a crushing mechanism for an automatic gold ore dressing system, which comprises a device main body, a control panel is arranged on one side of the device main body, two conical crushing wheels are arranged on one side of the device main body, and the control panel is arranged on the other side of the device main body. The two conical crushing wheels are arranged mutually, a motor is arranged on one side of the device body, the output end of the motor is connected with one ends of the conical crushing wheels, and the output end of the motor is connected with a conveying belt in a sleeved mode. According to the utility model, through the arrangement of the automatic crushing device, mathematical models among parameters of the crusher load detection module, the ore classifier load detection module, the pulverizer cylinder wall vibration detection module and the hydrocyclone module are obtained through a comparison test of four detection data in the device, and the mathematical models are associated and then recorded into a monitoring system; an operator can compare and analyze the working state and the crushing efficiency of the crushing system in a monitoring room through various data fed back by the monitoring system.

column12: Method for analyzing content of medium and strong magnetic sulfides in bayan obo ore
column13: The invention discloses a method for analyzing the content of medium and strong magnetic sulfides in bayan obo ore. The method comprises the following steps: S1, determining the medium and strong magnetic sulfides in the bayan obo ore sulfides; s11, magnetic ore samples are selected out through a magnetic separation device by using a magnetic separation method; and S12, analyzing the magnetic ore sample by using an acetic acid-hydrogen peroxide leaching barium sulfate-ICP-AES (Inductively Coupled Plasma-Atomic Emission Spectrometry) method. According to the method, the detection result is more stable and accurate, and an accurate data basis is provided for experimental research of the dressing and smelting process.

column12: System and method for controlling mining machine, mining equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a system and method for controlling a mining machine, mining equipment and a storage medium. column12: The base assembly is used in soil crushing device
column13: The base assembly is used in the soil crushing preparation device, at least one crushing station for placing a cup body assembly is arranged on the base assembly, and the crushing station is used forfixing the cup body assembly; a crushing unit is arranged in the crushing station and is used for crushing the soil sample in the cup body assembly. In the existing soil detection process, the crushing treatment on a soil sample is very troublesome, the manual degree is high, and an integrated crushing treatment device is lacked. The soil crushing and preparing device is high in automation degree,when the soil crushing and preparing device is used, an obtained soil sample is placed in the cup body assembly, then the cup body assembly is inserted into the crushing station, the crushing unit crushes the soil sample in the cup body assembly, operation is convenient, and the sample treatment time before detection is greatly saved.

column12: Coarse crushing integrated control system and method
column13: The invention provides a coarse crushing integrated control system and method, and belongs to the technical field of beneficiation. An indication signal of a traffic signal lamp of a vehicle entering platform is adjusted according to the material level height of a feeding bin, and an ore feeding truck feeds ore to the feeding bin or stops feeding the ore according to the indication signal; the discharging speed of a discharging belt is adjusted according to the material level height of a discharging bin; and the action of a plow discharger arranged in the conveying direction of the discharging belt is adjusted according to whether the ironware exists on the discharging belt or not, so that the ironware in the materials on the discharging belt is removed. The coarse crushing integrated control system has the technical effects that the automation degree of a semi-mobile crushing station is improved, and the crushing efficiency is improved.

column12: Screening device for primary processing of manganese ore
column13: The utility model discloses a screening device for manganese ore preliminary processing, which comprises a feeding hopper, the feeding hopper is fixed above a screening box body, a crushing groove is arranged below the feeding hopper, a crushing motor mounting groove is arranged in the crushing groove, a crushing motor is fixed in the crushing motor mounting groove, water tanks are arranged on both sides of the crushing groove, and a water tank is arranged in the crushing motor mounting groove. The water tank is connected with a water spraying device through a water conveying pipe, a plurality of evenly-distributed sprayers are arranged on the water spraying device, an ore sliding way is arranged below the sprayers, the ore sliding way is connected with a roller magnetic separator, and two ore outlets are formed below the roller magnetic separator and are respectively provided with a concentrate screen outlet and a tailing screen outlet. A concentrate storage cavity is arranged below an outlet of the concentrate screen, and a tailing storage cavity is arranged below an outlet of the tailing screen. Compared with the prior art, the manganese ore collecting device has the advantages that manganese ore with good quality can be conveniently collected, the whole device is high in automation degree, and a large number of manpower resources can be saved.

column12: High-quality and ultra-pure fine iron powder grading preparation device and high-quality and ultra-pure fine iron powder grading preparation method
column13: The invention discloses a high-quality ultrapure iron fine powder grading preparation device and method.The high-quality ultrapure iron fine powder grading preparation device comprises a fine grinding box, a crushing box, a feeding box, a magnetic separation box and a control box, the high-quality ultrapure iron fine powder is obtained in the modes of crushing, preheating treatment, fine grinding, ball milling, quantitative feeding, magnetic separation, purification, shaping and sintering, the adopted equipment is high in automation degree, and the production efficiency is improved. Compared with the prior art, fine iron powder processing and magnetic separation can be achieved only by feeding, drying and heating are conducted during feeding, fine grinding and ball milling, grinding of the iron ore powder is facilitated, later-stage magnetic separation is facilitated, the drying time is saved, independent drying treatment is not needed, fine grinding and ball milling are driven by the same motor, and the cost is reduced. And the auger is adopted for quantitative feeding during discharging, feeding is conducted according to the magnetic separation speed, flexibility is high, the magnetic separation quality is also guaranteed, and the equipment is further provided with the filtering filler which can filter air containing iron powder.

column12: Ore grinding medium bulk specific gravity measuring device and method
column13: The invention relates to an ore grinding medium bulk specific gravity measuring device, which comprises: an iron square frame, the top end of which is provided with a cover plate and the interior of which contains an ore grinding medium; the baffle is positioned in the iron square frame; the infrared distance measuring device is positioned in the middle of the cover plate of the iron square frame; the upper end of the damping spring is connected to the bottom end of the iron square frame at a distance from the edge; an electronic scale is mounted above the base, and the upper end of the electronic scale is connected with the lower end of the damping spring; the vibration motor is arranged in the base, and the vibration motor is connected with the lower end of the electronic scale; and the control panel is arranged on the side end part of the base, and is used for controlling the vibration of the vibration motor, controlling the movement of the baffle plate, controlling the infrared distance measuring device to measure the distance from the upper end of the iron square frame to the ore grinding medium in the iron square frame, receiving data of the electronic scale and calculating the bulk specific gravity of the ore grinding medium. The ore grinding medium bulk specific gravity can be rapidly measured, the ore grinding medium matching time can be saved, the proper ore grinding medium quality is selected, and the ore grinding efficiency is improved.

column12: Client mining model training method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium

The problem that in the prior art, when the client mining model is constructed, due to the singleness of data, the client mining model constructed through existing data is not ideal in application effect, and many potential clients may be missed is solved.

column12: Long-distance seepage simulation experiment device and method
column13: The invention discloses a long-distance seepage simulation experiment device which comprises a leaching agent preparation tank, a continuous long-distance model column and a data acquisition and processing system, a solution inlet, a carbon dioxide inlet and an oxygen inlet are formed in the leaching agent preparation tank, and valves are arranged at the three inlets; the liquid outlet end of theleaching agent preparation tank is communicated with the inlet end of the continuous long-distance model column, a back pressure valve is arranged at the outlet end of the continuous long-distance model column, and the back pressure valve and the leaching agent preparation tank are in electric signal connection with the data acquisition and processing system. The stratum pressure range of a targetore bed can be simulated to be 0-20 Mpa; the simulated well distance range is 0-50 m; meanwhile, a process solution can be subjected to pressure-maintaining sampling, and an ore sample can be sampledin sections after an experiment is finished.

According to the device, the crucible can be conveniently stored through the crucible matching groove, so that the effect of heating materials bythe crucible can be achieved; meanwhile, the volumetric flask or flask can be supported by the supporting plate, so that the vanadium content in the ore can be detected through mutual coordination ofmultiple structures.
