column12: Food processor with good crushing effect
column13: The utility model provides a food processor with a good crushing effect. The stirrer comprises a base and a stirring cup, a crushing knife is arranged in the stirring cup; the stirring cup comprises acup body, a cup cover and a cup base. A metal disc is arranged between the bottom of the cup body and the cup base; the metal disc comprises a metal disc side wall and a metal disc bottom wall; the crushing knife is arranged on the bottom wall of the metal disc; the cup body is in a big-end-down cone shape. Wherein the cup body comprises an upper cup body and a lower cup body; the upper cup bodyis in a big-end-up cone shape. The lower cup body is in a big-end-down cone shape. The upper cup body is smoothly connected with the lower cup body; the opening diameter of the cup body is smaller than the bottom diameter of the cup body; the rotating liquid is pressed by the inclined interior of the inner wall of the cup body in the process of ascending along the cup body; the component force converging to the rotating center is achieved, the water head uprush height of the rotating water flow can be reduced, the water head can fall back to the center in advance, hollow vortexes in the centerare filled, the up-down rolling effect is enhanced, the up-down circulation effect is improved, the contact space of liquid and blades is increased, and the smashing effect is improved.

column12: Multi-metal nodule crushing device and method based on supercritical carbon dioxide
column13: The invention discloses a multi-metal nodule crushing device based on supercritical carbon dioxide, the multi-metal nodule crushing device comprises a box body, an ore input pipe, a heating jet unit, a crushed ore output pipe and a control unit, the bottom of the box body is provided with a lower jaw plate, and the lower jaw plate is provided with lower jaw teeth and water permeable holes. One end of the ore input pipe is connected with the middle part of the box body; the crushed ore output pipe is arranged at the lower part of the other side of the box body; and an outlet valve and a centrifugal pump are arranged in the crushed ore output pipe. The heating jet unit is located above the box body, a carbon dioxide inlet is formed in the upper end of the heating jet unit, an upper jaw plate is slidably arranged in the box body and divides the interior of the box body into an air pressure chamber and a crushing chamber, and upper jaw teeth and a pressure release valve are arranged at the bottom of the upper jaw plate. The invention further discloses a multi-metal nodule crushing method. The characteristics of supercritical carbon dioxide are utilized, the polymetallic nodule is crushed twice, crushed particles are uniform, the mechanical failure rate is low, the automation degree is high, the number of crushing phenomena is small, work is reliable, and efficiency is high.

column12: Dust removal device for mineral separation
column13: The utility model discloses a dust removal device for mineral separation, which relates to the technical field of mining and mineral separation equipment and comprises a main body, a feed port is arranged above the main body, a motor I is arranged behind the main body, a crushing wheel is arranged below the feed port, and the crushing wheel is connected with the motor I through a bearing. Compared with an existing common dust removal device, according to the dust removal device for mineral separation, when ore falls into the screening frame, an off-axis gear rotates through a second motor, a first gear is driven to rotate, a first rotating rod and a second rotating rod rotate, the screening frame shakes up and down, dust and impurities in the ore fall from a leakage net, and the dust removal effect is achieved. column12: High-precision anti-deviation deburring grinding forming mechanism for cup opening of hollow plastic cup
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of automation equipment, and particularly relates to a high-precision anti-deviation deburring grinding forming mechanism for a cup opening of a hollowplastic cup. The plastic cup polishing machine comprises a polishing machine base, a rotating disc capable of rotating in the circumferential direction is arranged on the polishing machine base, anda plurality of plastic cup containing bases distributed in an annular array mode along the center point of the rotating disc are arranged on the rotating disc. Through the arrangement of the rotatingdisc, the plurality of plastic cup placing seats, the plastic cup positioning and clamping assembly and the cup rim grinding wheel, a plastic cup needing to be ground and deburred can be positioned and clamped, so that an opening of the plastic cup stably faces the cup rim grinding wheel, and then the cup rim of the plastic cup is ground through the cup rim grinding wheel to be deburred; the plastic cup polishing device is simple in structure and convenient to operate, avoids loosening and angle deviation of cup openings of plastic cups in the polishing process, improves the polishing accuracy, is good in deburring effect, can place a plurality of plastic cups at a time, and is high in automation degree and production efficiency.

column12: Ore crusher with anti-blocking function
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ore crushing, and particularly relates to an ore crusher with an anti-blocking function, the ore crusher comprises a jaw crusher, a material jacking frame, a rotating rod, a cam, a transmission plate and a connecting rod, the jaw crusher comprises a rack, a fixed jaw plate, a movable jaw plate and an output shaft; the material jacking frame is slidably arranged at the lower part of the fixed jaw plate; a rotating rod is rotationally arranged on the fixed jaw plate, and the end part of the rotating rod is connected with a cam; the transmission plate is fixedly connected to the cam, a linear sliding groove is formed in the end of the transmission plate, and the material jacking frame slides in the linear sliding groove. A connecting rod is rotationally arranged between the cam and the movable jaw plate, and the sliding motion of the material jacking frame is synchronous with the cyclic motion of the movable jaw plate. The material ejecting frame ejects and loosens the ores in an up-and-down reciprocating manner along with the cyclic movement of the movable jaw plate, so that the ores are prevented from being bonded and blocked, and the automation degree is high; and when the movable jaw plate is far away from the fixed jaw plate to increase the space of the crushing cavity, the material jacking frame can synchronously move upwards, crushing and jacking loosening operations are associated with each other, and ore discharging is facilitated.

column12: Ore grinding-weak and strong magnetic separation-reverse flotation process method for refractory iron ore tailings
column13: The invention relates to an ore grinding-weak and strong magnetic separation-reverse flotation process method for refractory iron ore tailings, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. According to the method, a tailing product serves as a research object, the iron ore refractory tailings are subjected to the technological method of ball milling, stirring mill grinding, weak magnetism, strong magnetism and reverse flotation, the technological process is simple, equipment operation is stable, the automation degree is high, industrial production is easy to achieve, the grading index of the treated tailings is good, and efficient development and utilization of resources are achieved.

column12: Top plate weighting display prediction method and device based on micro-seismic characteristics
column13: The invention provides a roof weighting display prediction method and device based on micro-seismic characteristics. The method comprises the following steps: calculating a theoretical weighting step value according to an obtained rock stratum structure numerical value of a roof; correcting the theoretical value of the weighting step to obtain a predicted value of the weighting step; obtaining daily actual mining progress parameters of the working face according to the obtained progress table data of the production site; calculating the ratio of the weighting step prediction value to the actual recovery progress parameter to obtain a predicted weighting display time attribute; when the predicted weighting display time attribute is larger than or equal to the current weighting display time attribute, roof weighting display is predicted, and an early warning device is triggered. According to the method, the roof weighting display of the working face can be analyzed and predicted, the roof weighting step pitch can be accurately judged, and the problem that the prediction result is not accurate enough in the prior art is solved.

column13: A helmet accessory mounting system includes a mounting device configured to couple to an outer surface of a side of a helmet. The mounting device includes a plurality of mounting locations configured to removeably couple to at least one accessory. A plurality of the plurality of mounting locations each includes an electrical node. A power supply is coupled to the mounting device. An electrical supply line electrically couples the power supply to each of the electrical nodes and the electrical supply line is contained at least partially within the mounting device.

column12: Visualization method and equipment for navigation type acetabulum grinding and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a visualization method for navigation type acetabulum grinding. The visualization method comprises the following steps that S1, an acetabular cup model is moved to a preset position of an acetabulum model; s2, planning a grinding area on the acetabulum model according to an overlapping area of the acetabular cup model and the acetabulum model, and generating volume drawing data of the acetabulum model according to the planned grinding area; s3, coloring the acetabulum model according to the volume drawing data; and S4, in the navigation grinding process, along with movement of a grinding instrument, corresponding parts on the acetabulum model are removed, and the exposed grinding area displays the corresponding color. According to the method, the volume drawing data of the acetabulum model is generated according to the planned grinding area, the acetabulum model is colored according to the volume drawing data, conversion from the surface grid data to the volume drawing data only needs to be carried out once, deep coloring is carried out on all the areas of the acetabulum model, grinding visualization is achieved only by relying on updating of the volume drawing data, and therefore the grinding efficiency is greatly improved. Therefore, the calculation speed is improved, and the fluency of the visual display picture is improved.

column12: Preparation and valuing method of molybdenum raw ore standard sample
column13: The preparation and valuing method of the molybdenum raw ore standard sample comprises the following steps: selecting a molybdenum raw ore standard sample raw material with the particle size of less than 200 microns, grinding, crushing, screening and uniformly mixing to obtain the standard sample; carrying out sample uniformity test through sampling, and carrying out cooperative valuing; and carrying out mathematical statistical analysis test and uncertainty calculation on the fixed value data to obtain the characteristic quantity value of the content of each element of the molybdenum raw ore standard sample. According to the method, the sample uniformity is good, seven qualified laboratories adopt different principles, accurate and reliable methods cooperate to fix values, and the determined standard values are accurate and reliable. The sample stability is good, and the effective storage life can be 10 years. The standard sample is reasonable in component design; the development of the standard sample supplements and perfects the range of the molybdenum raw ore standard sample, and the technical index reaches the domestic advanced level of similar standard samples.

column12: TRANSPORTING MINED MATERIAL
column13: Mined material is transported within and outside a mine (10) in containers (26) that are fixed, discrete load units, namely containers that define a fixed maximum volume that can be carried in each container. The containers can be carried on or coupled to and then removed from vehicles (16) or other transport options, such as flatbed trucks, flatbed rail carriages or overhead suspension units. The containers can be stored at designated container storage facilities (28) in the mine. The container storage facilities are holding areas for loaded containers at mines until decisions are made to transport the containers to mineral processing plants (30) in the mine or to end-use customers, for example via rail to a shipping port (24).

column12: Beneficiation fine grinding control method and beneficiation fine grinding control system thereof
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of beneficiation, in particular to a beneficiation fine grinding control method and a beneficiation fine grinding control system thereof, and the method comprises the following steps: presetting parameters, detecting actual parameters, processing data and controlling an actuator to act. A control system of the beneficiation fine grinding control method comprises a slag separation feeding pool, a feeding pump, a water storage pool, a water adding electric valve, a grinding machine, a ball supplementing machine, a control center, a man-machine conversation touch control screen and a detection unit. The system is reasonable and compact in structure and convenient to use, the detection unit, the control center and the actuator are matched to achieve automatic control over the ore pulp flow, the ore pulp concentration and the grinding granularity, real-time regulation and control are conducted, the optimal operation state of equipment is kept, the service life of the equipment is prolonged, energy is saved, and the ore pulp output quality is controllable; the influence of the ore pulp flow, the ore pulp concentration and the grinding granularity on the extraction rate of colored/black metal in the ore pulp is reduced, meanwhile, the labor intensity of operators is reduced, and the method has the characteristics of simplicity, convenience and high efficiency.

column12: Ceramic 3D printing material based on iron tailings and preparation method
column13: The invention provides a ceramic 3D printing material based on iron tailings and a preparation method, and the material comprises the following components by weight: 20-25 parts of iron tailings powder; 20 to 25 parts of kaolin; 15 to 20 parts of water; 0.5 to 2 parts of hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose; 0.3 part of citric acid; the iron tailing powder comprises the following components in percentage by mass: 80.2% of SiO2, 6% of Fe2O3, 4.4% of MgO, 3.7% of Al2O3 and 5.7% of other components, the specific surface area of the iron tailing powder is 247.5 m < 2 >/kg, the average particle size of the iron tailing powder is 75.9 microns, a large amount of iron tailings generated in the iron ore mining and smelting process are taken as raw materials, a 3D printing technology is combined, and through pretreatment such as drying and grinding, the iron tailing powder which is low in cost and high in efficiency can be obtained. The ceramic material which is good in printing performance, high in strength and good in thermal shock resistance and can be used for 3D printing is beneficial to high-value utilization of the iron tailings.

column12: Brine storage layer prediction and resource quantity evaluation method for underground brine type potassium ore and lithium ore
column13: The invention provides a brine storage layer prediction and resource quantity evaluation method for underground brine type potassium ore and lithium ore. The brine storage layer prediction method comprises the steps of establishing a nonlinear relationship among wave impedance, gamma, porosity and resistivity, obtaining a physical property inversion body of each parameter of a stratum based on the wave impedance of seismic inversion, predicting the distribution of a brine storage stratum with the characteristics of low gamma, high porosity, low impedance and low resistivity, and drawing a parameter map of the brine storage layer. The resource quantity evaluation method comprises the steps of predicting the spatial distribution characteristics of underground brine by adopting the method, detecting the potassium ion content of an underground brine sample, and estimating the lithium ion content in the corresponding brine sample by utilizing a positive correlation relationship between the potassium content and the lithium content, thereby calculating various parameters required for resource quantity evaluation of the underground brine type lithium ore. According to the method, the spatial distribution of the brine layer can be accurately predicted, and the effective implementation of the resource quantity of the underground brine type potassium ore and lithium ore is realized.

column12: Research and application of efficient novel copper collecting agent M1
column13: The invention discloses research and application of a high-efficiency novel copper collecting agent M1, which comprises the following steps of: A, searching a copper collecting agent substitute reagent through continuous screening, and optimizing bulk flotation indexes by applying a high-quality copper-molybdenum flotation collecting agent in a porphyry copper-molybdenum ore flotation process; according to the method, the copper collecting agent is continuously screened and found to replace the reagent, the high-quality copper-molybdenum flotation collecting agent is applied to the porphyry copper-molybdenum ore flotation process to optimize the bulk flotation index, the reagent insufficiency is found through big data comparison, the proportion is optimized, and under the condition that the industrial test is stable, the process examination of beneficiation flotation or separation operation is carried out in time; according to the method, the copper recovery rate can be increased by 0.34% and the molybdenum recovery rate can be increased by 1.48% by calculating and evaluating the sorting efficiency of rough scavenging and fine selection operation in the bulk flotation process, and the method is simple and easy to operate, and a feasibility report is submitted, finally, samples are taken for test and analysis, and mass flow calculation is performed. The copper recovery rate can be increased by 0.34% and the molybdenum recovery rate can be increased by 1.48%.

column12: On-line monitoring and early warning system for ion type rare earth mine slope
column13: The invention discloses an ionic type rare earth mine slope online monitoring and early warning system, which comprises an early warning system information acquisition terminal used for acquiring monitoring data of a specified type on an ionic type rare earth mine slope in real time; the early warning system network module is used for transmitting the monitoring data acquired by the early warning system information acquisition terminal in real time to an upper computer monitoring system; and the upper computer monitoring system is used for realizing on-line monitoring and early warning of the ion type rare earth mine slope according to the monitoring data. When the system is applied, the ore body cannot be damaged, a liquid injection system and production of a mining area are not affected, all-weather real-time monitoring of the side slope is achieved, and therefore resource loss and casualties caused by landslide disasters are effectively avoided, and loss of rare earth resources is avoided.

column12: Frequency conversion control system of sand making machine and frequency conversion control method and device of sand making machine
column13: The invention provides a frequency conversion control system of a sand making machine and a frequency conversion control method and device of the sand making machine, and relates to the technical field of intelligent control, and the frequency conversion control method of the sand making machine comprises the steps that product materials conveyed by a discharging belt are weighed to obtain yield data; carrying out image analysis processing on a material image obtained by carrying out image acquisition on the product material to obtain ore granularity data in the product material; and based on the yield data and the ore granularity data, frequency conversion set values of the feeder frequency converter and the crusher frequency converter are adjusted. According to the technical scheme, the workload of manual monitoring and adjustment can be reduced, the possibility of errors during manual operation and adjustment is reduced, meanwhile, it can be guaranteed that the crushing line works in the optimal state for a long time, the working efficiency of frequency conversion and speed regulation of the crusher is brought into play, and the maximum sand making amount and the ideal material granularity are achieved.
column15: DU BANGKUI;;MEI WUMI;;XU CHUNQIANG;;GUAN ZHOUYANG;;SUN TONGXIN

column12: Crushing system control method based on cyclic load
column13: The invention discloses a cyclic load-based crushing system control method, which comprises the following steps of: calculating a control cyclic load through a product granularity curve of a crusher in a crushing system and the screening efficiency of screening equipment, and determining a numerical range of the control cyclic load according to screening efficiency fluctuation caused by ore properties; weighing conveying capacity is obtained in real time through an ore feeding belt conveyor belt weigher, a returning belt conveyor belt weigher and a final product belt conveyor belt weigher, ore quantity balance correction is carried out according to the weighing conveying capacity, and the actual circulation load is calculated through the conveying capacity obtained through weighing after balance correction; and according to comparison between the actual circulation load and the control circulation load, adjusting the ore discharge port and the ore feeding quantity parameter of the crusher, and recalculating the actual circulation load until the actual circulation load is within the control range of the control circulation load. The operation state of the indirect reaction crushing system is analyzed through cyclic load fluctuation, the automation degree is high, and the labor intensity of operators can be greatly reduced.

column12: Clamping and fixing device for ore test
column13: The utility model discloses a clamping and fixing device for ore test, which comprises a support, the top end of the inner side of the support is connected with a sliding block in a sliding manner, the center of the inner side of the sliding block is spirally connected with a threaded shaft, and through the arrangement of a positioning nail, a pressure sensor and the sliding block, before the ore grade is tested and detected, the ore is firstly placed at the center of the top end of a supporting plate; then the ore is lifted to a clamping and fixing position, then a first motor is started, at the moment, a sliding block can be controlled to drive positioning nails to clamp and fix the ore, finally, under induction of a pressure sensor, a first electric telescopic rod is matched to drive the positioning nails to stretch out and draw back, and the positioning nails on the left side and the right side can be inserted into the left side and the right side of the ore correspondingly; and the counter-acting force borne by the positioning nails can be the same, so that the stability of the ores after being clamped and fixed is guaranteed, the phenomenon that the ores fall off is avoided when the ores are ground and crushed in the later period, then the phenomenon that the ores smash the equipment is avoided, and subsequent normal grinding and crushing of the ores are guaranteed.

column12: Ore grading process
column13: The invention discloses an ore grading process, which comprises the following steps of: grinding magnetic separation rough concentrate through an Ai sand mill, feeding a product into a high-frequency fine screen, returning oversize minerals to the mill in a closed loop, feeding undersize minerals into a pottery washing magnetic separator for grading, and carrying out reverse flotation operation on pottery washing concentrate. The content of silicon, potassium and sodium in the concentrate is effectively reduced through pottery washing operation, the content of fluorine in the concentrate is effectively reduced through flotation operation, the grade of the iron ore concentrate is improved, the content of impurity elements in the iron ore concentrate is reduced, the grade of tailings is reduced, and metal loss is reduced.

column12: Laboratory ore sample grinding sample preparation bag
column13: The utility model relates to a laboratory ore sample grinding sample preparation bag which comprises a sample preparation bag body and is characterized by further comprising a data label and a T-shaped metal wire, the sample preparation bag body is a paper bag with the periphery closed and a sampling opening formed in the upper portion, the data label is arranged on the right side of the sample preparation bag body, and the T-shaped metal wire is arranged on the T-shaped metal wire. The T-shaped metal wire is composed of a transverse supporting rod, a longitudinal connecting rod and a handling handle, the longitudinal connecting rod and the handling handle are connected with the transverse supporting rod, the data label is of a double-layer paper structure, the transverse supporting rod is arranged on the right side in the sample preparation bag, and the longitudinal connecting rod penetrates through the inner paper wall of the sample preparation bag and the data label of the double-layer paper structure to be connected with the handling handle. The device disclosed by the utility model has the advantages that 1, mixing of different types of ore samples is avoided; 2, ore sample information marked in advance cannot be covered by the to-be-ground ore sample; and 3, the hand does not touch the sample during sampling. And 4, not only can the grinding efficiency be influenced, but also the accuracy of experimental data can be improved to a certain extent.

column12: Intelligent water affair data center station based on distributed cloud architecture
column13: An intelligent water affair data center station based on a distributed cloud architecture comprises a data collection layer, a data background layer, a service center station layer, a foreground application layer and an interaction layer, wherein the data collection layer has standardized access to data of an informatization system of each regional project in an API mode and collects data of external terminal equipment; wherein the data background layer comprises a basic database and a secondary processing database, the service center station layer processes basic data collected by a data background through a data processing tool, and the foreground application layer comprises a comprehensive display application, a project management service, a safe operation service, an evaluation serviceand a universal service. The interaction layer comprises a browser, a WeChat applet and a WeChat official account. Interaction tools comprise a large screen, a computer, a tablet personal computer and a mobile phone. According to the invention, standardized acquisition, storage, management, analysis, mining, sharing, exchange, display and application of water affair data of group-level-project-level multi-management-level projects can be realized.

column12: Remote sensing image browsing graph cloud detection method based on difficult sample mining
column13: The invention provides a difficult sample mining-based remote sensing image browsing graph cloud detection method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring a panchromatic and multispectral remote sensing image browsing graph, and making a cloud detection sample library according to the panchromatic and multispectral remote sensing image browsing graph; constructing a full convolutional browse graph cloud detection network based on difficult sample mining; wherein in the encoding stage, features are abstractly extracted layer by layer from browsing image input, and in the decoding stage, all abstract features of an encoding layer and features of a decoder are added and fused, and feature scale recovery is carried out in an up-sampling + convolution mode; training a full convolutional browse graph cloud detection network according to the cloud detection sample library in combination with a difficult sample mining technology; and obtaining a to-be-detected remote sensing image browse graph, and detecting the prime number to-be-detected remote sensing image browse graph according to the trained full convolution browse graph cloud detection network.

column12: ROBUST USEFUL AND GENERAL TASK-ORIENTED VIRTUAL ASSISTANTS
column13: The disclosure deals with a system and method for improved general task-oriented virtual assistants (VAs). The presently disclosed framework incorporates discovery of knowledge from online sources to accomplish tasks (open world), user-specific knowledge for personalization, and domain-specific knowledge for context adaptation to recommend and assist the users over procedural tasks such as cooking and Do-it-Yourself (DIY) tasks. The approach also focuses on content curation for fault-tolerant execution to ensure the end goal is reached despite common failures.

column12: Device for rapidly detecting total iron content in iron ore
column13: The utility model discloses a device for quickly detecting the total iron content in iron ore, which is provided with a detection tank, a motor is mounted at the upper corner of the detection tank through bolts, and a crushing mechanism is sleeved on the outer side of a motor shaft; comprising a first buffer plate and a second buffer plate, the first buffer plate and the second buffer plate are fixed to the inner wall of the detection tank, electromagnets are arranged in the first buffer plate and the second buffer plate, and the bottom of the material receiving plate is attached to the surface of a weighing sensor; the fan blades are fixedly installed at the two ends of the motor shaft, and a protection box is fixed to the portion, on the outer sides of the fan blades, of the detection tank; the two ends of the belt wheel mechanism are connected with the motor shaft and the connecting shaft respectively. According to the device for rapidly detecting the total iron content in the iron ore, after the iron ore is crushed, iron component ore and other component ore can be well separated, so that the accuracy of detection data of the iron component ore is improved, and subsequent discharge of the iron component ore and other ore is also facilitated.

column12: Full-automatic alloy ore sample preparation screening and measuring system
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of sample preparation equipment, and relates to a full-automatic sample preparation screening and measuring system. The system comprises an incoming sampleweighing and conveying unit, a screening and measuring unit, a sample preparation unit and a PLC control unit which are connected in sequence, wherein the incoming sample weighing and conveying unitis used for opening a sample bag, weighing a sample and conveying the sample to the screening and measuring unit; the screening and measuring unit is used for automatically screening the alloy ore samples, automatically collecting the screened samples, automatically weighing and metering and uploading weighing data to the PLC control unit; the sample preparation unit is used for automatically crushing the collected alloy ore sample, and splitting and collecting the crushed sample; the PLC control unit is used for controlling the flow work of each unit equipment in the system; and the incomingsample weighing and conveying unit comprises an automatic unpacking and weighing device. According to the system disclosed by the invention, each unit device is controlled by the PLC, the automation degree of the system is high, the workload of workers is greatly reduced, and the working efficiency and the measurement accuracy are effectively improved.

column12: Smooth display method for navigation type acetabulum grinding
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of medical treatment, in particular to a navigation type acetabular grinding smooth display method which comprises the following steps: S1, moving an acetabular cup model to a preset position of an acetabular model; s2, generating acetabulum volume drawing data; s3, smoothing the acetabulum volume drawing data, and sequentially carrying out image channel splitting, single-channel image Gaussian filtering and single-channel image selective merging; s4, coloring the acetabulum model according to the smoothed volume drawing data; and S5, visual operation of acetabulum grinding is carried out. According to the method, only one time of conversion from the surface grid data to the volume drawing data is needed after acetabular cup planning is completed, the surface grid data does not need to be generated from the volume drawing data for visualization in the grinding process, on the basis of the high grinding calculation speed, acetabular image rendering smoothing is achieved, and the use experience is optimized.

column12: PLANT AND METHOD FOR TREATING SOLID MATERIAL
column13: The disclosure relates to a plant for thermal treatment of solid material to decrease the content of heavy metal elements. The plant comprises one reactor for heating the solid material, which is arranged to have both an oxidizing atmosphere and a reducing atmosphere, and the plant includes a hot gas generator, which is arranged to provide hot gas to the reactor. The disclosure also relates to a method for thermal treatment of solid material and to a method for producing fertilizer precursor.

column12: WIND TURBINE BLADE INSPECTION SYSTEM
column13: A robotic device includes four or more legs and is configured to crawl over a surface of a wind turbine blade for inspection of and/or maintenance of the wind turbine blade. The robotic device may be programmed to crawl along a leading edge of the wind turbine blade to conduct inspection and/or maintenance of the leading edge of the wind turbine blade. The device may include a body defining a longitudinal axis, a row of legs arranged on opposite sides of the body. The legs may each include two or more articulated limb segments and a foot. The foot may include a suction cup for securing the robotic device to the wind turbine blade.

column12: Blanking machine for making smoothie
column13: The utility model provides a blanking machine for making smoothie. The blanking machine comprises a horizontal moving module, an ice crushing mechanism and a guide cup, the horizontal moving module is provided with a rotating motor and a smoothie cup. The ice crushing mechanism is provided with a first lifting air cylinder. The rotating motor is used for rotating the smoothie cup, ice blocks are placed in the smoothie cup, and the horizontal moving module is started to drive the guide cup to move to the ice crushing mechanism for ice crushing treatment. Specifically, the lifting air cylinder drives the ice crushing mechanism to move up and down in the smoothie cup to completely crush ice. After the smoothie is finished, the smoothie cup is moved to the guide cup, at the moment, the rotating motor drives the smoothie cup to rotate, the smoothie treated in the smoothie cup is poured into the guide cup, and after the smoothie is finished, the smoothie cup returns to the initial position to prepare the next time of smoothie making. An operator only needs to take the smoothie in the guide cup for use, the purpose of efficiently making the smoothie is achieved, and the automation degree is relatively high.
column14: XIAMEN UMS INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Data processing method and system applied to mine environment recovery and treatment
column13: The invention discloses a data processing method and system applied to mine environment recovery and treatment, applied to the technical field of image recognition, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an original image; identifying the first boundary from the original image, and identifying the identification mark; acquiring a remote sensing image of starting mine recovery in the target area as a to-be-recognized image; calibrating the to-be-recognized image through the recognition identifier, and recognizing the closed boundary of the mining area in the to-be-recognized image through the first boundary as a second boundary; and calculating the mine recovery rate through the first boundary and the second boundary. According to the data processing method and system applied to mine environment recovery treatment, the second boundary is identified by taking the boundary of the mining area in the original image as the constraint condition, the accuracy of second boundary identification can be effectively improved, manual intervention is reduced, the labor cost is reduced, and multi-stage evaluation of the mine recovery condition is facilitated.

column12: Binary system gold ore gold-bearing mineral gold content determination method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of process mineralogy, and particularly relates to a binary system gold ore gold-bearing mineral gold content determination method. Comprising the following steps of ore grinding, reselection, heavy tail flotation, automatic mineralogical analysis of re-refined samples, grade conversion, substance composition conversion, unreasonable data removal, curve fitting, obtaining of gold-bearing property data of gold-bearing minerals and the like. The method is beneficial to the quantitative work of the gold content of the gold mineral and the gold-loaded mineral, the operation is reasonable, and the data is accurate.

column12: Underground water migration similar simulation system and method under in-situ leaching mining condition
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of similar simulation of groundwater migration, and provides a similar simulation system and method for groundwater migration under in-situ leaching mining conditions, and the system comprises a simulation box body and an ore-bearing and water-bearing layer located in the simulation box body; the multiple liquid injection pipe fittings, the multiple liquid pumping pipe fittings and the multiple monitoring pipe fittings are arranged, and the liquid injection pipe fittings, the liquid pumping pipe fittings and the monitoring pipe fittings are vertically arranged in the ore-bearing and water-bearing stratum; the pressure measuring pipes are arranged outside the simulation box body, and the bottom end of the liquid injection pipe fitting, the bottom end of the liquid extraction pipe fitting and the bottom end of the monitoring pipe fitting are communicated with the pressure measuring pipes one by one through connecting pipes; the monitoring system is used for detecting the liquid injection amount of the liquid injection pipe fitting, the liquid pumping amount of the liquid pumping pipe fitting and the water level of liquid in the pressure measuring pipe; and the processing system is in communication connection with the monitoring system. By means of the technical scheme, the problem that in the uranium mining mode of vertical well liquid injection and vertical well liquid extraction in the prior art, a similar simulation experiment system for conducting visual evaluation on multiple liquid extraction and injection schemes and automatically regulating and controlling the liquid extraction and injection amount and the extraction and injection mode according to the design scheme does not exist is solved.

column12: Mining comprehensive base station with multi-protocol interface
column13: The utility model relates to a mining integrated base station with multi-protocol interfaces, and belongs to the technical field of mining base stations. The technical problem to be solved is to provide an improvement of a mining comprehensive base station hardware structure with a multi-protocol interface. According to the technical scheme, a display screen, a keyboard and an indicator light arearranged on the front face of a base station box body, a plurality of wiring ports are formed in the side wall and the box bottom of the base station box body and connected with a data exchange modulethrough wires, and a data communication module is further packaged at the top of the base station box body; a control circuit board is packaged in the base station box body through a metal box body.A microcontroller, an audio signal processing module and a video signal processing module are arranged on the control circuit board, and the microcontroller is connected with the display screen, the keyboard, the indicator light, the data exchange module, the data communication module, the audio signal processing module and the video signal processing module through wires; the utility model is applied to the mining base station.

column12: Mill control method and mill control device
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a mill control method and a mill control device. The mill control method comprises the following steps: acquiring current working condition data related to a mill; inputting the current working condition data into a pre-trained neural network to obtain the mineral grinding granularity corresponding to the current working condition data; wherein the neural network is obtained by training according to the working condition data of each sample and the true value of the mineral grinding granularity corresponding to the working condition data of each sample; the current grinding speed of the mill and the current sand returning amount of the mill are obtained; and according to the mineral grinding granularity corresponding to the current working condition data, the current grinding speed of the mill and the current sand returning amount of the mill, the target grinding speed of the mill is generated, and speed control is conducted on the mill based on the target grinding speed. Based on the scheme, the mineral grinding granularity corresponding to the current working condition data can be accurately and reliably determined, the mill can operate under the optimal ore grinding working condition, the self loss and the power consumption of the mill are reduced, and meanwhile the production efficiency of the mill is improved.

column12: Intelligent ore blending device
column13: The utility model discloses an intelligent ore blending device, and relates to the technical field of mineral product assembly, the intelligent ore blending device comprises an ore rock identification mechanism and a control mechanism, one side of the ore rock identification mechanism is provided with an ore rock configuration mechanism, and the ore rock configuration mechanism is provided with an ore rock crushing mechanism; the ore rock recognition mechanism comprises a case, a weighing part is arranged at the top of the case, an ore rock recognition part is arranged on one side of the weighing part and comprises a shell, a plurality of first motors are arranged on the top and the side face of the shell, and output shafts of the first motors penetrate through the shell and extend inwards; a detection drill bit is arranged on an output shaft of each first motor, and the detection drill bits are used for detecting ore rock data; and the control mechanism is used for collecting and analyzing data of the ore rock blocks and controlling the ore rock configuration mechanism to classify the ore rock blocks and perform ore blending. According to the utility model, the ore rock identification mechanism is arranged, so that the types of ore rock blocks can be identified, and subsequent intelligent ore blending is facilitated.
column14: CHINA RAILWAY 19TH BUREAU GROUP MINING INVESTMENT CO LTD

column12: Water-soluble mining sodium salt mine quantity tax payment metering method, terminal, system and medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a water-soluble mining sodium salt mine quantity tax payment metering method, a terminal, a system and a medium. Temperature data and flow data of a salt solution flowing through a mining pipeline and an analog electric signal output by a concentration meter are obtained; the analog electric signal is preprocessed; sampling the preprocessed analog electric signal according to a preset sampling frequency to obtain a sampling signal amplitude; inputting the temperature data and the sampling signal amplitude into a pre-constructed concentration correction model, and outputting to obtain sodium salt concentration data; calculating the salt mine amount of the sodium salt according to the flow data and the sodium salt concentration data; and calculating the tax payment amount according to the sodium salt mine amount. The invention provides an efficient, accurate and high-temperature adaptive capacity sodium salt recovery amount metering algorithm for salt mine mining by a water-soluble method, the tax amount needing to be paid by a mining enterprise can be accurately calculated, and the robustness and accuracy of a tax metering result are effectively ensured.

column12: Method for predicting ore dressing yield of vanadium titano-magnetite and application
column13: The invention provides a method for predicting the ore dressing yield of vanadium titano-magnetite and application, and particularly relates to the technical field of mineral measurement. The method comprises the following steps that H, the magnetite mineral amount q in the vanadium titano-magnetite ore grinding product is calculated; i, counting the actually measured contents of a single body, a first intergrowth body and a second intergrowth body in a polished section made of the ore grinding product; j, counting the distribution content of a second intergrowth body in the polished section; and step K, calculating the theoretical yield of the concentrate, wherein the theoretical yield is equal to the sum of the monomer, the first intergrowth and the amount of the second intergrowth entering the concentrate. The method is more objective, accurate and fine, and the yield obtained by the method can reflect the yield of the final iron ore concentrate.
column14: MINING AND METALLURGY SCIENCE AND TECH GROUP LIMITED COMPANY
column15: JIN JIANWEN;;XIAO YIWU;;FANG MINGSHAN;;LI LEI;;ZHAO MING;;WU RUOCHEN;;DAI NA

column12: Method for recycling mineral powder slurry and comprehensively utilizing resources in open-pit stope
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of full recovery and comprehensive utilization of surface mine resources, and particularly relates to a method for recovering mineral powder slurry and comprehensively utilizing resources in an open-pit stope. The method comprises the following steps: determining the economic value and feasibility of mineral powder slurry recovery minerals, and constructing a rainfall surface confluence collection system and a mineral powder slurry collection system according to an ore body and ore rock boundary; according to local hydrological data, the total amount of mineral powder slurry and the total amount of flood and debris flow during one rainstorm are calculated, so that design parameters of the clarification and treatment system are determined. And after rainfall surface confluence is treated, mineral separation production water is supplemented, and mineral powder slurry is introduced into an ore grinding flotation system to recover mineral substances after being remade. Mineral powder slurry is collected to recover mineral substances, the utilization rate of mine mineral resources is increased, rainfall in an open stope converges on the earth surface and is discharged in time, safety and stability of a slope of the stope and comprehensive utilization of the part of water resources are facilitated, the cost of water for mineral separation production is reduced, and the treatment cost of water and environmental pollution is reduced.
column14: CHINA RAILWAY CONSTRUCTION TONGGUAN INVEST CO LTD;;SINOSTEEL MAANSHAN GENERAL INSTITUTE OF MINING RES CO LTD

column12: Data recovery method and system based on MMKV file format
column13: The invention provides a data recovery method and system based on an MMKV file format. The method comprises the steps of traversing an MMKV file, and obtaining all Key and Value key value pair data, writing the key value pair data into the created vector container, responding to the obtained value with the same key value, and placing the value at the tail of the vector container, and traversing the vector container, obtaining a first vector container corresponding to the key value of the data to be recovered, and in response to the situation that the size of the first vector container is greater than 1, taking data, except the tail data, of the first vector container as deleted recovery data for recovery display. The method is remarkable in effect in the aspect of deeply mining the mobile phone app application data containing the MMKV file, high in practicability and high in application value.
column15: DENG MING;;DU XINSHENG;;WU SONGYANG;;ZHANG XIAOJIAN;;QIU ZONGCHI

column12: Hydraulic gyratory crusher ore discharge port measuring tool and use method thereof
column13: The invention relates to the field of crushers, in particular to a hydraulic gyratory crusher ore discharge port measuring tool and a using method, and the hydraulic gyratory crusher ore discharge port measuring tool comprises a fixed cone, a movable cone and a measuring assembly; the supporting mechanism is detachably connected with the top of the fixed cone; supporting rods are rotationally arranged on the two sets of supporting plates, winding wheels are arranged on the supporting rods, and locking bolts b are arranged on the supporting plates. The multiple sets of rotating joints are rotationally connected end to end to form a strip-shaped supporting body, and the topmost rotating joint penetrates through the supporting structure and is wound around the winding wheel; the box body a is arranged at the bottom of the bottommost rotating joint, and a distance detection sensor a and a distance detection sensor b are arranged on the two side faces, facing the fixed cone inner wall lining plate and the movable cone outer wall lining plate, of the box body a correspondingly; a control system is arranged on the supporting mechanism. According to the invention, multiple groups of data can be quickly obtained, the size of the ore discharge port when the movable cone is located at different positions can be intuitively reflected, the use is convenient, and the measured data is more and accurate.
column14: GUANGDONG LEI MENG HEAVY MACHINERY MFG CO LTD
column15: ZHANG HONGQIANG;;LI LIN;;RAO ZHANSHENG;;ZHU JIMI;;YAN WEIDONG;;FAN YUBIAO

column12: Sulfide ore working electrode preparation method, working electrode and research method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of electrochemistry, and particularly relates to a preparation method of a sulfide ore working electrode for measuring an electrochemical signal under a sulfide ore pressure leaching process condition, the sulfide ore working electrode and a method for researching the sulfide ore pressure leaching process by applying the working electrode. The problems that in the prior art, devices and methods for measuring dynamic high-temperature and high-pressure electrochemical signals are lacked, and representativeness is lacked when a natural block electrode is used are solved. The sulfide ore working electrode is formed by pressing carbon powder and mineral powder which are mixed according to a certain proportion by adding an adhesive (PVDF). The chalcopyrite leaching electrochemical mechanism at different temperatures is tested through open-circuit potential testing, polarization curve testing and alternating-current impedance spectroscopy testing technologies; and the number of sub-processes in the leaching process can be distinguished by means of the alternating-current impedance technology, kinetic parameters of all the sub-processes are obtained through methods such as equivalent circuit simulation, and the forming and growing mechanism of the passive film on the surface of the chalcopyrite is determined.
column15: BAI YUNLONG;;WANG WEI;;XIE FENG;;LU DIANKUN;;CHANG YONGFENG;;WANG JIAN

column12: Ball mill capable of automatically feeding and discharging
column13: A ball mill capable of automatically feeding and discharging comprises a feeding device, a slurry discharging chute and a control device, the feeding device comprises a feeding bin hopper and a weighing conveyor belt, and a driving shaft of the weighing conveyor belt is connected with a servo motor. The bottom of the pulp outlet chute is communicated with an ore pulp specific gravity measuring device; and the ore pulp specific gravity detecting device comprises a measuring cup and a specific gravity meter suspended in ore pulp in the measuring cup. The specific gravity meter comprises a measuring column suspended above ore pulp, a metal ring is arranged on the measuring column, and a displacement sensor used for sensing vertical movement of the metal ring is arranged outside the metal ring. The ore pulp specific gravity measuring device can sense changes of ore pulp concentration in real time, manual detection is replaced, and basis is provided for correcting the feeding amount. According to the specific gravity of the discharged ore pulp, the feeding amount is continuously corrected, the closed-loop automatic control of the feeding amount is realized, the ore grinding efficiency of the ball mill is improved, the energy consumption of the ball mill is reduced, and the labor intensity of an operator is also reduced.
column14: LUANCHUAN COUNTY JINDING MINING CO LTD

column12: Oil reservoir exploitation method for ultrahigh-water-content oil field
column13: The invention discloses an oil reservoir exploitation method for an ultrahigh-water-content oil field, and relates to the technical field of oil field development. The method comprises the steps that a high-precision oil reservoir description method is adopted, oil reservoir description information of the ultrahigh-water-content oil field is obtained, and the oil reservoir description information is used for indicating a reservoir structure and oil reservoir information of the ultrahigh-water-content oil field; on the basis of the oil reservoir description information, a predictive analysis model is adopted to predict and analyze related data of the ultrahigh-water-content oil field, and predictive analysis data are obtained; on the basis of a full reservoir wave and efficient displacement technology, the ultra-high water content oil field is reconstructed in combination with prediction analysis data; and an efficient and intelligent production operation mode is adopted, and oil reservoir exploitation is carried out on the reconstructed ultrahigh-water-content oil field. According to the method, a set of complete mining scheme is provided for the extra-high-water-content oil field, the recovery efficiency of the extra-high-water-content oil field can be improved, the production cost can be reduced, the stable yield potential and the creative efficiency vitality of the extra-high-water-content oil field are further released, and the stable yield development of the extra-high-water-content oil field under the medium-low oil price condition is expanded.

column12: X luminoscope for measuring ore types
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of ore detection, in particular to an X-ray luminoscope for measuring ore types, which comprises a protective cover, an X-ray generator, a detector and a material composition analysis module are arranged in the protective cover, and a control cabinet is arranged at the bottom of the protective cover. A conveying mechanism, a first supporting frame and a second supporting frame are fixed to the upper surface of the control cabinet, an opening is formed in one side of the protective cover, and one end of the conveying mechanism penetrates through the opening and extends into the protective cover. The X luminoscope for measuring the type of the manganese ore integrates ore crushing, mixing, pressing and detecting into a whole, can automatically and quantitatively discharge the ore to the detection disc body after crushing and mixing the ore, and conveys the ore to the second conveying belt through the first conveying belt; after being pressed by the material pressing mechanism, the material is automatically conveyed into the protective cover and detected and analyzed through X rays, operation is convenient, the automation degree is high, and meanwhile the instrument is more complete in function.
column14: THE SECOND GEOLOGICAL BRIGADE OF XINJIANG UYGUR AUTONOMOUS REGION GEOLOGY AND MINERAL EXPLOR AND DEV

column12: Master data management method and system
column13: The invention provides a main data management method and system. According to the main data management method and system, source data is subjected to first data exchange processing, cleaning processing, data standard conversion processing, data quality control processing, data life cycle control processing and second data exchange processing in sequence; therefore, the source data is accessed to the corresponding data analysis and processing platform for batch analysis and processing; according to the method and the system, the applicability of main data management to different data occasionscan be improved, and meanwhile, the effect of the main data management on data value mining is also facilitated to be exerted.

column12: Crude oil elastic exploitation recovery ratio prediction method and prediction device
column13: The invention is suitable for the technical field of crude oil exploitation, and provides a crude oil elastic exploitation recovery ratio prediction method and device.The crude oil elastic exploitation recovery ratio prediction method comprises the steps that mathematical models of the influence of effective fluid viscosity and effective permeability of crude oil in an oil well mining area on the crude oil elastic exploitation recovery ratio are established; establishing a mathematical model of comprehensive influence of effective permeability and effective fluid viscosity of the oil well mining area on elastic crude oil exploitation, establishing a mathematical model of total oil production driven by elastic energy in the oil well mining area, and establishing a mathematical model of crude oil total reserves in an oil drainage range of the oil well mining area; and according to the total oil production quantity driven by the elastic energy in the oil well mining area and the total crude oil reserves in the oil drainage range of the oil well mining area, the crude oil elastic exploitation recovery ratio is calculated. The problems that an existing crude oil elastic exploitation recovery rate prediction method cannot accurately predict the crude oil output rate and cannot accurately evaluate the economic benefits of an oil field are solved.
column15: YAN KUN;;FU XIAOFEI;;XING JIANFEI;;ZHANG TONG;;DU RUISHAN;;ZHANG XIAOLING;;LI YANG

column12: Animal wearable devices, systems, and methods
column13: Methods, systems, and device for animal wearable technology are provided in accordance with various embodiments. Some embodiments include an animal wearable device that includes: a securing apparatus configured to be worn by an animal; multiple stimulation components coupled with different portions of the securing apparatus; and/or a computerized controller coupled with the securing apparatus and the multiple stimulation components. The computerized controller may be configured to provide stimulation to the animal through the multiple stimulation components. The computerized controller may be configured to separately and/or independently control each stimulation components from the multiple stimulation components. Some embodiments include a method that includes: determining one or more signals at a computerized controller coupled with a securing apparatus configured to be worn by an animal; and/or activating, based on the one or more determined signals, one or more stimulation components from multiple stimulation components coupled with different portions of the securing apparatus.

column12: Method for rapidly inverting content of rare earth Ce element
column13: The invention provides a method for rapidly inverting the content of a rare earth Ce element, and relates to the technical field of remote sensing hyperspectrum. The invention relates to a method for rapidly inverting the content of a rare earth Ce element, which comprises the following steps of: collecting a rare earth ore sample, and grinding and sieving the rare earth ore sample into a sample A and a sample B; respectively detecting to obtain the content of the Ce element and actual reflection spectrum data; resampling the reflection spectrum data, selecting the data as a research object, processing the data, drawing a double logarithmic diagram, determining boundary values of different filters, and then processing the spectrum data of the research object to obtain spectrum transformation data; and analyzing the correlation between the obtained Ce element content and the spectral transformation data, selecting a characteristic wave band, and carrying out inversion model training and testing on the spectral transformation data of the characteristic wave band as an input layer based on a neural network. The method is high in sample fitting degree, small in root-mean-square error, higher in prediction precision and capable of providing data support for rare earth ore exploration.
column15: KE DAN;;WANG WENKAI;;MENG LING;;MO HUAN;;ZHANG WANMING;;WANG JINJIN

column12: Automatic ore blending and setting device of ball mill
column13: The utility model discloses a device for realizing automatic ore blending and giving of a ball mill. Fine ore bin, level gauges are fixedly arranged on the two sides of the top face of the fine ore bin. Six disc feeders are fixed to the output end of the bottom of the fine ore bin. The output ends of the six disc feeders are fixedly connected with the input end of the belt conveyor, the belt conveyor extends out of the fine ore bin to be fixedly connected with the electronic belt scale, the six disc feeders are electrically connected with the AO module in a control mode, and the electronic belt scale is electrically connected with the AI module in a control mode. According to the utility model, the frequency of one of the disc feeders is fixed by observing the display height of the two level gauges of the fine ore bin; the frequency of the other disc feeder is adjusted to achieve automatic ore feeding adjustment and ore blending after the set treatment capacity in the upper computer iscompared with the feedback treatment capacity of the belt electronic scale, and the stable ore grinding index can be achieved by sequentially adjusting the fixed state and the movable state of the corresponding disc feeders according to the ore grade in the fine ore bin.
column14: INNER MONGOLIA BAOTOU XINDA GOLD MINING IND CO LTD

column12: Inner cup recovery structure for drilling fluid filtration experiment
column13: The utility model discloses an inner cup recovery structure for a drilling fluid filtration experiment. The inner cup recovery structure comprises an inner cup clamp, a first rotating mechanism used for driving the inner cup clamp to rotate along a horizontal axis, a second rotating mechanism used for driving the inner cup clamp to rotate along a vertical axis, and a lifting assembly used for driving the inner cup clamp to ascend and descend. The utility model aims to provide the inner cup recovery structure for the drilling fluid filtration experiment, so as to solve the problem that the subsequent treatment of the inner cup consumes manpower after the drilling fluid filtration experiment is finished in the prior art, and achieve the purpose of improving the automation degree after the inner cup is used and the filtration process is finished.

column12: Multifunctional clamp for optical lens machining
column13: The utility model relates to a multifunctional clamp for optical lens machining. The multifunctional clamp comprises a grinding vessel, a suction cup for sucking the grinding vessel, a suction cup connector for fixing the suction cup and a clamping jaw mechanism for clamping and fixing the grinding vessel. The grinding vessel is provided with a positioning groove for positioning a lens, the inner wall of the positioning groove is provided with a suction air channel for adsorbing the lens, the grinding vessel is provided with an adsorption position corresponding to the suction cup, the suction air channel is communicated with the adsorption position, and the suction cup connector is provided with a communication air channel communicated with an adsorption cavity of the suction cup; the suction cup connector and the clamping jaw mechanism are both arranged on the mounting frame. The fixture is simple in overall structure and convenient to operate, the lens and the grinding vessel can be automatically fixed by matching the suction air channel in the grinding vessel and the communicating air channel on the suction cup connector with an external air pressure source and a clamping jaw mechanism, and the degree of production automation is greatly improved.
column14: SHENZHEN LONG SHAPED LARGE AUTOMATED SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Tailing recovery method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of tailing ponds and placer mining, and particularly discloses a tailing stoping method which comprises the following steps: firstly, partitioning a tailing pond in the horizontal direction and dividing grids, including a pond tail grid region, a pond middle grid region and a dam front grid region; layering the tailings pond in the vertical direction, then arranging a drainage facility in a grid area at the tail of the pond, and taking the drainage facility as the center to make slurry and collect tailings; and in the grid area in the reservoir and the grid area in front of the dam, an amphibious backhoe excavator is used for excavating the tailing surface, then a water column cutting machine is used for conducting hydrodynamic cutting on the crushed tailings to make slurry, and a sand suction machine is used for sucking sand. According to the tailing recovery method, the mode of in-warehouse grid layered construction is adopted, the recovery safety coefficient is improved, recovery is conducted through mechanical equipment combination, the automation degree is high, the recovery working efficiency is improved, the labor intensity of operators is reduced, dust raising and pollution are avoided in the recovery process, normal operation can be conducted in rainy days, and the recovery efficiency is improved. And the working efficiency of tailing recovery is further improved.

column12: Glass cup rim grinding device
column13: The invention relates to a grinding device, in particular to a glass cup opening grinding device. According to the technical aims, the glass cup opening grinding device is high in automation degree and good in grinding effect. A glass cup opening grinding device comprises a first supporting frame and a supporting plate, and the supporting plate is arranged at the top of the first supporting frame; the first movable frame is arranged on the supporting plate in a sliding manner; the first spring is arranged between the first movable frame and the first supporting frame; and the first rotating shaft is rotationally arranged on the first movable frame. By arranging the clamping mechanism, the glass cup can be prevented from being thrown out when the disc drives the glass cup to rotate; a transmission mechanism and an opening mechanism are arranged, so that a first grinding column and a second grinding column grind the inner wall and the outer wall of a glass cup opening at the same time, and the working efficiency of people is improved; by arranging the rotating mechanism, people do not need to manually rotate the glass cup.

column12: Mining area crushing station control system and control method thereof
column13: The invention relates to a control system of a mining area crushing station, the control system comprises an information acquisition device (1), a control device (2) and a background control center (3), the information acquisition device and the control device are arranged in or near the crushing station, the information acquisition device detects state parameters of the crushing station, and the background control center (3) sends the state parameters to the control device. The control equipment receives the state parameters from the information acquisition equipment in a communication mode and sends the state parameters to a background control center in a communication mode; and the background control center obtains a control instruction for the crushing station based on the received state parameters and sends the control instruction to the control equipment so as to control the crushing station based on the control instruction. The invention further relates to a control method of the mining area crushing station. According to the control system, the operation state of the crushing station is judged and controlled through the powerful data processing function of the background control center, and the limited running speed of the mining truck in the crushing station can be provided in real time according to different conditions of the crushing station.
column15: CHEN WEIJUN;;SHANG ERBING;;WU XIANGCHANG;;SHI ZICAN;;SHEN YUNLI

column12: System and method for regulating and controlling Al precipitation amount in laterite-nickel ore high-pressure acid leaching process
column13: The invention relates to a system and a process for regulating and controlling the A < l > precipitation amount in a laterite-nickel ore high-pressure acid leaching process, and the system comprises a high-pressure kettle which comprises a kettle body, a first adding pipe, a second adding pipe, a discharging pipe and post-stage treatment equipment, and the post-stage treatment equipment is connected with the discharging pipe; the regulation and control device comprises a first valve, a second valve, a first pressure sensor, a second pressure sensor, an aluminum ion detection device and a regulation and control unit; the technology comprises the steps that the introduction amount of an inhibitor or the introduction flow of an accelerant is increased according to the concentration of aluminum ions in a leaching solution, and when the pressure drop difference of a discharging pipeline exceeds a set range, the introduction flow of the inhibitor is increased so as to relieve pipeline scaling; production fluctuation can be reduced, production is stabilized, and production and maintenance cost is reduced.

column12: Method for reducing mining area measurement elevation abnormal difference value
column13: The invention discloses a method for reducing a mining area measurement elevation anomaly difference value, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, removing a model gravity anomaly [delta] gGM and a terrain gravity effect [delta] NT from an observed gravity anomaly [delta] g to obtain a residual gravity anomaly, and substituting the residual gravity anomaly into a Stokes formula, s2, in the absence of gravity data, decomposing the geoid height N according to the wave spectrum structure characteristics of the elevation anomaly; and S3, on the unknown point, calculating the model elevation anomaly of the unknown point through the EGM2008 earth gravitational field model, adding the residual elevation anomaly xiC of the unknown point to the obtained result to obtain the final elevation anomaly value of the unknown point, and solving the normal height of the unknown point. Through practice, the polyhedral function fitting method based on the'removal-recovery 'method has a good fitting effect in a Dahongshan copper ore mining area, and the normal high precision after fitting can meet the requirement of +/-2cm.

column12: Ore crusher

The mounting frame is arranged in the screening mesh plate, the screening mesh plate is mounted in the mounting frame, and the crushing tooth roller is mounted in the crusher main body. By arranging the blockage removing piece, the mounting piece, the supporting piece, the moving piece, the transmission piece, the square hole and the first driving piece, blockage caused by screening in the holes of the screening mesh plate can be conveniently removed, the automation degree is high, the blockage in all the holes formed in the screening mesh plate can be fully removed, and the cleaning effect is good.

column12: Water-based liquid supply system
column13: Kitchen appliances usually include devices such as a water system, a cooker, a kitchen hood (range hood), an oven, a refrigerator, a microwave, a dishwasher and other devices. The devices are mostly operated independent from each other. Unlike those devices the “drinkable tap water-based liquid supply system” according to the present invention comprises a few devices controlled by an advanced control system according to the invention for providing connectivity and system management. The system is designed to provide comfort, convenience and energy saving. The water-based liquid supply system according to the present invention provides a variety of water-based liquids, dispatched with the desired properties from a countertop faucet.
column32: European Application No. EP18159914.3, Extended European Search Report, dated Oct. 14, 2019, 16 pages.;;European Application No. EP18159914.3, Office Action, dated Jun. 29, 2021, 5 pages.;;European Application No. EP20190219.4, Extended European Search Report, dated Nov. 27, 2020, 8 pages.

column12: Edge cache knowledge graph division method based on frequent pattern mining
column13: The invention provides an edge cache knowledge graph division method based on frequent pattern mining, and belongs to the technical field of data processing. According to the method, an initial knowledge graph is colored by utilizing a frequent query mode mined from a query graph, and the knowledge graph is divided into different color areas by improving an exchange algorithm, so that the divided knowledge graph meets the edge cache size while meeting the minimum cutting edge. And when the user accesses next time, the information of the surrounding required service scene can be quickly responded, and the approximate optimal cache performance is realized. According to the method, the knowledge graph is reasonably deployed in the edge server, so that the surrounding users can quickly obtain the required information, the return pressure of obtaining the data from the cloud is greatly reduced, and better interaction experience is provided for the users.

column12: Full-automatic sample preparation and detection system for ore raw materials
column13: The invention discloses a full-automatic sample preparation and detection system for ore raw materials. According to the system, a pneumatic sample conveying unit automatically conveys a sample; the sintered ore full-automatic tabletting detection unit is used for automatically grinding and tabletting a sample, conveying the sample to a full-automatic X luminoscope for automatic analysis and automatically uploading detection data; the full-automatic melting detection unit is used for automatically weighing and melting a sample and a flux, conveying the sample to a full-automatic X luminoscope for automatic analysis, and automatically uploading detection data; and the informatization control unit monitors the operation condition and is responsible for connecting and serially connecting the electrical control system, the sample preparation equipment, the robot, the tabletting equipment, the grinding equipment and the automatic melting device of each unit. According to the system, the level of chemical performance inspection and automatic sample preparation and analysis on the charging material is improved, the efficiency of detection operation is effectively improved, the labor intensity is reduced, the labor cost is saved, the detection precision is improved, and the full-automatic inspection and test operation process of ore raw materials is realized.

column12: Ecological environment quality factor analysis method and device, storage medium and processor
column13: The invention provides an ecological environment quality factor analysis method and device, a storage medium and a processor, and belongs to the technical field of ecological environment. column12: Lithium ion battery SOH estimation method based on CBAM improved 3DCNN
column13: The invention provides a lithium ion battery SOH estimation method based on 3DCNN improved by CBAM, and belongs to the technical field of lithium ion batteries. The technical problems of data feature mining and neural network framework complexity relieving in lithium ion battery SOH estimation of 3DCNN are solved. According to the technical scheme, the method comprises the following steps: step 1) fully charging different brand-new lithium ion batteries; 2) constructing a three-dimensional training data set and a test data set for SOH estimation; and step 3) realizing final SOH real-time estimation. The method has the advantages that various parameters of the batteries are obtained through charging and discharging experiments of the different batteries at different temperatures, then data are processed, training data sets of the different batteries are constructed, the training data sets are imported into the 3DCNN improved based on CBAM for training, and finally the training data sets can be used for real-time estimation of the SOH of the lithium ion batteries.
