column12: Scientific characterization method for real surface roughness of ore grinding product
column13: The invention provides a scientific characterization method for the real surface roughness of ore grinding products. The scientific characterization method comprises the following steps: classifying the ore grinding products according to different narrow particle fractions; fully and uniformly mixing and dispersing the ore grinding product of each size fraction to prepare an AFM detection sample of each size fraction; through a peak force tapping mode of an atomic force microscope, performing three-dimensional imaging on the surfaces of the uniformly mixed particles of the ore grinding product to obtain a scanning image; analyzing the scanned image; after particle surface steps and crystal face boundaries in the scanned image are removed, the surface of a particle product is divided into a plurality of areas serving as RMS calculation areas, and RMS calculation is carried out; the root mean square of the heights of all the pixel points in the RMS calculation area is calculated to serve as the RMS roughness of the surface of the ore grinding product, and the longitudinal diameter depth of the roughness of the fracture surface is quantitatively represented; correcting errors existing in the AFM imaging process to obtain accurate data of h (x) and h (X, Y); calculating the roughness PSD of the surface of the sample on a three-dimensional plane, and quantitatively representing the spatial distribution density of the roughness.

column12: Treatment method of valuable metal sulfide concentrate
column13: The invention discloses a treatment method of valuable metal sulfide concentrate. The treatment method comprises the following steps that S1, an alkaline reagent is added into a pressurizing device, the oxygen partial pressure in the pressurizing device is 0.3-1.0 Mpa, oxygen pressure treatment is conducted on the valuable metal sulfide concentrate for 0.5-3 h under the condition of 120-250 DEG C,and an alkaline reagent is calcium hydroxide or calcium oxide; and S2, valuable metal sulfide concentrate ore pulp is obtained after oxygen pressure treatment, the valuable metal sulfide concentrateore pulp is filtered, then normal-pressure sulfuric acid leaching is carried out, filtering is carried out again, and leaching liquid containing valuable metal and leaching residues containing the valuable metal are obtained. The process has the advantages of high valuable metal leaching rate, low energy consumption, wide application range of raw material, reliable process, high automation degree,investment saving and the like.

column12: Lower-cost, higher efficiency, environmentally friendly, self-dispersible recovery, and stimulation fluid for enhanced oil recovery (EOR) and improved oil recovery (IOR)
column13: A well stimulation method based on a self-dispersible and non-surface functionalized dispersion fluid to recover hydrocarbons from subterranean formation in conventional and non-conventional mode is described and claimed. The method includes introducing a self-dispersible, non-functionalized, three-dimensional (3D) crumpled graphene balls/structures into a water slug, a gas slug, a liquefied gas slug, a natural gas liquid slug, or a diesel slug. The resulting fluid containing self-dispersible, 3D crumpled structures is introduced into the subterranean hydrocarbon bearing formation. The said self-dispersion fluid may also contain a cocktail based on varying degree of hydrophilicity and hydrophobicity of 3D crumpled graphene balls, where the role of 3D hydrophilic crumpled graphene balls is to keep dispersion stable whereas, the role of hydrophobic 3D crumpled graphene balls is to interact with hydrocarbons and thus stimulating their dislodging or desorption from the rocks of subterranean hydrocarbon formation. The recovery fluid containing self-dispersible, non-functionalized stimulating agent is inserted into the underground formation containing hydrocarbons before, during or after the introduction of water, gas, liquefied gas, vaporized gas. This self-dispersible, and non-functionalized dispersion fluid provides a lower-cost, higher efficiency, environmentally friendly method for EOR and IOR.

column12: On-line full-automatic sampling, sample preparation and moisture determination system and method for iron ore

The method has the advantages of high accuracy of particle size determination and moisture analysis data, strong sample preparation representativeness, high automation degree and high sample preparation efficiency.

column12: Distributed data center attached to natural gas recovery well station
column13: The invention discloses a distributed data center attached to a natural gas recovery well station. The distributed data center comprises a data center module, a main pipeline, a power generation bypass and a refrigeration module. The distributed data center is attached to the natural gas recovery well station, the differential pressure generator of the power generation bypass in the distributed data center is used for collecting differential pressure energy of the gas transmission pipeline when the natural gas recovery well station executes gas transmission operation, electric energy is provided for equipment operation of the data center module, and the refrigeration module of the distributed data center is used for refrigerating the natural gas recovery well station. The cooling capacity generated by gas expansion and pressure reduction after the throttle valve and the differential pressure generator when the natural gas production well station executes gas transmission operation is collected, a cooling refrigerant is provided for equipment operation of the data center module, and the technical problem that the operation cost and the maintenance cost are high when a distributed data center is arranged in a western natural gas mining area is solved.

column12: Food processor with high crushing efficiency
column13: The utility model provides a food processor with high crushing efficiency. The stirrer comprises a base and a stirring cup, motor is arranged in machine base, a crushing knife is arranged in the stirring cup; motor-driven crushing knife, the stirring cup comprises a cup body, a cup cover and a cup base. A metal disc is arranged between the bottom of the cup body and the cup base; the metal disc comprises a metal disc side wall and a metal disc bottom wall; the crushing knife is arranged on the bottom wall of the metal disc; the cup body is in a big-end-down cone shape. A turbulent flow boss isarranged on the inner side wall of the cup body; the bottom end of the turbulent flow boss extends to the bottom end of the cup body; the opening diameter of the cup body is smaller than the bottom diameter of the cup body; the rotating liquid is pressed by the inclined interior of the inner wall of the cup body in the process of ascending along the cup body; the component force converging to therotating center is achieved, the water head uprush height of the rotating water flow can be reduced, the water head can fall back to the center in advance, hollow vortexes in the center are filled, the up-down rolling effect is enhanced, the up-down circulation effect is improved, the contact space of liquid and the blades is increased, and the crushing efficiency and the crushing effect are improved.

column12: PARTICLE-INDUCED X-RAY EMISSION (PIXE) USING HYDROGEN AND MULTI-SPECIES FOCUSED ION BEAMS
column13: Practical implementation of Particle-Induced X-ray Emission (PIXE) on a focused ion beam apparatus or on a dual-beam apparatus comprising both focused-ion beam and scanning microscopy capabilities is described. Accordingly, an analytical method comprises: directing and focusing a beam of ions comprising a mixture of protons and non-hydrogen ions onto a sample, wherein the kinetic energy of ions of the mixture is not greater than 50 kilo-electron-Volts (keV); and detecting and measuring X-rays that are emitted from the sample in response to the impingement of the protons and non-hydrogen ions onto the sample.

column12: MICROWAVE-ASSISTED REMOVAL OF ORGANIC SOLVENT FROM OIL SANDS GANGUE
column13: A method and system are provided for removing an organic solvent from a gangue comprising the organic solvent, bitumen and mineral solids comprising sand and clay particles. The gangue may be a mixture produced by a solvent-based process using the organic solvent for extracting bitumen from an oil sands ore, where the organic solvent in the mixture is residual from the solvent-based process. If necessary, water is added to the gangue so that the gangue has a water content greater than 0 wt% by weight of the mineral solids. The gangue with the water content is exposed to microwaves to heat the gangue and thereby vaporize at least a portion of the organic solvent from the gangue.

A water mist spraying system is arranged at the top in each of the feeding bin and the finished product warehouse; the feeder and the first crusher, the first crusher and the first vibrating screen, the first vibrating screen and the second vibrating screen, the first vibrating screen and the second crusher, the second crusher and the second vibrating screen, and the second vibrating screen and the third vibrating screen are connected through belt conveyors; and a first vibrating screen, a second vibrating screen and a third vibrating screen are respectively connected in the finished product warehouse through belt conveyors. column12: SEABED RESOURCE LIFTING APPARATUS
column13: The present invention relates to a system and its equipments to collect mineral ores on the seabed and to float them up to the sea surface by utilizing the buoyancy of a liquid having a specific gravity less than that of water at room temperature. It is an underwater navigator capable of autonomous navigation that descends at a specific gravity of around 1.0 with a ballast that cancels buoyancy when descending from the sea surface, and ascends at a specific gravity of around 1.0 by exchanging mineral ores with the ballast on the seabed. On the seafloor, it is accompanied by a device that collects seabed mineral ores for the underwater vehicle.

column12: Calculation method for theoretical flotation recovery rate of gold ore product
column13: The invention provides a method for calculating the theoretical flotation recovery rate of gold ore products. The method comprises the following steps: sampling a to-be-tested sample, preparing the sample as an MLA sample, then testing the content of the main metal sulfide in the MLA sample, and carrying out statistics on the embedding relation of the main metal sulfide in the MLA sample and the characteristics of gangue minerals; analyzing the gold content of the main metal sulfide in the sample to be detected; reselecting the to-be-detected sample, and detecting the gold grade of the to-be-detected sample; and finally calculating the theoretical recovery rate of the recoverable gold in the to-be-detected sample. According to the method, data correction is conducted by introducing the lean intergrowth body and the rich intergrowth body, errors are reduced, the method can be closer to actual production, and the theoretical flotation recovery rate of gold ore products under the conventional flotation means is accurately determined; and theoretical guidance is provided for technical indexes of a gold ore flotation process.

column12: Excavation robot experiment platform based on digital twinning technology
column13: The invention discloses an excavating robot experiment platform based on digital twinning. The excavating robot experiment platform comprises a server, a virtual scene generation module, an excavating robot twinning body, a path and trajectory planning module, a multi-degree-of-freedom excavating robot, a controller and an experiment platform body. The server is used for executing calculation required by the virtual scene generation module, the mining robot twinborn body, the path and trajectory planning module and the controller; the virtual scene generation module is used for generating a virtual working environment required by the twin of the excavating robot in real time, and the motion control of the twin of the excavating robot is realized through the path and trajectory planning module; the controller controls movement of the multi-degree-of-freedom excavation robot and collects information fed back by the multi-degree-of-freedom excavation robot; the information exchange module communicates with the virtual scene generation module through a network and exchanges virtual and reality information in real time; the experimental platform comprises a sand table and a laser radar arranged at the top, the sand table is used for simulating the working environment of a construction site, and the multi-degree-of-freedom excavating robot works on the sand table.
column14: UNIV YANSHAN;;YANKONG TECH QINHUANGDAO CO LTD

column12: Method for adjusting height of main shaft of gyratory crusher
column13: The invention discloses a method for adjusting the height of a main shaft of a gyratory crusher, which comprises the following steps of: operating the gyratory crusher at the initial height h0 of the main shaft, recording the initial operation duration time s0, monitoring the ore discharge granularity, and stopping the gyratory crusher to prepare to adjust the main shaft when the ore discharge granularity is greater than a set value; after multiple times of adjustment, when the spindle height is larger than the spindle stroke Hm, the adjustment process is ended, and the lining plate needs to be replaced; and at the last stage of the lining plate, when the height of the spindle is smaller than the stroke Hm of the spindle after the nth adjustment height value hn of the spindle of the gyratory crusher is adjusted up by the maximum recommended height H, but the operation performance index and the ore discharge granularity of the gyratory crusher monitored after adjustment cannot be smaller than respective set values at the same time, the adjustment process is ended, and the lining plate needs to be replaced. According to the adjusting method, mathematical description is conducted on the operation process of the height of the main shaft through the step function, comprehensive analysis is conducted on operation data of the crusher, guided operation parameters are formulated, and guidance is provided for the operation process of the crusher.

column12: Urban bus route toughness evaluation method and system
column13: The invention discloses a bus route toughness evaluation method and a system. The bus route toughness evaluation method comprises the following steps of: S1, a data acquisition step; S2, a data preprocessing step; S3, a step of calculating arrival time of an intermediate station; S4, a judgment step, which is implemented by acquiring a vehicle arrival time intermediate table according to processedstatic basic data and dynamic real-time data, clustering arrival time in the vehicle arrival time intermediate table by using an algorithm, and calculating ought-to-arrive time of the intermediate station; and S5, a toughness index calculation step, which is implemented by calculating a recovery degree and recovery time from a collapse state to a stable state, and calculating a toughness index according to the recovery degree and the recovery time. According to the bus route toughness evaluation method and the system, available data is fully utilized to mine effective operation information, and the bus route toughness evaluation method is constructed; historical data can be subjected to toughness mining analysis, and real-time data can be subjected to toughness calculation and monitoring,so that decision support is provided for bus route adjustment and optimization.

column12: Prediction model of RMB exchange rate option execution price
column13: The invention discloses a prediction model of an RMB exchange rate option execution price. The RMB exchange rate option execution price prediction model comprises the following steps: variable selection; preprocessing data, and constructing a training data and prediction data set; carrying out BMA modeling; and RMB exchange rate prediction and option application. According to the method, mining and using of data information are more sufficient, it can be judged that the explanation function of explanation variables on dependent variables is better, the influence function is more remarkable, and therefore scientific and accurate prediction can be made more easily. Based on the above prediction of the exchange rate of each deadline dollar exchange RMB, foreign capital and foreign trade enterprises can take the deadline dollar exchange RMB exchange rate as an execution price for handling exchange rate options, so as to obtain a better set value keeping effect and a higher exchange rate option value.

column12: Method for measuring vertical angle of ion beam by multiple cups
column13: The invention discloses a method for measuring the overall angle of an ion beam current in the vertical direction by using angle Faraday, which comprises the following steps of simultaneously selecting seven Faraday cups with the same angle, acquiring the beam current in a terminal target chamber by using a current detector on a grid of the Faraday cups, storing the obtained flow intensity data, and fitting by using an algorithm program, and calculating a relatively accurate vertical angle. According to the method, the vertical direction angle of the ion beam current can be measured, and whether the ion beam current is stable and the vertical direction divergence degree can be visually and qualitatively reflected through the acquired data image; and seven cups are used for collecting the beam current at one time, so that the measurement and calculation time is greatly saved and the terminal measurement efficiency is improved compared with multiple times of measurement by a single cup. The invention relates to an ion implantation device and a fitting algorithm, which belong to the field of semiconductor manufacturing.

column12: Crushing and screening integrated device and method for detecting ore rock crushing characteristics by using crushing and screening integrated device
column13: The invention discloses a crushing and screening integrated device and a method for detecting ore rock crushing characteristics by using the crushing and screening integrated device. The crushing and screening integrated device comprises a novel jaw crusher, an ore rock crushing force and compression displacement monitoring system and a horizontal vibration screening machine, wherein a screened material inlet is formed in the top of the horizontal vibration screening machine and located below a discharging port of the novel jaw crusher, the novel jaw crusher and the horizontal vibration screening machine are arranged in a linkage mode, and a displacement meter and a dynamic pressure sensor of the ore rock crushing force and compression displacement monitoring system are arranged at monitoring positions on the novel jaw crusher respectively. According to the device, a crushing and screening integrated linkage mode is adopted, ore rock crushing force, crushing deformation, crushing energy and gradation characteristic parameters are monitored during crushing and screening synchronous operation, the crushing characteristics and energy consumption rules of ore rocks under the mechanical crushing condition can be researched, improvement of an ore rock mechanical crushing process in actual production is guided, energy conservation and efficiency improvement of mine enterprise production are promoted, and economic benefits and social benefits of enterprises are improved.

column12: On-line full-automatic sampling, sample preparation and moisture determination system for iron ore
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of iron ore raw material sampling, sample preparation, detection and analysis, and provides an on-line full-automatic iron ore sampling, sample preparation and moisture determination system which is characterized in that a sampling transmission unit comprises a primary sampling machine, sample transmission equipment and a secondary sampling machine; the primary sampling machine is connected with the granularity determination unit and the robot sample preparation analysis unit through sample transmission equipment and conveys samples; the particle size measuring unit comprises a particle size screening machine and a particle size weighing system; the robot sample preparation analysis unit comprises a rotary sample collector, a sample barrel cleaning device, a primary jaw crusher, a primary division machine and the like; the rejected sample unit comprises a rejected sample transfer belt conveyor, a system rejected sample bucket elevator and a system rejected sample output belt conveyor. The device disclosed by the utility model has the advantages of high accuracy of granularity measurement and moisture analysis data, strong sample preparation representativeness, high automation degree and high sample preparation efficiency.

column12: Automatic post-processing device and method for precise metal 3D printing
column13: The invention provides an automatic post-processing device and method for precise metal 3D printing. The device comprises an annular assembly line; clamping wheels and a cutting machine are arranged on the annular assembly line; a cutting device and a grinding device which are used for cutting and grinding parts are installed on the upper portion of the annular assembly line; a robot used for grabbing base plates is arranged on one side of the annular assembly line; and a rolling and polishing device is installed at an outlet of the annular assembly line. The grabbing robot comprises a mechanical arm, a vacuum suction cup and a vacuum generator, and the vacuum suction cup is clamped on the mechanical arm and connected with the vacuum generator through a pipeline. The rolling and polishing device comprises a roller, a motor, a spiral rolling shaft and a grinding material, the spiral rolling shaft is installed in the middle of the roller, the motor drives the spiral rolling shaft through a belt, and the grinding material is arranged in the roller. According to the automatic post-processing device and method for precise metal 3D printing, manpower is saved, the process of independently disassembling a part support is omitted, and the production efficiency of products is improved through roller-type batch treatment.

column12: Combined feeding and discharging device of vertical mill
column13: The invention discloses a combined feeding and discharging device of a vertical mill. The device comprises an upper ore feeding device, a lower ore feeding device and an ore discharging device, the upper ore feeding device and the lower ore feeding device are communicated with feeding ports in the upper portion and the lower portion of the vertical mill respectively, and the upper ore feeding device and the lower ore feeding device are formed by connecting multi-end abrasion-resistant pipe fitting flanges and are each provided with an electric water supplementing valve and an electric gate valve. The ore discharging device is provided with a flowmeter, a concentration meter, an electric water supplementing valve, an electric gate valve, the flowmeter and the concentration meter which are connected through a water supplementing and adding control system and an operation control system. The grinding efficiency is high, feeding and discharging are rapid and convenient, the process is stable, and the automation degree is high.

column12: Sample pretreatment device for food detection
column13: The invention provides a sample pretreatment device for food detection. The sample pretreatment device comprises a supporting assembly, a sample cup, a flushing assembly, a crushing assembly and a sampling assembly. The supporting assembly comprises a base, a rotating table and a lifting mechanism. The lifting mechanism comprises a lifting rod, a first extension rod and a second extension rod which are vertically arranged on the rotating table. The flushing assembly comprises a flushing cylinder and a flushing nozzle; the crushing assembly comprises a crushing cutter and a first motor; the sampling assembly is arranged on the second extension rod. Under the combined action of the supporting assembly, the crushing assembly and the sampling assembly, automatic crushing and automatic sampling of samples can be realized, and the automation degree of sample pretreatment is improved. The sample cup and the crushing cutter are separately mounted, and the crushing cutter can enter the sample cup to crush a sample and can also enter the washing cylinder to wash and clean under the driving of the lifting mechanism and the rotating table. The sample cup can be taken down to be cleaned after sampling is finished, the sample cup is light in weight and more convenient to clean, water does not need to be fed into the motor, and safety is higher.

column12: SCANNING-BASED STEERING OF A MOBILE HAULAGE SYSTEM FOR CONTINUOUSLY CONVEYING FRAGMENTED MATERIAL
GOLF PLATFORM FOR TRAINING AND GAMING
column13: A system for detecting, tracking, measuring and analyzing putted golf balls and golfers' putting performance. The system includes a pole securable in a golf hole cup and a capturing device mounted on an upper portion of the pole. The capturing device includes at least one camera and a viewing screen and is for detecting, tracking, measuring and analyzing golf balls putted along the ground and associated golfer performance data. The camera detects a golf ball as it enters the camera field of view, and tracks and stores a path and stopping point coordinates of the golf ball in relation to the golf hole cup, for analysis. Software on the capturing device includes algorithms which analyze individual performance measurements, formulate performance assessments, and provides personalized feedback and instruction output based on data captured by the capturing device.

column12: Asphalt colloid mill for laboratory
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of emulsified asphalt preparation equipment, and particularly relates to an asphalt colloid mill which can accurately control the proportion during asphalt preparation and can be heated during grinding. The asphalt colloid mill for the laboratory comprises a grinding system, a power system, a control system and a feeding device. The power system isinstalled on the pedestal, connected with the grinding system and used for providing power for the grinding system. The grinding system comprises a grinding chamber, heating devices and a circulatingguide pipe, and the heating devices are installed on the two sides of the grinding chamber and conduct heating during grinding; the feeding device is installed above the control panel and is composedof an asphalt storage tank, a sample cup, a weighing sensor and a feeding pipe, and the weighing sensor is installed at the bottom of the asphalt storage tank and the bottom of the sample cup and is controlled by the control system. The instrument is simple in structure and simple and convenient to operate, and has the characteristics of automation, accuracy and safety.

column12: Wastewater treatment functional material prepared based on natural blue iron ore and natural limonite and application of wastewater treatment functional material in synchronous nitrogen removal and phosphorus recovery
column13: The invention discloses a wastewater treatment functional material prepared on the basis of natural blue iron ore and natural limonite, a preparation method of the wastewater treatment functional material and application of the wastewater treatment functional material to synchronous nitrogen removal and phosphorus recovery, and relates to the technical field of deep nitrogen removal and phosphorus recovery in sewage treatment. And preparing a 3D iron-sulfur-phosphorus porous functional material or a 3D hematite composite phosphorus functional material through a 3D printing technology. Wherein nano zero-valent iron phosphorus, sulfur and other components in the 3D iron-sulfur-phosphorus porous functional material can be used as electron donors and electron transfer media of thiobacillus denitrificans in the autotrophic denitrification process to reduce nitrate and nitrite, or can be used as protease synthesis of electron transfer bodies to improve the denitrification biological activity of thiobacillus denitrificans; or the 3D hematite composite phosphorus functional material serves as an electron acceptor of iron anaerobic ammonium oxidation bacteria in the iron anaerobic ammonium oxidation process, electron transfer of microorganisms and enzyme synthesis are promoted, the sewage denitrification performance is improved, and oxidation of ammonia nitrogen and recovery of phosphorus are achieved.

column12: USE OF A COMPOSITION COMPRISING A POLYAMINOAMIDE TYPE COMPOUND FOR COPPER NANOTWIN ELECTRODEPOSITION
column13: The present invention provides a new use of a polyaminoamide comprising a group of formula N1 [B-A-B'-Z]n[Y-Z]m (N1) in a composition for electrodepositing nanotwinned copper, that is obtainable by reacting a diamine compound comprising two a primary or secondary amino groups with an aminoacid in a molar ratio of approx. 1:2 to form an aminoamide compound that is afterwards reacted with a coupling agent and optionally with a diamine or other co-monomers.

column12: Double-arm education robot sorting control method and system
column13: The invention relates to a double-arm education robot sorting control method and system, and relates to the technical field of electromechanical control. The method comprises the steps that a sorting teaching resource library is called, and a sorting teaching process is obtained; forming sorting track data according to the sorting teaching process; forming a sorting control program according to the sorting track data; obtaining a sorting starting signal to form an executable instruction; sending an executable instruction to form a sorting identification instruction; sending a sorting identification instruction and forming a sorting counting instruction; sending a sorting counting instruction to form a sorting recovery instruction; sending a sorting recovery instruction to form a sorting disconnection instruction; and sending a sorting disconnection instruction to complete the sorting operation. The system comprises an operation cabinet, a double-arm robot, a control cabinet body, a first suction cup clamp assembly, a second suction cup clamp assembly, a first suction cup clamp support, a second suction cup clamp support, a color code sensor and a workpiece support. The sorting process can be displayed completely and vividly, and meanwhile students can intervene in operation control to combine teaching and practice.

column12: Crushing device for nonmetal ore processing
column13: The crushing device comprises a box body and crushing rollers rotationally connected to the back and the front face of one side of an inner cavity of the box body through bearings, one end of a rotating shaft of each crushing roller penetrates through the box body and is fixedly connected with a rotating mechanism, and a feeding opening is formed in the top of the box body; and the two sides of the top of the inner cavity of the box body are rotationally connected with closing mechanisms through rotating blocks. According to the crushing device for non-metal ore processing, automatic closing can be achieved through a spring and a closing plate after ore feeding is finished, the feeding opening is sealed, broken stone is prevented from splashing out through the feeding opening in the crushing process and hurting workers, meanwhile, the closing plate can be directly driven to be opened under the influence of the elastic force of the spring during feeding, and the crushing efficiency is improved. The automation of the device is improved, broken stones collided all around can be blocked through the baffles in the crushing process, the broken stones are prevented from directly colliding with the inner wall of the box body, and then the service life of the device is prolonged.
column14: JINCHANG LUHENG NEW BUILDING MATERIAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Risk prediction system based on dressing and metallurgy computer model
column13: The invention discloses a risk prediction system based on a dressing and smelting computer model, which is used for determining the risk of cyanidation leaching by adopting the dressing and smelting computer model by taking a result as a guide no matter which auxiliary agent is added in which process in a specified dressing and smelting process, and no matter which process specifically comprises the specified dressing and smelting process and the sequence among the processes. And even if a specified dressing and smelting process with high complexity is adopted, the risk of cyanidation leaching can be reduced on the premise of guaranteeing the quality of dressing and smelting products. The dressing and smelting computer model in the specification comprehensively considers the first data, the second data and the parameters of the conglomerate type gold ore raw material, does not relate to process parameters, does not relate to additive parameters, and does not need to directly bring the process parameters and the additive parameters into an inspection range, so that the evaluation complexity of the physical property of the intermediate material during risk determination is avoided.

column12: Method for rapidly predicting laboratory mineral separation closed-circuit index
column13: The invention discloses a method for rapidly predicting laboratory mineral separation closed-circuit indexes, which can directly estimate laboratory closed-circuit test results through open-circuit test results, avoids complex closed-circuit tests, shortens test time, improves the efficiency of predicting recovery rate, and saves a large amount of manpower and material resources. By utilizing the method, the recovery rates of concentrate products with different metal contents (grades) can be predicted, a judgment basis can be provided for laboratory process technology development and on-site selection of concentrate products with higher benefits, and the method is an efficient, simple and high-accuracy laboratory mineral separation closed-loop index method; the method is especially suitable for predicting laboratory mineral separation closed-circuit indexes of porphyry type copper ore.

column12: Vacuum cup full-automatic grinding machine production line
column13: The utility model discloses a full-automatic vacuum cup polisher production line, which relates to the technical field of automation and comprises an operation table, one end of the operation table is provided with an input mechanism, and the other end of the operation table is provided with an output mechanism; the multiple grinding mechanisms are all installed on one side of the operation table. The grinding mechanisms are used for grinding the vacuum cups. The multiple robot terminal execution mechanisms are all installed on the other side of the operation table, and each robot terminal execution mechanism is arranged opposite to the corresponding grinding device; the multiple jig stations are all installed in the operation table, and one jig station is arranged between every two adjacent robot terminal execution mechanisms; the robot terminal executing mechanism can move among the jig station, the grinding mechanism, the input mechanism and the output mechanism according to instructions. When the vacuum cup polishing line is used, the vacuum cup polishing line carries out polishing operation completely in a full-automatic mode in the period from manual material taking and placing to manual material taking after polishing is completed.

column12: Methods for processing oil sands containing swelling clays
column13: A method for extracting bitumen from an oil sands ore comprising swelling clays such as smectite is provided comprising blending said ore sands ore comprising swelling clays with a substantially swelling clays-free oil sands ore to give a blended oil sands ore having less than 1% swelling clays.

column12: Smelting device for improving rare earth oxide yield
column13: The smelting device comprises a smelting barrel, a liquid inlet pipe is connected to one side of the smelting barrel, and a feeding assembly is arranged at the end, close to the smelting barrel, of the liquid inlet pipe. The metal rare earth in the rare earth ore is reduced, so that the problem of incomplete smelting of the rare earth in the smelting process can be avoided, meanwhile, the crushed rare earth ore can be smelted for multiple times, the rare earth collection rate can be further ensured, and through mutual cooperation with a collection component, the rare earth ore can be effectively collected. According to the rare earth smelting device, metal rare earth adsorbed on the inner wall of the smelting barrel can be collected, so that the collecting effect and the machining efficiency of rare earth smelting can be guaranteed, through the arrangement of the feeding assembly, crushed rare earth ore can be quantitatively input in the rare earth smelting process, and therefore the rare earth smelting effect is guaranteed, and data recording is facilitated.

column12: ION-SORPTION METHOD OF LITHOCHEMICAL PROSPECTING OF POLYMETALLIC DEPOSITS
column13: FIELD: chemistry.SUBSTANCE: disclosed is an ion-sorption method of lithochemical prospecting of polymetallic deposits, involving extraction of soil samples, obtaining from samples of nitrate extracts and analysis of extracts by mass spectrometry with inductively coupled plasma (ICP MS), where sampling is performed from depth of 5–10 cm, nitrate extracts are obtained by wetting sample fractions of less than 0.1 mm with an extractant solution of nitric acid at ratio of 1 to 100: 100 ml of the extracting solution is added to a sample weight of 1.0±0.01 g, where the extracting solution is prepared by adding 250 ml of chemically pure nitric acid to 4,750 ml of distilled water, and ICP MS analysis is carried out after their daily settling, on which concentration of ore-bearing and petrogenic elements in each sample is obtained, from the obtained concentration data of elements determining sections with a homogeneous geochemical field, values of which are taken as local geochemical background, and detecting ion-sorption anomalies, which contain abnormal concentrations of ore and petrogenic elements, exceeding values of local geochemical background.EFFECT: reduction of labor intensity and increase of speed (rapid) analysis, increase of their reproducibility and relevance of analysis results, as well as increase in reliability of predicted estimates of detected abnormalities.1 cl, 5 ex

column12: Cone crusher for fine crushing of zinc concentrate
column13: The utility model discloses a zinc concentrate fine crushing processing cone crusher which comprises a driving wheel, a transmission belt, a motor, a crusher main body, a feeding mechanism, a driven wheel, a transmission shaft, a protective cover, a driving bevel gear, a driven bevel gear, a shaft rod, a crushing block and a lining plate. A supporting plate is matched with a weight sensor to detect zinc ore at the top, when the zinc ore at the top of the supporting plate reaches a preset value, a baffle drives the supporting plate to rotate, a gap is formed between the baffle and an inner ring of a feeding hopper, the zinc ore downwards falls into a lining plate through the gap to be crushed at the moment, and quantitative crushing of the zinc ore is achieved; and meanwhile, the situation that the service life of the crusher is affected due to the fact that too much zinc ore is introduced is prevented.
column15: LIU LIQIANG;;LUO LICHAO;;YANG XIAOCAI;;ZHAO YAMING;;HE JIAN

column12: Commercial soybean milk machine with automatic filling function
column13: The utility model discloses a commercial soybean milk machine with an automatic filling function, which belongs to the field of household appliances, solves the problems of low automation degree and low filling efficiency of the conventional commercial soybean milk machine, and adopts the technical scheme that the commercial soybean milk machine mainly comprises a rack, a cup falling assembly, a soybean milk grinding assembly, a soybean milk filling assembly, a cup sealing assembly and a cup discharging assembly, a control center and a rotary table are arranged on the machine frame, a plurality of supporting positions used for supporting slurry cups are arranged on the rotary table, the rotary table intermittently rotates to enable the cup falling assembly, the slurry filling assembly, the cup sealing assembly and the cup discharging assembly to be aligned to one supporting position, the cup falling assembly is used for placing the empty slurry cups on the supporting positions, and the slurry grinding assembly is used for making slurry and conveying slurry to the slurry filling assembly. The grouting assembly is used for pouring grout into the grout cup above the supporting position, the cup sealing assembly is used for sealing the grout cup filled with the grout, and the cup discharging assembly is used for moving the sealed grout cup out of the supporting position. The soybean milk machine is mainly used for improving the filling automation degree of the commercial soybean milk machine, so that the filling efficiency and the filling quality are improved.
column14: HANGZHOU NINE YANG BEAN INDUSTRY LTD COMPANY

column12: Automatic ore crushing device
column13: An automatic ore smashing device comprises a smashing box body, a feeding port, a smashing plate, a smashing fixing plate, a screening conveying belt, a first discharging port and a second discharging port are arranged in the smashing box body, the smashing plate is opposite to the smashing face of the smashing fixing plate, and the screening conveying belt is arranged below the smashing plate and the smashing fixing plate; a displacement sensor is arranged on the crushing plate, the crushing plate and the displacement sensor are connected with a hydraulic moving device, and the hydraulic moving device is fixed on the inner wall of the crushing box body; a crushing plate is pushed in a reciprocating mode through a hydraulic moving device, the crushing plate and a crushing fixing plate extrude and crush ores, meanwhile, a displacement sensor is arranged on the crushing plate and connected with the hydraulic moving device, the ores are clamped between the crushing plate and the crushing fixing plate, and when the crushing plate cannot move, the hydraulic moving device retreats to loosen the clamped and pressed ores; and a screening conveying belt is arranged below the crushing plate and the crushing fixing plate, and the crushed ore can be screened and conveyed.

column12: IMPROVEMENTS RELATING TO UNDERGROUND MINING
column13: A driverless haulage vehicle for use within an underground mining operation including a unitary support chassis having a first end section, a second end section and a central section located between said first and said second end sections, haulage vehicle transport means including a first wheel assembly, a second wheel assembly and a third wheel assembly, steerage means directing said vehicle along a transport path, the steerage means including said first wheel assembly and said second wheel assembly, said steerage means further including a sensor set from which sensor data is generated representing internal status of the driverless haulage vehicle, and/or environmental status within which the driverless haulage vehicle is operating, and controllable activators to control steering movements of said first wheel assembly and said second wheel assembly whereby driving steering, wheels of the first wheel assembly are directed oppositely to wheels of the second wheel assembly.

column12: Automatic liquid preparation system for ion adsorption type rare earth ore leaching liquid
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic liquid preparation system for ion adsorption type rare earth ore leaching liquid. Comprising a first electromagnetic valve, a first power pump, a first flow sensor, a liquid preparation pool, a conveying belt, a sulfur-magnesium solid, a photoelectric switch, a bale breaker, a vibrating feeder, a stirrer, a liquid level sensor, a pH sensor, a second electromagnetic valve, a second power pump, a second flow sensor, a control cabinet, an isolation module, a PLC control system and a touch screen, and the first electromagnetic valve is connected with the first power pump through a pipeline; the first power pump is connected to the liquid preparation pool; the second electromagnetic valve is connected with a second power pump through a pipeline; the second power pump is connected to the liquid preparation pool; the sulfur-matched magnesium solid is arranged above the conveying belt; the tail end of the conveying belt is connected with the bale breaker, and the lower portion of the bale breaker is connected with the vibrating feeder. And the vibrating feeder is positioned above the liquid preparation tank. The system can replace manual operation to complete preparation of the rare earth ore leaching liquid, the labor intensity of workers is reduced, and the production efficiency is improved.
column14: JIANGXI IONIC RARE EARTH ENGINEERING RES CO LTD

column12: Shaking control food processor
column13: The utility model discloses a shaking control food processor which comprises a cup body, a crushing knife arranged in the cup body, a control chip and a motor electrically connected with the control chip, and the motor drives the crushing knife to work; the food processor further comprises an acceleration sensor electrically connected with the control chip, and the acceleration sensor is used forcollecting acceleration sensing data of the food processor. And the control chip is used for controlling the food processor to be started or stopped according to the acceleration sensing data. The shaking control food processor provided by the utility model does not adopt a key mode to control starting or stopping; compared with the prior art, the handheld food processer is controlled through usergesture operation such as handheld shaking, on one hand, user operation is more convenient, on the other hand, by taking the handheld food processer as an example, the handheld shaking user gesture operation can help the machine to crush and stir more sufficiently, and the food processing effect is improved.

column12: Preparation process of double-layer heat insulation ceramic cup based on 3D printing
column13: The invention provides a preparation process of a double-layer heat insulation ceramic cup based on 3D printing. The preparation process of the double-layer heat insulation ceramic cup based on 3D printing comprises the following steps: grinding, drying and mixing titanium dioxide and potassium carbonate; performing high-temperature reaction to prepare a modifier; adding a modifier to modify chinastone, kaolin and clay; adding yttrium oxide and calcium oxide, and carrying out ball-milling mixing; modeling and performing 3D printing on a double-layer ceramic green body; and sintering the double-layer ceramic green body. Kaolin, clay, chinastone and china clay are used as raw materials, the inner blank layer and the outer blank layer of the ceramic cup are printed through a 3D pottery clay printer, the middle layer is a vacuum heat insulation layer, heat transfer can be effectively prevented, the heat insulation and scald prevention effects are achieved, and therefore the practicability of the ceramic cup is improved; and the complexity of a forming process can be reduced.

column12: Intelligent monitoring device for ore pulp and foam fullness of flotation cell, and monitoring method thereof
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent monitoring device for ore pulp and foam fullness of a flotation cell, and a monitoring method thereof. The flotation cell is provided with a camera, an electromagnetic flowmeter, a collector, a network switch, a BIM server, an electric control valve and an alarm; the BIM server receives the data, transmitted by the network switch, of the collector, the electric control valve and the alarm, model building software in the BIM server generates a real-time three-dimensional model, and the control system automatically compares the real-time three-dimensional model with a standard model; and if the foam height reaches a safety valve value, the control system of the BIM server sends an activation program instruction to the alarm and the electric actuator ofthe electric control valve through the network switch, an alarm program is activated, and the electric control valve is synchronously started to regulate the ore pulp output caliber. The device and the method have the advantages of high automation degree, ensuring of smooth flotation production, reduction of the safety risk caused when a flotation device runs at a high speed and the tank is full,avoiding of mineral losses, and ensuring of the grade and the recovery rate of flotation concentrate products.

column12: Urine Home Analyser
column13: A urine analyzer device, configured to be installed in a toilet bowl, to be used several times, the device comprising a holder member, to attach the device to the rim of the toilet bowl, an electronic unit, enclosed in a housing, a urine reception area, with at least one electro-chemical sensor, configured to measure a quantity of at least one substance contained in urine, such as physiological compound or chemical component, a wireless coupler to send resulting data to a remote computing device, wherein the electro-chemical sensor comprises at least a ion selective Field Effect Transistor (ISFET), configured to sense levels of one or more physiological ions, thereby providing a urine analyzer device, readily available at home, simply installed in a toilet bowl, and that can be used several times subsequently.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED PRODUCTION OF CIGARETTES
column13: An enclosed cannabis cigarette preparation system that includes an indexing module configured to accept a plurality of pre-rolled cones, each having a sealed end and an open end, and to move the pre-rolled cones through a plurality of stations. The system further includes a filling module configured to dispense, at a first station, a portion of cannabis shake material into the open end of each of the pre-rolled cones to form loosely filled cones; a tamping module configured to compress, at a second station, the cannabis shake material in each of the loosely filled cones to form tamped cones; a de-clogging module; and a pinching module configured to pinch-twist, at a third station, the open end of each of the pre-rolled cones to form rolled cigarettes.

column12: SOLID-LIQUID SEPARATION METHOD USING MULTISTAGE THICKNER AND WET SMELTER METHOD OF NICKEL OXIDE ORE CONTAINING THE SAME
column13: To provide a method of enhancing a solid concentration of a residual slurry extracted from a bottom part of a thickner.SOLUTION: A solid-liquid separation method comprises adding sulfuric acid to an ore slurry containing nickel oxide ore in a raw material to perform acid leaching under high temperature and high pressure, and after performing a pH adjustment by adding a neutralizer to the obtained slurry, introducing the slurry into a multi-stage thickener to repeat cleaning and sedimentation separation to separate the solid and liquid, wherein an addition ratio of a coagulant by which the solid concentration of the residual slurry extracted from the bottom of the last stage thickener of the multi-stage thickener for each of multiple types of ore slurries with different Si grades is a maximum value is obtained in advance and formed into data base, the addition ratio of the coagulant at which the concentration reaches the maximum value is determined in advance and compiled into a database, the addition ratio of the coagulant corresponding to the Si grade of the ore slurry prepared in the ore mixing process of actual operation is determined based on the database, and the coagulant is added to the last stage thickener at the determined addition ratio.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

column12: Mill filling rate vibration monitoring system
column13: The utility model discloses a mill filling rate vibration monitoring system which comprises a data collector, and the data collector comprises an acceleration sensor and a vibration data detection module. According to the utility model, the data acquisition unit, the acceleration sensor, the vibration data detection module, the XM124 vibration standard dynamic measurement module, the DeviceNet communication module, the background server, the controller, the ore grinding expert system module, the Matlab software and the Ementer software are arranged to cooperate with each other; the advantagesof high flexibility, high reliability, high accuracy and the like are achieved; the problem that an existing mill filling rate vibration monitoring system does not have the characteristics of high flexibility, high reliability, high accuracy and the like is solved. The filling rate is monitored in real time, the semi-autogenous grinding bulging pre-judgment function is achieved, the real-time working condition vibration amplitude information of the mill is actively judged, the actual situation of the current filling rate of the mill is judged, and the practicability of the mill filling rate vibration monitoring system is improved.
column14: CHINA GOLD INNER MONGOLIA MINING CO LTD

column12: Tableware edging and polishing device
column13: The utility model discloses a tableware edge grinding and polishing device which comprises a device support. The device support is provided with a first suction cup used for adsorbing tableware. An edge grinding part for grinding the edge of tableware is arranged at the first sucker; the edge grinding part comprises an edge grinding head and a first clamping part used for driving the edge grindinghead to move around the first suction cup. And the first clamping part is connected with the device bracket and the edge grinding head. The tableware edging machine has the advantages that automaticedging of tableware is achieved, the edging efficiency of the tableware is greatly improved, and the automation degree of production and the product quality are improved; meanwhile, matched cutters can be designed according to different tableware, so that the tableware is high in applicability.
column14: HEZHOU BAOXING NEW MAT CO LTD

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TREATING AGRICULTURAL OR INDUSTRIAL RECIRCULATION WATER
column13: Drainage water that includes anions and cations dissolved in water and that is received from an agricultural or industrial facility is treated by applying a voltage to an anode and a cathode on opposite sides of an electrically driven separation apparatus that further includes at least one monovalent-selective ion exchange membrane between the anode and the cathode. The drainage water is passed through the electrically driven separation apparatus, wherein monovalent ions are selected from the drainage water through the monovalent-selective ion exchange membrane. The drainage water is then recirculated as treated water through the facility after the monovalent ions are removed.

column12: Method for measuring horizontal angle of ion beam current by using multi-angle Faraday cup
column13: The invention discloses a method for measuring horizontal angles and calculating divergence by using a multi-angle Faraday cup, which comprises the following steps of receiving an ion beam current by using a mobile Faraday and cooperating with the angle Faraday cup. The angle Faraday cup is formed by tightly arranging seven rectangular angle cups along an X direction, and each angle cup is formed by a grid structure. The grid structure and the cup wall are both made of conductive materials and can receive ion beams. A plurality of cups are gated through a control channel, ion beam current intensity information is collected, data is stored, the overall angle and beam divergence degree of the ion beam in the horizontal direction are obtained through formula calculation, and therefore the function of measuring the horizontal angle and distribution of the ion beam is achieved. According to the method, the horizontal direction angle and the divergence state of the ion beam can be measured, and the real-time performance and observability of beam detection are improved; multiple angle cups are used for collecting beam currents at a time, the angles of the beam currents are calculated at the same time, and the measurement time of multiple times of collection of a single cup is greatly saved. The invention relates to an ion implantation device, and belongs to the field of semiconductor manufacturing.
column14: BEIJING SHUOKE ZHONGKEXIN ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Method for predicting weathering crust ion adsorption type rare earth deposit layer position through ancient phreatic water level
column13: The invention discloses a method for predicting a weathering crust ion adsorption type rare earth deposit layer position through an ancient phreatic water level. A sample of the weathering crust is collected for trace element analysis and visible light-near infrared reflectance spectrum analysis; the change of Ce content in the weathering crust whole rock, namely deltaCe, and the absorption peak position of a visible light-near infrared reflection spectrum capable of representing the relative content of hematite-goethite in a wave band (P500) of 480-530 nm are calculated; the boundary line where deltaCe in the weathering crust is sharply changed from positive to negative and P500 is remarkably reduced is the ancient phreatic water level of the weathering crust, and the rare earth element rich ore layer in the weathering crust is distributed below the ancient phreatic water level. The precision of delineating the ore body and evaluating the ore deposit reserves of the rich ore layer ofthe weatheringion adsorption type rare earth ore deposit is further improved, and the purpose of efficiently utilizing rare earth resources in weathering crust ion adsorption type rare earth ore deposit prospecting exploration work is achieved.

The system comprises a data transmission and exchange module, a data processing module, a data storage module, a data calculation module, a data analysis and mining module, a support engine module, a data management module, a safety management module, a platform management module and a platform service module. An evaluation means is provided for power grid safety and promotion of new energy consumption, and a protective effect is achieved for safe and stable operation of the power grid.

column12: Metallurgical cycle grinding equipment
column13: The invention discloses metallurgical cycle grinding equipment which comprises a shell. The shell comprises a material distributing chamber; a sorting mechanism is contained in the material distributing chamber; a first sliding chute is formed in the upper side of the right end wall of the material distributing chamber; a first sliding block is slidably arranged in the first sliding chute; a first open slot is formed in the first sliding block; a first rotary shaft is rotatably arranged in the first open slot; a first cam is rotatably arranged on the first rotary shaft located in the first open slot; an installation block is fixedly arranged on the front end face of the first cam; and a second sliding chute is formed in the installation block. The metallurgical cycle grinding equipment provided by the invention is simple in structure and simple and convenient to operate, and is mainly applied to ore grinding operation; ores fed into the equipment can be ground into fine particles through multiple times of operation in the equipment, and the equipment can re-process the identified larger particles, so that the ores are ensured to be all ground; and the equipment has a higher automation degree and has a higher integration degree.
column14: HANGZHOU GANGHE MACHINERY TECH CO LTD

column12: Geothermal heat mining system
column13: A geothermal heat mining system can operate within a single primary borehole in a geothermal reservoir. A primary fluid loop can include a cold working fluid line leading into the primary borehole and a hot working fluid line coming out of the primary borehole. A secondary fluid loop can be located down the primary borehole, where the secondary fluid loop is in thermal contact with the geothermal reservoir and is entirely subsurface. A downhole heat mining device can control a rate of heat transfer from the secondary fluid loop to the primary fluid loop by selectively controlling fluid flow through the primary fluid loop, the secondary fluid loop, or both.

column12: SYNTHESIS OF A THIN INSOLUBLE HYDROXIDE SHELL ON THE SURFACE OF MAGNETIC ZERO-VALENT METAL NANOPARTICLES FOR ENVIRONMENTAL REMEDIATION
column13: An insoluble thin hydroxide shell is synthesized on the surface of nanoscale zero-valent iron (NZVI), using a rate-controlled deprotonation method. The hydroxide coated NZVI remains suspended in aqueous phase better than the prior art and can be used to remove groundwater contaminants.

column12: Optimal selection method, device and system for drainage and mining process of liquid-accumulating gas well and storage medium
column13: The invention provides an optimal selection method, device and system for drainage and recovery processes of a liquid-accumulating gas well and a storage medium, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining parameter data of a gas well to be subjected to drainage and recovery, the parameter data comprising information of alternative drainage and recovery processes; on the basis of the parameter data, a preset productivity decline model is applied, and the measure gas increasing amount, the measure validity period and the comprehensive decline rate of the gas well to be discharged and recovered by adopting a first alternative discharge and recovery process are determined; on the basis of the parameter data, the gas production speed and economic indexes of the gas well to be discharged and produced by adopting the first alternative discharge and production process are determined; and on the basis of the measure gas increasing amount, the measure validity period, the comprehensive declining rate, the gas production speed and the economic indexes, the optimal drainage and production process of the gas well to be subjected to drainage and production is determined. According to the optimal selection method and device for the drainage and recovery process of the liquid-loading gas well, the drainage and recovery process of the liquid-loading gas well can be comprehensively and systematically evaluated; meanwhile, technical feasibility and economic effectiveness are considered, and the efficiency of drainage and mining measures is improved.

column12: Flash memory chip data recovery device
column13: The utility model relates to the field of flash memory chip data recovery, in particular to a flash memory chip data recovery device. The flash memory chip data recovery device comprises a main body, a transmission assembly and a fixing assembly, a plurality of fixedly-connected mounting plates are mounted on the two sides of the main body, suction cups are mounted at the bottoms of the mounting plates, pressure relief boxes communicated with one another are mounted on the suction cups, threaded rods in threaded connection are mounted on the pressure relief boxes, and the pressure relief boxes are connected with the transmission assembly. Vent holes which are communicated with each other are formed in the two sides and the bottom of the screw rod. According to the flash memory chip data recovery device provided by the utility model, when the device needs to be picked up, the screw rod is rotated, so that the vent hole in the side surface of the screw rod is exposed, outside air enters the sucking disc along the pressure relief box through the vent hole, and the negative pressure state in the sucking disc disappears, so that the whole device can be easily picked up, and the phenomenon that when the sucking disc sucks tightly, the sucking disc is damaged is avoided. And the device is difficult to pick up.
column14: ANHUI DONGFANG HUIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for rapidly screening ore-containing weathering crust and evaluating rare earth ore type in field
column13: The invention discloses a method for rapidly screening ore-containing weathering crust and evaluating rare earth ore types in the field. The method comprises the following steps: estimating the content of ion phase rare earth in a sample, analyzing the content of all-phase rare earth elements, eliminating high and underestimated phenomena, sending the screened sample to a laboratory to analyze the content of the ion phase rare earth in the sample, applying the obtained analysis result to resource quantity estimation;' and evaluating the type of the rare earth ore according to a specific formula by using total-phase rare earth element content analysis data. The method can effectively solve problems of overestimation and underestimation in the current ion phase rare earth field rapid analysis and separation process, the total amount of all-phase rare earth in an unknown sample can be estimated by using the content of La, Ce and Y or La, Ce, Pr, Nd and Y elements, and the range of the ion phase rare earth content in the unknown sample can be roughly estimated by combining an ion phase rare earth rapid separation technology; the rare earth partition type of the sample can be judged; the analysis accuracy is effectively improved; the analysis cost is reduced.

column12: Lamp cup shaping and polishing process and device
column13: The invention relates to a lamp cup shaping and polishing process which comprises the following processing steps: step 1, lamp cup alignment: an alignment tool is matched with a universal workpiece clamp to clamp a workpiece, the workpiece is manually, continuously and slightly shaken, and alignment is carried out by matching with feeler gauge measurement; 2, lamp cup punching, wherein a center hole is punched through a drill bit; 3, trimming the lamp cup: cutting a port of the workpiece by using a cutting blade; 4, lamp cup fixing, wherein a hanging plate is installed on the universal workpiece clamp again for fixing; 5, lamp cup grinding, wherein a diamond grinding wheel is controlled for grinding; and 6, lamp cup polishing, wherein the universal workpiece clamp and the workpiece are installed on a three-axis polishing machine. The invention further relates to a lamp cup shaping and polishing device. By means of large opening positioning and small opening alignment, the center position of the workpiece can be accurately found, port finishing and inner wall grinding and polishing are conducted after the workpiece is pressed, the polishing automation degree and the smoothness of the inner wall of the workpiece can be effectively improved through the three-axis polishing machine, and the device is suitable for machining of different curved surface lamp cup products.

column12: Method for enhancing classification-based software demand tracking link recovery through knowledge learning and electronic device
column13: The invention provides a method for enhancing classification-based software demand tracking link recovery through knowledge learning and an electronic device. The method comprises the steps: after text and structure information contained in a software demand and code file with a tracking relation to be determined is preprocessed, constructing a demand-code knowledge graph and a code dependency graph; modeling the structure and text information of the demand-code knowledge graph, and performing learning to obtain vectors of demand and code entities; modeling the relation of the triple in the demand-code knowledge graph to obtain a relation feature vector; and mining the code dependency graph, extracting inference rules for discovering R2C links between potential demands and codes, and expanding the training data scale. According to the method, an effective prediction model can still be obtained when the training data is less, so that the recovery accuracy of the R2C link is ensured, the recovery cost is reduced, and the workload of manually annotating the data is reduced.

column12: Detector system of hydrogen isotope mass spectrometer and accelerator mass spectrometer
column13: The invention provides a detector system of a hydrogen isotope mass spectrometer and an accelerator mass spectrometer. The detector system comprises nine Faraday cups, a light shield, an absorption film arranged in the light shield, an energy spectrum detector and a data acquisition system, h2 < + > in the second ion beam is split into H < + > through the absorption film; hD < + > and H3 < + > in the third ion beam are split into H < + > and D < + > when passing through the absorption film, and the energy spectrum detector determines atomic number ratios corresponding to different elements by obtaining an energy spectrum diagram of the split ion beam; and the data acquisition system determines component information according to the beam intensity and the atomic number ratio corresponding to different elements. According to the embodiment, after ions in the second Faraday cup and the third Faraday cup penetrate through the absorption film, H2 < + > is split into H < + >, and then interference of H2 < + > on D < + > content measurement can be avoided. The HD < + > and the H3 < + > are split into H < + > and D < + > when passing through the absorption film, so that the interference of the HD < + > and the H3 < + > on the determination of the content of the T < + > can be avoided.
column14: THE 404 COMPANY LIMITED CHINA NAT NUCLEAR CORPORATION
column15: LIANG ZHENG'AN;;WANG YUELONG;;HE HAIJING;;DANG YANHUI;;NIU XINGXING;;HE XIAOHONG;;YAN YU;;SANG YAPING;;YAN LIMING;;ZHANG QI

column12: Lithium ion battery residual life prediction method based on improved hybrid model
column13: The invention relates to a lithium ion battery residual life prediction method based on an improved hybrid model. Comprising the following steps: acquiring charging voltage, current and time data of the lithium ion battery in constant-current charging and constant-voltage charging processes; for the obtained data, extracting the ratio of voltage to time and the ratio of current to time, and analyzing the correlation between the ratio and the battery capacity by adopting a Pearson and Spearman correlation analysis method; constructing a lithium ion battery residual life prediction data set, and dividing the data set into a training set and a test set; establishing a convolutional neural network-long and short-term memory network hybrid model, and optimizing parameters of the hybrid model by adopting an improved sparrow search algorithm to achieve the purposes of effectively mining data information and enhancing the residual service life prediction capability; the lithium ion battery residual life prediction method based on the improved hybrid model provided by the invention has relatively high accuracy and good adaptability to battery residual life prediction, and improves the defect of unstable output of a single model.

column12: Mining ore crushing and cooling device
column13: The utility model discloses a mining ore crushing and cooling device which comprises two crushing rollers, the two crushing rollers are both rotationally connected to the opposite inner sides of clamping plates, the inner sides of the crushing rollers are fixedly connected with a heat absorption barrel, an inner barrel is arranged in the heat absorption barrel, and the inner barrel is fixedly connected with the clamping plates. The heat absorption barrel and the inner barrel are fixedly connected through a connecting block, and a cooling cavity is formed by the heat absorption barrel and the inner barrel; a heat absorption barrel and an inner barrel are arranged, a crushing roller is located on the outer side of the heat absorption barrel, a waterproof temperature sensor is arranged in a cooling cavity formed by the heat absorption barrel and the inner barrel, and a controller controls different cooling devices to work according to the detection result of the waterproof temperature sensor; and the problem of low cooling efficiency caused by cooling when the temperature is too high is prevented, automatic cooling work can be carried out through the controller, and use is more convenient.

column12: Jaw crusher for producing furnace mouth spray coating
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining machinery. The utility model relates to a jaw crusher, in particular to a jaw crusher for furnace mouth spray coating production. The jaw crusher comprises a jaw crusher body and an anti-splashing device, the jet-flying preventing device is mounted between the jaw crusher body and the feeding hole; the jet-flying-preventing device comprises a first partition plate, a supporting cylinder and a second partition plate. The first partition plate and the second partition plate are each in a big-end-up rectangular pyramid shape, the lower portions of the side walls of the first partition plate and the second partition plate are cut to be in a tooth shape, and the first partition plate and the second partition plate are fixed between thefeeding port and the jaw crusher body through the supporting barrel.
column14: ZHENGZHOU JINLI KILN ENG CO LTD

column12: Auxiliary feeding device of calcium carbonate ore grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses an auxiliary feeding device of a calcium carbonate ore grinding machine, and particularly relates to the technical field of ore grinding machines, the auxiliary feeding device comprises a grinding machine shell, a conveying frame and a feeding hopper, one side of the bottom end of the conveying frame is in contact with the outer end of the feeding hopper, and a feeding mechanism is fixedly arranged in the conveying frame; the feeding mechanism comprises a storage cavity, two lead screws are arranged in the storage cavity, the two ends of each lead screw are movably connected with the inner wall of the storage cavity through bearings, strip-shaped clamping grooves are formed in the front wall and the rear wall of the interior of the grinding machine shell, and the outer ends of the two lead screws are sleeved with nut seats. And connecting rods are fixedly arranged on one sides of the two nut seats, a push plate is fixedly arranged between the two connecting rods, and a power mechanism is fixedly arranged in the storage cavity. According to the utility model, materials can be automatically added in the grinding process through the feeding mechanism, the manual workload is reduced, the automation degree is high, and the production efficiency is high.
column14: NANZHAO DINGHENG CALCIUM IND CO LTD

column12: Method and system for predicting optimal well position of fireflooding transfer injection well based on injection-production linkage
column13: The invention discloses a method and a system for predicting the optimal well position of a fireflooding transfer injection well based on injection-production linkage. The method comprises the following steps of: determining the optimal time of transfer of an exhaust well to a gas injection well and a main control engineering parameter value in a fireflooding process under an optimal mining effect by utilizing a fireflooding numerical model; under the condition of the value of the main control engineering parameter under the optimal mining effect and the optimal time of the exhaust well to the gas injection well, the corresponding recovery rates of the gas injection well at different positions are calculated through the fireflooding numerical model; and utilizing the optimal well position evaluation model of the transfer injection well to predict the optimal well spacing position of the transfer injection well. According to the method, the problem of predicting the well position of the transfer injection well when the oil reservoir production degree is improved is solved, the production time can be effectively prolonged, the engineering risk can be effectively reduced, the fireflooding efficiency can be fully improved, and reference is provided for optimizing the mining effect of actual mine field production.
column15: YUAN SHIBAO;;XU SHUNYI;;LI LEHONG;;JIANG HAIYAN;;SHEN ZHIBING

column12: Ore property analysis method and equipment based on sound signal processing
column13: The invention discloses an ore property analysis method and analysis equipment based on sound signal processing, and the method comprises the steps that a sound collection device collects a sample sound signal generated when ore falls to impact a metal plate in real time, and transmits the sample sound signal to an analysis processing device; the analysis processing device converts the received sample sound signal into a sound waveform file; the analysis processing device performs fast Fourier transform on the sound waveform file and draws an amplitude spectrogram of the sound signal; and thetime domain and frequency domain analysis are carried out on the sample sound signal based on the sound waveform file and the amplitude spectrogram so as to predict the property of the ore. The hardness and volume of fed ore can be analyzed in real time, so that the operation state of an ore grinding system can be correspondingly adjusted to improve the operation efficiency.
column15: XIE QIYUE;;ZHONG-CAI FENGYAO;;SHEN ZHONGLI;;LIU DAIFEI;;PENG LIANG;;FU QIANG
