column12: Network traffic data filling method, device and equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention discloses a network traffic data filling method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps: carrying out the modeling of network traffic data into a three-dimensional original tensor, deeply mining the periodic features between the network traffic data, and reflecting the multi-dimensional features of the network traffic data; except regression and CPdecomposition are combined to construct a loss function, accurate recovery of data can be carried out in a targeted mode by selecting a set weight w, and accurate recovery of elephant flow data is achieved. Meanwhile, Execut regression can describe the central characteristics of the data and can describe the tail characteristics of the data, the full-view characteristics of the data are reflected,and the problem that local characteristics of all parts of the data cannot be described through a traditional method is solved; according to the method, the factor matrix is updated according to thenon-negative matrix factorization algorithm and Except regression, in the updating process, it is not needed to calculate an inverse matrix of the matrix like an ALS algorithm, it is also not needed to repeatedly balance an appropriate learning step length like an SGD algorithm, and the calculation complexity is greatly reduced.

column12: Mining explosion-proof lithium ion storage battery
column13: The invention relates to a mining explosion-proof lithium ion storage battery, and aims to solve the problems that a lithium ion battery in the prior art is easy to fire and explode, and is lack of battery state detection, battery state estimation, battery safety protection, battery energy control and information management of the storage battery. The battery pack comprises a battery module and a power supply output terminal, the current sensor is connected in series between the battery module and the power supply output terminal and is used for acquiring a total current signal of the battery module; the voltage acquisition module is electrically connected with the battery module and is used for acquiring voltage data of the battery module; the temperature acquisition module is electrically connected with the battery module and is used for acquiring temperature data of the battery module; and the BCU is electrically connected with the current sensor, the voltage acquisition module and the temperature acquisition module and is used for monitoring and controlling the state of the battery module according to the total current signal, the voltage data and the temperature data of the battery module.
column14: CHENGDU TIANDI ZHIFANG ENGINE CO LTD;;SHANXI TIANDI COAL MINING MACHINERY CO LTD;;JIANGXI ZHIFANG NUMERICAL CONTROL POWER CO LTD

column12: Crushing and plug cleaning system for draw shaft
column13: The utility model discloses a breaking and plug cleaning system for a draw shaft, which is characterized in that a remote control operation platform (1) is communicated with underground equipment through an optical fiber backbone network and an optical fiber switch, and the underground equipment comprises a breaking and plug cleaning positioning identification camera (2), a breaking and plug cleaning guide controller (3) and a multifunctional breaking and plug cleaning machine (4). The crushing and plug cleaning positioning recognition camera (2) sends a positioning recognition result to the crushing and plug cleaning guide controller (3) through a gigabit network; the crushing and plug cleaning guide controller (3) plans an optimal operation path by adopting an algorithm in combination with the state and the position of the large ore and drives the multifunctional crushing and plug cleaning machine to perform real-time crushing and plug cleaning operation through a CAN bus interface; the plug breaking and cleaning positioning identification camera (2) is connected with the plug breaking and cleaning guide controller (3) through a high-speed Gige gigabit network so as to realize high-speed transmission of image data and positioning result data; and the crushing and plug cleaning guide controller (3) sends control data to the multifunctional crushing and plug cleaning machine (4) through a CAN bus interface.
column14: SHENZHEN AOSHI DEBEI TECH CO LTD

column12: Liquid level control system of vertical-ring high-gradient magnetic separator
column13: The invention provides a liquid level control system of a vertical-ring high-gradient magnetic separator. The vertical-ring high-gradient magnetic separator comprises a beneficiation cavity, a tailinghopper and a liquid level box, wherein the tailing hopper is communicated with the liquid level box through a liquid level sampling pipe, the beneficiation cavity is provided with a raw ore pipe provided with a raw ore valve, and the tailing hopper is provided with a tailing pipe provided with a tailing valve. The liquid level control system comprises a raw ore branch, a tailing branch, a liquidlevel sensor and a controller, wherein the raw ore branch is connected with the raw ore pipe in parallel, the tailing branch is connected with the tailing pipe in parallel, the liquid level sensor isa non-contact sensor and is installed above the liquid level box, and valves are arranged on the raw ore branch and the tailing branch; and the valves and the liquid level sensor are electrically connected with the controller. The problem that a liquid level control system is adopted on the vertical-ring high-gradient magnetic separator is solved, the operation difficulty of liquid level control operators is lowered, the automation degree and the control precision of liquid level control are improved, and therefore, the ore dressing efficiency and the concentrate recovery rate of the vertical-ring high-gradient magnetic separator are improved.
column14: YUEYANG DALISHEN ELECTROMAGNETIC MACHINERY CO LTD

column12: Shale oil reservoir exploration data acquisition system based on distributed optical fiber sensing
column13: The utility model provides a shale oil reservoir exploration data acquisition system based on distributed optical fiber sensing. Comprising a ground single-component or three-component seismic data acquisition instrument, a ground artificial excitation seismic source, in-well distributed optical fiber sensing armored optical cables, in-well and ground seismic data acquisition vehicles and a distributed optical fiber sensing modulation-demodulation instrument, wherein the in-well distributed optical fiber sensing armored optical cables are arranged in a whole well section outside a sleeve and an oil pipe. Fine depiction of the shale oil reservoir is achieved through all-dimensional high-density well-ground combined mining three-dimensional seismic data, amplitude-preserving well flooding processing and high-resolution reservoir structure imaging, and sweet spot area distribution of the shale oil reservoir is predicted and evaluated through rock physical parameters of shale oil rock cores and various seismic attribute parameters. The underground armored optical cable is utilized to realize long-term dynamic monitoring of a liquid production profile of a production well and a water absorption profile of a water injection well, shale oil reservoir and fluid fine modeling and simulation, discover residual and residual shale oil, optimize deployment of a horizontal well and an optimal fracturing development production scheme, improve the recovery efficiency and reduce the production cost of the shale oil.

column12: Liquid level control system of vertical ring high-gradient magnetic separator
column13: The utility model provides a liquid level control system of a vertical ring high gradient magnetic separator, the vertical ring high gradient magnetic separator comprises a beneficiation cavity, a tailing hopper and a liquid level box, the tailing hopper is communicated with the liquid level box through a liquid level sampling pipe, the beneficiation cavity is provided with a raw ore pipe providedwith a raw ore valve, and the tailing hopper is provided with a tailing pipe provided with a tailing valve. The liquid level control system comprises a raw ore branch, a tailing branch, a liquid level sensor and a controller, the raw ore branch is connected with the raw ore pipe in parallel, the tailing branch is connected with the tailing pipe in parallel, the liquid level sensor is a non-contact sensor and is installed above the liquid level box, and valves are arranged on the raw ore branch and the tailing branch; and the valve and the liquid level sensor are both electrically connected with the controller. The vertical ring high-gradient magnetic separator breaks through the problem when a liquid level control system is adopted on the vertical ring high-gradient magnetic separator, reduces the operation difficulty of liquid level control operators, improves the liquid level control automation degree and control precision, and accordingly improves the ore dressing efficiency and the ore concentrate recovery rate of the vertical ring high-gradient magnetic separator.

column12: Tailing crushing device for production of self-heat-preservation foam light building blocks
column13: The utility model discloses a tailing crushing device for producing self-insulation foam light building blocks, which is characterized in that an ore bucket touches the ground through a force sensor, the force sensor is suitable for being electrically connected with a controller, a blanking port of the ore bucket is provided with an opening and closing structure, one end of a transfer conveyor belt is suitable for receiving ores falling from the ore bucket, and one end of a storage bucket body is closed; the feeding conveying belt is matched with the bottom of the storage hopper body, the end of the storage hopper body is suitable for receiving batch ore falling from the other end of the transferring conveying belt, and the pulverizer is suitable for receiving the ore flowing out of the discharging opening and pulverizing the ore. The batch receiving buffer long hopper can buffer the tailings weighed in a single batch, so that the ore weighing machine can continuously weigh the tailings batch by batch; and the batch receiving buffer long hopper can also drive the tailings of the same batch to be poured into the crusher, so that the crusher continuously crushes the tailings batch by batch.

column12: XRT EQUIPMENT AUDITING SYSTEM AND METHOD OF USING SAME
column13: Simulants or Tracers (20) for XRT equipment (8), commonly used in valuable mineral or gemstone processing and sorting, are disclosed. The invention also extends to an XRT equipment auditing system (10) and a method of using simulants or tracers (20) in said system. The invention further extends to a process monitoring method which uses such simulants or tracers (20) to monitor the efficiency of a valuable mineral or gemstone recovery process in which valuable minerals or gemstones are recovered from their ores.

column12: PCB assembly line side edge grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a PCB assembly line side edge grinding machine which comprises an equipment body, lifting supports are arranged on the two sides of the equipment body respectively, first lifting air cylinders are arranged at the bottom ends of the lifting supports, a grinding platform is arranged on the end face of the equipment body, a plurality of vacuum suction cups are arranged in the grinding platform, and the vacuum suction cups are arranged on the vacuum suction cups. A grinding device is arranged on the lifting support, a rotating device is arranged at the bottom end of the grinding platform, a second lifting device is arranged below the rotating device, a vertically-upward baffle is arranged on the end face, surrounding the grinding platform, of the equipment body, and a dust suction opening is formed in the position, corresponding to the inner side of the baffle, of the end face of the equipment body. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that: the utility model does not need to manually carry out reversing rotation on the PCB when in use, has the automation effect, reduces the flying of chippings at the same time, and maintains a better working environment.
column14: JIANSHAN SCIENCE AND TELEELECTRICITY TECH CO LTD

column12: Natural gas hydrate reservoir seepage visualization test device and use method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a natural gas hydrate reservoir seepage visualization test device which comprises a test space, and a molding part and a simulation test part are arranged in the test space. The molding part comprises a frame, the top end of the frame is fixedly connected with a mold pressing assembly, and a mold cavity is formed below the mold pressing assembly; an oblique angle delta is arranged at the bottom end of the mold pressing assembly; the simulation test part comprises a test cavity, and two ends of the test cavity respectively communicate with a fluid supply assembly and a fluid recovery assembly; the fluid supply assembly is provided with a first sensor, the fluid recovery assembly is provided with a second sensor, and the first sensor and the second sensor are electrically connected with a data collection assembly; and a shooting device is arranged in front of the test cavity and electrically connected with the data collection assembly. The device is simple in structure and high in practicability, various conditions of the natural gas hydrate reservoir can be effectively simulated, theoretical and data support is provided for research on the seepage mechanism of the natural gas hydrate, and a safe mining method for research on the natural gas hydrate is accelerated.
column15: GONG BIN;;JIANG YUJING;;ZHANG RUIQI;;NASSAR GORSANAMI;;LI YANLONG;;BI YANXU

column12: Intelligent blockage removing system for mine aggregate production line
column13: The invention relates to an intelligent blockage removing system for a mine aggregate production line, and belongs to the technical field of mining equipment. The intelligent blockage removing system comprises a blockage AI detection and analysis system and a blockage removing device. The AI detection and analysis system comprises a plurality of projection type photoelectric devices, a positioning image system, an image recognition sensor and a PLC. A delay detection program is arranged in the PLC, the projection type photoelectric devices are arranged at two easily-blocked points, namely a discharging pit outlet and a jaw crusher discharging position of the mine aggregate production line respectively to conduct blockage positioning detection, the blockage removing device is controlled to be started by the PLC, and meanwhile, the PLC conducts interlocking control on a bar feeding machine to stop feeding action. The designed intelligent blockage removing system for the mine aggregate production line can intelligently recognize the blockage condition of the easily-blocked points of the production line, automatic control is conducted to remove blockage and stop feeding, and timely treatment is realized.

column12: Automatic edge grinding machine
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of glass edge grinding processing, in particular to an automatic edge grinding machine. An automatic edge grinding machine comprises an edge grinding machine rack, a main controller, a conveying part, an edge grinding part and a water return part. The conveying part comprises a fourth servo motor, a first synchronous belt wheel, a second synchronous belt wheel and a suction cup set, and the first synchronous belt wheel and the second synchronous belt wheel are both rotationally connected with the edge grinding machine rack. The specific position of the glass sample can be recognized, the edge grinding part can grind the periphery of the glass sample, the water return part can adsorb residual water on the surface of the glass, and compared with the prior art, the edge grinding machine has the advantages that the automation degree is higher, the suction cup plane precision is higher, no water stain is left on the surface of the glass, and photographing positioning application is more mature.
column14: DONGGUAN BAIRONGSEN MACHINERY EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Non-metallic ore superfine grinding high-end intelligent production line
column13: The utility model provides a non-metallic ore superfine grinding high-end intelligent production line, and belongs to the technical field of material grinding production equipment. The problems that an existing material grinding production line is complex in process and high in energy consumption are solved. The non-metallic ore superfine grinding high-end intelligent production line comprises a feeding system, a grinding system, a dust collecting system, a material returning system and a control system, the grinding system comprises a vertical grinding machine, and the dust collecting system comprises a dust collector, a first dust collecting pipe set and a second dust collecting pipe set provided with a grinding fan. Two ends of the first dust collecting pipe group are respectively connected with an overflow port of the vertical mill and a first dust collecting port of the dust collector; two ends of the second dust collecting pipe group are respectively connected with an air inlet of the vertical mill and a second dust collecting port of the dust collector; the material returning system is connected with a material returning connector of the vertical mill and used for conveying returned materials to the feeding system again. The device is simple and compact in structure and high in automation degree, the production efficiency is improved, the energy consumption can be greatly reduced, and the production cost is lower.
column14: HENAN YULONG PREC MACHINERY EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURING CO LTD

column12: Cone crusher cavity type parameter optimization method based on EDEM
column13: The invention discloses a cone crusher cavity type parameter optimization method based on an EDEM. The method comprises the following specific steps: establishing an assembly model of a movable cone lining plate and a fixed cone lining plate of the cone crusher; establishing simulation of the crushing process of the cone crusher based on an EDEM; analyzing a result of the simulation of the EDEM; and determining the ore crushing efficiency of the crusher and the wear rate of the lining plate under different cavity type parameters. Therefore, the purpose of optimizing the cavity type parameters of the cone crusher is achieved. Cavity type parameters of the cone crusher are optimized by means of EDEM software, the ore crushing efficiency of the crusher is reflected by means of the fracture condition of bond keys, the strength required by a lining plate material is analyzed according to the surface pressure distribution state of a movable cone and a fixed cone, the surface pressure change conditions of the movable cone and the fixed cone lining plate under different cavity type parameters are compared, and the ore crushing efficiency of the crusher is improved. And then the abrasion rate of the lining plate is reflected, so that the optimal cavity type parameter is obtained, the ore breaking efficiency is continuously improved, and an intuitive and reliable method is provided for optimizing the cavity type parameter of the cone crusher.
column14: ANSTEEL GROUP MINING IND CO LTD
column15: YAN HONGTAO;;ZHANG KEMING;;WANG YONGJIN;;YANG GUANG;;QI HAILONG;;HAN RUIZHI

column12: Low-code platform data transmission method based on BI platform
column13: The invention relates to the field of data transmission methods, in particular to a low-code platform data transmission method based on a BI platform. Firstly, source data is processed and deeply mined through a BI platform, and the data is converted into an intelligent analysis report according to classification, so that the data relationship of the source data is more visual. And then the cross-platform data exchange channel analyzes and detects the processed data to ensure the safety and reliability of the data. And finally, the low-code platform transmits and converts the intelligent analysis report through codes to obtain data and a data relationship. Through the combination of the BI platform and the low-code platform, the universality and convenience of the low-code platform are ensured, deep mining of the data relationship is realized, the data value is improved, and meanwhile, the security of data transmission is also ensured.
column14: BEIJING GUQI DATA TECH CO LTD

column12: ROBOTIC SYSTEM WITH GRIPPING MECHANISM
column13: A robotic system is provided. The robotic system may include an end-effector configured for grasping an object, a sensor unit monitoring contact information received from the contact limit sensor, and a controller, coupled to the sensor unit. The end-effector may include a suction cup assembly for engaging the object, and a contact limit sensor for detecting a pressure associated with the engagement between the suction cup assembly and the object, wherein the contact limit sensor transmits contact information when the contact limit sensor detects the pressure exceeding a contact threshold. The controller may execute an operation for controlling the end-effector to limit movement of the end-effector toward the object based on the contact information received to prevent damage to the object.

column12: Rare earth ion migration simulation method based on nuclear magnetic resonance imaging
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of rare earth ion migration, and provides a rare earth ion migration simulation method based on nuclear magnetic resonance imaging, which comprises the following steps: step 1, obtaining an ionic rare earth ore body sample; 2, acquiring a pore structure image of the ionic rare earth ore body sample based on a nuclear magnetic resonance imaging technology; 3, preprocessing the pore structure image and generating a two-dimensional geometric model; and 4, simulating the rare earth ion migration process by utilizing multi-physics field coupling software, importing the two-dimensional geometric model into COMSOL Multiphysics multi-physics field coupling software, and simulating the rare earth ion migration process by adopting a seepage control equation, an ion exchange reaction control equation and a solute migration control equation. According to the method, the ionic rare earth digital model with real size, shape, seepage channel and pore proportion and distribution under the microscopic scale can be constructed, and the simulation accuracy of the rare earth ion migration process is improved.
column15: RAO YUNZHANG;;WANG DAN;;WU FUYU;;XU WEI;;ZHANG MEIDAO;;WU HONG;;ZHANG SHIJIA;;TAN SHUJUN

column12: Heat recovery type cup base heating system and vehicle
column13: The utility model relates to a heat recovery type cup base heating system and a vehicle. The heat recovery type cup base heating system comprises an information input module and a temperature control module. The information input module comprises a first temperature sensor, the first temperature sensor is configured to sense the first temperature of high-temperature cooling liquid for cooling an engine, and the information input module transmits the first temperature to the temperature control module. The temperature control module comprises a BCM unit, a second temperature sensor, an electromagnetic valve unit and a heat exchanger unit, and the second temperature sensor is configured to sense the second temperature of the surface of the water cup and feed the second temperature back to the BCM unit; the BCM unit is configured to determine the opening degree of the electromagnetic valve unit according to the first temperature and the second temperature so as to adjust the flow of the cooling liquid flowing into the heat exchanger unit.
column14: UNIVERSAL AUTOMOBILE LTD COMPANY;;GENERAL ASIA AUTOMOBILE TECH CENTER CO LTD

column12: Omnibearing detection mechanical arm of mining robot
column13: The invention relates to the field of mining robots, in particular to an omni-directional detection mechanical arm of a mining robot. Comprising crawler-type wheels and a frame, and further comprises a rotating assembly located above the frame; the detection mechanical arm is located at the end, away from the rotating assembly, of the mechanical arm supporting column; the force storage assembly is located in the detection mechanical arm; the launching assembly is located on the side, close to the mechanical arm supporting column, of the force storage assembly, and the recovery assembly is located above the detection mechanical arm and connected with the detection mechanical arm; according to the device, the detection mechanical arm, the rotating assembly, the force storage assembly, the transmitting assembly, the recovery assembly and the like are arranged, so that places with problems of water permeation, poor road conditions, narrow corners and the like are detected, technical personnel can obtain timely data, and the detection efficiency is improved. And the mine safety is ensured.

column12: Experimental device and method for monitoring porosity and permeability changes of ore bed
column13: The invention provides an experimental device and method for monitoring porosity and permeability changes of an ore bed, and the method comprises the following steps: a containing box is arranged on the side wall of a shading camera obscura in a penetrating and sealing manner, and a CCD camera and a constant light source are arranged on the two sides of the containing box respectively and directly face the two side walls of the containing box respectively, and located on the inner side and the outer side of the shading camera obscura respectively, and light-transmitting parts are arranged on the side walls, corresponding to the CCD camera and the constant light sources respectively, of the containing box; a constant light source and a CCD camera are started; a leaching agent is introduced into the containing box; the CCD camera obtains transmission light information and keeps an open state until the seepage simulation motion is finished; the data processing mechanism processes the experimental data to establish a fluid saturation model, an image of the light intensity value changing along with the time and a relational expression between the light intensity value and the fluid saturation are obtained, then the change rule of the fluid saturation along with the time is obtained, and according to the relational expression between the permeability and the fluid saturation and the relational expression between the porosity and the fluid saturation, the spatio-temporal evolution law of the porosity and permeability of the ore bed is finally obtained.

column12: POWER SYSTEM IN A MINING MACHINE
column13: The present disclosure relates to a power system (100) in a mining machine (10) configured to perform an at least partly stationary, high power operation driving one or more electrically powered tools (12) of the mining machine. The power system is arranged to provide electrical power to the one or more electrically powered tools. The power system comprises an energy storage system (120), an energy management system (130), and a distribution board (140). The energy storage system (120) comprises a plurality of exchangeable energy sources (122a-d) configured for recharging when detached from the mining machine. The distribution board (140) comprises a plurality of contactors (142a-d). One or more contactors are arranged to control a connection between the energy sources and the one or more electrically powered tools. The energy management system is configured to control operation of the distribution board. The present disclosure also relates to corresponding mining machines.

column12: PMU data recovery method and system based on enhanced time sequence mode attention
column13: The invention discloses a PMU data recovery method and system based on enhanced time sequence mode attention, and the method comprises the steps: employing optimal variational mode decomposition to extract features for PMU data to be recovered, carrying out the normalization, inputting the features into a network model which combines ETPA and LSTM, obtaining a hidden state vector through the LSTM, and constructing a hidden state matrix; carrying out convolution on the hidden state matrix to obtain a time sequence mode matrix, and transforming the matrix to obtain an enhanced time sequence mode matrix; performing weighted summation on each row of the enhanced time sequence mode matrix based on the attention weight to obtain a weighted sum; weighting the weighted sum and the hidden state vector into a hidden state vector, calculating and outputting the hidden state vector, and inputting the output into a full connection layer to obtain recovered PMU data. The invention aims to improve the capability of mining the correlation between the data of the PMU data sample and realize more accurate PMU data recovery.

column12: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR COOKING RICE
Method for evaluating explosion pressure of sulphide ore dust
column13: The invention discloses a method for evaluating the explosion pressure of sulphide ore dust, which comprises the following steps of: 1, preparing sulphide ore dust, measuring the explosion pressure, calculating a reducing component index, and drawing a sulphide ore dust explosion pressure judgment graph in combination with the concentration of the sulphide ore dust; 2, collecting a sulphide ore dust sample and measuring the concentration; 3, detecting and obtaining element components of the sulphide ore dust sample, calculating negative ion components participating in explosion, and then calculating a reduction component index; and 4, predicting and evaluating the explosion pressure of the sulphide ore dust by referring to the sulphide ore dust explosion pressure judgment graph according to the sulphide ore dust concentration result and the reducing component index. According to the method, the relationship between the sulphide ore dust explosion pressure and sulphide ore dust concentration and reducing component indexes is researched, the sulphide ore dust explosion pressure judgment graph is drawn, sulphide ore dust is sampled, measured and substituted into the graph for explosion pressure prediction evaluation, the evaluation result is reliable and stable, the process condition is mild, the method is simple and easy to implement, and a detonation process is not needed; and the method is suitable for production sites.
column15: LI ZIJUN;;XU YUANYUAN;;XU YU;;LI RONGRONG;;HAN ZIQING;;ZHANG MENGSHENG;;WANG JUNJIAN

column12: Preparation method of weathering steel for iron tower
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of alloy material preparation, and provides a preparation method of weathering resistant steel for an iron tower, which comprises the following steps: taking laterite-nickel ore as a raw material for preparing a nickel-iron alloy, crushing and screening the laterite-nickel ore, and conveying the crushed and screened laterite-nickel ore to a rotary drying kiln for drying treatment; coke is used as a reducing agent, lime is used as a cosolvent, and the dried laterite-nickel ore, the reducing agent and the cosolvent are conveyed to a rotary kiln to be subjected to baking-pre-reduction treatment; transferring the material subjected to baking-pre-reduction treatment into an electric arc furnace for smelting to obtain a nickel-iron alloy liquid, and adjusting the position of an electrode in real time according to characteristic analysis results of current density, temperature and electrode resistance data in the smelting stage of the electric arc furnace to obtain the nickel-iron alloy liquid which is sufficiently smelted; and refining and casting the nickel-iron alloy liquid to obtain the weathering steel for iron tower preparation. According to the method, the electrode position in the nickel-iron alloy smelting stage is subjected to self-adaptive adjustment, and the preparation quality of the weathering resistant steel is improved.
column14: QINGDAO HAIHUI TOWER MACH CO LTD

column12: Online detection system for intelligent material detection ball mill operation state and control method
column13: The invention provides an online detection system for the running state of an intelligent material detection ball mill and a control method, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. The system comprises a feeding belt conveyor, a water pipe, an electromagnetic valve, an ore grinding medium supplementing device, an intelligent material, an ore grinding medium, a wireless base station, an expert control system and an upper computer, an acceleration sensor is arranged in the intelligent material and connected with a microprocessor, wireless base stations are installed at a feeding port and a discharging port of the ore grinding machine, and an expert control system is connected with an upper computer. In the ore grinding process of the ball mill, intelligent materials move along with ore grinding media and ore, the acceleration sensor detects acceleration signals of the intelligent materials and inputs the acceleration signals to the microprocessor, the microprocessor conducts spectral analysis on the signals and outputs the signals to the expert control system and the upper computer, and the upper computer conducts stress analysis and inputs the stress analysis to the expert control system. The method can realize on-line detection and load control of the running state of the ball mill, is accurate, feasible and high in practicability, can be used for automatic control of the ore mill, and realizes energy conservation and consumption reduction.

column12: Non-ferrous metal mineral flotation chemical pretreatment method
column13: The invention discloses a non-ferrous metal mineral flotation chemical pretreatment method. The method comprises the steps that S1, to-be-treated ore pulp is obtained; s2, the ore pulp is subjected to acid adding treatment, the PH value of the ore pulp reaches 6.8-2, and stirring is conducted to make the ore pulp fully react; s3, alkali adding treatment is conducted on the ore pulp obtained after acid adding treatment, and the PH value of the ore pulp is 6-10; and S4, a flotation reagent is added into the ore pulp, and follow-up flotation treatment is carried out. Through small laboratory data analysis of a certain gold ore, compared with original flotation beneficiation treatment, the pretreatment method has the advantages that the gold grade in the tailings is reduced by about 0.2 g/t after the tailings are treated by the pretreatment method under the same flotation reagent use and the same flotation condition, and the gold grade in the tailings is reduced by about 0.2 g/t through conversion according to the current gold price; the recovery benefit of each ton of tailings reaches about dozens of yuan, and the economic benefit is obvious.
column14: YITAI JINTAI MINERAL SEPARATION LTD COMPANY

column12: Soft measurement method and device for overflow fineness of hydrocyclone, electronic equipment and medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a soft measurement method and device for overflow fineness of a hydrocyclone, electronic equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: determining an overflow fineness mechanism model of the hydrocyclone according to an ore grinding process mechanism; an overflow fineness compensation model of the hydrocyclone is determined in a data driving mode; determining an overflow fineness distribution interval according to a pre-constructed hydrocyclone overflow fineness evaluation model; and according to the overflow fineness distribution interval, the hydrocyclone overflow fineness of the hydrocyclone overflow fineness mechanism model and the overflow fineness compensation value of the hydrocyclone overflow fineness compensation model, the final overflow fineness of the hydrocyclone is obtained. Therefore, the accuracy and the detection speed of the final overflow fineness of the hydrocyclone can be improved, and real-time prediction of the overflow fineness in the ore grinding and grading process of a conventional ball mill and the hydrocyclone is realized.

column12: Gravel crushing device with screening mechanism
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of ore production, in particular to a gravel crushing device with a screening mechanism, the upper side of a first crushing box communicates with a feeding hopper, a first crushing mechanism is arranged in the first crushing box, the lower side of the first crushing box communicates with a second crushing box, and a second crushing mechanism is arranged in the second crushing box; the lower side of the second smashing box communicates with a screening box, and the two sides of the bottom of the screening box are fixedly connected with two concave frames which are vertically and symmetrically arranged. By arranging the first crushing mechanism and the second crushing mechanism, multi-stage crushing processing of gravel is achieved, the crushing processing quality is improved, a screen plate and a vibration motor are arranged to screen the gravel, the gravel particle uniformity is improved, the feeding mechanism is arranged to guide unqualified materials into the feeding hopper again for repeated processing, the automation degree is higher, and the production efficiency is improved. And the dust removal mechanism is arranged to achieve the dust removal effect, and water resources are saved.

column12: Beet sample solution automatic preparation device
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic preparation device for a beet sample solution. The device comprises a rack, a sample cup supporting plate arranged on the rack, a sample cup arranged on the sample cup supporting plate on the rack, a chain conveying mechanism arranged on the sample cup supporting plate on the rack and used for driving the sample cup to move forwards, and a sampling position, a dosing position and a grinding and stirring position which are sequentially arranged on the rack from front to back, a sample weighing precision balance is arranged at the position, at the sampling position notch, of the rack, a first pneumatic lifting platform is arranged at the lower end of the sample weighing precision balance, a dosing weighing precision balance is arranged at the position, at the dosing position notch, of the rack, and a second pneumatic lifting platform is arranged at the lower end of the dosing weighing precision balance. A dosing mechanism is arranged on the portion, over the dosing position, of the rack, an automatic grinding stirrer is arranged on the portion, over the grinding and stirring position, of the rack, and the automatic grinding stirrer is connected with a lifting driving air cylinder. The automatic beet sample preparation device can automatically prepare a minced beet sample into a sample solution, and is high in automation level and sample preparation efficiency.

column12: Pet food mincing device and mincing method thereof
column13: The invention relates to a pet food mincing device and a mincing method thereof, which are used for solving the problem that the existing pet food treatment effect is poor. The mashing method at least can be applied to the pet food mashing device, the pet food mashing device comprises a cup body and a cup cover, the cup cover is provided with a mashing assembly and a camera shooting assembly, and the mashing method comprises the steps that the closing action that the cup cover closes the cup body is obtained according to a closing detection assembly, and the camera shooting assembly is started according to the closing action; image data in the cup body is obtained through the camera shooting assembly; performing image analysis on the image data, and determining object related information of the to-be-processed target object; according to the object related information of the target object, determining a processing strategy of the crushing assembly; and according to the processing strategy, the smashing assembly is controlled so as to process the target object.

column12: Mining explosion-proof lithium ion battery system with multiple power supplies connected in series and in parallel
column13: The utility model provides a mining explosion-proof lithium ion battery system with multiple power supplies connected in series and in parallel, which comprises a mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supply, an explosion-proof power supply box, a built-in lithium ion battery pack, a battery management system, a relay, a fuse and a current sensor, the general control box is internally providedwith a battery management system, a low-voltage lead-acid power supply, a DCDC module power supply and a relay; the master control box and the mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supplies automatically judge whether the positions of the mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supplies in the system architecture are connected in series or in parallel according to address codes, and thereforecoordinated control is conducted on the mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supplies. The main control box communicates with the whole vehicle, reports information of the mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supplies to the whole vehicle, and controls the mining explosion-proof lithium ion power supplies to work according to an instruction of the whole vehicle; the utility model has the advantages of fault tolerance design and high system stability.

column12: Full-automatic grinding and milling production line
column13: The utility model discloses a full-automatic grinding and milling production line which comprises a feeding mechanism, and a conveying device, a feeding robot device used for visual inspection and positioning and a suction cup carrying manipulator are sequentially arranged from the feeding end to the discharging end of the feeding mechanism. The transferring module device is arranged at the discharging end of the feeding mechanism, a plurality of CNC grinding devices are arranged in the moving direction of the transferring module device, and the transferring module device is used for transferring the glass workpieces between stations on the front CNC grinding device and the rear CNC grinding device; after being detected and positioned by the feeding robot device, a glass workpiece is sucked and transferred to the transfer module device by the suction cup carrying manipulator, so that the glass workpiece is processed by a plurality of process procedures, the purpose of full automation of the processing technology of the vehicle-mounted glass is achieved, and the effects of high efficiency, high precision and reduction of labor intensity are achieved.

column12: Vacuum cup polishing equipment
column13: The utility model discloses vacuum cup polishing equipment, which relates to the technical field of automation and comprises a conveying mechanism, a polishing mechanism and a polishing mechanism. The robot terminal executing mechanism is located on one side of the conveying mechanism. A clamping device is arranged at one end of the robot terminal executing mechanism and used for clamping and loosening the vacuum cup. The polishing mechanism is located on the other side of the conveying mechanism. A first motor, a rotating wheel, a grinding belt and an adjusting device are arranged at the top of the polishing mechanism. The output end of the first motor is connected with the rotating wheel, one end of the grinding belt surrounds the outer edge of the rotating wheel, the other end of the grinding belt is connected with the adjusting device, and the adjusting device is used for tensioning abrasive cloth. During use, manual work is replaced, full-process automatic polishing of the cup body is achieved, the production efficiency is improved, the cost caused by manual operation is reduced, actions are automatically completed through machinery, errors caused by manual operation are reduced, and therefore the yield is improved.

column12: Mining mass data rapid buffering method
column13: The invention relates to a mining mass data rapid buffering method, and belongs to the field of data processing. The method comprises the following steps: S1, acquiring an MAC address at the first time after switch equipment is normally started; S2, confirming the type of the network equipment according to the MAC; S3, confirming the number of corresponding buffer areas according to the type number of the MAC address confirmation data exchange; S4, confirming a buffer space of each type of data according to MAC address type characteristics; S5, calculating each type of data buffer space; S6, numbering plates of the buffer space, wherein each plate has a unique mark number; S7, marking timestamps on the data of the corresponding types, and putting the data into the buffer areas of the corresponding plates; and S8, according to the sequence of the timestamps, carrying out data exchange on the whole plate. According to the invention, the buffer area of the switching equipment is managed as a whole, and the switching data is judged, so that the massive data can be cached and converted in a whole plate manner.

column12: Edge grinding machine for plywood
column13: The utility model discloses an edge grinding machine for plywood, which comprises a machine frame, a grinding mechanism is arranged above the machine frame, and the grinding mechanism comprises a main arm, an electric telescopic rod A, a sliding block, a lifting arm, an electric telescopic rod B, a motor A, a cross A, a cross B, a suction cup and the like. An electric telescopic rod B is arranged, the electric telescopic rod B extends to drive a cross A to be close to a cross B, the circular plywood is clamped under the action of a suction cup, a motor A is arranged, the motor A drives the cross B to rotate, the circular plywood is driven to rotate under the cooperation of the cross A, and the electric telescopic rod A drives a lifting arm to be close to a grinding component. The edge grinding effect of the plywood edge grinding machine on the circular plywood is ensured; and a motor B is arranged, the motor B drives a grinding roller to rotate, and an electric telescopic rod C drives the grinding roller to move, so that the whole corners of the plywood are automatically ground, and the automation degree of plywood grinding is improved.

column12: Screening device facilitating mineral crushing
column13: The utility model discloses a screening device convenient for mineral crushing, which comprises an operating platform, a control device for screening is rotatably arranged on the operating platform, a material receiving device is rotatably arranged on the operating platform, and a first driving device for driving the control device to rotate is fixed on one side of the operating platform. A second driving device used for driving the material receiving device to rotate is arranged on the other side of the material receiving device, a crushing device rotating in a control device is arranged on the second driving device, the control device comprises a rotating box, screening holes which are distributed in an array mode and are different in size are formed in the side wall of the rotating box, a feeding port is formed in the rotating box, and an opening and closing cover is rotationally arranged on the feeding port. According to the screening device, the first motor drives the rotating box to rotate, ore located in the rotating box is rotationally screened through the screening holes of different sizes, meanwhile, the second motor drives the net-shaped crushing cutter to circularly crush and screen the ore again, the structure is simple, the automation degree is high, fine screening can be achieved, and the screening efficiency is improved.

column12: Method for measuring dissociation degree of molybdenite
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of process mineralogy, and particularly relates to a method for measuring the dissociation degree of molybdenite. Comprising the following steps of ore grinding, grading, measurement of monomer dissociation degree, conversion of molybdenite and intergrowth leakage length, calculation of intergrowth type and the like. Measurement is closer to the actual condition of molybdenite, automatic mineralogy analysis is combined, interference of artificial subjective factors is avoided, and data are accurate.
