column12: Efficient environment-friendly ore finish machining production line
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of crushing equipment, and particularly discloses an efficient environment-friendly ore finish machining production line which comprises a feeding part, acrushing part, a screening part, a finished product bin and an excess material reprocessing part. The feeding part comprises a feeding bin, a dust removal device and a material blocking device are arranged in the feeding bin, and a first conveying part is arranged at the bottom of the feeding bin; the crushing part comprises a first crushing device and a second crushing device, and a discharging port of the first crushing device is connected to a feeding port of the second crushing device through a second conveying part; the screening part comprises an ore distribution box, and the ore distribution box is used for distributing ore materials to a plurality of vibrating screens; and oversize materials of the screening part are conveyed to the excess material reprocessing part through a conveying belt, the excess material reprocessing part comprises an excess material bin and a fourth conveying part, and a first sensor used for detecting the thickness of excess materials is arranged on the fourth conveying part. The production line has the beneficial effects of being environment-friendly, fine in ore processing and high in processing efficiency.
column14: JINAN LUPING BUILDING MAT CO LTD

column12: Mining area aquifer geochemical index database system construction method
column13: The invention discloses a mining area aquifer geochemical index database system construction method, and belongs to the field of mining area aquifer geochemical index analysis. The invention discloses a mining area aquifer geochemical index database system construction method. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring related chemical index parameters of a main aquifer water sample of a certain mining area, storing the related chemical index parameters in a table, and comprehensively analyzing each index in the system; importing local data into the system during analysis; inspecting the introduced single water sample to inspect whether the contents of zwitterions and cations are equal or not, and determining that the water sample is a qualified water sample if the contents are equal; selecting a single water sample in the system, carrying out water sample analysis on the single water sample, and analyzing the concentration ratio of each ion; performing water quality analysis on all the introduced water samples, and solving the minimum value, the maximum value, the average value and the standard deviation of each ion; the operation is simple, the practical application is easy, the accuracy is high, a simple and convenient operation platform is provided for geochemical index analysis of the main aquifer of the mining area, and the analysis efficiency of the aquifer of the mining area is improved.
column15: LI RU;;ZHU SHAOMENG;;LU HAIFENG;;NING MINGCHENG;;WANG TIANHAO

column12: Gravity feeding device of antimony ore crusher
column13: The gravity feeding device of the antimony ore crusher comprises a support, a feeding belt conveyor, the crusher and a buffer hopper, the buffer hopper is installed above the crusher in a suspended mode through the support, and a feeding port in the bottom of the buffer hopper is communicated with a feeding port of the crusher in a butt joint mode. A weighing sensor is arranged between the buffer hopper and the support, the feeding belt conveyor is communicated with a feeding port in the top of the buffer hopper, and the weighing sensor and the feeding belt conveyor are both electrically connected with a PLC. The gravity feeding device not only can reduce the labor intensity of workers, but also can effectively ensure that antimony ore feeding is always in a full state, and the treatment capacity of the whole ore crushing section is improved.

column12: Graph data compression method based on Boolean matrix decomposition
column13: The invention discloses a Boolean matrix decomposition-based graph data compression method, which specifically comprises the following steps of: splitting original graph data, expressing by using a self-center network, and reordering; expressing the sorted self-center network set by using an adjacent matrix to generate a sampling matrix; decomposing the sampling matrix into a product of a dictionary matrix and a sparse code matrix; performing Boolean atom mining; the atoms are linearly combined to obtain a sampling recovery matrix, and then according to a sampling node set obtained in the sampling stage, the edge connection relation between the nodes is recovered according to the sampling recovery matrix to obtain recovered graph data. According to the method, the dictionary matrix and the sparse code matrix which are obtained through matrix decomposition are constrained in a Boolean matrix decomposition mode, so that the dictionary matrix and the sparse code matrix are both Boolean matrixes, the error rate of graph data representation can be reduced, meanwhile, the accuracy of atoms obtained through representation is improved, and compression of graph data is achieved.

column12: Dispensing and hot-pressing integrated automation equipment and process for processing computer rear shell
column13: The invention discloses dispensing and hot-pressing integrated automation equipment and process for computer rear shell machining in the technical field of computer rear shell machining, the dispensing and hot-pressing integrated automation equipment comprises a machining body and dispensing equipment, a second fixing frame is fixedly mounted on the machining body, one end of the second fixing frame is rotationally connected with a threaded sleeve through a threaded rod, and a connecting plate is fixedly mounted on one side of the threaded sleeve; the connecting plate is slidably connected with the second fixing frame, a mounting pipe is fixedly mounted at the lower end of the threaded sleeve, a suction cup is fixedly mounted at the lower end of the mounting pipe, a driving gear is rotatably mounted on the mounting pipe, and a grinding ring is fixedly mounted at the lower end of the driving gear; the driving assembly is matched with the suction cup to drive the plastic plate to be embedded into the metal plate, the grinding ring is driven to rotate when the plastic plate makes contact with the embedding groove, the plastic plate is driven to move up and down through grinding rotation to grind and expand glue drops, the thickness of adhesive glue during bonding is reduced, the area of the adhesive glue is enlarged, and the bonding stability is improved.
column14: ZHEJIANG BOQIN PREC INDUSTRY CO LTD

column12: Method for rapidly identifying partition type of ion adsorption type rare earth ore in field
column13: The invention discloses a method for rapidly identifying partition types of ion adsorption type rare earth ores in the field. The method comprises the following steps: collecting ion adsorption type rare earth ore weathering crust samples in the field; preparing an ammonium sulfate solution with the concentration of 5% and an oxalic acid solution with the concentration of 3% by using distilled water; the method comprises the following steps: weighing a weathering crust sample, putting the weathering crust sample into a funnel pasted with filter paper, connecting a test tube with scales to the bottom of the funnel, adding 50ml of an ammonium sulfate solution into the funnel, and obtaining an ionic state rare earth solution in the test tube at the bottom; adding 3ml of an oxalic acid solution into the test tube filled with the ionic state rare earth solution, and fully shaking up to obtain an oxalic acid rare earth solution; filtering the rare earth oxalate solution to obtain rare earth oxalate; detecting rare earth oxalate on the filter paper to obtain the content of each rare earth element, and recording the numerical value of each rare earth element; and substituting the obtained content data of each rare earth element into a rare earth partition formula for calculation, and judging the partition type of the ion adsorption type rare earth ore according to a calculation result. According to the method, the efficiency of finding the ion adsorption type heavy rare earth ore in the field is improved.
column14: JIANGXI GEOLOGY BUREAU NO 7 GEOLOGICAL BRIGADE JIANGXI GEOLOGICAL BUREAU RARE EARTH APPLICATION RES
column15: PENG LINLIN;;CHEN BINFENG;;ZENG ZAILIN;;YANG BIN;;YANG XIONGTAO;;LI JIAZHEN;;MO HUOHUA;;ZHANG QING;;YANG XIN

column12: Automatic multifunctional composite magnetic separation equipment
column13: The invention provides automatic multifunctional composite magnetic separation equipment which comprises an ore feeding system, a magnetic separation and roughing system, a magnetic separation and concentration system, a magnetic separation and scavenging system and a collecting system, the magnetic separation and roughing system conducts roughing on raw ore to obtain first concentrate and first tailings, and the magnetic separation and concentration system conducts concentration on the first concentrate to obtain second concentrate and second tailings; and the magnetic roughing system scavenges the first tailings to obtain third concentrate and third tailings. According to the method, multi-stage separation of raw ore is achieved, the quality of magnetic concentrate is improved, and the recovery rate of magnetic minerals is increased; the problems that in the prior art, equipment is low in automation degree, poor in integration level, single in function, large in occupied area and the like are solved.
column14: PANZHIHUA IRON & STEEL RES INST PANGANG GROUP

column12: Horizontal shaft vibration protection device of gyratory crusher
column13: The utility model discloses a vibration protection device for a horizontal shaft of a gyratory crusher, belongs to the technical field of mining machinery, particularly relates to protection of the horizontal shaft of the gyratory crusher, and aims to overcome the defect that the horizontal shaft and a driving end are easy to break due to vibration, one end of the horizontal shaft is a gear end, and the other end of the horizontal shaft is a motor driving end. The system further comprises an on-line monitoring data acquisition module and a server, a first pulse sensor is arranged on a bearing seat at the gear end, a second pulse sensor is arranged at the motor driving end, the first pulse sensor is connected with the on-line monitoring data acquisition module through a first wire, and the second pulse sensor is connected with the server through a second wire. The second pulse sensor is connected with the on-line monitoring data acquisition module through a second wire, and the on-line monitoring data acquisition module is connected with the server through a signal line. The vibration difference is obtained through calculation, analysis and comparison on the server, when the difference is too large, an alarm is given, meanwhile, related personnel are warned to close the host, and the purpose of protecting the horizontal shaft is achieved.
column15: LI HAILIN;;QING QIUFU;;SHI YUNFEI;;RAN SIMING;;WANG XINYUE

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATED ROCK RECOGNITION
column13: Methods and systems for rock recognition are provided. In one embodiment, a method comprises: receiving or generating, at one or more computing systems, data comprising at least one drilling variable for a plurality of drilled holes across observations at a plurality of depths, wherein the at least one drilling variable is a variable affected by at least one physical characteristic of rock in the plurality of drilled holes; determining, by the one or more computing systems, a plurality of characteristic measures for each of the plurality of drilled holes, wherein the plurality of characteristic measures for each drilled hole comprise: at least one characteristic measure of a first type, wherein a characteristic measure of the first type is a measure based on a comparison of a distribution of a said at least one drilling variable for the drill hole with a distribution of a related or the same drilling variable across a plurality of the drilled holes; and at least one characteristic measure of a second type, wherein a characteristic measure of the second type is based on said at least one drilling variable across the plurality of depths of the drilled hole; applying, by the one or more computing systems, unsupervised learning to the plurality of characteristic measures, the unsupervised learning determining groups of the drilled holes; and generating, by the one or more computing systems, an output indicating the determined groups of the drilled holes.
column32: HANG ZHOU ; PETER HATHERLY ; SILDOMAR T. MONTEIRO ; FABIO RAMOS ; FLORIAN OPPOLZER ; ERIC NETTLETON ; STEVE SCHEDING: "Automatic rock recognition from drilling performance data", ROBOTICS AND AUTOMATION (ICRA), 2012 IEEE INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON, IEEE, 14 May 2012 (2012-05-14), pages 3407 - 3412, XP032194340, ISBN: 978-1-4673-1403-9, DOI: 10.1109/ICRA.2012.6224745

column12: Terrestrial heat utilization system and method
column13: The invention discloses a terrestrial heat utilization system. The terrestrial heat utilization system comprises a monitoring unit and an acquisition unit; the monitoring unit comprises a monitoring module, an alarm module and a main control unit; the monitoring module monitors the geothermal water temperature, the geothermal water pressure and the air tightness and transmits monitored data to the alarm module, and the alarm module transmits abnormal data to the main control unit; the acquisition unit comprises an exploration construction module, a heat collection module, a heat exchange unit and an output module; the exploration construction module analyzes the earth surface composition of a mining area, detects the temperature of geothermal water in the mining depth and transmits an analysis result and a detection result to the main control unit, and the main control unit controls the heat collection module to work according to the information; the heat collection module transmits collected geothermal water to the heat exchange unit; and the heat exchange unit outputs heat to the output module. The invention further provides a terrestrial heat utilization method. According to the invention, the heat exchange energy efficiency of geothermal energy can be improved, and the geothermal exploitation condition can be known in real time.
column14: SINOPEC OILFIELD SERVICE CORP;;SINOPEC JIANGHAN OILFIELD SERVICE CO LTD
column15: YU XULIN;;TAO MINFENG;;WANG XIN;;WANG FANGJIE;;ZHAO MING;;HUANG XIANGFENG;;ZHANG CHAOJUN;;ZHOU WEI;;YANG LIN;;LIANG YAN;;ZHAO ZHEN;;LIU HAIYAN;;ZHOU QIUZHEN

column12: Mining integrated heat energy complementation device
column13: The utility model discloses a mining integrated heat energy complementation device which comprises a heat pump set, each heat pump of the heat pump set comprises an evaporator end and a heat exchanger end, the evaporator end and the heat exchanger end are respectively provided with a temperature sensor, the mining integrated heat energy complementation device further comprises a temperature control unit, and the temperature control unit comprises a noise reduction amplification adjusting circuit, an isolation conversion circuit and a controller. According to the utility model, the temperature sensor is used for sampling the node temperature of a heat pump branch, and a detection signal is sent to the temperature control unit for conditioning, so that peak interference caused by fluid fluctuation is eliminated, power frequency noise is suppressed, and the accurate and effective output of the temperature detection signal is ensured; and the controller obtains temperature data of each branch node of the heat pump after carrying out operation processing on the received detection signal, and automatically adjusts the input flow and the distribution proportion of each pipeline according to the temperature data, so that the orderly operation of the whole set of heat supply system is ensured.
column14: HENAN WANHE ELECTRICAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Ore crusher equipment operation state monitoring method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of data processing, in particular to an ore crusher equipment running state monitoring method, which comprises the following steps: acquiring neighborhood data of each piece of vibration data to obtain a plurality of pieces of noise data to be corrected; obtaining the noise degree of each piece of to-be-corrected noise data; obtaining a reference block of each piece of noise data to be corrected and each neighborhood block of the reference block; obtaining the correction degree of each piece of to-be-corrected noise data; obtaining a filtering weight of each neighborhood block of the reference block of each piece of to-be-corrected noise data, and obtaining a filtering result of each piece of to-be-corrected noise data; obtaining a final filtering result of each piece of to-be-corrected noise data, and obtaining corrected vibration data; and obtaining the abnormal possibility of each corrected vibration data to obtain abnormal vibration data. According to the method, the monitoring effect is prevented from being influenced by data distortion after de-noising through adaptive filtering.
column15: SUN SHANJIN;;QIU LEIMING;;ZHENG ZHAOZONG;;YAO SHUO;;LIU CUNGEN;;HE WEIKAI;;YANG FUCHUN;;ZHANG YING

column12: Experimental device for monitoring changes of porosity and permeability of ore bed
column13: The utility model provides an experimental device for monitoring changes of porosity and permeability of an ore bed, which comprises the following steps: a containing box is arranged on the side wall of a shading camera obscura in a penetrating and sealing manner, a CCD camera and a constant light source are respectively arranged on two sides of the containing box, are respectively opposite to two side walls of the containing box and are respectively positioned on the inner side and the outer side of the shading camera obscura; the side walls, corresponding to the CCD camera and the constant light source, of the containing box are each provided with a light-transmitting part. Starting a constant light source and a CCD camera; a leaching agent is introduced into the containing box; the CCD camera obtains transmission light information and keeps an open state until the seepage simulation motion is finished; the data processing mechanism processes the experimental data to establish a fluid saturation model, an image of the light intensity value changing along with the time and a relational expression between the light intensity value and the fluid saturation are obtained, then the change rule of the fluid saturation along with the time is obtained, and the fluid saturation is calculated according to the relational expression between the permeability and the fluid saturation and the relational expression between the porosity and the fluid saturation. And finally obtaining the spatio-temporal evolution law of the porosity and permeability of the ore bed.

column12: Rapid fat extraction method and device suitable for fat tester
column13: The invention discloses a fat rapid extraction method suitable for a fat determinator, which comprises the following steps: putting a plurality of filter bags in which samples are packaged into an inner cup, putting the inner cup into an outer cup, and forming an extraction cup by the inner cup and the outer cup; a heating body and a sealing plate above the heating body are arranged on a workbench of the fat tester, an extraction cup is arranged on the heating body and is connected with the sealing plate in a clamping and sealing mode, and a liquid adding opening, a liquid extraction opening, a liquid return opening and an air outlet are formed in the sealing plate. Two ends of the liquid adding port are respectively connected with the liquid adding pump and the inner cup; two ends of the liquid pumping port are respectively connected with the recovery pump and the liquid pumping pipeline; two ends of the liquid return port are respectively connected with the recovery pump and the outer cup; the air outlet is communicated with the air inlet of the condenser; a control device of the fat tester respectively drives a heating body, a liquid adding pump and a recovery pump to respectively work according to requirements so as to carry out sample fat extraction work; the invention further discloses a fat rapid extraction device for implementing the extraction method. The device is high in testing speed, large in sample testing amount, high in automation degree and high in testing precision.
column15: TIAN WENGE;;LI LIHUA;;TIAN YE;;YANG YUEWU;;DONG YANFEI;;LU XIYU

column12: Online detection system for intelligently detecting running state of ball mill
column13: The utility model provides an online detection system for intelligently detecting the running state of a ball mill by materials, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. The system comprises a feeding belt conveyor, a water pipe, an electromagnetic valve, an ore grinding medium supplementing device, an intelligent material, an ore grinding medium, a wireless base station, an expert control system and an upper computer, acceleration sensors are arranged in the intelligent materials and connected with a microprocessor, wireless base stations are installed at a feeding port and adischarging port of the ore grinding machine, and an expert control system is connected with an upper computer. In the ore grinding process of the ball mill, intelligent materials move along with anore grinding medium and ore, the acceleration sensor detects acceleration signals of the intelligent materials and inputs the acceleration signals into the microprocessor, the microprocessor conductsspectral analysis on the signals and outputs the signals to the expert control system and the upper computer, and the upper computer conducts stress analysis and inputs the signals to the expert control system. The device can realize online detection and load control of the running state of the ball mill, is accurate, feasible and high in practicability, can be used for automatic control of the ore mill, and realizes energy conservation and consumption reduction.
column15: ZOU WENJIE;;FANG ZICHUAN;;XU HUAIBING;;ZHANG ZHIJUN;;SUN CHUNBAO;;LI ZHENGYAO

column12: Network load interaction method based on load side flexible resource multi-energy complementation
column13: The invention discloses a load side flexible resource multi-energy complementation-based network load interaction method, and the method for guiding a user to participate in load response to improve the power grid supply and demand balance capability comprises the following steps: 1, constructing a renewable energy source fused park integrated energy system digital twin system model; 2, constructing a source network load storage low-carbon multi-energy collaborative interaction strategy and a system comprehensive evaluation system; 3, mining a park load response strategy and flexible resources under a novel power system multi-incentive mechanism; the park multi-energy flow comprehensive energy management platform is based on a load side flexible resource multi-energy complementary network load interaction method, the system forms a source network load storage low-carbon multi-energy cooperative interaction strategy, the operation strategy of each unit of the system is integrated, the system reasonably participates in power grid exchange, and the power grid exchange efficiency is improved. The system operation cost is reduced, the carbon emission is reduced, the new energy consumption rate is improved, and the energy consumption is reduced.
column15: DENG HANBIAO;;LI LIAN;;ZHANG YAN;;YANG JIANXIN;;WANG LIXIAO;;LIN JINGTAO;;LI ZHICAI;;HE JIASHENG

column12: Online ore pulp solid sample cake sample preparation device
column13: The invention provides an on-line ore pulp solid sample cake sample preparation device. The device comprises a filtering assembly used for filtering flowing-in ore pulp, so that solid minerals in the ore pulp form an ore-containing material cake; the material cake drying assembly is used for drying mineral-containing material cakes; the cake block crushing assembly is used for crushing the dried cake blocks; the mineral powder pressing assembly is used for pressing mineral powder to form a solid cake. Liquid in ore pulp is filtered out through the filtering assembly, and an ore-containing material cake is obtained; the material cake drying assembly is used for drying the mineral-containing material cake to form a dried cake block; crushing the dried cakes through a cake crushing assembly to obtain mineral powder; the mineral powder is pressed through the mineral powder pressing assembly to obtain the solid cake, the ore pulp is converted into the uniform and dense solid cake from the slurry state, element grade detection can be conducted on the solid cake, the non-contact type sample preparation requirement is provided for a detection sensor, and direct contact type detection does not need to be conducted through a detection window.
column14: SHENYANG LONGJI INTELLIGENT TECH RESEARCH CO LTD

column12: ELECTRONIC GRINDER
column13: An electronic grinder includes a base (1) and a cup (2), the cup defining a pulverization chamber (20). A drive shaft (101) connected to an electric motor (10) terminates inside the pulverization chamber at a blade group (3). The blade group is magnetically removable from the end of the drive shaft for easy cleaning and replacement. The end of the cup opposite from the base in includes a fixed ring and a moveable cap that rotates or swivels about a pin connecting the two components for easy access to the contents of the pulverization chamber. The electric motor is controlled by a microcontroller operable by a power button and a control button. An inductive switch configured as a triggering member is disposed between the base and cup to detect whether the two components are connected in order to prevent inadvertent use of the grinder.

column12: Equipment capable of continuously polishing vacuum cup mouth
column13: The utility model discloses a device capable of continuously polishing a vacuum cup mouth, which comprises a machine body platform, a placing frame is arranged above the machine body platform, and the placing frame is driven by an air cylinder to move up and down relative to the machine body platform; the placing frame is provided with an abrasive belt storage rotary disc assembly which actively rotates relative to the placing frame, an abrasive belt installation rotary disc assembly which rotates along with the abrasive belt storage rotary disc assembly in a driven mode, and a polishing assembly used for vacuum cup opening machining. The grinding assembly comprises a grinding head movably connected with the containing frame, and an abrasive belt for grinding the vacuum cup opening is wound around the surface of the grinding head and extends to be wound around the abrasive belt storage rotary disc assembly when extending out of the abrasive belt installation rotary disc assembly. According to the vacuum cup mouth polishing device, the abrasive belt is installed on the set of rotating discs, when the rotating discs rotate, the new abrasive belt is continuously transferred to the polishing heads, the polishing heads continuously machine vacuum cup mouths, the automation degree is high, and good sustainability is achieved.
column14: YANGKANG CITY JIUXING MACHINERY LTD COMPANY

column12: High-precision automatic surface rolling and polishing device
column13: The utility model discloses a high-precision automation device for surface rolling and polishing, and relates to the field of high-precision automation devices for surface rolling and polishing, the high-precision automation device for surface rolling and polishing comprises a workbench, a vertical mounting plate and a polishing roller, the bottom end of the vertical mounting plate is fixedly and vertically mounted on the upper surface of the workbench, and a driving motor is mounted at the top end of the vertical mounting plate; the driving motor is in transmission connection with the grinding roller, two sets of electric sliding rails are fixedly arranged on the upper surface of the workbench, and the interiors of the electric sliding rails are in sliding connection with electric sliding blocks. When the electric sliding block moves to drive the horizontal mounting plate to move, a plate can be driven to automatically move at the same time, so that the plate does not need to be held and pushed by hands to move, manpower is saved, the plate is prevented from shaking in the polishing process due to the fact that the rubber suction cup tightly adsorbs the plate, and meanwhile the rubber suction cup has certain elasticity. And the effects of shock absorption and noise reduction can be achieved in the grinding process.

column12: Dust-free ore crusher
column13: The dust-free ore crusher comprises a bottom plate, a mounting plate and a vertical rod are fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the bottom plate, a motor is fixedly mounted on the front surface of the vertical rod, two groups of mounting rods are movably mounted between the front surface and the rear surface of the mounting plate, and two groups of gears are fixedly mounted on the outer surfaces of the mounting rods. A chain is movably installed between the outer surfaces of every two adjacent sets of gears, two sets of transmission rods are movably installed between the front surface and the rear surface of the installation plate, transverse rods are fixedly installed on the front surfaces of the transmission rods, and connecting blocks are movably installed on the outer surfaces of the transverse rods. The utility model relates to a dust-free ore crusher, which can effectively and autonomously carry out timed and quantitative feeding, and greatly limits the movement track of the whole material while effectively avoiding the situation that the material cannot be fully crushed in the material process, thereby avoiding the possibility of deviation or inclination of the material. And the overall automation and stability are effectively improved.
column14: SHENZHEN HONGWEIDA BUILDING MAT CO LTD

column12: Intelligent control system for vertical stirring mill and method
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent control system for a vertical stirring mill and a method, and relates to the field of mining machinery. The intelligent control system for the vertical stirring mill comprises a data acquisition system and an DCS system OPC server, wherein the acquisition system is used for acquiring the feeding flow and concentration of the vertical stirring mill, the rotating speed of a variable-frequency motor, the current and power of the motor, the liquid level of a pump pool, the frequency of a slurry pump, the feeding pressure of a swirler, the feeding concentration of the swirler, the feeding flow of the swirler, the overflow concentration of the swirler and the granularity parameters, acquiring the height on-line detection information of steel balls of the vertical stirring mill, acquiring abrasion on-line detection information of a spiral lining plate, and sending the acquired information to the on-site DCS system OPC server through a data acquisition terminal; a controller in the DCS system OPC server adopts a fuzzy controller; and the output variables of the fuzzy controller are the steel ball adding amount of the vertical stirring mill, the rotating speed of the motor, the water adding amount for ore grinding, the water adding amount into the pump pool and the frequency of the slurry pump. The system and the method provided by the invention have the advantages that the hysteresis and instability caused by manual adjustment are avoided, so that the operation of the mill is more stable, and an energy-saving effect is achieved.
column14: LUOYANG MINING MACHINERY ENGINEERING DESIGN INST CO LTD
column15: TAN WENCAI;;LIU JUN;;SONG XIANZHOU;;WAN YONG;;TIAN ZHENHUA;;DU ZIBIN;;CHEN CHONG;;FENG YIZHONG;;ZHANG GUANGWEI;;ZHANG WANG;;LI HUAWEI;;WANG MINGHAO;;HAN GAOXIANG;;KONG WENJIE;;GAO YUAN

column12: Grinding force prediction method and prediction system for cup-shaped grinding wheel curved surface grinding machining
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of curved surface grinding machining, and discloses a grinding force prediction method and prediction system for curved surface grinding machining of a cup-shaped grinding wheel. The method comprises. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a grinding track l and a grinding contact area S of a single abrasive particle in the curved surface grinding machining process of the cup-shaped grinding wheel; obtaining the grinding depth ap and the critical grinding depth apc of the single abrasive particle in the direction of the grinding track l; obtaining a grinding force model of a single abrasive particle; obtaining the effective abrasive particle number Nact of the total abrasive particle number Nstat in unit area; and calculating the total grinding force of curved surface grinding. According to the method, the predicted value of the tangential force can be obtained at the same time under the condition that the normal force is known;and the grinding force is controlled by changing the grinding parameters. The accurate grinding force prediction method with the accurate calculation result can be used for evaluating the service life of the grinding wheel and has important significance in grinding temperature field analysis. The service life of the grinding wheel for automatic curved surface machining can be monitored.
column15: DAI SHIJIE;;ZHANG SHUAI;;YUAN YIKUN;;SUN ZHENLIN;;MU JIAHENG;;DENG RIQING

column12: Operation and maintenance equipment data exchange gateway based on BIM
column13: The utility model discloses an operation and maintenance equipment data exchange gateway based on BIM. The device comprises a lower shell and an upper shell, a plurality of connecting devices are symmetrically arranged at the bottom of the lower shell; the connecting device comprises a connecting piece which is fixedly connected to the lower shell; a fixing sleeve is fixedly connected to the bottom of the connecting piece, a suction cup is arranged in the fixing sleeve, a connecting edge is arranged at the bottom of the suction cup, the connecting edge is fixedly connected with the bottom sidewall of the fixing sleeve, a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the upper side of the fixing sleeve, a rotating shaft is fixedly connected to the fixing plate, and an extrusion block is rotatably connected to the rotating shaft. According to the utility model, the connecting piece, the fixed sleeve, the extrusion block, the moving block and other structures interact with one another; the data exchange gateway can be fixed on a desktop or a wall surface through the suckers, arrangement, binding and storage of various connecting wires are facilitated, disordered placement is avoided, and thedata exchange gateway is fixed on the desktop, so that the data exchange gateway is not easy to fall off from the desktop and is not easy to damage to cause loss.
column14: SHENZHEN JIANSHU YUNWEI TECH CO LTD

column12: Automatic sampling and sample preparation equipment for iron ore
column13: The utility model discloses automatic iron ore sampling and preparing equipment which comprises a bottom plate, a collecting tank is installed at the left end of the top of the bottom plate, a movable plate is installed in an inner cavity of the collecting tank in a sliding mode, sliding blocks are symmetrically arranged at the left end and the right end of the movable plate, and sliding rails matched with the sliding blocks are symmetrically arranged on the left side wall and the right side wall of the inner cavity of the collecting tank. Iron ore is crushed through the crushing mechanism in the inner cavity of the crushing chamber, then the vibration motor is controlled by the PLC to be started, the vibration motor vibrates to drive the screen to move up and down in the inner cavity of the sliding cavity through the sliding strip, and the iron ore is crushed through the pressure sensor. Meanwhile, under the cooperation of a positioning spring, a screen shakes to screen the crushed iron ore, and finally, through the arrangement of a material guide plate, the iron ore falls into an inner cavity of a collecting groove, so that automatic sampling and preparation of the device are realized, a traditional manual sampling and preparation mode is changed, the labor intensity is reduced, and the working efficiency of the device is improved.

column12: Automatic low-power inspection method and system for continuous casting billet
column13: The invention discloses an automatic low-power inspection method and system for a continuous casting billet. Comprising a feeding tray, a blank centering device, an industrial robot, a first suction cup, a second suction cup, a low-power sample automatic milling and grinding machine, a cutting bead automatic machining center, a full-automatic electrolytic corrosion center and an image collecting device. The feeding tray is used for bearing blanks, the blank centering device comprises a workbench, a correcting mechanism and a measuring mechanism, the correcting mechanism and the measuring mechanism are fixed to the workbench, the correcting mechanism is used for clamping the blanks in the fixed direction, the measuring mechanism is used for measuring the center points of the blanks, and the first suction cup and the second suction cup are fixed to the output end of the industrial robot. The feeding tray, the blank centering device, the low-power sample automatic milling and grinding machine, the cutting bead automatic machining center, the full-automatic electrolytic corrosion center and the image collecting device are arranged around the industrial robot. The device has the advantages that full automation of continuous casting slab low-power inspection processes such as transferring, nodule cutting, milling and grinding, acid pickling, low-power image acquisition and defect judgment is achieved.
column15: WEI YUNJI;;ZHANG CHAOYI;;ZHAO XIUPENG;;ZHOU DING;;WANG SHAODI;;LIU ANG

column12: Preparation method of zirconium oxide 3D printing material
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of 3D printing, and discloses a zirconium oxide 3D printing material preparation method which comprises the following steps: mixing zirconium-containing ore and a carbon-containing substance, and carrying out electrofusion desilicication; one or more of Y2O3 with the molar fraction of 8%-13%, CaO with the molar fraction of 14%-26%, MgO with the molar fraction of 18%-24% and CeO2 with the molar fraction larger than or equal to 15% are added into the desilicication zirconium to be mixed, and crystal form smelting is carried out; cooling, and carrying out secondary heat treatment to obtain zirconium oxide crystals; performing crushing; performing calcination; performing spray drying; crystallizing and sintering; the zirconium oxide 3D printing powder is uniformly mixed with photosensitive resin, polyethylene glycol and water, the zirconium oxide crystal prepared by the method is high in stability and small in cracking condition, and the zirconium oxide slurry for 3D printing prepared from the zirconium oxide crystal is high in purity and uniform in granularity.
column14: HUNAN PENGDENG PREC CERAMICS CO LTD

column13: The present invention relates to a method for preparing deuterated compounds and to deuterated compounds produced by the same method.

column12: Ore pigment production device based on intelligent control
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of building ore pigment production, and discloses an intelligent-control-based ore pigment production device which comprises a tank body, a dust sensor assembly and a supporting seat, the tank body is fixed to the upper end of the supporting seat, a shell is arranged in the tank body, and supporting parts are arranged at the two ends of the supporting seat correspondingly; wherein the upper end of one supporting part is connected with a fixing seat, one side of the fixing seat is rotationally connected with a first gear through a first ball bearing, one side of the first gear is meshed with a first gear ring, the shell is connected with a grinding mechanism, the grinding mechanism is connected with the first gear ring, and two circulating mechanisms are arranged at the lower end of the fixing seat and connected with the first gear ring. According to the ore pigment production device based on intelligent control, the flowability of ore raw materials in the production device can be effectively improved, the running resistance of the ore raw materials to the grinding piece is reduced, the ore raw materials are continuously ground for multiple times during circulation, and the grinding efficiency of the production device is greatly improved.

column12: TRANSCRITICAL CO2 PULVERIZATION
column13: Methods and apparatus for comminution of solid materials. Solid materials are introduced into a first pressure vessel. A working fluid is provided in the first pressure vessel at an operating pressure and an operating temperature. The working fluid is allowed to permeate into the solid materials. The working fluid may permeate into the solid materials while in a supercritical fluid phase. The working fluid is rapidly expanded to thereby create fractured solid materials from the solid materials. Rapidly expanding the working fluid may comprise causing a transition of the working fluid from a supercritical phase with a first density to a subcritical vapour phase with a second density.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR THE CONTROL OF A FLOTATION SEPARATION PROCESS, INCLUDING PARAMETERS OF THE FLOTATION PROCESS AND REAGENT ADDITION TO OPTIMIZE MINERAL RECOVERY
column32: VANEGAS C ET AL: "On-line froth acoustic emission measurements in industrial sites", MINERALS ENGINEERING, PERGAMON PRESS , OXFORD, GB, vol. 21, no. 12-14, 1 November 2008 (2008-11-01), pages 883-888, XP025479052, ISSN: 0892-6875, DOI: 10.1016/J.MINENG.2008.04.007 [retrieved on 2008-06-02]

column12: Online soft measurement method for sand return ratio in ore grinding classification process
column13: The invention discloses an online soft measurement method for a sand return ratio in an ore grinding classification process, which comprises the following steps: firstly, detecting the ore feeding flow, pressure and concentration of a cyclone in real time, and filing real-time detection data into a database; then, completing soft measurement algorithm parameter calculation; selecting a soft measurement calculation period of the sand return ratio; and finally, calculating the sand return ratio on line. The online algorithm only depends on online measurement values of ore feeding flow, pressureand concentration of the cyclone, and online soft measurement of the sand return ratio is achieved; parameters are determined by using an off-line multi-sampling method, and a least square method is used during parameter calculation, so that the minimization of a sand return ratio calculation error is ensured.

column12: Horizontal machine tool automatic machining robot for mining mechanical workpieces
column13: The invention provides a mining mechanical workpiece horizontal machine tool automatic machining robot, and belongs to the technical field of mining workpiece automatic machining, the mining mechanical workpiece horizontal machine tool automatic machining robot comprises a feeding seat, a first grinding part and a second grinding part are arranged on the feeding seat, the first grinding part comprises a vertical sliding seat and a first limiting piece, grinding columns are symmetrically arranged on the vertical sliding seat, and the second grinding part comprises a transverse sliding seat; the transverse sliding seats are connected to the upper end of the feeding seat in a sliding mode, the transverse sliding seats are symmetrically arranged, longitudinal sliding seats are arranged on the transverse sliding seats, and transition grinding tools are arranged on the corresponding opposite sides of the longitudinal sliding seats. According to the automatic machining robot of the horizontal machine tool for the mining mechanical workpieces, the symmetrical grinding columns are tangent to the peripheral faces of the workpieces at the same time to grind the workpieces, the grinding columns are horizontally moved up and down, the grinding columns are controlled to be in the tangent state with the areas, with different diameters, of the workpieces, and then the areas, with different diameters, of the workpieces are flexibly ground; and in addition, the position stability of the workpiece in the grinding process is effectively improved, and the grinding difficulty is correspondingly reduced.

column12: Intelligent control method for balanced crushing of fine crushing workshop in machine-made gravel
column13: The invention provides an intelligent control method for balanced crushing of a fine crushing workshop in machine-made gravel. An intelligent control judgment table is preset in a control system of an intelligent control center, data of a level gage are acquired in real time, the data are compared with a set control range, and the conveying capacity of a feeding adhesive tape machine is adjusted when deviation occurs, so that the ore filling amount in a crusher is within the control range of the level gage; and meanwhile, the feeding relation and the conveying amount of each batching point of the feeding adhesive tape machine, the discharging conveying amount and the working current of the crusher are monitored in real time, a control deviation range is set for each parameter, and when the parameters exceed the deviation ranges, the frequency parameter of a feeding machine is adjusted according to the judgment standard of the intelligent control judgment table, so that each parameter is maintained within the allowable deviation range. Through intelligent monitoring and regulation of process parameters, balanced operation of the system can be effectively ensured, so that the process target of green, efficient and low-consumption shaping and crushing is achieved, intelligent regulation of each device is realized, the labor cost is reduced, the product quality consistency of medium and fine crushing procedures is ensured, and a foundation is laid for high-quality sandstone processing.

column12: Food processor convenient to use
column13: The utility model provides a food processor convenient to use, which comprises a cup body, a crushing knife arranged in the cup body, a battery, a charging circuit of the battery, a control chip, a motor electrically connected with the control chip and an acceleration sensor electrically connected with the control chip, the acceleration sensor is used for collecting acceleration sensing data of the food processor; the acceleration sensing data is used for determining swing parameters of the food processor; and the control chip controls the working state of the food processor according to the acceleration sensing data. According to the food processing machine, the swing parameters of the food processing machine are determined through acceleration sensing data collected by the acceleration sensor so as to identify various gesture operations of a user, the working state of the food processing machine is controlled through the control chip, key control is omitted, the food processing machine is more convenient to use, cost is reduced, the structure is simple, the appearance can be integrally formed, and the food processing machine is suitable for popularization and application. The waterproof effect is good, and the user experience is good.

column12: SUBSTRATE PROCESSING APPARATUS AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF
column13: A substrate processing apparatus includes a substrate support unit including a chuck for supporting a substrate, a fluid supply unit that supplies a processing fluid to the substrate, and a recovery unit surrounding the chuck and recovering the supplied processing fluid. The substrate support unit includes an antistatic material in which milled carbon fibers (MCF) are blended into a perfluoroalkoxy alkane (PFA) resin.

column12: Heavy metal fast detector
column13: The invention discloses a heavy metal fast detector. The detector comprises a casing, a detection module, a control module and a display device, wherein the detection module is mainly composed of a base, a temperature measurement probe, a sample cup rotating shaft, a motor, a telescopic rod and a detection head, a sample cup is arranged in the sample cup rotating shaft, and an electrode plate is arranged on the detection head. A sample solution is dropwisely added to be detected into the sample cup for activation, full ionization of heavy metal elements is promoted, an electrode plate is electrified after activation is completed, electric signals such as current, potential, conductance and electric quantity are collected, and collected peak current data are substituted into a standard curve equation of heavy metal ions, therefore, the type and concentration of the heavy metal ions in the to-be-detected solution are obtained, the detection result is displayed on the display device, the whole process steps are few, operation is convenient, and detection efficiency is high; and meanwhile, the temperature measuring probe can record the temperature condition during detection, and under the condition that the deviation of a detection result is large, judgment is carried out according to the temperature condition, so wrong data are effectively eliminated.
column14: ZHEJIANG MINGPU BIOTECHNOLOGY CO LTD;;UNIV HENAN TECHNOLOGY

column12: Disposable cup smart factory that sorts and crushes cups by material
column13: The present invention relates to a disposable cup smart factory which sorts, crushes, and stores cups by the material. According to the present invention, the disposable cup smart factory comprises: a dispenser unit which stores cups in a hollow receiving space formed inside and sorts the cups according to the material of the cup; a processing unit formed on one side of the lower side of the dispenser unit to crush, clean, and store the cup discharged from the dispenser unit; and an accumulating unit which collects and loads scraps of the cup discharged from the processing unit. The dispenser unit includes: a passage part for storing cups temporarily and transferring the cups; and a discriminating part formed on one side of the lower side of the passage part to sort the cups transferred from the passage part by material and transfer the cups to the processing unit.

column12: ATTACHABLE PORTABLE POWER CHARGER WITH REMOVABLE DIRECT CHARGING CONNECTOR CABLES
column13: A portable power charger is provided for charging an electronic device from a rechargeable battery internally disposed within the charger. An attachment system is also provided for connecting the electronic device to the portable charger and maintaining the connection during charging, whether by wireless means or by direct charging connection. The attachment system can also ensure that respective wireless transmission components in the portable charger and the electronic device, where available, are properly aligned for optimal and efficient wireless charging. The alignment system can comprise an arrangement of magnets on each of the portable charger and the electronic device, whereby said magnets are geometrically arrangement is spaced apart relationship to one another. The alignment system may alternatively comprise a sticky pads, suction cups or hook-and-loop fasteners to physical attach the electronic device to the portable charger.

column12: High-temperature softening material grinding method and device with temperature control function
column13: The invention relates to a high-temperature softened material grinding method and device with temperature control, the device comprises a shell, a sorting machine, a grinding component, a transmission system and a cooling system are arranged in the shell, an inlet of the sorting machine is connected with a feeding channel, and the feeding channel is arranged on the shell; an outlet of the sorting machine is connected with an inlet of the grinding component through the charging barrel; the bottom of the grinding part is connected with a transmission system through a transmission shaft, the transmission system comprises a main machine, and the main machine is connected to driving equipment through a transmission mechanism; the cooling system comprises a circulating cooling water jacket sleeved on the periphery of the grinding main body part, the circulating cooling water jacket is communicated with a water inlet and a water outlet, and the water inlet is connected with a water pump. The high-temperature easily-softened ore raw materials can be effectively ground, the grinding efficiency of the grinding machine and the quality of ground products are improved, the application range and the application level of the grinding device are remarkably improved, and the automation level and the intelligence level of the grinding device are improved.
column14: HENAN LIMING HEAVY IND & SCIENCE CO LTD;;UNIV HENAN TECHNOLOGY

column12: Mineral separation fine grinding control device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mineral separation, in particular to a mineral separation fine grinding control device which comprises a slag separation feeding pool and a water storage pool, a first inlet of the slag separation feeding pool is communicated with an outlet of a ball supplementing machine through a pipeline, an outlet of the slag separation feeding pool is connected with an inlet of a feeding pump through a pipeline, and an outlet of the feeding pump is communicated with a grinding machine through a feeding pipeline. The reservoir is communicated with the feeding pipeline through a water replenishing pipeline, a water replenishing valve is arranged on the water replenishing pipeline, and a flow meter and an ore pulp concentration meter are respectively arranged on the feeding pipeline between the water replenishing pipeline and the feeding pump. The device is reasonable and compact in structure and convenient to use, the flow meter, the ore pulp concentration meter and the particle size monitor are arranged to display collected flow, concentration and grinding particle size data, an operator can conveniently regulate and control according to monitoring values, and therefore the flow, the concentration and the grinding particle size are kept floating in an allowable range, the quality of discharging of a mill is guaranteed, and the working efficiency is improved. Parameters are more visual, convenient and concise.
column14: ZHEJIANG AILINGCHUANG MINING TECH CO LTD

column12: Dynamic modeling method for ore grinding medium of semi-autogenous mill
column13: The invention discloses a semi-autogenous mill ore grinding medium dynamic modeling method which comprises the following steps: aiming at different cylinder lining plate structure parameters and working parameters of a mineral mill, establishing a theoretical model capable of accurately calculating a separation angle, a falling angle, normal impact energy and tangential grinding energy of an ore grinding medium under the lifting action of a lining plate; and numerical simulation and simulation are carried out after the mathematical theoretical model is programmed, so that the understanding of the dynamic characteristics of the ore grinding medium can be deepened, and theoretical guidance is provided for the design and optimization of the lining plate structure of the barrel of the mineral mill.

column12: Intelligent ore crushing device with automatic adjusting function
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent ore crushing device with an automatic adjusting function. The intelligent ore crushing device comprises a machine body, a frequency converter and gravity sensors, a feeding opening is fixedly formed in the upper portion of the machine body, a forward and reverse motor is installed on the left side of the feeding opening, a second sliding groove is formed in the inner surface of the feeding opening, an opening is formed in the upper portion of the machine body, a driving motor is installed on the left side of the machine body, the output end of the driving motor is connected with a crushing roller on the upper portion in the machine body, and a second open groove is formed in the surface of the right side of the machine body. According to the intelligent ore crushing device with the automatic adjusting function, the feeding quantity can be detected through a feeding gravity detection device formed by the froward and reverse motor in the feeding opening and the gravity sensors on the surfaces of material separation plates, through cooperation with use of the frequency converter installed on the surface of the output end of the driving motor, the device can automatically adjust the rotating speed of the crushing roller driven by the driving motor conveniently by combining the material feeding quantity with use of the frequency converter, and then the ore crushing effect is improved.
column14: SHANDONG JIUCHANG HEAVY INDUSTRY TECH CO LTD

column12: Interactive service platform and operating method thereof
column13: An operating method of an interactive service platform including the steps of: communicating with a plurality of user end devices via an application software; receiving physiological measurement information of user from the user end devices via the application software; analyzing the physiological measurement information to identify a physical and mental state/lifestyle of an associated subscriber; and automatically responding content information associated with at least one associated subscriber according to requests from the user end devices.

column12: Mineral mill subcritical rotating speed judgment method
column13: The invention discloses a mineral mill subcritical rotating speed judgment method, which comprises the following steps of: taking an outermost layer ore grinding medium of a mineral mill, which is directly lifted by a barrel lining plate, as a research object, and performing mathematical modeling on the mineral mill assembled with the barrel lining plate by utilizing a geometric analysis method; performing kinematics analysis on the ore grinding medium based on a layered motion theory; based on the analysis and the ore grinding medium motion differential equation, the separation angle of the ore grinding medium on the outermost layer directly subjected to the lifting effect of the lining plate can be obtained; reversely solving the subcritical rotating speed of the mineral mill based on the proposed mathematical model; simulating the movement track of the ore grinding medium through a discrete element method, and verifying the accuracy of the established mathematical model; the method can effectively reduce the judgment upper limit of the maximum working rotating speed of the mineral mill, improves the judgment precision of the upper limit boundary of the working rotating speed of the mineral mill, and provides a new judgment method for limiting the maximum working rotating speed of the mineral mill.
column14: CITIC HEAVY IND CO LTD;;LUOYANG MINING MACHINERY ENGINEERING DESIGN INST CO LTD
