column12: Turbocharger systems and method for capturing a process gas
column13: Systems and methods are provided for a turbocharger system for use with a process gas capture system. In one example, the turbocharger system comprises: a heat exchanger positioned to receive inlet gas from a gas generating system via a first inlet; a low pressure compressor driven by a low pressure turbine and coupled to a first outlet of the heat exchanger; a mid-pressure compressor driven by a mid-pressure turbine and coupled in series with the low pressure compressor, the mid-pressure compressor configured to receive low pressure compressed gas from the low pressure compressor; and a high pressure compressor driven by a high pressure turbine and coupled in series with the mid-pressure compressor, the high pressure compressor configured to receive mid-pressure compressed gas from the mid-pressure compressor and output high pressure compressed gas to the process gas capture system and a second inlet of the heat exchanger.
column16: TRANSPORTATION IP HOLDINGS LLC (2019-02-25);;GENERAL ELECTRIC COMPANY (2019-01-17)

column12: CONFIGURABLE ELECTROCRUSHING MINING APPARATUS
column13: Methods and configurable apparatuses for mining a vein using electrocrushing. The apparatus can be configured to match the size and shape of a vein, greatly reducing mining of the surrounding matrix and therefore the amount of material that is transported to the surface. The apparatus is modular, can be assembled underground, and can be propelled by retractable tractors. The apparatus is guided using a positioning and navigational system in accordance with the mine design. The apparatus can be steered by varying the pulse rates on different end effectors which produce the arc that fractures the vein, and sensors can minimize excavation of the surrounding matrix. The electrocrushing process produces cuttings that have already undergone the first stage of comminution to less than one inch in size, thus reducing operational costs. The apparatus can mine parallel slots in a vein, leaving support ribs in place between the slots.
column15: MOENY WILLIAM M;;SMALL JAMES G;;PRONKO STEVEN G E

column12: Novel combined superfine laminated autogenous mill for mining engineering
column13: The utility model discloses a novel combined superfine laminating autogenous mill for mining engineering, which comprises a bottom plate, a damping mechanism, a driving mechanism and a feeding mechanism, the damping mechanism is arranged at the top of the bottom plate, the driving mechanism is arranged on the damping mechanism, the feeding mechanism is arranged at the top of the bottom plate, and the damping mechanism comprises a fixing rod. Through mutual cooperation of the fixing rod, the fixing plate, a buffer spring and a rubber block, vibration generated when the grinding cylinder works is reduced, stability is greatly improved, through mutual cooperation of the feeding shell, the fixing shell, a rotating motor, a spiral conveying blade, a drainage plate, a pressure sensor, a containing plate, an air cylinder, a push plate, a connecting rod, a baffle and an inclined plate, the stability of the grinding cylinder is improved, and the working efficiency is improved. And therefore, automatic and quantitative feeding can be achieved, the situation that the feeding amount is too large or too small is avoided, the ore grinding efficiency and quality are not affected, the practicability of the whole device is greatly improved, and great convenience is brought to a user.
column14: JIANGSU JINSHENG SILICON BASED NEW MATERIAL RES INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: Analysis method for gold content of gold-containing ore sample
column13: The invention discloses an analysis method for the gold content of a gold-bearing ore sample, which comprises the following steps of: crushing and weighing the gold-bearing ore sample to be detected, sorting out reselected concentrate and reselected tailings through reselection equipment, analyzing the gold content of the reselected concentrate and the reselected tailings through a gold content detection method respectively, and determining the gold content of the gold-bearing ore sample after the results of the reselected concentrate and the reselected tailings are processed. The gold content of the reselected concentrate is detected by the fire assaying method according to the weight suitable for fire assaying method detection. According to the invention, a division process step is avoided, and the sampling range of the gold-containing ore sample to be detected is expanded, so that the detection result is accurate and real. Since the gold ore is different from other ores, the gold content is relatively low and the gold is scattered in the ores, a representative detection result is difficult to obtain if an existing detection method is adopted. The positive deviation and the negative deviation of the detection result of the conventional method represented by the embodiment of the invention are respectively 16-38% and 9-18%, and compared with the existing detection method, the method disclosed by the invention can reduce 75% of data fluctuation to the maximum extent.
column15: CHEN JUN;;LIU LIANG;;DING LI;;PAN FENGGANG;;HUANG LIULAO;;ZHOU YU;;WANG XUETIAN;;DONG JING;;HUANG JUN

column12: SMART PROCESSING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INDUSTRIAL STONE MATERIAL
column13: A smart processing system and method for an industrial stone material. Said method comprises the following steps: step I, grabbing, by a manipulator or other lifting and carrying device (4) or manual work, a stone material to be processed, placing same on a cutting machine (1), and enabling a polished surface of the stone material to face upwards, and then the cutting machine (1) cutting the stone material; step II, a suction cup built in the cutting machine (1) grabbing the cut stone material, then placing same on the manipulator or other lifting and carrying device (4), turning over the stone material and placing same on a table top of a smart splicing machine (5), and then the smart splicing machine (5) splicing several pieces of stone material; step III, the manipulator or other lifting and carrying device (4) re-grabbing the stone material and placing same on an edge grinding machine (6), and the edge grinding machine (6) grinding the stone material; step IV, the manipulator or other lifting and carrying device (4) picking up the stone material from the edge grinding machine (6) and transferring same to a stone material processing center (2); and step V, the manipulator or other lifting and carrying device (4) picking up the processed finished stone material, and placing same in a finished product transfer section (3). The present invention can replace a traditional processing method, saving manpower and improving efficiency.
column14: AITALMAC NANJING STONEWORK AND MECH CO LTD

column12: Estimation method for brine mining amount of drilling solution rock salt mining area
column13: The invention provides a drilling water rock salt mining area brine mining amount estimation method, which comprises the following steps: generating a coherence coefficient graph and a difference interference graph based on InSAR, and generating a high coherence point-based time sequence difference interference phase matrix; constructing a dynamic function model among the time sequence difference interferometric phase, the water-soluble kinetic parameters and the time; carrying out optimal solution on model parameters in the dynamic function model; estimating the time sequence deformation of the surface subsidence of the rock salt mining area in the InSAR image interference time period; and obtaining an estimated value of the total brine mining amount through the sequential deformation of the surface subsidence of the rock salt mining area, and the like. According to the calculation method for inverting the brine mining amount of the rock salt mining area at any moment by utilizing the time sequence InSAR technology, quantitative prediction of important components of the brine mining amount can be realized, the application field of the InSAR technology is widened, the calculation method can be used for guiding mining and utilization of mineral resources, the recovery rate of the mineral resources is further improved, and data reference is provided for reasonable development and utilization of salt deposits.
column15: XING XUEMIN;;ZHANG TENGFEI;;YANG ZEFA;;ZHU JUN;;PENG WEI
column32: CHEN L等: "A fast estimating method of initial phase offset for airborne dual-antenna INSAR system", 《 GEOSCIENCE & REMOTE SENSING SYMPOSIUM》;;马超等: "神东矿区InSAR开采沉陷区及形变参数研究", 《2015中国地球科学联合学术年会》;;XING X等: "InSAR Modeling and Deformation Prediction for Salt Solution Mining Using a Novel CT-PIM Function", 《REMOTE SENSING》;;马涛等: "SBAS-InSAR技术在矿山开采区沉降监测中的应用", 《测绘与空间地理信息》

column12: Cone crusher convenient for removing foreign matters
column13: The cone crusher comprises a crusher body, a hydraulic cylinder, a displacement amplification assembly, a first supporting rod, a sixth supporting plate, a first spring and a first pressure sensor; a discharging hopper is arranged at the bottom of the crusher body; the hydraulic cylinder is arranged on the first supporting plate; a first baffle is arranged at the top of the hydraulic cylinder; second supporting plates are arranged at the bottoms of the supporting sleeves. A third supporting plate is arranged on the first supporting plate; the fourth supporting plate is arranged at the bottom of the second supporting plate; the fifth supporting plate is arranged on the third supporting plate; the rotating rod is arranged at the top of the fifth supporting plate; the first supporting rod is arranged on the third supporting plate; the first supporting rod is sleeved with the first spring; the first pressure sensor is arranged on the sixth supporting plate. According to the ore crushing device, foreign matter and uncrushed ore are guided into the designated position through the material guiding assembly, the foreign matter and the uncrushed ore are prevented from flowing to the subsequent machining procedure, the ore crushing uniformity is guaranteed, and damage caused by the hard foreign matter to subsequent machining equipment can be prevented.

column12: Mill detection method, device and equipment
column13: The invention provides a mill detection method, device and equipment. The mill detection method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of groups of real-time vibration signals and a group of real-time operation data from a plurality of vibration sensors at preset positions of a mill, wherein the real-time operation data comprises a plurality of preset types of operation data; extracting a plurality of groups of to-be-detected vibration data from the real-time vibration signals according to preset conditions, wherein the to-be-detected vibration data comprises frequencies, amplitudes and phases of a plurality of to-be-detected vibration signals meeting the preset conditions in the real-time vibration signals; and inputting the to-be-detected vibration data and the real-time operation data into a preset neural network model to obtain mill detection parameters output by the preset neural network model, wherein the detection parameters include the filling rate of the ore grinding medium filled in the mill, the comprehensive filling rate, the height of the lifting strip and the wear degree of the lining plate. According to the embodiment of the invention, the detection parameters of the mill can be directly output according to the real-time vibration signal and the real-time operation data of the mill.
column15: TANG YAJING;;CHEN LIANG;;SONG LEI;;CUI RENTAI;;SUN MINGJUN

column12: Wind speed measuring device, ventilation device and portable weather station
column13: The utility model provides a wind speed measuring device, ventilation device and portable weather station, including anemograph and fixing the bearing of anemograph, anemograph includes hub and at least two velocity measurement subassembly that distributes on the hub peripheral side, velocity measurement subassembly includes wind cup, the surface of wind cup extends towards one side, and the bearing is fixed on the hub. The included angle between the side wall, away from the hub, of the wind cup and the opening face of the wind cup is larger than the included angle between the side wall, close to the hub, of the wind cup and the opening face of the wind cup. According to the utility model, the appearance shape of the wind cup is optimized, and the wind cup can quickly act aiming at first-level wind speed and is captured by the wind speed sensor, thereby improving the detection precision; the shape of the grid is optimized, and good heat exchange is achieved; the device is opened by unscrewing the protective cover, so that the device is more convenient to use, and the wind speed is measured instantly; the accuracy of monitoring ambient air temperature, humidity and pressure data is improved, the data reference is improved, and the user experience is improved.

column12: Pretreatment device for simultaneously and quantitatively measuring gaseous and non-gaseous hormones in rice body
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of rice hormone determination, and discloses a pretreatment device for simultaneous quantitative determination of gaseous and non-gaseous hormones in rice, the pretreatment device comprises a cup body, the top end of the cup body is movably provided with a cup cover, one side of the cup cover is provided with a constant pressure port, and the middle of the cup body is fixedly connected with a shaft barrel; the shaft barrel comprises a shaft barrel upper section and a shaft barrel lower section, the outer side of the shaft barrel is movably sleeved with a rotary outer barrel, air outlets are formed in the two sides of the bottom end of the shaft barrel, the middle of the shaft barrel is movably sleeved with a pressing rod, and a movable opening is formed in the middle of the cup cover. According to the invention, disturbance airflow is generated in the cup body, and ethylene gas collected in the cup body is homogenized, so that the accuracy of ethylene hormone determination is improved; the crushing blades crush a rice sample to complete pretreatment work of non-gas phase hormone determination in the rice body, and the whole operation process is in the closed cup body, so that determination data deviation caused by hormone escape in the treatment process is avoided.
column15: ZHANG WEIYANG;;CAI WEI;;ZHU KUANYU;;SEO WOON-HEE;;WANG ZHIQIN;;ZHANG HAO;;GU JUNFEI;;LIU LIJUN

column12: Sampling device for mineral geological exploration
column13: The utility model provides a sampling device for mineral geological exploration. The sampling device comprises a collecting bin; and one side of the treatment bin is fixed to the collection bin, a collection box is arranged on one side in the treatment bin, and a vibration machine is arranged at the bottom of the collection box. According to the sampling device for mineral geological exploration provided by the utility model, through the arranged vibration machine, crushed materials can be vibrated in advance, so that ores with different volumes are moved and layered, and the situation that sampling collection is influenced due to the fact that the ores with different volumes are mixed together and filtering is not uniform in the filtering process is avoided; and through the arrangement of a first filter screen and a second filter screen, materials of different volumes can be filtered again, so that the materials of different volumes are subjected to multi-stage filtration, different ores are conveniently sampled, subsequent detection and analysis of data are facilitated, and the practicability of the device is improved.

column12: Faraday cup and ion beam measurement system
column13: The invention relates to a Faraday cup and an ion beam measurement system. The Faraday cup comprises a front end part, a suppression assembly, an isolation assembly and a collector assembly which are stacked in sequence. An ion beam collecting opening is formed in the front end part; wherein the front end part is provided with a measuring port; the collector assembly comprises a first PCB substrate, the middle part of the first PCB substrate is provided with a first metal layer, and the edge of the first metal layer is provided with a first PCB insulating layer; a measured ion beam enters from an ion beam collection port of the front end part, is collected by the first metal layer after electrons are shielded by the suppression assembly, and is used for detecting beam data of the ion beam; according to the technical scheme, the collector assembly is made of the PCB, the PCB insulating layer on the PCB substrate and the metal layer in the middle of the PCB insulating layer are used for collecting ion beams, the Faraday cup structure is simplified by adopting the PCB technology, equipment installation is facilitated, the structural consistency is good, the production and manufacturing cost is low, and later maintenance is simple.
column14: ZHONGSHAN BOTON PHOTOELECTRIC SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY;;BORTON PHOTOELECTRIC SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY IN FOSHAN CITY

column12: Stone vibrating screen for mine
column13: The utility model discloses a mine stone vibrating screen which comprises a shell, a feeding port is welded to the top end of the shell, a bottom plate is welded to the bottom end of the shell, a motor is installed on one side of the shell, a second gear is installed at the top end of the motor, and the second gear is connected with two sets of first gears in a meshed mode. The first gear is provided with a crushing roller through the shell, the second gear is provided with a third gear through the shell, the bottom end of the third gear is in meshed connection with a fourth gear, the other end of the fourth gear is fixedly provided with rotating blades, one side of the shell is fixedly provided with a hydraulic pump, and the hydraulic pump is connected with a telescopic rod; a rotating handle is mounted at the bottom end of the telescopic rod, one side of the rotating handle is connected with a secondary screen through a rotating rod, and a fixed rotating wheel is mounted on the other side of the secondary screen. The ore screening device has the advantages of being high in automation degree, capable of crushing ores, fast in screening, safe and reliable.
column14: JIANGXI HENGHONG INT MINING MACHINERY CO LTD

column12: Online measurement system and method for sodium ions in effluent of cation bed
column13: The invention discloses a cation bed effluent sodium ion online measurement system and method. The system comprises an online alkalizer preparation device, a water supply module, a reagent module, a water sample pH value monitoring module, a sodium ion concentration measurement module and a data processing unit, the water supply module, the reagent module and the water sample pH value monitoring module are all connected with the online basifier preparation device, and effluent of the water sample pH value monitoring module enters the sodium ion concentration measurement module; the on-line alkalizer preparation device, the water sample pH value monitoring module and the sodium ion concentration measurement module are all connected to the data processing unit. A to-be-measured water sample enters the online alkalizer preparation device to generate OH <-> on line to adjust the pH value of the to-be-measured water sample, after the pH value of the measured water sample meets the requirement, the water sample enters the electrode cup and the sodium ion electrode to measure the concentration of sodium ions in water on line, and a measurement signal is output to the data processing unit for data processing and display. The method has a good alkalization effect on the effluent of the cation bed, and can greatly improve the measurement accuracy and sensitivity of the sodium ions in the water sample to be measured.
column14: ZHEJIANG XIRE LIHUA INTELLIGENT SENSOR TECH CO LTD

column12: Automatic deslagging food processor
column13: The invention relates to a kitchen cooking appliance, in particular to an automatic deslagging food processor. The automatic deslagging food processor is characterized in that the food processor comprises a pulverizing cup, a pulverizing device arranged in the pulverizing cup and a filtering device installed at the bottom of the pulverizing cup. A liquid outlet for automatically discharging liquidand a residue outlet for automatically discharging residues are formed in the bottom of the crushing cup, the space in the cup body is divided into a liquid collecting cavity and a residue collectingcavity by the filtering device, the liquid outlet is located in the liquid collecting cavity, and the residue outlet is located in the residue collecting cavity. According to the food processor, automatic residue filtering, automatic pulp discharging and automatic residue discharging can be achieved, and full automation of the food processor is achieved on the basis that the taste requirements ofconsumers are met.
column15: WANG XUNING;;WAN JUN;;YUCHI YANMIN;;YU QINGHUI;;HUANG QILANG

column12: Method for determining assimilation performance of iron ore powder
column13: The invention discloses a method for determining assimilation performance of iron ore powder and belongs to the technical field of metallurgical physical and chemical performance determination. The method is capable of representing the assimilation performance of the iron ore powder by using an assimilation reaction parameter M, and specifically comprises the following steps: respectively grinding the iron ore powder and a CaO reagent to be less than or equal to 100 meshes, pressing the iron ore powder into a cylinder with the diameter of 8mm, and pressing the CaO reagent into a gasket with the diameter of 20-22mm; then placing iron ore powder on the CaO reagent, keeping the temperature at 200 DEG C, quickly heating to 800 DEG C, keeping the temperature, quickly heating to 1200 DEG C, keeping the temperature, and heating at the speed of 3-10 DEG C/min until the assimilation reaction is finished, wherein in the roasting process, TD1, S1, TD2 and S2 are determined and calculated according to M = (T/1000)*H*eta, T = (TD1 + TD2)/2, and eta = (S2-S1)/S1. According to the invention, errors caused by thermal hysteresis can be effectively avoided, and the accuracy of assimilation performance data measurement is improved.
column15: WANG HONGBIN;;ZHENG AIJUN;;JIA JIANPING;;YANG YONGQIANG;;LI YANG;;WANG ZHONGHUA;;HAN TAO;;SHEN FENGMAN;;ZHENG HAIYAN;;JIANG XIN;;GAO QIANGJIAN

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MONITORING THE PRESENCE OR ABSENCE OF A TOOTH OF A BUCKET IN A TRUCK HOPPER AND IN A PRIMARY CRUSHER
column13: Disclosed is a system and method for detecting the presence of a shovel tooth in a hopper of a truck and in a primary crusher, the system comprising: a plurality of devices that interact with each other to determine the presence of the tooth by establishing Wi-Fi communication; and devices that receive wireless signals, located in a cabin for a shovel operator, a cabin of an operator of a mining extraction truck, and a cabin of a primary crusher operator. The data collected (e.g., location of the tooth, identification of the tooth, statues of the battery and operating times) and the analysis thereof allows it to be deduced whether a tooth remains inside the extraction and loading area, whether it is on board a truck, and whether it is approaching the crusher. Depending on the location of the tooth, the system generates different types of records (ID of the device of the nearby tooth, location), activating audio and visual alarms in the devices.

column12: Method for selecting optimal ore grinding medium proportion by identifying area of inert zone in ball mill
column13: The invention relates to a method for selecting an optimal ore grinding medium ratio by identifying the area of an inert zone in a ball mill, and belongs to the technical field of ore grinding optimization. Carrying out ore grinding process investigation and ore mechanical property determination on a separation plant, carrying out discrete element analogue simulation under different medium proportions, and exporting motion state diagrams of particle swarms in a ball mill at different moments after simulation operation is stable; the motion state diagrams of the particle swarms in the ball mill at different moments are imported into imagej software to be processed, an image in which an obvious boundary exists between an inert zone and other zones is obtained, an inert zone range is divided, and the area of the inert zone range is counted. According to the method, on the basis of discrete element method analogue simulation, imagej software is used for processing motion state diagrams of particles in the ball mill at different moments to accurately recognize and count the inert zone in the mill, so that a better ore grinding medium proportioning scheme is compared and selected, and the defect that previous visual observation is inaccurate and unscientific is effectively overcome.

column12: Distributed sensor monitoring device based on 1000-3000 m geothermal collection
column13: The utility model discloses a distributed sensor monitoring device based on 1000-3000m terrestrial heat collection in the technical field of terrestrial heat well heat collection, which comprises a heat exchange assembly, distributed temperature measurement assemblies are arranged on the outer wall of the heat exchange assembly, optical fiber pipelines are arranged among the distributed temperature measurement assemblies, a monitoring system terminal is arranged at the top end of each optical fiber pipeline, and the monitoring system terminals are connected with the distributed temperature measurement assemblies. A measuring circuit board is arranged in the distributed temperature measuring assembly; the distributed monitoring system composed of the distributed temperature measuring assembly, the optical fiber pipeline and the monitoring system terminal is designed, the optical fiber sensors can be evenly distributed along the shaft of the geothermal well to monitor geothermal temperature data at different positions, all the data are integrated together, more accurate temperature data are obtained through calculation, and the accuracy of the temperature data is improved. Errors are greatly reduced, improvement and maintenance of equipment are facilitated, heat loss in the mining process is reduced, and the heat collecting benefit of the heat collecting assembly is increased.
column14: XIAN TIANTONG INTERNET OF THINGS TECH CO LTD

column12: Wear-resistant steel plate impact test evaluation processing method and system
column13: The invention discloses a wear-resistant steel plate impact test evaluation processing method and system. The method comprises the steps: photographing a wear-resistant steel plate to obtain a first photo, wherein the first photo is the photo of the wear-resistant steel plate before the impact test; photographing the wear-resistant steel plate subjected to the impact test to obtain a second photo; identifying cracks added in the second photo according to the first photo and the second photo; and determining the impact resistance of the wear-resistant steel plate according to the cracks and the impact test to which the wear-resistant steel plate is subjected. According to the invention, the problem that no good scheme for testing whether the wear-resistant steel plate in the ore grinding machine can bear the impact of the medium exists in the prior art is solved, so that the impact resistance of the steel plate can be accurately obtained, and data support is provided for use and replacement of the steel plate in the ore grinding machine.

column12: Novel data exchange gateway module
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of network appliances, in particular to a novel data exchange gateway module, which comprises a gateway body and at least one group of connecting mechanism, the connecting mechanism comprises two rectangular grooves which are symmetrically arranged on the side surfaces of the bottom of the gateway body, rectangular connecting pieces are connected in the two rectangular grooves, and the rectangular connecting pieces are connected with the gateway body. One end of the rectangular connecting piece is rotationally connected with the groove wall of the rectangular groove through a rotating shaft, and the other end of the rectangular connecting piece is connected with a suction cup. In practical application, through the arrangement of the connecting mechanism, the problems that the existing data exchange gateway is not provided with a fixing device, so that the data exchange gateway can only be randomly placed on the ground or a desktop, the placement is disordered, various complicated connecting wires are inconvenient to store, the placement is not fixed, and the data exchange gateway is inconvenient to use are effectively solved. And the loss is caused by easy falling.

column12: Data processing method, system and equipment applied to digital resource weaving
column13: The invention discloses a data processing method, system and equipment applied to digital resource weaving, and belongs to the technical field of digital resource processing and data resource application. According to the method, other digital resources are also included in the weaving object range, so that the applicability is improved. Various digital resources are associated and integrated through the connector, and the resource circulation and exchange mode is simplified. Through integration and association of the digital resources, data discovery and data positioning are simplified, efficiency is improved, and intelligent interaction of the digital resources is further realized. Through integration, analysis, development and mining of the digital resources, the digital assets are quickly and effectively formed, and a complete link from the digital resources to the digital assets is broken through.

column12: Electromagnetic ore processing method and implementation device thereof
column13: The invention relates to an electromagnetic ore processing method before grinding of precious metal ore, which can be used for ore preparation before extraction of useful components. The technical result of the proposed method and device is that the productivity of the grinding equipment is increased and the extraction of useful components is increased by reducing the strength properties of the boundary layer at the interface of the ore and non-ore phases, thereby ensuring selective destruction of the material when further mechanically grinding the ore material, reducing the probability of failure of the ore and non-ore phases. The technical result of the invention is achieved by the fact that the duration of the low-frequency magnetic field is at least 10 times the duration of the influence of the high-frequency magnetic field and the period of action of the high-frequency magnetic field is at least 100 times less than the period of the main magnetic field as a result of the influence of the low-frequency pulsed magnetic field and the high-frequency pulsed magnetic field on the material to be treated. Exposure of a pulsed magnetic field is carried out in a softening device for crystalline structure materials equipped with a main inductor and an additional inductor, and a protective shell separating the inner surface of the electromagnetic system and the material processing zone, while a low current inductor system is also contained in the shell, the system being inductively connected to the main inductor and the additional inductor, the sensor is connected to a measuring element as part of the device.

column12: Glass raw material crushing device
column13: The utility model discloses a glass raw material crushing device which comprises a machine box, a motor is installed at one end of the outer surface of the machine box, an output shaft of the motor penetrates through the side wall of the machine box and extends into the machine box, a feeding hopper is installed at the other end of the outer surface of the machine box, and the discharging end of the feeding hopper corresponds to a screening plate arranged in the machine box. A rotor, a hammer head, a flow guide plate, a first impact plate, a second impact plate, a first buffer mechanism and asecond buffer mechanism are arranged in a crushing cavity in the case; a discharging hopper is further arranged at one end of the outer surface of the machine box and communicates with a crushing cavity in the machine box. According to the glass raw material crushing device, the stone crushing capacity is improved through the first impact plate and the second impact plate, so that large ores can be completely crushed into fine crushed stones, and later processing is facilitated; therefore, the device can effectively crush the glass mineral raw materials, and has the advantages of simple structure, high automation degree and good crushing effect.

column12: Ionic soil stabilizer suitable for storage yard slope in southern rare earth mining area
column13: The invention relates to an ionic soil stabilizer suitable for a storage yard side slope in a southern rare earth mining area. The ionic soil stabilizer mainly aims at granite weathered products subjected to ore leaching treatment and soil formed on the granite weathered products. The stabilizer is prepared from calcium chloride, sodium alkyl benzene sulfonate, attapulgite, water glass and water according to a certain proportion. The liquid injection agent is injected into a soil body by digging a seepage ditch or punching a liquid injection hole in a side slope of a tailing storage yard in a rare earth mining area, so that the anti-shearing capability of the soil body can be quickly improved, the stability of the side slope is improved, and the occurrence risk of landslide is reduced. Through an indoor simulation test, the soil cohesive force and the internal friction angle are respectively improved by 21.8% and 12.5% compared with a contrast, and the anti-shearing capability is obviously improved. After a pilot plant test is carried out on the side slope of a rare earth tailing storage yard, the stability coefficient of the side slope under the self-weight working condition is increased to 2.14 from 1.03 before application, the stability coefficient of the side slope under the rainstorm and self-weight working condition is increased to 1.41 from 0.96 before application, and the stability level of the side slope is increased to a stable state from an understable state and an unstable state.
column15: GAO CHAO;;ZHANG HUAN;;XU MINGXU;;CHEN FEI;;WANG XINGXIANG

column12: Method for evaluating diffusivity of lithium ions in positive electrode material
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of lithium ion battery material detection, and particularly relates to a method for evaluating the diffusivity of lithium ions in a positive electrode material. According to the method for evaluating the diffusivity of the lithium ions in the positive electrode material, the size relation of the lithium ion diffusion coefficient of the positive electrode material to be evaluated can be obtained by directly using a traditional charging and discharging cabinet and depending on the charging and discharging cycle test data of the battery. Different from the direct test of the diffusion coefficient in the prior art, under the demand of only evaluating the diffusivity of each material, compared with other evaluation means for directly solving the diffusion coefficient, the method has the advantages that the test steps are simple, the test steps can be integrated with the battery charge-discharge capacity test, the cycle performance test and the like, and the test efficiency is greatly improved. According to the method, professional equipment and a specific experimental scheme are not needed, the method belongs to deep mining of conventional cycle test data, and the difference of the lithium ion diffusivity of multiple types of positive electrode materials can be accurately evaluated in a relatively short time.
column14: HONEYCOMB ENERGY SCIENCE AND TECH SHARE LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Automatic sampling device
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic sampling device which comprises a bottom box, a top plate is fixedly arranged on the top of the bottom box, a first side plate is fixedly arranged on the left side of the top of the top plate, and a second side plate is fixedly arranged on the right side of the top of the top plate. According to the automatic sampling device, through cooperation of the first packing auger, the grinding roller, the sample collecting barrel and the discharging pipe, ore samples of different depths can be conveniently sampled and ground in time, the samples cannot be confused in the process, sampling is accurate and representative, the reliability of chemical analysis data is improved, and the sampling efficiency is improved. Through cooperation of the inner baffle ring, the outer baffle ring, the sample collection iron boxes and the scale groove, ore materials falling from the blanking pipe can be sequentially collected by different sample collection iron boxes, when ore samples of different depths need to be collected, the ore materials taken out of different depths are observed through the scale groove, and then sampling by workers is facilitated.
column14: ABAGA BANNER JINDI MINING IND CO LTD

column12: Slope soil curing agent for tailing storage yard in southern rare earth mining area
column13: The invention discloses a soil curing agent for a side slope of a tailing storage yard in a southern rare earth mining area. The soil curing agent mainly aims at granite weathered products subjected to ore leaching treatment and soil formed on the granite weathered products. The curing agent is prepared from water glass, disodium hydrogen phosphate, polyacrylamide, hydroxymethyl cellulose and water according to a certain proportion. The liquid injection agent is injected into a soil body by digging a seepage ditch or punching a liquid injection hole in a side slope of a tailing storage yard in a rare earth mining area, so that the anti-shearing capability of the soil body can be quickly improved, the stability of the side slope is improved, and the occurrence risk of landslide is reduced. Through an indoor simulation test, the soil cohesive force and the internal friction angle are respectively improved by 23.6% and 11.7% compared with a contrast, and the anti-shearing capability is obviously improved. After a pilot plant test is carried out on the side slope of a rare earth tailing storage yard, the stability coefficient of the side slope under the self-weight working condition is increased to 2.10 from 1.03 before application, the stability coefficient of the side slope under the rainstorm and self-weight working condition is increased to 1.28 from 0.96 before application, and the stability level of the side slope is increased to a stable state from an understable state and an unstable state.
column15: GAO CHAO;;WANG YONGHONG;;HAN LINRUI;;CHEN FEI;;WANG XINGXIANG

column12: Mine goaf groundwater leaching simulation device and experiment method
column13: The invention provides a mine goaf underground water leaching simulation device and experiment method, and the device comprises a temperature control box which is used for simulating the environment temperature of a goaf; the leaching simulation box is horizontally arranged in the temperature control box, an ore layer is arranged in the leaching simulation box, a liquid inlet is formed in the bottom of one side wall of the leaching simulation box, and an air inlet is formed in the top of one side wall of the leaching simulation box; a liquid outlet is formed in the bottom of the other side wall, and an air outlet is formed in the top; the liquid inlet assembly is communicated with the liquid inlet; the liquid collecting device is communicated with the liquid outlet; the air inlet assembly is communicated with the air inlet; and the gas collecting device is communicated with the gas outlet. According to the mine goaf groundwater leaching simulation device and the experiment method, the structure is simple, operation is convenient, the horizontal leaching effect of a mine goaf stratum and groundwater is simulated more truly, the process and change of forming acid mine water from the groundwater can be monitored and analyzed conveniently, and the credibility and accuracy of gushing water source judgment are improved.

column12: Software architecture recovery method and device
column13: The invention relates to a software architecture recovery method and device, belongs to the technical field of software, and solves the problems that in the prior art, only a current project is used for mining feature weights in a development style, and the recovery precision is low. The software architecture recovery method comprises the following steps: extracting source code static informationof a software project by using a JDT tool and storing the source code static information in a database; generating a feature matrix of a software architecture based on the source code static information; obtaining a feature weight based on similar software project data of the open source software community; and recovering the software architecture of the software project based on the feature matrix configured with the feature weight. The feature weight of architecture recovery is learned from group software development intelligence by utilizing an open source software project, and the recoveryaccuracy is improved.

column12: Vacuum cup mouth grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses an opening grinding machine for a vacuum cup, which relates to the technical field of automation and comprises a first moving device, a second moving device and a third moving device, the first moving device comprises a first servo motor, a first driving lead screw and a first component, the output end of the first servo motor is connected with the first driving lead screw, and the second moving device is mounted at the upper part of the first component; the first moving device drives the second moving device to move in the horizontal direction; the second moving device comprises a second servo motor, a second driving lead screw and a second assembly. The output end of the second servo motor is connected with the second driving lead screw. The fixing device is installed on the side, away from the first moving device, of the second assembly and used for installing and fixing the cup opening grinding mold. The opening grinding device is located under the fixing device, and a cup opening is formed in the top of the opening grinding device. During use, the production efficiency and the yield are greatly improved, actions are automatically completed through machinery, errors caused by manual operation are reduced, and therefore the yield is improved.
column14: SUZHOU SOFTWARE INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Ore intelligence sorting apparatus and method based on X-rays discernment
column13: Abstract The ore intelligence sorting apparatus and method based on X-rays discernment is disclosed by the invention, the apparatus mainly includes a feeding unit with a toothed classifier, and a X ray excitation unit with filter, and a characteristic spectrum receiving unit with filter, and a computer analysis and control unit with a central control unit, a spectral acquisition system, an industrial computer and an instruction output system, and a separator unit with a cylinder and a wear-resistant kick plate. The feeding unit is fed by a vibrating feeder, and grading materials by means of a toothed classifier, and the measured ore is stimulated by the X ray excitation unit to produce a characteristic x ray spectra, and the characteristic spectrum receiving unit receives characteristic x ray spectrum which is then analyzed by the computer analysis and control unit, and a sorting instructions is output based on the analysis results. The invention is used for sorting magnetic or non-magnetic ores in a concentrator. The invention has the advantages of high product grade, high recovery rate, a large capacity, low water consumption and high automation degree.

column12: Intelligent data sensitivity detection method and system based on large model
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent data sensitivity detection method and system based on a large model, and belongs to the technical field of sensitive information detection. According to the method, after the text data is preliminarily evaluated, staged sensitive data recognition is determined and implemented according to different recognition difficulties, the whole sensitive data recognition process is divided into two independent but mutually associated stages, and different data distribution recognized in the two stages is restrained by adjusting difficult sample thresholds, so that the recognition accuracy of the sensitive data is improved. The invention aims to realize real-time classification and detection of sensitive information in data interaction. According to the technology, the advanced large model algorithm is integrated, and text data with different complexities are accurately analyzed, so that the data security is enhanced, deep sensitive information mining can be performed on the text data in real time in a digital environment, the common security risk in the digital era is effectively dealt with, and the security guarantee of data exchange is enhanced.

column12: Lithium ion battery kilowatt-hour cost prediction method and device
column13: The invention provides a lithium ion battery kilowatt-hour cost prediction method and device, and relates to the field of energy storage, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the related data of a lithium ion battery, carrying out the calculation according to the related data of the lithium ion battery, obtaining a full-life-cycle cost discount value of the lithium ion battery, and carrying out the prediction of the kilowatt-hour cost of the lithium ion battery according to the full-life-cycle cost discount value of the lithium ion battery. Calculating the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery, establishing a prediction model of the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery by utilizing the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery based on a learning curve theory, and carrying out sensitivity analysis on the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery according to the prediction model of the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery to obtain a change trend chart. The trend prediction research on the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery fills the gap of research on the prediction aspect of the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery. Sensitivity analysis on the trend of the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery is beneficial to mining sensitive factors of the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery, and reference is provided for reducing the cost per kilowatt-hour of the lithium ion battery in the future.
column14: ELECTRIC POWER CONSTRUCTION DIRECT STATION OF CHINA SOUTHERN POWER GRID CO LTD

column12: Construction method of long-time-sequence year-by-year mangrove forest remote sensing monitoring product
column13: The invention provides a construction method of a long-time-sequence year-by-year mangrove forest remote sensing monitoring product, and the method comprises the steps: firstly, based on a long-time-sequence multispectral remote sensing image, fully mining rich time-sequence spectral information, and synthesizing one-year multiband image; constructing a mangrove forest multispectral pixel sample library suitable for long-time-sequence year-by-year mangrove forest, and carrying out machine learning-based year-by-year mangrove forest supervised classification; further, by means of a time sequence consistency checking and correcting method, accidental classification errors of individual years are effectively removed, and the precision of long-time-sequence year-by-year mangrove forest remote sensing monitoring products is improved. The mangrove forest remote sensing monitoring product constructed by the method can serve as thematic information data to be provided for mangrove forest resource competent departments, a scientific basis is provided for protection, recovery or reconstruction of mangrove forests, the method has great practical value, the application value of long-time-sequence multispectral remote sensing images is greatly improved, the method is an innovation in the aspect of remote sensing information technology application, and the method is worthy of popularization and application. The method is a beneficial supplement for a coastal wetland remote sensing information extraction method system.

column12: Grinding and polishing device for optical element
column13: The utility model discloses a grinding and polishing device for an optical element, which comprises a workbench and two mounting frames, the upper end of the workbench is provided with a mounting groove, the workbench is provided with a driving mechanism for driving the optical element to move, and the driving mechanism comprises two electric slide rails arranged on the workbench. A movable frame is arranged on the electric sliding rail, a suction cup assembly is installed at the top in the movable frame through an air cylinder, a conveying belt is arranged on the inner wall of the installation frame, a motor is arranged at the bottom in the workbench, and a rotating disc is arranged at the bottom in the installation groove. According to the automatic grinding device, the driving mechanism is arranged, the suction cup assemblies on the two sides of the workbench can be matched with the air cylinder and the electric sliding rail to place the optical element on the workbench and take down the optical element, automatic grinding of the optical element can be achieved, and then the automation degree of the device is improved.

column12: UPPER PILL-CRUSHING-CUP DETECTION
column13: A sensor detects the presence of an upper cup in a pair of cups, between which pills are crushed by machine. Operation of the crushing machine is prevented if the upper cup is absent, and enabled if the upper cup is present. The sensor may be a photodiode that is sensitive to a beam of laser light that is directed over the lower cup. The beam passes when the upper cup is absent and is blocked by the upper cup when present. An optional sensor may be included to detect whether the drawer containing the cups and pills is closed, which is used as a further condition that must be satisfied before crushing can be started. Also, an interlock can be included to prevent the drawer from opening during the crushing process. By ensuring the presence of the upper cup, the escape of powdered medication can be prevented.
column15: FADER AARON EDWARD;;TANG YIN KWONG WILLIAM

column12: Chamfering mechanism for special-shaped cup opening of universal joint
column13: The utility model relates to a universal joint special-shaped cup mouth chamfering mechanism, which belongs to the technical field of universal joint processing equipment, and comprises a support assembly and a chamfering assembly which is rotatably connected to the support assembly and acts on a workpiece, and the support assembly is provided with a floating assembly which applies torsion to thechamfering assembly to rotate towards the workpiece. The chamfering mechanism for the special-shaped cup opening of the universal joint has the advantages of being high in automation degree, improvingmachining efficiency, reducing labor intensity and being good in grinding effect.
column14: ZHEJIANG ODM TRANS TECHNOLOGY CO LTD

column12: Method for recovering geomorphic form of exploited fossil energy stratum
column13: The invention provides a recovery method for a geomorphic form of a mined fossil energy stratum, and the recovery method comprises the steps: carrying out the seismic exploration of a mined fossil energy research region, and obtaining seismic data; processing the seismic data to obtain processed seismic data, and obtaining the distribution condition of the collapse stratum; the collapse stratum is tracked on the seismic section through a stratum trend method, the distribution situation of the exploited stratum on the plane is obtained, and the exploited stratum is the target stratum of the exploited research area; performing time-depth conversion on the target stratum to obtain the depth of the stratum; subtracting the depths of the top stratum and the bottom stratum to obtain the thickness of the residual stratum; carrying out dip angle correction on the residual stratum thickness to obtain the real residual stratum thickness; and the residual stratum is compacted and corrected, and the real deposition thickness of the stratum after fossil energy exploitation is obtained. Evaluation factors for understanding the exploited stratum are increased, and the reutilization rate of mining areas and oil fields after exploitation is improved.
column32: 韦忠红;: "塔河油田4区奥陶系古地貌恢复研究", 内蒙古石油化工, no. 07, 28 July 2006 (2006-07-28)

column12: Food processor capable of accurately measuring temperature
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of food processing devices, and particularly discloses a food processor accurate in temperature measurement, which comprises a machine body, a crushing cup and a motor, the crushing cup and the motor are arranged on the machine body, a crushing device driven by the motor is arranged in the crushing cup, a liquid discharge hole is formed in the cup wall of the crushing cup, and a liquid discharge valve is arranged at the liquid discharge hole. The drain valve comprises a valve body fixed outside the crushing cup and a valve element movably arranged in the valve body, the valve element moves to control opening and closing of the drain hole, the valve element is further provided with a temperature sensor used for detecting the temperature of liquid in the crushing cup, and the temperature sensor moves along with the valve element. The temperature sensor is arranged on the valve element, the distance between the temperature sensor and liquid in the smashing cup can be reduced compared with the mode that the temperature sensor is fixed to the outer side of the cup wall, the temperature sensor can make direct contact with slurry at the liquid discharging hole, and temperature measurement is accurate; the valve element serves as an installation carrier of the temperature sensor, the problems that holes are punched in the cup wall of the smashing cup and residues are hidden in the punched holes are avoided, cleaning is convenient, and the structural strength of the smashing cup can be guaranteed.
column14: HANGZHOU JOYOUNG HOUSEHOLD ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES CO LTD

column12: AEROSOL DEPOSITION DEVICE
column13: Device (1) for applying an aerosol on a biological system, the device (1) comprising: a base and a casing, the casing comprising a frame (24) and four panels (36) removably inserted in the frame (24).

column12: Programmable miniature four-axis aircraft based on 3D printing
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicles, in particular to a 3D printing-based programmable miniature quadrotor which comprises a rack, the rack is integrally formed by PLA (polylactic acid) materials through a 3D printing technology, a battery is mounted in the rack and made of a high-polymer lithium battery, miniature hollow cup motors are arranged on the periphery of the rack, and the miniature hollow cup motors are arranged on the rack. An output shaft of the micro hollow cup motor is connected with anticlockwise propeller blades and clockwise propeller blades, and the anticlockwise propeller blades and the clockwise propeller blades are symmetrically distributed in pairs; based on the 3D printing technology, the special mechanical configuration and size of the micro aircraft can be self-defined according to different user requirements, the cruising ability of the aircraft can be enhanced by utilizing the high-voltage lithium ion polymer battery, the flight control mainboard has a high-integration design, can autonomously control flight in a programmable manner, and is low in manufacturing cost, safe, environment-friendly and suitable for popularization and application. The miniature four-axis aircraft is mainly used for guiding teenagers to learn programming and carry out aerospace science popularization activities.
column14: CITY COLLEGE OF HUIZHOU HUIZHOU COLLEGE OF BUSINESS

column12: Raw material bin blockage monitoring method and device
column13: The invention provides a raw material bin blockage monitoring method and device, and relates to production equipment monitoring management. The problem that production is affected due to the fact thata stone inlet and a stone outlet of crushing equipment are directly blocked when blockage cannot be found manually in time can be solved. According to the specific technical scheme, by collecting image data, when material blocking information is judged through system analysis and processing, an indication control lamp prompts display and notifies equipment to process the information; the problemthat production is affected due to the fact that a stone inlet and a stone outlet of crushing equipment are directly blocked when blockage cannot be found manually in time can be solved. Due to the fact that ore supply is the first step of all procedures, continuous work of the whole production procedure is guaranteed in the supply link, the final capacity of the gravel production line is affectedto a large extent, the profit rate of an enterprise is increased, and indirect losses caused by equipment shutdown are reduced. The method is applied to the field of ore processing equipment monitoring.
column14: XIAN REDOUBLE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: Adjusting device for ore pulp liquid level of flotation tank
column13: The utility model discloses an adjusting device for the ore pulp liquid level of a flotation tank, belongs to the technical field of ore dressing, and aims to solve the problems that the ore pulp liquid level of a large-capacity flotation tank is not accurate and potential safety hazards exist due to manual operation and control in the prior art. The adjusting device for the ore pulp liquid level of the flotation tank comprises a liquid level measuring device, a control device, a first straight stroke type electric actuator, a water inlet valve and a middle chamber. The liquid level measuring device comprises a magnetic floater liquid level meter and a guide pipe, and the liquid level detection precision can be improved. A liquid level transmitter is arranged in the magnetic floater liquid level meter, liquid level signals are linearly transmitted to the control device, the control device converts collected data information into adjusting signals, the opening degree of a water inlet valve is controlled through a first straight stroke type electric actuator, and the purpose of accurately controlling the liquid level of ore pulp in a flotation tank is achieved. And the production safety and the metal recovery rate in the concentration process are improved.

column12: Method for detecting maturity of organic matters in whole rock based on methane content
column13: The invention discloses a method for detecting maturity of organic matters in whole rock based on methane content. The method comprises the following steps: S01, grinding a rock sample into powder by using a crusher; s02, filling the powder in the step 01 into a measuring cup, and heating the powder sample by using a gas heater; s03, detecting a methane signal released by the sample by using a methane content detector in the heating process, and recording temperature data of the to-be-detected sample at the same time; s04, recording a signal peak value detected by the methane content detector, and searching a temperature value of the sample at a time point by utilizing the time point corresponding to the peak value; s05, utilizing a corresponding relation between a temperature value corresponding to a predetermined methane signal peak value and an organic matter maturation stage; s06, determining an organic matter maturation stage of the sample; according to the method, the maturity of the organic matters in the rock can be rapidly and accurately detected.

column12: Portable fracturing propping agent breakage rate detection device and determination method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of oil and gas field fracturing, and particularly relates to a portable fracturing propping agent breakage rate detection device and a determination method. A portable fracturing propping agent breakage rate detection device comprises a metering part and a crushing part, the metering part comprises a screen, a balance and a display terminal, the screen is connected with a sampling port of a fracturing blender truck through a conveying belt, the balance is located below the screen and connected with the display terminal, and the display terminal is connected with the display terminal. The crushing part comprises a proppant cup and a hydraulic assembly, and the hydraulic assembly is used for crushing the proppant in the proppant cup. The device is simple in structure and easy to operate, data can be obtained in real time, the real breakage rate of the proppant can be directly evaluated on a fracturing site, the detection process is rapid and accurate, and therefore the on-site proppant quality control requirement is met.
column15: TIAN FAGUO;;ZHANG KUANGSHENG;;LI XIANWEN;;AI XIN;;ZHANG YANMING;;LU MEI;;LI LOULOU;;LYU HAIYAN;;DONG LIQUAN;;YIN XIAOHONG

column12: Explosion-proof water cooling device for mining high-power permanent magnet direct-drive motor
column13: The invention provides an explosion-proof water cooling device for a mining high-power permanent magnet direct-drive motor. On the one hand, an axial flow fan and a heat exchanger are adopted to realize heat exchange between a heat medium and air; on the other hand, internal circulation of a cooling medium is achieved through a water pump, whether the device works normally or not is monitored on line, and problems are checked before the device is abnormal, so that a solution can be provided for workers to analyze data in time, and the reliability and safety performance of the device are improved.
column14: ZHUZHOU LINCE GROUP CO LTD;;HUNAN LINCE TRACK EQUIP CO LTD
column15: HU JINRUN;;LI YOUYU;;CHEN YAO;;WU KAI;;WANG XIANHAI

column12: Rolling mortar wall of multi-cylinder hydraulic cone crusher for crushing cobblestones
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining machinery, in particular to a rolling mortar wall of a multi-cylinder hydraulic cone crusher for crushing cobblestones, which is provided with an inner cylindrical surface, a horizontal annular surface, a vertical inner circular surface and an inner conical surface, the inner cylindrical surface is positioned at the upper end; the plurality of horizontal circular ring surfaces and the plurality of vertical inner circular surfaces are positioned in the middle, and one horizontal circular ring surface and one vertical inner circular surface form an inverted step, so that a plurality of inverted steps are formed; the inner conical surface is located at the lower end and is in a big-end-down form. By using the rolling mortar wall of the multi-cylinder hydraulic cone crusher for crushing the cobblestones, when the cobblestones entering a crushing cavity are rolled and crushed, the phenomena of slipping and upward spitting of the cobblestones in the crushing cavity are well eliminated due to the blocking and limiting effects of multiple steps, the quality of finished products is improved, the service time of quick-wear parts is prolonged, and the production cost is reduced. And the throughput of the cobblestones is increased.
column15: LOU LIXIA;;HU XINHUA;;CHEN WEIXIN;;DONG QIONG;;JIA JINZHONG

column12: Food processor
column13: The utility model discloses a food processor, which belongs to the field of life electric appliances, solves the problem that the crushing efficiency and the crushing effect are difficult to further improve, and adopts the technical scheme that a detection sensor is arranged on a crushing cup, a detection probe of the detection sensor extends into the crushing cup, an auxiliary cutter is mounted on the detection probe, and the auxiliary cutter is fixed on the crushing cup. The auxiliary cutter is located outside the rotating range of the smashing cutter. The crusher is mainly used for further improving the crushing efficiency and effect.

column12: Multi-element on-site detection device in bulk ore loading, unloading and transporting process
column13: The utility model discloses a multi-element on-site detection device in bulk ore loading, unloading and transporting processes, which is characterized in that ores are conveyed through a conveying belt module, bulk ore samples are obtained through a sampling module, various components in bulk ore are collected through a multi-element detection module, and the samples are crushed and mixed into balls through a mixing module. The nuclide contained in the sample material is identified through the nuclide detection module, the radioactivity contained in the sample material is measured and detected through the radiation detection module, the sample material detected by each module is weighed through the multi-point weighing module, and the information of each module is summarized and processed through the multi-information processing module. And the detected sample material is sent back to the hopper through the sample material module. The device has the beneficial effects that the coverage rate is improved through high-density sampling, the efficiency is improved by implementing single-batch analysis on site, the deviation is reduced through multi-element detection and data comparison, the accuracy is improved, and the labor intensity is reduced without an independent sampling process.
column14: JIANGSU FLASH CODE OPTO ELECTRO MECHANICAL SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
column15: SONG YAQIANG;;WANG HONG;;WANG LIMING;;WANG YONGQING;;LI QIANG;;FU LIGE;;ZHOU GUOJUN

column12: Ball mill load measuring method and device, electronic equipment and medium
column13: The invention provides a ball mill load measuring method and device, electronic equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of ore grinding, the method comprises the following steps: obtaining vibration signal data and audio signal data of a ball mill; performing feature extraction on the vibration signal data and the audio signal data to obtain vibration IMF component feature data and audio mfcc feature data; obtaining a pre-trained multi-modal neural network model, and inputting the vibration IMF component feature data and the audio mfcc feature data into a multi-modal neural network model (comprising a feature extraction network, namely a vibration signal CNN sub-network, an audio signal CNN sub-network and a two-layer full-connection BP neural network connected with the feature extraction network) to obtain a ball mill load measurement result. The invention can accurately and effectively measure the filling amount of the ball mill, provides possibility for real-time control of the filling amount of the ball mill, can improve the working efficiency of the ball mill, and reduces power consumption and raw material consumption.
column14: TIANJIN ZHONGXIN ZHIGUAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Grinding wheel positioning and tool setting device of straight knife sharpener
column13: The utility model discloses a straight knife sharpener grinding wheel positioning and tool setting device which comprises a lathe bed, a suction cup workbench and a grinding head assembly movably supported on the lathe bed, a tool setting gauge is installed on the lathe bed and located on the outer side of one end of the suction cup workbench, and a tool setting working face on the tool setting gauge is lower than a workpiece adsorption plane of the suction cup workbench; a cleaning nozzle is installed on one side of the tool setting gauge and faces the tool setting working face of the tool setting gauge. A movable cover cap is arranged on the tool setting gauge and the cleaning nozzle, the movable cover cap comprises a top cover plate and a side plate connected with the periphery of the top cover plate, a notch is formed in the side plate, and the movable cover cap is driven by a cover cap driving device. By adopting the grinding wheel positioning and tool setting device of the straight knife sharpener, the automation of the tool setting process of the straight knife sharpener can be realized, and the tool setting precision can be ensured.
column14: JIANGSU BEISITE NC MACHINERY CO LTD

column12: Intelligent control method for copper smelting slag ore grinding
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent control method for grinding copper smelting slag. The intelligent control method comprises the following steps: feeding; a rough grinding procedure; a screening procedure; a grading procedure; and an analysis procedure: sampling the materials conveyed in the first-section grading overflow pipeline and the second-section grading overflow pipeline by using a sampler respectively, conveying the sampled materials to an online particle size analyzer, analyzing the concentration and fineness of overflow products by using the online particle size analyzer, and feeding back analyzed data to an ore grinding system for optimizing and controlling an ore grinding grading system. When the milling sound and the oil pressure of the hollow shaft are gradually increased, the heavy plate feeder immediately adjusts to gradually reduce the feeding amount and increase the water supply flow, so that the swelling phenomenon of the semi-autogenous mill is prevented; when the mill sound and the oil pressure of the hollow shaft exceed set values, the heavy plate feeder stops feeding immediately and increases the feed water flow until the swelling phenomenon of the semi-autogenous mill is eliminated and the semi-autogenous mill returns to normal, the heavy plate feeder recovers feeding, and the water supply pipeline returns to the set feed water flow, so that the phenomenon of swelling of the semi-autogenous mill for a long time is avoided, and the service life of the semi-autogenous mill is prolonged. And safe operation of the semi-autogenous mill is ensured.
column15: YE HONGBO;;WAN LIMING;;DONG XIANG;;DENG WENBIN;;JI XIANCI;;WANG CONGBING;;CHEN HONG

column12: Self-adaptive prediction method for key parameters in beneficiation process
column13: The invention relates to a self-adaptive prediction method for key parameters in a mineral separation process. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, establishing a mineral grinding classification working condition division model based on depth correlation alignment (Deep Call); then, the relative position codes are introduced into Transform, an attention mechanism is decoupled to directly encode the position information into the attention mechanism, and then the prediction performance is improved; furthermore, an adaptive prediction network is provided, a distribution matching regularization item is applied to hidden features of a Transform model, distribution differences among different working conditions are reduced to learn common knowledge of the hidden features of the model, and the generalization ability of the model is improved; and finally, learning the importance of the hidden state by adopting a Boosting-based method. According to the method, the distribution difference between different working conditions is reduced, the limitation that the mill load prediction precision is insufficient due to unstable ore grinding classification data distribution in an existing method is overcome, and the method has theoretical and practical significance on prediction of key parameters in the ore dressing process.
column15: PAN FUCHENG;;YIN HANG;;ZHOU XIAOFENG;;LI SHUAI;;LIU SHURUI;;JIA DONGNI

column12: System and method for detecting temperature of barrel of semi-autogenous mill
column13: The invention provides a system and a method for detecting the temperature of a barrel of a semi-autogenous mill. The system comprises a positioning subsystem, a thermal infrared imager and a server, the positioning subsystem comprises a first original part and a second original part; the thermal infrared imager is used for detecting temperature data of the semi-autogenous mill barrel in real time; the first original part is arranged on an end cover of the semi-autogenous mill and moves along with rotation of a barrel of the semi-autogenous mill; the second original is used for detecting position data of the first original and sending the position data to the server in real time; and the server is used for acquiring temperature data in the thermal infrared imager according to the position data and a preset acquisition rule, and storing and displaying the temperature data in a preset format. The detection system provided by the invention can comprehensively and accurately detect the temperature of the cylinder of the semi-autogenous mill; the method plays an important role in observing the process operation state of the semi-autogenous mill so as to guide the ore grinding process operation and improve the production efficiency.
column14: NORTH MINE INTELLIGENT CLOUD TECH BEIJING LIMITED COMPANY
column15: XU NING;;WANG JUNPENG;;GUO ZHIHAO;;ZHAO JIANQIANG;;LI XIAOGANG;;WANG WENFEI;;WANG SHANXIANG;;GAO TIANLONG;;GUI JUN;;LIU PENG

column12: Deep sea digging tooth rock breaking robot
column13: The deep sea digging tooth rock breaking robot comprises a chassis, a sliding table, a moving mechanism, a digging tooth ore breaking head and a motor I; the digging tooth ore crushing head comprises a connecting base, a motor base and a plurality of supporting shafts, the supporting shafts are connected with the connecting base and located in the same plane, each supporting shaft is provided with a shaft sleeve through a bearing, and the connecting base is connected with an output shaft of a motor I; the motor seat comprises a bearing seat and a plurality of motor mounting plates mounted on the bearing seat, a motor II is arranged on each motor mounting plate, an output shaft of each motor II is connected with the corresponding shaft sleeve, and sliding grooves are formed in the opposite side faces of the two sliding tables respectively; sliding blocks are arranged on the two side faces of the motor base respectively, and the sliding blocks are inserted into the corresponding sliding grooves. The two sliding tables and the motor base are connected with the lifting mechanism. The device is simple in structure and reliable in operation; and the motor is adopted to drive the digging tooth ore crushing head to rotate, ore crushing of the deep sea bottom is achieved, and the crushing efficiency is high.
column15: SUN KAI;;PENG YOUDUO;;XUE YUANYE;;ZHANG BING;;HE YINQIANG;;JIANG SHANQIANG

column12: Tunnel boring machine operating arrangement and method
column13: An operating arrangement for operating a tunnel boring machine for constructing a tunnel in a ground, the operating arrangement including a feed drive that is configured to advance the tunnel boring machine in the ground; a tool drive that is configured to drive a mining tool of the tunnel boring machine so that a successive removal of the ground is performable; at least one fluid tank for storing a drive fluid; at least one filtering arrangement for filtering the drive fluid; at least one cooling arrangement for cooling the drive fluid; and at least one control arrangement by which the feed drive and/or the tool drive is controllable wherein at least the feed drive and the tool drive are jointly arrangeable in a container.

column12: Method for measuring total iron content of complex multi-metal pyrite
column13: The invention discloses a method for measuring the total iron content of complex multi-metal pyrite, which is characterized in that a sulfur-phosphorus mixed acid is used for dissolving a sample, the problem that the sample is not completely dissolved by a single acid is solved, a conical flask is continuously shaken in the dissolving process, and the problem of low result caused by pyrophosphate or metaphosphate separated out from the bottom of the flask is effectively solved. Besides, the method disclosed by the invention is practically applied, and is researched and analyzed in combination with ore with specific properties, so that compared with the existing scheme, the method disclosed by the invention is more detailed and comprehensive, and the method is proved to have applicability by more accurate experimental data through long-term application. The accuracy and the precision of the method are better, the detection samples are within the error range, and the relative standard deviation is 0.04-0.13%; the recovery rate is good, and the standard addition recovery rate of the sample is 98.0-101.5%; the detection range is wide, and the total iron content of which the percentage content is more than 0.5% in the ore can be measured; the detection speed is high and the method is easy to master.
column15: WEN JIAN'AN;;ZHAO HUAKE;;YAN CHUANMING;;LEE DO-YOUNG;;XU DENGWEI;;CAO GUICHENG

column12: METHOD FOR PRODUCING MOLDING AND/OR DRYING MODULES FOR THE PRODUCTION OF CONTAINERS COMPRISING FIBERS, METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PRODUCING A CONTAINER COMPRISING FIBERS USING A MOLDING AND/OR DRYING MODULE
column13: The disclosure relates to a method for producing molding and/or drying modules for the production of containers comprising fibers by means of the molding and/or drying modules, wherein the method comprises producing a molding and/or drying module, wherein at least a part of the molding and/or drying module is produced by means of an additive manufacturing method, for example by means of 3D printing. The disclosure further relates to a device for carrying out the method for producing molding and/or drying modules for the production of containers comprising fibers, a molding and/or drying module produced by means of this method, a method for producing a container comprising fibers using a molding and/or drying module which has been produced by means of the method for producing molding and/or drying modules for the production of containers comprising fibers, and a device for producing containers comprising fibers.
