column12: Deep sea digging tooth rock breaking robot
column13: The deep sea digging tooth rock breaking robot comprises a chassis, a sliding table, a moving mechanism, a digging tooth ore breaking head and a motor I, the digging tooth ore crushing head comprises a connecting base, a motor base and a plurality of supporting shafts, the supporting shafts are connected with the connecting base and located in the same plane, each supporting shaft is provided with a shaft sleeve through a bearing, and the connecting base is connected with an output shaft of a motor I; the motor seat comprises a bearing seat and a plurality of motor mounting plates mounted on the bearing seat, a motor II is arranged on each motor mounting plate, an output shaft of each motor II is connected with the corresponding shaft sleeve, and sliding grooves are formed in the opposite side faces of the two sliding tables respectively; sliding blocks are arranged on the two side faces of the motor base respectively, and the sliding blocks are inserted into the corresponding sliding grooves. column12: SYSTEMS, DEVICES, AND METHODS FOR CONTAMINANT RESISTANT INSULATIVE STRUCTURES
column13: Embodiments of systems, devices, and methods relate to an electrode standoff isolator. An example electrode standoff isolator includes a plurality of adj acent insulative segments positioned between a proximal end and a distal end of the electrode standoff isolator. A geometry of the adjacent insulative is configured to guard a surface area of the electrode standoff isolator against deposition of a conductive layer of gaseous phase materials from a filament of an ion source.

column12: CONTRACT TRADING DEVICE
column13: Disclosed in the present application is a contract trading device, comprising: a contract underlying asset manager for managing a contract exchange rate Ph between a first asset A and a second asset B; a margin determiner for determining a trading margin for a trading user; a trading engine for matching trades between users; a spot market data processor which is configured to initiate a query to a spot market data server gateway and obtain a spot exchange rate Px; a user position adjustment processor which is configured to reflect Ph changes such that the contract position of the trading user expressed in terms of the number of A in a continuous time segment is negatively correlated with Ph, and the contract position of the trading user expressed in terms of the number of B is positively correlated with Ph; a trade data storage for storing basic information of the trading user; and a closeout processor for initiating a forced closeout request against the trading user to a trading server. The contract trading device in embodiments of the present application can effectively reduce impermanent loss, improve asset and data security, and achieve liquidity mining of a single asset.
column15: ZHANG DACHENG;;CHEN JIE;;ZHANG CHAO;;HOU DIANJIE;;WANG XIN;;GUO ZICHUAN;;LIANG YAO

column12: Multi-head blank grinding device for ceramic machining
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of blank grinding, and discloses a multi-head blank grinding device for ceramic processing, which comprises a support table, and a mounting frame is fixedly mounted on the support table; adjustable blank grinding mechanisms are arranged on the two sides and the top of the mounting frame; a rodless air cylinder is arranged in the middle of the supporting table, and a rotating limiting mechanism is detachably connected to a movable table of the rodless air cylinder. According to the multi-head blank grinding device for ceramic machining, a ceramic plate is placed on the rotary disc, the vacuum suction cups adsorb and limit the ceramic plate, the rodless air cylinder drives the ceramic plate to move, and the adjustable blank grinding mechanism grinds the top face and the side face of the ceramic plate at the same time; and the side face of the ceramic plate is changed through the rotating limiting mechanism so that grinding can be conducted, the treatment efficiency is improved, and meanwhile automation is improved.
column14: JIUDING MECH EQUIPMENT LIMITED COMPANY IN FOSHAN CITY

column12: Tool for replacing lining plate of vertical stirring mill
column13: A tool for replacing a lining plate of a vertical stirring mill relates to the field of overhaul and maintenance of mining equipment and comprises a telescopic arm, hydraulic cylinders and a base, a rotary seat is arranged on the base, a rotary support is arranged between the base and the rotary seat, and the hydraulic cylinders are hinged to two sides of the upper surface of the rotary seat. The telescopic arm is arranged on the upper portion between the hydraulic cylinders on the two sides and the two side plates of the rotary seat, the telescopic arm is divided into two sections, and a hanging ring and a high-definition network camera are arranged on the lower portion of the front end of the two sections of the telescopic arm; the device is simple in structure, is installed near a grinding door of the vertical stirring mill, is convenient for operation, can transmit images to the Internet of Things in real time through the high-definition network camera, and can watch operation pictures in real time on a liquid crystal screen of a handheld remote controller, a computer webpage end and a mobile phone end; operation is carried out through a handheld remote controller, so that the portability and the safety are improved; if the remote controller breaks down, the remote controller can be operated by the electric control box, so that the fault tolerance of the equipment is improved.

column12: Buffering and slurry guiding device for granularity analyzer in ore grinding room
column13: The utility model provides an ore grinding room particle size analyzer buffering and slurry guiding device which comprises a cyclone body, a cyclone overflow buffering box is fixedly connected to the cyclone body, a flow guiding pipe is arranged on the cyclone overflow buffering box, a particle size analyzer feeding buffering box is fixedly connected to the flow guiding pipe, and the particle size analyzer feeding buffering box is fixedly connected to the flow guiding pipe. The buffer tank is provided with a return pipe, the cyclone overflow buffer tank is provided with an overflow pipe, the cyclone overflow buffer tank is provided with an overflow pipe, and the flow guide pipe is provided with two manual gate valves. And the amount of ore pulp entering the pulp inlet buffer box of the granularity analyzer from the cyclone overflow buffer box is controlled, so that the pulp inlet of the granularity analyzer is relatively smooth and stable, the ore overflow phenomenon of the pulp inlet tank of the granularity analyzer is avoided, the ore pulp leakage is reduced, the on-site safe standardized construction is facilitated, and meanwhile, the measurement data error of the granularity analyzer is reduced.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING CHANGES TO A HEAT PROFILE OF A STOCKPILE
column13: The method may comprise receiving historical data (e.g., mineralogy data, irrigation data, raffinate data, heat data, lift height data, geographic data on ore placement and/or blower data); training a predictive model using the historical data to create a trained predictive model; adding future assumption data to the trained predictive model; running the forecast engine for a plurality of parameters to obtain forecast data for a mining production target; comparing the forecast data for the mining production target to the actual data for the mining production target; determining deviations between the forecast data and the actual data, based on the comparing; and changing each of the plurality of parameters from the forecast data to the actual data to determine a contribution to the deviations for each of the plurality of parameters.

column12: CONTRACT TRADING DEVICE
column13: Disclosed in the present application is a contract trading device, comprising: a contract underlying asset manager for managing a contract exchange rate Ph between a first asset A and a second asset B; a margin determiner for determining a trading margin for a trading user; a trading engine for matching trades between users; a spot market data processor which is configured to initiate a query to a spot market data server gateway and obtain a spot exchange rate Px; a user position adjustment processor which is configured to reflect Ph changes such that the contract position of the trading user expressed in terms of the number of A in a continuous time segment is negatively correlated with Ph, and the contract position of the trading user expressed in terms of the number of B is positively correlated with Ph; a trade data storage for storing basic information of the trading user; and a closeout processor for initiating a forced closeout request against the trading user to a trading server. The contract trading device in embodiments of the present application can effectively reduce impermanent loss, improve asset and data security, and achieve liquidity mining of a single asset.
column15: ZHANG DACHENG;;CHEN JIE;;ZHANG CHAO;;HOU DIANJIE;;WANG XIN;;GUO ZICHUAN;;LIANG YAO

column12: Special-shaped rock particle specific surface area estimation method, system and equipment
column13: The invention provides a special-shaped rock particle specific surface area estimation method, system and equipment, and relates to the technical field of ore rock particle crushing. The method comprises the following steps: performing visual classification according to shape features of special-shaped rock particles; performing a multi-angle three-dimensional laser scanning test on the special-shaped rock particles of different shapes and types to obtain point cloud data, reconstructing a special-shaped rock particle model, and obtaining the triaxial size, the surface area and the volume of the special-shaped rock particle model; introducing a Heywood volume shape factor and a surface area shape factor to describe the shape of the special-shaped rock particles, and calculating the Heywood surface area shape factor and the Heywood volume shape factor of each special-shaped rock particle according to the triaxial size, the surface area and the volume; fitting a statistical relationship of the shape factors; and estimating the specific surface area of the to-be-measured special-shaped rock particles according to the statistical relationship, the volume and the particle size of the to-be-measured special-shaped rock particles. The method can quickly estimate the specific surface area of the special-shaped rock particles.

column12: Anti-blocking continuous feeding type vertical mill capable of sensing and self-cleaning
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of anti-blocking of vertical mills, and discloses an anti-blocking continuous feeding type vertical mill capable of sensing and self-cleaning, which comprises a mill body, the top of the mill body is fixedly connected with a connecting pipe communicated with the inside of the mill body, and the left side of the connecting pipe is communicated with a feeding pipe. An infrared sensor is fixedly connected to the inner side of the connecting pipe, a stabilizing frame located above the infrared sensor is fixedly connected to the inner side of the connecting pipe, and a sliding rod with one end penetrating through the connecting pipe and extending to the position above the connecting pipe is slidably connected to the interior of the stabilizing frame. The anti-blocking continuous feeding type vertical mill capable of sensing and self-cleaning has the advantages of being good in anti-blocking effect and the like, and the problems that most of existing vertical mills are not provided with anti-blocking mechanisms during feeding, the anti-blocking effect is poor, but raw ore crushed aggregates are large blocks and are prone to being clamped at a feeding port in the process of entering the vertical mill, and the raw ore crushed aggregates are prone to being damaged are solved. Therefore, accumulation and blockage are caused, and the grinding efficiency of the vertical mill is affected.

column12: Method and device for evaluating water-drive heat collection capacity of hydrothermal geothermal field
column13: The invention provides a method for evaluating the water drive heat collection capacity of a hydrothermal geothermal field, and the method comprises the steps: calculating the storage capacity of geothermal water in the geothermal field, the storage capacity of geothermal energy in a rock skeleton and the storage capacity of geothermal energy in the geothermal water through a heat storage method,and obtaining the total reserve of the whole heat storage geothermal energy; then evaluating the water gushing capacity and the recharging capacity of the geothermal well through a water pumping testand a recharging test, and designing a mining and recharging mode on the basis of the test data; and finally, establishing a geothermal field numerical model on the basis, and calculating the total heat recovery quantity and recovery rate of the geothermal well under the condition of extraction and irrigation, so as to evaluate the heat recovery capability of the hydrothermal geothermal field in the water flooding heat recovery mode, and provide reference for efficient development of geothermal resources.

column12: System and method for charging or powering devices, including mobile devices, machines or equipment
column13: In accordance with various embodiments, described herein are systems and methods for enabling efficient wireless power transfer and charging of devices and/or batteries, including in some embodiments freedom of placement of the devices and/or batteries in one or multiple (e.g. one, two or three) dimensions, and/or improved features such as ease of use and compatibility. Exemplary applications include beam inductive or magnetic charging and power for use in, e.g., mobile, electronic, electric, lighting or other devices, machines, batteries, power tools, kitchen, military, medical, industrial tools or systems, robots, trains, buses, trucks and/or vehicles, and other environments.

column12: Device and method for automatically monitoring chloride ion concentration of desulfurization slurry on line
column13: The invention discloses a device and a method for automatically monitoring the chloride ion concentration of desulfurization slurry on line. The device comprises a primary clarification device, a secondary clarification device, an intermediate water tank, a primary peristaltic pump, a filtering device, a filtrate clear water tank, a desalted water tank, a titration cup, a nitric acid solution tank and a silver nitrate solution tank. According to the method, an automatic potentiometric titration mode is adopted, so that the operation consistency is ensured, and measurement errors caused by manual operation are avoided. More importantly, chloride ion concentration data can be transmitted back to a computer in a central control room in real time, a worker can check the chloride ion concentration data through software, convenience and rapidness are achieved, running operation can be conveniently and timely adjusted, and the running stability and economical efficiency of the desulfurization system are guaranteed.

column12: Multi-station grinding tool for robot
column13: The multi-station grinding tool for the robot comprises a flange plate and a suction cup assembly, a grinding machine installation base is fixedly installed at the lower end of the flange plate, a plurality of sets of grinding machines are rotatably installed on the periphery of the grinding machine installation base, and the grinding faces of the multiple sets of grinding machines face the outer portion of the side end of the grinding machine installation base. The suction cup mounting disc is fixedly mounted at the lower end of the grinding machine mounting base, and a plurality of suction cup assemblies are fixedly arranged at the lower end of the suction cup mounting disc. The utility model relates to the technical field of polishing tools, in particular to a multi-station polishing tool for a robot. According to the multi-station grinding tool for the robot, automatic feeding, discharging and grinding operation can be completed through one robot, multiple grinding or polishing procedures are completed, and the multi-station grinding tool can adapt to feeding and discharging of workpieces of different sizes by adjusting the position of the suction cup.

column12: Radio map construction method based on dynamic window
column13: The invention discloses a radio map construction method based on a dynamic window, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining sensor data outputted by a sensor in an observation area, the sensor data comprising the position coordinates of the sensor and the signal intensity received by the sensor; s2, setting a spatial resolution, rasterizing the observation area according to the set spatial resolution to obtain grids, and constructing a rasterized matrix based on a dynamic window; and S3, carrying out matrix completion on the rasterized matrix so as to recover missing elements in the rasterized matrix. According to the method, an interpolation method and a matrix completion method are fused, joint mining of local features and global features of the radio map is achieved, matrix completion precision can be improved based on dynamic window selection, and finally recovery precision and spatial resolution of the radio map are improved.

column12: Geotechnical engineering exploration field data acquisition device
column13: A field data acquisition device for geotechnical engineering investigation belongs to the technical field of geotechnical engineering investigation and comprises an acquisition tube for acquiring rock cores and a tripod which is used for mounting the acquisition tube and is convenient to use on complex terrains. The device can be rapidly inserted into rock ore to take out a rock core through the rock core collecting pipe, meanwhile, the integrity of the rock core can be guaranteed, the situation that the taken-out rock core is crushed into blocks, and consequently the data collecting effect is poor is avoided, the rock core collecting pipe can take out rock cores of different lengths according to needs, and the situation that rock core collecting is incomplete and data are not damaged is avoided. The data acquisition is incomplete; through the arrangement of the tripod, the rock core collecting pipe can be used on different terrains, meanwhile, the angle of the rock core collecting pipe can be adjusted, single-person operation is facilitated, and the whole device is of a detachable structure and is convenient to carry and use outdoors.

column12: A Sensor System
column13: Abstract The present invention is a sensor system for use with a measuring device. The measuring device being of the type adapted to measure the volume of a desired solid component in a sample volume of a solid-liquid slurry obtained from either a carbon-in-pulp or carbon-in leach process. The solid-liquid slurry comprises granular carbon particles, ore pulp, and water. The carbon-in-pulp or carbon-in-leach process includes at least one retention tank. The measurement device including: - a receptacle for receiving the sample volume of the slurry; - a screen provided in the receptacle for separating out the desired solid component from a remainder of the slurry.

column12: Production process and equipment for ultra-pure fine iron powder
column13: The invention discloses a production process of ultra-pure fine iron powder, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. A production process of ultra-pure fine iron powder comprises the following steps that when a flotation machine conducts first reverse flotation, the flotation machine adds and mixes ore pulp with the use amount being X and a flotation key agent with the use amount being Y according to the proportion, and the ore pulp liquid level height A, the foam layer height B and the foam layer reflectivity C are detected through a detection assembly after reaction is completed; when the flotation machine carries out reverse flotation for multiple times, a flotation key agent with the dosage being Y is added into a flotation chamber firstly, then ore pulp is continuously added, the reflectivity of the liquid level in the flotation chamber is continuously detected through a detection assembly, and the flotation machine controls the feeding amount and the feeding speed of the ore pulp according to the change of the reflectivity; and the flotation machine judges whether a flotation key agent attached to the inner wall of the flotation tank needs to be subjected to a recovery reaction or not and executes. The device can automatically supplement flotation agents and ore pulp and automatically judge the reaction condition of mixed liquid in the flotation tank, and is high in automation degree and production efficiency.

column13: An autonomous mining system (100) includes a real-time digital video transmission sub-system (110) configured to obtain video streams (125, 127) from underground, and transfer the video streams to a control center (115) located above ground; and an exploration and maintenance sub-system (130) located underground, and configured to extract a resource and bring the resource to the surface, based exclusively on commands received from the control center (115) through the real-time digital video transmission sub-system (110).

column12: Cup-shaped arc grinding wheel in-place finishing method based on cradle type five-axis numerical control machine tool
column13: The invention discloses a cup-shaped arc grinding wheel in-place finishing method based on a cradle type five-axis numerical control machine tool. The method is used for ultra-precision grinding and aims to solve the problem that an existing cup-shaped arc grinding wheel is not easy to finish. The finishing method comprises the steps that a finishing grinding wheel is installed on a rotary table of the numerical control machine tool, and a cup-shaped arc grinding wheel to be finished is installed on a machine tool spindle; intermittent trimming and opposite grinding of the inner arc and the outer arc of the finishing grinding wheel and the cup-shaped arc grinding wheel to be finished are achieved through an arc enveloping trimming track; and in-situ measurement is performed on the grinding wheel through a calibrated laser displacement sensor. According to the finishing method, the cup-shaped arc grinding wheel of the cradle type five-axis numerical control machine tool is subjected to in-place finishing, the problem that the cup-shaped arc grinding wheel is difficult to finish due to the fact that the arc is prone to interference is solved, the influence of grinding wheel abrasion on the high-precision requirement of a workpiece is reduced, the compensation machining frequency is reduced, deterministic machining is achieved, and the machining efficiency and the machining quality of the whole workpiece are improved.

column12: Intelligent mine clothing recovery device based on gravity sensing
column13: The utility model discloses an intelligent mining clothes recovery device based on gravity sensing, which comprises a multifunctional fixing frame and a movable recovery basket, and clothes with built-in radio frequency tags are loaded in the movable recovery basket and can be separately arranged in the multifunctional fixing frame; the multifunctional fixing frame comprises a frame body, an LED display screen, an RFID recognition device, a power module, a weighing module, a control module and at least two laser induction devices. The LED display screen, the RFID identification device, the power supply module and the weighing module are in communication connection with the control module; the control module is in communication connection with the AGV intelligent carrier. After the recovery basket is full-loaded, the AGV intelligent carrier can carry the recovery basket to the laundry room, so that the current situation that an absenteeter automatically sends the recovery basket to the laundry room is improved, dirty clothes information identification can be achieved, a data basis is provided for subsequent intelligent sorting and distribution of mine clothes, and the fatigue degree of miners and the workload of workers in the laundry room are relieved.

column12: Method and Apparatus for Reducing Vacuum Loss in an Ion Implantation System
column13: A method and apparatus for dosage measurement and monitoring in an ion implantation system is disclosed. In one embodiment, a transferring system, includes: a vacuum chamber, wherein the vacuum chamber is coupled to a processing chamber; a shaft coupled to a ball screw, wherein the ball screw and the shaft are configured in the vacuum chamber; and a vacuum rotary feedthrough, wherein the vacuum rotary feedthrough comprises a magnetic fluid seal so as to provide a high vacuum sealing, and wherein the vacuum rotary feedthrough is configured through a first end of the vacuum chamber and coupled to the ball screw so as to provide a rotary motion on the ball screw.

column12: Heat dissipation device of imaging system of XRT intelligent ore separation equipment
column13: The utility model discloses a heat dissipation device of an imaging system of XRT intelligent ore separation equipment, which comprises an X-ray source bin and an X-ray sensor bin, the X-ray source bin and the X-ray sensor bin are communicated through an air circulation pipeline, and the waterproof and dustproof problems of the heat dissipation structure of the imaging system of the XRT intelligent ore separation equipment are solved. Meanwhile, the heat dissipation efficiency and the actual heat dissipation effect are guaranteed, and the heat dissipation system is not affected by imaging data drift caused by temperature drift any more; according to the scheme, the air in the imaging system is cooled by using the air internal circulation air conditioner, and the air internal circulation air conditioner does not exchange with the air outside the equipment and only exchanges heat with the air outside the equipment, so that the air in the imaging system is isolated from the air outside the equipment; and meanwhile, the X-ray source bin and the X-ray sensor bin of the imaging system are sealed, so that the dustproof and waterproof problems of precise electronic instruments of the imaging system are effectively solved.

column12: Gold powder grinding preparation machine
column13: The utility model relates to a gold powder grinding preparation machine, and belongs to a gold powder preparation device. The observation protective cover and the C-shaped rack are connected to form a closed space, the gold powder collecting cup is placed in the closed space, the horizontal feeding mechanism is installed on a connecting side plate of the C-shaped rack, the manual bench clamp is installed on the horizontal feeding mechanism, and the pneumatic file driver is installed on a top supporting plate of the C-shaped rack. And the file is mounted at the tail end of the pneumatic file driver and extends into the gold powder collecting cup. The device has the advantages that the structure is novel, manual file grinding of gold blocks is simulated, manual work is replaced by mechanical control of reciprocating file grinding and continuous feeding of the gold blocks, manpower input is reduced, automation of gold powder production and processing is achieved, gold powder product particle size distribution is more uniform, and the yield is higher; the problems that a traditional chemical method or mechanical method for manufacturing gold powder is relatively complex in technology and high in cost are solved, and the device which is convenient to operate and use and low in cost is provided for domestic gold powder production.

column12: Blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot and grinding method
column13: The invention discloses a blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot and a grinding method. The grinding robot comprises a frame, a suction cup positioning device, a four-axis motion platform, a grinding mechanism and a laser scanning positioning mechanism, and the suction cup positioning device comprises a plurality of middle suction cups and a plurality of auxiliary suction cups; the four-axis moving platform comprises an X-axis moving mechanism, a Y-axis moving mechanism, a Z-axis moving mechanism and an R-axis swinging mechanism; the polishing mechanism comprises a polishing motor and a polishing milling cutter; the laser scanning positioning mechanism comprises a laser sensor. The device can well adapt to the surface of the blade through the suction cup positioning device, the whole frame and the blade can be stably kept fixed, and the grinding quality of the inner staggered layer is guaranteed; through the cooperation of the four-axis motion platform and the laser scanning positioning mechanism, the inner staggered layer can be quickly and effectively positioned, and the grinding accuracy is improved; and dust generated in the polishing process can be rapidly sucked away and collected through the dust collector, and the dust generated in the polishing process is prevented from affecting the workshop environment.
column14: XINPA INTELLIGENT TECH PINGHU CO LTD

column12: Buffer mechanism for automatic feeding of glass edge grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a buffer mechanism for automatic feeding of a glass edge grinding machine, which comprises a feeding machine, a rotating shaft is fixedly mounted in the feeding machine, a portal frame is fixedly mounted on the surface of the feeding machine, a suction cup is fixedly connected to the surface of the portal frame, an edge grinding machine is fixedly connected to the surface of one end of the feeding machine, and the edge grinding machine is fixedly connected to the surface of the other end of the feeding machine. And a grinding wheel is fixedly mounted on the surface of the bottom end of the edge grinding machine. According to the buffer mechanism for automatic feeding of the glass edge grinding machine, the automation degree of the whole structure can be increased through the arranged feeding machine structure, so that the workload of workers is greatly reduced, the edge grinding procedure of the whole glass can be improved, and through the arranged edge grinding machine mechanism, the production efficiency is improved. The grinding effect of the grinding mechanism is guaranteed, operation is convenient and easy, meanwhile, noise and pollutants during cutting are reduced, and a good environment is brought to construction operation.
column14: HEFEI CITY ZHENXING INSULATING GLASS CO LTD

column12: Dish-washing machine heat exchanger robot assembly line
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mechanical automation, in particular to a dish-washing machine heat exchanger robot assembly line. By arranging the tool line body unit, the preheating and labeling unit, the first robot welding detection unit, the second robot electromagnetic valve assembling unit and the finished product discharging unit, the automation degree is high, tedious and repeated manual work can be achieved, and the efficiency and reliability are high. The special machine clamp is provided with a special machine clamp robot connecting unit, a special machine clamp suction cup clamp and a special machine clamp air cylinder gripper clamp, electrical control is conducted, and automatic grabbing and placing of the heat exchanger of the dish washing machine by the industrial robot can be achieved. The welded dish-washing machine heat exchanger can be conveniently taken out and placed on a conveying line to be conveyed to the next procedure, industrial automatic production is achieved, and the production efficiency is effectively improved. The electromagnetic valve assembling machine can be used for well assembling the electromagnetic valve on the heat exchanger, and has the advantages of reliable quality and controllable process.
column14: TIN FREE RIEMANN ROBOT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Polishing machine for mobile phone camera lens
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of polishing machines, and particularly relates to a polishing machine for a mobile phone camera lens, which comprises a working table, a driving device, a polishing grinding disc, a feeding device, a visual device, a flow guide groove, a recovery groove, a flow guide pipe and a liquid spraying pipe, the driving device is arranged on the lower surface of the working table, and the output end of the driving device penetrates through the working table. The polishing grinding disc is connected with the output end of the driving device, the feeding device and the visual device are erected on the workbench through the rack, the output end of the feeding device and the output end of the visual device are vertically arranged downwards, the feeding device comprises a telescopic mechanism, a pressure sensor and a suction cup, and the telescopic mechanism is arranged on the rack. The suction cup is connected with the output end of the telescopic mechanism through the pressure sensor and corresponds to the polishing grinding disc. The polishing machine can polish a plurality of lenses at the same time according to different technological requirements and different polishing pressures, the machining process can be monitored in real time, the working efficiency is high, and practicability is high.
column14: DONGGUAN HONGHAN ELECTRONIC MAT CO LTD

column12: Oxygen Injection For Reformer Feed Gas For Direct Reduction Process
column13: A direct reduction plant is disclosed. The direct reduction plant includes an oxygen injection system, a reformer, and a shaft furnace. The oxygen injection system includes an oxygen injection reactor and a main oxygen burner. The oxygen injection reactor is adapted to receive a gas mixture. The main oxygen burner is adapted to increase a temperature of the gas mixture by burning a mixture of fuel and oxygen fed to the main oxygen burner. The reformer is adapted to reform the gas mixture with the increased temperature. The shaft furnace is adapted to reduce iron ore using the reformed gas mixture.

column12: Method for analyzing separation efficiency in beneficiation process
column13: The invention discloses a method for analyzing the separation efficiency in the beneficiation process, which relates to the field of process mineral detection and analysis and comprises the following steps: 1, determining the yields of raw ores, concentrates and tailings in the beneficiation process to be examined; 2, counting process mineralogy parameters of target minerals in the original, refined and tailings; 3, the recovery rate of the examined target mineral in the mineral separation process is calculated; 4, calculating the distribution rate of the target mineral in each product in each particle size range; 5, calculating the separation efficiency of the target mineral in each particle size range; the mineral recovery rate is calculated according to the production data or the flow examination number mass calculation value and the process mineralogy statistical data of products in the mineral separation process, the target mineral separation efficiency in the specific particle size range or the continuous generation state is calculated according to the calculated mineral recovery rate, and analysis of mineral behaviors in the separation process is achieved; the mineral state separation efficiency is used for indicating the mineral separation behavior in the mineral separation process, and more specific understanding and evaluation on the mineral level are provided for the examined technological process.
column14: JINCHUAN GROUP CO LTD;;JINCHUAN NICKEL AND COBALT RES AND DESIGN INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: MACHINING SYSTEM FOR MACHINING SPECTACLE LENSES
Snowflake ice maker
column13: The snowflake ice maker comprises a machine body, a raw material refrigerating device, an ice crushing head, a mechanical arm and a cup placing piece are arranged in the machine body, the raw material refrigerating device comprises a box body, a main material cylinder, a condenser and a compressor are arranged in the box body, and a stirrer and a discharging channel are arranged in the main material cylinder; the condenser, the compressor and the stirrer are all electrically connected with a control system in the box body, the discharging channel is communicated with the main material cylinder and the sand ice head, and the mechanical arm is connected with the cup placing piece; the raw material refrigeration device, the ice crusher head and the mechanical arm are all electrically connected with a master control system of the machine body. According to the snowflake ice maker, fresh-keeping raw materials can be refrigerated and fully stirred at the same time, manual work is reduced, and automation of work of the snowflake ice maker is achieved.
column14: GUANGZHOU CHITU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: Miniature external fixation combined frame for treating interphalangeal joint comminuted fracture
column13: A miniature external fixation combination frame for treating hand interphalangeal joint comminuted fracture comprises a ring-shaped connecting device, a double-thread supporting frame and an interphalangeal joint 3D printing micro gasket, and the ring-shaped connecting device is composed of a ring-shaped screw hole, a solid fixing rod and a ring cup and used for connecting a double-thread fixing needle and a double-thread fixing rod. The supporting frame is composed of two double-end thread fixing needles, four double-end thread fixing rods and a hollow thread sleeve, the fixing rods are connected in pairs through the hollow sleeve to form a long combined fixing rod, the length is adjusted through the hollow sleeve, and the effects of resetting and opening the interphalangeal joint are achieved. The 3D printing micro-gasket is a titanium alloy instrument for interphalangeal joint surface comminuted fracture, is clamped and extruded in a joint during operation, extrudes the shaped and crushed interphalangeal joint surface by utilizing the shape of the far end and the near end of the micro-gasket, is opened by a frame to achieve the purpose of phalangeal fracture reduction, and achieves the purpose of restoring the shaped and crushed interphalangeal joint surface by 3D printing the micro-gasket.

column12: System to Control Parameters of a Mill
column13: A system to measure and control real-time parameters of a mill for grinding particulate without using auxiliary energy is disclosed. Sensors connected to the mill produce signals. A signal transmitting and receiving module is connected to the sensors and receives and transmits the mill process signals to a network. A modular power generator unit powers the system. A radio antenna receives and transmits signals from and to the signal transmitting and receiving module. A master controller connects to the network and to a distributed control system to receive and use process variables and the signals to compute and transmit setpoints to the distributed control system. The system alarms for upsets conditions, alters mill control variables, or both.

column12: Automatic fermented grain inspection device and working method thereof
column13: The invention provides an automatic fermented grain inspection device and a working method thereof. The device comprises a multi-station rotary table, near-infrared detection equipment, a turnover filling mechanism, a sampling cup temporary storage conveying line, a robot, a clamping jaw and a sampling cup recovery box. The sampling cup is conveyed to the tail end of the sampling cup temporary storage conveying line; the robot clamping jaw grabs the sampling cup and the inspection vessel and places the sampling cup and the inspection vessel on the overturning and filling mechanism; the overturning and filling mechanism clamps the sampling cup and the inspection vessel, and the robot clamping jaw loosens and moves away; the overturning and filling mechanism overturns and compacts, and the overturning mechanism loosens; the robot takes away the inspection vessel and places the inspection vessel into near-infrared inspection equipment; the robot takes away empty sampling cups and throws the empty sampling cups into a sampling cup collecting box; after the inspection is completed, the robot grabs the inspection vessel to the first flushing position of the multi-station rotary table; and after being washed and blow-dried, the inspection vessel waits for being taken for the next time. According to the invention, automation of fermented grain inspection can be realized, the labor intensity of inspectors is greatly reduced, and the requirement of inspection links on manpower is reduced.

column12: Ion beam polishing machine capable of accurately positioning workpiece coordinates and method for accurately positioning workpiece coordinates
column13: The invention provides an ion beam polishing machine capable of accurately positioning workpiece coordinates. The ion beam polishing machine comprises a machine body with a vacuum cavity, a workpiece bearing platform installed in the cavity, a driving device and an ion source, the driving device drives a coordinate detection mechanism, the relative positions of the coordinate detection mechanism and the ion source on the driving device are fixed, and a Faraday cup is also mounted in the cavity. The detection action of the coordinate detection mechanism and the detection action of the Faraday cup are both implemented according to set steps through regulation and control, and accurate positioning of the workpiece machining coordinate system is achieved by means of acquisition of relative position data of the coordinate detection mechanism and the ion source. According to the method for accurately positioning the coordinates of the workpiece by using the ion beam polishing machine, reference initial coordinates when the coordinate detection mechanism is aligned with the center of the workpiece are firstly obtained, and then machining initial coordinates can be simply measured and calculated by using relative position coordinates of the coordinate detection mechanism and the ion source, so that the labor intensity of workers during positioning is greatly reduced, the machining efficiency is improved, and meanwhile, the polishing machining precision is improved.
column15: THE INVENTOR HAS WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE MENTIONED

column12: Deep-sea mining laying test system and test method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a deep-sea mining laying test system and a test method thereof, and the system comprises a test pool which simulates waves under different sea conditions through an artificial wave flow generator; a hull model; a vehicle body model; the two ends of the mooring rope are connected to the miniature winch of the ship body model and the vehicle body model respectively, tension sensors are arranged at the joints of the miniature winch and the vehicle body model, and a strain gauge is installed between the two ends of the mooring rope; the substrate unit can be fixed at the bottom of the test pool; and the transient load control module is used for adding a transient load to the vehicle body model. According to the invention, a simulation test can be comprehensively carried out in the laying and recovery process of the deep-sea mining vehicle under the conditions of different sea wave conditions, different wind and wave conditions, different elastic vibration stress modes and different seabed substrates, so that the comprehensiveness and efficiency of the test are effectively improved, and efficient and accurate acquisition of cable stress data is ensured in the test process.

column12: Soft package lithium ion battery homogenization modeling method
column13: The invention discloses a soft package lithium ion battery homogenization modeling method, which comprises the following steps: carrying out a one-way tensile experiment, an equal two-way tensile experiment and a cup drawing experiment on an aluminum plastic film in a quasi-static state to respectively obtain load-displacement curves of the aluminum plastic film under the experiment conditions; establishing an aluminum plastic film simulation model by using a method of combining elastoplasticity with a fracture criterion, and calibrating the model by using data obtained by an experiment; the calculation result of the aluminum plastic film simulation model is compared with the actual experiment result, and the error is required to be smaller than a set value; carrying out an integral plane extrusion experiment on the single lithium ion battery to obtain a load-displacement curve of the single lithium ion battery under a plane extrusion condition; establishing an overall simulation model of the lithium ion battery monomer, and calibrating the overall model of the battery by using experimental data of a plane extrusion experiment of the battery monomer; and comparing a calculation result of the calibrated battery monomer model with an actual experiment result, wherein an error is required to be smaller than a set value.

column12: Supervised SAE-based tail gas hydrogen sulfide concentration real-time monitoring method
column13: The invention discloses a supervised SAE-based tail gas hydrogen sulfide concentration real-time monitoring method, and aims to solve the problem of online real-time monitoring of H2S concentration oftail gas of a sulfur recovery device by using a supervised SAE model. According to the method, in the SAE training process, output data are set as concentration data, and input data are conventionalflow data capable of being measured in real time. The key potential characteristics useful for soft measurement output are continuously extracted by utilizing the SAE depth characteristic mining capability, so that the online real-time monitoring of the H2S concentration is achieved. Compared with a traditional method, the method has the advantages that the SAE is ingeniously expanded into a supervised SAE model by setting the output of the SAE as the concentration of the hydrogen sulfide and the output as conventional flow data capable of being measured in real time. In addition, the method provided by the invention further improves the precision of soft measurement by using least square regression. Finally, the superiority of the method is verified through comparison of experimental results in specific embodiments.
column15: GE YINGHUI;;ZHU YING;;OTHER INVENTORS HAVE WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE MENTIONED

column12: Spoiler polishing robot
column13: The utility model discloses a spoiler polishing robot which comprises a workbench, an explorator detachably connected with the workbench and a mechanical arm arranged on one side of the workbench, anda polishing mechanism is arranged at the free end of the mechanical arm. And the explorator is arranged on a workbench panel of the workbench. The explorator is easy to replace; originally, the angleof a new part needs to be adjusted up and down, the angle is fixed at present, the turnover workbench can turn over at three stations, turnover positioning is achieved through the fact that the turnover angle of the workbench is fixed, the turnover angle is not changed after the explorator is replaced, readjustment is not needed, the mode of integrally replacing the explorator is adopted, and product universality is high. Grinding and positioning are accurate, and the device is particularly suitable for injection products with high grinding effect requirements; the spoiler is fixed in a vacuum suction cup mode and is automatically controlled by electric automation, the suction cup is directly loosened after a product is polished, the product is lifted up by the profiling bottom support, an operator only needs to take away the polished product, operation is convenient, and time is saved.
column14: JIANGYIN MINGHONG AUTOMOTIVE ROOF SYSTEM CO LTD

column12: Lithium ion battery cap thermoplastic device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of battery caps, in particular to a lithium ion battery cap thermoplastic device which comprises a box body, the bottom of the box body is in threaded connection with a bolt, the top of the box body is in sliding connection with a module installation plate, and a linear module is fixedly installed on the bottom end face of the module installation plate. The sliding end of the linear module is fixedly connected with a fixing plate, an electric push rod is fixedly installed on the bottom end face of the fixing plate, and a vacuum suction cup is fixedly installed at the bottom end of the electric push rod. The linear module drives the vacuum suction cup to move, the electric push rod pushes the vacuum suction cup, the vacuum suction cup adsorbs the cap, the position sensor transmits a signal to the controller through the signal receiver, and a circuit of the vacuum suction cup is closed, so that the cap falls on the belt conveyor to be conveyed, the automation capacity is enhanced, the labor cost is saved, and the working efficiency is improved. And the safety and the practicability are enhanced.
column14: HEFEI GUANSU ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for analyzing sedimentation performance of backwater by utilizing conductivity
column13: The invention relates to a method for analyzing sedimentation performance of return water by utilizing conductivity. The method comprises the following steps: (1) detecting characteristic ions contained in the return water by a chemical detection analysis method; (2) preparing a mixed solution of the heavy metal ions with different conductivities in the step (1) and the standard ore sample at room temperature, completely settling the mixed solution, recording the complete settling time, and making a standard settling meter; (3) measuring the conductivity of the return water by using a conductivity tester; and (4) comparing the conductivity measured in the step (3) with a standard settlement meter, and analyzing to obtain the complete settlement time of the return water. The method can effectively predict the settling performance of the tailing backwater, has high accuracy, and is simple to operate.
column14: WUGANG RESOURCE GROUP JINSHANDIAN MINING IND CO LTD

column12: COMPOSITION FOR COPPER ELECTRODEPOSITION COMPRISING A POLYAMINOAMIDE TYPE LEVELING AGENT
column13: The present invention provides a copper electroplating composition comprising copper ions, an acid, and at least one polyaminoamide comprising a group of formula L1[B-A-B'-Z]n[Y-Z]m (L1)that is obtainable by reacting a diamine compound comprising two a primary or secondary amino groups with an aminoacid in a molar ratio of approx. 1:2 to form an aminoamide compound that is afterwards reacted with a coupling agent and optionally with a diamine co-monomer.

column12: Graphite flake grinding equipment
column13: The utility model discloses improvement of graphite flake grinding equipment, and relates to the field of graphite flake production and manufacturing, the graphite flake grinding equipment comprises an L-shaped mounting plate, and the outer surface of one side of the L-shaped mounting plate is provided with a first mounting buckle. According to the improvement of the graphite flake grinding equipment, the L-shaped mounting plate, the first mounting buckle, the air cylinder, the push rod, the sliding base, the mounting base, the vacuum suction cup, the linear rail and the second mounting buckle are arranged, the high-precision linear rail is additionally arranged on the equipment, the stability of products can be improved, the quality of the products can be improved, the vacuum suction cup is additionally arranged, and the production efficiency is improved. A product can be firmly adsorbed and does not fall off at will, meanwhile, the two-way air cylinder is additionally arranged, automation of the equipment is enhanced, the machining time is shortened, the working efficiency is improved, and the equipment is simple in structure and convenient to operate and brings better use prospects.

column12: PROCESS FOR ANALYZING DATA OF AT LEAST ONE MOBILE GAS MEASURING DEVICE AND OF A STATIONARY GAS MEASURING DEVICE AS WELL AS SYSTEM FOR MONITORING AT LEAST ONE GAS CONCENTRATION
column13: A process and a system analyze data of at least one mobile gas measuring device as well as of a stationary gas measuring device (3a, 3b). Data are generated by the mobile gas measuring device and by the stationary gas measuring device (3a, 3b) as a function of a gas concentration and are transmitted to a central data processing unit (1). Further, the data are supplemented with information in relation to a location of the data generation before, during or after the transmission. The processed data of the mobile gas measuring device and of the stationary gas measuring device (3a, 3b) are sent to a data analysis unit (2), in which a joint analysis of the processed data of the mobile gas measuring device and of the stationary gas measuring device (3a, 3b) is carried out for generating at least one result value.

column12: Special-shaped edge grinding machine for furniture glass production
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of glass grinding equipment, and provides a special-shaped edge grinding machine for furniture glass production, the special-shaped edge grinding machine comprises a base, a grinding machine arranged on the base, and a feeding conveyor belt, a supporting mechanism and a discharging conveyor belt which are sequentially arranged on the base in the feeding direction, and the supporting mechanism comprises a supporting plate, a carrying plate and a plurality of supporting columns; the supporting plate is arranged on the base in a sliding mode, the supporting columns are arranged on the supporting plate, suction cups are arranged at the ends of the supporting columns, the carrying plate is arranged on the base, a plurality of through holes are formed in the carrying plate, the supporting columns are located in the through holes, and containing grooves are formed in the carrying plate. By means of the technical scheme, the problems that in the prior art, a glass edge grinding machine is low in automation degree, and potential safety hazards of manual feeding are high are solved.
column14: SHAHE SAIFU GLASS PRODUCTS CO LTD

column12: Intelligent operation and maintenance management and control platform for power secondary system
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent operation and maintenance management and control platform and system for an electric power secondary system, and belongs to the technical field of electric power system operation and maintenance. The platform comprises a spacing layer, a transmission layer, a station control layer, a system layer, a platform layer, an application layer and a disaster recovery backup center; the problems of omission, repeatability and isolation of current data collection are solved, meanwhile, the requirements of safety of a production control region and advanced application development of an information management region are balanced, comprehensive collection and deep mining of data are finally achieved, the production operation and maintenance service of a power secondary system is smoother, the professional requirements of professional operators are met, and the working efficiency is improved. And quality and efficiency improvement of the secondary system is realized.

column12: Multi-source data drawing engine system
column13: The invention discloses a multi-source data drawing engine system, and relates to the technical field of geographic information systems, the engine system is developed based on a B/S architecture, and the engine system comprises a data management module, a data extraction module, a data processing module, a data visualization module, a WEB server and a toolbox module; the engine system supports an http method, calls a system interface through a URL port, responds to an external request by using POST, completes data exchange of each sub-process of a cluster running in an automatic distributed deployment manner in a program, completes a functional module used for multi-parameter control, previews analysis results in real time, supports a GET request to repeatedly obtain an operation result for multiple times, and improves the operation efficiency. Mining analysis and drawing visual expression of multi-source data are mainly achieved, a background achieves concurrent access processing and load balancing through distributed deployment, a URL is supported to call related components and use specified functions, and parameter analysis and result return are achieved.

column12: Mine mobile power supply vehicle
column13: The mine mobile power supply vehicle comprises a traction vehicle head, a flat-bed trailer and a compartment, the compartment is installed on the flat-bed trailer, a generator set is arranged in the middle of the compartment, and a transformer and a power distribution cabinet are arranged on the front portion of the compartment; an intelligent service system host is arranged in the power distribution cabinet, a distance sensor is arranged below the front end of a cab of the traction vehicle head, a power output port is formed outside the power distribution cabinet and connected with a power supply cable through an adapter cable, and one end of the power supply cable is fixedly installed on a cable winch. And the other end is connected with a cable interface of an external mining vehicle through a cable guide wheel. The distance sensor is arranged at the front end of the power supply vehicle, the self-recovery cable winch is arranged, the power supply cable is steered through the cable guide wheel and is in butt joint with the external mining vehicle, and real-time power supply to the external mining vehicle is achieved; an intelligent service system host is arranged in the power distribution cabinet and is connected with an external command center, so that positioning of a vehicle and real-time monitoring data transmission of a generator set are realized.
column15: HUANG JIANXIANG;;LAI YONGKUN;;ZHANG SHENGZHAO;;ZHONG HOUCHENG;;WANG KUNLIN;;HUANG YU

column12: Dust cleaning device for ceramic grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a dust cleaning device for a ceramic grinding machine. The dust cleaning device comprises a dust cleaning disc, a clamping base, a swing groove, a sleeving base, a distribution box, a first wire, a swing suction cup, a dust storage bin, a suction fan, a fixed connecting plate, a second wire, a motor, a transmission gear, first clamping teeth, an assembling ring, secondclamping teeth, a rubber strip, a dust suction hole, a PLC and a screwing bolt. The dust collector has the advantages that when the swing suction cup sucks and collects dust, the PLC drives the transmission gear to repeatedly swing front and back in the mounting and connecting ring through the motor, so that the motor drives the swing suction cup to continuously swing front and back through the fixed connecting plate, the air fluidity is improved, and the dust suction and collection range of the swing suction cup is enlarged; it is guaranteed that the device sucks and collects dust generated when the ceramic grinding machine works more comprehensively and thoroughly; the device is high in automation degree during working, manual control is not needed, time and labor are saved, and use convenience is guaranteed; the device is convenient to operate, and all components are flexibly connected.
column14: FOSHAN LIANGGU ENVIRONMENTAL NEW MATERIAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Self-adaptive reinforced grinding device for curved-surface thin-wall part and using method of self-adaptive reinforced grinding device
column13: The invention provides a self-adaptive reinforced grinding device for a curved-surface thin-wall workpiece and a using method thereof.The self-adaptive reinforced grinding device comprises a self-adaptive clamping mechanism, the self-adaptive clamping mechanism is fixed in a reinforced grinding box, and the self-adaptive clamping mechanism comprises a main lifting table, an inclined mechanism and four auxiliary lifting tables; the main lifting table and the auxiliary lifting tables are fixed to the fixing frame, the four auxiliary lifting tables are located on the periphery of the main lifting table, inclined mechanisms are arranged between the main lifting table and the auxiliary lifting tables respectively, pressure sensors and infrared sensors are arranged on the inclined mechanisms, and suction cups are installed on the pressure sensors. When the curved-surface thin-wall part is placed above machining equipment, the pressure sensor receives a signal, and the angle of the inclination mechanism is adjusted according to data of the infrared sensor and the pressure sensor, so that the suction cup can make full contact with the surface of the part and can adapt to the shape of the part, time is greatly saved, and production efficiency is improved; and the pressure sensor can detect the clamping effect at any time, and accidents are prevented.
column15: LIU XIAOCHU;;LIN ZISHUN;;LIANG ZHONGWEI;;TANG GONGBIN;;XIAO JINRUI;;TANG HUI;;CHEN YUANYE

column12: Burr remover
column13: The utility model discloses a burr removing device, relates to the technical field of burr removing, and aims to solve the problems that an existing burr removing device is complicated in outflow during use, a plastic product needs to be fixed by adjusting the device firstly, and then a grinding head is adjusted for grinding after the plastic product is fixed, and the operation is troublesome. A limiting groove is formed in the outer wall of the top of the fixing frame, and a pressure sensor is embedded in the inner wall of the limiting groove. A plastic cup can be directly placed in the limiting groove, the plastic cup is pressed on the pressure sensor, the pressure sensor transmits a signal to the controller, the controller automatically controls the two clamping mechanisms to clamp and fix the plastic cup, and after clamping is completed, the servo motor and the edge grinding mechanism are controlled to operate at the same time. The servo motor drives the edge grinding mechanism to rotate around the plastic cup, the edge grinding mechanism operates to grind and remove burrs on the outer wall of the cup opening of the plastic cup, automatic operation is achieved, and convenience and rapidness are achieved.
column14: DALIAN RUIXING PREC SHEET METAL CO LTD

column12: EDEM-based mine ball mill working parameter optimization method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ore grinding, and particularly relates to an EDEM-based mine ball mill working parameter optimization method which is characterized by comprising the following steps: step 1, early-stage preparation: establishing a ball mill three-dimensional model export. Stl model file, and calculating the number of grinding balls and ores and the critical rotation speed; step 2, setting material attribute parameters and interaction parameters; step 3, setting a particle model and a particle contact model; step 4, importing a three-dimensional geometric model of the ball mill. Stl model file, and setting a rotating speed rate; step 5, creating a particle factory; step 6, entering simulation setting; step 7, starting simulation; step 8, changing one of the rotating speed rate and the filling rate by applying a control variable method, and repeating the steps 1-8; and step 9, obtaining the primary and secondary sequence of the influence of each working parameter on the index and the optimal parameter cooperation. According to the invention, the specific powers of different cylinders can be obtained by simulating different working parameters, which reflects the ore grinding efficiency under different working conditions, so that the optimal working parameter cooperation can be effectively simulated before the ball mill completes the ore grinding work.

column12: Directing light for thermal and power applications in space
column13: Solar collectors can provide power for electricity, thermal propulsion, and material processing (e.g., mining asteroids). In one aspect, an apparatus for collecting solar energy and simultaneously protecting against damage from a resulting energy beam includes a solar energy collection system including at least one concentrator and a target configured to use, store, or convert the solar energy, the collection system configured to cause solar energy to focus on the target, at least one sensor configured to detect misalignment of the concentrator by determining that some or all of the collected solar energy is offset from the target, and a safety system configured to redirect the energy or interpose a safety structure for shielding other non-target systems from receiving too much solar energy from the collection system.

column12: Polishing equipment and polishing method for notebook keyboard shell and polishing clamping jaw assembling method
column13: The invention relates to a grinding device and method for a notebook keyboard shell and a grinding clamping jaw assembling method, and belongs to the field of grinding and polishing of die-casting products. The device comprises a grinding clamping jaw, a grinding mechanism, a robot and a material table, and is structurally characterized in that the grinding clamping jaw is installed on the robot, the robot is matched with the grinding mechanism and the material table, and the grinding clamping jaw comprises an upper fixing plate, a lower fixing plate, equal-height positioning columns, suction cups, suction cup positioning holes, a fixing block, a profiling block and a double-shaft air cylinder; the upper fixing plate and the lower fixing plate are connected through the equal-height positioning column, the suction cup positioning hole is formed in the upper fixing plate, the head end of the suction cup is arranged on the lower fixing plate, the tail end of the suction cup is located in the suction cup positioning hole, the fixing block is arranged on the upper fixing plate, the double-shaft air cylinder is arranged on the lower fixing plate, and the double-shaft air cylinder is arranged on the lower fixing plate. The profiling block is arranged on the double-shaft air cylinder and matched with the fixing block, and the lower fixing plate is installed on the robot.
column14: HANGZHOU LONGLI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: Double-station precise five-axis grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a double-station precise five-axis grinding machine which comprises a movable driving mechanism, an AC-axis swinging and rotating mechanism and a grinding head driving mechanism. The AC-axis swinging and rotating mechanism is mounted on the movable driving mechanism and is driven by the movable driving mechanism to move in the X-axis direction, the Y-axis direction and the Z-axis direction; the AC-axis swinging and rotating mechanism comprises a C-axis supporting frame, a C-axis motor, a C-axis rotating shaft, an A-axis motor and a workpiece suction cup, the grinding head driving mechanism is arranged below the AC-axis swinging and rotating mechanism, and the grinding head driving mechanism comprises a rotary table motor, a grinding head rotary table, a plurality of grinding head motors and grinding heads with the number equal to that of the grinding head motors; the double-station precise five-axis grinding machine has the beneficial effects that the double-station precise five-axis grinding machine can continuously, randomly and automatically switch processing procedures, and the procedures of 3D thinning, medium polishing and fine polishing can be completed by clamping a workpiece at one time.
column14: SHENZHEN MOBA INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: ION COLLECTOR FOR USE IN PLASMA SYSTEMS
column13: An ion collector includes a plurality of segments and a plurality of integrators. The plurality of segments are physically separated from one another and spaced around a substrate support. Each of the segments includes a conductive element that is designed to conduct a current based on ions received from a plasma. Each of the plurality of integrators is coupled to a corresponding conductive element. Each of the plurality of integrators is designed to determine an ion distribution for a corresponding conductive element based, at least in part, on the current conducted at the corresponding conductive element. An example benefit of this embodiment includes the ability to determine how uniform the ion distribution is across a wafer being processed by the plasma.

column12: Electric vehicle power lithium battery residual life prediction method based on deep network model
column13: The invention discloses an electric vehicle power lithium battery residual life prediction method based on a deep network model, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining lithium battery performance data in a historical database, and generating a data set; s2, preprocessing the lithium battery performance data of the data set; s3, inputting the processed lithium battery performance data into a deep network model for training, extracting features by using the deep network model, continuously performing deep mining on the features in a forward propagation mode, and establishing a network system structure; s4, establishing a characteristic basic degradation mechanism and an equivalent model of the power lithium ion battery in the network system structure by utilizing adam back propagation training; and S5, testing the characteristic basic degradation mechanism and the equivalent model according to a preset evaluation index. According to the method, the original image is used as input by using the convolutional neural network, corresponding features can be effectively learned from a large number of samples, and a complex feature extraction process is avoided.

column12: SEPARATE PFCP SESSION MODEL FOR NETWORK ACCESS BY RESIDENTIAL GATEWAYS
column13: A network element includes means for establishing, via an aggregate gateway function, a separate packet forwarding control protocol session for each packet data unit (PDU) session between the residential gateway and the network; and means for facilitating, via the aggregate gateway function, network access by the residential gateway via each PDU session according to a corresponding, separate packet forwarding control protocol session.
