column12: In-situ microcell xenotime Lu-Hf dating method
column13: The invention provides an in-situ microcell xenotime Lu-Hf dating method, which comprises the following steps of: performing point denudation and ionization on a target sampling point, and measuring ion signal data; in a triple quadrupole mode, an ICP-MS/MS instrument adopts auxiliary gas nitrogen to sensitize the instrument, adopts pure ammonia gas as reaction gas to react with 176Hf, so that the pure ammonia gas is separated from 176Lu and 176Yb on line, and ion signal intensity is collected; after element signal data are obtained, the ratio of 176Lu/176Hf to 176Hf/177Hf is calculated, and instrument drift correction is carried out; deducting the signal of (176 + 82) Hf; carrying out common Hf deduction on the xenotime standard substance and the sample; the specific value of 176 Hf/176 Lu and the specific value of 176 Hf/176 Hf of the unknown sample are corrected; and calculating the Lu-Hf age data of the xenotime ore. According to the method, the matrix effect between the NIST SRM 610 and the xenotime is overcome, and accurate year determination of the in-situ microcell xenotime Lu-Hf is achieved. The defects of poor spatial resolution, low dating success rate, long period and the like in the prior art are overcome.
column15: WU SHITOU;;YANG YUEHENG;;WANG HAO;;XU LEI;;HUANG CHAO;;XIE LIEWEN

column12: Decision-making method of comprehensive alumina production indexes based on multi-scale deep convolutional network
column13: The invention provides a decision-making method of comprehensive alumina production indexes based on a multi-scale deep convolutional network. The method mainly consists of several sub-models: a multi-scale deep splicing convolutional neural network prediction sub-model reflecting the influence of bottom-layer production process indexes on the comprehensive alumina production indexes, a full connecting neural network prediction sub-model reflecting the influence of upper-layer dispatching indexes on the comprehensive alumina production indexes, a full connecting neural network prediction sub-model reflecting the influence of the comprehensive alumina production indexes at a past time on current comprehensive alumina production indexes, and a multi-scale information neural network integrated model for collaborative optimization of sub-model parameters. According to the method, through an integrated prediction model structure, a memory capacity of a superficial-layer network and a feature extraction capacity of a deep-layer network, a precise decision-making for the comprehensive alumina production indexes is realized.
column32: Qiu et al, “Hybrid Model Based Optimal Control for a Metallurgy Process”, 2008, Proceedings of the 17th World Congress The International Federation of Automatic Control, pp. 10844-10850 (7 pages) (Year: 2008).

column12: Spraying and dust-settling type crushing device for tin smelting ore charge
column13: The utility model discloses a tin smelting ore charge spraying and dust falling type crushing device, and relates to the technical field of crushing devices. Comprising a supporting bottom plate, supporting stand columns are fixedly connected to the top of the supporting bottom plate, supporting transverse columns are fixedly connected to the inner sides of the supporting stand columns, limiting blocks are fixedly connected into the supporting transverse columns, a supporting top plate is fixedly connected to the tops of the supporting stand columns, and a crushing structure is arranged at the bottom of the supporting top plate; and the crushing cylinder is matched with the crushing structure. The dust sensor is arranged on the inner wall of the crushing barrel, when the dust sensor detects that the dust content in the air exceeds a set value, it shows that the crusher generates more dust, at the moment, an atomizing nozzle in the spraying and dust falling structure is started to conduct spraying and dust falling, and when the dust sensor detects that the dust content is reduced, the atomizing nozzle is closed to conduct spraying and dust falling. According to the design, the problem of dust generated by crushing is solved with the minimum water consumption, the water content of crushed ore materials is low, and follow-up treatment is facilitated.
column14: GEJIU KAIMENG IND AND TRADE CO LTD

column12: Uncertain multi-objective optimization method for ore grinding grading process
column13: The invention discloses an uncertain multi-objective model and an optimization method in an ore grinding grading process. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a determined multi-objective optimization model for improving the treatment capacity of a mill by maximizing the mill power and improving the product quality by maximizing the-0.075 mm fineness content of a section of overflow; considering the problem of uncertainty of ore particle size distribution fluctuation in the production process, regarding ore particle size parameters as triangular fuzzy parameters, and proposing a fuzzy opportunity constraint model in the ore grinding classification process; a hybrid NSGA-II algorithm based on credibility measurement and fuzzy simulation is adopted for solving, and a Pareto optimal leading edge is obtained; and finally, obtaining an optimal set value by adopting a TOPSIS decision method. The result shows that the product quality is improved by 3.52% and the yield is improved by 7.56 t/h through the method.
column15: WANG XIAOLI;;LIAO QIAN;;DUAN LIAN;;XIONG WEI;;YANG CHUNHUA;;LIU YANG

column12: Automatic grinding electric control device and automatic cup body grinding equipment
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic grinding electric control device and automatic cup body grinding equipment. The power distribution cabinet comprises a cabinet body, pLC controller, driver andrelay, frequency converter and power supply module, according to the automatic polishing electric control device, the PLC is adopted to control signal transmission and processing of the electric control device and the external polishing device; the driver is adopted for driving the external robot to operate, the frequency converter is adopted for controlling the rotating speed of the external grinding motor, accurate control over automatic grinding is achieved, and therefore the grinding equipment adopting the electric control device has the advantages of being high in grinding precision, good in consistency, high in grinding efficiency and the like. According to the automatic cup body grinding equipment, due to the fact that the automatic grinding electric control device, the cup body clamping device and the cup body grinding device are adopted, manual operation is replaced with automatic machining, the problems that pure manual grinding is large in dust amount and low in efficiencyare solved, manual operation is reduced, the environment quality is improved, and the influence of dust on operators is greatly reduced.
column14: SHANGHAI KUNJEK HANDTOOLS & HARDWARE CO LTD

column12: Lead-zinc slag pellet raw material preparation system
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of XXX, in particular to a lead-zinc slag pellet raw material preparation system which comprises XXX. In the lead-zinc slag pellet raw material preparation system, part of raw materials required by a pelletizing system are piled in different areas, and each raw material is provided with relatively independent feeding, ore grinding and conveying systems; the ground materials enter the batching bin of the batching chamber after being stored by the bag collector in a pneumatic conveying mode, the continuity and stability of feeding can be guaranteed, and the whole system is high in automation degree, small in occupied area, easy to control and small in environmental pollution.
column14: YUNNAN HUADING REGENERATION RESOURCE DEV CO LTD
column15: ZHANG ZHI'AN;;SHEN PENGJUN;;YU XIANG;;WU SHAOXIANG;;WANG MINGQIANG

column12: Small-caliber heat exchange tube cathode protection potential measuring device and using method
column13: The invention provides a small-caliber heat exchange tube cathode protection potential measuring device and a using method. The device comprises a heat exchange tube with a hole in the outer wall, wherein a metal pipe hoop compresses a sealing rubber pad and a pressing block which are arranged at the upper end of the hole part of the heat exchange tube; a potential test probe sequentially penetrates through the metal pipe hoop, the pressing block, the sealing rubber pad and a small hole reserved in the heat exchange tube in a machining mode and extends into the heat exchange tube; the upper end of the potential test probe is connected with an inlet of a needle valve; the lower end of a drainage tube is connected with an outlet of the needle valve; one end of a flow guide tube is directly connected to the drainage tube, and the other end of the flow guide tube is placed in an electrode cup; a reference electrode is also placed in the electrode cup; the heat exchange tube and the reference electrode are connected with a potential tester through wires; and in the testing process, after a working medium in the heat exchange tube forms a flowing condition, the needle valve is slightly opened, so that the working medium in the tube slowly flows into the electrode cup, the potential tester is opened, and potential test data are recorded. The measuring device is reliable and easy to realize, and the problem of measuring the cathode protection potential of a small-caliber pipeline is solved.
column14: XI'AN THERMAL POWER RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
column15: LIU FENG;;CAO JIEYU;;LIU YONGBING;;ZHU TAO;;YAO JIANTAO;;WEN HUIFENG

column12: Automatic inner circle grinding machine for glass
column13: The utility model relates to an automatic internal grinding machine for glass. The glass grinding machine comprises a rack, a horizontal sliding mechanism, a rotating mechanism, an advancing and retreating mechanism, a lifting mechanism and a grinding wheel motor, a workbench is arranged on the rack, and a glass fixing suction cup is arranged on the workbench. And the horizontal sliding mechanismis used for controlling the grinding wheel motor to move left and right. And the rotating mechanism is used for controlling the grinding wheel motor to integrally rotate. The advancing and retreatingmechanism is used for controlling the grinding wheel motor to move forwards and backwards. And the lifting mechanism is used for controlling the grinding wheel motor to lift. And a motor shaft of thegrinding wheel motor is provided with a grinding wheel used for rotationally grinding a round hole in the glass. According to the automatic inner circle grinding machine for the glass, the actions ofleft-right movement, front-back movement, lifting movement, 360-degree rotary grinding and the like of the grinding wheel are completed through the horizontal sliding mechanism, the rotating mechanism, the advancing and retreating mechanism, the lifting mechanism and the grinding wheel motor; therefore, efficient and rapid grinding of the glass inner circular hole is achieved, and the glass innercircular hole grinding device is high in automation degree and high in grinding efficiency.
column14: FOSHAN CITY HONGYI AUTOMATION EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Food processor
column13: The utility model discloses a food processing machine, which belongs to the field of household appliances, solves the problem that food materials are possibly clamped between a crushing cutter and a detection sensor, and adopts the technical scheme that the inner bottom surface of a crushing cup is provided with a mounting through hole, the detection sensor penetrates through the mounting through hole to be fixed, and the inner bottom surface of the crushing cup is provided with a sinking groove; the detection sensor is installed in the sinking groove, the top end face of the detection sensor is a smooth curved surface, the edge of the top end face of the detection sensor is not higher than the inner bottom face, located on the edge of the sinking groove, of the smashing cup, and a sealing ring is arranged between the detection sensor and the smashing cup. The food crushing device is mainly used for effectively avoiding the situation that food materials are clamped by the detection sensor and the crushing knife.
column14: HANGZHOU JOYOUNG HOUSEHOLD ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES CO LTD

column12: Food processor with reservation function
column13: The invention provides a food processor with a reservation function, which comprises a base and a stirring cup, the stirring cup comprises a cup body and a cup cover, a crushing knife driven by a motor is arranged in the cup body, an accommodating cavity is formed in the cup cover, a first opening communicated with the cup body is formed in the bottom of the accommodating cavity, and a first coverbody is arranged at the first opening; the lower end of the containing cavity is larger than the upper end of the containing cavity. According to the food processor with the structure, food materialscan be prevented from making contact with water too early, the taste of the food materials is guaranteed, the lower end of the containing cavity is arranged to be larger than the upper end of the containing cavity, and it can be guaranteed that the food materials in the containing cavity can fall into the cup body from the first opening after the first cover body is opened; particularly, after food materials in the containing cavity expand when meeting water, the food materials are easily clamped in the containing cavity and are difficult to fall off, the containing cavity is arranged to be of a big-end-down structure, falling of the food materials is facilitated, and therefore the reliability of the reservation function is improved.

column12: Mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type dual-power-supply switching control system
column13: The invention discloses a mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type dual-power-supply switching control system, which comprises a mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type dual-power-supply switching control box, and is characterized in that the mining flame-proof and intrinsic safety type dual-power-supply switching control box collects on-site switching value and analog quantity signals into the control box, and the on-site switching value and analog quantity signals are processed and subjected to logical operation through an internal program, so that the on-site switching value and analog quantity signals are obtained. The dual-power-supply switching control box outputs a control signal of a switching value to control the on-off of field equipment, and meanwhile, the dual-power-supply switching control box exchanges data with 485 communication equipment and an upper computer, so that long-distance and large-data-volume monitoring is realized. According to the mining flameproof and intrinsic safety type dual-power-supply switching control system, the intelligent controller is adopted, the operation stability of equipment is ensured, the bidirectional automatic switching function of a main power supply and an auxiliary power supply can be met, the system is automatically switched to an auxiliary loop for power supply when a main loop breaks down, and is automatically switched to the main loop after power supply of the main loop is recovered, the whole process is intelligent and automatic, and manual assistance is not needed; the voltage meets various voltage grades, the application range is wide, and various devices can be used at the same time.
column14: JIANGSU ZHONGGU MINE TECH CO LTD

column12: Edge grinding device for breakage-proof glass
column13: The invention discloses an edge grinding device for breakage-proof glass, and particularly relates to the technical field of breakage-proof glass edge grinding equipment.The edge grinding device is provided with an edge grinding walking mechanism, a horizontal air cylinder pushes an edge grinding mechanism to move towards the edge of the breakage-proof glass, and the grinding face of an edge grinding wheel makes contact with the edge of the breakage-proof glass in an attached mode; the edge grinding wheel is driven by the driving motor to rotate, then edge grinding of the breakage-proof glass is achieved, the transmission plate is pulled by the pushing air cylinder to roll on the fixing plate, the edge grinding wheel moves in the edge direction of the breakage-proof glass, the edge of the breakage-proof glass is subjected to unified edge grinding treatment, the automation degree is high, and edge grinding is efficient. The bottom face of the breakage-proof glass is adsorbed through the steering adsorption mechanism and the multiple vacuum suction cups, the bearing plate is driven by the rotating air cylinder to rotate by 90 degrees, the other two edges of the breakage-proof glass are moved to the position of the edge grinding mechanism, edge grinding on the other two edges of the breakage-proof glass is facilitated, the edge grinding efficiency is high, and automatic completion is achieved.
column15: YU CHUNYUN;;SUN CAIZHANG;;WANG LINNA;;LI ZHENZHEN;;LI XIAOLONG;;LI PENG

column12: Master-slave control type mechanical platform based on total hip arthroplasty
column13: The invention discloses a master-slave control type mechanical platform based on total hip replacement arthroplasty. The master-slave control type mechanical platform comprises a support, an XY-axis driving device arranged on the support, a Z-axis driving device arranged on the XY-axis driving device, a grinding and filing mechanical arm installed on the Z-axis driving device, a binocular camera device used for sensing and monitoring the condition of an operation execution process and a controller. When the controller controls the grinding and filing mechanical arm to work, the controller shoots and obtains real-time position data of the grinding and filing mechanical arm through the binocular camera device, and then the controller controls the X-axis and Y-axis driving device and the Z-axis driving device to drive the grinding and filing mechanical arm to move to the corresponding positions in the X-axis direction, the Y-axis direction and the Z-axis direction according to the obtained position data. Computer vision, an automatic control technology and acetabular cup positioning and automatic grinding in total hip replacement are fused, an automatic master-slave control type mechanical platform is achieved, operation precision is improved, manual operation errors are reduced, and manufacturing cost is reduced.
column15: HU CHAOHUI;;CAI SHUTING;;XIONG XIAOMING;;GUO JING;;LIU YUAN

column12: Automatic feeding machine of grinding machine
column13: The utility model provides an automatic feeding machine of a grinding machine. The automatic feeding device comprises an attraction mechanism, a pushing mechanism arranged on the right side of the attraction mechanism and a rotary discharging mechanism installed on the left side of the attraction mechanism. The rotary discharging mechanism comprises a rotary motor; the rotating piece is arranged on the rotating motor; the adapter plate is connected with the rotating piece; the sliding table cylinder fixing plate is vertically connected to the tail end of the adapter plate; wherein the slidingtable air cylinder is fixed to the sliding table air cylinder fixing plate, the two adjusting rods penetrate through the sliding table air cylinder fixing plate, the adjusting guide sleeves are arranged on the adjusting rods in a sleeving mode, the suction cup fixing plate is fixed to the lower ends of the adjusting rods, and the suction cups are fixed to the lower surface of the suction cup fixing plate. According to the automatic feeding machine of the grinding machine, the working efficiency is high, the suction mechanism and the rotary discharging mechanism work alternately till a whole stack of materials is taken out, the automation degree is high, and operation is easy.

column12: Mangrove forest extraction method based on multi-feature and long-time-sequence probability cooperation
column13: The invention relates to a mangrove forest extraction method based on multi-feature and long time sequence probability cooperation, and the method comprises the steps: screening all Landsat image surface reflectance data according to time and regions based on a GEE platform; and calculating a normalized vegetation index, a normalized water index and a mangrove forest comprehensive identification index. The beneficial effects of the invention are that: the method achieves the full mining and utilization of the Landsat long time series data; the data acquisition is convenient, and the process iseasy to implement; long-time-sequence and space-fully-covered mangrove forest data can be provided, analysis of the space-time change trend of the mangrove forest nationwide is facilitated, and scientific support and decision reference suggestions are provided for implementation of large-scale mangrove forest ecosystem protection and recovery actions in China. According to the method provided bythe invention, the Landsat long-time series data is fully mined and utilized, the spatial information and the time information are fused, the existing mangrove forest extraction method is effectivelysupplemented, the data is convenient to obtain, the process is easy to realize, and the fine monitoring of the mangrove forest and the ecological system protection of the mangrove forest are facilitated.
column32: 李澜等: "《光学设计实用技术》", 31 January 2019;;赵谦等: "《智能视频图像处理技术与应用》", 30 September 2016;;刘 凯等: "基于Google Earth Engine的红树林年际变化监测研究", 《地球信息科学》;;KAUSHIK GUPTA等: "An index for discrimination of mangroves from non-mangroves using LANDSAT 8 OLI imagery", 《METHODSX》

column12: Online copper and iron ion analysis device for PCB hole filling process liquid medicine
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of liquid medicine analysis and sampling in a wet process technology, and particularly relates to an on-line copper and iron ion analysis device for liquid medicine in a PCB (Printed Circuit Board) hole filling technology. The utility model discloses an online copper and iron ion analysis device for PCB hole filling process liquid medicine. The online copper and iron ion analysis device comprises a sampling module, a copper ion detection module, an iron ion detection module and a liquid discharge module which are sequentially communicated according to the flowing direction of the liquid medicine to be detected, the sampling module comprises a sample injection pump, a flow switch and a circulation cup which are communicated in sequence, the sample injection pump is used for sampling from tank liquid, and an output port of the circulation cup is communicated to an input port of the copper ion detection module. According to the utility model, copper ions or iron ions can be simultaneously detected through one-time sampling, online monitoring of bath solutions in a plurality of bath positions is realized, human resources can be saved, the problem of difficulty in labor use under the general trend is solved, the sampling and analysis time is shortened, the monitoring cost is reduced, the influence of human factors in the data processing process can be eliminated, and the working efficiency is improved. And the detection efficiency and accuracy are improved.
column14: SHANGHAI MIYUAN AUTOMATIC CONTROL SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Burr polishing device for microcrystalline glass plate
column13: The burr polishing device comprises a supporting plate, a motor is fixedly connected to the middle of the upper surface of the supporting plate, a rotating rod is fixedly connected to the output end of the motor, and a rotating disc is fixedly connected to one end of the rotating rod. According to the burr grinding device for the microcrystal glass plate, through the arrangement of the motor, the rotating disc, the suction cups, the first springs and the pressing plate, the motor drives the rotating rod to rotate, so that the rotating disc can drive the glass plate to rotate, the fixing effect on the glass plate is improved through the suction cups, and the supporting stability of the glass plate during grinding is ensured; glass plates with different diameters can be fixed and machined, the use range is widened, multi-directional grinding is achieved, the automation degree is high, a pressing plate makes contact with the tops of the glass plates under the action of first springs, so that the tops of the glass plates are limited and fixed, the first springs enable the pressing plate to have certain buffering force when the glass plates are fixed, and therefore the glass plates are fixed. And the plate cannot be damaged.

column12: Ore feeding process automatic control system based on 5GAI technology
column13: The invention discloses an ore feeding process automatic control system based on a 5GAI technology. Comprising a coarse ore bin, a bar feeder, a coarse ore bin, a coarse crusher, a first belt conveyor, a vibrating screen bin, a vibrating screen, a second belt conveyor, an intermediate crusher bin, an intermediate crusher, a third belt conveyor, a transfer station, a first ultrasonic sensor, a first camera, a first weight sensor, a second ultrasonic sensor, a second camera and a second weight sensor. A third ultrasonic sensor, a third camera, a third weight sensor, an electric control cabinet and a remote server. Automatic feeding of the bar feeder is achieved through the automatic control system, field operation is free of manual intervention, the automatic feeding mode is scientific and reasonable, operation control of the automatic feeding system is stable and reliable, production efficiency is improved, the energy consumption utilization rate is high, collaboration among equipment is high, the positions and reasons of equipment faults can be found in time, and the production efficiency is improved. And the service life of equipment is prolonged.
column14: MAANSHAN XINCHUANG ELECTRIC TECH CO LTD

column12: Crusher transmission PLC control system and method based on variable-frequency transmission system
column13: The invention provides a crusher transmission PLC control system and method based on a variable-frequency transmission system. The system comprises a PLC module, a variable-frequency module, a serial communication module, a rotating speed sensor and a heavy-plate ore feeder motor; the PLC module is connected with the variable-frequency module and the rotating speed sensor through the serial communication module; and the PLC module comprises a variable-frequency current acquisition module, a rotating speed sensor rotating speed acquisition module, a variable-frequency current comparison module and a variable-frequency frequency write-in module. Through the serial communication module between the PLC module and the variable-frequency module, the current of an impact crusher is used as a judgment condition, the operation rotating speed of the heavy-plate ore feeder motor is reduced by reducing the operation frequency; the impact crusher is stopped in time by taking the rotating speed value of a transmission belt rotating speed sensor as a judgment condition, so that the problem that a transmission belt slips and is abraded due to overlarge ore feeding amount is avoided.

column12: Mine re-greening monitoring and evaluating method based on remote sensing data
column13: The invention discloses a mine re-greening monitoring and evaluation method based on remote sensing data. The method comprises the steps of 1, image acquisition and preprocessing; step 2, overall inter-year vegetation growth vigor grading analysis; 3, overall vegetation growth vigor change analysis; 4, monitoring land type changes; 5, monitoring whether the normal vegetation growth trend is similar to the restored vegetation growth trend or not; 6, monitoring the graded growth change of the restored vegetation; 7, evaluating the inter-annual restoration effect of the region; step 8, evaluatingan interannual comprehensive restoration effect; and 9, evaluating the overall repair effect. According to the method, the land type and vegetation growth change result in the research area can be quickly and simultaneously obtained, and the dynamic change of mining area expansion and recovery is indicated; whether restored vegetation grows normally or not can be monitored; change conditions of the restored vegetation in all aspects are analyzed; dynamic changes of inter-annual restoration vegetation are analyzed; the interannual repair effect is quantitatively evaluated; and the comprehensive vegetation recovery effect of the research area is determined. According to the invention, monitoring of mine vegetation recovery can be effectively carried out, and data support is provided for ecological protection and mine development supervision.
column14: AERO GEOPHYSICAL SURVEY AND REMOTE SENSING CENTER FOR NATURAL RESOURCES OF CHINA
column15: LIU RONGYUAN;;GAN FUPING;;WANG WEI;;YAN BAIKUN;;YU JUNCHUAN;;YANG JINZHONG

column12: Electric power point commodity recommendation method and system based on inverse reward learning optimization
column13: The invention discloses an electric power point commodity recommendation method and system based on inverse reward learning optimization, and the method comprises the steps: building a potential customer mining model, predicting the probability of point exchange of a user according to the historical point exchange record of a to-be-predicted user, and determining a potential point exchange user; utilizing a three-dimensional scoring recommendation algorithm to calculate the interest degree of the current user on the unscored commodities, and combining the forgetting curve to calculate the preference degree of the current user on the unscored commodities; according to the preference degree of the current user for the unscored commodities, the recommendation strategy is continuously adjusted through an inverse reward feedback learning method, the commodities with the high recommendation success rate replace the commodities with the low recommendation success rate, and a commodity recommendation list is generated. In the aspect of commodity recommendation, a traditional recommendation algorithm and inverse reinforcement learning are combined, the advantages of the traditional recommendation algorithm and the inverse reinforcement learning are fused, the influence of a time factor and a user behavior factor on user preference is introduced, the recommendation precision of the algorithm is improved, and the satisfaction degree of the user is also improved.

column12: Navigation method and system for assisting acetabular cup implantation by acetabular collapse reconstruction technology
column13: In order to overcome the defects in the prior art, the navigation method and system for assisting acetabular cup implantation through the acetabular collapse reconstruction technology are provided, and the navigation method comprises the steps that after a CT/MRI graph of an acetabular part is segmented, modeling is conducted on the acetabular part, and an acetabular model is obtained; the operation position of the acetabular cup is positioned, the acetabular cup and the acetabular model are utilized to make preliminary contact, and the depth of the acetabular cup and the number of contacts of the acetabular cup and the acetabular model are obtained; according to the depth of the acetabular cup and the number of contact points of the acetabular cup and the acetabular model, a to-be-ground part of the acetabular part of the patient is determined; a mathematical expression of the grinding and filing tool is constructed, and a grinding and filing tool model is determined; and simulation navigation is performed on the assigned grinding and filing tool model, and the grinding and filing effect of the acetabulum part is analyzed. According to the method, surgical planning and modeling can be carried out on the seriously worn acetabulum according to the shape of the acetabular cup, and the surgical planning effect is achieved.
column15: YANG YIJING;;SHEN JUN;;HE YAN;;GUO JING;;CAI SHUTING;;XIONG XIAOMING

column12: Power and axial pressure control device of semi-autogenous mill
column13: The utility model discloses a power and axial pressure control device of a semi-autogenous mill, and relates to the field of semi-autogenous mill equipment. The device comprises a PID controller, an axial pressure set value and a power set value of the semi-autogenous mill are input into the input end of the PID controller, the output end of the PID controller is connected with an ore feeder, an ore feeding water valve and a ball feeder, the ore feeder, the ore feeding water valve and the ball feeder are connected with the semi-autogenous mill, and the output end of the semi-autogenous mill is connected with a mill audio frequency spectrum analyzer, an axial pressure sensor and a power transmitter. The grinding frequency spectrum analyzer is connected with the PID controller, after an output signal of the axial pressure sensor is compared with a semi-autogenous mill axial pressure set value input by the input end of the PID controller, the deviation is input into the PID controller, and after an output signal of the power transmitter is compared with a semi-autogenous mill power set value input by the input end of the PID controller, the deviation is input into the PID controller. According to the device, the power and the axial pressure of the semi-autogenous mill are kept in the optimal ore grinding area by controlling the ore feeding amount, the ore feeding water and the ball adding amount of the semi-autogenous mill which influence the load of the semi-autogenous mill.

FREE ACTIVE CHLORINE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD
column13: A system and method for measuring concentration of oxidation ions in a solution includes a conduit that contains the solution at least temporarily, a pH sensor associated with the conduit and configured to provide a pH signal indicative of a pH of the solution, an oxidation reduction probe (ORP) associated with the conduit and configured to provide an ORP signal indicative of an oxidation reduction of the solution, and a controller configured to receive and process the pH signal and the ORP signal, wherein the controller calculates a concentration of oxidation ions in the solution based on the pH and ORP signals.

column12: Glass substrate polishing mechanism
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of glass grinding, and discloses a glass substrate grinding mechanism which comprises a driving mechanism and a grinding mechanism, the grinding mechanism is movably connected to the bottom of the driving mechanism, the grinding mechanism comprises a polishing unit and a fixing unit, and the polishing unit is connected to the bottom of the driving mechanism. The driving mechanism is movably connected to the top of the fixing unit. According to the glass substrate grinding mechanism, the suction cups are arranged, when a glass plate is placed on the top, negative pressure equipment is started, the glass plate is adsorbed to the tops of the suction cups to be fixed, the glass substrate grinding mechanism is suitable for glass plates of different shapes, the use efficiency is higher, rubber sheets are arranged at the bottoms of the suction cups, and when the suction cups adsorb the glass plate, the rubber sheets are pressed; and an internal pressure sensor conducts position recognition detection, the polishing cotton is moved to the top of the glass plate through the driving mechanism, and using is more accurate.

column12: Machining equipment for rubber base inflating valve
column13: The utility model provides processing equipment for a rubber base inflating valve. The processing equipment is sequentially provided with a feeding mechanism, a distributing mechanism, a feeding mechanism, a turntable mechanism and a grinding mechanism along a processing transmission line of the processing equipment, the material distributing mechanism comprises a guide rail assembly and a lifting assembly. The guide rail assembly is in butt joint between the feeding mechanism and the feeding mechanism and drives the lifting assembly to move back and forth in the direction of the conveying line. The lifting assembly is used for grabbing and limiting the rubber base inflating valve input by the feeding mechanism in the posture that a rubber base body of the rubber base inflating valve faces upwards. The feeding mechanism is provided with a suction cup assembly, and the suction cup assembly is suitable for sucking and releasing the rubber base body; the rotating disc mechanism comprises a rotating disc, a clamp and a driving part. The clamp is configured to be a station suitable for insertion arrangement of an air cock body of the rubber base inflating valve, so that a rubber base body of the rubber base inflating valve is exposed on the end face of the clamp, and the grinding mechanism is supplied to carry out rapid grinding operation on the rubber base body on the clamp. And the grinding efficiency is improved, the machining quality is improved, and the automation degree of equipment is remarkably improved.

column12: Small-caliber heat exchange tube cathodic protection potential measuring device

column13: Environmental control device (1) for aquariums (6), ponds, or terrariums comprising: a casing (5); an environmental control means (2), adapted to control an environmental condition of the aquarium (6), pond, or terrarium; and an NFC communication device (3) configured to communicate with an external unit (4). column12: Real-time monitoring type multistage magnetic separation device for zirconium-titanium mine and magnetic separation method of real-time monitoring type multistage magnetic separation device
column13: The invention discloses a real-time monitoring type multistage magnetic separation device for zircon-titanium ore and a magnetic separation method of the real-time monitoring type multistage magnetic separation device, relates to the technical field of zircon-titanium ore magnetic separation monitoring, and aims to solve the problems that the magnetic separation effect is poor due to the fact that only one-time magnetic separation is carried out without considering different magnetic separation effects under different solid states in the existing magnetic separation; according to the key points of the technical scheme, the device comprises a first magnetic separation box and remote alarm equipment, a crushing box is fixedly connected to the upper end of the first magnetic separation box, and a crushing mechanism used for crushing ores is arranged in the crushing box; the side wall of the first magnetic separation box is detachably connected with a first magnetic separation plate used for sucking magnets, the interior of the first magnetic separation box is fixedly connected with a first laser sensor used for detecting accumulation of the magnets on the first magnetic separation plate, and the lower end of the first magnetic separation box is fixedly connected with a second magnetic separation box; and the effects of real-time monitoring, blockage prevention, convenience in cleaning and remote alarm are achieved.

column12: Isothermal efficient pyrometallurgical equipment
column13: The invention provides isothermal efficient pyrometallurgical equipment. The isothermal efficient pyrometallurgical equipment comprises an automatic feeding system, a constant-temperature reacting furnace, a discharging cooling system, a surface cooler and a dust collector which are sequentially arranged from left to right. The isothermal efficient pyrometallurgy equipment is reasonable in structural design, continuous operation can be achieved at the same time, the temperature is easy to control, continuous reaction is achieved, expanded experimental research equipment is provided for pyrometallurgy, experimental data are closer to actual production, and more accurate and reliable technical guidance is provided for industrial application. column12: Manganese ore drying machine
column13: The utility model discloses a manganese ore drying machine which comprises a first supporting seat, a first driving motor, a main body and a spiral conveyor, and the first supporting seat is arrangedat one end of the bottom of the main body. By installing the PLC, the heating block, the temperature sensor, the stirring shaft, the second driving motor and the main body, the performance of the device is optimized, on one hand, when the device is used, the second driving motor is started to drive the stirring shaft and the crushing fan blades to rotate, the added manganese ore raw materials arecrushed and separated, and on the other hand, the performance of the device is improved; on the other hand, the temperature sensor can monitor the temperature of the main body all the time and send the monitored data to the PLC, when the temperature reaches a preset value, the drying effect is influenced, and the temperature sensor can monitor the temperature of the main body all the time, so thatthe drying effect is improved. column12: Crawler belt remote control type breaking hammer vehicle
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining, in particular to a crawler remote control type breaking hammer vehicle which comprises a walking unit, a chassis, a control circuit, a wireless communication module, a remote control terminal, a hydraulic control system, a large arm assembly, a small arm assembly and a breaking assembly. The walking unit is mounted on the chassis; the big arm assembly is movably connected to the front end of the chassis; the small arm assembly is movably connected with the large arm assembly; the crushing assembly is movably connected with the small arm assembly; the hydraulic control system is connected with the big arm assembly, the small arm assembly and the crushing assembly; the control circuit is electrically connected with the hydraulic control system; the wireless communication module is electrically connected with the control circuit; and the wireless communication module communicates with a remote control terminal. The crawler remote control type breaking hammer vehicle provided by the utility model has the advantages that the remote finishing operation of the crawler remote control type breaking hammer vehicle in a mine hole can be realized, the vibration discomfort to an operator can be prevented, and the injury to the operator caused by dropped slag when the top of the mine hole is finished can be avoided.

column12: Substrate processing apparatus, substrate processing method and storage medium
column13: Disclosed is a substrate processing apparatus. The substrate processing apparatus includes a first nozzle that ejects droplets of a chemical liquid toward a front surface of a substrate, the droplets being formed by mixing a gas supplied by a gas supply mechanism and a heated chemical liquid supplied by a heated chemical liquid supply mechanism with each other, and a second nozzle that ejects the heated deionized water supplied by the heated deionized water supply mechanism toward the rear surface of the substrate. The first nozzle supplies the droplets to the front surface of the substrate heated from the rear surface thereof by the heated deionized water supplied from the second nozzle.

column12: VEHICLE INTERIOR CLEANING APPARATUS
column13: A cleaning apparatus for use by hand and/or with a robotic device includes a nozzle that expels fluid, air or liquid, out of an open end of a housing of the cleaning apparatus. Simultaneously, a vacuum device is suctioning debris through the housing and into a vacuum port. The simultaneous use of suction and expelled fluid through a single apparatus generates turbulent airflow and effectively loosens and removes debris attached to surfaces without the need for the housing to contact the surfaces.
column32: See also references of EP 4057881A4

column12: Sea area natural gas hydrate barrel-type mining simulation test device and test method thereof
column13: The invention relates to a sea area natural gas hydrate barrel type mining simulation test device. The test device comprises a high-pressure test box and a simulation mining barrel used for sinking into the high-pressure test box to simulate a natural gas hydrate reservoir, the simulation mining barrel is provided with a first drainage pipe communicating with the space in the barrel, the simulation mining barrel is further provided with a sand prevention cavity, the sand prevention cavity is connected with a second drainage pipe and an air delivery pipe, and the high-pressure test box is driven to lift by a vertical drawing system. The test device can simulate the processes of mining barrel sinking, depressurization mining and mining barrel recovery, and has important significance for researching the applicability, mining efficiency, action range and the like of a marine natural gas hydrate barrel-type mining device.

column12: Automatic polishing method for fan blade defect repair
column13: The invention relates to an automatic polishing method for fan blade defect repair, which belongs to the technical field of fan repair and comprises the following steps: an unmanned aerial vehicle acquires a point cloud picture of a fan blade and transmits the point cloud picture to an industrial personal computer; the industrial personal computer reconstructs a fan blade model according to the point cloud atlas, marks the area with the surface depth larger than 1 mm and transmits the area to the repairing robot; the repairing robot ascends to the front of the blade of the wind driven generator through a self-lifting device and is adsorbed on the fan through a suction cup, and a pre-polishing detection program is executed on the fan blade to determine a to-be-polished area and properties; the repairing robot executes a polishing program on the to-be-polished area according to the property; the repairing robot executes a post-polishing detection program on the fan blade; and the repairing robot descends to the ground through the self-lifting device, and automatic grinding work is finished. The blade polishing device can complete the blade polishing procedure in the air, is good in safety, and ensures the accuracy of the polishing position of the mechanical arm.
column14: SHANGHAI ELECTRIC POWER IND CO LTD;;SHANGHAI GREEN ENVIRONMENTAL PROT ENERGY CO LTD;;UNIV SHANGHAI ENG SCIENCE

column12: Sheet taking mechanism of guillotine shear
column13: The utility model discloses a sheet taking mechanism of a guillotine, which is arranged at one end of a material bearing guide rail facing a separation end, and comprises a sheet taking guide rail, a suction cup assembly seat, a suction cup motor and a material fixing suction cup, the suction cup is arranged at the separation end of the material bearing guide rail, and a sample sheet is fixed by a negative pressure pipeline; according to the cutting-off machine, the sample is moved out of the material bearing guide rail through the sample taking guide rail, materials with different areas and different weights cut by hard and brittle material bars with different sizes can be matched through the multiple material fixing suction cups, the suction force is shared through the multiple suction cup structures, compared with a hand-held sample, the probability that the sample is broken is reduced, automation of material taking of the cutting-off machine is achieved, and the cutting-off efficiency is improved. And operators are prevented from staying around the equipment for a long time, and body injury caused by long-time suction of crushed aggregates and dust is avoided.
column14: FUZHOU TIANREI FRETSAW SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
column15: WANG XIAOZHAO;;LI BO;;XU XIANZHAO;;YU HUIHUA;;YANG CHANGYOU;;LIN GUANGZHAN

column12: Stone machining device
column13: The utility model relates to a stone processing device which comprises two Y-axis rails which are arranged in parallel in a spaced mode, a movable base which moves in the Y-axis direction of the Y-axis rails is arranged on the Y-axis rails, Z-axis vertical frames are arranged on the movable base, an X-axis cross beam is erected between the two Z-axis vertical frames, a processing base which moves in the X-axis direction of the X-axis cross beam is arranged on the X-axis cross beam, and the processing base is arranged on the Y-axis rails. The machining base is provided with a polishing and grinding machine used for polishing and grinding stone, a conveying shaft of the polishing and grinding machine is provided with an electromagnet suction cup used for adsorbing a millstone tool bit, and a millstone tool rest capable of moving in the Y-axis direction and the Z-axis direction of the X-axis cross beam is arranged below the X-axis cross beam. A plurality of tool magazines used for containing grinding disc tool bits are arranged on the grinding disc tool rest in the X-axis direction of the grinding disc tool rest at intervals. Various millstone tool bits of different specifications are placed on the millstone tool rest, different millstone tool bits can be automatically replaced through the electromagnet suction cup, operation is easy, the tool bit replacement speed is high, manual participation is not needed, and the automation degree is high.
column14: QUANZHOU MINYAN STONE MACHINERY CO LTD

column12: RAPID ELECTROLYTE REPLENISHMENT SYSTEM FOR AERIAL DRONES
column13: A metal air battery electrolyte replenishment system comprised of a base station with docking receptor apparatus and matching docking probe on a flying drone. The probe onboard the drone has a sensor that guides the drone to connect with the electrolyte docking receptor on the base station. The drone uses the probe to obtain fresh electrolyte and simultaneously expel spent electrolyte into the base station while still in flight or during a brief landing. Rapid exchange of the electrolyte allows for extended range and flight time without penalty of onboard electrolyte reconditioning system and its associated weight.

column12: Method and equipment for making uncongealed beancurd
column13: The invention provides an uncongealed beancurd making method and equipment, the method is applied to material processing equipment, and the material processing equipment comprises a soybean milk making cavity, a soybean milk receiving cup and a filter screen; the uncongealed beancurd making method comprises the following steps: a pulping stage: crushing bean raw materials in a pulping cup to form pulp; a soybean milk discharging stage: filtering the soybean milk through the filter screen, and discharging the filtered soybean milk to the soybean milk receiving cup; and a forming stage: placing a coagulator in the soybean milk receiving cup, mixing the soybean milk with the coagulator in the soybean milk receiving cup, and standing the mixed solution for a first time period to form the uncongealed bean curd. The whole beancurd jelly making process is automatically carried out, a user does not need to manually filter and marinating after completing soybean milk making in the whole process, full-automatic making is achieved, an active intervention mode is adopted to limit the user not to take away the soybean milk receiving cup too early, the automation degree of material processing equipment is improved, and the user experience is improved.
column14: HANGZHOU JOYOUNG HOUSEHOLD ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES CO LTD

column12: Method and device for evaluating contribution degree of equipment system
column13: The invention provides an equipment system contribution degree evaluation method and device, and relates to the field of weapon equipment system contribution rate evaluation. According to the method, each device is taken as a node, an information exchange channel between the devices is taken as a link, and a structure model corresponding to the device system is acquired; constructing an event flow response model based on the input and output relationship in the operation state of the equipment system, the input and output relationship among the nodes and the sequential relationship of the node events of the nodes; based on the structure model and the event flow response model, system input data, node event data and system output data of the equipment system under multiple times of operation are obtained, association mining is conducted on the equipment system, and contribution degree data of each node are obtained. According to the method, the support degree of the node events to the output of the equipment system and the task-oriented demand satisfaction degree are comprehensively considered, and the contribution rate of the activity events of the nodes to the system is more accurately and comprehensively evaluated.
column15: CHEN DONG;;YU BO;;ZHANG ZHI;;ZHU YUTAO;;LONG HUIMIN;;LIU YONG;;YANG LIPING;;LI NA;;WANG RIDONG;;TAN LIJIN;;LI CHAO;;YAO LIANGXI;;SHI GE

column12: Insulation resistance tester
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of insulator testing equipment, and discloses an insulation resistance tester which comprises a machine body, a first wire and a second wire are inserted into the upper end of the machine body, the side end of the second wire is fixedly connected with an adsorption connection main body, and the adsorption connection main body comprises an elastic plug and a suction cup. The lower portion of the elastic plug is installed on the upper portion of the suction cup in a sliding and sealing mode, the interior of the elastic plug is fixedly connected with the suction cup, the second wire is electrically connected with the suction cup, the side end, back on to the machine body, of the first wire is fixedly connected with a conductive clamp, and the first wire is electrically connected with the conductive clamp. The suction cup is placed on the outer wall of the target insulator, then the elastic plug is pressed downwards, gas is exhausted through the lower portion of the suction cup, and after the elastic plug is loosened, negative pressure is formed in the suction cup through upward recovery of the elastic plug, so that the suction cup is firmly sucked outside the target insulator, and two hands are liberated for data observation and copying during testing.
column14: GUANGDONG ZHUJIANG YUANZAN CABLE CO LTD

column12: 3D printing cubilose equipment
column13: The utility model discloses a 3D printing cubilose equipment, including feeding module, control unit and printing module, feeding module is connected with printing module, control unit is provided the printing module, control unit is electrically connected with conveying module, printing module, printing module includes printing pipe, drive motor, swivel joint, connecting pipe and discharge hole, and the printing module includes the printing pipe, drive motor, swivel joint, connecting pipe and discharge hole. The printing pipe is of a hollow tubular structure, and one end of the printing pipe is connected with the feeding module; according to the bird's nest 3D printing equipment, pasty bird's nests are conveyed to the printing module through the feeding module, the printing module drives a spray head to rotate through a driving motor, so that bird's nest filaments are sprayed out of discharging holes in an elliptical array in the spray head, the bird's nest filaments are sprayed on a mold to be wound in a swallow cup shape, the pasty bird's nests are rapidly formed, and swallow cups are formed; and the production efficiency of the crushed cubilose is effectively improved.

column12: PORTABLE SERVICE DEVICE
column13: The invention describes a portable service device (1) for machining a surface (30S) of a component (30) of a wind turbine (3), which portable service device (1) comprises a machining component (10) configured to machine the surface (30S); a 3-axis gantry system (11) with a movable carrier (11Z_C) to which the machining component (10) is attached; an arrangement of at least three legs (12) attached to the gantry system (11), wherein each leg (12) terminates in a suction cup (12S); and a vacuum assembly (14P, 14A) configured to achieve a partial vacuum between a suction cup (12S) and a surface (30S). The invention further describes a portable service device arrangement (2), and a method of machining an outer surface (30S) of a wind turbine rotor blade (30).

column12: Method for monitoring and supporting surrounding rock of mining roadway
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of roadway surrounding rock monitoring and supporting, and provides a mining roadway surrounding rock monitoring and supporting method which comprises the steps that the strain of surrounding rock is continuously monitored according to the monitoring frequency of distributed optical fibers, and surrounding rock strain monitoring data are obtained; according to surrounding rock strain data obtained through interpolation of surrounding rock strain monitoring data, region division is conducted on the roadway, and the bearing region ranges of different positions of the roadway and the sizes of broken regions of different sections of the roadway are obtained; and on the basis of the relationship between surrounding rock stress and strain, according to surrounding rock strain data, the bearing area ranges of different positions of the roadway and the sizes of broken areas of different sections of the roadway, the primary support, secondary support and reinforcement treatment opportunities and treatment modes of the surrounding rock are determined. According to the method, surrounding rocks in different stable states in the tunneling process are respectively supported, the area with the obviously increased crushing degree in the stoping process is reinforced and supported, the later deformation problem of the roadway is eliminated, and the stability and safety of the roadway are remarkably improved.
column15: XU WENSONG;;LI SHIGANG;;ZHAO GUANGMING;;MENG XIANGRUI;;LIU CHONGYAN;;QI MINJIE

column12: Grinding device for mining anchorage device production
column13: The utility model discloses a grinding device for mining anchorage device production, and relates to the technical field of grinding equipment. A clamping seat is arranged in the fixed seat; an anchorage device is clamped in the clamping seat; the right side of the fixed plate is fixedly connected with a cylinder; a driving frame is fixedly connected to the right side pushing end of the air cylinder. A sliding block is fixedly connected to the bottom of the driving frame; a sliding rail is fixedly connected to the base and arranged between the fixing plate and the fixing base, the sliding block is arranged on the sliding rail in a left-right sliding mode through a sliding groove in the bottom of the sliding block, a first motor is fixedly connected to the driving frame, a fixing block is fixedly connected to a right output shaft of the first motor, and a grinding mechanism is arranged on the right side of the fixing block. And the anchorage device is clamped, so that the anchorage device is in a stable state, polishing operation is conducted through rotation of the polishing head, the automation degree is high, manpower and material resources are saved, the polishing efficiency isremarkably improved, and the safety performance is high.

column12: PHOTOCONDUCTIVE SLEEVE SUPPORTS
column13: According to an example, a photoconductive sleeve support includes a core member rotatable about a rotation axis and an energy exchange member to receive a photoconductive sleeve and coupled to the core member. The energy exchange member is arranged such that an outer surface of the energy exchange member is to contact with an inner surface of the photoconductive sleeve and the energy exchange member includes an input port to receive heat transfer fluid from a fluid supply station.

column12: Wood cup polishing and manufacturing equipment
column13: The utility model relates to polishing manufacturing equipment, in particular to wooden cup polishing manufacturing equipment. The wood cup polishing manufacturing equipment is high in automation degree, the wood cup is easy to fix in the polishing process, and the polishing effect is good. The wood cup polishing manufacturing equipment comprises a bottom plate, a servo motor, a polishing mechanism, a limiting mechanism and a transmission assembly, the servo motor is arranged on the right side of the top of the bottom plate, the polishing mechanism is arranged between the top of the bottom plate and the servo motor, and the limiting mechanism is arranged between the left side of the top of the bottom plate and the servo motor. A transmission assembly is arranged between the servo motor and the grinding mechanism. And through cooperation of a second wedge-shaped block, a sliding block, a second elastic piece and a limiting block, the special-shaped block drives the second wedge-shaped block to move leftwards, and through cooperation of the sliding block and the second elastic piece, the limiting block is pressed inwards, so that the wooden cup is fixed to the placing block, and polishing work is facilitated.

column12: ARBITRARILY TAILORABLE ELECTROCHROMIC DEVICE AND USE THEREOF
column13: Disclosed is an arbitrarily tailorable electrochromic device and use thereof, wherein the electrochromic device includes in order of a first transparent flexible substrate, a first transparent electron-conductive layer, an electrochromic layer, an electrolyte solution with automatically curable in presence of air and/or moisture to achieve a self-encapsulation function, an ion storage layer, a second transparent electron-conductive layer and a second transparent flexible substrate. The electrochromic device of the present disclosure is arbitrarily tailorable and can be used in various applications.

column12: Automatic test system and method for closed-cup flash point of lithium ion battery electrolyte
column13: The invention provides an automatic test system for closed-cup flash point of lithium ion battery electrolyte. The automatic test system comprises a support table 1, a sample cup 2, a cup cover 5, a sliding rail, an electric motor 6, a control and display device 17, a direct-current power supply 15, a high-voltage power supply module and a constant-temperature pump 4. According to the invention, through arrangement of the control and display device 17, intelligent control of the direct-current power supply 15, a gas source 16, the high-voltage power supply module and the constant-temperature pump 4 is realized, automatic test operation according to a test instruction and experiment termination according to monitoring of an experiment process are realized, and intelligence and automation ofa flash point test are realized.
column14: HEFEI GUOXUAN HIGH TECH POWER ENERGY CO LTD
column32: 邓明: "响车用柴油闪点测定结果准确性的因素", 《化工管理》;;丁超 等: "低压条件下燃油开闭口闪点变化规律的实验研究", 《火灾科学》;;杨雪滢等: "不同气压条件下变压器油闪点的变化规律研究", 《绝缘材料》

column12: Grinding instrument
column13: The invention relates to a grinding instrument. When a power device vertically moves downwards, the end, away from a blade, of a cutter bar enters a clamping hole, a clamping sensor sends a signal to the power device when sensing a sensing area, and the power device controls a clamping hole to clamp the cutter bar. A cutter can be used in cooperation with a grinding cup. Each grinding cup can be matched with one cutter, so that cross infection of materials can be avoided. Furthermore, the clamping sensor senses the sensing area to determine the position of the cutter bar, then the clamping hole is automatically controlled to clamp the cutter bar, the working efficiency is high, and the problem that the holding position of the cutter bar needs to be continuously and manually adjusted due to the fact that the cutter bar is different in height due to the fact that grinding cups of different heights and sizes are used or the materials in the grinding cups are different in quantity is solved.
column14: WISE THINKING BEIJING TECH CO LTD

column12: Accurate determination method for isotope abundance percentage content
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of isotope analysis, and particularly relates to an accurate determination method of isotope abundance percentage content. Comprising the following steps: S101, selecting proper receiving ions; s102, determining a magnetic field position corresponding to each isotope ion peak; s103, receiving an ion current signal of each isotope ion; and S104, measuring and calculating the percentage content of the isotope. The invention establishes an analysis method for accurately measuring the isotope ratio or isotope abundance percentage content of a substance by only using one Faraday receiving cup. The method is not limited to isotope analysis of substances composed of single atoms, and is also suitable for composition analysis of different molecular weights in compounds composed of multiple isotopes and multiple atoms. On one hand, accurate isotope data can be obtained, and on the other hand, expensive instruments can be fully utilized.
column14: RES INST PHYSICAL & CHEMICAL ENG NUCLEAR IND

column12: Oxygen distribution fan
column13: An oxygen distribution fan belongs to the technical field of air optimization equipment and comprises an oxygen distribution pipeline, an oxygen distribution base, an oxygen distribution hanging cup, an oxygen distribution hanging arm, an oxygen distribution hanging rod, an oxygen distribution fan machine, oxygen distribution fan blades, an oxygen distribution fan head and an oxygen distribution illumination device. The oxygen distribution fan and the oxygen generator can be turned on or turned off according to the detected indoor temperature value and indoor oxygen concentration value, and the oxygen distribution fan has three modes of dispersed oxygen distribution, rotary cooling and heating. And the negative ion generator and the ozone generator are used, so that gas output by the oxygen distribution fan is safer and healthier. All parts of the oxygen distribution fan are detachably connected, so that respective production, transportation and installation are facilitated, the use difficulty is reduced, the working efficiency is improved, and meanwhile, the upper and lower layers of all the parts or different combinations can be adjusted according to requirements. The Internet of Things unit is arranged in the oxygen distribution fan, so that the oxygen distribution fan can be monitored and controlled conveniently through a mobile phone APP and the like, and the requirements of different users are met.

column12: Polishing device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of automation equipment, in particular to a polishing device which comprises a base table and a polishing unit and further comprises an X-axis drivingmechanism used for driving the polishing unit to move in the X-axis direction and a Z-axis driving mechanism used for driving the polishing unit to move in the Z-axis direction. A Y-axis driving mechanism moving in the Y-axis direction is arranged on the base table, the Z-axis driving mechanism and the grinding unit are driven by the X-axis driving mechanism to move in the X-axis direction, a grinding base is arranged between the grinding unit and the Z-axis driving mechanism, the grinding base is driven by the Z-axis driving mechanism to move in the Z-axis direction, and a grabbing mechanismis further arranged on the grinding base. The grabbing mechanism comprises a grabbing air cylinder arranged on the grinding base and a suction cup driven by the grabbing air cylinder to move in the Z-axis direction. The automatic polishing machine has the advantages of being capable of achieving automatic feeding, discharging and polishing, high in polishing efficiency and high in polishing speed.

column12: Portable water cup with internal heating function
column13: The utility model discloses a portable water cup with an internal heating function, which comprises a cup body, the top and the bottom of the cup body are respectively connected with a cup cover and a base through threads, a threaded column is fixedly arranged at the bottom of the cup cover, and a rotating motor can drive a driven gear to rotate through a driving gear. The driven gear can drive the crushing cutter to rotate through the rotating rod, the crushing cutter can crush fruits placed in the water cup, fruit juice can be rapidly made, the base is connected with the cup body through threads so that the base can be detached, the top of the base and the bottom of an inner cavity of the cup body can be conveniently cleaned, and the temperature sensor can detect the water temperature in the water cup. When the water temperature is lower than the lowest temperature set on the temperature controller, the temperature controller controls the electric heating pipe to be opened for heating, when the water temperature is higher than the highest temperature set on the temperature controller, the temperature controller controls the electric heating pipe to be closed for stopping heating, constant temperature control can be conducted on water in the water cup, and drinking is convenient.
column14: SUZHOU BENXU PLASTIC TECH CO LTD

column12: Horizontal four-edge grinding machine for glass
column13: The utility model discloses a horizontal four-edge grinding machine for glass, which comprises a base and an edge grinding block, the edge grinding block is rotatably connected with a second servo motor, the horizontal four-edge grinding machine also comprises four groups of slide rails and slide blocks, the slide rails are arranged at the top of the base, the four groups of slide rails are arranged in a rectangular shape, the slide rails are connected with the slide blocks in a sliding manner, and the second servo motor is arranged at the top of the slide blocks through bolts. By arranging the rectangular sliding way, arranging the sliding block on the sliding way, arranging the second servo motor on the sliding block and driving the edge grinding block through the servo motors, the device can machine the four edges of rectangular glass at the same time, the working efficiency is greatly improved, the sliding block is controlled by the first servo motor to move on the sliding rail, automation of glass edge grinding is achieved, and the production efficiency is improved. Manpower is saved; and the glass is fixed through the vacuum suction cups, so that the glass can be kept stable during processing.
column14: HUNAN JINGCHENGKAI GLASS PRODUCTS CO LTD

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ONTOLOGY GUIDED INDOOR SCENE UNDERSTANDING FOR COGNITIVE ROBOTIC TASKS
column13: Existing cognitive robotic applications follow a practice of building specific applications for specific use cases. However, the knowledge of the world and the semantics are common for a robot for multiple tasks. In this disclosure, to enable usage of knowledge across multiple scenarios, a method and system for ontology guided indoor scene understanding for cognitive robotic tasks is described where in scenes are processed based on techniques filtered based on querying ontology with relevant objects in perceived scene to generate a semantically rich scene graph. Herein, an initially manually created ontology is updated and refined in online fashion using external knowledge-base, human robot interaction and perceived information. This knowledge helps in semantic navigation, aids in speech, and text based human robot interactions.

column12: Simple and reliable automatic feeding and discharging device of optical lens accurate grinding equipment
column13: The utility model discloses a simple and reliable automatic feeding and discharging device of optical lens accurate grinding equipment, which is characterized in that a rack is arranged along the front end of the accurate grinding equipment in rows and is provided with a charging tray, a guide rail is fixed with the rack and is parallel to the accurate grinding equipment in rows, a base is provided with a guide wheel and a driving device for driving the guide wheel, and the base is connected with the guide rail through the guide wheel. The bottom of the robotic arm system is fixed to the base, the first suction cup is fixed to the front end of the robotic arm system and communicates with the vacuum system through the first control valve, the positioning device is arranged on the base and/or the rack and positions the base, and the control ends of the driving device, the first control valve and the positioning device are electrically connected with the controller. And the data end of the robotic arm system is in signal connection with the controller. The movable robotic arm system is arranged in front of the multiple accurate grinding devices, the positions of the robotic arm system and the accurate grinding devices are determined through the positioning device, automatic feeding and discharging of the multiple accurate grinding devices are achieved, and the automatic feeding and discharging device has the advantages of being simple in structure, high in production efficiency and equipment utilization rate and stable in quality.
column14: YUNNAN HUIHENG OPTOELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for evaluating soft melting characteristic and strength of sintered iron ore powder
column13: The invention discloses a method for evaluating the soft melting characteristic and strength of sintered iron ore powder, and relates to the technical field of iron ore powder performance detection.The method comprises the steps that the sintered iron ore powder is screened firstly, a sample with the particle size being-0.5 mm is selected for carbon blending, briquetting and roasting, the sample state in an actual sintering system is simulated through carbon blending, fine grinding treatment does not need to be conducted on the sample, and the sample can be obtained; the method respectively reflects the liquid phase generation capability under the conditions of fine particles, carbon addition and no carbon addition of the sintered iron ore powder, is closer to the actual sintering production process, and can better reflect the real soft melting characteristic of the sintered iron ore powder.

column12: Filter for wet ore dressing
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of ore dressing, in particular to a filter for wet ore dressing. According to the technical scheme, the device comprises a box body, a treatment cavity and a filter box, the treatment cavity is formed in the box body, a motor is fixedly installed on the surface of one side of the box body at the top of a crushing shaft, an ultrasonic generator is fixedly installed on the surface of the other side of the box body, and a water pump is installed on the surface of the other side of the box body at the bottom of the ultrasonic generator; sliding rails are fixedly installed on the two sides in the treatment cavity at the bottom of the crushing shaft, a filtering box is installed between the sliding rails through sliding blocks, and a water quality sensor is fixedly installed on the surface of one side in the box body at the bottom of the treatment cavity. Through the combination of various structures, the device can quickly and efficiently carry out ore washing work during working, the working efficiency and quality are improved, meanwhile, a worker can conveniently and respectively process separated ore and fine silt clay, the good energy-saving effect is achieved, and the device is convenient to use by the worker.
column14: LIYUNGANG HUANGPU MINING MACHINE MFG CO LTD

column12: DEVICE FOR DEGASSING OF LIQUID MEDIA
column13: FIELD: mining; chemistry.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to installations for degassing of various liquid media, including suspensions and emulsions under vacuum, and can be used in mining, food, chemical and other industries. Design features of the degasser are obtained by forming and investigating a mathematical model, by means of which the profile of the liquid velocity at the output of the degassing degasifier inlet is reproduced considering the diameter of the degasser cylindrical housing. Based on the obtained data, a relationship is found between the distance required for gas bubbles to enter a vortex air cord, and their dimensions, which made it possible to design degasifier with possibility of deformation and enlargement of gas bubbles at their merging and at the same time crushing of remaining gas bubbles not included into air cord.EFFECT: technical result achieved when using the claimed invention consists in enabling degassing of liquids with large volume fraction of gases (more than 10 %) and large bubbles (size of more than 0.5 mm) due to the stability of the air vortex cord formed in the degasifier.10 cl, 13 dwg

column12: Vibrating screen ore feeding device based on multi-sensor technology

On the basis of multi-stage screening and transferring treatment on the raw mineral aggregate, the screening treatment efficiency of the raw mineral aggregate is effectively improved.

column12: Electric power marketing inspection information analysis system and method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of electricity marketing analysis, in particular to an electricity marketing inspection information analysis system and method.The electricity marketing inspection information analysis system comprises a text preprocessing module based on a Transform model, a text abstract algorithm module, a BERT classification module, a weight calculation module and a coding module; the text preprocessing module is used for performing synonym replacement, random insertion, immediate exchange and immediate deletion on a data set, expanding the data set, generating enhanced data of original data, introducing new vocabularies through synonym replacement and random insertion operations, and allowing generalization to words in a test set but not including a training set; and the text abstract algorithm module is used for screening redundant information in the text and removing stop words. The device is reasonable in design, assists inspectors to quickly complete inspection marketing information classification and analysis in an omnibearing and multi-dimensional manner, strengthens data deep mining application, improves the efficiency of an inspection marketing system, reduces the labor cost, and comprehensively improves the timeliness, standardization and accuracy of marketing inspection work.
