column12: Automatic online detection device
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic online detection device. Including a main controller, the main controller is connected with a pump set control circuit and an RS485 communication circuit. Thepump set control circuit controls the pump set to work; the pump set comprises a sampling pump, a water pump, a developing pump and a titration pump; the sampling pump and the water pump are used forrespectively pumping sample liquid and pure water into the reaction cup; wherein the color developing pump and the titration pump are used for titrating a sample solution, a visual sensor is arrangedbehind the reaction cup, the main controller exchanges data with the visual sensor through an RS485 communication circuit, and the main controller performs data processing and then displays a result on a touch screen. The reaction kettle is suitable for reaction of all color changes, and is wide in application range; visual sensors for testing various responses do not need any adjustment, the operation is simple, the requirements on operators are reduced, and the labor intensity is reduced; the visual sensor does not need to directly contact with the solution, so that the use and maintenance cost is reduced.

column12: Grinder
column13: The invention relates to a grinding instrument which is characterized in that when a power device vertically moves downwards, one end, far away from a blade, of a cutter bar enters a clamping hole, aclamping sensor sends a signal to the power device when sensing an induction area, and the power device controls the clamping hole to clamp the cutter bar. The cutter can be used in cooperation with the grinding cup. Each grinding cup can be used in cooperation with one cutter, and therefore cross infection of materials can be avoided. Furthermore, the position of the cutter bar is determined by sensing the sensing area through the clamping sensor, then the clamping hole is automatically controlled to clamp the cutter bar, the working efficiency is high, and the situation that the heights of the cutter bar are different due to the fact that grinding cups of different heights and sizes are used or the quantities of objects in the grinding cups are different is avoided. Therefore, the trouble that the clamping position of the cutter bar needs to be continuously and manually adjusted is avoided.

column13: The invention discloses a medical tuberculosis culture and detection system. column12: Multi-protocol mining pump room control system based on industrial Ethernet
column13: The utility model discloses a multiprotocol mining pump room control system based on industrial Ethernet, which comprises a data acquisition execution layer, a data convergence layer and a logic control layer, the data acquisition execution layer is provided with an explosion-proof and intrinsic safety type local control box, and the explosion-proof and intrinsic safety type local control box is provided with an intrinsic safety type IO module and a non-intrinsic safety type IO module; the data aggregation layer is provided with more than three small-sized programmable logic controllers (PLCs); an S7 communication network based on the industrial Ethernet is adopted between the data convergence layer and the logic control layer for data exchange; the logic control layer is provided with a control module, the control module is provided with a CP communication expansion module and a PLC programmable controller, and the CP communication expansion module is connected with the PLC programmable controller through a backboard bus. The system has the advantages of being high in control capacity, high in communication speed, flexible in configuration, small in size, low in cost, high in anti-interference capacity, compatible with other existing mainstream control systems and the like.

column12: Ore pulp monitoring device based on microfluid
column13: The invention discloses an ore pulp detection device based on microfluid. The ore pulp detection device comprises a detection pool and a microfluidic channel arranged in the detection pool, the detection pool is filled with ore pulp and ore pulp fluid is formed through stirring; microfluid with the flow velocity exceeding that of the ore pulp fluid is formed in the microfluidic channel. A permeation opening communicated with the interior of the detection pool is formed in the microfluidic channel; a detection sensor is fixedly arranged in the microfluidic channel on the other side opposite tothe permeation opening; the flow velocity of the microfluid is greater than that of an ore pulp system; large mineral particles in the ore pulp are discharged out of the microfluid; small ions and molecules in the ore pulp can permeate into the microfluid through the permeation opening to form a detection system, and finally, pass through the detection sensor such that the purpose of monitoring the components of the ore pulp system is achieved, the real-time monitoring result of the ore pulp is more accurate, the loss of the detection sensor caused by mineral particles is effectively avoided,and a basis is provided for the detection of key flotation parameters.

column12: METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC CONTROL OF TECHNOLOGICAL GRADES OF ORE IN FLOW
column13: FIELD: mineral processing; metallurgy and other industries.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to methods for controlling technological grades of ore in a stream and can be used in the field of mineral processing, metallurgy and other industries. The method for automatic control of technological grades of ore in the flow consists in the fact that the final technological indicators of the efficiency of the flotation process are set, a representative sample of the flotation feed pulp is taken, one part of the sample is analyzed for the content of chemical elements in the solid phase of the pulp, and the other is subjected to dehydration, drying and analysis. the color characteristics of the formed dry surface, control the operating parameters of the grinding and flotation cycles and the corresponding technological indicators of the efficiency of the flotation process, then an archive of initial data is formed, containing information on the numerical values of the color characteristics and the elemental composition of the flotation feed, the values of the controlled technological parameters and indicators of the efficiency of the flotation process at each measurement cycle. After the accumulation of the necessary initial volume of information for the period of submission for processing of the main technological grades of ores, its numerical coding is carried out by scalar transformation, a summary code of the characteristics of the flotation feed, which is one sequence of decimal digits, is formed from the codes of the numerical values of color characteristics and elemental composition, an archive of scalar values is formed , whose database structure is similar to the structure of the original data archive. The range of changes in the efficiency indicators of the flotation process is determined, it is divided into equal discrete intervals that are significant for assessing the performance of the changes in efficiency indicators caused by the change in the washability properties of the ore supplied for processing, the number of obtained discrete intervals is determined, serial numbers are assigned to the discrete intervals, starting from the minimum value of the range of changes performance indicators, a table is formed of correspondence to the selected intervals of the efficiency indicators of the arrays, including the groups of summary codes of the flotation feed characteristics and the codes of the values of the controlled technological parameters formed from the data obtained at the same measurement cycles, the average values of the summary codes of the flotation feed characteristics and the codes of the controlled technological parameters are found. In accordance with statistical methods, the "Shewhart control charts" take the obtained average values of the summary codes of the flotation feed characteristics and the codes of the values of the controlled technological parameters for the central lines, find for them the upper and lower boundaries of statistical stability, spaced from the average values by ± two standard deviations, the group of summary codes of the flotation feed characteristics and the codes of the values of the controlled technological parameters that go beyond the boundaries of statistical stability are excluded in the correspondence table from the data arrays. Upon completion of the formation of the correspondence table, the next cycle of measuring the parameters characterizing the properties of the ore and the current technological mode is carried out, they are subjected to processing and coding according to the above-described procedure, the criterion for the identity of the current ore grade to the technological grades contained in the correspondence table is calculated by finding the sum of the absolute values of the differences, obtained as a result of bitwise subtraction of the corresponding summary codes, and by its minimum value, the belonging of the current variety to one of those available in the correspondence table is determined when the condition of finding the code of the current variety within the bounds of statistical stability is met, and otherwise proceed to the next measurement cycle.EFFECT: increasing accuracy and reliability of assessing the belonging of the current ore grade to the corresponding technological grade, as well as increasing the efficiency of the concentration production in the conditions of processing ores varying in composition.4 cl, 3 dwg, 4 tbl

column12: TREATMENT APPARATUS FOR REMOVING HEAT FROM SUBCUTANEOUS LIPID-RICH CELLS AND MASSAGING TISSUE
column13: A treatment device for removing heat from subcutaneous lipid-rich cells of a subject having an actuator that provides mechanical energy to the tissue. The mechanical energy provided may include a vibratory component that can range between low and ultra-high frequencies, and such energy may include various combinations of two or more frequencies tailored to produce the desired effect on the subcutaneous tissue. Disruption of adipose tissue cooled by an external treatment device may be enhanced by applying mechanical energy to cooled tissue. Furthermore, such mechanical energy may impart a vibratory effect, a massage effect, a pulsatile effect, or combinations thereof on the tissue.

column12: Positioning method for Faraday cup of hydrogen isotope accelerator mass spectrometer
column13: The invention provides a method for positioning Faraday cups of a hydrogen isotope accelerator mass spectrometer, which comprises the following steps: S1, enabling sample ions to simulate the motion trails of nine ion beams, and determining the theoretical position of each Faraday cup; s2, determining the mounting position of a first Faraday cup; s3, adjusting the magnetic field current I0 to enable the intensity of the ion beam entering the first Faraday cup to be maximum, and determining the adjusted magnetic field current as a sample magnetic field current I1; s4, according to the theoretical position of the Nth Faraday cup, a first fluorescent screen and a second fluorescent screen are arranged at the first position and the second position in a one-to-one correspondence mode, and under the condition of the sample magnetic field current I1, a first light spot coordinate and a second light spot coordinate corresponding to the Nth Faraday cup are collected; and S5, based on the step S2, determining the position of the Nth Faraday cup according to the first light spot coordinate and the second light spot coordinate. According to the embodiment of the invention, the method can guarantee the high convergence degree of the received ion beams, is large in intensity of the ion beams, and enables the measurement to be more precise.

column12: Remote sensing image mining area green recovery monitoring method and system based on deep learning
column13: The invention discloses a remote sensing image mining area greening monitoring method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining multi-source remote sensing image historical data of a monitoring area, and carrying out the preprocessing, and obtaining an initial data set; constructing a deep learning network model comprising a super-resolution reconstruction network, a data fusion network and a semantic segmentation network; sequentially training the super-resolution reconstruction network, the data fusion network and the semantic segmentation network based on the initial data set to obtain a trained deep learning network model; and processing the current image data of the monitoring area by using the trained deep learning network model to obtain a classification result of the monitoring area so as to realize monitoring of mining area greening. According to the method, deep learning, a remote sensing technology and mining area regreening monitoring are combined, and mining area regreening monitoring is realized by using multi-source multi-scale remote sensing data and fusion data thereof, so that the accuracy and precision of mining area regreening monitoring are greatly improved.

column12: ASSESSMENT OF ORGANIC MATTER CONTENT IN OIL-PRODUCING ROCKS CONTAINING TYPE II KEROGEN

The obtained data are used to calculate the content of separately aliphatic and aromatic fragments according to the following formulas:and,whereis the content of aliphatic fragments in the sample, %,the content of aromatic fragments in the sample, %;Aiis the optical density at the wave numbericm-1.EFFECT: increasing the expressiveness of the method and providing the possibility of obtaining data on the structural group composition and assessment of the content of organic matter in the rocks of unconventional reservoirs.1 cl, 2 dwg

column12: Food processor capable of accurately measuring temperature
column13: The utility model provides a food processor capable of accurately measuring temperature. The stirrer comprises a base with a motor and a control panel, a stirring cup and a heating device, the stirring cup comprises a cup body, a cup cover and a cup base. A cutterhead is arranged at the bottom of the cup body; the cutter head comprises a cutter head body and a crushing cutter arranged at the bottom of the cutter head body; motor-driven crushing cutter, the crushing cutter comprises a cutter shaft and blades; a processing cavity is defined by the cutter head, the cup body and the cup cover; a first temperature sensor is arranged on the side wall of the cup body; a second temperature sensor is arranged at the bottom of the cutter head body; the first temperature sensor and the second temperature sensor extend into the processing cavity; therefore, a three-dimensional temperature measuring point is formed. The temperature measurement accuracy is guaranteed, the actual temperature of pulpor food materials at all positions in the stirring cup can be measured so as to transmit temperature signals to the control panel, the control panel controls whether the smashing cutter needs to rotate or not according to the measured temperature signals so that the temperature of the food materials or the pulp can be uniform, and the problems that the pulp or the food materials are not thoroughlycooked or the bottom is burnt are solved.

column12: Low-energy large-beam ion implantation system
column13: The invention relates to a low-energy large-beam ion implantation system, which belongs to the technical field of semiconductor ion implantation process equipment, and comprises an ion beam generation module and an ion beam implantation module, and the output side of the ion beam generation module is provided with an ion beam speed reducing mechanism; the cavity of the ion beam injection module is provided with an ion beam input port, and the output end of the cavity of the ion beam generation module is hermetically connected with the cavity of the ion beam injection module through the ion beam input port; an ion beam correction mechanism is arranged in the cavity of the ion beam injection module close to the ion beam input port; a scanning robot and a Faraday cup are further arranged in the ion beam injection module, the Faraday cup is located on the side opposite to the ion beam input port, and the scanning robot is located between the ion beam correction mechanism and the Faraday cup. According to the scheme, the problems of poor ion beam angle and uniformity in an existing low-energy large-beam ion implantation system are solved, more ideal uniform ion beams are obtained, and the effect of an ion implantation process is improved.

column12: AUTOMATED METHOD
column13: One or more methods for automated preparation of a regenerative epidermal suspension comprises a processor receiving an initiation signal that indicates that a cartridge that has a cover, a cup containing a tissue sample, and a well plate situated beneath the cover that has a first well containing an enzyme solution and a second well containing a buffer solution, has been placed on a sensor, executing a sequence that actuates a tissue disaggregator against the tissue sample in the cup positioned in the first well, raises the cup to an upper position, rotates the well plate to position the second well beneath the cup, lowers the cup to a position within the second well, and actuates the tissue disaggregator against the tissue sample in the second well.

column12: Ion beam measurement method and device, ion beam measurement system and vacuum equipment
column13: The invention relates to an ion beam measurement method and device, an ion beam measurement system and vacuum equipment. The method comprises the following steps: when an ion beam output by an ion source of vacuum equipment is measured, determining a measurement point sequence and position parameters thereof according to a space model of the ion source, and calculating control parameters for moving a detection device to corresponding measurement points, sequentially controlling the detection device to move to each measurement point position to measure beam parameters according to the control parameters, and generating an ion beam distribution diagram of the ion source according to the beam parameters; according to the technical scheme, the mobile detection device is adopted to measure the beam parameters of all the position points, compared with a Faraday cup array measurement mode, the consistency of measurement data can be improved, and accurate performance parameters can be obtained; and the number of measurement points can be set according to requirements, measurement can be performed by selecting points at any position in the spatial model, and measurement requirements in different application scenes are met.

column12: GAS DETECTION AND PURIFICATION DEVICE
column13: A gas detection and purification device can be placed in an in-car space and includes a housing, a purification module, a gas-guiding unit, and a gas detection module. The housing has a gas inlet and a gas outlet. A gas channel is between the gas inlet and the gas outlet. The purification module is disposed in the gas channel to filter the gas guided into the gas channel. The gas-guiding unit is disposed in the gas channel and at one side of the purification module. The gas-guiding unit guides the gas into the device from the gas inlet, guides the gas to pass through the purification module for performing filtering and purifying, and discharges the gas out from the gas outlet. The gas detection module is disposed in the gas channel to detect the gas guided into the housing to obtain gas detection data.

column12: Individualized reflexed embedding type artificial acetabulum and manufacturing method
column13: The invention relates to an individualized reflexed embedding type artificial acetabulum and a manufacturing method. The individualized reflexed embedding type artificial acetabulum comprises an acetabulum cup and a ceramic lining, wherein a plurality of embedding bodies which are arranged in the circumferential direction, protrude forwards and are reversely reflexed are arranged on the cup edge of the acetabulum cup, the inner surfaces of the embedding bodies are matched with a bone contact surface, the inner surfaces of the embedding bodies are rough surfaces, the outer surfaces of the embedding bodies are smooth surfaces, and at least two embedding bodies are respectively provided with a screw hole. The manufacturing method comprises the following steps: establishing a pelvis 3d mathematical model; manufacturing a pelvis resin model; grinding the acetabulum on the pelvis resin model; manufacturing an acetabulum cup model; manufacturing a titanium alloy acetabulum cup; machining screw holes in the embedding bodies; spraying hydroxyapatite rough surfaces on the inner surfaces of the embedding bodies; and manufacturing a ceramic lining and installing the ceramic lining in the acetabulum cup. The individualized reflexed embedding type artificial acetabulum is in close contact with the acetabular contact surface of a hip joint, the individualized reflexed embedding type artificial acetabulum and the pelvis can grow into a whole conveniently, an external fixing mode is adopted, the phenomenon that screws protrude to rub against with a lining to cause lining cracking due to an internal fixing mode of the acetabulum cup is avoided, and the service life is prolonged.

column12: Method for carrying out all-isotope static determination on ultra-low-content/sample-amount Os
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a method for performing all-isotope static determination on ultralow-content/sample-amount Os, which comprises the following steps: selecting a rock sample to be determined, weighing the rock sample, and dissolving the rock sample to be determined to obtain a dissolving solution; carrying out Os chemical separation and purification on the dissolved solution to obtain a purified Os solution; carrying out tape dotting treatment on the purified Os solution to obtain a to-be-measured sample; according to the natural abundance of each Os isotope, selecting a plurality of Faraday cups and a plurality of ion counters for the novel thermal ionization mass spectrometer to be combined with different types of amplifiers, and establishing a cup structure for performing Os all-isotope static determination; establishing an ion counter yield correction method; carrying out Os all-isotope thermal ionization mass spectrometry measurement according to the corrected ion counter; and processing the measured data to obtain the final Os all-isotope composition. The method can be used for measuring all the Os isotope and oxygen isotope composition of a sample with ultralow sample amount or ultralow Os content.
column14: GUANGZHOU INST GEOCHEMISTRY CAS;;UNIV CHINA GEOSCIENCES WUHAN

column12: Method for flotation separation of copper-sulfur minerals through ferrate
column13: The invention discloses a method for flotation separation of copper-sulfur minerals through ferrate, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. The method for separating the copper-sulfur minerals comprises the steps of mixing chalcopyrite, pyrite and simulated seawater to obtain ore pulp, then regulating the pH value of the ore pulp to 8.0-9.0, adding ferrate according to the ratio of the ferrate to solid materials in the ore pulp being 250-500 g: 1 t, then adding a collecting agent, and then conducting air inflation flotation to obtain the chalcopyrite. According to the method, flotation of copper is achieved, and the highest recovery rate of chalcopyrite is 85.48%.
column32: 傅佳丽等: "浸泡预处理对铜钼硫化矿浮选分离的影响机理", 《金属矿山》

column12: Aluminum oxide ball mill monitoring method and system
column13: The invention discloses an alumina ball mill monitoring method and system, and belongs to the technical field of alumina production. The method comprises the following steps: 1, acquiring historical data of the ball mill; 2, training historical data to obtain a calculation formula of a unit wear value delta R of the steel ball; 3, calculating the unit wear value delta R of the steel balls with various particle sizes; 4, calculating the particle size R'of the steel balls with various particle sizes after being worn on the day; 5, calculating the volume V'of the steel balls with various particle sizes after the steel balls are worn on the same day; 6, calculating the filling rate F of the ball mill after the ball mill is abraded on the same day; 7, according to the filling rate F obtained in the step 6 and the set steel ball ratio, the adding number corresponding to the steel balls of all the particle sizes is calculated; the system comprises a data acquisition module, a data processing module and a data display module. The problem that in the prior art, the steel ball condition of the ball mill needs to be manually monitored, and a ball adding scheme needs to be formulated is solved, the ore grinding quality and efficiency of the ball mill can be effectively improved, and energy consumption is reduced.
column14: GUANGXI HUASHENG NEW MAT CO LTD;;ALUMINUM CORP CHINA LTD

column12: Method for flotation separation of chalcopyrite and pyrite through H2O2
column13: The invention discloses a method for flotation separation of chalcopyrite and pyrite through H2O2, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing. The method for flotation separation of the chalcopyrite and the pyrite comprises the steps of S1, mixing the chalcopyrite, the pyrite and simulated seawater to obtain ore pulp, wherein the particle sizes of the chalcopyrite and the pyrite are less than 150 microns; and S2, regulating the pH value of the ore pulp to 7.5-9.0, then adding H2O2, then adding a collecting agent, and then conducting air inflation flotation, wherein the flotation foam is chalcopyrite. According to the method, the grade and the recovery rate of the chalcopyrite are improved, the highest yield of the concentrate is 55.01%, the highest grade of copper in the concentrate is 26.06%, and the highest recovery rate of the chalcopyrite is 90.05%.

column12: Device and method for testing soil-gas-water two-phase permeability and mechanical properties of near-wellbore marine energy in combustible ice mining process
column13: The invention belongs to the field of ocean energy soil mechanical testing, and particularly relates to a device and a method for simulating near-well ocean energy soil gas-water two-phase permeation and mechanical property testing in the combustible ice exploitation process. The testing device comprises a triaxial pressure chamber, an axial pressure and confining pressure loader, a near-well combustible ice soil sample, a gas and liquid supply pressure regulating system, a temperature control system, a back pressure regulating system, a gas-liquid separation and recovery device and a data transmission, acquisition and processing system. The near-well marine energy soil sample is formed by embedding a mining well metal model into a cylindrical marine energy soil sample, and is wrapped by a thermal shrinkage rubber sleeve and then placed in a triaxial pressure chamber; samples with different combustible ice occurrence conditions can be prepared, and the pressure can be adjusted to enable the samples to be in different stress states; the temperature and pressure conditions are changed to control generation and decomposition of combustible ice; the data transmission, acquisition and processing system acquires and stores test data, and a test can obtain a gas-water two-phase permeability characteristic evolution rule and a mechanical property evolution rule of the sample in a combustible ice decomposition process.
column15: ZHANG YU;;LI JIANWEI;;CHENG ZHILIANG;;LI DAYONG;;HOU ZHENGSEN

column12: Ore ball-milling process load identification method based on milling sound signal
column13: The invention discloses an ore ball-milling process load identification method based on a milling sound signal, and the method comprises the steps: firstly carrying out the preprocessing of a collected original signal, including the elimination of a DC component and the filtering, then proposing a geometric spectral subtraction inhibition noise signal based on the autoregression (AR) spectrum estimation, and improving the signal to noise ratio; secondly, decomposing the grinding sound signal into K intrinsic mode components IMF based on an ensemble empirical mode decomposition (EEMD) method, and selecting a mode component with high reliability by utilizing permutation entropy to reconstruct the grinding sound signal; calculating the box fractal dimension of the reconstructed signal under each load type, and taking the box fractal dimension as a final load classification basis; and finally, establishing a Bagging and extreme learning machine load identification model based on fuzzy C-means clustering to realize load identification. According to the method, the actual production load of a certain domestic multi-metal separation plant is recognized, and the result shows that the recognition model can accurately recognize the load states of different mills and has good generalization performance and recognition precision.
column15: WANG XIAOLI;;LIAO QIAN;;ZHANG HE;;MA CHONGZHEN;;YANG CHUNHUA;;ZHANG SHENGGUANG

column12: Unmanned filling mining device and method for end slope working face of strip mine
column13: The invention provides an unmanned filling mining device and method for an end slope working face of a strip mine. The device comprises an unmanned mining device, an unmanned filling device and a mobile control platform, wherein the mobile control platform controls the unmanned mining device and the unmanned filling device; the unmanned mining device comprises a transportation system and a draw-out type ventilation system; the unmanned filling device comprises a multifunctional filling robot, walking filling equipment and a press-in type ventilation system; the filling operation and the end slope mining process are matched and do not interfere with each other through the device, and the mining and filling operation is separated in space and parallel in time; and the problems that in the mining and filling process, personnel cannot enter a cave, filling pipelines are difficult to erect, the filling rate is low, the roof contact effect is poor, mining and filling are not coordinated, the resource recovery rate is low, the ecological environment is destroyed, and safety is poor are solved.

column12: Jet flow-cavitation gold concentrate ore powder cyanidation leaching gold extraction production device
column13: The utility model discloses a jet flow-cavitation gold concentrate ore powder cyanidation leaching gold extraction production device, and belongs to the technical field of gold extraction of hydrometallurgy. Comprising a size mixing tank mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation tubular reactor mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation reaction tower mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation supplement reactor mechanism, a three-layer washing concentration mechanism I, a cavitation cyanidation mechanism, an airflow cavitation cyanidation tubular reactor mechanism, an aging tank mechanism, a three-layer washing concentration mechanism II and a pregnant solution tank mechanism, a deoxidizing tower mechanism and a zinc powder mixing and replacing tank mechanism; the cavitation reactor and the jet reactor can form a sufficient gas-liquid (solid) mixing area, so that heat transfer, mass transfer and momentum transfer are effectively promoted, the reaction is further enhanced, and the reaction rate and the product yield are improved; the device is advanced, continuous in operation and high in automation degree, the cyanidation reaction time is shortened, and the production efficiency is improved.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR TREATMENT OF VISCERAL FAT
column13: A system for laparoscopic thermal treatment of visceral fat includes an elongate cooling probe configured for placement through a trocar, the probe including an elongate shaft having a proximal end and a distal end and having a maximum transverse dimension, and an expandable endpiece having a proximal end and a distal end, and including a collapsed state configured for placement through a channel of the trocar and an expanded state, the expanded state having a maximum outer diameter, the maximum outer diameter at least about twice the maximum transverse dimension of the shaft, wherein the proximal end of the endpiece is sealingly coupled to the distal end of the shaft, and a heat exchanger coupled to the cooling probe and configured to remove heat from the endpiece such that adipose tissue placed in contact with the endpiece can be cooled to a temperature of between about - 2oC and about +1oC.
column32: See references of EP 4061264A4

column12: Sucker positioning device of blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot
column13: The utility model discloses a suction cup positioning device of a blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot, the grinding robot comprises a frame, two ends of the frame are respectively provided with a main stand column, the lower end of each main stand column is provided with a plurality of middle suction cups, two sides of each main stand column are respectively provided with a plurality of auxiliary stand columns, each auxiliary stand column is provided with a guide rail and a telescopic cylinder, and the guide rails are vertically arranged. The telescopic air cylinder is located above the guide rail, a sliding block is installed on the guide rail in a matched mode, the telescopic air cylinder is connected with the sliding block, a swing connecting base is arranged at the lower end of the sliding block and comprises a vertical plate and a transverse plate, the vertical plate is rotatably connected with the sliding block through a swing shaft, and an auxiliary suction cup is installed on the transverse plate. The fixed middle suction cup on the main stand column is used as a reference, the adjustable auxiliary suction cup on the auxiliary stand column is used for adapting to the special surface of the blade, the working stability of the whole grinding robot is improved, the grinding part on the blade can be accurately positioned conveniently, and the grinding quality of the surface of the blade is guaranteed.
column14: XINPA INTELLIGENT TECH PINGHU CO LTD

column12: Combined detection device for ore pulp liquid level and foam yield of flotation machine
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mine automation equipment, in particular to a combined detection device for the ore pulp liquid level and the foam yield of a flotation machine. The combined detection device for the ore pulp liquid level and the foam yield of the flotation machine comprises an isolation barrel, a liquid level measuring instrument and a foam yield measuring instrument, the liquid level measuring instrument is arranged at the upper end of the isolation barrel, and the foam yield measuring instrument is arranged on one side of the isolation barrel; the isolation barrel is arranged in the flotation tank, and the foam yield measuring instrument and the foam tank are oppositely arranged. Through the arrangement of the liquid level measuring instrument and the foam yield measuring instrument, combined detection of the liquid level and the foam yield of the flotation machine is achieved, when linkage control is conducted, the foam yield can be set in a fixed interval, and when the foam value detected by the foam yield measuring instrument exceeds the fixed interval, automatic regulation and control are conducted by adjusting the liquid level value of the flotation machine; therefore, the foam yield of the flotation machine is stably controlled, and the flotation recovery rate index is effectively guaranteed.
column14: BGRIMM MACHINERY & AUTOMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: MULTI-APPLICATOR SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR BODY CONTOURING
column13: Systems, methods, and devices for treating a subject are described herein. In some embodiments, an applicator for selectively affecting a subject's subcutaneous tissue is provided. The applicator can include: a housing; a treatment cup mounted in the housing, wherein the treatment cup defines a tissue-receiving cavity and includes a temperature-controlled surface; at least one thermal device coupled to the treatment cup and configured to receive energy via a flexible connector coupled to the applicator and to cool the temperature-controlled surface; an at least one vacuum port coupled to the treatment cup and configured to provide a vacuum to draw the subject's tissue into the tissue-receiving cavity and against at least a portion of a treatment area of the temperature-controlled surface to selectively damage and/or reduce the subject's subcutaneous tissue.

column12: Ionic rare earth ore erbium-thulium grouping method
column13: The invention relates to an ion type rare earth ore erbium and thulium grouping method, and belongs to the technical field of rare earth extraction and separation. In order to solve the problem of loss of heavy rare earth such as lutetium in the existing ion type rare earth ore grouping process, the invention provides an ion type rare earth ore erbium-thulium grouping method, which comprises the following steps of: 1, performing erbium-thulium grouping by adopting a P507-isooctanol system, simulating fractional extraction by adopting a separating funnel method, enabling the total content of thulium, ytterbium and lutetium in outlet organic phase rare earth to be greater than 99%, and enabling the total content of thulium, ytterbium and lutetium to be greater than 99%; the thulium, ytterbium and lutetium in the outlet water-phase rare earth are less than 0.03%, so that the high yield of heavy rare earth such as lutetium is ensured. Compared with an existing grouping process, the method has the advantages of being short in process, high in yield, low in acid consumption, easy to industrialize and the like, and has practical application value.

column12: Separation calibration device and method for deep-sea mining hydraulic lifting test
column13: The invention discloses a separation calibration device and method for a deep-sea mining hydraulic lifting test, and relates to the field of solid-liquid two-phase flow tests, the separation calibration device comprises a device body, a mixture inlet pipeline, a filtering part and a recovery device; the invention further provides a separation and calibration method, particles fall into the separation and calibration device body through the mixture inlet pipeline along with water flow and are filtered through the filter plate, and the cyclic separation or calibration function is selected according to actual test requirements. The control equipment computer end controls the liquid recovery pipeline valve, the first solid recovery pipeline valve and the second solid recovery pipeline valve to be opened and closed. Separation and calibration are integrated, control and selection can be conducted according to test requirements, the device is suitable for simulating a deep-sea mining hydraulic lifting test device, efficient solid-liquid circulation separation is achieved, and the device is simple, easy to control and convenient to test and observe.

column12: Food processor
column13: The utility model discloses a food processing machine, which belongs to the field of life electric appliances, solves the problem that the turbulent flow effect is difficult to continue to be improved through turbulent flow ribs, and adopts the technical scheme that a detection sensor is arranged on a crushing cup, and a detection probe of the detection sensor extends into the crushing cup; an unpowered rotating fan blade is mounted on the detection probe and is positioned outside the rotating range of the crushing cutter. The utility model is mainly used for further improving the turbulent flow effect.

column12: Coil pipe device for monitoring and controlling temperature of autoclave
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of hydrometallurgy pressure leaching, in particular to a coil pipe device for monitoring and controlling the temperature of an autoclave, and aims to further enhance real-time automatic control of the temperature in the autoclave and prevent the temperature in the autoclave from being out of control by improving a temperature control device of the autoclave in the hydrometallurgy pressure leaching process. The smooth reaction of media in the kettle is promoted, and the leaching effect of ore pulp in the kettle is effectively improved, so that the production efficiency is improved, and the product quality is improved. The device comprises a coil pipe, a cooling water pipe, a steam pipeline, a conveying pump, an automatic valve, a manual valve, a PLC and the like, the temperature in the autoclave is monitored in real time through a temperature sensor in the autoclave, a temperature signal is fed back to the PLC in time, and the automatic valve and the conveying pump are controlled through the PLC, so that the automatic valve and the conveying pump are automatically controlled. And the temperature in the kettle is timely adjusted by using steam or cooling water, so that the temperature in the reaction kettle is timely and effectively adjusted. Therefore, the coil pipe device has good practicability.

column12: Heading machine pose measurement system based on space vector constraint
column13: The utility model discloses a heading machine pose measuring system based on space vector constraint, which comprises a laser pointing component, a deviation measuring mechanism and an operating tableare arranged on a heading machine, and the operating table comprises a pose measuring module, a communication switching mechanism and a display component; the deviation measuring mechanism is composed of two fixed-focus cameras and a strapdown inertial navigation component; the fixed-focus camera detects a light source signal emitted by the laser orientation instrument in real time; the strapdowninertial navigation component detects an attitude angle signal of the heading machine in real time; the communication exchange mechanism converts a light source signal output by the fixed-focus camera and an attitude signal of the heading machine into an attitude data signal of the heading machine; and the pose measurement module constructs a space vector constraint equation for heading machine pose data signals to obtain six-degree-of-freedom data of heading machine poses, and the six-degree-of-freedom data is output by the display part, so that computerized processing of heading machine pose detection is realized, and safety and high efficiency of mining construction are ensured.

column12: Remote work group chat room communication method and system based on digital multimedia
column13: The invention discloses a remote work group chat room communication method and system based on digital multimedia, which are used in the field of remote chat communication, and the method comprises the following steps: verifying the identity of a user, and opening the entrance of a group chat room; when information is sent in the group chat room, communication content is encrypted, and metadata is stored in a block chain by using a block chain platform; remote cooperation is carried out in the group chat room; when the communication content is processed, analyzing user data by using a privacy protection technology; the server side performs redundant backup, disaster recovery switching and automatic data migration, and provides a fine-grained access control function; an interface is opened, a third-party security mechanism is allowed to perform software security review, and communication content is automatically saved; and under the condition of network disconnection or transmission delay, a fault-tolerant and retry processing mechanism is provided. According to the method, on a multi-party security computing platform, a privacy protection association rule mining algorithm based on homomorphic encryption is used, and the privacy and security of data are protected.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REPAIR AND MAINTENANCE OF WIND TURBINE BLADE
column13: The invention relates to an unmanned repair aerial vehicle tool (10) for a wind turbine blade comprising a unmanned aerial vehicle (11) adapted to be positioned along the wind turbine blade (1). The tool further comprises -a holding fixation assembly system (20) comprising at least one suction cup (21) and an actuator (22) connected the at least one suction cup (21) to the unmanned aerial vehicle (11) for positioning and connecting the tool (10) to a wind turbine blade (1) prior to a repair and maintenance operation and -a robotic arm (15) attached to the unmanned aerial device (11) to perform repair and maintenance at a defined position on the wind turbine blade (1). The invention further relates to a maintenance assembly for a wind mill (1) and a method for performing the operation.

column12: Pulverizer capable of grinding powder in grading mode
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining machinery equipment, in particular to a grading grinding mill which comprises a grinding box, a machine frame and a discharging tank, the discharging tank and the grinding box are arranged on the machine frame, the discharging tank is arranged above the grinding box, a first feeding pipe is arranged above the grinding box, and a second feeding pipe is arranged above the grinding box. According to the flour mill capable of grinding powder in the grading mode, equipment is convenient to clean, material loss is prevented, the equipment adopts grading powder grinding, the powder grinding efficiency is high, the second powder grinding device adjusts the height of a pressing roller through coordination and cooperation of an electric telescopic rod and a position sensor, and the fine degree of powder grinding is convenient to adjust.

column12: Blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot
column13: The utility model discloses a blade inner surface staggered layer grinding robot which comprises a frame, a suction cup positioning device, a four-axis motion platform, a grinding mechanism and a laser scanning positioning mechanism, and the suction cup positioning device comprises a plurality of middle suction cups and a plurality of auxiliary suction cups; the four-axis moving platform comprises an X-axis moving mechanism, a Y-axis moving mechanism, a Z-axis moving mechanism and an R-axis swinging mechanism; the polishing mechanism comprises a polishing motor and a polishing milling cutter; the laser scanning positioning mechanism comprises a laser sensor. The inner staggered layer polishing device can well adapt to the surface of a blade through the suction cup positioning device, the whole frame and the blade can be stably kept fixed, and the polishing quality of an inner staggered layer is guaranteed; through the cooperation of the four-axis motion platform and the laser scanning positioning mechanism, the inner staggered layer can be quickly and effectively positioned, and the grinding accuracy is improved; and dust generated in the polishing process can be rapidly sucked away and collected through the dust collector, and the dust generated in the polishing process is prevented from affecting the workshop environment.

column12: Mining towing cable power supply robot
column13: The invention relates to an inspection robot technology, aims to solve the problems that an inspection robot is unstable and detection data is inaccurate when the inspection robot advances at a curve and encounters a bulge in a moving track, and particularly relates to a mining towing cable power supply robot which comprises the moving track, the position and height of the connecting rod are adjusted through the vertical push rod and the lifting push rod, so that the inspection robot can be kept in a horizontal state all the time when moving on the bent part of the moving track; the size of the protrusions in the moving track is judged through the analysis module, so that the inspection robot can quickly pass through the protrusions which can pass through, and avoiding and grinding measures can be taken according to the size data of the protrusions when the inspection robot meets the protrusions which cannot pass through, the inspection efficiency of the inspection robot is prevented from being delayed, and the inspection efficiency of the inspection robot is improved. Protrusions existing in the moving track cannot block advancing of the inspection robot, and the stability of the inspection robot in the advancing process is guaranteed.

column12: Shore power network target range system based on block chain
column13: The invention provides a shore power network target range system based on a block chain, and the system comprises a shore power simulation industrial control system which is used for simulating the operation condition of each industrial control device of a ship shore power system; the shore power target range management and control system is used for controlling the shore power simulation industrial control system to carry out simulation operation, monitoring, control, event alarm and ship power utilization monitoring and analysis on industrial control equipment of the ship shore power system; the shore power target range management and control system is also used for carrying out network security vulnerability testing on the shore power simulation industrial control system based on the block chain according to needs; the data obtained in each step in the network security vulnerability test process is stored on the block chain, so that the data is prevented from being tampered. The system has the functions of performing simulation operation, data summarization and exchange, monitoring, control, analysis and the like on the industrial control equipment of the shore power facility, fills the blank of the prior art, and realizes network security vulnerability mining in a shore power control scene.

column12: Intelligent sanitation cleaning robot
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent environmental sanitation cleaning robot, and relates to the technical field of environmental sanitation robots, the intelligent environmental sanitation cleaning robot comprises a main body, a brush and a suction cup, the brush is arranged at the lower end of the main body, the suction cup is arranged on one side of the brush, an air duct is arranged at the upper end of the suction cup, and a crushing assembly is arranged in the air duct; the crushing assembly is used for crushing large-size garbage, the driving assembly is arranged at the lower end of the crushing assembly and provides power for the crushing assembly, the separation assembly is arranged on one side of the crushing assembly, the fan is arranged on one side of the separation assembly, and the extrusion assembly is arranged at the lower end of the separation assembly. And a packaging assembly is arranged on one side of the extrusion assembly. Separated filtering is carried out through the separating assembly, a filter screen self-cleaning function is achieved, garbage on the inner wall of the robot is squeezed through the squeezing assembly, the garbage temporary storage space is fully utilized, and then caked garbage is packaged through the packaging assembly so that carrying can be facilitated.
column14: JIANGSU BOREN INTELLIGENT ROBOT CO LTD

column12: Glass edge grinding machine for display cabinet processing
column13: According to the glass edge grinding machine used for display cabinet machining, glass is adsorbed through the suction cups on the balance assembly, so that the glass is stably installed, and the glass is prevented from deviating in the grinding process. In the grinding process, according to different grinding force of the edge grinding assembly on the glass, the gravity center of the glass can be changed, the supporting base and the base are connected through the balance sliding block, so that when the gravity center of the glass is changed and deflects, the balance sliding block deflects along with the glass, deflection is detected by the sensor, the hydraulic cylinder is controlled to drive the suction cup to ascend and descend, and the glass is ground. The gravity center balance of the glass is kept, and the accurate grinding process is guaranteed.

column12: Bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient for surgical operation
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of medical instrument design, in particular to a bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient for surgical operation. The bionic surface hip joint prosthesis comprises an acetabular cup prosthesis, a femoral head prosthesis, a prosthesis intermediate, a main pressure nail and an auxiliary tension nail, wherein the femoral head prosthesis is arranged in the acetabular cup prosthesis, the inner surface of the acetabular cup prosthesis is in hemispherical sliding friction fit with the outer surface of the femoral head prosthesis, the prosthesis intermediate is arranged in the femoral head prosthesis, the outer surface of the prosthesis intermediate is in conical surface fit with the inner surface of the femoral head prosthesis, the contact surfaces of the acetabular cup prosthesis, the femoral head prosthesis and the prosthesis intermediate with the bone are all of a 3D printing bone trabecula structure, and the rear end parts of the main pressure nail and the auxiliary tension nail are both connected with the prosthesis intermediate. The prosthesis provided by the invention is relatively low in friction coefficient and metal ion precipitation, good in long-term bone ingrowth performance and capable of reconstructing a hip joint physiological fulcrum.
column14: JUST HUAJIAN MEDICAL DEVICE TIANJIN CO LTD

column12: Induction heater and apparatus
column13: An induction-heating device for heating and or melting a heat affected product zone of shaving or cosmetic products stored in a product container which consists of a layer of said product heated by an electrically conductive metallic target member having through-passages overlying said top product surface and energized by an induction coil into which an electromagnetic field is generated by electronic circuitry for a predetermined time period into said product container, thereby permitting said heated and or melted product to flow through said through-passages onto said top surface of said target member to be collected by a user for shaving or cosmetic purposes.
column14: ALPS SOUTH EUROPE S R O

column12: Lithium ion battery leak detection device
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of lithium ion battery production and manufacturing, and particularly discloses a lithium ion battery leak detection device, which comprises a material receiving table, a pressure maintaining bin, a sucker and a detection mechanism, and is characterized in that the pressure maintaining bin and the material receiving table are matched with each other to form a pressure maintaining cavity, and the pressure maintaining cavity is used for placing a battery cell; the suction cup is mounted on the material receiving table and/or the pressure maintaining bin and attached to the surface of the battery cell, and the pressure intensity of an inner cavity of the suction cup is larger than or smaller than that of the pressure maintaining cavity; the detection mechanism is used for detecting whether the surface of the cell is bulged. According to the lithium ion battery leak detection device provided by the utility model, by utilizing the principle that high air pressure flows to low air pressure, when a battery cell leaks liquid, the surface of the battery cell is bulged, and whether the battery cell leaks liquid is judged through judging whether the surface of the battery cell is bulged or not by the detection mechanism, so that manual judgment is not needed, and the risk of high error rate of manual detection is avoided; the accuracy of battery cell liquid leakage detection is enhanced, and automation is easy to realize.
column14: ZHEJIANG LIWEI ENERGY SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: Rotation-percussion drilling rock drill drilling speed prediction method
column13: The invention discloses a method for predicting the drilling speed of a rock drill for rotary-percussion drilling. The method comprises the following steps: determining the hardness of ore rock to be crushed; the relation between the drilling specific work of rotary rock breaking and the rock hardness and the drilling diameter is obtained through a rotary drilling test; based on the rotary cutting power balance relation and the relation between the rotary rock breaking drilling specific work and the rock hardness and the drill hole diameter, the rotary drilling breaking drilling speed is calculated; obtaining the relationship among the rock drilling coefficient, the rock hardness and the diameter of the drill bit of the rock drill through an impact drilling test; on the basis of the percussion drilling fluctuation theory and a rigid piston model, the percussion drilling breaking drilling speed is calculated according to the relation among the rock drilling coefficient, the rock hardness and the drill bit diameter of the rock drill; the interaction of rotary rock breaking and impact rock breaking is analyzed, and the drilling speed of rotary-impact drilling and breaking of the rock drill is predicted based on the drilling speed of rotary drilling and breaking and the drilling speed of impact drilling and breaking. Through the method, the drilling speed of the rock drill in a rotary-percussion drilling mode can be predicted, so that the rock drilling process is optimized.
column15: WANG YU;;WANG HONGLI;;HU XIAODONG;;LI XU;;LEI SHURONG;;LIU JUNLONG
column32: HONG-LI WANG ET AL: "Study on Prediction of Rotary-Impact Drilling Speed of Rock Drill", INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON MANUFACTURING ENGINEERING AND INTELLIGENT MATERIALS, 28 February 2017 (2017-02-28), pages 201 - 206

column12: Dustproof device for dry powder machine-made sand production
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of dry powder machine-made sand production, in particular to a dustproof device for dry powder machine-made sand production, which comprises a machine body, a supporting seat, a feeding seat and a discharging seat, the bottom end of the machine body is fixedly connected with the supporting seat, the upper end of the machine body is fixedly connected with the feeding seat, and the discharging seat and a dustproof structure are arranged below the machine body. The dustproof structure comprises a sliding groove, the sliding groove is formed in the feeding base, a sliding rod is inserted into the sliding groove, the end, away from the sliding groove, of the sliding rod is fixedly connected to the outer wall of a connecting block, and a rotating rod is movably connected to the front end of the connecting block. By controlling the feeding speed, excessive ore is prevented from colliding with the interior of the device to generate a large number of dust particles, the cloud dust fog sealing agent spraying structure is arranged, dust can be agglomerated, settled and separated, the spraying structure is provided with a protection and disassembly structure, use and protection are better, and the service life of the device is prolonged. And the practicability and the safety of the device are improved.
column14: BIYANG JINDING REGENERATION RESOURCE UTILIZATION CO LTD

column12: MONITORING DEVICE OF AN OXYGEN CONCENTRATOR
column13: A device (100) for monitoring the oxygen inhaled by a user and produced by an oxygen concentrator is described, said device comprising: - means (SF) for detecting the oxygen flow, - means (SP) for detecting the purity of the oxygen, - means (ST) for detecting the oxygen temperature, - means (SH) adapted to detect the humidity of the environment in which the concentrator is arranged, - means (QA) adapted to detect the air quality of the environment in which the concentrator is arranged, - means (ST) adapted to detect the temperature of the environment in which the concentrator is arranged, a control unit (1 ) provided with a microprocessor and with a memory and adapted to receive the signals coming from the totality of said means; said control unit (1 ) is adapted to determine the real purity oxygen volume (RPOV) in response to the signal coming from said means for detecting the oxygen flow and as a function of the other signals coming from the other means and received during the period of time (t 1 - t 0 ) in which the oxygen flow remains other than zero.
column14: ODA OSSIGENO DALLAMBIENTE S R L

column12: Manufacturing method of personalized acetabular cup with bone defect repairing function
column13: The invention discloses a manufacturing method of a personalized acetabular cup with a bone defect repairing function. The manufacturing method is characterized by comprising the following steps: stepone, establishing a hip bone three-dimensional model; step two, extracting a curved surface solid structure model; step three, stretching the curved surface at the concave part of the curved surfacesolid structure model to fill the concave part in the curved surface; step four, acquiring a liner surface and a countersunk head mounting hole of an acetabular cup; step five, trimming the peripheralstretching part of the curved surface solid structure model, then performing rounding to finally obtain a retention structure, and preforming stretching and material removal to obtain two uniformly distributed retention holes in the retention structure; step six, repairing the curved surface solid structure model obtained in the step five, adding a support, performing slicing and layering; and step seven, performing 3D printing to make a personalized acetabular cup. According to the invention, the prepared acetabulum cup is customized according to the bone condition of the patient, so that the acetabulum does not need to be grinded in advance and thus the bone loss is avoided and the injury is reduced; and the bone defect position of the patient can be synchronously filled and repaired.
column14: FOSHAN CITY YIHE BIOTECHNOLOGY CO LTD

column12: Mine card unmanned global operation path planning method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of unmanned driving of mine trucks, as mines are successively converted into deep sunken mining and the height of a side slope is increased, mining of mines by mine enterprises generally has the problems of difficulty in labor use, high labor cost and the like, and the application of unmanned driving can exactly effectively relieve the production capacity delay caused by insufficient manpower supply. And the capacity of each enterprise can be flexibly adjusted according to market requirements. However, according to an existing mine card unmanned driving technology, only a global path or global planning is operated, and the unloading time and the loading time of unloading and loading under the actual condition and the queuing time during unloading and loading are not considered. Therefore, the invention provides the mine truck unmanned global operation path planning method under the consideration of the cooperative operation between the mine truck and the crushing station, thereby improving the overall production efficiency, predicting the shift output in real time, solving the problem of non-uniform production in a mine area in the time dimension, and providing a great significance for improving the production efficiency and safety of mine enterprises. And the transportation cost is reduced.

column12: Test platform for testing impact crushing characteristics of ore particles
column13: The invention discloses a test platform for testing impact crushing characteristics of ore particles, and belongs to the technical field of mineral processing engineering equipment. The test platformcomprises a base, a frame, a guide pipe, a punch, a chopping board, an impact force sensor, an acquisition card and a computer, wherein the guide pipe is suspended on the frame, the punch is providedwith a rope and can enter and exit from the top of the guide pipe, the impact force sensor is placed on the base, the chopping board is placed above the impact force sensor, and is used for placing ore particles and bearing the impact of the punch falling from the guide pipe on the ore particles, the impact force sensor is in communication connection with the acquisition card, and the acquisitioncard is in communication connection with the computer.

column12: Block natural gas hydrate sample preparation and decomposition system
column13: The invention discloses a blocky natural gas hydrate sample preparation and decomposition system which comprises a hydrate synthesis and pressing subsystem, a hydrate breaking decomposition and metering subsystem, a pressure maintaining transfer ball valve and the like, and the pressure maintaining transfer ball valve is arranged between the hydrate synthesis and pressing subsystem and the hydrate breaking decomposition and metering subsystem. The two subsystems are connected through the pressure-maintaining transfer ball valve, integration of the hydrate sample synthesis system and the crushing decomposition system is achieved, the sample quality is guaranteed to the maximum extent, experimental interference factors are reduced, on the basis of the capacity of synthesizing blocky hydrate samples, the compactness degree of hydrate blocks is controlled, meanwhile, pressure-maintaining transfer and rotary crushing of the samples are achieved, and finally, the functions of obtaining hydrate decomposition gas production characteristics under different crushing and fluidizing processes and the like are achieved, the split type design is adopted, more scientific and reasonable effects are achieved, and expansion or decomposition of hydrate blocks due to pressure reduction can be effectively avoided; and effective data support is provided for work such as research and development of a leakage type hydrate resource mining process and productivity prediction.

column12: Simulation test device for barrel-type mining of natural gas hydrate in sea area
column13: The utility model relates to a marine natural gas hydrate barrel type exploitation simulation test device which comprises a high-pressure test box and a simulation exploitation barrel used for sinking into the high-pressure test box to simulate a natural gas hydrate reservoir, the simulation exploitation barrel is provided with a first drainage pipe communicated with the inner space of the barrel, and the simulation exploitation barrel is further provided with a sand prevention cavity. The sand prevention cavity is connected with a second drainage pipe and an air delivery pipe; and the high-voltage test box is driven by the vertical drawing system to lift. The device can simulate the processes of mining barrel sinking, depressurization mining and mining barrel recovery, and has important significance for researching the applicability, mining efficiency, action range and the like of a marine natural gas hydrate barrel type mining device.

column12: Full-automatic chip mounting robot and method
column13: The invention discloses a full-automatic chip mounting robot and method. The robot comprises a motor box I, a connecting and fixing plate, a connecting flange, a Mecanum wheel A, a motor box II, a camera I, a sliding rail, a main console, a shell, a sliding block, a mounting box, an isolation plate, a Mecanum wheel B, a grinding module, a cleaning liquid module, a cleaning module, a glue liquid module, a pasting module, a camera II and a camera III. The grinding module is composed of a mounting plate I, a motor box II, a servo electric cylinder I and a grinding wheel. The full-automatic strain gauge pasting machine integrates multiple procedures of surface polishing, surface cleaning, surface gluing, automatic pasting and the like, automation of the whole process of strain gauge pasting operation is achieved, manual operation errors are reduced, and the quality of pasting operation is improved; mecanum wheels are used for being matched with a main console, full-automatic all-directional walking of the strain gauge pasting robot is achieved, and the flexibility of an operation path is improved. And by adopting a high-capacity strain gauge bin and a suction cup automatic sheet taking mode, the chip mounting work efficiency is improved.

column12: Adjustable clamping device for robot part machining
column13: The utility model relates to the field of part machining and clamping, in particular to an adjustable clamping device for robot part machining, which comprises a working support table, an electromagnetic connecting plate is mounted on one side of the working support table, a rotating frame is rotatably mounted on the electromagnetic connecting plate, and limiting rotating blocks are arranged on two sides of the rotating frame. The limiting rotating block is matched with the electromagnetic connecting plate in an electromagnetic attraction mode, a manual negative pressure suction cup is installed at the other end of the rotating frame, and an installation suction cup is installed at the top end of the manual negative pressure suction cup. According to the grinding and polishing device, through rotation adjustment of the limiting rotating block and the electromagnetic connecting plate and negative pressure adsorption of the manual negative pressure suction cup to the shell pieces, the positions of the shell pieces can be conveniently adjusted, so that the shell pieces with different radians can be moved to proper grinding and polishing positions, and grinding and polishing equipment can be better matched for grinding and polishing.

column12: Drug addiction treatment medicine supply and recovery device
column13: The invention relates to a drug addiction treatment medicine supply and recovery device, which comprises an alcohol detection system, a medicine supply system and a drinking utensil recovery system. The alcohol detection system performs alcohol detection on a medicine user through an alcohol detection sensor. The medicine supply system comprises a cup lifting control module, a cup falling controlmodule and a straw control module. The drinking utensil recovery system comprises a cup body recovery module and a straw recovery module. The medicine supply system sends a drinking utensil to a liquid medicine and drinking water supply port, the alcohol detection system detects alcohol of a person entering the range of the device, the liquid medicine and the drinking water are sequentially addedinto the drinking utensil after the person passes alcohol detection, and the drinking utensil recovery system recovers the used drinking utensil through the drinking utensil recovery system after thedrug user finishes drug taking. According to the device, the steps for providing a drug addiction treatment medicine are greatly simplified, a large amount of medicine supply cost is saved, and the device is high in practicability and safety performance and suitable for wide popularization.
column14: SHENZHEN POLICE EQUIPMENT CO LTD AEGIS WEIMIN

column12: Novel chloride ion tester
column13: The utility model discloses a novel chloride ion determinator which comprises a box body, a box cover is arranged on the top surface of the box body, a measuring cup is arranged in a measuring cup storage area, the bottom surface of the measuring cup is connected with a base, a weighing block is arranged in the base, a measuring tube is arranged at the lower end of a connecting block, and the measuring tube is arranged in the measuring cup storage area. And a movable measuring head is arranged at the lower end of the measuring tube. Through the arrangement of the weighing block, the storage box and the movable measuring head, in the using process, liquid to be measured is added into the measuring cup, the liquid is weighed by the weighing block, data are displayed on the base, the sampling amount of each time can be accurately controlled, the storage box is rotated to the vertical angle, the supporting rod is unfolded on the side face, and the liquid can be accurately measured. Then the connecting block in the supporting rod is rotated, the measuring pipe is driven to rotate together, the measuring pipe is opened, the movable measuring head is pulled downwards, the movable measuring head enters liquid to be measured, the measuring rod is designed to be foldable, the occupied space is saved, and the use efficiency is improved.

column12: Intelligent heat supply control method based on gis
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of heat supply control, in particular to an intelligent heat supply control method based on gis, which comprises map tiles, a wireless temperature measurement module and a server, and the server adopts a dell VxRail super-fusion all-in-one machine to build a basic virtualization platform for data storage, analysis and display; on the basis of the platform, a windows system is established, data storage, analysis and picture software are installed and debugged, and a Dell XC hyper-fusion solution combines various advantages of fusion infrastructure, transverse extension architecture and software-defined storage. According to the intelligent heat supply control method based on gis, on the basis of a GIS, a pipeline is described on a detailed topographic map and endowed with pipeline information, a pipe network is managed more visually, full-life-cycle complete information including a user side, a heat exchanger, a heat supply network and a heatsource is obtained, and a scheme of equipment operation monitoring-data deep mining-management and control optimization is taken as a main line. And with the cooperation platform as a support, integrated service cooperation is realized.

column12: HYDROGEN GAS RECYCLING IN A DIRECT REDUCTION PROCESS
column13: A system for the production of sponge iron, the system comprising a direct reduction shaft (201) comprising a first inlet (202) for introduction of iron ore into the shaft (201); a first outlet (203) for removal of sponge iron from the shaft (201); a reduction gas source (206), connected through a gas line (207) with the shaft (201); a first compressor (208) provided in said gas line (207); a primary circuit (209) for conducting at least a part of the top gas through it, said primary circuit (209) being connected in one end with shaft (201) and in another end with said gas line (207) downstream said first compressor (208), a secondary circuit (210) for conducting at least a portion of gas removed from gas conducted through the primary circuit (209), said secondary circuit (210) being connected in one end to the primary circuit (209) and in another end to said gas line (207) upstream said first compressor (208), and comprising means (211) therein for reducing the pressure of said portion of gas conducted through the secondary circuit (210), and a first valve (212) for controlling a flow of said portion of gas into the secondary circuit (210).

column12: ACTUATION UNIT OF THE ARTICULATED LEVER OR CAM TYPE PROVIDED WITH A BRAKING UNIT
column13: An actuation unit includes an actuating arm pivotable between an open and closed position; a pneumatic cylinder comprising a stem movable linearly along a cylinder axis and configured to control pivoting of the actuating arm; and a closing device that includes a braking unit configured to brake movement of the actuating arm having a surface portion configured to come into contact with at least one braking assembly. The braking assembly is locked against rotation and axially movable between a non-braking and braking configuration. The surface portion is in a non-orthogonal arrangement with respect to the cylinder axis and the braking assembly includes a plurality of rollers retained in the braking assembly with clearance at least with respect to a radial movement thereof, the rollers being able to assume a first radial configuration not in contact with the surface portion and a second radial configuration in contact with the surface portion.

column12: Optics and structure for space applications
column13: A transportation network for providing propellant in space can include optical mining vehicles that concentrate solar energy to spall captured asteroids, capture released volatiles, and store them in reservoirs as propellants. The network can also have orbital transfer vehicles that use solar thermal rocket modules that focus solar energy on heat exchangers to force propellant through nozzles, as well as separable aeromaneuvering tanker modules with reusable heatshields and storage tanks. The network can have propellant depots positioned between Earth and a transport destination. The depots can mechanically couple to accept propellant delivery and to supply it to visiting space vehicles.
