column12: Visual negative pressure sputum suction device
column13: The utility model discloses a visual negative pressure sputum suction device which comprises a collecting cup, a first observation window is arranged on the outer surface of the collecting cup, first scale marks are arranged on the side, close to the first observation window, of the outer surface of the collecting cup, a cleaning mechanism is connected to the lower end of the collecting cup in a penetrating mode, and the cleaning mechanism is in threaded connection with the collecting cup. A gathering pipe is connected to the middle of the upper end of the collecting cup in a penetrating mode, a first control valve is arranged outside the gathering pipe, a measuring cylinder is arranged at the upper end of the gathering pipe, and a sputum suction pipe and a negative pressure air pipe are detachably installed on the left side and the right side of the upper end of the measuring cylinder respectively. According to the visual negative pressure sputum suction device, sputum sucked out of the respiratory tract of a patient can be accurately observed, metered and recorded every time, medical staff can conveniently obtain accurate illness state data, treatment and recovery of the patient are facilitated, the situation that the sputum adheres to the wall due to the viscidity of the sputum can be avoided, cleaning treatment is facilitated, and the sputum suction device is convenient to use. And the device is simple in structure, low in cost and capable of being popularized and used.

column12: Food material processing device
column13: The utility model discloses a food material processing device which comprises a mounting base, an upper shell is arranged on one end face of the mounting base, a lower cup used for containing objectsto be cut is detachably arranged on the other end face of the mounting base, a cutter set used for cutting is arranged on the mounting base, and the cutter set extends into the lower cup. A motor anda reduction gear box are arranged in the upper shell, the motor is in transmission connection with the cutter set through the reduction gear box, and the input end and the output end of the reductiongear box are not located on the same straight line. The crushing is realized by driving the cutter group through the motor, the automation is higher, the continuous dependence on manual operation is not needed in the use process, and meanwhile, in the preferable scheme, the input end and the output end of the reduction gear box are not collinear, so that the reduction gear box has larger torque, higher cutting stability and larger force.

column12: Bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient to replace
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of medical instrument design, in particular to a bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient to replace. The bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient to replace comprises an acetabular cup prosthesis, a femoral head prosthesis, a pressure main nail and a tension auxiliary nail, and the inner surface of the acetabular cup prosthesis is in hemispherical sliding friction fit with the outer surface of the femoral head prosthesis. The contact surfaces of the acetabular cup prosthesis and the femoral head prosthesis with bones are of 3D printing bone trabecula structures, a partition plate is arranged in the femoral head prosthesis to form a head groove and a tail groove in the femoral head prosthesis, a spherical cover is assembled at the head groove, and external threads are arranged at the rear ends of the pressure main nail and the tension auxiliary nail respectively. The bionic surface hip joint prosthesis convenient to replace is simple in structure, convenient to replace, low in cost, low in friction coefficient and metal ion precipitation, good in long-term bone ingrowth performance and capable of reconstructing a hip joint physiological fulcrum.
column14: JUST HUAJIAN MEDICAL DEVICE TIANJIN CO LTD
column15: ZHANG DIANYING;;LIU NIAN;;MA XINLONG;;ZHOU YIXIN;;CHAI WEI;;XU JIANZHONG;;LIU GUODONG;;YU KAI;;WANG YANHUA;;ZHANG XIAOMENG;;TANG MOUTIAN;;ZHANG LIJIA;;YANG JIAN

column12: Deburring device for cut mobile phone steel sheet
column13: The deburring device comprises a base, a motor is arranged on one side of the top of the base, a first electric telescopic rod is arranged on the lower end face of the top of a rotating frame, an electric suction cup is arranged at the bottom of the first electric telescopic rod, and a machining box is arranged in the middle of the top of the base. An electric grinding machine is arranged at the bottom of the first support, a fixing block is arranged on the side, close to the electric suction cup, of the base, a screw block is arranged on the right-hand and left-hand threaded rod, and a limiting block is arranged at the bottom of the screw block. According to the deburring device for the cut mobile phone steel sheets, a large number of machined parts can be conveyed, deburring machining can be conducted on the machined parts in sequence, the machining efficiency is high, chippings in the machining process can be conveniently collected, meanwhile, the positions of the machined parts can be adjusted, and the machining efficiency is improved. And finally, the machined part is conveniently moved to a collecting device or a next machining device through an electric suction cup, and the automation degree of the machining process is high.
column14: HUAIAN CITY DONGPDA HARDWARE VISCOSE PRODUCT LTD COMPANY

column12: Purple sand raw ore material processing system and processing method
column13: The invention relates to the field of processing of purple sand raw ore materials, in particular to a purple sand raw ore material processing system and a processing method. The method for processingthe purple sand raw ore material by adopting the purple sand raw ore material processing system comprises the following steps that S1, the purple sand raw ore material needs to be placed on the upperside of an arc-shaped plate, and a motor II drives a turntable to rotate, so that a plurality of arc-shaped elastic rods are continuously blown up and flat, and then the purple sand raw ore material can be extruded; S2, a motor I drives the plurality of arc-shaped elastic rods to rotate around the axis of a hollow cylinder, and the purple sand raw ore material is extruded and stirred; S3, a jointis used for introducing gas into an air inlet cylinder, the gas is introduced into the hollow cylinder and sprayed out from a plurality of vent holes to simulate the weathering process of the purple sand raw ore material; and S4, after weathering, crushed materials are formed and are poured onto a screen frame, and the screen frame is used for screening purple sand fine materials. The hollow cylinder is of a hollow structure, a circular base is fixedly connected to the left end of the hollow cylinder, and a plurality of vent holes are formed in the hollow cylinder from left to right.

column12: Jet flow-cavitation gold concentrate ore powder cyanidation leaching gold extraction production device and production method
column13: The invention discloses a jet flow-cavitation gold concentrate ore powder cyanidation leaching gold extraction production device and method, and belongs to the technical field of gold extraction of hydrometallurgy. Comprising a size mixing tank mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation tubular reactor mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation reaction tower mechanism, a jet flow cyanidation supplement reactor mechanism, a three-layer washing concentration mechanism I, a cavitation cyanidation mechanism, an airflow cavitation cyanidation tubular reactor mechanism, an aging tank mechanism, a three-layer washing concentration mechanism II and a pregnant solution tank mechanism, a deoxidizing tower mechanism and a zinc powder mixing and replacing tank mechanism; the cavitation reactor and the jet reactor can form a sufficient gas-liquid (solid) mixing area, so that heat transfer, mass transfer and momentum transfer are effectively promoted, the reaction is further enhanced, and the reaction rate and the product yield are improved; the method has the advantages of mature process, advanced equipment, continuous operation and high automation degree, shortens the cyanidation reaction time, and improves the production efficiency.

column12: ELEVATOR INSPECTION SYSTEM WITH ROBOTIC PLATFORM CONFIGURED WITH A PLATFORM PROPULSOR
column13: Disclosed is an elevator inspection system, the system having: a robotic platform (220) configured to inspect a hoistway; a platform propulsor (255) operationally connected to the robotic platform (220); and a controller (230) operationally connected to the platform propulsor (255), wherein the controller (230) is configured to control the platform propulsor (255) to propel the robotic platform (220) vertically within the hoistway.

column12: Multi-channel mechanical spectrum sub-frequency band characteristic evaluation method based on multilayer correlation
column13: The invention discloses a multi-channel mechanical spectrum sub-frequency band characteristic evaluation method based on multilayer correlation. The method comprises the following steps of performingtime-frequency domain transformation on a multi-channel mechanical signal to obtain multi-channel spectrum data, and dividing the spectrum data into a plurality of sub-frequency bands, and acquiring characteristics; then calculating standardized correlation coefficient values between the sub-frequency band characteristics and a mill load; and then calculating a variable projection importance (VIP)value of the sub-frequency band characteristics based on the partial least square algorithm by adopting the selected sub-frequency band characteristics, and performing standardized processing; and finally, defining a comprehensive evaluation index based on single channel and all channels by adopting the standardized correlation coefficients and the VIP value and combining mill load estimated performance, wherein the comprehensive evaluation index is used for measuring the importance degree of the sub-frequency band characteristics. The effectiveness of the proposed method is verified by adopting the multi-channel mechanical signal of an experimental ball mill in the ore grinding process.
column32: 汤健 等: "基于自适应多核潜结构映射选择性集成模型的磨机负荷参数预测", 《控制理论与应用》

column12: Food processor reliable to use
column13: The utility model discloses a reliable food processor, which comprises a machine body, a crushing cup arranged on the machine body, a motor and a control device, the crushing cup is internally provided with a crushing device driven by the motor, the cup wall of the crushing cup is provided with a liquid discharge hole, the liquid discharge hole is provided with a liquid discharge valve, and the liquid discharge valve comprises a valve body, a liquid discharge channel and a valve core. The liquid drainage channel is communicated with the liquid drainage hole, the valve element is movably arranged in the valve body to control opening and closing of the liquid drainage channel, a temperature sensor is arranged on the inner wall of the liquid drainage channel to detect the temperature of liquid flowing through the liquid drainage channel, and when the liquid temperature detected by the temperature sensor is not matched with the preset temperature, the control device controls the valve element to move to close the liquid drainage channel. The temperature sensor is arranged on the inner wall of the liquid discharge channel, so that the temperature sensor can detect the temperature of the liquid flowing through the liquid discharge channel, and the detection accuracy is improved. The control device can prevent liquid with the temperature not meeting the requirement from flowing out, and the user experience is improved.
column14: HANGZHOU NINE YANG SMALL HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCE LTD COMPANY

column12: Green mine and agricultural resource integrated construction scheme and economic determination method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of economic information and data evaluation processing, and discloses a green mine and agricultural resource integrated construction scheme and an economic determination method. A method for selecting the position of a green mine according to remote sensing data and geographic information utilizes a remote sensing information extraction technology and combines a powerful spatial analysis function of a GIS (Geographic Information System); mine environment information and development conditions can be monitored in real time, and mine green site selection and planning can be carried out by combining a remote sensing technology with factor elements extracted by mine remote sensing images; meanwhile, a green mine and agricultural resource evaluation index system is constructed through a method for evaluating the restoration effect of the green mine, a remote sensing technology and an unmanned aerial vehicle oblique photography technology are used as monitoring means, mine digital elevation and image data are collected regularly, a true three-dimensional model of the mine is generated, and the effects before and after treatment and restoration are evaluated accurately. Dynamic three-dimensional visualization of the whole process of mine development and utilization is achieved, and the purposes of green mining area treatment and recovery continuity and long-term supervision are achieved.
column14: JIANPING COUNTY SCIENCE AND TECH BUREAU

column12: Method for preparing single-cell suspension based on retinal tissue/organoid-retinal tissue
column13: The invention relates to a method for preparing a single-cell suspension based on retinal tissue/organoid-retinal tissue. According to the invention, retina tissues or organoid-retina tissues are selected, and two efficient digestive enzymes as well as use doses and concentrations, use proportions, action time of the enzymes and the like thereof are screened out, so that the high activity rate (the survival rate being greater than or equal to 90%, and meeting the cell library building requirement), the low agglomeration rate and the low dead cell rate of various cells in the retina single-cellsuspension are ensured; the method disclosed by the invention is simple and convenient to operate and short in consumed time, and efficient living cells can be provided for retina single cell RNA-Sequence sequencing, ATCT-Sequence sequencing and the like; and then systematic bioinformatics analysis and mining on high-throughput data obtained by sequencing are obtained, transcription factor changerules of different cell populations in a retina development process are revealed, and change rules of various cell transcriptomes in a cell fate transformation process are disclosed.
column32: 白海青: "视网膜神经元营养和保护的体外实验研究", 《中国优秀博硕士学位论文全文数据库(博士) 医药卫生科技辑》;;YASUMASA OTORI ET AL.: "Protective effect of nilvadipine against glutamate neurotoxicity in purified retinal ganglion cells", 《BRAIN RESEARCH》;;SAMUEL SHAO-MIN ZHANG ET AL.: "Tissue culture studies of retinal development", 《METHODS》

column12: Device for measuring dissociation degree of useful minerals in ore grinding process
column13: The utility model discloses a device for measuring the dissociation degree of useful minerals in the ore grinding process, which comprises a device body, the device body comprises an image acquisition part, a control part and a printing part, and the control part is arranged on one side of the image acquisition part. In the image acquisition process, an object to be identified is placed on the bearing plate, then the infrared detector and the image acquisition camera are respectively started, the image acquisition camera transmits acquired data to the control part, and the acquired data are analyzed and calculated through the control panel on the surface of the control part, so that the mineral dissociation degree is obtained; in the measurement process, the infrared detector checks the space outside an image acquisition area, and when the infrared detector detects mineral substances, the control part starts the loudspeaker to remind workers and sort out the mineral substances on the surface of the bearing plate, so that the mineral substances are prevented from appearing in a non-image acquisition area, and the measurement accuracy is improved. Therefore, the determination result of the mineral dissociation degree is influenced.
column14: JIANGXI YIFENG WANGUO MINING CO LTD
column15: LUO ZUJUN;;DUAN XIAOGANG;;CHENG LEI;;HUANG GUANGFU;;LEI XIANLIN

column12: Layered injection-production method for improving recovery efficiency through steam injection
column13: The invention relates to a layered injection-production method for improving the recovery efficiency through steam injection. The method comprises the following steps that S1, an oil layer is divided into a plurality of sub-oil layers in the longitudinal direction according to the characteristics of a heavy oil reservoir; S2, a production well and a steam injection well are arranged according to a well pattern structure; S3, a general steam injection pipe column is lowered into the steam injection well, and a layered production pipe column is lowered into the production well; and S4, steam is injected into the general steam injection pipe column, logging data of the production well are monitored in real time, whether the steam channeling phenomenon exists in the production well or not is judged according to the logging data, and if the steam channeling phenomenon does not exist, general mining continues to be carried out, otherwise, determining the position of the sub-oil layer with the steam channeling phenomenon, and closing a normally-open sliding sleeve switch corresponding to the position of the sub-oil layer with the steam channeling phenomenon to realize layered injection and production. According to the method, the steam heat energy can be fully utilized, the requirements of wells at different layers are reduced, the operation cost of the production well is reduced, the recovery efficiency is improved to the maximum extent, the steam flooding development cost is reduced, and the overall economic benefit is improved.

column12: Flotation process problem diagnosis method based on MLA
column13: The invention discloses an MLA-based flotation process problem diagnosis method, which comprises the following steps of S1, performing process examination sampling on each process node in a process of a flotation plant, and collecting current process conditions; s2, measuring the working concentration, the grade, the size fraction composition and the target metal content of each size fraction of the obtained sample; s3, MLA measurement analysis is conducted on the raw ore, the concentrate, the tailings and the key intermediate products, and an MLA report is formed; s4, according to the MLA report and the analysis result obtained in the step S2, comprehensive analysis is conducted on the grinding and floating process of the selected plant, and a process examination conclusion is obtained; and S5, determining a process improvement direction and suggestions according to a process examination conclusion. According to the method, MLA analysis is carried out on key products of process examination, systematic analysis is carried out on the whole grinding and floating process in combination with data obtained by a traditional examination analysis method, and targeted optimization measures and improvement suggestions are provided according to quantitative indexes.

column12: Mine field hydrocarbon injection gas drive miscible phase discrimination method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of well mining, in particular to a mine field hydrocarbon injection gas drive miscible phase distinguishing method. The mine field hydrocarbon injection gas drive miscible phase distinguishing method comprises the steps that data of a researched oil reservoir high-pressure physical property experiment, a gas injection expansion experiment and a thin pipe minimum miscible phase pressure experiment are obtained; experimental data are fit and imported into a thin pipe model to obtain a gas-liquid saturation field graph, and then a gas-oil ratio range of a miscible phase belt is determined by a gas-oil ratio-dimensionless distance curve; miscible phase wells are preliminarily screened according to miscible phase conditions on the basis of the pressure-temperature phase diagram of the fluid produced in the mine field and the pressure-temperature phase diagram of a miscible-phase belt determined by thin pipe numerical simulation; and the miscible phase wells are determined in the preliminarily screened miscible phase wells based on the molar content of CH4. Therefore, whether a miscible phase is reached or not in the gas injection process of the mine field can be conveniently judged, and the recovery rate of crude oil can be better improved.

column12: Full-automatic mining system for mine
column13: The utility model provides a full-automatic mining system of a mine, and relates to the technical field of mining systems of mines. The excavating equipment is arranged at the front end of the loading equipment, the self-discharging carrier loader runs on the conveying line, the conveying line is connected with the loading equipment and the material station, the excavating equipment, the loading equipment, the self-discharging carrier loader and the conveying line are in signal connection with the controller, and the excavating front end used for crushing a mine is installed on the side away from the loading equipment. The front end of the weighing conveying line is connected with the collecting device, the rear end of the weighing conveying line is connected with the lifting device, the hopper is located at the top end of the lifting device, a discharging valve is arranged at the bottom of the hopper, a stagnation space of the self-discharging carrier loader is reserved below the hopper, and a radar device is installed on the self-discharging carrier loader. According to the utility model, full automation in excavation, loading and transportation is realized, mine accidents are avoided, safety and intelligence are realized, and the working efficiency is improved; and the self-discharging carrier loader is charged while running at the charging section, so that the shortage of power shortage of the battery can be made up, and continuous operation is realized.
column14: INNER MONGOLIA JINHUI NAT INVESTIGATION HEAVY INDUSTRIAL CO LTD

column12: Cascade adaptive optical image blind restoration method
column13: The invention discloses a cascade adaptive optical image blind restoration method, which is applied to multi-frame image blind restoration of a ground-based telescope, and aims at solving the problem that a high-resolution adaptive optical image cannot be reconstructed robustly under the condition of relatively large data quality fluctuation in the prior art. According to the method, firstly, every five continuous clear-degraded image pairs are sent into a cascade network comprising four image recovery units, every three adjacent image pairs are sent into three image recovery units in the first stage, and pixel-level optical flow alignment is carried out in each image recovery unit; then, a space-time attention mechanism module is used for carrying out feature weight redistribution, after a clear pixel block is extracted through time sharpness prior, the two parts are output and sent into an image reconstruction model, and a hard example mining strategy is used for paying attention to an area difficult to recover on a loss function; and finally, sending the restored three frames of clear latent images into an image restoration unit in the second stage to obtain a finally restored clear adaptive optical image.
column14: YANGTZE RIVER DELTA RESEARCH INSTITUTE QUZHOU OF ELECTRONIC SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY UNIV

column12: Controlled station communication method of train control interlocking integrated system
column13: The invention discloses a controlled station communication method of a train control interlocking integrated system, and the method comprises the following steps: exchanging a first local blue network port of a first original communication board and a second local blue network port of a second original communication board in a controlled station safety platform, interchanging a first far-end blue network port of the first original communication board with a second far-end blue network port of the second original communication board to obtain a first new communication board and a second new communication board; connecting the first new communication board and the second new communication board with the trackside equipment driving and mining unit, so that a new local communication path is formed between the controlled station and the trackside equipment driving and mining unit; connecting the first new communication board and the second new communication board with a first main communication board and a second main communication board in a main control station safety platform respectively, so that a new far-end communication path is formed between the controlled station and the main control station; and constructing a new data transmission path according to the new local communication path and the new far-end communication path, thereby enabling the controlled station to carry out data forwarding.

column12: Tibia upper section cup joint prosthesis
column13: The utility model relates to a tibia upper section cup joint prosthesis which comprises a sleeve and an extension rod located on the lower portion of the sleeve, and the sleeve and the extension rod are of a personalized 3D printing integrated structure. The external shapes of the sleeve and the extension rod are matched with the proximal tibia medullary cavity of a patient, the internal shape of the sleeve is matched with the tibia platform prosthesis of the patient, and the contact surface of the sleeve and the proximal tibia medullary cavity is of a bone trabecula imitating porous structure. The sleeve and the extension rod are integrally printed through the 3D printing technology, the mechanical reliability is higher, stress shielding between the prosthesis and the far end of the tibia of a patient can be effectively relieved, and the pain feeling is relieved; the sleeve is individualized and customized for an original tibial plateau prosthesis, can be accurately matched and fixed with the tibial plateau prosthesis, is higher in adaptability, does not need to replace the tibial plateau prosthesis, and reduces bone loss of the upper tibia section of a patient. The bone contact surface of the sleeve is of a 3D-printed bone trabecula-imitating porous structure, so that recovery of near-end bone substances is facilitated, and even tendon-bone combination dead points are provided for ligaments.
column15: WANG JINCHENG;;HAN QING;;ZHANG AOBO;;GUO XINGCHEN;;ZHONG LEI

column12: DEVICES AND METHODS FOR STERILIZING CUPS AND OTHER OBJECTS
column13: In one aspect, the present disclosure is directed to devices and methods for sterilizing objects using HOCl (hypochlorous acid). A variety of objects may be sterilized, including cups, plates, utensils, toys, medical equipment, etc., in various embodiments. In one set of embodiments, chloride ions (Cl- ) in water may be reacted using an electric current to produce HOCl. In some cases, there may be sufficient Cl- in the water such that another source of Cl- is not required; for example, the water may be tap water containing some Cl-. In some cases, the water may be acidified to facilitate the production of HOCl, for example, by introducing CO2 into the water. The production of HOCl may occur relatively quickly, e.g., within a few minutes. This may allow devices to produce water that can be used to sterilize objects quickly and simply.

column12: Method for predicting buried depth of ion adsorption type rare earth deposit in weathering crust
column13: The invention discloses a method for predicting the burial depth of an ion adsorption type rare earth deposit in a weathering crust, and relates to the technical field of exploration and prospecting, and the method comprises the following steps: analyzing and calculating the mineral phase characteristic peak areas of kaolinite and halloysite through Jade 6.5 by using the analysis results of non-directional powder crystal X-ray diffraction and directional sheet X-ray diffraction of clay minerals; obtaining the content of kaolinite-halloysite minerals in the weathered crust; and calculating the kaolinite crystallinity in the weathered crust in a clay mineral powder crystal X-ray diffraction spectrum. The method comprises the following steps: determining the position of a groundwater surface fluctuation zone according to the rapid change of kaolinite-halloysite content and kaolinite crystallization index, and determining that an enrichment layer of ion adsorption state rare earth in a weathering crust is at the bottom of the groundwater fluctuation zone; according to the method, the weathering crust ion adsorption type rare earth ore body can be rapidly and accurately delineated in prospecting and exploration work by combining the correlation between specific parameters of the visible light-near infrared reflection spectrum and the kaolinite crystallinity.
column15: TAN WEI;;LUO LIANYING;;QIN XIAORONG;;CHEN KEYAN;;HAN MENGQI;;HE HONGPING;;LIANG XIAOLIANG

column12: Grinder with automatic measuring cup supplementing function
column13: The utility model relates to the related field of medical supplies, in particular to a grinder with an automatic measuring cup supplementing function, which comprises a shell, a grinding mechanism, a plurality of measuring cups, two groups of limiting components, a pushing mechanism and an overturning mechanism, and a cup inlet and a cup outlet are respectively arranged on two sides of the shell; the bottom of the grinding mechanism is provided with a discharging port used for conveying medicine powder into the shell. Each limiting assembly comprises a plurality of limiting mechanisms. The overturning mechanism is used for driving the measuring cup, closest to one side of the cup outlet, at the bottom of the pushing mechanism to move to the position under the discharging opening and overturning the measuring cup till the cup opening faces upwards. Firstly, the turnover mechanism is arranged on the side wall sliding groove and the arc-shaped groove in the shell in a matched mode, so that the plurality of measuring cups which lie flat can be accurately turned over to designated positions to receive medicine; the first sensor and the second sensor are matched with the controller to automatically control the material pushing mechanism and the turnover mechanism to move the measuring cups, operation is convenient, and efficiency is high.
column14: THE FIRST AFFILIATED HOSPITAL OF GUANGZHOU UNIV OF CHINESE MEDICINE

column12: AIR CONDITIONER
Heat and moisture exchange performance testing device for large-enthalpy-difference cooling equipment in mining area of heat damage mine
column13: The invention discloses a heat and moisture exchange performance testing device for large-enthalpy-difference cooling equipment in a mining area of a heat damage mine. The device comprises a mining area hot and humid air simulation device, a large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device, a cold source system and a test control system, wherein the hot and humid air simulation device is connected with the large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device through an air inlet end interface of the large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device, an air outlet end interface of the mining area hot and humid air simulation device and a mine mining area air supply dust simulation device; the cold source system is connected to the large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device through a tee joint, a chilled water return pipe, a large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device cold source water supply pipe and a first-stage spraying water supply pipeline; and the test control system is electrically connected with the mining area hot and humid air simulation device, the large-enthalpy-difference cooling and dehumidifying device and the cold source system. The method is suitable for testing and researching the heat and moisture exchange performance of the large-enthalpy-difference cooling equipment in the mining area, and an optimization design method and an optimization product design are researched on the basis.

column12: Filling-free cone crusher
column13: The utility model discloses a filler-free cone crusher, which relates to the field of crusher equipment, and comprises a main body, a motor is mounted on the outer wall of the main body, a second helical gear is arranged at the output end of the motor extending into the main body, a cone block is arranged in the main body, a rolling plate is sleeved on the outer wall of the cone block, and a second helical gear is arranged at the output end of the motor. And a fixing mechanism extending to the outer side of the conical block is arranged in the conical block. By arranging the single chip microcomputer, the pressure sensor and the pneumatic cylinder, when the conical block is blocked by ore with higher hardness, the ore generates extrusion force on the inner wall of the lifting frame through the rotation of the conical block, and when the pressure sensor detects that the pressure exceeds a preset value, the pressure sensor converts a signal at the moment into an electric signal and transmits the electric signal to the single chip microcomputer; the single-chip microcomputer controls the pneumatic cylinder to be started and pushes the lifting frame to ascend, so that blocked ores roll to the outer side of the main body from the bottom end of the lifting frame, and then the service life of the conical block is prolonged.

column12: HMD WITH CHARGING DEVICE

The system further including a wearable audio device having a second battery and a second connector electrically coupled to the second battery. The second connector configured to connect with the first connector to transfer power from the second battery to the first battery.

column12: Workpiece conveying mechanism
column13: The invention provides a workpiece conveying mechanism which can reduce the occupied area of a grinding device, shorten the conveying time of a workpiece and improve the productivity. A workpiece conveying mechanism for conveying a workpiece in a polishing apparatus includes a robot, a loading tray for conveying the workpiece received from the robot to the suction cup mechanism, a loading arm for supporting the loading tray and rotating freely, an unloading tray for receiving the workpiece from the suction cup mechanism and transferring the workpiece to the robot, a suction cup mechanism, and a suction cup cleaning unit for cleaning the suction cup mechanism. The loading disc and the unloading disc can rotate freely and independently, and the suction cup cleaning part cleans the suction cup mechanism, is arranged on the loading arm and rotates simultaneously with the loading disc. By means of the structure, the configuration area of the workpiece conveying mechanism can be reduced, and miniaturization of the grinding device can be achieved. In addition, the workpiece conveying time can be shortened, and the productivity can be improved.

column12: Flour mill
column13: The utility model provides a flour mill. The flour mill comprises a machine body, a motor fixed in the machine body, a cup body assembled in the machine body and detachably and fixedly connected withthe machine body, a grinding cutter set arranged at the bottom of the cup body, a temperature sensor fixed in the machine body and a control knob mounted on the machine body, the grinding cutter set comprises a rotating shaft and blades fixed to the rotating shaft, the rotating shaft penetrates through the bottom of the cup body to form rotating connection and is sealed with the bottom of the cupbody, the rotating shaft is connected with the output end of the motor, and the grinding cutter set is driven to rotate through rotation of the motor; and the control knob is electrically connected with the temperature sensor and the motor respectively, receives the detection temperature returned by the temperature sensor, and compares the detection temperature with the cup body temperature set bythe control knob to control the working state of the motor. Compared with the prior art, the flour mill disclosed by the utility model is good in reliability.
column14: ZHONGSHAN HUIREN ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO LTD

column12: Test method and test system for simulating mining of shale oil
column13: The invention provides a test method and a test system for simulating mining of shale oil. The test method for simulating exploitation of shale oil comprises the following steps: step S100, measuring the mass of a reservoir core sample, and sealing and fixing the reservoir core sample; s200, carrying out sound wave vibration on the reservoir rock core sample for a preset time length, and obtaining sound wave attribute parameters of the reservoir rock core sample; s300, carrying out microwave radiation heating on the reservoir core sample to a preset temperature in a constant-temperature environment, and keeping the preset temperature for a first preset duration; step S400, injecting supercritical carbon dioxide into the reservoir core sample, and soaking for a second preset time length so as to exploit oil and gas; and step S500, collecting decomposition products of the reservoir core sample, and recording the cumulative yield of the decomposition products. The method solves the problems that in the prior art, the mining rule and the recovery ratio of shale oil are difficult to effectively evaluate, so that the mining difficulty of the shale oil is large, and the recovery ratio is low.

column12: Edge grinding and cleaning device for building ceramic tile processing
column13: The utility model discloses an edge grinding and cleaning device for building ceramic tile processing. The utility model relates to the field of tile edging cleaning. An existing ceramic tile edge grinding and cleaning device is low in efficiency. The adjustment is inconvenient. Proposed now is the following scheme, the device comprises a supporting table, supports are arranged on the left side and the right side of the supporting table. A sliding groove is formed in the support. A first threaded rod is arranged in the sliding groove; a first sliding rail module is arranged between the supports on the left side and the right side. The lower surface of the sliding block in the first sliding rail module is fixedly connected with a second sliding rail module; a grinding machine is fixedly connected to the lower surface of a sliding block in the second sliding rail module, a limiting cylinder is arranged in the middle of the first sliding rail module, a limiting rod is arranged in the limiting cylinder, a suction cup is fixedly connected to the lower end of the limiting rod, a waterproof table is arranged on the upper surface of the supporting table, and a motor is arranged in the center of the waterproof table. The device has the characteristics of being convenient to adjust, efficient in grinding and high in automation degree.

column12: Intrinsic safety type mining communication node based on Modbus communication protocol
column13: The utility model provides an intrinsic safety type mining communication node based on a Modbus communication protocol, which comprises a shell, the shell comprises a front cover and a rear shell, andthe front cover and the rear shell are in lap joint through a mortise and tenon structure; wherein a control main board and a power supply module for supplying power to the control main board are arranged in the shell, the control main board is electrically connected with a data transceiving module and a data conversion module, and an LED signal lamp and a reset button which are connected with the control main board are arranged on the rear shell; the control main board comprises a single chip microcomputer of which the model is PIC24FJ64GA004; a lining plate is further arranged in the shell,and the power module is fixedly installed on the lining plate. The lining plate and the control main board are provided with a plurality of threaded through holes corresponding to each other, and thelining plate and the control main board are fixedly installed together through screws corresponding to the threaded through holes. The mine data acquisition and transmission device can be automatically networked underground, can be matched with various data acquisition and transmission devices to perform high-speed exchange and transmission on various acquired data, and has the advantages of longtransmission distance, lightning protection, electromagnetic interference resistance and simplicity in layout.

column12: Safety device for rehabilitation running water large pool
column13: The utility model discloses a safety device for a rehabilitation running water big pool, which comprises a bathing pool, a first guardrail is arranged in the bathing pool, a plurality of first connecting rods are fixedly connected onto the first guardrail, the other ends of the plurality of first connecting rods are fixedly connected with the inner wall of the bathing pool, and water cup holders are fixedly arranged on the plurality of first connecting rods; a center wall is fixedly arranged on the inner bottom face of the bathing pool, a second guardrail is arranged on the center wall, a plurality of second connecting rods are fixedly connected to the second guardrail, the other ends of the second connecting rods are fixedly connected with the center wall, and a plurality of fitness recovery devices are installed on the inner wall of the bathing pool. Through the arrangement of the first guardrail and the second guardrail, a patient can hold the first guardrail or the second guardrail when walking in the bathing pool, so that the patient is prevented from slipping and being injured; the water cup holder is arranged on the first connecting rod, bottled water can be placed in the water cup holder, and when a patient is thirsty, the water cup holder can be directly taken for drinking.
column14: SHENZHEN JIESHUI MEDICAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Jaw crusher ore discharge port adjusting hydraulic system and starting-up adjusting method
column13: The jaw crusher ore discharge port adjusting hydraulic system comprises a hydraulic pump, an integrated valve set, a wedge block adjusting oil cylinder and a tensioning oil cylinder, the integrated valve set comprises a valve block, an adjusting electromagnetic reversing valve, a pressurizing electromagnetic reversing valve, a one-way throttling valve, an unloading valve and a hydraulic lock, and an adjusting loop and a pressurizing loop are arranged in the valve block; the adjusting loop and the pressurizing loop pump oil through a hydraulic pump, the adjusting loop is connected with a wedge adjusting oil cylinder through an adjusting electromagnetic directional valve, and the pressurizing loop is sequentially provided with a pressurizing electromagnetic directional valve, a one-way throttle valve, an unloading valve and a hydraulic lock in the oil inlet direction of an oil way and communicated with a tensioning oil cylinder. An energy accumulator is arranged on a branch of the pressurizing loop between the unloading valve and the hydraulic lock, and a pressure sensor is arranged on a connecting oil way of the energy accumulator. The ore discharge port can be dynamically adjusted in real time under the non-stop state of the crusher, and the operation efficiency of the crusher is greatly improved.
column14: NANCHANG MINERAL MACHINE GROUP STOCK LTD COMPANY

column12: Cloth abrasion resistance testing equipment
column13: The utility model discloses cloth abrasion resistance testing equipment which comprises a main body assembly, a machine body, a support, a grinding wheel, a weight, a suction cup and a cloth sample, one side of the support is fixed with the machine body, one side of the grinding wheel is fixed with the support, one side of the weight is fixed with the support, the suction cup is arranged on one side of the weight, and the cloth sample is arranged on the suction cup. The cloth sample is positioned below the grinding wheel; the auxiliary assembly is arranged below the grinding wheel and comprises a transmission part, a fixing part, a locking part and a stretching part, the transmission part is located below the grinding wheel, the fixing part is arranged on one side of the transmission part, and the locking part is located below the fixing part. The cloth wear resistance testing equipment has the beneficial effects that the cloth wear resistance testing equipment can be used for testing the wear resistance of cloth and the tensile strength of the cloth through the arrangement of the auxiliary component, and the test result of the cloth is more fit with the reality through simulating the wear of the cloth under different use conditions.

column12: Sample treatment and extraction device for chemical analysis
column13: The utility model provides a sample processing and extracting device for chemical analysis, which comprises a machine table, a displacement mechanism which is arranged on the machine table and is used for moving a stirring cup, a crushing mechanism which is used for cutting and crushing materials in the stirring cup, and a liquid adding mechanism which is used for adding a solvent into the stirring cup for extraction, the stirring cup is placed in a cup groove corresponding to the displacement table, and the smashing mechanism comprises a lifting assembly installed at the upper end of the machine table and a stirring base installed on the lifting assembly. The stirring cup is moved on the displacement mechanism through a displacement table so that the stirring cup can be sequentially moved to the lower ends of the smashing mechanism and the liquid adding mechanism, and the displacement table conducts position monitoring through a displacement sensor so that it can be guaranteed that the placement position is accurate. The lifting assembly controls the stirring base to descend, so that the stirring rod is used for smashing the materials in the stirring cup, and the material dissolving efficiency is higher. And the liquid adding mechanism performs self-injection liquid adding on the stirring cup, so that the working efficiency of personnel is improved. And the material extraction is simpler and more convenient.
column14: XUANCHENG AOCHUANG ENV DETECTION CO LTD

column12: Food processor stable in work
column13: The utility model provides a food processor stable in work. The stirring machine comprises a machine base, a heating device and a stirring cup arranged on the machine base. A motor and a control panelare arranged in the machine base. The stirring cup comprises a cup body, a cup cover and a cup base. A crushing knife driven by a motor is arranged in the cup body; a heating disc is arranged betweenthe bottom of the cup body and the cup base; the heating disc is provided with a mounting hole for a cutter shaft of the crushing cutter to pass through; a temperature sensor is arranged on the uppersurface of the heating disc; a positioning notch is formed in the edge of the heating disc; a positioning boss matched with the positioning notch is arranged on the inner side wall of the cup base; the positioning notch and the temperature sensor are arranged along the radial direction of the heating disc; the circumferential direction of the metal disc is fixed through cooperation between the positioning notch and the positioning boss, the situation that normal work of the metal disc is affected due to circumferential rotation of the metal disc is prevented, it is guaranteed that the metal disc cannot be loosened, the problem that slurry or food materials leak out is avoided, and the work stability and reliability of the metal disc are guaranteed.

column12: Rapid installation and recovery device for micro-seismic single-axis acceleration sensor
column13: The rapid installation and recovery device comprises a paper cup, an installation head and a plurality of installation rods, the installation rods are detachably connected to the front end of the installation head in sequence through male and female connectors, and the tail end of the installation head is tightly arranged outside the front end of a sensor body in a sleeved mode. A key groove convenient for a cable at the front end of the sensor body to penetrate out is formed in the mounting head, the paper cup is detachably connected to the tail end of the sensor body through an adapter, an opening of the paper cup is arranged back to the sensor body, and resin adhesive used for being fixedly connected with a rock mass is arranged in the paper cup. According to the utility model, the mounting rod and the paper cup which are detachably connected are respectively arranged at the front end and the tail end of the sensor body, the sensor body is fed into a rock mass drill hole by using the mounting rod, and the sensor body is bonded and connected with a rock wall at the bottom of the hole by using the resin adhesive in the paper cup, so that quick mounting is realized; and during recovery, the sensor body can be separated from the rock wall at the bottom of the hole only by detaching the sensor body from the adapter, so that recovery is realized.
column14: CHANGSHA INST MINING RES CO LTD

column12: Monitoring and early warning system for crusher of dressing plant
column13: The utility model discloses a monitoring and early warning system for a crusher of a dressing plant, which relates to the technical field of ore extraction and comprises a crushing barrel, a plurality of crushing rollers are rotatably arranged on the inner wall of the crushing barrel, and a monitoring structure is further arranged on the side wall of the crushing barrel and corresponds to the crushing rollers. The monitoring structure comprises a rotating disc arranged on a rotating shaft of the crushing roller and a cover body arranged on the outer side wall of the crushing barrel, two baffles opposite in position are arranged on the circumferential wall of the rotating disc, the rotating shaft, corresponding to one end of the cover body, of the crushing roller extends into the cover body, and the rotating disc is arranged in the cover body; light transmitting holes penetrating through the cover body are formed in the positions, corresponding to the two baffles, of the cover body correspondingly, and photosensitive sensors are arranged at the positions, corresponding to the light transmitting holes, of the side wall of the crushing barrel correspondingly; the system has the advantages of convenience in use, good monitoring effect, high safety and the like.

column12: High-valued clean production process for reducing phosphorus loss of phosphogypsum by wet-process phosphoric acid device
column13: The invention discloses a high-valued clean production process for reducing phosphorus loss of phosphogypsum by a wet-process phosphoric acid device. The process comprises the following steps: separating a certain amount of steam high-temperature condensate of a concentration heat exchanger of the phosphoric acid device, and conveying the condensate to a newly added final-stage washing tank of a filter through a newly added DN50 carbon steel conveying pipeline, wherein the dosage ratio of the condensate is 10% of the dosage of washing water which is matched with production load and meets waterbalance; uniformly distributing the condensate at the temperature of more than 80 DEG C on the surface of a phosphogypsum filter cake of the filter through the final-stage washing tank; and countingthrough long-term operation data measurement, and reducing the total phosphorus loss of the phosphogypsum by 40%. According to the process disclosed by the invention, the problems that due to long-term development, rich ores in phosphate ore mountains are reduced, the adaptability of the ores in dihydrate-process phosphoric acid production is reduced after resource depletion, the phosphogypsum crystals are fine, the filtering effect is poor and the phosphorus loss of the phosphogypsum is high are solved. The process disclosed by the invention is low in investment, high in cost performance andconvenient to operate and is universally applicable to reduction of the phosphorus loss of the phosphogypsum by the wet-process phosphoric acid device.

column12: Cooling device
column13: A device, in particular for a biological sample grinding apparatus, comprising a first enclosure comprising an internal chamber intended to receive a material capable of producing cold by sublimation under normal temperature and pressure conditions and comprising an opening making it possible for a fluidic communication with an internal chamber of a second enclosure through an opening of it. The device further comprising an air circuit making the outside air communicate with the internal chamber of the first enclosure, a blasting module making it possible for an air circulation in the air circuit from the outside up into the internal chamber of the first enclosure.

column12: Ion adsorption type rare earth ore exploration method
column13: The invention discloses an ion adsorption type rare earth ore exploration method which comprises the following steps: collecting a data analysis area metallogenic geological background and metallogenic conditions, and preliminarily determining a working area range; hydrogeological survey is carried out according to a certain proportional scale in the working area range, and the distribution area and type of water in the working area range are found out in detail; water geochemical samples are collected in the working area according to a certain net degree; performing rare earth element chemical analysis on the collected water geochemical sample; tracing an ion adsorption type rare earth mineralization abnormal source area according to a rare earth element chemical analysis result, and rapidly delineating a target area. According to the method, on the basis of hydrogeological survey, the rare earth element content of water is measured, then the mineralization abnormal source area is traced, the target area is rapidly delineated, the working range is effectively narrowed, the working investment is reduced, environmental disturbance caused by blind construction of Gannan drills is avoided, and a reliable basis is provided for delineation of the ion adsorption type rare earth target area.

column12: GRINDING MILL SYSTEM AND A METHOD OF OPERATING A GRINDING MILL
column13: A method of, and system for, operating/monitoring a grinding mill. A first and second variable is obtained. The first variable relates to a first property of a current grinding mill operation. The second variable relates to a second property of the current grinding mill operation. The first and second variables are used to determine a maximum charge cell amount for the grinding mill which would result in a stable throughput/output where the throughput/output of the grinding mill remains at a pre-determined/desired target throughput/output level or higher than the pre-determined/desired target throughput/output level. Historical information may also be used in the determination. The historical information may relate to what a measured throughput of a particular historical grinding mill operation was at different times over a period of time, and for each measured throughput what its associated first variable and second variable were.

column12: Method for rapidly preparing primary slag sample from single iron ore
column13: The invention relates to a method for quickly preparing an initial slag sample from single iron ore, which comprises the following steps: carrying out simulated heating and reducibility test by adopting an iron ore high-temperature soft melting dripping device, stopping heating after iron liquid drips, taking out a crucible, naturally cooling, and cleaning, finely grinding, screening and compacting crucible residues to obtain the initial slag sample. According to the method, the primary iron slag is prepared from the residues in the crucible after the molten iron drops, the indexes such as the melting temperature, the melting temperature and the melting interval of the blast furnace primary slag are accurately measured, and a new way is provided for accurately evaluating the metallurgical performance of iron ore.

column12: Diamond high-thermal-conductivity material coating equipment
column13: The invention relates to the field of diamond plating, in particular to diamond high-thermal-conductivity material plating equipment which comprises a workbench, an index plate and a plurality of carriers, each carrier is provided with a suction cup used for tightly sucking a diamond piece, and one side of each carrier is provided with a valve core used for deflating the corresponding suction cup. A feeding station, a double-face grinding station, a double-target magnetic control coating machine and a discharging station are arranged on the working table, a coating feeding mechanism used for feeding diamond sheets into the double-target magnetic control coating machine is erected above the dividing plate, and deflation air cylinders making contact with valve cores are arranged on the feeding station, the double-face grinding station, the double-target magnetic control coating machine and the discharging station. Compared with the prior art, the diamond high-thermal-conductivity material coating equipment provided by the invention simplifies and combines a complex coating process of a diamond sheet into integrated automatic production, and has the characteristics of small occupied area, reasonable equipment layout, powerful functions, high automation degree, low failure rate, convenience in maintenance, energy conservation, environmental protection, high production efficiency and the like.

column12: Safety monitoring system of oil gas recovery device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of oil gas recovery, in particular to a safety monitoring system of an oil gas recovery device, which comprises an oil gas recovery tank and a temperature sensor, the top end face of the oil gas recovery tank is hinged with a tank door, the right end face of the oil gas recovery tank is fixedly connected with a controller, and an installation fixing assembly is arranged on the outer side of the temperature sensor. During use, the handle is rotated to drive the threaded shaft to rotate, the threaded shaft rotates to drive the baffle to slide, the baffle slides to drive the first through hole to move, the first through hole is staggered with the suction cup and the second through hole, the air inlet channel of the suction cup is closed, the temperature sensor is pressed on the oil gas recovery tank, and the oil gas recovery tank is protected. The temperature sensor can be firmly adsorbed and fixed on the oil gas recovery tank under the action of the sucker, so that the temperature sensor can be conveniently installed and fixed on the oil gas recovery tank during use, the installation and the fixation are simple and convenient, and time and labor are saved.

column12: Ship rust removal wall-climbing robot
column13: The invention provides a ship rust removal wall-climbing robot which structurally comprises an electricity supplementing end, a program contact layer, a magnetic suction cup, a magnetic climbing wheel and a rust removal body, the electricity supplementing end is embedded into the upper end of the program contact layer, the magnetic suction cup is installed at the lower end of the program contact layer, and the magnetic climbing wheel is in clearance fit with the magnetic suction cup; on the basis of a direction adjusting assembly, a crushing body, a rotating body and other parts which are additionally arranged on the middle section of the front end of a program contact layer, the crushing body can be driven by program electrification rotation of the rotating body and an electric connecting body to assist a rust removal body in rapidly removing stubborn rust blocks on the surface layer of a ship body, and the stubborn rust blocks are broken open from the outside; the rust removing body can directly remove the rust blocks, so that the speed of removing the stubborn rust blocks by the whole robot is increased, the rollover condition is avoided, then the rotating body and the crushing body can be loosened under the matching of linear movement of the shifting block on the support and the slide way, and the rotating body and the crushing body can be conveniently disassembled through the rotating body and the crushing body.

column12: Calibration method for mining laser target
column13: The invention discloses a calibration method for a mining laser target. The system according to the method comprises the mining laser target, a liftable total station, a reference prism and a laser target stabilizing support. The interior of the mining laser target comprises a clinometer, an optical sensor and an installation support, and the mining laser target is divided into horizontal axis calibration and longitudinal axis calibration. In the mining laser target calibration process, the laser target support is leveled to enable the degrees of two axes of an internal inclinometer to be minimum, the liftable total station is leveled, and the positions of the prism and the mining laser target under a total station coordinate system and the angle of incident light are established through precise exchange of the prism and the mining laser target and measurement of the total station; meanwhile, the light spot centroid of the light emitted by the total station in the mining laser target is recorded so that the incident light of the total station is in one-to-one correspondence with the light spot centroid, and the calibration of the transverse axis and the longitudinal axis of the mining laser target is completed. The method is suitable for completing high-precision mining laser target calibration under the condition that the large-shell laser target cannot be turned over due to the size.

column12: SINTERING MACHINE
column13: To provide a sintering machine suppressing deterioration in the productivity of sintered ores.SOLUTION: A sintering machine 1 comprises: a crusher 17 pulverizing sinter cakes produced and separated in pallets 10 to produce sintered ores; a crushing guide 16 guiding the sinter cakes to the crusher; a back chute 19 recovering cake pieces separated from the sinter cake and dropped to a side opposite to the crushing guide via an opening part formed at a side opposite to a side guiding to the crusher with respect to the crushing guide; a cake piece detection sensor 20 acquiring cake piece information showing a state of the cake pieces present at a region including the opening part; and a control device 21 determining whether the opening part is clogged by the cake pieces or not based on the cake piece information and outputting a clogging signal showing that the opening part is clogged when it determines that the opening part is clogged by the cake pieces.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: Anonymous privacy protection method for multi-sensitive attribute data release
column13: The invention discloses an anonymous privacy protection method for multi-sensitive attribute data release. The method comprises the steps of 1, calculating correlation among attributes in an originaldata table, and defining attribute categories; 2, grouping all the attributes according to the correlation among the attributes; 3, sorting the groups from high to low according to the correlation among the attributes; 4, calculating the occurrence frequency of the sensitive attribute values in each group, and judging whether the attribute values need to be protected or not; 5, exchanging the sensitive attribute value needing to be protected and the associated attribute thereof with the sensitive attribute value needing not to be protected; 6, performing frequent item set mining on the relatedattributes; and step 7, generating an anonymous equivalent group by using a clustering technology, wherein each sensitive attribute in the anonymous equivalent group satisfies L diversity. By reducing the anonymity rate and jointly replacing the associated attributes, the availability of the data is improved while the privacy protection strength is ensured.

column12: Speed characteristic comparative analysis method based on different medium proportioning schemes of discrete element method
column13: The invention relates to a speed characteristic comparative analysis method based on different medium proportioning schemes of a discrete element method, and belongs to the technical field of ore grinding optimization. After three-dimensional modeling is carried out on the mill, discrete element analogue simulation of a field medium proportioning scheme and a theoretical medium proportioning scheme is carried out under the same condition. Dividing a particle motion state diagram in a selected period into 30 * 30 grid regions, respectively counting position coordinates and velocity vector coordinates of particle swarms in grids on an x plane and a z plane, and averaging the position coordinates and the velocity vector coordinates; points with the particle swarm speed being zero in the mill are extracted and connected, horizontal and vertical balance planes in the x and z directions are obtained, and the balance plane is obtained by removing the redundant part at the intersection point of the two balance planes. And quantitatively comparing speed characteristic relations of particle swarms in the grinding machine under different medium proportioning schemes by taking a balance surface as a reference, and selecting a better ore grinding medium proportioning scheme. The method has high practical application value.

column12: Media data wireless transmission equipment
column13: The utility model discloses media data wireless transmission equipment, which comprises a router body, a shell, a fixing mechanism and a dust removal mechanism, wherein the fixing mechanism and the dust removal mechanism are arranged on the shell; the fixing mechanism comprises a backup plate, an adsorption bolt, a connecting plate, a suction cup and a handle. The dust removal mechanism comprises an ion fan, an air outlet pipe and an air outlet hopper, and the ion fan is arranged on the surface of the front side of the backup plate and is close to the top surface of the interior of the shell. The fixing effect is more stable, and the problem that equipment is easy to damage due to random placement is avoided; the ion fan ionizes air and blows the air to the router body through the air outlet pipe and the air outlet hopper, the ionized air eliminates static electricity on the surface of the router body and prevents dust and sundries from being adsorbed by the static electricity, dust is blown out of the heat dissipation holes and is eliminated, and the service life of the device is prolonged.

column12: Automatic potentiometric titration method for total amount of exchangeable basic groups in acidic and neutral soil
column13: An automatic potentiometric titration method for the total amount of exchangeable basic groups in acidic and neutral soil comprises the following steps: step 1, weighing an air-dried soil sample, adding the air-dried soil sample into an ammonium acetate solution, and uniformly stirring and mixing in an ultrasonic cleaner; collecting the centrifuged supernate, repeating the steps, and finally fixing the volume of the exchange liquid by using an ammonium acetate solution; 2, transferring the exchange liquid, evaporating to dryness under a water bath heating condition, and firing an evaporating dish after evaporation to dryness in a muffle furnace at high temperature; accurately adding a hydrochloric acid standard solution after cooling, adding hydrochloric acid into the air-dried soil sample, promoting dissolution under a water bath heating condition, transferring into a flat-bottom sample cup prepared by a potentiometric titrator after cooling, repeatedly cleaning the evaporation dish with carbon-dioxide-free water, and continuously transferring into the sample cup; and 3, titrating the solution in the step 2 by using a potentiometric titrator in a dynamic titration mode, recording a titration curve, carrying out primary differential processing on data to obtain the volume of the sodium hydroxide titrant corresponding to a titration jump point, and substituting the volume into the following formula to calculate the total amount of the exchangeable base.

column12: Protective gas chamber structure for sensitive element of mining sensor
column13: A protective gas chamber structure for a sensitive element of a mining sensor provided by the present invention comprises a housing, a retainer, a joint, a lining and a filter screen, the retainer is connected to the outer side of the lower part of the housing, the joint is connected to the upper part of the housing, the lower end of the housing is provided with an gas inlet and an gas exchange port, the inner wall of the housing is provided with a clamping groove for assembling the filter screen, and the clamping groove is communicated with the gas exchange port and the gas inlet. The gas inlet is bent outwards to form a circle of boss, the boss is located under the ventilation opening, and the lining is detachably laid and attached to the inner wall of the chamber. According to the gas chamber structure, gas convection is formed in the chamber through the gas exchange port, the detected gas can rapidly enter the chamber, the sensitive element can respond in time and rapidly detect the gas, and the accuracy of detection data is improved; the arranged waterproof structure can prevent water from entering the chamber to influence the sensitive element, and also can prevent the water from forming a water sealing film on the filter screen to cause that the detected gas cannot quickly enter the chamber; and the water spraying requirement of IPX5 and the dustproof requirement of IP6X can be met.

column12: System for recovering micro-fine particle fluorite in multi-metal tailings by adopting flotation column-flotation machine
column13: The utility model discloses a system for recovering micro-fine particle fluorite in multi-metal tailings by adopting a flotation column-flotation machine. The system comprises a slurry-making stirringtank, a roughing flotation column, a concentration flotation system, a scavenging flotation system, a feeding pump tank and a feeding pump. According to the utility model, CSF micro-bubble static flotation column and flotation machine combined process equipment is adopted; the method has the characteristics of short process flow, high ore dressing enrichment ratio, small occupied area, high automation degree, low operation cost, environmental friendliness and the like; compared with other methods, the method has the advantages that the grade and the recovery rate of the associated fluorite inthe tailings can be greatly increased, the comprehensive utilization rate of secondary mineral resources is effectively increased, and good economic benefits and social benefits are achieved.

column12: Suction filtration device of soil cation exchange capacity tester
column13: The utility model discloses a suction filtration device of a soil cation exchange capacity tester. The device comprises a support frame, a cylinder, a sample bottle and a distillation cup, wherein a filter membrane is arranged in the sample bottle; the sample bottle is of a structure with two open ends; an annular boss is arranged on the inner wall close to the bottom of the sample bottle; the inner wall of the bottom of the sample bottle is connected with a filter screen through threads, the filter membrane is arranged between the annular boss and the filter screen, the lower end of the sample bottle is sleeved with a sealing bottom ring in butt joint with the inner wall of the bottom of the distillation cup, a suction filtration groove is formed in the middle of the inner wall of the bottom of the distillation cup, and a suction filtration nozzle and a flushing nozzle are arranged at the lower end of the distillation cup. The problem that a soil sample is lost between the edge of thefilter membrane and the sample bottle is solved by structurally improving the fixation of the filter screen at the bottom of the sample bottle; the washing nozzle is additionally arranged at the bottom of the distillation cup, so that a cavity between the distillation cup and the sample bottle can be subjected to back washing, the problem that filter washing liquid residues enter the final receiving bottle along with steam is solved, and the accuracy of experimental data is improved.

column12: Electrochemical analyzer for pesticide residues of freeze-dried marine products
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of food detection, in particular to a freeze-dried marine product pesticide residue electrochemical analyzer which comprises a main machine, a sliding rod is arranged on a supporting column on the left side of the top of the main machine in a sliding mode, a constant-temperature magnetic stirrer is fixedly arranged on the top of the main machine, and a detection cup is arranged above the constant-temperature magnetic stirrer. According to the utility model, the constant-temperature magnetic stirrer is arranged on the main machine, so that the reagent in the detection cup can be stirred at a constant temperature, the detection precision is improved, and the electrochemical biosensor is arranged, so that when in use, marine products are crushed, soaked in distilled water and then added into the detection cup, and the reaction reagent is dropwise added by utilizing the dropping pipette; meanwhile, the constant-temperature magnetic stirrer is started for stirring, the electrochemical biosensor detects electrochemical information of the solution in the period and transmits data to the controller, after the controller analyzes the electrochemical information, the detection information is displayed on the display screen, detection operation is completed, and the equipment is convenient to operate, convenient to carry, accurate in detection and suitable for application and popularization.

column12: Substrate thinning device
column13: The utility model discloses a substrate thinning device. The substrate thinning device comprises a base; the thinning module is arranged at the upper part of the base; the turntable is arranged at the upper part of the base and is positioned at the side part of the thinning module; a sucking disc for carrying a substrate is arranged above the turntable; the position checking assembly comprises a rotating part, a swing arm and a measuring part, one end of the swing arm is connected to the rotating part, and the other end of the swing arm is provided with the measuring part; the measuring part is provided with a detection sensor which can move to the position above the suction cup through a swing arm. A grinding wheel of the thinning module moves towards the measuring part, so that a detection sensor of the measuring part abuts against the suction cup; the detection sensor triggers a signal that the grinding wheel stops moving downwards so as to obtain the distance between the grinding wheel and the suction cup.

column12: Method for determining static reserve threshold value of fault-karst oil reservoir, electronic equipment and medium
column13: The invention discloses a method for determining a static reserve threshold value of a fault-karst oil reservoir, electronic equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an actual well test interpretation curve according to well test monitoring data; establishing well test curve theoretical charts of different threshold values through earthquake engraving; and comparing and analyzing the well testing curve theoretical charts with different threshold values and the actual well testing interpretation curve, and taking the threshold value corresponding to the well testing curve with the highest fitting precision as an accurate threshold value. According to the method, data are monitored through pressure recovery well testing, the seismic attribute threshold value in the fault-karst reservoir static reserve calculation process is determined by adopting a numerical well testing means, the influence of factors such as a working system and a mining speed on the seismic threshold value is effectively eliminated, the uncertainty of fault-karst reservoir static reserve calculation is reduced, and the fault-karst reservoir static reserve calculation accuracy is improved. And a theoretical basis for calculating the reservoir reserves of the fault solution is tamped.

column12: Geothermal cascade mining device and method
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of geothermal energy development, and particularly discloses a terrestrial heat cascade mining device and method.The terrestrial heat cascade mining device comprises a heat exchanger, a temperature and pressure sensor, an inner pipe, an outer sleeve and cascade injection and production equipment; a temperature and pressure sensor is used for detecting the temperature of a geothermal reservoir and segmenting the geothermal reservoir, an outer sleeve is fractured, circulating geothermal water is injected through a first water pump, and the circulating geothermal water sequentially flows through the space between an inner pipe and the outer sleeve, a fracturing hole of an exploitation section, the geothermal reservoir, a fracturing hole of the next section of the exploitation section, a uniflow hole pipe of the next section of the exploitation section, the inner pipe and a second water pump. Finally, the heat is converted and conveyed to a user side through the heat exchanger; and when the temperature of the single layer does not meet the heating requirement, the next layer is mined, and terrestrial heat cascade mining is finally achieved through coordination and cooperation of different sections of single-flow hole pipes and packers. The terrestrial heat cascade mining equipment is simple and easy to implement, intelligent layering is conducted on terrestrial heat reservoirs, terrestrial heat mining schemes of different terrestrial heat layer sections are formulated, damage to the reservoirs is reduced to the maximum extent, and the utilization rate of terrestrial heat wells is increased.
