column12: Automatic feeding and discharging mechanism
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic feeding and discharging mechanism. Wherein a vibration feeder and a rotary table are installed at the top of the table plate, the vibration feeder conveys pellets to be tested into a receiving cup on the rotary table through a receiving pipe, when the pellets pass through the receiving pipe, a feeding movable blade can rotate when being impacted, and the feeding movable blade shields a feeding sensor during rotation to form a feeding signal to achieve automatic counting; preferably, the number of the material receiving through holes in the rotary disc is three, after feeding is completed in the material receiving cup on one material receiving through hole, the material receiving cup is made to rotate to the detection position through a motor or other rotating devices connected with a connecting shaft of the rotary disc, and the other material receiving cup is made to rotate to the position below the discharging end of the material receiving pipeto continue feeding. After the test is finished, the turntable continues to rotate, the crushed materials in the material receiving cups move to the crushed material discharging holes along with thematerial receiving cups and fall off to be discharged, at the moment, one material receiving cup after feeding starts to be tested, the other material receiving cup starts to feed, and the cycle is repeated.
column14: SHAOXING DONGJING MACHINERY INSTR EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Automatic pellet pressure testing machine
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic pellet pressure testing machine. Wherein a vibration feeder, a rotary feeding and discharging device and a pressure testing device are mounted at the top of the machine table; a vibration feeder conveys pellets to be tested into a receiving cup on a rotary disc through a receiving pipe, when the pellets pass through the receiving pipe, a feeding movable blade is impacted to rotate, and when the feeding movable blade rotates, a feeding sensor is shielded to form a feeding signal, so that automatic counting is achieved; after feeding is completed in one material receiving cup, the material receiving cup is rotated to the position below a pressure head of a pressure testing device through a rotary disc servo motor to be subjected to pressure testing, and at the moment, the other material receiving cup is rotated to the position below a material receiving pipe to be fed; after the test is completed, the turntable servo motor continues to control theturntable to rotate, the crushed materials in the material receiving cup move to the crushed material discharging hole along with the material receiving cup to fall off and be discharged, and at themoment, other material receiving cups perform test and feeding operations, so that the test efficiency is high.
column14: SHAOXING DONGJING MACHINERY INSTR EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: High-speed bone meal pulverizer
column13: The utility model discloses a high-speed bone meal crusher which comprises a rack, the crushing box is fixedly arranged at the top of the rack; the crushing assembly is arranged at the bottom in the crushing box; the high-speed motor is arranged at the bottom of the crushing box and used for driving the crushing assembly to rotate at a high speed; the thermocouple sensor is arranged at the bottom in the crushing box; the microcontroller is arranged on one side of the rack and electrically connected with the high-speed motor and the thermocouple sensor, and the microcontroller is electrically connected with a temperature display meter and a timer; and the suction cup assembly is fixedly arranged at the bottom end of the rack. The high-speed crusher disclosed by the utility model is high in crushing efficiency, and can monitor the temperature in a bone meal crushing process in real time, so that the crushing quality of bone meal is ensured.

column12: Automated Consumable Exchangers
column13: A consumable exchanger for a plasma arc material processing system is provided. The consumable exchanger comprises a base portion and a holder shaped to retain at least a portion of a consumable component of a plasma arc torch. The holder is operably connected to the base portion. The consumable exchanger further comprises a driver connected to the holder. The driver is configured to rotate the consumable component relative to at least one of the base portion or the plasma arc torch to perform one of engage the consumable component to the plasma arc torch or disengage the consumable component from the plasma arc torch.

column12: Machine-made sand production quality informatization monitoring system based on liquid dispersion
column13: The utility model discloses a machine-made sand production quality informatization monitoring system based on liquid dispersion. The machine-made sand production quality informatization monitoring system is composed of a sampling device, a sample disperser, a concentration controller, a grain shape analysis device, a data processing and transmission module and an excess material recovery module. The test host sends a control command, and the water inlet pipe 4 adds water to the sample cup 5 to a preset value; a sample in the sampling device 2 falls into the sample cup 5, and the stirrer 6 andthe ultrasonic disperser 8 uniformly stir the sample; a sample with proper concentration flows to the sample pool 11, the high-speed camera 12 collects image information of the flowing sample, and a test result is synchronously transmitted to the informatization management platform; and a tested sample is collected in a recovery barrel 15 and is discharged to a specified position by a sewage pump16. The utility model solves the technical problem that a dry monitoring system needs to dry a sample and disperse micron-sized powder, is particularly suitable for production monitoring in a complexenvironment, can monitor key technical parameters of quality in real time, and provides an effective method for quality control of machine-made sand.

column12: Method for efficiently positioning metallogenic rock mass of skarn deposit
column13: The invention discloses a method for efficiently positioning ore-forming rock mass of a skarn ore deposit. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a sample; grinding the collected sample into a probe piece, and determining and marking a garnet single mineral crystal area; carrying out LA-ICPMS in-situ microcell element analysis on the marked region to obtain the content of microelements, and calculating to obtain the content ratio (L/H) of light rare earth to heavy rare earth; substituting (L/H) into exponential models D = a '(L/H) b and D = a' (L/H) b + c and a logarithmic model D = a '(ln (L/H) + 4) (b + 0.1); setting a parameter range; performing parameter optimization on the three models by utilizing a grid search method; determining an optimal model and corresponding parameters a ', b and c through continuous loop iteration by taking the minimum R value as a limiting condition; substituting data of all sampling points into the optimal model, calculating a D value of each sampling point, and drawing a circular ring by taking the corresponding sampling point as a circle center and the D value as a radius; all circular ring intersection points are judged as the coordinates of the metallogenic rock mass, and the R value serves as a buffer area of the metallogenic rock mass to be delineated.

column12: Multi-layer optical network management graphical user interface and visualizations
column13: A network management system includes a network interface communicatively coupled to one or more network elements in a network for exchanging Operations, Administration, Maintenance, and Provisioning (OAM&P) data; a processor communicatively coupled to the network interface; and memory storing instructions that, when executed, cause the processor to obtain the OAM&P data from the network, provide a Graphical User Interface (GUI) based on the network from the OAM&P data, wherein the GUI includes a network map which provides a topological view and a subway view which provides a detailed device-level view which is more granular than the network map and illustrates individual components at each site, receive a selection from a user of a service in the network, and update the GUI to highlight the service in the network map and illustrate the associated sites in the subway view.

column12: An end assembly of orthopaedic joint replacement surgical system
column13: The utility model relates to a tail end assembly of an orthopedic joint replacement surgery system. The device comprises a shell fixed to a robot arm, a main shaft is arranged in the shell, the main shaft is rotationally connected with the shell and can slide in the axis direction of the shell, a grinding shaft is arranged at the end of the main shaft, an acetabulum file is arranged at the end ofthe grinding shaft, and a fixing device used for fixing the grinding shaft is arranged at the end of the main shaft; the mounting shaft is fixed at the end part of the main shaft through a fixing device; and an acetabulum cup is arranged on the mounting shaft. During operation, the grinding shaft is fixed to one end of the spindle through the fixing device, the other end of the spindle is connected with the electric drill, and after the robot arm locates the spindle, the electric drill is started and drives the spindle and the grinding shaft to rotate, and meanwhile the spindle is pushed to slide on the shell to grind acetabulum. After grinding is finished, the grinding shaft is detached, the installation shaft is replaced, the electric drill is detached, the main shaft is directly knocked, the acetabular cup on the installation shaft can be knocked into the acetabular fossa, and the tail end assembly does not need to be replaced.
column14: JIANGSU KERUNXI MEDICAL SCIENCE AND TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD

column12: AUTOMATED SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING OPERATING MODE OF CONE CRUSHER
column13: FIELD: control systems.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to automated control system of working mode of cone crusher and can be used in mining industry and construction materials industry. Automated system comprises feed conveyor 2 with controlled drive 3, crusher motor consumed power sensor 5, material loading level sensor 6 in crushing chamber, capacity controller 4 of feeding conveyor 2, output of which is connected to input of controlled drive 3 of feed conveyor 2. At that, in addition, the automated system comprises linear movement sensors 7 mounted on the base in the vertical plane of the crusher support ring, note here that outputs of engine consumed power sensor 5, material level sensor 6 in crushing chamber and linear displacement control sensors 7 are connected to input of capacity controller 4 of feed conveyor 2.EFFECT: automated system increases accuracy of adjustment of crusher operating mode, achieving maximum permissible capacity of crusher with invariability of granulometric composition of crushing product.1 cl, 3 dwg

column12: Tea drinking machine
column13: The utility model discloses a tea making machine which comprises a machine shell, a tea making cup detachably installed on the machine shell and a first-stage heating device arranged in the machine shell and used for heating water and outputting the heated water into the tea making cup, and the tea making cup is provided with a second-stage heating device and a temperature sensor. Hot water in the tea making cup can be secondarily heated through the second-stage heating device, the heating efficiency is higher, meanwhile, the temperature of the hot water in the tea making cup is detected through the temperature sensor, the hot water in the tea making cup can be accurately heated to the preset temperature through the second-stage heating device, and the optimal tea making temperature is obtained; for example, tea water can reach 90 DEG C or above, so that the requirement for soaking different types of tea leaves is met, the taste of the tea is rapidly leached, and the taste of the tea water is improved; meanwhile, the secondary heating device can conduct secondary heating on the hot water in the tea making cup until the hot water is boiled, so that the tea boiling function is achieved, and different use requirements of different consumers are met.

column12: Rock processing apparatus and mechanical combination
column13: The invention relates to a rock processing plant for comminuting and/or sizing granular mineral material, comprising: a material filling plant having a material buffer; at least one working unit consisting of at least one crushing device and at least one screening device; at least one conveying device for conveying material between the two device parts; the at least one unloading conveying device is used for conveying the processed materials to the pile; a control device; at least one stack sensor for detecting at least one state of the stack or/and a change over time, the stack sensor being connected to the control device; and at least one output device for outputting information, wherein the output device is connected to the control device. According to the invention, the control device is designed to ascertain mining time information relating to the time of execution of future mining of the pile on the basis of the at least one detection signal during operation of discontinuous mining with the at least one pile, and the output device is designed to output the ascertained mining time information.

column12: Iodine absorption value tester
column13: The utility model discloses an iodine absorption value determinator, which belongs to the field of iodine absorption value detection, and comprises a main machine, an operation table is arranged on the top surface of the main machine, a groove is formed in the top surface of the operation table, a reagent bottle is arranged in the groove, an inclined plate is fixedly connected to the top surface of the operation table close to the front side, and the inclined plate is fixedly connected with the operation table. An exchange unit is arranged on the top face of the operation table, a magnetic stirrer is fixedly connected to the right side wall of the main machine, a measuring cup is arranged on the top face of the magnetic stirrer, a measuring electrode is arranged in the measuring cup, and a support is installed on the side wall of the main machine. And moreover, a quantitative reducing agent can be added, so that test data is more accurate and reliable.

column12: Iron ore powder liquid phase fluidity detection method based on sintering actual production conditions
column13: The invention discloses an iron ore powder liquid phase fluidity detection method based on sintering actual production conditions, and belongs to the technical field of ironmaking sintering. The method comprises the following steps: taking the actual industrial analysis CaO mass fraction of sinter as a constant target value; selecting calcium ash in a sintering production field as a flux, and determining that the mass fraction of CaO in a mixture is a batching structure with a set constant target value according to the mass fractions of the calcium ash, iron ore powder SiO2 and CaO; pressing a sample with a fixed specification by using a grinding tool, and simulating a sintering temperature rise curve to sinter the sample; utilizing organic glass with equidistant grids to calculate the vertical projection area of the fused sample by applying a differential method and a cutting compensation method; characterizing the ratio of the vertical projection area of the sample after melting to the vertical projection area of the sample before melting as a liquid phase fluidity index; taking an index mean value of a plurality of groups of samples of a single iron ore powder as the liquid phase fluidity of the iron ore powder under the actual sintering production condition, and guiding the sintering ore blending according to the complementation principle.

column12: INHALER SET
column13: An inhaler set is described comprising an inhaler (10) and a sensor unit (40), which can be exchangeably attached to the inhaler (10) for detecting the use of the inhaler (10). The inhaler (10) is designed as a powder inhaler and has a housing (12) with a delivery opening (14) designed as a mouthpiece and with a plurality of air inlet openings (20, 22), wherein powder to be inhaled is stored inside the inhaler (10) prior to discharge, said powder being atomized and being transported to the delivery opening (14) by means of an air flow caused by the inhalation from the air inlet openings (20, 22) to the delivery opening (14). The sensor unit (40) is provided for attachment to the inhaler (10), wherein the sensor unit can be attached to the inhaler (10) in such a way that at least one first air inlet opening (20) is covered by the sensor unit (40) in the attached state and at least one second air inlet opening (22) is not covered by the sensor unit (40) in the attached state. The sensor unit (40) comprises at least one inhalation sensor (82) for detecting the air flow through the first air inlet opening (20).

column12: Embedded features for interlocks using additive manufacturing
column13: The present disclosure describes a method and apparatus for determining whether components in a semiconductor manufacturing system are authorized for use in that system. By embedding an identification feature in the component, it is possible for a controller to determine whether that component is qualified for use in the system. Upon detection of an unauthorized component, the system may alert the user or, in certain embodiments, stop operating of the system. This identification feature is embedded in a component by using an additive manufacturing process that allows the identification feature to be embedded in the component without subjecting the identification feature to extreme temperatures.
column32: International Search Report and Written Opinion dated May 7, 2019 in corresponding PCT application No. PCT/US2019/013014.

column12: Cutting device and method of 3D printing substrate with positioning structure
column13: The invention discloses a cutting device and method of 3D printing substrate with a positioning structure and belongs to the technical field of 3D printing. The cutting device of the 3D printing substrate with the positioning structure comprises a base, stand columns are arranged at the two sides of the base, a cross rod is arranged between the top ends of the two sets of stand columns, a motor isarranged on the base, a rotating shaft of the motor is coaxially connected with a driving gear, and the driving gear is engaged with a driven gear. The driven gear sleeves a rotating shaft, the top end of the rotating shaft is fixedly connected with a rotating box, a vacuum machine is arranged in the rotating box, an air suction port of the vacuum machine is connected with a suction cup through apipeline, the center of the top end of the rotating box is fixedly connected with a bottom end pressing plate, a base plate is arranged at the top end of the bottom end pressing plate, a thread cylinder is arranged at the top end of the cross rod, and a thread column matched with the thread cylinder is sleeved with the thread cylinder. A top end pressing plate is arranged at the bottom end of thethread column, the stand columns are sleeved with stand column sleeving blocks, and the sleeving blocks are fixedly connected with a grinding mechanism and a cutting mechanism. A base plate can be cut and ground by the device, accordingly, the regularity of the base plate can be greatly improved, and subsequent printing work is facilitated.

column12: In-vitro model and method for measuring silver ion release of silver-containing dressing
column13: The invention relates to the field of research model and method for evaluation of an anti-bacterial property of a dressing, and in particular to an in-vitro model for measuring silver ion release of asilver-containing dressing. The in-vitro model includes a test cup and a culture tray; the test cup includes a raised portion and a sunken portion that are fixedly connected; a top surface of the raised portion is higher than a top surface of the sunken portion; a cavity is arranged in the test cup; an opening communicating with the cavity is formed on the top surface of the sunken portion; a liquid feeding port communicating with the cavity is formed on the raised portion; and a groove is formed on the culture tray. The invention further provides a method for measuring the silver ion releaseof the silver-containing dressing. According to the in-vitro model and the method provided by the invention, different types of wounds can be simulated; and through an in-vitro test of measuring silver ion release amount and release curve quantitatively at different time points after measuring a contact of a silver-containing dressing specimen with a percolate of a simulated wound, an effective component and an accumulative ion amount of the silver ion released in a dressing product are reflected scientifically and intuitively, and thus a release amount of the silver ion of the silver-containing dressing in a simulated clinical use state is evaluated dynamically.
column14: SHANDONG QUALITY INSPECTION CENTER FOR MEDICAL DEVICES

column12: Mining intrinsic safety type temperature sensor
column13: The utility model discloses a mining intrinsic safety type temperature sensor. The mining intrinsic safety type temperature sensor comprises an electric appliance box, a heat exchange tube, a heat exchange box and an exhaust fan. Wherein a temperature sensor body is arranged in the electric appliance box. A signal output end and a signal input end are fixed to the side wall of the electric appliance box, and air holes are formed in the outer wall of the electric appliance box. The heat exchange tube is a straight tube with two closed ends, and a liquid working medium which is heated and evaporated is stored in the heat exchange tube. The lower portion of the heat exchange tube penetrates through the top wall of the electric appliance box and then is located in an inner cavity of the electric appliance box, and the outer wall of the heat exchange tube is fixedly connected with the top wall of the electric appliance box. The upper end of the heat exchange pipe penetrates through the bottom face of the heat exchange box, then is located in an inner cavity of the heat exchange box and is fixedly connected with the heat exchange box, the left end and the right end of the heat exchange box are open, and the exhaust fan is fixedly connected to one port of the heat exchange box. According to the utility model, the heat pipe cooling technology is utilized, so that the heat dissipation effect can be enhanced, and the problem that a filter screen needs to be frequently replaced and cleaned due to an auxiliary ventilation mechanism on the sensor is solved.

column12: Simulated graystone lunar-like soil and preparation method thereof
column13: The invention relates to simulated graystone lunar soil and a preparation method thereof. The invention provides a preparation method of simulated basalt lunar soil, which is characterized by comprising the following steps: (1) mixing 35-45% by mass of basalt, 5-8% by mass of elongated stone, 5-8% by mass of pyroxene, 35-45% by mass of hedenbergite and 6-10% by mass of calcium iron ore to obtain a mixed raw material; (2) crushing the mixed raw material for multiple times, and sorting fragments with specified sizes; (3) grinding the fragments to obtain a coarse particle finished product with a specified size; (4) screening the coarse particles by using screens with different screen holes to obtain fine particles with different particle sizes; and (5) grading the fine particles with different particle sizes according to a specified percentage to obtain the simulated graystone lunar soil. The component composition and particle size distribution simulation of the lunar soil sample are considered, so that the application range of the simulated lunar soil can be widened.

column12: Intelligent switch device
column13: The intelligent switching device comprises a pressure sensor, a driving part, a one-way valve, an inner sleeve and an outer sleeve. The inner sleeve is fixedly sleeved with the outer sleeve, the outer sleeve is used for installing the intelligent switch device on the wall face of a downhole tool, the two sides of the wall face of the downhole tool are the collecting side and the mining side respectively, the collecting side is communicated with a reservoir, and the mining side is communicated with the ground; an overflowing channel for communicating the collecting side with the mining side is arranged in the outer sleeve; the pressure sensor is used for sensing pressure sent by the ground and providing a pressure signal; the one-way valve is arranged in the overflowing channel and is configured to allow fluid to flow from the collecting side to the mining side and prevent the fluid from flowing from the mining side to the collecting side; the driving piece is connected with the pressure sensor and the one-way valve and used for driving the one-way valve to close the overflowing channel according to the pressure signal. According to the intelligent switch device, the service life of an oil and gas well can be prolonged, and the yield and the recovery efficiency are improved.
column14: BEIJING HELI QIDIAN TECH CO LTD

column12: Horse belly edge table board production line
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of horse belly edge table board production, in particular to a horse belly edge table board production line which comprises a plate conveying frame, a suction cup hanger is erected on the top of the plate conveying frame, a plate feeding frame is placed on one side of the plate conveying frame, and a water jet cutter is placed on the other side of the plate conveying frame. A plate turnover machine is placed at the tail end of the plate conveying frame, a positioning conveying frame is placed at the tail end of the plate turnover machine, a first edge grinding machine is placed at the tail end of the positioning conveying frame, and a first positioning rotary table is placed at the tail end of the first edge grinding machine. According to the utility model, the four edge grinding machines automatically grind the edges of the plate, the periphery can be processed at one time, the positioning is accurate, the damage is reduced, the cleaning machine can clean and dry the plate, and the surface of the plate package is not easy to scratch, so that the production process of the horse-belly-edge table board is completed, the standardization, mechanization and automation of the production of the horse-belly-edge table board are realized, and the production efficiency is improved. And the production efficiency is greatly improved, and the production quality of the horse belly edge table board is also ensured.
column14: FOSHAN LANGGE MACHINERY EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Payment user management method, device and system
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a payment user management method, device and system, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining user information according to a registration or login eventof a user on a target service platform; according to the user information, obtaining order information of a payment user which is matched with the user and purchased on an external cooperation platform; associating the user with the payment user in the order information; judging whether the user meets the condition of the payment user or not, and if not, generating to-be-activated data and generating an activation task according to the to-be-activated data; and when the user completes the activation task, issuing the user rights and interests corresponding to the payment user to the user. According to the invention, full mining of payment users of an external cooperation platform is realized; a non-target service platform registered user, a non-target service platform activated user and the like which have purchased a payment user on an external cooperation platform can be quickly converted into the payment user of a target service platform without complex exchange operation, and thesales process of the payment user is optimized.

column12: Charging and discharging integrated mining sensor battery cavity and mining sensor
column13: The utility model discloses a charging and discharging integrated mining sensor battery cavity and a mining sensor, and solves the problems that the existing mining sensor cannot meet the increasinglyprolonged mining working surface, the power supply is insufficient, and wired power supply equipment frequently moves the operation level. The lithium ion battery comprises a battery cavity, whereinthe battery cavity is a cuboid cavity made of a metal material; a battery pack, a fixing support and a charging control panel are sequentially arranged in the battery cavity from bottom to top, and the battery pack, the fixing support and the charging control panel are assembled in the battery cavity and independently encapsulated into a whole. Wherein the battery pack is used for providing a power supply for the charging control panel, the fixing support is used for supporting and fixing the charging control panel, and a charging and discharging management module, an electric quantity management module and a safety barrier circuit module are integrated on the charging control panel and used for achieving charging and discharging integrated safety management. And connecting parts fixedly connected with a mining sensor are arranged on the two sides of the battery cavity.

column12: Following type soybean milk machine
column13: The utility model discloses an accompanying type soybean milk machine, which relates to the technical field of life electric appliances, and comprises a through cup body and a heating plate connected with the cup body in a sealing way, the top wall of the heating plate and the side wall of the cup body are enclosed to form a crushing cavity, a heating pipe is arranged on the heating plate and is cast in the heating plate, a blind hole is arranged on the outer side of the bottom wall of the heating plate, and the blind hole is communicated with the crushing cavity. And a temperature sensor is hidden in the blind hole. The temperature sensor is installed in the blind hole in a hidden mode, so that the integrity of the cup body is guaranteed, the assembling difficulty is reduced, the assembling efficiency is improved, meanwhile, the situation that dirt is prone to being accumulated at cleaning dead corners at the matching position of the temperature sensor and the cup body is avoided, and the cleanliness of the cup body is guaranteed. And the temperature sensor is not exposed to the outside, so that the effect of protecting the temperature sensor is achieved, the situation that the temperature sensor is inaccurate in temperature measurement due to rapid aging of the temperature sensor caused by long-time exposure of the temperature sensor to the outside is avoided, and the temperature measurement accuracy of the temperature sensor is improved.

column12: Seepage-heat transfer experimental device for in-situ mining of compact oil shale
column13: The utility model discloses a seepage-heat transfer experiment device for in-situ mining of compact oil shale. The utility model belongs to the technical field of experimental measuring instruments. The device comprises a seepage-heat transfer rock core holder, an axial-confining pressure injection system, an axial-radial pressure stabilizing system, a temperature-strain monitoring system, a liquid cooling circulation system, a safety backflow prevention system, a flow monitoring system, a gas collection-recovery system and a control and data recording system which are matched with one another, according to the utility model, a hot fluid medium with pressure is injected into the fractured rock core in the seepage-heat transfer rock core holder; observing axial and radial strains to determine a closed critical temperature point of a crack in the rock core under a heat injection condition and a critical pressure that the crack is reopened under a pressurization condition of a later-stageheat medium; therefore, closed critical parameters of the fractures in the in-situ mining process are obtained, the permeability change condition of the fractures with the rock mass can be evaluatedaccording to the front and back flow change conditions, long-term effective communication of the reservoir fractures by adjusting field construction parameters is achieved, and later-period heat injection and oil and gas migration are facilitated.

column12: Electric pepper grinder
column13: The utility model discloses an electric pepper grinder which comprises a grinder body with an opening in the bottom surface, a grinding core assembly arranged at the bottom of the grinder body, a closed cavity formed in the grinder body and a material channel communicated up and down, a motor connected with a transmission rod is installed in the cavity, and the end of the transmission rod extendsout of the cavity to be connected with the grinding core assembly. A storage cup is detachably connected to the upper portion of the machine body, pepper particles located in the storage cup reach thegrinding core assembly through a material channel, and a gravity sensor connected with a switch control circuit of the motor is arranged in the machine body. The power assembly is reasonably arrangedin the inner cavity, the gravity sensor is arranged in a matched mode to control the power assembly, and mechanical automatic grinding is achieved.

column12: Wandering star wheel positioning device for double-sided grinding machine
column13: The invention discloses a wandering star wheel positioning device for a double-sided grinding machine. The wandering star wheel positioning device comprises a mounting top plate, a mounting bottom plate and a suction cup assembly. Wherein the force measuring structure comprises a ball body, a first groove, a second groove, an elastic element and a force measuring sensor; the area of the mounting top plate is smaller than that of the mounting bottom plate; one end of the force transducer is arranged on the peripheral side of the bottom of the mounting top plate, and the other end of the force transducer is connected to the top of the mounting bottom plate; and the mounting bottom plate is provided with an accommodating space for accommodating deformation displacement of the force transducer. A mounting top plate, a mounting bottom plate and a force measuring structure are arranged; the positioning is accurate, the production efficiency is improved, the automation degree is high, the labor force is reduced, and the production quality is improved.

column12: Hospital infection monitoring system for medical treatment
column13: The invention discloses a hospital infection monitoring system for medical treatment. The hospital infection monitoring system comprises a sample processing module, a culture instrument, an inoculation instrument, an identification instrument, a controller, a display module, a storage module, a three-dimensional clamping jaw, a position detection module, an assembly line driving unit, a recovery unit and an assembly line. The assembly line sequentially passes through the sample processing module, the culture instrument, the inoculation instrument and the identification instrument. Sample information in each room is obtained through the sample processing module, samples are placed in the sampling cups with the identification tags, and then the samples in the sampling cups can be sequentially subjected to the steps of culture, inoculation and identification through the controller, the corresponding position detection modules, the corresponding three-dimensional clamping jaws and the corresponding assembly line driving units. The automation of culture, inoculation and identification processes is realized, the obtained result is directly displayed by virtue of the display module and is convenient to watch, and meanwhile, identification records are left by virtue of the storage module and are convenient to inquire in the future; the method is simple, effective, easy and practical.

column12: Wandering star wheel positioning device for double-sided grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a wandering star wheel positioning device for a double-sided grinding machine. The wandering star wheel positioning device comprises a mounting top plate, a mounting bottom plate and a suction cup assembly. Wherein the force measuring structure comprises a ball body, a first groove, a second groove, an elastic element and a force measuring sensor; the area of the mounting top plate is smaller than that of the mounting bottom plate; one end of the force transducer is arranged on the peripheral side of the bottom of the mounting top plate, and the other end of the force transducer is connected to the top of the mounting bottom plate; and the mounting bottom plate is provided with an accommodating space for accommodating deformation displacement of the force transducer. A mounting top plate, a mounting bottom plate and a force measuring structure are arranged; the positioning is accurate, the production efficiency is improved, the automation degree is high, the labor force is reduced, and the production quality is improved.

column12: Rock crushing and sampling device for geological exploration
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of rock sampling for geological exploration, and discloses a rock crushing and sampling device for geological exploration, a first stone crushing device is arranged in a box body, a drill bit is rotatably mounted in the middle of the front end of the first stone crushing device, and the drill bit is connected with the box body through a driving mechanism; the lower end of the first stone crushing device is connected with a second stone crushing device through a V-shaped funnel, and infrared sensors are installed on the inner walls of stone crushing boxes of the first stone crushing device and the second stone crushing device and connected with the control module. The first stone crushing device is provided with a motor and a stone crushing rotating head, the motor is connected with the stone crushing rotating head through a rotating speed sensor, the rotating speed sensor is connected with the control module, and the control module is connected with a rotating speed controller on the reduction gearbox and controls gear transmission in the reduction gearbox. The problem that workers are injured when breaking sampling is needed is solved. The system is provided with the control module, and the control module is internally provided with the master control and the slave control, so that the control module can stably perform signal switching after the mining mechanism enters the underground.

column12: Ore crushing device capable of automatically screening
column13: The utility model discloses an ore crushing device capable of automatically screening, which comprises a crusher, a vibration sensor is arranged on one side of the crusher, a noise sensor is arranged at a position adjacent to the vibration sensor, and a plurality of spring shock absorbers are uniformly arranged at the bottom of the crusher at intervals. A partition plate is fixedly connected to the bottoms of the spring shock absorbers, a plurality of groove holes are evenly formed in the positions, between the spring shock absorbers, of the partition plate at intervals, supports are fixedly connected to the four corners of the partition plate, and a control host is arranged at the adjacent positions of the supports. The vibration sensor and the noise sensor are both electrically connected with the control host, a display screen is arranged on the top of the control host, a loudspeaker is arranged on one side of the control host, and the display screen and the loudspeaker are both electrically connected with the control host. And a plurality of fixing piles matched with the inner diameters of the slotted holes are uniformly and fixedly connected to the bottom of the crusher at intervals. The device is high in efficiency and strong in practicability.

column12: Automatic titration detection device
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic titration detection device which comprises a first reagent bin and a second reagent bin, and the first reagent bin is communicated to a titration pump flow metering system through a sodium nitrate titration pump; the second reagent bin is communicated to a titration pump flow metering system through a sodium hydroxide titration pump; the first reagent bin and the second reagent bin are communicated to the reaction vessel through a titration pump flow metering system; the conductivity probe circulation cup is connected with a copper circulation type sensor, and the copper circulation type sensor is connected with a sampling circulation pump; and the conductivity probe circulation cup is communicated to the reaction vessel through a sampling pump anda burette. According to the utility model, manual sampling analysis can be replaced, the investment of labor cost is reduced, and data errors caused by manual analysis errors are reduced; the copper ion concentration can be analyzed in real time, and the concentrations of sulfuric acid and hydrogen peroxide can be analyzed in a short interval period; a multi-frequency process control curve can beprovided, and the process stability is improved.

column12: Impurity removal system based on electromagnetic induction
column13: The invention relates to an impurity removal system based on electromagnetic induction, and relates to the field of electromagnetic impurity removal, the impurity removal system comprises an impurity removal mechanism, a conveyor and a control system, the impurity removal mechanism comprises a first impurity removal assembly, a detection assembly and an adjuster, the first impurity removal assembly comprises a first supporting frame and a first electromagnet, the first supporting frame is arranged on the conveyor, and the first electromagnet is arranged on the conveyor; the first electromagnet is arranged on the first supporting frame, the regulator is arranged on the first supporting frame and is in electric signal connection with the first electromagnet, the detection assembly comprises a first magnetic sensor, and the first magnetic sensor is arranged on the conveyor. According to the ore raw material treatment device, metal impurities contained in the ore raw materials can be removed, the content of the metal impurities in the ore raw materials is reduced, and therefore the possibility that subsequent grinding equipment is damaged by the metal impurities is reduced.

column12: Operation method for stable and smooth operation of high-titanium vanadium titano-magnetite large blast furnace
column13: The invention discloses an operation method for stable and smooth operation of a large high-titanium vanadium titano-magnetite blast furnace, which comprises the following steps: a material distribution system: dividing a furnace throat equal-area matrix into 12 rings, distributing ore drop points in 5-10 rings, and forming a material distribution matrix based on various historical material distribution data, setting an ore distribution angle based on the length of a stockline, and controlling the throat temperature of the blast furnace to be 60-120 DEG C; according to the air supply system, under the normal production condition, the symmetrical air port layout of two air ports is adopted, the areas of the two air ports are different, and under the medium-and-long-term abnormal production condition, the air port areas are adjusted based on the air volume; and a slagging system and a heat system. According to the method, the difficult problems that the performance improvement difficulty of the smelting furnace burden of the high-titanium vanadium titano-magnetite large-scale blast furnace is large, the blast furnace reinforced smelting operation adjusting difficulty is large, and the blast furnace condition fluctuation recovery difficulty is large are solved, and long-term stable smooth operation of the high-titanium vanadium titano-magnetite large-scale blast furnace and smooth operation of efficient smelting maintenance furnace conditions are achieved.
column14: PANGANG GROUP RES INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: Sucker moving type wind power blade flash cutting and grinding equipment and implementation method
column13: The invention discloses suction cup migration type wind power blade flash cutting and grinding equipment which comprises a crawling mechanism, the top of the crawling mechanism is connected with a transverse moving mechanism, and cutting and grinding equipment is installed at the bottom of the transverse moving mechanism. The cutting and polishing equipment comprises a first screw sliding table, a second motor for driving the first screw sliding table is arranged on the first screw sliding table, a connecting plate is fixedly installed on the first screw sliding table, and a clamping mechanism, a cutting device and a polishing device are installed on the connecting plate. The invention further discloses an implementation method of the suction cup moving type wind power blade flash cutting and grinding equipment. The cutting and polishing robot is adsorbed on the wind power blade through the first suction cup and moves on the blade, die assembly flashes on the two sides of the blade can be cut and polished at the same time through cutting and polishing equipment on the two wings of the cutting and polishing robot, and the working efficiency is greatly improved.

column12: Mine mining filling maintenance environment analysis testing device and method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mining filling, and discloses a mining filling maintenance environment analysis testing device and method.The testing device comprises a pressure testing assembly, and the pressure testing assembly is composed of a press machine and a pressure sensor used for monitoring pressure; the maintenance assembly is composed of a water bath barrel, a circulating water path and a permeable stone; the water bath barrel is installed in the press machine, the permeable stones are of an arc-shaped structure, a cylinder formed by connecting the two permeable stones is installed in the water bath barrel, and a curing chamber is arranged in the cylinder. According to the testing device, pressure is applied to the filling body, the actual pressure of an overlying rock stratum is simulated, a water immersion environment of the filling body is simulated through the circulating water path, meanwhile, the temperature of water is adjusted through the temperature control device, the thermal environment of the filling body is simulated, and the ion concentration monitoring module monitors the ion concentration of water in the circulating water path in real time; and the maintenance process of the filling body in the underground in-situ environment is analyzed and simulated through a small amount of filling materials.

After polishing is completed, a clamping control module can be started on a hydraulic telescopic shaft, so that a clamping plate loosens the workpiece, a taking and placing control module controls a taking and placing motor to be started, the polished workpiece is hung on a placing rod through a suction cup, and by arranging a taking and placing mechanism, it is avoided that workers take down the polished workpiece manually; and personal injury caused by the fact that the polished workpiece accidentally scalds workers is avoided.

column12: SILVER/SILVER CHLORIDE SENSOR ELEMENT
column13: The present disclosure relates to a medical electrode for biopotential monitoring and/or recording of biopotential signals when attached to the skin of a human or animal. The medical electrode comprises a sensor element and an ion conductive layer, which is in contact with the skin side of a sensor layer in the sensor element. The sensor layer comprises silver (Ag) and silver chloride (AgCI) and has a tailored effective AgCl area density, which depends on the electrode wear time and surface area of the sensor layer.

column12: COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTHENTICATING DOCUMENTS
column13: The present invention relates to a system and method enabling users to confirm any formally or officially recognised qualification, certification and/or accreditation associated with an individual as maintained by various entities, including Government or professional/trade organisations. More particularly, the system and method of the present invention enables users to quickly and easily verify the claim(s) of an individual regarding their formally or officially recognised qualification, certification and/or accreditation with prompt confirmation of same, including the status of any such qualification, certification and/or accreditation.

column12: Ion reaction demonstrator
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching instruments, in particular to an ionic reaction demonstrator. Comprising a reaction system and a display system, the reaction system comprises a beaker filled with a barium hydroxide solution, a reagent cup filled with dilute sulphuric acid, two graphite electrodes, a power supply, a switch, a universal meter and an indicator lamp; the two graphite electrodes are connected in series with the power supply, the switch, the universal meter and the indicator lamp through leads, and the two graphite electrodes extend into the barium hydroxide solution to form a closed circuit; the display system comprises a conductivity probe, a conductivity module, a data collector and a display terminal. According to the utility model, the change of the ion concentration in the solution is speculated by monitoring the current magnitude and the conductivity change of the solution in the circuit, and the abstract microscopic ion world is concrete through the intuitive electrical phenomenon and the conductivity curve, so that students can conveniently form the cognitive thought of the ion reaction from phenomenon to nature, and the teaching efficiency is improved. Therefore, chemical experiment teaching in senior high schools is assisted, and comprehensive accomplishment of students is cultivated.

column12: Ore crushing station discharging device based on unmanned driving technology
column13: The utility model relates to an ore crushing station discharging device based on an unmanned driving technology. The crushing station comprises a crushing station base surface, a loading platform is arranged in the middle of the crushing station base surface; a limiting plate is arranged at the right end of the loading platform; a limiting sensor and a radar sensor are arranged on the front side surface of the limiting plate; the right end of the loading platform is rotationally connected with the base surface of the crushing station through a supporting shaft; a discharging hopper is arrangedon the right side of the limiting plate and located below the crushing station base face. A hydraulic cylinder body is hinged to the lower end of the loading platform; the hydraulic cylinder body isfurther connected with a hydraulic station, an automatic discharging control system is further arranged on the outer side of the base face of the crushing station, the automatic discharging control system is electrically connected with a limiting sensor, a radar sensor and the hydraulic station, an unmanned mine car is arranged above the loading platform, and an unmanned driving system is arrangedon the unmanned mine car. The utility model has the advantages of reasonable vehicle allocation, high production efficiency and low operation cost.

column12: Novel router for mobile internet data exchange
column13: The invention discloses a novel router for mobile internet data exchange, and relates to the technical field of mobile internet data exchange appliances, the novel router comprises a router body and a bottom plate arranged below the router body, the top surface of the bottom plate is provided with a stabilizing box, the top of the stabilizing box is connected with a buffer box, and the periphery of the outer wall of a mounting ring is provided with bearing strip plates. A plurality of positioning suction cups are arranged on the periphery of the bottom face of the bottom plate, and air cooling mechanisms are arranged at the outer ends of the bearing strip plates. Buffering mechanisms are arranged at the four corners in the buffering box, and a plugging assembly is arranged in the positioning box. According to the invention, through cooperation of the air cooling mechanism, the buffer mechanism and the plugging assembly, the router can have positioning and anti-sliding functions during placement, and wiring ports of the router are prevented from being damaged; the situation that the network is blocked slowly due to the overheating phenomenon of the router is effectively avoided, the router can be horizontally rotated to carry out dust removal operation on the heat dissipation opening for air inlet, and the stability of the network in the operation process of the router is greatly improved.

column12: DEVICE FOR AUTOMATIC CONTROL OF DENSITY AND FLOW RATE OF A SOLID IN PULP FLOW
column13: FIELD: physics.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to device for automatic control of density and flow rate of solid in pulp flow, to automation of production processes, in particular, for measurement of pulp parameters at output of grinding complex of mill-classifier in process of dressing at concentrating mills of mining and metallurgical and chemical industries. Device for automatic control of density and flow rate of solid in pulp flow contains a storage tank equipped with a weight sensor and a pulp level sensor, a shut-off controlled valve at the outlet of the container. Device also comprises a sampler, which provides representative sampling from the pulp flow by the content of solid in it, made in the form of a hollow tube with a slit along its generatrix to the entire height of the flow, wherein pipe slot is arranged opposite to flow, sampler output is articulated by flexible connection with distributor inlet in form of hollow movable pipe, lower end of which is moved by a drive according to a predetermined program, periodically connecting it to a storage container equipped with weight sensors and a pulp level sensor. Device comprises a unit of calculations and control, to input of which signals of weight sensors and pulp level sensor are connected, according to which the unit of calculations and control periodically by the specified algorithm calculates values of pulp density and solid flow rate in the pulp flow with output of signals on a scoreboard and in a system for automatic control of the process of solid grinding in pulp flow, controlling the movable pipe of the distributor and the outlet valve of the storage container.EFFECT: simplification of the device and expansion of its functional capabilities.1 cl, 1 dwg

column12: Method for effectively measuring completely uniform temperature of CO2-rich fluid inclusion
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of fluid inclusion homogeneous method temperature measurement, and discloses a method for effectively measuring the complete homogeneous temperature of a CO2-rich fluid inclusion, which comprises the following steps: grinding an inclusion sheet; unloading the inclusion sheet; selecting experimental samples of the CO2-rich fluid inclusion; cleaning a sample cavity of the hydrothermal diamond pressing cavity; fixing the position of the metal rhenium sheet, loading a CO2-rich fluid inclusion experiment sample, and carrying out other preparation work before temperature measurement; measuring the temperature by a heating homogenization method; and after the complete uniform temperature measurement experiment of the CO2-rich fluid inclusion is completed, the steps are repeated, and complete uniform temperature data of the CO2-rich fluid inclusion are measured. According to the invention, the hydrothermal diamond pressure cavity, which is high-temperature and high-pressure equipment, is applied to microscopic uniform temperature measurement experiment research of the CO2-rich fluid inclusion for the first time, so that accurate and reliable complete uniform temperature data of the inclusion can be obtained, and a scientific judgment basis is provided for clarification of the mineralization temperature and the mineralization mechanism of carbonate rock type rare earth ore deposits and the like.

column12: Disassembling and recycling treatment method for charging pile
column13: The invention discloses a charging pile disassembly and recovery processing method, which adopts a robot with a visual identification system, the robot is provided with a mechanical arm capable of freely moving, and the front end of the mechanical arm is provided with a clamp for fixing an automatic screwdriver or is provided with a suction cup type gripper; the method comprises the following steps that S1, a charging pile is fixedly clamped through a fixing tool; s2, automatically disassembling protective plate fixing screws or nuts of the charging pile; s3, sucking and transferring the disassembled protection plate; s4, automatically disassembling fixing screws or nuts which are set as core high-value components; s5, the charging pile is moved to a manual disassembling position; s6, core high-value components are manually disassembled and sorted; and S7, crushing and sorting remaining parts of the charging pile. column12: Drilling natural gas hydrate monitoring secondary generation experimental device and method
column13: The invention relates to a drilling natural gas hydrate monitoring secondary generation experimental device and method. The device comprises a hydrate reaction kettle, an ore body crushing drilling machine, a monitoring and preventing kettle, a gas phase flow meter, a liquid phase flow meter, a first pressure sensor, a second pressure sensor, a first temperature sensor, a second temperature sensor, a camera, an inhibitor meter, a control cabinet and a computer, an ore body crushing drilling machine is arranged at the bottom of the hydrate reaction kettle; the lower part of the hydrate reactionkettle is connected with an inlet of the monitoring control kettle through a first valve; a second valve, a gas phase flow meter and a liquid phase flow meter are sequentially arranged at a middle outlet of the hydrate reaction kettle; a first pressure sensor and a first temperature sensor are arranged at the upper part of the hydrate reaction kettle; and a camera, an inhibitor meter, a second pressure sensor and a second temperature sensor are arranged in the monitoring control kettle. column12: SUMP COVER FOR A LAUNDRY APPLIANCE COMPRISING A SELF CLEANING LINT FILTER
Edge grinding equipment for glass processing
column13: The utility model discloses glass processing edging equipment which comprises a working table and a screening net plate, the bottom of the working table is fixedly connected with a vacuum generator, the output end of the vacuum generator penetrates to the top of the working table and is fixedly connected with a vacuum suction cup, round glass is arranged at the top of the vacuum suction cup, and the screening net plate is arranged on the working table. Electric push rods are fixedly connected to the four corners of the top of the workbench. The vacuum generator, the vacuum suction cup, the pressure sensor, the electric push rod, the installation plate, the air cylinder, the draught fan, the air collecting hopper, the stepping motor, the sliding block, the electric grinding machine, the positioning plate, the double-thread screw and the sliding groove are used in cooperation, so that the edge grinding device has the advantages of being wide in application range and assisting in positioning. The problems that in the prior art, the device is not suitable for glass of different specifications, does not have an auxiliary positioning function, needs to manually calibrate and adjust round glass, and reduces the practicability of edge grinding equipment are solved.

column12: Traditional Chinese medicinal material mashing device
column13: The utility model discloses a traditional Chinese medicine mashing device which comprises a machine base, an adjustable-speed motor, a throwing arm, an up-down sliding mashing rod, a mashing hammer and a medicine mashing cup, the adjustable-speed motor is arranged on the machine base, the throwing arm is arranged on a power output shaft of the adjustable-speed motor, and the up-down sliding mashing rod is arranged on the machine base. The lower end of the up-down sliding pounding rod is connected with a pounding hammer, the medicine smashing cup is arranged on the bottom face of the machine base and located under the pounding hammer, and the centrifugal end of the swing arm is matched with the up-down sliding pounding rod to enable the up-down sliding pounding rod to be lifted up. The crushing device is simple in structure, capable of simulating manual crushing, low in crushing temperature, time-saving, labor-saving and convenient to operate.

column12: Fan blade surface constant-force grinding device and control method thereof
column13: The invention relates to a constant-force grinding device for the surface of a fan blade. The constant-force grinding device comprises a hoisting mechanism, a rotor wing adjusting unit, a suction cup unit, an overall supporting frame, a six-degree-of-freedom collaborative robot, a six-dimensional force sensor, a robot controller and a constant-force grinding unit. The invention further relates to a constant-force grinding control method. The constant-force grinding control method comprises the steps that the six-degree-of-freedom collaborative robot controls the constant-force grinding unit to conduct grinding according to a preset track, and a grinding force analog signal is obtained; calculating a force error according to the grinding force analog signal and the expected force signal, and taking the force error as force controller input; the force controller outputs servo valve control quantity, meanwhile, signals collected by the distance sensor are transmitted to a robot controller, compensation is conducted through a pose compensation algorithm, and constant-force grinding is achieved. Compared with the prior art, high-altitude fan blade grinding constant force control can be achieved, the manual operation danger is reduced, the high-altitude blade repairing efficiency is improved, the grinding quality is guaranteed, the structure is reasonable, and the high-altitude fan blade grinding device is more suitable for large-scale production.

column12: New method for deep mining of terrestrial heat
column13: The invention discloses a novel method for deep mining of terrestrial heat, which comprises a backwater tunnel, an S-shaped multi-connection tunnel and a water outlet tunnel, and is characterized in that a miniature shield tunneling machine is adopted for construction, the backwater tunnel is firstly excavated downwards at an angle of 35-40 degrees until the temperature required by terrestrial heat temperature is reached, then the S-shaped multi-connection tunnel is horizontally excavated, and the water outlet tunnel is excavated downwards at an angle of 35-40 degrees until the temperature required by terrestrial heat temperature is reached. And after the S-shaped multi-connection tunnel is excavated to the required length, the water tunnel is excavated upwards according to the angle of 35-40 degrees till the water tunnel is excavated out of the ground, and construction is completed. The water outlet tunnel is connected with the heat exchange station, and cold water of the heat exchange station directly enters the water return tunnel. According to the invention, geothermal energy is well exploited, resources on the earth are saved, and the implementation of the invention not only is environment-friendly, but also solves the big problem in the aspect of human energy.

column12: Residual oil distribution prediction method based on formation crude oil viscosity
column13: The invention discloses a residual oil distribution prediction method based on formation crude oil viscosity. The method comprises the following steps of (1) determining a parameter combination mainlybased on fluid viscosity for each formation in a target block, wherein the parameter combination comprises crude oil viscosity and one of other eight parameters, and calculating all parameter valuesin the parameter combination; (2) performing normalization processing on the parameters in the parameter combination to obtain a normalized parameter combination V, respectively calculating the entropy of each parameter in the parameter combination, and then calculating the weight W of each parameter; (3) obtaining a comprehensive index I of a corresponding formation through a formula according tothe parameters determined in the parameter combination in the step (1) and the weight of each parameter obtained in the step (2); and (4) selecting the formation with the comprehensive index of 0.5 to 0.75 as a potential layer, and predicting the potential layer to be an effective residual oil reserve volume enrichment area where recovery and mining of the residual oil can be performed.

column12: Automatic high-precision machining and assembling device with multi-layer structure

The top end of the rotating rod penetrates through the machining table and extends to the top of the machining table. According to the automatic high-precision machining and assembling device of the multi-layer structure, an exhaust fan, a suction cup, an annular disc and a sliding rod are installed on the two sides of the top of the machining table correspondingly and driven by a motor, and when the automatic high-precision machining and assembling device is used, under transmission of a belt wheel and a belt, the suction cup and the sliding rod can rotate by 1/8 circle to be vertically opposite; and after the air cylinder is pressed downwards, the patch can be directly attached to the grinding wheel, and the right side of the patch is also directly adsorbed through the effect of the material preparation cylinder, so that the patch pasting accuracy is improved, and the deviation condition is avoided.

column12: OUTBOARD-MOTOR CLOSED-LOOP COOLER SYSTEM
Slitting method based on polypropylene ultrathin metallized material
column13: The invention discloses a slitting method based on a polypropylene ultrathin metallized material. The slitting method comprises the following steps: a, drawing a film: drawing an OPP micron film; b, film plating: plating a layer of metal aluminum on the OPP micron film; slitting is conducted, specifically, the product obtained after film coating is completed is placed on slitting equipment to be slit; the slitting process comprises the steps that the metallized material is placed on the cutting table, and the lifting table is lifted through the lifter; the metalized material is adsorbed on the cutting table through an air suction device in the ascending process; the air suction device comprises a suction pipe, a suction cup, an air suction mechanism, a driving gear and a piston mechanism. The cutting machine is started to cut the metallized material; after cutting is completed, the lifting table is driven to move downwards; in the descending process, the grinding device is started to grind and deburr the cutting surface of the cut metallized material; according to the device, the trimmed edge can be automatically polished and deburred during cutting; and the automation degree of slitting is improved, and the quality of materials can be further improved.

column12: Ultrasonic cell crusher with temperature balancing function
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of ultrasonic cell disruptors, in particular to an ultrasonic cell disruptor with a temperature balancing function, which comprises a disruptor body, an industrial computer, a connector and a signal line, the connector is fixedly connected above the disruptor body, and the lower end of a pneumatic lifting rod is in threaded connection with an amplitude-change pole. The amplitude-change pole is located over the supporting plate, a heating pipe is fixedly connected to the interior of the supporting plate, a heat conduction layer is fixedly connected to the upper portion of the supporting plate, supporting cup fixing plates are slidably connected to the left end and the right end of the upper surface of the heat conduction layer, and semiconductor chilling plates are fixedly connected to the upper surfaces of the ends, close to the amplitude-change pole, of the supporting cup fixing plates; and the semiconductor chilling plate, the amplitude-change pole, the temperature sensor and the heating pipe are electrically connected to an industrial computer through signal lines. The ultrasonic cell crusher with the temperature balancing function has the characteristics that the temperature is kept balanced when the ultrasonic cell crusher crushes cells, and the influence of the temperature on cell crushing is avoided.

Through the action of a rotating rod, a powerful suction cup can be attracted to the inner side of the crushing box, so that a screening net is installed at different positions of the inner side of the crushing box, crushed raw materials can be filtered, and through arrangement of a weighing sensor, the crushed raw materials can be weighed, and follow-up use is facilitated.

column12: Gas recovery oxygen content analyzer and method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a gas recovery oxygen content analyzer and a method thereof.The analyzer comprises a steam-jet pump, a first-stage gas-water separator, a second-stage gas-water separator, a cooling water device, a radiator, a pressure reducing valve, a bubbling cup, a sensor, a first exhaust pipe and a second exhaust pipe, and the steam-jet pump is connected with a gas pipeline; the first-stage gas-water separator and the cooling water device are converged and then connected into the second-stage gas-water separator, the second-stage gas-water separator, the radiator and the pressure reducing valve are sequentially connected, the bubbling cup and the sensor are connected with the pressure reducing valve in parallel, the first exhaust pipe is connected with the bubbling cup, and the second exhaust pipe is connected with the second-stage gas-water separator; the invention provides a safer and more stable gas recovery oxygen content analyzer and a method thereof.

column12: SYSTEM AND PROCESS FOR ONLINE DETERMINATION OF THE CHARACTERISTICS OF WORN BALLS AND BALL FRAGMENTS OF THE SAME
column13: The present invention relates to a system and process carried out after a process of separating pieces of steel from pieces of ore that come out of a semi-autogenous grinder for grinding ores, and which consists of a system formed by one or more instruments for capturing images, each one being sensitive to light of different wavelengths, which point to the surface of an element for receiving the steel pieces or a channel that receives the steel balls and the pieces thereof from the separation process, through which the steel balls and pieces thereof move when they are discharged from this process, with the possibility of directing each image sensor such that it is not parallel to the others. By digitally processing the images obtained with the one or more sensors, the dimensions and morphology of the balls and ball pieces discharged from the separation process can be determined.

A plurality of slotted holes corresponding to each other up and down are formed between the first bottom plate and the second bottom plate, a plurality of nail-shaped bodies penetrating through the first bottom plate and the second bottom plate are arranged in the slotted holes in a penetrating manner, each nail-shaped body is connected with a mining height controller, and each nail-shaped body is subjected to numerical control lifting by the mining height controller. The test bench can also realize simulation of different boundary conditions closer to reality. Other test benches are only changed at the boundary of the test bench, and the test bench enables the boundary condition of the periphery of the mining area to be closer to the field mining area environment through pre-crushing of the goaf part; and moreover, the distribution of the bottom nail-shaped bodies is more reasonable than that of bottom lifting control parts of other test benches.

Method and system for predicting optimal working condition of hydrothermal reaction degradation effect of thickened oil
column13: The invention discloses a heavy oil hydrothermal reaction degradation effect optimal working condition prediction method and system, and the method comprises the steps: building an orthogonal experiment working condition table according to the temperature, pressure, water-oil ratio maximum value and minimum value of a heavy oil hydrothermal reaction, carrying out an experiment according to the orthogonal experiment working condition table, and classifying and quantifying hydrothermal reaction products; an orthogonal experiment and lumped parameter method is adopted, the experiment number is small, experiment operation is easy and convenient, the accuracy of a thickened oil hydrothermal reaction equation established on the basis of experiment data is high, the degradation rates of different working conditions and different reaction stages can be calculated, the working condition of the maximum thickened oil degradation rate under the maximum temperature and pressure range allowed by thickened oil recovery is found, and the method is suitable for large-scale popularization and application. And an experimental basis in a laboratory is provided for guiding actual mining and underground in-situ modification.

column12: Method for treating heavy metal pollution in sulphide ore tailings
column13: The invention discloses a method for treating heavy metal pollution in sulphide ore tailings, which comprises the following steps: carrying out sodium modification on a calcium-based bentonite suspension by using solid Na2CO3 to obtain a sodium-modified bentonite suspension, aging, adding a modifier to modify to obtain modified bentonite, drying, and grinding to obtain a treatment material; mixingthe treatment material with sulfide ore tailings and a simulated acid rain solution, oscillating at a constant speed, and filtering and carrying out suction filtration on the mixture to obtain a treated tailing leachate. According to the method, the used raw material calcium bentonite is low in price, few organic modifiers are used, and the requirement for the environment is low; meanwhile, the method is simple to operate, good in curing effect and convenient to use in industrial production.

The discharging rail is perpendicular to the feeding rail, the storage bin is arranged at the tail end of the feeding rail, a side mounting plate used for mounting the ion fan is arranged on the side edge of the feeding rail, the automatic feeding machine comprises a storage frame, a clamping arm, a pushing arm and a material box, the clamping arm is connected with a first lifting mechanism, and the pushing arm is connected with a second lifting mechanism. column12: Automatic control device for selective priority flotation
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of mineral flotation, and discloses an automatic control device for selective preferential flotation, which comprises a flotation column, a concentrate pipeline of the flotation column is communicated with a cylindrical copper concentrate sampler, the cylindrical copper concentrate sampler is electrically connected with an X fluorescence online grade analyzer, the X fluorescence online grade analyzer is electrically connected with a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) control module, and the PLC control module is electrically connected with the flotation column. The PLC control module is electrically connected with a tailing adjusting valve of the flotation column, and the PLC control module is used for controlling the opening degree of the tailing adjusting valve according to data detected by the X fluorescence online grade analyzer in real time; according to the scheme, the X fluorescence online grade analyzer is introduced to detect data, the PLC control module is used for adjusting the opening degree of the flotation column tailing adjusting valve in real time, the situation that a worker adjusts medicament hysteresis due to increase of the copper-zinc ratio of a flotation column is reduced, so that raw ore grade fluctuation is dealt with, the loss of zinc in optimized copper concentrate is reduced, and the zinc recovery rate index is further improved; the problem of adjusting the opening degree of the flotation column tailing adjusting valve in real time is solved.

column12: Method and system for predicting biomass and nitrogen content of brassica napus at seedling stage
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of remote sensing, and discloses a method and a system for predicting biomass and nitrogen content of brassica napus in a seedling stage, and the method comprises the following steps: preparing experimental materials; five rows are selected for each variety, one plant is selected for each row, and the fresh weight of the overground part and the fresh weight of the underground part of the plant are weighed respectively; placing the sample in a 105 DEG C oven for fixation for 0.5 h, then adjusting the temperature to 80 DEG C, drying to constant weight, and weighing the dry weight; grinding the above-ground part and underground part tissues into powder by using a small-sized sample grinding machine, and measuring the nitrogen content of the powder by using a Duma azotometer NDA702; performing unmanned aerial vehicle remote sensing image acquisition work; software ENVI is used for obtaining and calculating a normalized vegetation index (GNDVI), a green wave band normalized vegetation index (NDVI), a non-blue wave band enhanced vegetation index (EVI2), NDI, a super-green index (ExG) and a super-red index (ExR); and performing result analysis. The invention aims to establish a high-throughput identification platform, and provides a theoretical basis and technical support for prediction of biomass and nitrogen content in the rape seedling stage and mining of resources with excellent related characters.
