column12: Method for determining shape and parameters of lining plate of ball mill
column13: The invention relates to a method for determining the shape and parameters of a ball mill lining plate, and belongs to the technical field of ore grinding in ore dressing. According to the method, on the basis of on-site ball mill working conditions including feeding mechanical properties, ball mill steel ball gradation, mill operation parameters and lining plate parameters, EDEM discrete element numerical simulation is used for optimizing the shape and the parameters of the lining plate, so that the shape and the parameters of the ball mill lining plate are determined. After the method is optimized, the ball mill lining plate and the field working condition are better in synergism, the movement state of the steel balls in the ball mill is more reasonably matched with energy, the collision energy utilization rate of the steel balls in the ball mill to ore can be improved, the energy consumption of impacting the lining plate by the steel balls in the ball mill and impacting the steel balls by the steel balls is reduced, and the service life of the lining plate is prolonged; and energy conservation and consumption reduction of the ball mill can be effectively realized.

column12: Substrate grinding method
column13: The invention discloses a substrate grinding method. The substrate grinding method comprises the steps that S1, the vertical initial position of a grinding wheel is determined through a checking device; s2, according to the vertical initial position of the grinding wheel, the initial surface shape of the base plate and the target surface shape of the base plate, base plate grinding parameters are set; s3, grinding the substrate according to the grinding parameters of the substrate; the step S1 comprises the following steps: carrying out constant-temperature treatment on a gauge block of the checking device; a gauge block of the checking device moves to the upper side of the suction cup; the main shaft assembly moves towards the gauge block along the vertical direction; a grinding wheel at the bottom of the spindle assembly abuts against the gauge block, so that a detection sensor at the lower part of the gauge block abuts against the surface of the sucker; when the detection sensor triggers the spindle assembly to stop moving, the position of the grinding wheel is the vertical initial position of the grinding wheel.

column12: Double-loop control device for mining drainage substation

When the water level reaches a certain height, the first water pump and the second water pump can work at the same time, and water in the water storage tank can be pumped out quickly and timely; the water storage tank of the device is provided with the crushing mechanism, the crushing mechanism can crush broken stones flowing into the water storage tank, the situation that the broken stones with large particle sizes enter the first water pump and the second water pump and then block and damage the first water pump and the second water pump is avoided, and normal use of the device is guaranteed.

column12: Robot end multi-station grinding head mounting mechanism and grinding device
column13: The invention provides a robot end multi-station grinding head mounting mechanism and a grinding device. The mounting mechanism comprises a grinding head main coupling seat, a plurality of grinding head mounting seat assemblies and inclined mounting transition blocks. The grinding head main coupling seat is used to connect with the robot end. The grinding head mounting seat assemblies is used to install grinding heads. The inclined mounting transition blocks is used to adjust the angles of the grinding heads and the grinding head mounting seat assemblies. At least one of the grinding head mounting seat assemblies is installed on the side wall of the grinding head main coupling seat through the inclined mounting transition blocks. By selecting the inclined mounting transition blocks with different angles, the grinding angle can be set quickly and accurately. The remaining grinding head mounting seat assemblies among the multiple grinding head mounting seat assemblies are installed on the side wall of the grinding head main coupling seat. The robot end multi-station grinding device comprises the grinding head mounting mechanism, and further comprises a grinding movement and a grinding disk thereof, a quick disassembly device for the grinding movement, a suction cup reclaiming device or an attitude calibration pen.

column12: Lifting type pressing mechanism for glass edge grinding machine
column13: The utility model discloses a lifting type pressing mechanism for a glass edge grinding machine. The lifting type pressing mechanism comprises a machining table. A support is installed on the right side of the top of the machining table, a hydraulic telescopic rod is installed at the bottom of the left side of the support, a pressing plate is fixedly installed at the bottom of the hydraulic telescopic rod, a motor is installed on the left side of the top of the machining table, a pressure sensor is installed at the top end of the motor, and a supporting plate is fixedly installed at the top of the pressure sensor. Pressure can be monitored in real time through the pressure sensor, the hydraulic telescopic rod can be automatically closed when the pressure reaches the maximum threshold value, so that glass is prevented from being damaged by too large pressure, adsorption and fixation can be achieved through the suction cup, the pressing stability is improved, the valve can be opened after edge grinding is completed, and the glass edge grinding efficiency is improved. At the moment, outside air can enter the suction cups through the ventilation pipes, the annular pipes and the branch pipes, suction force can be lost after air enters the suction cups, then the glass can be located on the supporting plate and easily taken down, and the practicability of equipment is greatly improved.

column12: Automatic mineral product sample preparation system with self-protection function and implementation method
column13: The invention relates to an automatic mineral product sample preparation system with a self-protection function and an implementation method. The sample preparation system comprises a feeder, a jaw crusher, a conveyor belt I, a conveyor belt II, a divider, an optocoupler, a baffle, a supporting surface, a material receiving vehicle, a material discarding vehicle and a spiral uniform feeder, so that great damage to a machine system caused by manual rough operation is avoided. A division machine-eccentric wheel-gear-rack type division structure is adopted, and stable ore sample screening work is achieved through precise reciprocating motion. And an optocoupler feedback protection mechanism captures feedback by an optocoupler pulse detection system at the tail end, so that the circuit is switched off at the first time, and motor equipment is protected. The device has the effects that the defects of the traditional sample preparation process can be effectively eliminated, and the aspects of feeding automation, treatment precision, operation safety and the like are comprehensively improved. And safe operation of a factory is facilitated, equipment maintenance is facilitated, collection of dust particles can be improved to a certain extent, and the environment-friendly effect is achieved.

column12: PLUG SEEDLING AUTOMATIC TRANSPLANTING MACHINE AND ITS CONTROL METHOD
column13: The invention provides a plug-tray seedling automatic transplanting machine and control method thereof, wherein, said machine comprises a chassis bracket, a planting mechanism, seedling separating mechanisms, seedling guiding devices, a power mechanism, a box shifting mechanism, a seedling picking mechanism. The box shifting mechanism is installed on the chassis bracket, the seedling picking mechanism is installed on the box shifting mechanism, and two sets of seedling separating mechanism are symmetrically arranged on both sides of the box shifting mechanism by the chassis bracket, the seedling guiding device is provided above each set of seedling separating mechanism, and the planting mechanism is provided under each set of seedling separating mechanism. With the synergistic effect of various mechanisms and control system, it is possible to pick seedlings in whole row without interval in various sizes of plug-trays, and drop seedlings at the same time, which increase the efficiency and success rate of picking seedlings and dropping seedlings. The plug-tray only needs to move longitudinally, thereby improving the efficiency of the plug-tray transport. The seedling claw can comb the pot seedlings before being inserted into the pot, which improves the quality of seedling picking. The seedling guiding device receives the seedlings statically and shortens the free-falling movement distance, which makes seedling dropping more accurate.

column12: Vacuum chuck for notebook computer cover plate

The suction cup comprises a suction cup cover and a suction cup bottom which are connected, and is structurally characterized in that a suction cup cavity is formed in one side of the suction cup cover, an air storage groove and an air conveying groove are formed in the inner wall of the suction cup cavity, the air storage groove is communicated with the air conveying groove, an air vent is formed in the side wall of the suction cup cover, and the air vent is communicated with the air storage groove. The suction cup bottom is provided with an air conveying hole, one side of the suction cup bottom is provided with an adsorption groove, the adsorption groove is communicated with the air conveying hole, the air conveying hole is communicated with the suction cup cavity, one side of the suction cup cover is further provided with a sealing groove, and a sealing ring is arranged in the sealing groove. One side of the suction cup cover is connected with the other side of the suction cup bottom, the other side of the suction cup cover and the other side of the suction cup bottom are of a plane structure, and an air nozzle is installed on the air vent.

column12: Portable food processor
column13: The portable food processor comprises a shell and a smashing assembly, the smashing assembly comprises a smashing cup, a smashing cutter extending into the smashing cup and a motor driving the smashing cutter to rotate, a heating pipe extending in the circumferential direction of the smashing cup is arranged at the bottom of the smashing cup, and an opening is formed between the two ends of the heating pipe. And a temperature sensor located at the opening is fixedly arranged at the cup bottom of the crushing cup. The portable food processor is convenient for a user to hold and carry. The heating pipe is large in heating area and high in heating efficiency. The opening is formed between the two ends of the heating tube, the temperature sensor is arranged at the opening, and the opening is physically isolated, so that heat conduction of the heating tube to the temperature sensor is effectively reduced, the influence of heat conducted by the heating tube on temperature measurement of the temperature sensor is effectively reduced, and the temperature measured by the temperature sensor is more accurate.

column12: Novel automatic discharging equipment for sintered DBC ceramic substrates
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of automation, and discloses novel automatic discharging equipment for sintered DBC ceramic substrates. The novel automatic discharging equipment comprisesan equipment body which is formed by combining a discharging delivery conveying line, a centring platform, a feeding platform, a stepping lifting device, a tool base plate recovery platform, an emptymaterial frame conveying line, a full material frame conveying line, a picking robot and a robot non-mark suction cup; and the discharging delivery conveying line comprises a first motor bracket, a conveying line bracket is fixedly mounted on the first motor bracket, a first conveyor belt is fixedly mounted on the conveying line bracket, first driven wheels are mounted at the two ends of the first conveyor belt correspondingly, a plurality of detection switches corresponding to the first conveyor belt are fixedly mounted on the conveying line bracket, and a servo motor is fixedly mounted on the first motor bracket. The DBC ceramic substrates can be automatically discharged after being sintered, thus manual operation is avoided, and the production efficiency is effectively improved.

column12: Novel water level observation device
column13: The utility model relates to a novel water level observation device, and belongs to the technical field of mining equipment. According to the technical scheme, one end of a resistance wire (2) is wound on a wire barrel (3), and the other end of the resistance wire (2) is connected with a probe inductor (9); the access socket (4) is connected with the resistance wire (2), the alarm indicator lamp (5) is connected with the probe sensor (9), the input end of the built-in megohmmeter (7) is connected with the resistance wire (2), and the output end of the built-in megohmmeter (7) is connected with the depth display (6); the bobbin (3) includes a bobbin shaft (10) and a spring piece (11), and the spring piece (11) is installed inside the bobbin (3). The resistance wire recovery device has the advantages that the automatic wire take-up device is additionally arranged, the resistance wire recovery efficiency is improved, the resistance wire recovery labor intensity is reduced, and the resistance wire recovery device is easy to manufacture, convenient to carry and convenient to use.

column12: Dishwasher status indicator
column13: The dishwasher status indicator includes an announcement module, a monitoring module, and a wireless communication link. The wireless communication link exchanges data between the monitoring module and the announcement module. The dishwasher status indicator is for use with a dish washing machine. The dishwasher status indicator monitors the operation of the dish washing machine. The dishwasher status indicator determines and indicates when the contents of the dish washing machine are clean. The monitoring module is placed inside of the dish washing machine. The monitoring module detects the presence of water in the dish washer to determine whether the dish washer has run. The announcement module attaches to the door of the dish washing machine. The announcement module visually and audibly indicates whether the contents of the dish washing machine are clean and dirty.

column12: Method for eliminating carbon monoxide products in air bag suspended roof blasting operation
column13: The invention provides a method for eliminating carbon monoxide products in air bag suspended roof blasting operation, and belongs to the technical field of carbon monoxide product elimination. Comprising the following steps: S1, preparation of eliminating airbags: firstly, grinding a prepared eliminating agent into powder with required granularity, activating at high temperature in a dry environment, then preparing a certain number of airbags, filling the airbags with 50-200g of the eliminating agent, then inflating the airbags, and tightening the airbags; s2, suspension of eliminating air bags: determining an eliminating area, and arranging a suspension device at the top of the blasting tunneling operation roadway; s3, arranging tunneling blasting operation; and S4, removing the toxic CO gas. The method for eliminating the carbon monoxide products in the air bag suspended roof blasting operation is suitable for mining of tunnels, mine laneways and other limited spaces and rock blasting scenes, the air bag serves as a carrier to carry a carbon monoxide eliminating agent, and shock waves generated by the blasting operation serve as power to break the air bag; the eliminating agent forms dust cloud to eliminate carbon monoxide.

column12: Early warning device for jaw crusher with jaw swing exceeding stroke
column13: The invention provides an early warning device for a jaw crusher with jaw swing exceeding a stroke, and belongs to the technical field of mining jaw crushers. The early warning device comprises a small stop block fixed to a movable jaw plate, a position sensor with adjustable position, an intermediate relay, a PLC control unit, an audible and visual alarm and a power supply, the position sensor forms a closed circuit with the intermediate relay and the power supply, the audible and visual alarm is connected with a contact of the intermediate relay, and the PLC control unit is connected with acontact of the intermediate relay. According to the early warning device, the connection is simple, the device is convenient and easy to use, when the movable jaw swing exceeds the stroke, an alarm signal can be sent out in time to prompt the staff to maintain and repair equipment, major damage to the equipment is avoided, the utilization rate of the equipment is increased, and meanwhile the inspection times of the jaw crusher in harsh working environment can be reduced.

According to the automatic swing type stirring ball mill of the invention, the swing supporting device, the lifting system and the stirring system work jointly, so that the ultrafine dispersion effect of various ores and other grindable materials in the stirring system is achieved; the servo system drives a swing supporting plate to automatically swing through the transmission assembly; the PLC control system is electrically connected with the liftingsystem, the stirring system and the servo system; a whole operation process is high in automation degree; and operation is very convenient.

A grinding disc machine shell communicated with the main machine shell is arranged on the front side of the upper portion of the main machine shell, an opening is formed in the top end of the grinding disc machine shell, and an upper grinding disc and a lower grinding disc are arranged on the inner side of the grinding disc machine shell. column12: Laboratory constant-temperature high-shear vaccine emulsification equipment
column13: The utility model discloses laboratory constant-temperature high-shearing vaccine emulsifying equipment which comprises a supporting mechanism, an emulsifying cup and a shearing mechanism. The supporting mechanism comprises a bottom table and a longitudinal beam connected to the bottom table. The emulsifying cup is supported on the bottom table, comprises an emulsifying cavity and is provided with a temperature sensor and a heat exchange medium channel. The shearing mechanism comprises a driving device and a shearing part arranged in the emulsifying cavity, the driving device is connected to the longitudinal beam, and the driving device is in transmission connection with the shearing part. A first robot control cabinet, a discharging tray and a discharging robot are arranged on the other side of the grinding and chamfering machine. The feeding robot and the discharging robot are internally provided with the 3D recognition systems so that incoming materials can be recognized, the magnetic suction cups can be used for grabbing the raw materials according to different materials and shapes of the raw materials, and the raw materials are placed at the feeding position of the polishing chamfering machine after being grabbed; and then after the polishing chamfering machine completes machining, the workpiece is taken away after visual recognition of the discharging robot, and the intelligence of the work station in the using process is improved.

column12: Automatic equipment for assembling lithium ion battery cap
column13: The utility model discloses lithium ion battery cap assembly automation equipment, which relates to the technical field of lithium battery processing, and comprises a processing table, and the upper surface of the processing table is fixedly connected with a motor. According to the utility model, the motor, the disc, the rotating piece, the rotating shaft, the rotating roller, the crawler belt, the electric push rod II, the connecting column and the L-shaped feeding plate are matched with one another, so that a lithium battery processing piece and a cap can be driven to automatically move to appointed positions; then, under the mutual cooperation of an adjusting air pump, a telescopic air pipe and a suction cup, the cap in the cap groove can be sucked out, then under the mutual cooperation of a third electric push rod and a lifting plate, the cap adsorbed on the suction cup can be driven to move downwards to the upper end of the lithium battery machined part, and therefore automatic assembling of the lithium battery cap is achieved; and after the lithium battery cap is assembled, the processing track drives the assembled lithium battery processing piece to move to the position below the welding machine, and therefore welding of the lithium battery processing piece is achieved.

column12: Automatic remote centralized control system and centralized control method for main shaft loading
column13: The invention relates to an automatic remote centralized control system and a centralized control method for main shaft loading. The system comprises a main shaft loading chamber, a main shaft truck room pressure monitoring system and a centralized control room, wherein the main shaft loading chamber, the main shaft truck room pressure monitoring system and the centralized control room exchange data through an optical fiber network to realize acquisition and control of equipment state information, the hardware of the centralized control room is composed of a network switch, an optical fiber transceiver and an industrial computer, a loading chamber control system comprises a programmable controller and a mining explosion-proof vacuum magnetic starter, the main shaft truck room pressure monitoring system comprises a network switch, an optical fiber transceiver and an industrial computer, and the loading chamber is provided with a console, and the working mode of the loading system is selected through a far and near control switch. The automatic remote centralized control system for main shaft loading not only realizes visual equipment operation and controllable equipment state, but also can perform self-diagnosis on the equipment through a powerful data processing function, and provides guarantee for preventive maintenance of a main lifting system.

column12: Automatic performance checking device for water quality monitoring instrument
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic performance checking device for a water quality monitoring instrument, which is connected with a water station system and comprises a box body and a door body covering the box body, a main control board, a multi-channel discharge valve, a first peristaltic pump, a stop valve and a sample supply cup are arranged in the box body, the first peristaltic pump, the multi-channel discharge valve and the stop valve are all electrically connected with the main control board, and the first peristaltic pump is electrically connected with the main control board. The multi-channel discharge valve is respectively communicated with a checking liquid bottle and a stop valve, the multi-channel discharge valve is communicated with a sample supply cup connected with a water quality analyzer through a first peristaltic pump, and the multi-channel discharge valve is communicated with a sample distribution cup of a labeling recovery device of a water station system through the stop valve. According to the automatic performance checking device for the water quality monitoring instrument, the main control board controls the operation of the multi-channel discharge valve so as to automatically supply a solution according to the performance required to be debugged, the multi-channel discharge valve is communicated with the checking liquid bottles, so that the water quality analyzer is conveniently and automatically debugged according to the prepared solution, the automation degree is high, and the working efficiency is high. And solution supply and replacement can be carried out without standing of preparation personnel.

column12: Glass edge grinding machine capable of accurately feeding
column13: The glass edge grinding machine comprises a glass edge grinding machine body machining base, a first driving motor is arranged at the bottom of the glass edge grinding machine body machining base, the output end of the first driving motor penetrates through the glass edge grinding machine body machining base and is provided with a first transmission shaft, and a supporting disc is arranged at the top of the first transmission shaft; a vacuum suction cup assembly is arranged on the supporting disc, a supporting column is arranged on the glass edge grinding machine body machining base, and a fixing base is arranged on the supporting column. According to the glass edge grinding machine, the transmission screw on the fixing base is in threaded fit with the sliding block, adjustment of large-distance moving feeding of the grinding wheel is facilitated, in addition, an extrusion structure is formed between the air cylinder and the extrusion block, fine adjustment of distance moving feeding of the grinding wheel is conducted through pressure signals of the pressure sensor, the glass edge grinding machine can achieve accurate feeding of the grinding wheel, and the grinding wheel can be accurately fed. Therefore, the feeding distance between the grinding wheel and the glass can be accurately controlled, accurate grinding of the glass is facilitated, and errors caused by abrasion of the grinding wheel are reduced.

column12: Iron ore iron content rapid detection device
column13: The utility model discloses a device for rapidly detecting iron content of iron ore, which belongs to the technical field of iron ore detection and comprises a device main body, a feeding port is arranged at the top of the device main body, supporting legs are welded at the bottom of the device main body, motors are arranged on two sides of the device main body, and an air cylinder, a dischargingport and a receiving barrel are respectively arranged on one side of the device main body. And the output end of the motor is connected with a rotating shaft, the outer surface of the rotating shaft is sleeved with a crushing roller, and the output end of the air cylinder is connected with a push block, so that the iron ore iron content rapid detection device is provided with a second guide plate,an iron sheet, a first electromagnet, a weighing sensor, a fixing rod and a second electromagnet. The ground iron and stone mixture falls onto a weighing sensor in the fixing rod along with a secondguide plate, when the iron and stone mixture on the weighing sensor reaches a certain mass, a first electromagnet is electrified to attract the iron sheet, and the iron and stone mixture is preventedfrom falling continuously, an air cylinder starts to work, and a push block is pushed to move forwards.

column12: Power supply circuit of explosion-proof and intrinsically safe mining 5G multifunctional base station access device
column13: The invention relates to a power supply circuit of an explosion-proof and intrinsically safe mining 5G multifunctional base station access device, which comprises a wiring terminal strip, the input end of the wiring terminal strip is electrically connected with alternating current, the output end of the wiring terminal strip is electrically connected with a power adapter, the BAT input end of the power adapter is electrically connected with the output end of a lithium manganate lithium ion battery pack, and the BAT input end of the power adapter is electrically connected with the output end of the lithium manganate lithium ion battery pack. The output end of the power adapter is electrically connected with the input end of the 12V DC/DC power module and the input end of the 54V DC/DC power module. The output end of the 12V DC/DC power module and the output end of the 54V DC/DC power module are both electrically connected with the input end of the data output board. In order to improve the stability and fault tolerance of mine communication power supply, the access device circuit is provided with a battery protection circuit, and has the functions of single battery overcharge voltage protection, single battery over-discharge voltage protection, charge overcurrent protection, discharge overcurrent protection, output short circuit protection, temperature protection and the like.
column15: LIU ZHIJIAN;;SUN HAOHE;;MA WENBO;;GUO QIANG;;YAN NING

column12: Systems and approaches for semiconductor metrology and surface analysis using secondary ion mass spectrometry
column13: Systems and approaches for semiconductor metrology and surface analysis using Secondary Ion Mass Spectrometry (SIMS) are disclosed. In an example, a secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS) system includes a sample stage. A primary ion beam is directed to the sample stage. An extraction lens is directed at the sample stage. The extraction lens is configured to provide a low extraction field for secondary ions emitted from a sample on the sample stage. A magnetic sector spectrograph is coupled to the extraction lens along an optical path of the SIMS system. The magnetic sector spectrograph includes an electrostatic analyzer (ESA) coupled to a magnetic sector analyzer (MSA).

column12: Toughened glass film tearing and static electricity removing fixing equipment
column13: The invention discloses tempered glass film tearing and static electricity removing fixing equipment. Comprising a rotating disc machine, a first support, an ion wind bar, a material box, a second support, a fixing assembly, a first shell, a through hole, a first through groove, a supporting sleeve, a first pneumatic suction cup, a wedge block, a first spring, a first guide block, a first guide rail, a positioning column, a first guide groove, a limiting groove, a top block, a second spring, a first rack, a second rack, a second guide block, a second guide rail, a third spring and a clamping jaw assembly. A linear module and a film opening assembly; the designed fixing assembly can automatically clamp glass of different specifications, and the application range is wider; the clamping jaw assembly is designed to have a material returning function, so that a protective film can be prevented from being adhered to the clamping jaw, and the safety of equipment is guaranteed; according to the film opening assembly, automatic film opening can be achieved, and the automation degree and the working efficiency of equipment are improved; the ion wind bar is used for removing static electricity, and the glass after film tearing is prevented from adsorbing dust.

column12: Material suction device for grinding machine
column13: The utility model provides a material suction device for a grinding machine, which comprises a lifting plate, at least one material suction mechanism is mounted below the lifting plate, and each material suction mechanism comprises a mounting plate mounted below the lifting plate and at least one group of sucker components arranged below the mounting plate. Each suction cup assembly comprises a suction cup body, a suction cup connector arranged on the suction cup body and a vacuum logic valve connected with the suction cup connector of the suction cup body, and a vacuum generator connected with each vacuum logic valve is further arranged on the lifting plate. A sensor used for sensing a workpiece sucked by the suction cup is further arranged below the mounting plate. Compared with the prior art, the material suction device has the advantages that the vacuum generator can be used in cooperation with a plurality of vacuum logic valves, when a workpiece is sucked, the suction cup body which is not sucked and vacant cannot leak air due to the action of the valve element in the vacuum logic valves, the suction cup body does not need to be dismounted according to the size of the workpiece, and the application range is enlarged.

column12: Anhydrous lithium hydroxide production device
column13: The utility model discloses an anhydrous lithium hydroxide production device and relates to the technical field of lithium hydroxide production. The anhydrous lithium hydroxide production device comprises a bottom plate, a supporting table is fixedly connected to the top of the bottom plate, a first storage barrel and a second storage barrel are sequentially arranged at the top of the supporting table, a mixing chamber and a grinding chamber are sequentially arranged at the top of the bottom plate, and a proportioning assembly is arranged at the top of the supporting table; the proportioning assembly is located below the first storage barrel and the second storage barrel, the proportioning assembly comprises two loading plates, the tops of the loading plates are fixedly connected with weighing sensors, and the tops of the weighing sensors are fixedly connected with loading parts. Through mutual cooperation of the controller, the proportioning component, the electromagnetic valve and other structures, the lithium ore and the limestone can be automatically proportioned, and the proportion of the lithium ore and the limestone is strictly controlled, so that the product quality is improved.
column14: YAHUA LITHIUM IND YAAN CO LTD

column12: DEVICE FOR CONTROLLING THE FUNCTION OF A VACUUM LIFTING DEVICE, AND VACUUM LIFTING DEVICE HAVING SUCH A CONTROL DEVICE
IN-SITU ETCH RATE OR DEPOSITION RATE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM
column13: A system is provided for in-situ ion beam etch rate or deposition rate measurement, including: a vacuum chamber; an ion beam source configured to direct an ion beam onto a first surface of a sample located within the vacuum chamber and to etch the first surface of the sample with an etch rate; or a material source configured to deposit material onto a first surface of a sample located within the vacuum chamber with a deposition rate; and an interferometric measurement device located at least partially within the vacuum chamber and configured to direct light onto a second surface of the sample and to determine the etch rate of the ion beam or the deposition rate of the deposited material in-situ based on light reflected from the sample.

column12: Automatic magnetic steel grabbing and placing device
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of magnetic steel production and discloses an automatic magnetic steel grabbing and placing device which comprises a linear conveying belt arranged on one side of the feeding end of a grinding machine, a six-axis robot is arranged on the side face of the linear conveying belt, a suction cup is installed at the output end of the six-axis robot, and a full-material tray position is arranged on one side of the six-axis robot. An empty tray position is arranged on one side of the full tray position, and the linear conveying belt, the six-axis robot and the suction cup are all in signal connection with the PLC. According to the automatic feeding device, the trays containing products are manually carried to the full tray position through the forklift, the six-axis robot drives the suction cup to suck up the products in the trays and carry the products to the linear conveying belt, then the linear conveying belt conveys the products to the grinding machine in sequence, automatic feeding of the products is achieved, and therefore the feeding efficiency is effectively improved, and the labor intensity of workers is reduced. And the labor intensity of workers is reduced.

column12: Carbon fiber plate polishing device for intelligent robot
column13: The carbon fiber plate polishing device for the intelligent robot comprises a base, two shells are symmetrically installed on the right side of the top end of the base, two fixing frames are symmetrically installed on the left side of the top end of the base, and a plurality of first leather cups are installed on the right sides of the fixing frames at equal intervals in the vertical direction; a clamping mechanism is assembled in an inner cavity of the shell, grinding mechanisms are assembled in inner cavities of the two fixing frames, and a driving mechanism is assembled on the left side of the base. The clamping mechanism comprises a first rotating disc installed in an inner cavity of the shell through a bearing. According to the carbon fiber plate polishing device for the intelligent robot, in actual use, a plate can be flexibly clamped through cooperation of a second leather cup and a first leather cup, the outer wall of the carbon fiber plate is prevented from being abraded, cracks are prevented, the product quality is guaranteed, meanwhile, manual adjustment of workers is not needed, and the production efficiency is improved. Therefore, the grinding and polishing track of the equipment can cover the whole plate, the high working efficiency is guaranteed, and the labor cost is saved.

column12: NANOELECTROMECHANICAL INTERFEROMETER FOR VISIBLE TO INFRARED WAVELENGTHS
column13: The present disclosure relates to an on-chip interferometer and a spectrometer comprising said interferometer. The present disclosure relates to an on-chip interferometer comprising a waveguide for propagation of an optical signal comprising an input waveguide; at least two interferometer arms comprising one or more slot waveguides; and an output waveguide; wherein the input waveguide is split into the at least two interferometer arms which are recombined into the output waveguide; and a control mechanism configured for controlling a relative time delay between optical signals propagating in the two interferometer arms by modifying one or more slot widths of one or more of the slot waveguides; and wherein the relative time delay is at least 1, 2, 5, or at least 10 fs or at least one optical period of the longest optical wavelength of the optical signal.

column12: Slurry pressure pipeline leakage test device and use method
column13: The invention provides a slurry pressure pipeline leakage test device and a use method. The test device comprises a slurry storage tank, a water storage tank, a main circulation pipeline, a leakage recovery pipeline, a tail slurry recovery channel and a cleaning pipeline, a slurry outlet pipe is arranged at the bottom of the slurry storage tank, and a first slurry return pipe and a second slurry return pipe are arranged at the top of the slurry storage tank. The main circulation pipeline comprises a first slurry pump, a main path ring pipe and a pressure excitation device arranged on the main path ring pipe, and the leakage recovery pipeline comprises a second slurry pump, a leakage recovery ring pipe, discharging pipes arranged at leakage detection points of the main path ring pipe and at least three leakage pipes with different diameters. Slurry leakage of the buried slurry conveying pipeline is simulated through the main circulation pipeline and the leakage recovery pipeline, influence factor analysis of the slurry leakage area and the leakage position is achieved, tests of slurry of different ore samples, slurry of different concentrations and solid-phase particle slurry of different gradation can be achieved, and the slurry pipeline leakage test device has important significance on slurry pipeline conveying.

column12: PERSONAL HANDHELD RAPID SLUSHY DRINK MAKER
column13: The present disclosure relates to a device for making slushy drinks from ingredients placed inside the device. When the device is placed and activated at an ambient temperature below the freezing temperature of the liquid ingredients placed inside, such as a home freezer, it creates a flow of chilled air inside the device. This flow of chilled air removes heat from the liquid inside by means of forced convection. This heat transfer mechanism is enhanced by using a high heat conducting finned heat exchanger and rotating the liquid using a bladed stirrer. When the slushy drink is ready to consume, the device sends an indication to the user and maintains the proper slushy composition until it is removed from the cold environment and consumed. The device is small, portable, and makes the slushy drink quickly.

column12: Accompanying crushing appliance which is safe to use
column13: The utility model provides a safe-to-use accompanying crushing appliance, which comprises a cup body, a crushing part, a driving part and a driving part, motor mounting base, wherein an annular matching surface and a convex annular extending wall are arranged on the main body; the annular extending wall is positioned on the outer edge of the annular matching surface; an ejector rod is arranged onthe annular matching face in a penetrating mode, a pressure sensor, a control unit and a motor are arranged in the motor installation base, the connecting part stretches into the inner side of the annular extending wall and abuts against the ejector rod so that the ejector rod can be pressed on the pressure sensor, a rotating shaft of the motor stretches into the cup body, and the smashing deviceis located in the cup body and installed on the rotating shaft of the motor. After a starting key on the generator mounting base is touched, when the pressure detected by the pressure sensor is not smaller than a preset threshold value, the control unit controls the motor to be started, the motor operates to smash materials at the moment, otherwise, the control unit controls the motor to stop, themotor cannot operate and cannot smash the materials at the moment, and the purpose of improving the use safety of the smashing device is achieved.

column12: TREATMENT SYSTEMS AND SMALL VOLUME APPLICATORS FOR TREATING TISSUE
column13: Systems for treating a subject's tissue can include a thermally conductive cup, a tissue-receiving cavity, and a vacuum port. The vacuum port is in fluid communication with the tissue-receiving cavity to provide a vacuum for drawing the submental tissue, or other targeted tissue, into the tissue-receiving cavity. A thermal device can cool and/or heat the conductive cup such that the conductive cup non-invasively controls the temperature of subcutaneous lipid-rich cells in the tissue. A restraint apparatus can hold a the conductive cup in thermal contact with the target region.

column12: 90-degree manipulator mechanism for full-automatic labeling machine
column13: The utility model discloses a 90-degree manipulator mechanism for a full-automatic labeling machine. Fixing support, a fixing module is mounted on one side of the fixing bracket; a rotating module isarranged on the fixed module; rotating module comprising a rotating shaft, a mechanical arm is mounted on the rotating shaft; the mechanical arm comprises a first rectangular arm and a second rectangular arm which are perpendicular to each other; grabbing modules are arranged at the ends, away from the rotating shaft, of the first rectangular arm and the second rectangular arm; the grabbing moduleis used for grabbing/putting down the grinding wheel; according to the 90-degree mechanical arm mechanism, forward rotation and reverse rotation of the mechanical arm are controlled through the servomotor, lifting of the lifting air cylinder and the negative-pressure suction cup achieve automatic taking and automatic discharging at the same time, the automation level of equipment is improved, meanwhile, the production cost is greatly reduced, and the production efficiency is improved.

column12: Automatic balancing device of parallel type mining crusher discharge port material receiving disc
column13: The invention discloses an automatic balancing device of a parallel type mining crusher discharge port material receiving disc, and relates to the technical field of crushers, the automatic balancing device comprises a supporting frame, and further comprises a material receiving disc, a fixed plate and a movable plate are arranged in the supporting frame, a material falling barrel is fixedly arranged on the movable plate, and the material receiving disc is arranged on the fixed plate; a material receiving disc connected with a discharging port of the crusher is arranged at the bottom of the material falling barrel, a baffle is arranged on one side of the fixed plate, a transmission block is arranged outside the baffle, a movable frame is arranged on the side wall of the material falling barrel, and rolling wheels making contact with the transmission block are arranged at the bottom of the movable frame; the discharging box is arranged in the supporting frame, and the discharging box is located above the conveying belt; a plurality of sensors and control systems do not need to be used, the transmission block is downwards extruded through the blanking barrel and the movable frame, and materials fall into the blanking box; the material receiving disc controls the opening amplitude of the baffle through the descending distance, and automatic balance of the discharging speed of the discharging port of the crusher and opening and closing of the baffle is achieved.

column12: Weighing flour mill
column13: The utility model provides a weighing flour mill, relates to the technical field of flour milling equipment, and solves the problems of excessive human intervention and unstable thickness of food materials during flour milling in the prior art. The host comprises a host shell, a motor and a connector, wherein the motor and the connector are arranged in the host shell. The connector is connected with a motor output shaft. The bottom of the host shell is connected with a pressure sensor; a compressible gap is formed between the bottom of the host shell and the top of the host base; the powder cup assembly comprises a blade, a powder cup and a powder cup cover, the blade is arranged on the inner side of the powder cup, the bottom end of the blade downwards extends out of the powder cup to be connected with the connector, and the powder cup cover detachably covers a top opening of the powder cup; the pressure sensor and the motor are connected with a control circuit, and the control circuit can control the working time of the motor according to the magnitude of input current of the pressure sensor. According to the utility model, food materials with more consistent thickness can be obtained, and human intervention in the grinding process is reduced.

column12: Anti-falling double-layer stainless steel cup
column13: The utility model discloses an anti-falling double-layer stainless steel cup which comprises a bottom sleeve, an inner container, a filter frame and a stainless steel cup body, the inner container isarranged in the stainless steel cup body, a vacuum cavity is formed between the stainless steel cup body and the inner container, a constant-temperature heating element is arranged in the vacuum cavity below the inner container, and the inner wall of the inner container is evenly coated with a ceramic coating. A temperature sensor is arranged at the bottom end of the interior of the inner container, a threaded sleeve is arranged in the center of the stainless steel cup body in a sleeving mode, the top ends of the movable columns are fixedly connected with the bottom of the stainless steel cupbody, and a control panel is fixed to one side of the bottom sleeve. The stainless steel cup body, the inner container, the vacuum cavity and the elastic element are installed, the longitudinal section of the elastic element is in a semi-arc shape, and the elastic element is made of rubber with a high elastic coefficient, so that when the cup is extruded and collided by the outside, the bufferingeffect can be achieved through deformation and recovery of the elastic element; and the device is not easy to break.

column12: Safety voice alarm equipment for continuous mining face
column13: The utility model discloses safety voice alarm equipment for a continuous mining face, which comprises a voice early warning device, an infrared sensor, a deviation sensor, a feed switch and a fence, the feed switch is positioned at the bottom of the fence, the output end of the infrared sensor is electrically connected with the voice early warning device, and the output end of the deviation sensor is electrically connected with the feed switch. According to the utility model, the voice early warning device, the infrared sensor, the deviation sensor, the feed switch and the fence are matched for use, so that the problems that accidents are easily caused and the safety during operation is reduced when people enter a working surface by mistake due to unattended operation of a working environment during operation of an existing crusher are solved; the safety voice alarm equipment for the continuous mining working face has the advantage of being capable of improving operation safety when unattended, and is worthy of popularization.

column12: FULLY AUTOMATIC CELL CULTURE SYSTEM AND METHOD
column13: Disclosed in the present inventions is a fully automatic cell culture system. The fully automatic cell culture system comprises a pre-analysis device, a cell culture device, and a control device. The pre-analysis device comprises an automated centrifuge electrically connected with the control device, a first multi-directional motion transfer mechanism, an automated plate lifting/lowering mechanism, a second multi-directional motion transfer mechanism, a fluorescence imaging identification mechanism, a constant temperature mechanism, an adjustable tilting and rotating mechanism, a solid-liquid separation recovery processing mechanism, and a reagent cryopreservation mechanism. The cell culture device comprises a culture tower electrically connected with the control device and a third multi-directional motion transfer mechanism; the culture tower is used for cell culture and incubation; and the third multi-directional motion transfer mechanism is used for transferring an incubator in the culture tower and a reagent for cell culture in the pre-analysis device. The fully automatic cell culture system in the present invention can implement real-time whole-process monitoring of a cell culture process, automated culture expansion, identification, classification and selection, and automatic data analysis and mining.

column12: Vacuum suction head device
column13: The vacuum suction head device comprises a negative pressure air supply assembly, a vacuum suction cup, an angle adjusting assembly, a pressure sensor, a transmission assembly, a conduction rod and a spring, and an air pipe connector of the negative pressure air supply assembly communicates with an air inlet of the vacuum suction cup so as to provide negative pressure for the vacuum suction cup; the vacuum chuck is installed at the first end of the transmission assembly, the second end of the transmission assembly abuts against the first end of the spring, and the second end of the spring is connected with the pressure sensor through the conduction rod. The angle adjusting assembly is in transmission connection with the vacuum suction cup and drives the vacuum suction cup to conduct angle adjustment. The angle of the vacuum suction cup can be accurately adjusted by arranging the angle adjusting assembly, mounting of heat dissipation covers of different sizes and specifications can be met, the pressure of the vacuum suction cup on an adsorbed workpiece can be monitored in real time by arranging the pressure sensor, pressure feedback in the mounting process is achieved, the technological requirement is met, and meanwhile the mounting efficiency is improved. column12: Host device of full-automatic beading machine
column13: The utility model discloses a host device of a full-automatic bead turning machine. The host device comprises a base module, a lower cutter servo motor and a left-right adjusting hand wheel, the device is reasonable in structural design; practicality is high, during work, raw materials are conveyed through the feeding groove; the ejector pin is driven to clamp the raw material under the action ofthe ejector pin stepping motor and the ejector pin clamping servo motor; the thimble up-and-down alignment adjusting screw and the thimble left-and-right alignment adjusting screw are convenient for adjusting the up-and-down height and the left-and-right distance of the thimble according to the size of a raw material; the front-back adjusting hand wheel and the left-right adjusting hand wheel canconveniently adjust the position of the raw material relative to the base module; the cutter head left-right servo motor can adjust the cutter head to move left and right, the lower cutter servo motordrives the cutter head to move downwards for cutting and grinding, the cutter head rotating servo motor can drive the cutter head to rotate, meanwhile, the suction cup air cylinder conveniently drives the suction cup to take materials, the working efficiency is improved, the automation degree is high, and batch bead turning is facilitated.

column12: Mining truck diesel oil preheating system and method of methanol engine and mining truck
column13: The invention discloses a mining truck diesel oil preheating system and method of a methanol engine and a mining truck. The mining truck diesel oil preheating system comprises the methanol engine, a methanol box and a diesel oil heating system. The methanol engine is provided with a water temperature sensor used for detecting the temperature of cooling liquid of the methanol engine in real time. The methanol tank is connected with an engine oil inlet of the methanol engine through an oil inlet pipe, a methanol pump is connected in series in the oil inlet pipe, and when the water temperature detected by the water temperature sensor is higher than a methanol starting set temperature, the methanol engine is directly started and operated by using methanol fuel in the methanol tank; the diesel oil heating system is connected with a water path of the methanol engine through a water pipe, when the water temperature sensor detects that the water temperature is lower than the methanol starting set temperature, the diesel oil heating system exchanges heat with circulating cooling liquid through heat generated by burning diesel oil, then the cooling liquid is preheated, and the methanol engine is started under the low-temperature condition. The problem that the mining truck with the methanol engine cannot be started under the low-temperature condition is effectively solved.

column13: The utility model discloses an automatic polishing device for telescope glass lenses, which comprises a positioning and placing machine table, a material moving mechanism, a feeding mechanism, a polishing mechanism and a surface polishing mechanism, the positioning and placing machine table is provided with a placing groove with fixed coordinates, the placing groove is used for placing the lenses, the material moving mechanism can move along three axes, and the feeding mechanism is used for feeding the lenses. A lifting material taking suction cup and two pneumatic claws are arranged on the material moving mechanism, the two pneumatic claws form an angle of 90 degrees and are fixed to the Z-axis moving mechanism through a rotating air cylinder, the rotating direction of the two pneumatic claws driven by the rotating air cylinder forms an angle of 45 degrees with the XZ plane and the XY plane, the rotating direction of the grinding mechanism is parallel to the YZ plane, and the rotating direction of the face grinding mechanism is parallel to the XZ plane. column12: Intelligent blender

column12: Edge grinding device for circuit board production
column13: The utility model relates to an edge grinding device for circuit board production, which comprises a first conveying mechanism, a first adjusting cover plate is arranged above the first conveying mechanism, a distance sensor is arranged on the inner side of the first adjusting cover plate, a placing plate is arranged at the discharging end of the first conveying mechanism, and edge grinding mechanisms are arranged on the left side and the right side of the placing plate. column12: Automatic grinding device for special-shaped part of bottom cover of vacuum cup
column13: The utility model provides an automatic grinding device for a special-shaped part of a bottom cover of a vacuum cup. The automatic grinding device comprises a workbench, a disc, a first industrial robot, a second industrial robot, a third industrial robot, a first motor and a second motor, wherein the disc is rotatably connected with the workbench. The disc is provided with eight mushroom-shaped workpiece carrying bases which are evenly distributed in the circumferential direction of the disc, and the workpiece carrying bases are rotatably connected with the disc. The first motor is used for driving the disc to rotate. The second motor is used for driving the workpiece carrier to rotate. Eight stations evenly distributed around the disc are arranged on the workbench, one station is a workpiece taking station, and the other seven stations are the three side face coarse grinding stations, the three side face fine grinding stations and the sky face fine grinding station in sequence from the workpiece taking station in the rotating direction of the disc. By means of the automatic grinding device, the labor intensity of workers can be reduced, and the quality of new products is guaranteed.

column12: METHODS FOR DETECTING ANTI-PORCINE ANTIBODIES
column13: The present application provides methods of predicting the risk of a subject developing a xenograft rejection response, methods of monitoring the risk of a subject developing a xenograft rejection response, methods of identifying a new porcine antigen(s) recognized by anti-porcine antibodies, methods for creating a porcine xenograft donor with a minimized likelihood of inducing a xenograft rejection response, as well as reagents and kits suitable for use in the described methods.

column12: Disposable cup collection device capable of unmanned payment and video information delivery
column13: The present invention relates to a cup collector including: a cup collector case; a cup with a barcode printed on the exterior thereof; a screen providing part located on one side of an outer front part of the case to provide a screen for at least one among cup collection, ordering, instruction and advertisement, and including a height recognition sensor for recognizing the height of a user; a cup collection part located on the other side of the front part of the case and including a cup inlet slidingly opened and closed in an upward direction to collect the cup; an information recognition part located at the lower end of the cup inlet and including a payment means and a barcode recognition means; a resource recovery part located at the lower end of the information recognition part to be slidingly opened and closed in a forward protruding shape to collect a resource; a first transfer part located on the inside of the cup collection part and including an input lift to move the cup for cleaning the collected cup; a cup washing part for washing the cup transferred from the first transfer part; a second transfer part including a transfer chain for transferring the cup through the cup washing part, and a fixing means installed on one side of the transfer chain for placing and fixing the cup; a cup compression part located in a lower part of the second transfer part to compress the washed cup; a third transfer part piercing one side of the second transfer part to transfer the cup from the second transfer part to the cup compression part, and including a discharge lift for transferring the cup from the second transfer part to the cup compression part and a passage cover having a hollow hole; a separating collection part located at the lower end of the cup compression part to collect the compressed cup; a purified water tank storing purified water used for washing the cup washing part and including a first pump for supplying the water to the cup washing part; and a wastewater tank collecting residues in the cup and wastewater after use for the washing. Therefore, the present invention is capable of eliminating the need for separate equipment for collecting a disposable cup.

column12: Milking system
column13: A milking system includes one or more milking devices and a control unit. The system is provided with a plurality of milking cups, a first milk jar for receiving the milking, a first pumping device for pumping the milking, a second milk jar for receiving the milking from the first milk jar, a second pumping device for pumping at least a part of the milking, and at least one storage tank for storing at least a part of the milking. The second pumping device pumps the milking at a lower flow rate than that at which the first pumping device pumps the milking. As a result, the milk is for the most part moved with low mechanical load and little admixture with air which improves milk quality. In the case of a plurality of milking devices in the milking system, various milkings can be moved and treated separately.
column15: VAN DE MEERENDONK ROBERTUS CAROLUS MARIA

column12: TESTING DATA CHANGES IN PRODUCTION SYSTEMS
column13: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable medium, for obtaining copies of resources at a canary server and from a hosting server. The resources include initial instructions for responding to requests from an external device. The canary server executes an update that modifies the initial instructions in the resources to create modified instructions. A router determines a routing of a request for resources that render a webpage based on parameters in the request. The request is processed using the modified instructions rather than the initial instructions and in response to the request router determining that the canary server is a destination of the determined routing of the request. The system determines a reliability measure of the update when the request is processed at the canary server. The reliability measure identifies whether the update will trigger a fault during execution at production servers of the system.

column12: PROTECTION SYSTEM FOR A POWER TOOL
column13: A protection system for a power tool is disclosed having a battery pack. The batter pack may be used with the power tool to supply an electrical consumer of the power tool with electrical energy, as well as hearing protection for a user of the power tool. The battery pack has a first control circuit, which is set up to, directly or indirectly, provide information relating to a value of an operating parameter of the power tool to a second control circuit of a hearing protector. The hearing protector has an audio output device, and the second control circuit is set up for this purpose, the audio output device uses the transmitted information to control generation of an audible warning output.

column12: TRACE DETECTION DEVICE
column13: A trace detection device including: an ion mobility tube ; a sampling gas path module ; a sample injection gas path module configured to introduce a sample carrier gas containing a sample collected by the sampling gas path module toward the ion mobility tube; and a gas chromatography apparatus capable of pre-separating the sample carrier gas, so as to form a pre-separated sample carrier gas; wherein the sample injection gas path module is further configured to be capable of switching between a first mode and a second mode, in the first mode, the sample injection gas path module introduces the sample carrier gas into the ion mobility tube; and in the second mode, the sample injection gas path module introduces the sample carrier gas into the gas chromatography apparatus to pre-separate the sample carrier gas, and the pre-separated sample carrier gas is introduced into the ion mobility tube.
column15: ZHANG QINGJUN;;LI YUANJING;;CHEN ZHIQIANG;;LI JIANMIN;;ZHU WEIPING;;MA QIUFENG;;CAO BIAO;;YAN LILI;;LI GE;;YANG NEI

column12: Experimental determination method for vertical gas well shaft flow pattern under high pressure condition
column13: The invention provides an experimental determination method for a shaft flow pattern of a vertical gas well under a high-pressure condition, and belongs to the technical field of gas well drainage and recovery processes. The method comprises the following steps: collecting target block parameters; carrying out a physical simulation experiment, and measuring the liquid holdup of the vertical shaft; the flow similarity of different gas flow velocities (liquid holdup) under different pressures (gas densities) is represented by constructing a similar criterion which expresses the gas density and changes along with the liquid holdup; flow similarity is represented by utilizing equal liquid holdup, a coefficient of a similarity criterion is fitted, the flow under different pressure conditions is normalized to the same similarity criterion, and curve superposition of the liquid holdup under normal pressure and medium pressure along with the change of the similarity criterion is realized; and calculating the value of the similar quasi number by using the production data of the high-pressure gas well, and converting the value to the airflow velocity corresponding to the normal-pressure condition, wherein the normal-pressure two-phase flow experimental flow pattern at the airflow velocity is the corresponding wellbore flow pattern of the high-pressure gas well. Therefore, the calculation method is simple and applicable, and a theoretical basis is provided for optimization design of the drainage and mining process.
column32: CHUAN XIE: "Experimental analysis and model evaluation of gas-liquid two phase flow through choke in a vertical tube", 《JOURNAL OF PETROLEUM SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING》;;任桂蓉: "川西水平气井井筒两相管流流型实验研究", 《中国优秀硕士学位论文全文数据库工程科技Ⅰ辑》;;刘琪等: "垂直管中气液两相混输压降的实验研究", 《工程研究(跨学科视野中的工程)》;;刘永辉等: "水平气井井筒气液两相流型预测", 《西南石油大学学报(自然科学版)》

column12: Scale-down physical experiment system and simulation method for supercritical CO2 geothermal exploitation
column13: The invention discloses a supercritical CO2 geothermal exploitation reduced-scale physical experiment system which comprises an S-CO2 generation system, an S-CO2 temperature and pressure control system, a small-scale geothermal simulation system, an S-CO2 recovery system, an S-CO2 pressure and temperature measuring system, a rock physical and mechanical property testing system and a safety protection system. According to the mixed numerical simulation method, a small-scale physical experiment system is utilized, and experiments are carried out under the conditions of different surrounding rock pressures, different reservoir temperatures, different S-CO2 injection temperatures and different flow velocities; performing physical and mechanical property measurement tests on the rock sample before and after the test to obtain small-scale physical experiment data, and analyzing physical and mechanical parameter changes of the rock sample before and after the test; and inputting physical and mechanical parameters of the tested rock sample into the small-scale numerical model, analyzing and calibrating the physical and mechanical parameters through the automatic parameter calibration system to obtain the physical and mechanical parameters of the rock sample, inputting the physical and mechanical parameters into the large-scale numerical model, and analyzing mining efficiency, dynamic disasters and feasibility under different thermal reservoir conditions, flow rates and pressures under engineering scales.

column12: Equipment suitable for automatic grinding of magnetic materials
column13: The utility model discloses equipment suitable for automatic grinding of magnetic materials. Including a machine frame, a workpiece arrangement vibration disc is connected to the upper portion of therack. A material distribution mechanism is arranged on one side of the workpiece arrangement vibration disc; a grabbing and transplanting assembly is arranged on one side of the linear vibration feeding rail, a suction cup assembly is connected to the grabbing and transplanting assembly, a grinding wheel adjusting assembly is arranged below the grabbing and transplanting assembly, a grinding positioning platform is arranged at one end of the grinding wheel adjusting assembly, and a ground finished product conveying belt is arranged at one end of the grinding positioning platform. Workpieces are arrayed through the workpiece arraying vibration disc, feeding is conducted through the linear vibration feeding rail, and automatic arraying and feeding of the workpieces are achieved. Whether a workpiece is in place or not is detected through the in-place detection sensor, the jacking piece is driven by the electromagnet push rod to separate the workpiece, and automatic separation of the workpiece is achieved.

column12: Copper smelting slag flotation control method
column13: The invention discloses a copper smelting slag flotation control method, which belongs to the technical field of copper smelting slag flotation, and comprises the following steps: foam detection devices are arranged in a first roughing flotation machine, a second roughing flotation machine and a scavenging flotation machine, and are used for detecting the flotation foam condition of each section on line in real time; the flotation process is optimized and controlled through the flotation expert system, and stability of the flotation system is achieved. According to the scheme, the flotation expert system carries out centralized analysis, processing and quantification on all data in the flotation process, all technological parameter control standards in the flotation process are continuously learned, and a flotation process model is established; through collection and analysis of raw ore grade, concentrate grade, tailing grade and other information, advantages and disadvantages of the flotation process are automatically judged, flotation process control parameters are automatically optimized until the parameters tend to the optimal state, and full-automatic control over the flotation process is achieved. On the premise of ensuring the concentrate grade, the copper content of tailings is reduced, the copper separation recovery rate is continuously increased, and great benefits are created for enterprises.

column12: Sucker type clamp for product boxing
column13: The utility model relates to a suction cup type clamp for product boxing, which comprises a robot flange, a fixing plate, a suction cup fixing seat and a square suction cup which are sequentially distributed and positioned on the same axis, the bottom end of the robot flange is connected with the fixing plate through bolts, and four groups of guide columns are uniformly distributed between the fixing plate and the suction cup fixing seat; the upper ends of the guide columns are slidably connected with the fixing plate, and springs are arranged outside the guide columns. The proximity switch is arranged to sense whether the square suction cup is in contact with a product or not, when the sizes of the products are different in a reasonable range, the square suction cup can still suck up the products with small sizes, meanwhile, the products can be prevented from being crushed when the sizes of the products are large, and after the square suction cup is in contact with the products, the products are prevented from being damaged. The guide column slides upwards along the fixing plate, the induction plate and the proximity switch are close to each other, and the proximity switch sends out a signal when detecting that the distance between the proximity switch and the induction plate is shortened, so that the servo system stops moving downwards.
column14: HEWEI HAUJIANLONG INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT LTD COMPANY

column12: Video-text cross-modal retrieval method and device based on multi-feature map attention network model
column13: The invention relates to a video-text cross-modal retrieval method and device based on a multi-feature map attention network model. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a multi-feature map attention network model for mining a structural relationship among different modal features of a video, and obtaining efficient video feature representation through advanced semantic information exchange among different video features; adopting a double-constraint sorting loss function to train the multi-feature map attention network model, wherein the double-constraint sorting loss function comprises a sorting constraint function between video-text pairs and a structure constraint function in single-class data, so that texts and videos with similar semantics can be similar in an embedding space; keeping the original structural characteristics in the embedding space; and performing video-text cross-modal retrieval by using the trained multi-feature map attention network model. According to the method, the retrieval performance of video-text retrieval is remarkably improved.
column15: WU DAYAN;;HAO XIAOSHUAI;;ZHOU YUCAN;;LI BO;;WANG WEIPING;;MENG DAN

column12: DETERMINING THE AVERAGE FREQUENCY OF A SERIES OF PULSES
column13: A method and device for determining an average frequency of a series of ion detection pulses (P) in a spectrometer can be applied to a measurement interval (MI). The method may comprise determining the duration of an auxiliary interval (AI1, AI2, ...), wherein the auxiliary interval overlaps the measurement interval, the auxiliary interval starts at the last pulse (P0) preceding the measurement interval (MI), and the auxiliary interval ends at the last pulse (PN) within the measurement interval. The method may further comprise determining the number of pulses during the auxiliary interval and dividing the number of pulses by the duration of the auxiliary interval so as to produce the average frequency. The method may be applied to a series of ion pulses produced by a voltage-to-frequency converter connected to a Faraday cup.

column12: Grinding device for polishing and edging glass magnesium fireproof plate
column13: The utility model discloses a grinding device for polishing and edging a glass magnesium fireproof plate, which comprises a workbench, a controller panel is arranged on the side surface wall of the workbench, two vertical plates are symmetrically arranged on the edge of the upper surface wall of the workbench, sliding rods are symmetrically arranged on the opposite sides of the two vertical plates, the outer surface walls of the sliding rods are connected with moving blocks in a sliding manner, and the moving blocks are arranged on the upper surface wall of the workbench. The number of the moving blocks is two, the opposite sides of the two moving blocks are fixedly connected with a moving supporting plate, and the moving supporting plate is located above the workbench. According to the grinding device for polishing and edge grinding of the glass magnesium fireproof plate, by arranging a suction cup, a vacuum groove, an air suction pipeline, a three-way pipe fitting, a vacuum pump and a calibration line, the fixing effect of the glass magnesium fireproof plate can be simple, rapid and stable, and therefore the grinding efficiency of the device can be improved; and by arranging a laser distance sensor, a hydraulic rod, a sliding block, a sliding groove, a grinding motor and a grinding wheel, the grinding applicability of the grinding device to the glass magnesium fireproof plates with different widths can be improved.

column12: Automatic planting robot system for leaf vegetable seedlings
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of agricultural intelligent equipment, and provides a leaf vegetable seedling automatic planting robot system which comprises a planting robot, a visual inspection mechanism, a cache mechanism, a seedling tray conveying mechanism and a planting plate conveying mechanism. The seedling raising tray conveying mechanism is used for conveying seedling raising trays to a seedling taking area, the planting plate conveying mechanism is used for conveying planting plates to a seedling placing area, and planting cups are supported in the seedling raising trays; the field planting robot is used for clamping a plurality of field planting cups from the seedling taking area and transferring the field planting cups to the photographing area, and the visual detection mechanism is used for judging whether seedlings exist in the field planting cups or not and judging whether the seedlings are good seedlings or bad seedlings in a visual detection mode; and the planting robot transfers the planting cups corresponding to the bad seedlings and the empty cups to a recovery area, transfers the planting cups corresponding to the good seedlings to a planting plate, and uses a cache mechanism to fill the seedlings with the seedlings or store the seedlings. According to the leaf vegetable seedling planting device, automatic planting of leaf vegetable seedlings can be achieved, and it is ensured that the planting cups corresponding to the good seedlings with the consistent growth vigor are planted on the planting plate.

column12: Multi-layer and multi-grid arranged cell co-culture device and co-culture equipment
column13: The utility model relates to a multi-layer and multi-grid arranged cell co-culture device and co-culture equipment, the device comprises a culture tank, the top end of the culture tank is provided with an opening, the culture tank is internally provided with vertically arranged partition plates, and the partition plates divide the culture tank into a plurality of cavities; the culture dish rack is placed in each cavity of the culture tank and comprises a plurality of cup-shaped containers and a mounting part for mounting the cup-shaped containers in the culture tank, each cup-shaped container comprises a cup bottom and a cup side wall, the plurality of cup-shaped containers are sequentially arranged in the vertical direction and form a multi-layer structure in each cavity, and the mounting part is used for mounting the cup-shaped containers in the culture tank. A culture area is arranged at the cup bottom of the cup-shaped container, and a first exchange hole is formed in the cup side wall of the cup-shaped container. The device can accommodate various cells in a spatial distribution manner, is not limited by the types of the accommodated cells, can accurately simulate the physiological environment of the cells, constructs more real physiological and pathological models, and effectively improves the accuracy and efficiency of a simulation experiment in a complex environment.

column12: Dish-washing machine heat exchanger positioning and grabbing clamp
column13: The utility model relates to a dish-washing machine heat exchanger positioning and grabbing clamp and a special machine clamp.
