The lower side of the special machine clamp connecting module is connected with a special machine clamp air cylinder gripper clamp. The dish-washing machine heat exchanger automatic grabbing and placing device is provided with the special machine clamp robot connecting unit, the special machine clamp suction cup clamp and the special machine clamp air cylinder gripper clamp, electrical control is carried out, and automatic grabbing and placing of the dish-washing machine heat exchanger by an industrial robot can be achieved; the dish-washing machine heat exchanger subjected to hot melting can be conveniently taken out and placed on a conveying line to be conveyed to the next working procedure, industrial automatic production is achieved, and the production efficiency is effectively improved.

Accordingly, the effects of facial skin firming, cleaning, beautifying and caring are achieved.

column12: Building robot
column13: The utility model discloses a building robot and relates to robot equipment. The utility model aims to provide the building robot which can finish different types of building workers, saves labor and is safe to use. The building robot comprises a robot body, the tail end of the robot body is provided with a first quick-change connector, the first quick-change connector is connected with an executing mechanism, the executing mechanism comprises a putty spraying assembly, a dust collection gripper assembly and a sponge suction cup assembly, and the three assemblies can be connected with the first quick-change connector of the robot body respectively. The putty spraying assembly comprises an electric push rod and a spray gun, the electric push rod is connected with a pulling plate, and the pulling plate is in contact with a handle of the spray gun; the dust collection gripper assembly comprises a dust collection fixing plate, and a grinding machine is arranged on the dust collection fixing plate. The sponge suction cup assembly comprises a suction cup mounting plate, and a sponge suction cup is arranged on the suction cup mounting plate.

column12: Low-speed spiral shaft type small juice and pomace automatic separation type juicer
column13: The invention provides a low-speed screw shaft type small juice and pomace automatic separation type juicer which comprises a juicing system and a control system, the juicing system comprises a juice collecting cup, a feeding cylinder, a screw shaft and a filter screen, and the screw shaft is sequentially provided with a cutting shaft section, a juicing shaft section and a grinding shaft section from top to bottom; the shaft diameter of the juicing shaft section is sequentially increased in the direction from the joint of the juicing shaft section and the cutting shaft section to the grinding section; a residue outlet is formed in one side of the juice collecting cup, and when fruits rotate along with the spiral shaft, the fruits are pushed downwards along threads on the spiral shaft to pass through the cutting shaft section, the juicing shaft section and the grinding shaft section in sequence; the control system comprises a motor, a PLC, an expansion module, a frequency converter and a sensor, high speed is changed into low speed, a traditional blade is changed into a spiral shaft, juicing is achieved in a low-speed spiral extrusion juicing mode, and the device is controlled based on the PLC electrical control system, so that use and operation are more intelligent and convenient; the life quality and the life experience of people are improved.

column12: MACHINE, CONTAINER, SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PREPARING ICE CREAM OR CHILLED DESSERTS ON DEMAND
Controlled-release fertilizer constant-temperature rapid extraction instrument
column13: The utility model discloses a constant-temperature rapid leaching instrument for a controlled-release fertilizer. The utility model belongs to the technical field of digesters. The device comprises awater tank, a flowmeter, an ultrasonic device, a temperature sensor, a controller and an electric heater, a flow meter is mounted on one side of the outer surface of the water tank; a drain valve is arranged below the flow meter; a magnetic valve is arranged above the inner surface of the water tank; heat preservation layers are fixed to the two sides of the magnetic valve. A water inlet valve ismounted above the heat preservation layer; a flow guide hole is formed in the middle of the water tank; the emptying valve is mounted on one side of the extraction cup fixing plate, and the pressure gauge is fixed on the other side of the extraction cup fixing plate, so that the pressure in the water tank can be observed and released in time, a human body is prevented from being burnt and injuredwhen taking a sample, the water level observation hole is replaced with the flowmeter, the observation effect is remarkable, and meanwhile, the trouble of fuzzy inner surface of the hole is avoided.

column12: Filter screen vacuum cup
column13: According to the technical scheme, the filter screen vacuum cup is characterized by comprising a cup body, a cup cover is detachably connected to the upper end of the cup body, an inner container is fixedly arranged in the cup body, a limiting ring is fixedly arranged at the upper end of the inner wall of the inner container, a filtering device is in lap joint with the interior of the inner container, and a lap joint ring is integrally formed on the outer edge of the upper end of the filtering device. The lap joint ring is in lap joint with the upper end of the limiting ring, the lower end ofthe filtering device is rotationally connected with a storage box, a plurality of first filtering holes are formed in the outer side wall of the filtering device, a plurality of second filtering holesare formed in the outer side wall and the bottom of the storage box, and the diameter of the first filtering holes is larger than that of the second filtering holes. A temperature sensor is fixedly arranged at the lower end of the outer side wall of the inner container; a temperature display screen is fixedly arranged at the outer end of the cup body; according to the utility model, the problemsthat crushed tea leaves can flow out along the filtering holes and the temperature of hot water in the vacuum cup cannot be directly known through external observation due to larger aperture of the filtering holes in the existing filtering screen are solved.

column12: 90-degree manipulator mechanism for full-automatic labeling machine
column13: The invention discloses a 90-degree manipulator mechanism for a full-automatic labeling machine. The 90-degree manipulator mechanism for the full-automatic labeling machine comprises a fixing support,a fixing module is installed on one side of the fixing support, a rotating module is arranged on the fixing module, the rotating module comprises a rotating shaft, a mechanical arm is installed on the rotating shaft, the mechanical arm comprises a first rectangular arm and a second rectangular arm which are perpendicular to each other, grabbing modules are arranged at one ends, away from the rotating shaft, of the first rectangular arm and the second rectangular arm correspondingly, and the grabbing modules are used for grabbing/putting down a grinding wheel. According to the 90-degree manipulator mechanism, the forward rotation and the reverse rotation of the mechanical arm are controlled through a servo motor, and automatic material falling is completed while automatic material taking is achieved through lifting of an lifting air cylinder and a negative pressure suction cup together, the production cost is greatly reduced while the automation level of equipment is improved, and theproduction efficiency is improved.

column12: Full-automatic glass inspection and conveying system
column13: The invention discloses a full-automatic glass inspection and conveying system. The full-automatic glass inspection and conveying system comprises a conveying unit, a detection unit and a production unit, wherein the conveying unit comprises a conveying machine tool and an automatic glass finished product discharging device, and is connected with the detection unit and the production unit; the detection unit comprises an inspection machine, and an inspection device is arranged in the inspection machine; the production unit sequentially comprises a manufacturing machine, a cutting machine, an edge grinding machine, a printing machine, a tempering machine and a packaging machine; and the detection unit is connected between the tempering machine and the packaging machine. By the system, automation of glass inspection and conveying is realized, manual transportation is replaced, the working efficiency is improved, and the damage of glass is relieved; the whole system is made into a U shape, so that the occupied area is reduced; and the automatic glass finished product discharging device is used, so that air leakage of a suction cup caused by glass collision in the conveying process of the glass is avoided, and the circumstance of conveying failure of the automatic glass finished product discharging device is reduced.

column12: Non-stop intermittent pumping control method for pumping well
column13: According to the non-stop intermittent pumping control method for the pumping well, the oil well productivity serves as the target, a reasonable yield interval is determined by combining the pump efficiency and historical yield data, and the non-stop intermittent pumping control method for the pumping well is achieved by establishing an IPR production curve, calculating a reasonable bottomhole flowing pressure interval and a working fluid level fluctuation range, formulating different non-stop intermittent pumping operation cycles and combining a working fluid level recovery curve test. The optimal continuous swabbing and swinging time is determined, the optimal non-stop intermittent pumping oil extraction operation cycle is given through continuous correction of the non-stop intermittent pumping operation cycle, and on the basis that influence factors of a non-stop intermittent pumping working system are analyzed and nine mutually independent factors are optimized, a BPNN neural network algorithm is adopted, so that the continuous swabbing and swinging time of the non-stop intermittent pumping oil extraction operation cycle is optimized. And the non-stop intermittent pumping normal operation time is used as an analysis mining object, so that the optimal operation time of the pumping well is determined.
column15: ZHENG DONGLIANG;;ZENG PENG;;LI SHICHAO;;SHI SHUO;;ZHANG LITING;;LING XIAO

column12: Mining locomotive explosion-proof box and using method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a mining locomotive anti-explosion box and a using method thereof, and relates to the technical field of mining anti-explosion, the mining locomotive anti-explosion box comprises an anti-explosion box body, a heat exchanger and an air pressure sensor, one side of the anti-explosion box body is provided with a sealing door through a hinge piece, and the outer wall of one end of the sealing door is provided with a control panel; a temperature sensor is installed below the control panel, and a locking piece is installed on the inner wall of the sealing door. A handle is held by a hand to reciprocate up and down, an arc-shaped piece drives a pull rod to circularly move up and down at the same time, a piston repeatedly inflates in an inflation device, then air is pumped into a sealed air bag through an air pipe, a one-way valve prevents the air from flowing back, and the sealed air bag expands to fill a gap between a first sealing groove and a second sealing groove. The sealing performance is better, serious explosion caused by dust entering is avoided, and the problem of poor sealing performance is solved.
column14: XIANGYANG BAISHENGXIN MACHINERY TECH CO LTD

column12: Low-weak light image enhancement method and device based on RAW image
column13: The invention relates to a low-weak light image enhancement method and device based on an RAW image, and belongs to the technical field of image processing. According to the method, a multi-scale parallel deep neural network for low-weak light image enhancement is provided, and cascade connection of different deep network branches is realized through convolution modular design, so that complementary features are fully extracted, and computing resources are reasonably allocated. Meanwhile, the data advantages of the RAW format-based low-weak light image are deeply analyzed, and the high-resolution RAW image, especially the spatial information and channel characteristics of a green channel, are fully utilized, so that better detail feature extraction and hidden information mining are achieved, and efficient low-weak light image enhancement based on the RAW image is realized; and balance between the image enhancement quality and the model processing efficiency is realized. According to the method, the robustness recovery capability of the low-weak light image enhancement network on low-weak light images with different information contents is effectively improved, the low-weak light enhancement quality of a real image is improved, and the authenticity of the real low-weak light enhancement image is ensured.

column12: Micro-earthquake monitoring system for hot dry rock mining
column13: The invention relates to a microseism monitoring system for hot dry rock mining, and relates to the technical field of energy mining. Comprising a heat exchange device and a central control processing module, a central processing unit of the central control processing module is used for presetting a liquid injection pressure range according to use requirements and rock mass structure conditions, and different initial liquid injection pump rotating speeds are set according to types of liquid injected into a liquid injection well so as to inject liquid into the liquid injection well; the rotating speed of the liquid injection pump is adjusted on the basis of the initial rotating speed of the liquid injection pump in real time according to the distribution condition of the cracks, so that the liquid injection pressure is kept within the preset liquid injection pressure range, and the liquid injection process is accurately controlled; and the liquid injection pressure is monitored in real time through the pressure sensor, and the liquid return temperature in the mining process according to the use requirements is monitored in real time through the temperature sensor, so that accurate control over the liquid injection process is further improved, and the resource utilization rate is increased.

Diagnosis of a number of clinical conditions relies on imaging of the various tissues of the eye. column12: EKG DEVICE
METHOD FOR TESTING GRINDING BALLS FOR IMPACT RESISTANCE
column13: FIELD: mechanical testing.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to methods for mechanical testing, in particular to a method for testing grinding balls. The claimed method for testing grinding balls for impact resistance includes a comprehensive test of 2 test balls repeatedly colliding with each other throughout the entire test time, while during the test the first ball 1 is located in the socket of the lower stationary holding device 3, and the second ball 2 is located in the socket of the upper movable holding device 4, which is driven directly by a hydraulic or pneumatic plunger, while the second ball 2 simultaneously with the upper holding device 4 rises to a predetermined height and then descends, in this case, the upper ball 2 collides with the lower ball 1, then the process cycle is repeated with a frequency of 60 to 450 beats per minute, depending on the type of impact machine used.EFFECT: premature detection of defective batches of grinding balls during the impact resistance test due to a more accurate simulation of the impact of balls, when working in ball mills when grinding ores and other materials, using multiple mutual collision of a pair of balls throughout the entire test time on a pneumatic (hydraulic) impact unit, which allows assess the possibility of destruction of balls that have passed the impact strength tests under metal fatigue conditions.1 cl, 2 dwg, 1 tbl

column12: Adsorption Parallel Machining Robot
column13: The application discloses an adsorption parallel machining robot, including a machining module and an adsorption module. The machining module includes a fixed platform, a movable platform, multiple branch chains and end effector; multi-degree-of-freedom motion is achieved through linear motion of the multiple branch chains. The adsorption module includes multiple fixed adsorption branch chains, each of which includes a connecting bracket, an adsorption device, an adsorption locking device, an omnidirectional wheel and a driving device, and is used for achieving adsorption and movement of the robot on the surface of a workpiece. Besides the locking function, the locking device additionally has a cleaning function, and residual cutting chips on the robot can be removed. The robot has the beneficial effects of flexible local posture adjustment, high processing efficiency, wide processing range, easy disassembly and assembly, good portability and low energy consumption, which can meet the demand for mobile processing of large components.

column12: A DEVICE INCREASING ENGINE EFFICIENCY AND REDUCING EXHAUST AND NOISE
column13: A device increasing engine efficiency and reducing exhaust and noise, comprising: the liquid catalyst pressured spraying exhaust gas reducing system, the exhaust gas bypass pipe, and the high temperature plasma exhaust gas reducing device, and the three are linked to achieve the effect of: without replacing the catalytic converter, the catalyst carrier can easily remove accumulated dirt and the block on the through holes, reduce the resistance of the exhaust gas, increase the horsepower of the engine, etc., thereby improving the efficiency of the engine and reducing the exhaust gas, so as to achieve degrading pollutants, makes vehicles comply with environmental regulations, and saves maintenance costs.

column12: Ultrasonic cell crusher with temperature adjusting function
column13: The utility model discloses an ultrasonic cell disruptor with a temperature adjusting function. The ultrasonic cell disruptor comprises a device shell, a lifting cylinder and a rotating motor, the interior of the device shell is hollow to form a working cavity, the lifting motor is fixed to the top of the device shell through a mounting base, and an output shaft of the lifting air cylinder penetrates through the device shell to be arranged in the working cavity; a gland is mounted on an output shaft of the lifting motor through a bearing; the rotating motor is fixed to the bottom of the device shell through a mounting base, and an output shaft of the rotating motor penetrates through the device shell to be arranged in a rotating groove in the bottom of the working cavity. A rotating disc is rotationally arranged in the rotating groove, and the rotating disc is connected with an output shaft of the rotating motor; a supporting cup fixing seat is fixed above the rotating disc, and a supporting cup is placed on the supporting cup fixing seat. According to the utility model, the heating sheet and the refrigerating sheet are controlled by the temperature sensor, so that the temperature in the supporting cup is kept balanced, and the cell crushing effect is further ensured.

column12: Shallow geothermal field monitoring device
column13: The utility model provides a shallow ground temperature field monitoring device. The shallow ground temperature field monitoring device comprises a protection pipe, a plurality of heat exchange pipes,a temperature field monitoring cable, a pipe clamp and a positioner, the positioner is connected with the bottom end of the protective tube; a plurality of temperature sensors are arranged on the temperature field monitoring cable; the temperature field monitoring cable is sequentially divided into a heat exchange monitoring area, a heat exchange influence monitoring area and an original ground temperature monitoring area. The heat exchange monitoring area is fixed on the heat exchange pipe through a pipe clamp; and the heat exchange influence monitoring area and the original ground temperature monitoring area are connected with the positioner. The temperature sensors on the three monitoring areas are used for monitoring the temperature of the ground source heat pump heat exchange area, the heat exchange influence monitoring area and the original ground temperature area respectively, and temperature monitoring of the ground source heat pump heat exchange area, the heat exchange influence area and the original ground temperature area can be achieved only by arranging the monitoring devices in the mining holes. Not only can the geological environment monitoring cost be reduced, butalso the problem of inaccurate shallow geothermal layer temperature field monitoring caused by the fact that the distance between an original geothermal monitoring hole and a heat exchange hole of a traditional geological environment monitoring system is large is solved.

column12: High-strength rock mass in-situ low-energy-consumption rock crushing excavation robot and excavation method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of mine underground rock breaking, and provides a high-strength rock mass in-situ low-energy-consumption rock breaking excavation robot and a tunneling method.The tunneling robot comprises a walking mechanism and a robot body arranged on the walking mechanism, and the robot body at least comprises an electric power system and a control system; the robot body is provided with an omnibearing supporting mechanism, an environment sensing system, a drilling and expansion rock breaking system, a rock crushing and raking system and a rock slag collecting and transporting system, and the control system comprises a tunneling parameter intelligent dynamic analysis module, a communication module and an intelligent navigation module. The tunneling robot integrates multiple functions of drilling, rock breaking, rock crushing, slag conveying and the like, rock breaking is carried out by fully utilizing in-situ engineering geological conditions of rock mass and mechanical characteristics of compression resistance, no tensile resistance and shear resistance of rock materials, lumpiness control after ore rock crushing can be achieved, rock breaking efficiency is effectively improved, excavation energy consumption is reduced, and the tunneling robot is suitable for large-scale popularization and application. And safe, stable and continuous rock breaking operation is achieved.

column12: FLOW AND PRESSURE CONTROL DEVICE
column13: A flow and pressure control device, pertaining to the field of flow control or hydraulic transmission, and solving the problem in which the inscribed circle radius of a passage section of a conventional flow control valve is small and therefore not conducive to flow control and pressure transmission of an inhomogeneous fluid or a viscous fluid. The flow and pressure control device comprises: a valve body, a flow limiting core and an adjustment device The valve body comprises: an outlet pipe, a transition cavity and an inlet pipe having a circular or elliptical cross section. The flow limiting core can be completely inserted into the inlet pipe, and blocks a fluid passage of the inlet pipe. An inclined and inwardly recessed surface is provided at an end portion of the flow limiting core. The adjustment device is used to adjust the depth by which the flow limiting core is inserted into the inlet pipe. An operating section of the flow and pressure control device is approximately circular or approximately elliptical or is a combination of a partially circular shape and a partially elliptical shape. In the case where the invention has the same pass-through section proportions as the prior art, the diameter of passing particles are at least 2-10 times, thereby reducing the interference of impurities and fouling on operation the device, reducing energy consumption, and reducing wear and tear of the device.

column12: Preparation method for nondestructive testing metal samples with controllable roughness and internal defects
column13: The invention discloses a preparation method for nondestructive testing metal samples with controllable roughness and internal defects, and belongs to the technical field of metal nondestructive testing. According to design principles of surface roughness of samples and preset internal defect requirements, a three-dimensional digital model is drawn. A channel connecting internal defects with non-testing surfaces is designed and used for a runner, an overflow discharging system and a supporting system for precision casting. By light curing 3D printing, the digital model is made into a high waxresin model, supporting is removed, curing is conducted, and the resin model is fixed in a steel cup. Gypsum is poured, the resin model is wrapped, after vacuum degassing and curing, the model is placed in a constant temperature furnace to be heated, and resin is removed. Molten alloy is injected into the hollow gypsum model, the gypsum is crushed and cleaned after solidification and cooling, anda nondestructive testing metal sample containing complex defects is obtained. According to the preparation method for the nondestructive testing metal samples with controllable roughness and internaldefects, the requirements of surface roughness and preset internal defects of a standard sample are met, and the high-efficient and accurate preparation requirements of nondestructive testing standardsamples of metal parts for casting and metal additive production are realized.

Method for characterizing biological part based on dual-fluorescent reporter gene system and biological part library constructed thereon
column13: A method for identifying and characterizing biological parts based on omics datasets and a dual-fluorescent reporter gene system, and a biological part library constructed thereon are provided, relating to a technical filed of biology. The method includes steps of: identifying the biological parts using the omics datasets; constructing a single-fluorescent reporter gene system using a shuttle vector pEZ15Asp as a skeleton for screening and determining fluorescent reporter genes; obtaining a dual-fluorescent reporter gene system skeleton; constructing recombinant plasmids, and finally transforming into competent cells for quantitative analysis of fluorescence intensities. The present invention is convenient and quick, and can screen and identify different biological parts such as RBS, UTRs, promoters, and terminators of different intensities in batch quantitatively in a relatively short time. Moreover, the present invention can quickly expand the biological part library of Z. mobilis, so as to be applied in metabolic engineering of different demands.

column12: PUMPING DEVICE, A SINGLE-USE DEVICE AND A METHOD FOR OPERATING A PUMPING DEVICE
column13: A pumping device includes a single-use device and a reusable device. The single-use device is to be inserted into the reusable device and includes two pump units in series, one behind the other. Each pump unit includes a rotor for a bearingless motor, and can be magnetically levitated and driven without contact for rotation about an axial direction. The reusable device includes a stator for each rotor which form an electromagnetic rotary drive for rotating the rotor about the axial direction. Each stator is a bearing and drive stator with which the rotor can be magnetically driven and levitated without contact with respect to the stator. An independent control device is provided for each stator, and can independently activate a respective stator.

column12: Finished dye automatic collecting device for dye production
column13: The invention discloses an automatic finished dye collecting device for dye production, and relates to the technical field of dye production, the automatic finished dye collecting device comprises a bottom plate, a grinding mechanism for grinding dye is arranged on the bottom plate, a discharging pipe is arranged on the grinding mechanism, and a valve assembly is arranged on the discharging pipe; a first conveying mechanism and a lifting mechanism are arranged on the bottom plate, the first conveying mechanism is used for conveying the charging boxes to the lifting mechanism, a sliding seat used for bearing the charging boxes is arranged on the lifting mechanism, and the sliding seat is arranged below the discharging pipe; a second conveying mechanism and a sealing mechanism are arranged below the grinding mechanism, the second conveying mechanism is used for conveying sealing covers to the sealing mechanism, a second air cylinder and a vacuum suction cup are arranged on the sealing mechanism, and the second air cylinder is used for driving the valve assembly and the sealing mechanism; a discharging mechanism is arranged below the lifting mechanism, a sensor is arranged on the discharging mechanism, and the sensor is electrically connected with the second air cylinder. During operation, automatic grinding and automatic packaging are completed, and damage to human bodies caused by manual operation is avoided.

column12: Spoiler polishing table
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of spoiler polishing tables, in particular to a spoiler polishing table which comprises a bottom frame, a hollow pipe is arranged at the top of the bottom frame, positioning blocks are arranged on the two sides of the hollow pipe, a polishing table body is arranged at the tops of the positioning blocks and is an inclined panel, and a profiling tool is arranged on the front face of the polishing table body. A quick-change disc is arranged at the joint of the back face of the profiling tool and the base, and suction cups are arranged on the two sides, close to the bottom, of the front face of the profiling tool. The grinding tool can be matched with the track of a robot, each point can be ground in place, compared with a clamp, due to the fact that the grinding tool is provided with a plurality of limiting grooves, the grinding precision is ensured while it is ensured that a product cannot move, the working efficiency is greatly improved, the bottom frame and the supporting blocks arranged on the front side and the rear side of the bottom frame form a triangle, and therefore the grinding precision is improved. Therefore, good stability is achieved, and the supporting effect is better.

column12: Robot tail end multi-station grinding head mounting mechanism and grinding device
column13: The utility model provides a robot tail end multi-station polishing head mounting mechanism and a polishing device. The mounting mechanism comprises a polishing head main connecting base used for being connected with the tail end of a robot, a plurality of polishing head mounting base assemblies used for mounting polishing heads and inclined transition blocks used for adjusting the angles of the polishing heads and the polishing head mounting base assemblies. At least one polishing head mounting seat assembly in the multiple polishing head mounting seat assemblies is mounted on the side wall of the polishing head main connecting seat through the oblique transition block, and rapid and accurate setting of the polishing angle can be achieved by selecting the oblique transition blocks with different angles. And other polishing head mounting seat assemblies in the plurality of polishing head mounting seat assemblies are mounted on the side wall of the polishing head main coupling seat. column12: DRUG DELIVERY DEVICE WITH MEANS FOR DETERMINING EXPELLED DOSE
column13: The present invention provides a drug delivery device (1) of the type in which a piston rod (10, 110) extends along a reference axis and is forced to rotate in an expelling direction about the reference axis during a dose expelling event to cause an expelling of drug from a drug reservoir (30, 130), and a resilient ratchet element (12) is operatively coupled with the piston rod (10, 110) and undergoes a deflecting motion comprising elastic deformation and recovery in response to an expelling of a predetermined dose increment, which deflecting motion occasions a velocity fluctuation of the piston rod (10, 110), comprising: a rotator module (50, 150) operatively coupled with the piston rod (10, 110) and configured to rotate about the reference axis against a rotation resisting force in response to a rotation of the piston rod (10, 110) in the expelling direction, the rotator module (50, 150) comprising a sensor system (70, 71; 170, 183; 270, 183) for monitoring a torque transferred by the piston rod (10, 110) during the dose expelling event, wherein the sensor system (70, 71; 170, 183; 270, 183) is configured to, from the monitored torque, identify occurrences of velocity fluctuation of the piston rod (10, 110) attributable to the deflecting motion of the resilient ratchet element 15 (12).

column12: Road spraying system for open-pit mine
column13: The utility model provides a road spraying system for an open pit mine, which comprises a plurality of groups of atomizing spraying devices which are uniformly arranged on two sides of a mine road and can generate water mist to enable dust particles to be agglomerated and sink. Each group of atomizing and spraying device is provided with an electromagnetic valve; the electromagnetic valves are used for controlling the opening and closing of the spraying devices; and each group of atomizing and spraying device is provided with a sensor, and the sensors can generate signals and transmit the signals to the electromagnetic valve when the head of the tramcar passes through, so that the atomizing and spraying devices are started for spraying. Spraying is controlled through bilateral remote distribution, meanwhile, by means of the characteristics of the atomizing nozzles, dust particles have a condensation effect and sink, water consumption is low, water pressure is stable, the spraying and atomizing effect is far better than that of common spraying and atomizing, the spraying time can be adjusted according to the atomizing effect, and damage to an ore conveying road caused by long-time water spraying is avoided.

column12: Arc-shaped lining plate structure of ball mill and cavity type optimization method
column13: The invention provides an arc-shaped lining plate structure of a ball mill and a cavity type optimization method, and belongs to the technical field of preparation equipment. The method comprises the steps of determining arc-shaped lining plate cavity type parameters needing to be optimized, establishing lining plate models under different cavity type parameters, conducting discrete element simulation analysis on all the established lining plate models, and determining the optimal values of the cavity type parameters according to the motion state of a ball milling medium and contact energy absorbed by a lining plate in a simulation result; thickening one side of an ore facing surface of an arc-shaped lining plate, respectively establishing lining plate models under different thickening values, carrying out discrete element simulation analysis on the established lining plate models under different thickening values, and determining the optimal thickening value of the ore facing surface according to the motion state of the ball milling medium in the simulation result and the contact energy absorbed by the lining plate. By adopting the invention, the service life of the lining plate can be prolonged while the crushing efficiency and the wear rate of the ball mill are balanced.

column12: Mining explosion-proof intrinsic safety type programmable control box based on PLC
column13: The invention discloses a PLC-based mining explosion-proof intrinsic safety type programmable control box, which comprises a fixed seat, a breather pipe, a connecting frame, a protective shell and a liquid conveying pump, and is characterized in that a control box main body is arranged at the upper end of the fixed seat, a controller is arranged in the control box main body, and the outer side of the control box main body is connected with a connecting shell; the protective shell is arranged on the outer sides of the connecting shells on the left side and the right side, second cooling fins are arranged on the side face of the protective shell, one ends of the second cooling fins are arranged in the cooling water tank in a penetrating mode, the cooling water tank is arranged in the protective shell, the liquid conveying pump is arranged in the cooling water tank, and a temperature sensor is arranged on the cooling water tank in a penetrating mode. According to the mining explosion-proof intrinsic safety type programmable control box based on the PLC, external air flows in the arranged vent pipes and can exchange heat with the interior of the control box main body, heat dissipation in the control box main body is enhanced, dust and moisture are prevented from entering the control box main body, and under the action of the arranged first cooling fins, the heat exchange area with the interior of the control box main body is increased.

column12: Electronic pen, handwriting input device, and central rod for electronic pen
column13: An electronic pen is configured to transmit and receive a signal to and from a position detection sensor by electromagnetic induction. The electronic pen includes a coil and a magnetic core around which the coil is wound. The magnetic core has a through-hole in an axial center direction. The electronic pen includes a capacitor that forms a resonant circuit with the coil. The electronic pen includes a central rod that is inserted in the through-hole of the magnetic core. The central rod has a magnet part and a yoke part that holds the magnet part at a pen tip part of the central rod.

column12: Conveying device and drying and conveying method for mineral evaporative crystallization
column13: The invention mainly relates to the field of evaporative crystallization, in particular to an evaporator for ore liquid crystallization and an ore liquid evaporative crystallization method. The evaporator comprises a heating bin, a bin door, an electric push rod, a push plate and a humidity sensor, a heating wire is arranged at the bottom of the heating bin; the top of the heating bin is opened, the front side of the heating bin is provided with a bin opening, and a bin door is arranged outside the bin opening; a push plate is vertically arranged on the rear side of the bin opening, an electric push rod is connected to the outer side of the push plate, and the electric push rod is horizontally arranged on the support and electrically connected with an electric cabinet arranged on the support. The humidity sensor is arranged at the top of the inner side of the heating bin. And the gas generator is mounted at the bottom of the conveying belt to dry mineral crystals on the conveying belt, and then the dried mineral crystals are directly conveyed into the next crushing process through the conveying belt, so that the mineral production efficiency is greatly improved. The two layers of baffles and the conveying belt in the heating box enable gas to be uniformly discharged on the long conveying belt, so that the air outlet of the whole conveying belt is optimized; the conveyor belt length is fully utilized.

column12: Closed air internal circulation dustproof detection equipment
column13: The utility model discloses a closed air internal circulation dustproof detection device, which comprises a casing, a pressing assembly, a separation assembly and a detection assembly, and adopts the technical scheme that the casing is moved by controlling the pressing assembly, and is adsorbed on the surface of a photovoltaic panel through an annular suction cup, so that the detection assembly is separated from the casing; according to the invention, the sweeping mechanism is driven to move in the sweeping cavity, so that dust adsorbed on the surface of the photovoltaic panel is separated, a dust raising effect is generated, the dust is uniformly mixed in the gas in the sweeping cavity, and the detection result is prevented from being influenced by the gas exchange in the sweeping cavity. And in addition, due to the existence of the fixed rod piece, the sweeping mechanism can automatically remove dust attached to the sweeping mechanism in the working process, dust raising is more sufficient, it is guaranteed that data obtained by detecting the quality of air in the sweeping cavity through the detector is more accurate, and whether the surface of the photovoltaic panel needs to be cleaned or not can be better judged conveniently.

column12: Whole mining process and goaf subsidence area foundation stability test device and method
column13: The invention discloses a whole mining process and goaf subsidence area foundation stability test device and method. According to the technical scheme, the device comprises a model groove, and the interior of the model groove is used for filling foundation soil similar filler; the model groove is connected to the inner side of a supporting frame, a counter-force cross beam with the adjustable height is installed at the top of the supporting frame, and the counter-force cross beam is connected with a sand spraying device or a loading device; a sand filling recovery device is arranged at the bottom of the model groove; wherein a plurality of supporting plates are arranged at the bottom of the model groove, the plurality of adjacent supporting plates are connected together, an electric lifting rod is mounted at the bottom, and the supporting plates are controlled by the electric lifting rod to lift so as to realize foundation uplift or sedimentation simulation. According to the invention, the real-time monitoring of the foundation displacement of the whole goaf and the surrounding foundation soil in the mineral mining and goaf loading process is realized, and the test simulation of the influence of the non-uniform sedimentation of the bottom of the goaf caused by earthquake load and the like on the upper subgrade soil and the ground surface can be realized.

column12: Optical glass processing equipment and process
column13: The invention relates to the related field of glass processing, in particular to optical glass processing equipment and process, the optical glass processing equipment comprises a rack and a suction cup clamp, and further comprises a frame, a supporting mechanism, three sets of elastic welt assemblies and a polishing assembly, and the frame comprises three first profile supports and a second profile support; the supporting mechanism comprises two first guide rods and two second guide rods; each elastic welt assembly comprises a moving plate, an abutting wheel and an opposite moving mechanism, and each opposite moving mechanism comprises two rubber wheels; the grinding assembly comprises a movable frame, a movable base, a grinding wheel, a distance measuring sensor and a driving mechanism. The rubber wheels in the elastic welt assembly can synchronously press the upper end and the lower end of the special-shaped glass under the driving of the opposite moving mechanism, so that the stable rotation of the special-shaped glass is kept; the distance between the movable frame and the edge of the special-shaped glass is almost unchanged, the grinding wheel is flexibly connected with the movable frame through the movable seat, it can be guaranteed that the grinding wheel is always attached to the special-shaped glass, and therefore sufficient grinding is guaranteed.

column12: Water control device for crusher
column13: The utility model discloses a water control device for a crusher, which belongs to the technical field of mining equipment and comprises a connecting pipe and fresh water pipes connected with two ends of the connecting pipe, a water valve is mounted on the connecting pipe, a support frame is arranged on one side of the water valve, an electromagnetic valve is mounted on the support frame, and a second alarm is mounted on one side of the support frame. And a second water flow sensor is mounted in the connecting pipe. By arranging the electromagnetic valve, when the crusher is closed, the electromagnetic valve is closed, continuous fresh water transportation caused by forgetting to close the water valve can be prevented, the second alarm can give an alarm when the electromagnetic valve is closed, a worker is reminded to close the water valve, and the water valve and the supporting frame are matched with each other to achieve dual protection. By arranging a second water flow sensor, whether water flow exists in the connecting pipe or not can be sensed when the supporting frame is opened, and an alarm can be given through a second alarm to remind a worker to open the water valve.

column12: Kitchen ware clamping tool and grinding robot
column13: The utility model discloses a kitchenware clamping tool and a polishing robot, and the kitchenware clamping tool comprises a mounting plate, a clamping device and a clamping device, the pneumatic clamping jaw is arranged on the mounting plate, and the pneumatic clamping jaw is provided with two pneumatic clamping fingers; the number of the workpiece clamping jaws is two, the two workpiece clamping jaws are connected with the pneumatic clamping fingers in a one-to-one correspondence mode, and the sides, used for clamping workpieces, of the workpiece clamping jaws are defined as clamping faces; the vacuum suction cup is communicated with a vacuum generator, and the vacuum suction cup is arranged on the clamping surface; the workpiece clamping jaws extend into the kitchen ware, and the pneumatic clamping jaw drives the two workpiece clamping jaws to move in the opposite direction or in the back-to-back direction, so that the vacuum suction cup is far away from or close to the inner side face of the kitchen ware. According to the technical scheme, the kitchenware clamping tool improves production efficiency, improves grinding quality and reduces labor cost.

column12: PREPARATION OF BIMODAL RUBBER, THERMOPLASTIC VULCANIZATES, AND ARTICLES MADE THEREFROM
column13: Pellet-stable olefmic copolymer bimodal rubber is made using parallel reactors, with one reactor synthesizing higher molecular weight (MW) rubber with dual catalysts, with an improved molecular weight split ratio and an improved composition distribution of the moderate and ultra-high MW components, while another reactor synthesizes random isotactic polypropylene copolymer (RCP). The effluents are reactor-blended and result in pellet-stable bimodal rubber (P-SBR), which may be pelletized. When making thermoplastic vulcanizates (TP Vs) with P-SBR, the need to granulate rubber bales and subsequently use talc, clay, or other anti-agglomeration agents to prevent granulated rubber crumbs from agglomerating are eliminated. TPV s made with P-SBR have vulcanized rubber particles that are smaller and more uniform in size, resulting in TPVs with higher particle counts and more thermoplastic "ligaments" between the particles, with such ligaments being made stronger by the added RCP. Such thus-produced TPVs have a lower hysteresis and flexural modulus, and better elastic properties.
column15: TSOU ANDY;;HAGADORN JOHN;;YANG JIAN;;WALKER RON;;DATTA SUDHIN

column12: Wrist joint prosthesis with surface hydroxyapatite HA modified microporous titanium
column13: The invention discloses a wrist joint prosthesis with surface hydroxyapatite HA modified microporous titanium. The wrist joint prosthesis comprises a hemispherical cup, a radial handle, a movable hemisphere, a carpal bone platform and a metacarpal bone fixing handle. Titanium alloy (Ti6Al4V) is used as a material and is integrally manufactured in a laser 3D printing mode, the surface is covered with an HA coating through a plasma spraying technology, the HA coating can ensure that calcium and phosphorus ions are slowly released around the prosthesis, so that cell osteogenic differentiation is promoted, better bone ingrowth is achieved, the problem that middle and long-term prostheses are prone to loosening is solved, and the prosthesis has a good application prospect. Meanwhile, the HA coating can enable the surface of the prosthesis to become rough and can also be coated with an anti-infection coating, so that the prosthesis has antibacterial ability, and the problem that infection is likely to occur in the early stage of replacement is solved; the surface of the prosthesis is designed to be conical circular rings stacked layer by layer, friction force is increased, anti-pullout performance is improved, the surfaces of the radius assembly, the carpal assembly and screws on the two sides are all provided with HA coatings, and therefore better osseointegration is achieved.

column12: Internal gearing foam scrubbing rod putting device
column13: The invention relates to an internal meshing gear foam drainage rod putting device used in the field of drainage of a gas recovery well. Foam drainage rods can be regularly and efficiently put on time. The device is mainly composed of a driving part, a driven part, a supporting part, a shell part and a connecting part. The driving part is jointly composed of a bearing sleeve cup, a rotating shaft, a stop bearing, a stop washer, a supporting bearing and an inner gear. The driven part consists of an outer gear and a feeding pipe; the supporting part is composed of a bottom bearing and a feeding pipe tray. The shell part is composed of a foam scrubbing cylinder shell and a base; the connecting part is composed of bolt sets and sealing washers. The driving part and the driven part are in transmission through meshing of the inner gear and the outer gear. According to the foam discharging rod feeding device, a transmission mode of gear internal meshing is adopted, the device has high automation, clean energy can be effectively utilized to drive a mechanical device to complete foam discharging rod feeding, the national strategy of double carbon is met, labor intensity is reduced, working efficiency is improved, and great economic benefits are achieved.
column15: JIANG FAGUANG;;ZHANG XUEWEN;;XIAO HUA;;GUO XUYANG;;YANG QING;;ZHOU JIAN

column12: PARTICLE SENSOR AND SENSING METHOD
column13: A particle sensor for measuring size and concentration properties of particles in a gas includes a bipolar diffusion charger configured to charge particles within a received gas sample by the collision of the received particles with and transfer of charge from both positive and negative ions concurrently. At least one electrometer detects the charge of received particles thereby charged. The net, positive, negative or total charge on the bipolarly charged particles has a low sensitivity to variations in the absolute rate of charge generation in the bipolar diffusion charger. A sensor for a ratio of ion charge mobilities in a bipolar diffusion charger employs an ion trap between the bipolar diffusion charger and at least one electrometer.
column15: NISHIDA ROBERT;;JOHNSON TYLER JAMES;;HOCHGREB SIMONE;;BOIES ADAM MEYER

column12: Vehicle-mounted humidifier easy to disassemble and assemble
column13: The vehicle-mounted humidifier easy to disassemble and assemble comprises a main body and a fan support, a touch key is arranged in the middle of the top of the main body, an air outlet is formed in the bottom of the touch key, negative ions are arranged at the bottom of a circuit board, an air sensor is arranged on the front side of the negative ions, and the fan support is connected with the circuit board. The fan support is arranged at the bottom of the air sensor, a fan cover is connected to the bottom of the fan support, a clamping block is arranged at the top of the fan cover, an iron mesh cover is arranged at the bottom of the clamping block, a base is connected to the bottom of a balancing weight, and a fixing groove is formed in the outer wall of the top of the base. According to the vehicle-mounted humidifier easy to disassemble and assemble, the cup-shaped appearance is arranged, the vehicle-mounted humidifier is designed according to the position of a cup holder in a vehicle, use and installation are very convenient, the size is small, carrying and use are convenient, the filter screen is arranged, hair, pollen, dust and the like floating in air can be filtered, and meanwhile microbe, virus, PM2.5 and other tiny particles as small as 0.3 micron can be filtered.
column14: ZHONGSHAN KATALD ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO LTD

column12: Rock core total porosity measuring device
column13: The utility model relates to the field of rock core analysis. The utility model relates to a measuring device, in particular to a rock core total porosity measuring device. Included gas source, wherein the reference chamber, the sample chamber, the pressure gauge, the reference chamber and the sample chamber are connected with an air source through pipelines, valves for controlling air intake of the reference chamber and the sample chamber and the pressure gauge for detecting the reference chamber and the sample chamber are mounted on the pipelines, an air inlet of the sample chamber is formedin the bottom, a sample cup with an opening in the top is arranged in the sample chamber, and a protective cap covers the top of the sample cup. Powder measurement is carried out in a rock sample crushing mode, the sample cup and the protective cap are used for preventing the powder sample from flying apart in the measurement process, the powder sample can be effectively prevented from entering afine pipeline under the action of high-pressure airflow, the pipeline is prevented from being blocked, a sensor is prevented from being damaged, and the safety of measuring the powder sample by an instrument is guaranteed.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ICE MANUFACTURING
column13: A system for manufacturing clear ice products is provided. The system includes a freezing module, a demolding module, and a converting station. The freezing module includes a frame comprising a plurality of levels, a plate freezer provided at each level, and at least one mold provided for placement on each plate freezer and suitable for receiving water. A control frame is provided associated with each plate freezer and is movable from an elevated position to fill position. In the fill position, the control frame is at least partially disposed within the mold. One or more circulation pumps are associated with each control frame for circulating water in the mold to release air bubbles as the water freezes. The demolding module removes the mold from the freezing module and removes formed ice from the mold. The converting station converts the formed ice into a clear ice product.
column14: MINNESOTA ICE SCULPTURES L L C

column12: Automatic lens taking and placing device of optical spherical surface milling and grinding robot
column13: The invention discloses an automatic lens taking and placing device of an optical spherical surface milling and grinding robot. The automatic lens taking and placing device comprises a horizontally-arranged main shaft seat bracket, an after-milling lens storage transition disc, a before-milling lens storage transition disc, a lens milling clamp seat arranged at the side of the middle part of the main shaft seat bracket, a rotary stepping motor fixed at a middle part of the main shaft seat bracket, an encoder connected with a driving shaft of the rotary stepping motor, an air cylinder fixing seat connected with the driving shaft of the rotary stepping motor, a lifting air cylinder fixed to the air cylinder fixing seat, a suction cup frame connected to a piston rod of the lifting air cylinder, an after-milling lens taking and placing suction cup, a before-milling lens taking and placing suction cup, a negative pressure pipeline, an air cylinder control air circuit and a controller; the after-milling lens storage transition disc and the before-milling lens storage transition disc are respectively fixed at the two ends of the main shaft seat bracket, and the after-milling lens taking and placing suction cup and the before-milling lens taking and placing suction cup are respectively arranged at the two ends of the suction cup frame; and the negative pressure pipeline is connected with the after-milling lens taking and placing suction cup and the before-milling lens taking and placing suction cup, and the air cylinder control air circuit is connected with the lifting air cylinder. By means of the automatic lens taking and placing device, double arms act simultaneously, so that the lens taking and placing time is shortened, and the production efficiency is greatly improved.

column12: Road slope-based energy recovery method, device and equipment for extended-range mine card
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of energy recovery, and particularly provides a road slope-based energy recovery method, device and equipment for an extended-range mine truck, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining the state of a vehicle weight switch, and obtaining the weight of a vehicle according to the state of the weight switch; acquiring the road gradient of the current vehicle according to a gradient sensor; according to the obtained road gradient, road section attributes of current vehicle driving are judged, wherein the road section attributes comprise an uphill section, a downhill section and a flat road section; obtaining the state of an accelerator pedal and the current vehicle speed, and judging whether the vehicle enters a sliding mode or not according to the state of the accelerator pedal and the current vehicle speed; and after judging that the vehicle enters the sliding mode, controlling a motor to recover braking energy according to the attributes of the current vehicle driving road section and the weight of the vehicle. The comfort level and the transportation time efficiency of the vehicle braking process are improved, the mining area vehicle transfer efficiency is improved, and meanwhile vehicle energy balance is guaranteed.
column14: SINO TRUK JINAN POWER CO LTD

column12: ROTARY ATOMIZING HEAD, ROTARY ATOMIZING HEAD MANAGING SYSTEM, AND ROTARY ATOMIZING HEAD MANAGING METHOD
Delayed dust removal device for mining wet dust removal fan
column13: The utility model discloses a delayed dust removal device for a mining wet type dust removal fan, which relates to the field of mining industry and comprises a base, a wet type dust removal fan body is fixedly mounted at the upper end of the base through a support matched with screws, and a dust removal shell and a suction end pipe are fixedly mounted on two sides of the wet type dust removal fan body through hoops respectively. And air volume sensors are arranged at the upper ends of the two sides of the wet dust removal fan body correspondingly, and a spraying pipe is arranged in the middle of the interior of the dust removal shell. The motor is arranged to drive the screw rod to rotate, and at the moment, the threaded sleeve on the screw rod can do forward and reverse reciprocating motion along with rotation of the screw rod, so that the electromagnetic rod is driven to move in dust falling liquid, and metal particles in the dust falling liquid are adsorbed through magnetic force; after recovery is completed, recovered dust falling liquid can be pumped into the filter box through the material conveying pump and then is filtered through the filter plate, and the filtered liquid can be discharged through the drainage electromagnetic valve.
column14: YANGZHOU SUPERBLOG MINING INDUSTRY ELECTROMECHANICAL EQUIPMENT LTD COMPANY

column12: Robot zero-point rapid recovery tool
column13: The invention relates to the field of robot zero-point rapid recovery, in particular to a robot zero-point rapid recovery tool. The robot joint mechanism comprises an upper-stage connecting rod and a lower-stage connecting rod which are connected with each other, a first positioning feature, a direction mark and a zero position mark which are used for positioning the tool assembly are arranged on the upper-stage connecting rod, and a second positioning feature which is used for positioning the tool assembly is arranged on the lower-stage connecting rod. The tool assembly comprises a rotary pointer seat which is positioned and installed at the positioning feature position of the upper-stage connecting rod in a magnetic attraction or screw connection mode, and a fixed ball cup which is positioned and installed at the positioning feature position of the lower-stage connecting rod in a magnetic attraction or screw connection mode. The double-spherical-surface connecting rod is connected to the rotary pointer seat and the fixed ball cup in a magnetic attraction mode, the movement of the lower-stage connecting rod is transmitted to the rotary pointer seat through the double-spherical-surface connecting rod, movement amplification is carried out through the length of the bent pointer, and high-precision zero-point operation is achieved.

column12: High-efficiency recovery process for full-size TiO2 in vanadium magnetite tailings
column13: The invention discloses a vanadium magnetite tailing full-size-fraction TiO2 efficient recovery process which comprises the following steps: S1, treating through a cyclone to obtain overflow liquid and underflow, and carrying out short-process screening through weak magnetism and strong magnetism in the step 1; s2, the tailings in the S1 pass through a cyclone and a tailings concentration plate, and overflow clear liquid and tailings are obtained; and S3, the air inlet amount of each stage is controlled through a floating sulfur control cabinet, a refined titanium finished product is screened out through a one-roughing and one-concentration two-section short process, through the steps, the technological process is simplified into the one-roughing and one-concentration two-section short process, the complexity of the production steps is reduced, the working efficiency is effectively improved, energy-saving and emission-reducing clean production is achieved, and the production cost is reduced. The adverse effect of scaling of the liquid level sensor on the flotation technological process is avoided, the stability and controllability of the flotation process are enhanced, the pressure and flow of the high-pressure air source entering the column are controllable and measurable, real-time linkage control can be achieved with changes of factors such as ore pulp concentration and flow, and intelligent ore dressing is achieved.
column14: SICHUAN QIANXINDA ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TECH CO LTD

column12: Lithium ion battery diaphragm packaging clamping plate mounting device
column13: The invention discloses a lithium ion battery diaphragm packaging clamping plate mounting device which is characterized in that a bagged diaphragm roll core is placed on a first support of a diaphragm roll core transition platform, and after it is detected that the diaphragm roll core is placed in place, the diaphragm roll core is automatically conveyed to a side grabbing position of a feeding robot; a feeding robot grabs a diaphragm roll core on a first support on a diaphragm roll core transition platform and places the grabbed diaphragm roll core on a second support, and after a roll core detection sensor of a clamping plate mounting platform detects that the diaphragm roll core on the second support is placed in place, clamping plate conveying mechanisms located on the two sides of the clamping plate mounting platform convey clamping plates; a movable grabbing/placing mechanical arm suction cup of the clamping plate mechanism conveys a clamping plate to a clamping plate pushing suction cup, the clamping plate pushing suction cup acts to push the clamping plate to load the clamping plate into the diaphragm roll core, and after a detection clamping plate detection sensor detects that the clamping plate is in place, the clamping plate in the next process is fed back to be installed, and the diaphragm roll core with the installed clamping plate is taken away.
column14: SINOMA LITHIUM BATTERY SEPARATOR CO LTD

column12: Automatic concentrating table robot for laboratory
column13: The utility model relates to an automatic concentrating table robot for a laboratory, and belongs to the technical field of concentrating tables. The laboratory automatic ore dressing table robot comprises a bottom plate, a table surface, a transmission box, a motor and a recovery assembly. The top surface of the bottom plate is slidably provided with the bed surface through a rack, one side of the top surface of the bed surface is fixedly connected with the mixing tank, the top surface of the mixing tank is provided with the water feeding tank and the ore feeding tank, the bottom plate is further provided with the transmission box and the motor, the transmission box is connected with the motor through a transmission chain wheel, and the output end of the transmission box is fixedly connected with the outer wall of one side of the bed surface. Water flow is collected and stored through the water storage tank, water stored in the water storage tank can be reused, particles in the water are screened through the filter screen, the particles cannot interfere with an existing water pump, the installation frame can be taken out to be cleaned or replaced, the utilization rate of a water source is high, and the service life of the water pump is prolonged. Meanwhile, impurities in water are prevented from damaging existing equipment, the filter screen is convenient to replace and maintain, and environmental protection and production are facilitated.
column14: YUNNAN HUALIAN ZINC & INDIUM CO LTD

column12: Device and method for continuously measuring beam angle in vertical direction
column13: The invention discloses a device and a method for continuously measuring a beam angle in a vertical direction, relates to an ion implanter, and belongs to the field of semiconductor manufacturing. Thedevice comprises a Faraday cup (5), a beam baffle (4), a front angle baffle (3), a beam baffle transmission device (35), a front baffle transmission device (42) and a controller (37). The method comprises: a beam baffle stopping at a starting point (36), a front baffle moving downwards to an ending point (50), and a controller (37) collecting a beam value and judges whether a measurement condition is met or not; the front baffle moving downwards, the front baffle stopping moving every time the front baffle reaches one angle measuring point (51), and at the moment, the beam baffle beginning tomove downwards and begins to continuously collect beam values, ending the measurement when the front baffle plate reaches an end point, and analyzing each group of beam acquisition values to obtain acritical position (49) of the beam baffle plate; through data processing, obtaining beam angle sizes (18) in one-to-one correspondence with the measurement points.
column14: BEIJING ZHONGKEXIN ELECTRONICS EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Mining ring network switch
column13: The utility model provides a mining looped network switch which comprises a power supply management module, a voltage conversion module, a switching module and a control module, the power supply management module is respectively connected with the switching module and the control module through the voltage conversion module, and the switching module is connected with the control module; the switching module comprises a switching chip, a signal isolator, a 100M optical fiber transceiver and a gigabit SFP module, the signal isolator, the 100M optical fiber transceiver and the gigabit SFP module are connected with the switching module, and the control module comprises a control chip, a serial interface module, a FLASH memory and an SDRAM memory. The serial interface module, the FLASH memory and the SDRAM memory are respectively connected with the control chip, and the serial interface module is connected with an RS-485 chip through photoelectric isolation. The underground gigabit optical fiber redundant ring network is realized, the functions of information exchange and video transmission are integrated, mine network platform data transmission and network platform information management are undertaken, the construction of the industrial Ethernet ring network is realized through the application of the underground gigabit optical fiber redundant ring network, and the possibility of communication accidents caused by cable damage is reduced to the minimum.
column14: ZHENGZHOU ZHENRONG AUTOMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: METHOD AND ARRANGEMENT FOR CALIBRATING A BRAKE OF A SPRING APPLIED BRAKE SYSTEM
column13: Disclosed is a method and arrangement for calibrating a brake of a spring applied brake system comprising an electronic control unit (10), brakes (22) arranged to operate on drive means (40) of a vehicle, a brake valve (24), a pressure supply system (30) and conduits (32a, 32b) fluidly connecting the pressure supply system (30) with the brakes (22) via the brake valve (24). The method comprises providing a varying electrical current to the brake valve (24) for controlling the brake valve to trigger a discharge of fluid from the accumulator (28) through the conduits (32a, 32b) and the brake valve (24) towards the brakes (22), recording accumulator (28) pressure, and any of the electrical current and brake pressure of the brakes (22). Further, based on the recorded accumulator pressure, a pressure drop event is detected in the accumulator, which indicates that the brake (22) has released. The recorded electrical current or brake pressure at the pressure drop event are then used for the calibration.

column12: Novel recharge method for improving geothermal recharge efficiency of middle-deep layer sandstone
column13: The invention discloses a novel recharge method for improving geothermal recharge efficiency of middle-deep layer sandstone. The novel recharge method comprises the following steps that S1, geothermal water is pumped into a pretreatment system from a mining well; s2, the geothermal water participating in heat exchange is guided into a geothermal utilization system; s3, the geothermal tail water is pumped into a coarse filtration system through a water pump; s4, opening a butterfly valve to pump the geothermal tail water in the coarse filtration system into the fine filtration system; s5, opening a butterfly valve to guide the filtered geothermal tail water into an exhaust tank; s6, the geothermal tail water in the exhaust tank is guided into a variable-pressure system; s7, selecting a recharge mode according to the conditions of the recharge well and the sand layer; s8, opening a butterfly valve to recharge the geothermal tail water into the tank returning well; s9, recording various data in the recharge well and performing system analysis; the coarse filtering system and the fine filtering system are arranged to remove gravel or particle suspended solids and chemical precipitates in the geothermal tail water, so that the gravel or particle suspended solids and chemical precipitates are prevented from blocking a recharge well or a recharge pipeline.
column14: YANTAI LONGYUAN POWER TECH CO LTD;;DONGYING LONGYUAN CLEAN ENERGY TECH CO LTD
column15: FAN XINGLONG;;ZHENG QINGYUAN;;YANG TIANLIANG;;LI WENBIN;;YUAN JIUWANG;;JI MINGZE;;LIU HAIQING;;XUE ZHIMING;;LYU WENJIE

column12: Dispensing device for rehabilitation of tumor patients
column13: A dispensing device for rehabilitation of tumor patients comprises a PLC intelligent controller and a plurality of tablet powder making devices distributed along a distribution track, and each tablet powder making device is used for grinding a tablet into medicine powder and storing the medicine powder in the tablet powder making device. The distribution track comprises a rotating lead screw driven by a motor controlled by the PLC intelligent controller and a sliding block matched with the rotating lead screw to form a lead screw sliding block mechanism, and the sliding block is provided with a medicine mixing cup for receiving medicine powder poured out of all the tablet powder making devices and a weight sensor for detecting the medicine powder increment in the medicine mixing cup. The PLC intelligent controller controls the motor to drive the rotating lead screw to rotate for a specific number of circles according to input prescription information, so that the sliding block and the medicine mixing cup on the sliding block are sequentially positioned into a certain tablet powder making device, then the PLC intelligent controller controls the tablet powder making device to discharge medicine powder stored in the tablet powder making device into the medicine mixing cup, and medicine dispensing is completed. The working intensity of medical staff is greatly reduced, and the working efficiency is improved.
column14: FIRST AFFILIATED HOSPITAL HENAN UNIV SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY

column12: Water purifier and method for controlling the same
column13: Provided is a water purifier. The water purifier includes an agitator configured to agitate cooling water and heat-exchange the cooling water with a cooling coil, a motor coupled to the agitator to allow the agitator to rotate, the agitator operating at at least two rotational speeds other than zero, and a control assembly configured to control the rotational speed of the motor.

column12: Intelligent material blocking device for mine underground draw shaft
column13: The utility model relates to an intelligent material blocking device for a mine underground draw shaft. The intelligent material blocking device comprises a material blocking baffle, a controller, a first position detection sensor, a second position detection sensor, a button, a distribution box and a driving motor. The material blocking baffle is installed at the front end of the draw shaft ore drawing vibration machine, the first position detection sensor is installed at the top of the material blocking baffle, the second position detection sensor is installed at the bottom of the material blocking baffle, the button and the distribution box are installed in the ore loading chamber, and the driving motor is installed on the material blocking baffle. The input end of the controller is connected with the button, the first position detection sensor and the second position detection sensor. Interlocking intelligent interlocking control of the mine underground draw shaft vibration machine can be achieved, materials of the draw shaft vibration machine are prevented from sliding off or leaking, and meanwhile it is guaranteed that the materials of the draw shaft vibration machine are prevented from sliding off to crush workers, and it is avoided that normal mine conveying of mine underground rail conveying is affected due to the fact that conveying rails are blocked due to material leakage; the mine loading and transporting efficiency of a mine underground rail transportation system is improved, and underground safety accidents are avoided.
column14: YUNNAN KUNGANG ELECT INF TECH CO LTD
column15: YUAN MINGLU;;WU QIAOSHUN;;LI JIE;;LIU CHUNLIN;;LI GANG;;ZHANG KUN;;LUO LEI;;JIANG HONG

column12: Biological raw material weighing device for laboratory
column13: The utility model discloses a biological raw material weighing device for a laboratory, which belongs to the technical field of weighing devices and comprises a base, a mounting plate is fixedly mounted on one side of the top of the base, an electronic balance is fixedly mounted on the top of the mounting plate, and a scale pan is mounted on the top of the electronic balance. Through the arrangement of the clamping assembly, a measuring cup filled with biological raw materials can be clamped and fixed, through the arrangement of the feeding assembly, the measuring cup can be stably moved to the top of the scale pan, and at the moment, a user can control an electric telescopic rod to open two groups of clamping plates through an external controller, so that the measuring cup stably falls on the top of the scale pan; through the use of the device, the problem that a reed of the gravity electromagnetic sensor is crushed due to manual weighing and feeding can be avoided, the sealing plate is linked with the sliding plate, and the sealing plate can be stably and slowly closed along with the movement of the sliding plate; and the weighing result deviation caused by blowing the biological raw materials by high-speed airflow generated when the sealing plate is quickly closed is prevented.

column12: Mineral treatment method and system applying ultrasound to flotation froth
column13: The invention relates to a flotation mineral treatment method. There is provided herein a mineral treatment system applying ultrasound to flotation froth, the system comprising an air-emitting ultrasound sensor (10) located above the flotation froth, the ultrasound sensor (10) being adapted to emit ultrasound to the flotation froth. The invention further provides a mineral treatment method related to the system. Therefore, the invention provides a mineral processing method and system which can apply ultrasonic waves to flotation froth without immersing the ultrasonic sensor (10) into the ore pulp. Liquid films among bubbles can be partially discharged, the metallurgical recovery rate is improved, three-phase floating foam continuously existing in flotation can be inhibited, and the efficiency of the water and tailing management process is improved.
