column12: Clamp suction row and transfer clamp thereof
column13: Suction cups of the clamp suction row are all communicated with a negative pressure cavity in a suction cup cavity, so that suction force of all the suction cups is balanced. Furthermore, the bottom plate is detachably designed, so that a sucker can be additionally arranged to adapt to circuit boards with different sizes; the negative pressure generator is provided with a silencer, so that noise is reduced; a damping device is arranged to prevent the circuit board from being crushed; the clamp suction row is provided with a first clamp suction row and a second clamp suction row which are adjustable in distance and suitable for circuit boards of different sizes, a fixed third clamp suction row is arranged, and the stability of adsorption grabbing is improved; meanwhile, the first clamp suction row and the third clamp suction row can be further arranged to be of installation structures convenient for manual adjustment, and the applicability of the clamp is improved; a U-shaped photoelectric switch, a metal detection sensor, a diffuse reflection type photoelectric switch, an ultrasonic sensor and a downward detection sensor are arranged; and the safety and the accuracy of automatic control of the transfer clamp can be further improved.
column14: GUANGZHOU TAILI ELECTROMECHANICAL EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: THREE-WHEELED ELECTRIC VEHICLE
column13: A three-wheeled electric vehicle in accordance with EU vehicle classification L2e-U, which has two electric-motor-driven rear wheels, each of which is driven by one wheel-hub motor. A hydraulically actuatable rear-wheel disc-brake system is mounted on each rear wheel which brake system is also fitted with an integrated electromechanical parking brake, the activation of which shifts each rear wheel into a parking-brake mode in which wheel rotation is prevented. In a rear portion, the vehicle body forms a support structure on which an optionally present, exchangeable transport container can be supported and secured with the aid of a quick-release fastening system. The quick-release fastening system includes one or more connection device(s), wherein each connection device includes a bar that protrudes from a bottom wall of the transport container; and a locking device, which is permanently attached to the support structure, is fitted with a movable blocking element.

column12: Large-pipe-diameter dissimilar metal sleeving welding method and low-temperature pump cold head
column13: The invention discloses a large-pipe-diameter dissimilar metal cup joint welding method and a low-temperature pump cold head. The method comprises the following steps: S1, preparing a nickel coating film on the surface of a stainless steel tube core (2) by adopting an electroplating method; s2, an assembly structure is designed, according to the thermal expansion coefficients of stainless steel and copper, the expansion phenomenon possibly occurring in the brazing heating process is predicted, and an assembly gap is determined; s3, an oxide film on the inner side of the copper pipe fitting (1) is removed; s4, the stainless steel pipe core plated with the nickel film and the copper pipe fitting (1) are assembled according to the assembly gap determined in the step S2; s5, Sn-based soft solder is placed at the position of an annular step between the copper pipe fitting (1) and the stainless steel pipe core plated with the nickel film, and a prefabricated weldment is obtained; and S6, the assembled prefabricated weldment is put into a vacuum brazing furnace to be welded. The low-temperature pump cold head is manufactured through the method and has high heat exchange efficiency and high welding rate.
column15: ZHANG LIJIAN;;JIANG ZHIGUANG;;XU ZHENLONG;;LI GANG;;PAN DINGWEN;;SHANG YANG;;ZHANG RAN;;LI YICHEN;;CHEN HAO;;LI DAWEI

column12: Curtain wall cleaning robot
column13: The invention discloses a curtain wall cleaning robot which comprises a machine frame, a driving device of the machine frame, a hanging cable, a plurality of suction cups arranged on the bottom face of the machine frame, cleaning assemblies arranged at the front end and the rear end of the machine frame respectively, a sewage suction pump and an air suction pump which arranged at the top surface of the machine frame and four steering wheels arranged on the two sides of the machine frame. The air suction pump communicates with the suction cups. A water tank, a storage battery, a control box, alifting cable twisting device and a water-gas separation box are further arranged on the top surface of the machine frame; the storage battery is connected with the input end of the twisted cable driving motor; the twisted shaft is in transmission connection with the suspension cable; a clean water supply device, a sewage recovery device and a roller brush are arranged in the cleaning assembly cover-shaped body; an outlet of the sewage recovery device is communicated with an inlet of the sewage suction pump, an outlet of the sewage suction pump is communicated with an inlet end of the water-gas separation box, a gas outlet end of the separation box is emptied, a liquid outlet end of the separation box is communicated with an inlet of the water filtering device, and an outlet of the water filtering device is communicated with an inlet of the water tank. The use cost is low and the use is more convenient.
column14: XIAMEN LINGDU KONGJIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: DEVICE FOR FRESH PRODUCE
column13: Device for keeping fresh produce conditioned, particularly for fruit, comprising a receptacle with a substantially cup-shaped chamber which is enclosed by a wall and conditioning means, wherein the conditioning means comprise at least a cooling device (35) and at least an air displacing device (55), wherein a cavity (25) comprises at least one air channel (25, 27) which is in open communication with the air displacing device so as to guide the forced airflow at least partially, and wherein an inner wall (21) is provided in the bottom with perforations (28) which maintain an open communication between the chamber and at least one of the at least one air channel.

column12: Ore dump leaching tailing sampling device
column13: An ore dump leaching tailing sampling device relates to the technical field of tailing sampling devices and comprises a fixed pipe and a sample loading pipe sleeved in the fixed pipe, a plurality of first through holes are uniformly distributed in the outer wall of the fixed pipe, and a plurality of second through holes are uniformly distributed in the outer wall of the sample loading pipe. A plurality of groups of sensor mechanisms are uniformly distributed on the surface of the outer wall of the fixed pipe in the longitudinal direction, each sensor mechanism comprises a liquid inlet pipe penetrating through the interior of the fixed pipe and a sensor protection shell arranged at the upper end of the liquid inlet pipe, the sensor protection shells are fixedly connected with the outer surface of the fixed pipe and the upper end of the liquid inlet pipe respectively, and industrial sensors are arranged in the sensor protection shells; a probe of the industrial sensor penetrates into the liquid inlet pipe, a wiring hole is further formed in the pipe wall of the fixing pipe, and the industrial sensor is in signal connection with a control center through a wire penetrating through the wiring hole. According to the device, the operation steps of sampling detection are greatly simplified, the detection efficiency is improved, and the service life of the device is prolonged.
column15: CHENG QUANMIN;;HE TAO;;LU DONG;;WU SHENG;;BAYHETIAR IRFAN

column12: Automatic descaling device and method for laterite-nickel ore high-pressure leaching system
column13: The invention discloses an automatic descaling device and method for a laterite-nickel ore high-pressure leaching system, and relates to the technical field of descaling devices, the automatic descaling device comprises a high-pressure reaction kettle, a first pressure sensor, a second pressure sensor, an acid supply assembly, a collection assembly and a main controller. A reaction cavity is formed in the high-pressure reaction kettle, the acid supply assembly comprises an acid storage tank, a second pipeline and a first switch, the second pipeline is communicated with the acid storage tank and the first pipeline, and the first switch is arranged on the second pipeline. The collecting assembly comprises a collecting tank, a third pipeline and a second switch. The two ends of the third pipeline communicate with the collecting tank and the first pipeline. The main controller is simultaneously connected with the first pressure sensor, the second pressure sensor, the first switch and the second switch. The main controller can automatically control the first switch to be turned on and control the second switch to be turned off when the pressure difference between the first pressure sensor and the second pressure sensor reaches a preset range, so that acidic substances in the acid storage tank flow into the reaction cavity, and the automatic intelligent degree is high.

column12: DRY COATING PRE-MIX FOR POTATO FRIES
column13: The present invention relates to a dry coating pre-mix for potato fries, comprising a coating base and a hydrocolloid that is capable of reacting with divalent ions, which coating pre-mix when applied as a batter to potato fries confers a crispy and crunchy external texture and a large contrast inside/outside to the fries after finish-frying. The hydrocolloid is suitably alginate or carrageenan, or a combination thereof. The invention further relates to a batter prepared from the pre-mix by adding a liquid, in particular water, to potato fries coated with the batter, to pre-fried coated potato fries, to pre-fried coated potato fries that are deep-frozen and to the finish-fried coated potato fries. The invention further relates to the use of the premix in the preparation of potato fries with a crispy and crunchy external texture and/or having a large contrast inside/outside.

column12: Profile control and displacement simulation method of soft and hard double-layer structure viscoelastic particles in oil reservoir
column13: The invention discloses a profile control and displacement simulation method for viscoelastic particles with a soft and hard double-layer structure in an oil reservoir. The profile control and displacement simulation method comprises the following steps: establishing a mathematical model of the particle size and pressure of the viscoelastic particles with the soft and hard double-layer structure; a blockage dynamic model and a bridging dynamic model of the soft and hard double-layer structure viscoelastic particle model during migration in an oil reservoir are established, and a three-dimensional two-phase three-component viscoelastic particle profile control and displacement mathematical model further established on the basis can reflect the dehydration deformation characteristics of the outer layer soft structure of the viscoelastic particles; the method has the advantages of being simple in structure, capable of reflecting the rigidity characteristic of an inner layer hard structure, capable of more accurately simulating the migration process and the profile control and flooding effect of the viscoelastic particles in the oil reservoir, closer to actual exploitation, capable of providing a simulation method and tool for further improving the recovery ratio of the soft and hard double-layer structure viscoelastic particle profile control and flooding oil reservoir, capable of simulating an optimal exploitation scheme and capable of improving the exploitation efficiency. Therefore, the mining cost is reduced and the mining quantity is increased.
column15: LIU YONGGE;;JIA WEI;;HOU JIAN;;LIU LU;;PAN YUPING;;LI GUO;;YANG JUNRU;;DU QINGJUN;;ZHOU KANG;;WEBER

column12: Turbine blade tip clearance sensor calibration device and simulated impeller manufacturing method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a turbine blade tip clearance sensor calibration device and a simulated impeller manufacturing method thereof. The sensor calibration device comprises a base frame (2), a displacement mechanism component (5), a motor (7), a simulation impeller (1) and a suction cup assembly. The displacement mechanism component is installed on the base frame, the motor is installed on the displacement mechanism component, the simulation impeller is installed on the motor, and the rotation axis of the simulation impeller is perpendicular to the displacement direction of the displacement mechanism component; the suction cup assembly is installed on the base frame. The manufacturing method of the simulation impeller comprises the following steps: manufacturing the simulation impeller with a reduced scale; a blade tip clearance signal time sequence curve of the simulated impeller is obtained through a blade tip clearance sensor; grinding the blades of the simulated impeller; and the time sequence curve of the blade tip clearance signal of the simulated impeller meets the requirement. By adopting the sensor calibration device and the simulated impeller manufacturing method thereof, accurate detection signal calibration can be conveniently carried out on the blade tip clearance sensor on the turbine on site.

column12: Experimental device integrating mixing, wet grinding and pelletizing
column13: The utility model provides an experimental device integrating mixing, wet grinding and pelletizing, which comprises a support frame, two groups of roller brackets are arranged at the top of the support frame side by side, driving rollers are mounted on the two groups of roller brackets, and the driving ends of the driving rollers are in transmission connection with a motor mounted at the bottom of the support frame; a guide rod is further arranged at the top of the supporting frame and located on the extension line of the midpoint of the connecting line of the two roller supports, a sliding block with a locking knob is slidably connected to the guide rod, a pressing rod is fixed to the side, facing the driving roller, of the sliding block, a roller support is fixed to the tail end of the pressing rod, and two rollers are installed on the roller support side by side; during use, an automobile tire is placed between the two groups of driving rollers, and the top of the automobile tire is in contact with the lower surface of the roller. By using the device, the purchase cost of uniform mixing equipment, wet grinding equipment and pelletizing equipment can be saved, and the occupied area is small; and meanwhile, the field production process can be accurately and comprehensively simulated, and the method has remarkable significance in studying the use of the coarse iron ore concentrate.

column12: ON-LINE INSPECTION SYSTEM FOR OPERATION STATE OF BALL MILL BY INTELLIGENT MATERIAL AND CONTROL METHOD
column13: To provide an on-line inspection system for inspecting an operation state of a ball mill by an intelligent material, and a control method.SOLUTION: In a pulverization process of a ball mill 5, an intelligent material 7 interlocks together with a crushing medium 8 and ore 6, an accelerator sensor 7/1 detects an acceleration signal of the intelligent material and inputs the same to a microprocessor 7/4, the microprocessor performs spectral analysis for the signal and outputs the same to an expert control system 11 and a master computer 12, and the master computer performs force analysis and inputs the same to the expert control system. The present invention realizes on-line detection of ball mill operation state and load control, is correct and high in practicality, and can realize energy conservation and consumption reduction when being applied for automatic control of ball mill.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: Deep sea crawler belt viscosity removing system and method with functions of carbon dioxide refrigeration and carbon sequestration
column13: The invention discloses a deep sea track viscosity removal system and method with carbon dioxide refrigeration and carbon sequestration, and the system comprises a gas source supply device, a pressure regulation unit, a refrigeration cycle unit, a wireless temperature sensor, a supercritical carbon dioxide preparation unit, a jet device and a control unit. The air source supply device is connected with the refrigeration cycle unit through the relay storage tank and the pressure adjusting unit. The refrigeration cycle unit comprises a second pipeline, an expansion valve, an evaporator, a compressor and a condenser, the expansion valve, the evaporator, the compressor and the condenser are sequentially arranged on the second pipeline, the evaporator is arranged on the mining vehicle underframe, a transmission shaft of the mining vehicle penetrates through an evaporator shell, the wireless temperature sensor is arranged on the crawler belt, and the jet device jets supercritical carbon dioxide to the surface of the crawler belt. Carbon dioxide is used as a refrigerant medium for heat exchange, so that a smooth ice surface is formed on the surface of the track, seabed sediment adhesion is reduced, sludge on the track is injected by supercritical carbon dioxide and falls off, the maneuverability of tramcar running is kept, and slipping or subsidence is avoided.

column12: RIDING SYSTEM OF ROBOT AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present disclosure relates to a riding system of a robot which supports a PUI through user authentication to provide convenience to users, and including a server for exchanging authentication information with the robot; a mobile terminal including an application interlocking with the server and for arranging use information of the user through the application and for calling the robot through the application; and a robot storing the authentication information, to authenticate the user through the authentication information when there is a call from the mobile terminal, and deforming according to a body size of the user included in the use information and to allow the user to ride thereon and to move the user to the destination, and a control method thereof.

column12: Mining explosion-proof and intrinsically safe programmable control box for water pump room
column13: The invention relates to a mining explosion-proof and intrinsically safe programmable control box for a water pump room, which comprises an explosion-proof main cavity and an explosion-proof wiring cavity. Cable leading-in devices are arranged on the left side, the right side and the lower side of the explosion-proof wiring cavity, and an intelligent key board and a display screen are arranged ona left front door panel of the explosion-proof main cavity. A glass observation window and a function knob are arranged on a right front door panel of the explosion-proof main cavity, a nine-core wiring terminal and a wall penetrating terminal are arranged between the explosion-proof wiring cavity and the explosion-proof main cavity, and a network switch is arranged in the explosion-proof wiring cavity. A transformer, a programmable module group and an anti-surge and filtering module group are arranged in the explosion-proof main cavity, the intrinsic safety power supply, the switching power supply, the anti-surge and filtering module group are respectively connected with the intrinsic safety power supply, and the switching power supply, the programmable module group and the display screenare respectively connected with the network switch through network cables for data exchange. The programmable control box has the advantages of convenient operation, various communication interfaces,strong compatibility, complete functions and stable and reliable connection.

column12: COMPLIANCE-ASSISTING MODULE FOR AN INHALER
column13: An inhaler includes a mouthpiece cover, a pressure sensor, a first indicator and a second indicator. The first indicator may be configured to indicate based on a state of the cover, and the second indicator may be configured to indicate based on an output of the pressure sensor. For example, when the mouthpiece cover opens, the first indicator may illuminate and a dose of medication may be transferred from a reservoir to a dosing cup. The second indicator may illuminate if an amount of inhaled medication reaches a predetermined threshold for successful inhalat ion.

column12: Cleaning robot for municipal pipelines
column13: The municipal pipeline cleaning robot comprises a crawler-type walking mechanism, a controller, a control handle, a cleaning arm and a nozzle or a pickaxe or a suction cup, the controller is arranged above the crawler-type walking mechanism, one end of the cleaning arm is movably connected with the crawler-type walking mechanism, and the other end of the cleaning arm is movably connected with the control handle. The nozzle or the pickaxe or the suction cup is arranged at the other end of the cleaning arm, the controller is connected with the control handle through a wire, and the controller is used for controlling the crawler-type walking mechanism and the cleaning arm to move. The nozzle is communicated with an external water source through a pipeline, or the pickaxe is communicated with an external hydraulic oil source or an external air source through a pipeline, or the sucker is communicated with an external sewage suction truck through an air pipe; the cleaning robot can conveniently enter a municipal pipeline, the cleaning arm arranged on the cleaning robot can deflect at multiple angles and in multiple directions, the cleaning operation efficiency of the pipeline is greatly improved, meanwhile, a nozzle or a pickaxe or a suction cup can be arranged at the front end of the cleaning arm, and the three functions of flushing, crushing and sewage discharging are achieved.

column12: Sample preparation device for food safety detection
column13: The utility model relates to a sample preparation device for food safety detection, which is characterized in that food to be detected is guided into an inner barrel, a barrel cover is covered, a motor drives a screw blade to rotate, the inner barrel is driven to rotate reversely through belt transmission and gear transmission, and a plurality of spiral bulges are arranged on the inner side wall of the inner barrel, so that the food to be detected can be better crushed; liquid for smashing food flows into the bottom of the outer cylinder through the filter funnel and flows out through the liquid outlet pipe by rotating a valve at the bottom, the electric push rod drives the inner shaft to vertically move downwards, the follow-up bearing on the side wall of the inner shaft slides in the spiral groove in the side wall of the outer sleeve, and therefore the inner shaft is driven to rotate by 90 degrees at the same time, and the suction cup and the inner cylinder are coaxial. When the suction pipe is inserted into a to-be-detected food sample, the air pump is started, the food sample is sucked into the suction pipe, a filter screen is installed in the top of the suction pipe, the food sample is prevented from entering the air channel, the electric push rod is jacked up and reset, the air pump slightly blows air, the food sample is blown out of the test tube, the automation degree is high, and practicability is high.

column12: Novel mining explosion-proof display screen
column13: The invention relates to a novel mining explosion-proof display screen which comprises an explosion-proof cavity cover and an explosion-proof cavity, the explosion-proof cavity cover is arranged on the front end face of the explosion-proof cavity, a first display element and a second display element are arranged on the left side and the right side of the front end face of the explosion-proof cavity cover respectively, and an observation window assembly is arranged in the middle of the front end face of the explosion-proof cavity cover. An industrial personal computer assembly is arranged on the rear side of the observation window assembly, receives, exchanges and transmits communication data through an interface of the industrial personal computer assembly, displays the communication dataon the first display element, the second display element and the observation window assembly in a graphic animation mode in real time, and is provided with an intelligent key board on the rear side. The intelligent keyboard plate is connected to the industrial personal computer assembly through a USB interface line and performs up, down, left, right, exit and confirmation operations, the explosion-proof cavity is connected with a grounding assembly, and the grounding assembly is connected with a ground wire; the device has the advantages of being convenient to operate, visual in display, highin universality, resistant to damp and shock, convenient for workers to operate and capable of adapting to various severe working environments.

column12: Wet-type protective cover for driving cab of heading machine
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of mining dust removal facilities, in particular to a wet-type protective cover for a driving cab of a heading machine, which comprises a connecting shell and two connectors, the connecting shell is of a U-shaped structure, and two opening ends of the connecting shell are fixedly connected with two sides of the driving cab through the two connectors respectively. A dust concentration sensor and a temperature sensor are installed above the outer side of the closed end of the connecting shell, a plurality of resistance rods are hung below the outer side of the closed end of the connecting shell, a plurality of nozzles are evenly distributed below the inner side of the closed end of the connecting shell, and the nozzles are communicated with a circulating pump through pipelines. The nozzles are arranged around the cab and opened at the same time to form the fog curtain, then the dust concentration sensor and the temperature sensor detect the dust concentration and temperature around the cab, and when the controller controls and receives signals of the dust concentration sensor and the temperature sensor, starting and stopping of the resistance rod are controlled. When the resistance rod is started, the temperature rises to enable dust to generate an agglomeration effect, so that wet dust removal and dust fall are realized.
column14: CHANGCUN COAL MINE SHANXI LUAN ENV ENERGY DEV CO LTD

column12: Structure, preparation method and application mode of multipurpose hydrogen sensor
column13: The invention discloses a structure, a preparation method and an application mode of a multipurpose hydrogen sensor, the hydrogen sensor comprises a first heating resistor, a second heating resistor, a temperature measuring resistor, a measuring end, a palladium alloy film assembly, a hydrogen insulation coating, a hydrogen selective coating and a silicon cup, the whole sensor is of a central symmetry structure, the palladium alloy thin film assembly is composed of four groups of centrosymmetric palladium alloy thin film resistors, hydrogen insulation coatings are deposited on the surfaces of the palladium alloy thin film resistors at two opposite angles to serve as internal reference ends, and hydrogen selective coatings are deposited on the surfaces of the palladium alloy thin film resistors at the other two opposite angles to serve as hydrogen sensing ends. According to the hydrogen sensor, the hydrogen sensing end and the internal reference end are in a complete equivalent relationship, so that signal drift caused by change of a temperature field or an atmosphere field can be eliminated in real time, the stability and the reliability of the hydrogen sensor are remarkably improved, and the hydrogen sensor has multiple variable working modes; the redundant modes comprise a single-resistor type redundant mode, a double-resistor redundant mode with an internal reference structure and a 'Wheatstone Bridge' mode with an internal reference structure. The invention further provides a data processing method capable of remarkably shortening the response and recovery time of the hydrogen sensor, so that the hydrogen sensor can meet the hydrogen content detection requirement and the hydrogen leakage monitoring requirement in different application scenes.

column12: Respiratory medicine lung function rehabilitation physiotherapy system and device thereof
column13: The respiratory medicine lung function rehabilitation physiotherapy system comprises a base and a box body, the box body is arranged above the base and fixedly connected with the base, fixing suction cups are arranged at the two ends of the bottom of the base respectively, a storage battery is arranged on the inner wall of the base, an air collection cavity is formed in the bottom of the inner wall of the box body, and a stand column is arranged on one side of the base; an air inlet pipe is arranged in the stand column, one end of the air inlet pipe is connected to the air collecting cavity, an air blowing hopper is arranged at the other end of the air inlet pipe, an oxygen conveying device is arranged on the side, away from the base, of the stand column, the oxygen conveying device is fixedly connected with the stand column, and a data displayer is arranged at the top end of the side, away from the stand column, of the box body. According to the structural design, the device can be continuously used and is convenient to use, breathing resistance can be adjusted according to patients with different illness states, the patients can obtain better rehabilitation physical therapy, the application range is wide, the recovery efficiency of the lung function is remarkably improved, and the device is suitable for popularization and application. And the working intensity of medical personnel is reduced.

column12: COMPRESSOR MODULE
column13: A compressor module for a refrigerant circuit of a motor vehicle air-conditioning system, exhibiting a modular multi-part housing with a low-pressure refrigerant inlet, a high-pressure refrigerant outlet and a compressor, characterized in that an inner heat exchanger of the refrigerant circuit is produced such that it is integrated into the compressor module, wherein the housing of the compressor module fully encloses the inner heat exchanger.

column12: Energy harvesting mechanism for range hood and oil cup liquid level detection device applying same
column13: The invention relates to an energy harvesting mechanism for a range hood. The energy harvesting mechanism comprises a shell, at least three energy harvesting elements and a power storage module, wherein the shell is arranged outside a ring wall of a volute in an enclosing way; the at least three energy harvesting elements are arranged in the shell at intervals along a circumferential direction; the power storage module is electrically connected with each energy harvesting element; the shell comprises an inner ring shell attached to the outside of the volute and an outer ring shell arranged outside the inner ring shell in an enclosing way; the outer ring shell is connected with the inner ring shell; one end of each energy harvesting element is fixed to an inner surface of the outer ring shell; and the other end of each energy harvesting element can be movably pressed against an inner surface of the inner ring shell. The energy harvesting mechanism for the range hood disclosed by the invention is arranged on the periphery of the volute, and can harvest energy lost during the vibration of the volute, so that energy recovery is realized; the energy utilization rate of the range hood can be improved; energy is saved; and environmental protection is facilitated. The invention also discloses an oil cup liquid level detection device. The oil cup liquid level detection device comprisesthe energy harvesting mechanism, and a liquid level sensor which is electrically connected with the power storage module in the energy harvesting mechanism and is used for detecting the oil cup liquidlevel. The oil cup liquid level detection device is more user-friendly.

column12: GAS ANALYSIS WITH AN INVERTED MAGNETRON SOURCE
column13: A total pressure cold cathode ionization gauge is disclosed. An inverted magnetron electrode design is capable of simultaneously detecting and measuring total gas pressure in a high vacuum system, along with partial pressures of one or more gases, such as hydrogen, helium and water. In addition, a leak detector, such as a helium leak detector, is disclosed with a compact counterflow arrangement of a gas inlet passage to an ion detection passage.

column12: Curtain wall cleaning robot
column13: The utility model discloses a curtain wall cleaning robot which comprises a machine frame, a driving device of the machine frame, a suspension cable, a plurality of suction cups arranged on the bottom face of the machine frame, cleaning assemblies arranged at the front end and the rear end of the machine frame respectively, a sewage suction pump, an air suction pump and four steering wheels arranged on the two sides of the machine frame, the sewage suction pump and the air suction pump are arranged on the top face of the machine frame, and the air suction pump is communicated with the suction cups. A water tank, a storage battery, a control box, a lifting stranded cable device and a watergas separation box are further arranged on the top surface of the rack; the storage battery is connected with the input end of the stranded cable driving motor; the stranded shaft is in transmission connection with the suspension cable; a clean water supply device, a sewage recovery device and a roller brush are arranged in the covershaped body of the cleaning assembly; an outlet of the sewage recovery device is communicated with an inlet of the sewage suction pump, an outlet of the sewage suction pump is communicated with an inlet end of the watergas separation tank, a gas outlet end of the separation tank is emptied, a liquid outlet end of the separation tank is communicated with an inlet of the water filtering device, an outlet of the water filtering device is communicated with an inlet of the water tank, and an outlet of the water tank is communicated with an inlet of the clear water supply device. The use cost is low and the use is more convenient.

column12: CONTAINER STATION FOR HYDROGEN PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION
column13: A container station for hydrogen production and distribution with a voltage converter, an air intake and a shutter. A fuel cell is installed inside the container. The electrolyzer is connected to the hydrogen distribution station. Hydrogen dryers, hydrogen non-return valves, a hydrogen compressor are installed on the hydrogen pressure conduit. High pressure hydrogen composite cylinders are connected to the hydrogen pressure conduit. The electrolyzer is connected to the fuel cell. Oxygen dryers, oxygen non-return valves, an oxygen compressor and oxygen solenoid valve are installed on the oxygen pressure conduit. High pressure oxygen composite cylinders are connected to the oxygen pressure conduit. The fuel cell is connected to the hydrogen pressure conduit. The inlet of central heating liquid and the outlet of central heating liquid are connected to a fluid exchanger.

column12: Simulation experiment device for dynamic measurement of pH electrode
column13: The invention relates to a pH electrode dynamic measurement simulation experiment device, and belongs to a power plant water quality chemical analysis instrument. Comprising a backpressure overflow cup, a pH meter, a pH electrode, a metal electrode cup for a standard pH electrode, a metal electrode cup for a detected pH electrode, a non-metal electrode cup for the detected pH electrode, a needle valve, a discharge three-way valve, a device control unit, an ammonia adding peristaltic pump, an electronic flowmeter, a tee joint, a variable speed circulating pump, a cation exchange column, a diluted ammonia water storage bottle, a detection liquid circulating water tank and a vacuum degassing module. The vacuum pump is connected with the low-temperature water bath and the liquid level meter. The device has the advantages that working conditions of power plant pH measurement can be simulated, the performance of the detected pH electrode can be rapidly detected, the device is used as a judgment basis for power plant state maintenance, the maintenance cost is reduced, a detected temperature compensation curve can be directly used for correcting an online table, the device is a basic guarantee for safe and stable operation of a power plant unit, and direct economic benefits can be brought.

column12: Tuning gas cluster ion beam systems
column13: A method for processing a substrate that includes: applying, at an ionizer, a drive pulse train to an ion source to ionize a gas cluster beam and transfer the drive pulse train to the gas cluster beam; measuring, at a detector exposed to the gas cluster beam, a beam current synchronously with the drive pulse train; obtaining time-of-flight information of the clusters and the monomers in the gas cluster beam based on the beam current and the drive pulse train; determining size information relating to a size distribution of clusters and monomers in the gas cluster ion beam based on the time-of-flight information; adjusting a process parameter of the gas cluster beam based on the size information; and exposing the substrate to the gas cluster beam with the adjusted process parameter.

column12: Ink-jet printer for degradable food packaging bag
column13: The utility model discloses an ink-jet printer for a degradable food packaging bag, which relates to the technical field of ink-jet printers and comprises a mounting plate, a conveyor belt arranged on the inner side wall of the mounting plate, an ink-jet printer arranged on the upper surface of an upper top plate, an ion wind bar arranged in the middle of the upper surface of the mounting plate, and a first support arranged on the right side of the middle of the upper surface of the mounting plate. A data collector is arranged on the upper surface of the first support, a conveying device is arranged on the front surface of the mounting plate, a mounting rod is arranged on the inner side wall of the mounting plate, a universal joint is arranged on one side face of the mounting rod, a flow guide funnel is fixedly connected to one end of the universal joint, and a third electric telescopic rod is movably connected to one end of the ball cup through a ball rod. According to the code spraying device, through the arrangement of the flow guide plate, the conveying device and the transmission roller, the purpose of automatically reprocessing products without code spraying is achieved, and through the arrangement of the universal joint, the flow guide funnel and the third electric telescopic rod, the purpose of conveniently solving the problem that the products are prone to accumulation is achieved.

column12: Automatic car washing system for mining fixed mine car
column13: The utility model provides a mining fixed type mine car automatic car washing system which comprises a sweeping device, a sewage recovery system and an electric control device, the sweeping device comprises a car side spraying pipe and a car bottom spraying pipe, and the car side spraying pipe and the car bottom spraying pipe are arranged on the two sides of a mine car lifting rail and the bottom of the rail respectively. The sewage recovery system comprises a water collecting tank, a sludge pump and a mine sewage treatment workshop sludge tank, the water collecting tank is arranged below the lifting mine car track and connected with the mine sewage treatment workshop sludge tank through the sludge pump, and the electric control device comprises a PLC, an infrared sensor and an electric gate valve. The infrared sensors are installed on the two sides of a lifting mine car rail in front of the cleaning device, the electric gate valve is installed at the front end of the water inlet pipe, and the PLC controls the infrared sensors and the electric gate valve. According to the automatic car washing system, the current situation that the mine car is not washed and is dirty, disordered and bad is improved, the reusability of the mine car is improved, and the uncertainty of manual car washing is reduced.

column12: Electromagnetic heating method for improving thickened oil recovery efficiency
column13: The invention discloses an electromagnetic heating method for improving the thickened oil recovery efficiency. The electromagnetic heating method comprises the steps that an antenna for launching electromagnetic radiation is placed in a production tubular column, meanwhile, a temperature sensor is installed on a near shaft, and the nearby temperature of the near shaft is collected in real time; when the nearby temperature of the near shaft rises to the preset critical temperature, the transmitting power of the antenna is reduced in a gradient mode, and at the moment, the temperature of the near shaft is firstly reduced and then rises; after current power is adopted for continuous radiation heating, and if the temperature of the near shaft rises to the critical temperature, the antenna f power is continuously reduced; power ladder reduction and adjustment are continuously carried out, and until the power is reduced to about 100W; and a production well is opened, thickened oil spontaneously flows into the production well due to stratum differential pressure, and at the moment, the antenna continuously performs electromagnetic radiation heating with low power. According to the electromagnetic heating method for improving the thickened oil recovery efficiency, the problems of reducing the thickened oil yield and affecting the shaft material quality due to excessive heating temperature are solved, meanwhile, the heating temperature of the liquidity of the thickened oil is ensured, and the mining efficiency and engineering safety of the thickened oil are improved.

column12: Multi-foot wall-climbing hull polishing robot
column13: The multi-foot wall-climbing hull polishing robot comprises a main body component, walking components and polishing components, the main body component comprises a frame main body, a CCD camera, a relay module, a controller, a battery device and electric control permanent magnet foot bodies, the frame main body is of a regular polygon frame structure, and the multiple walking components are evenly distributed and installed on the periphery of the frame main body at intervals; the walking component is a multi-joint type electric component, an octopus type electric control permanent magnetic chuck is installed at the bottom of the walking component, and the grinding component is installed at the top of the frame body. The CCD camera, the relay module, the controller, the battery device and the electric control permanent magnet foot body are respectively arranged on the frame main body. The robot can stably crawl on the surface of a ship body under adsorption of the multi-foot electric control permanent magnet octopus type suction cups, the electric control permanent magnet foot bodies are installed at the lower end of the main machine frame, and overturning of the robot caused by grinding vibration in the grinding process is prevented. The polishing device can accurately polish burrs and metal chippings on the surface of the ship body, and the polishing mechanism is simple in structure.

column12: ELECTROCHEMICAL CELL
column13: An electrochemical cell includes a winding comprising a ribbon-shaped negative electrode with an anode current collector and a ribbon-shaped positive electrode with a cathode current collector. An assembly comprises the negative electrode and the positive electrode, the assembly is wound spirally around a winding axis to form the winding, the winding comprises a central cavity, two terminal end faces, and a circumferential winding shell. The electrochemical cell further includes a contact sheet metal member in direct contact with a protruding longitudinal edge of the anode current collector or the cathode current collector. In addition, the electrochemical cell includes a housing, a sensor apparatus configured detect changes in a state of the winding, and a display and/or a contact configured to display measured values and/or via which the measured values can be transmitted.

column12: Method and apparatus for keeping artificially created tissues alive
column13: A device to aid in the production and regeneration of tissues and organs, standing alone, or on or inside of the human body, with a method of fabrication of tissues and organs and use of the device.

column12: Sensor arrangement

column12: Stamping part deburring equipment and using method thereof
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of stamping production, in particular to stamping part deburring equipment and a using method thereof.The stamping part deburring equipment comprises a punching machine, and the punching machine is provided with a discharging track and a control unit; the punching machine further comprises a deburring device, and the discharging rail is connected with the deburring device which can quickly remove burrs at the bottom of the iron punching part without turning over the punching part. A shell is arranged above a discharging rail, a first conveying belt and a magnetic suction cup are arranged in the shell, a second shell is connected to one side of the discharging rail, an abrasive belt is arranged in the second shell, a second conveying belt is arranged below the end, away from a punching machine, of the first conveying belt, and a distance sensor is arranged on the second conveying belt; when the stamping part moves to the position below the first conveying belt and the magnetic suction cup through the discharging track, the stamping part can be sucked up by the magnetic suction cup and then moves along with the first conveying belt under friction of magnetic force and the first conveying belt, the abrasive belt conducts grinding work when the stamping part passes through the position above the abrasive belt, and the stamping part can be directly deburred without turning over the stamping part to enable burrs to face upwards.
column14: QIDONG SHENLONG IND COMPLETE CO LTD

column12: GAS INJECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DEEP STRONG BOTTOM WATER SANDSTONE RESERVOIR
column13: A gas injection method for a deep strong bottom water reservoir, comprising: configuring a plurality of gas injection media for a deep strong bottom water reservoir to be researched, and analyzing the mixed phase characteristics of each gas injection medium in oil reservoir crude oil, respectively, so as to screen, from the plurality of gas injection media, for several target gas injection media facilitating the use of the remaining oil in the oil reservoir; combining the several target gas injection media with a well group simulation model corresponding to the oil reservoir, and analyzing a mining rule of the remaining oil for use so as to obtain an optimal gas injection proportion between the target gas injection media; by means of the optimal gas injection proportion and the well group simulation model, using a plurality of gas injection modes, respectively to perform gas injection simulation on the oil reservoir, and obtaining a recovery ratio improvement amplitude corresponding to each gas injection mode, so as to determine an optimal gas injection mode; and performing gas injection operation on the oil reservoir according to the optimal gas injection proportion by using the optimal gas injection mode. Effective oil stabilization and water control of an oil reservoir to be mined are achieved, and the later recovery ratio during oil reservoir exploitation is greatly improved.

column12: Robot arm control method and device, control equipment and robot
column13: The invention discloses a robot arm control method and device, control equipment and a robot. The method comprises the following steps: calculating the pose of a target object according to the pose of an actuator and a first relative pose relationship between the actuator and the target object; calculating a conversion relation between the coordinate system of the target object and the coordinate system of the robot arm, and calculating a third relative pose relation of the target pose of the reference object in the coordinate system of the robot arm in combination with a second relative pose relation of the target pose of the reference object in the coordinate system of the target object; adjusting information, including Euler angle rotation information and position movement information, of the robot arm is obtained; and according to the adjustment information, the robot arm is controlled to move, so that the target object moves to a target posture and a target position corresponding to the target posture of the reference object. According to the embodiment of the invention, the grinding process of the acetabulum or the mounting process of the acetabular cup prosthesis can be implemented strictly according to the plan, and the effect of ideal mounting pose of the acetabular cup prosthesis is achieved.
column14: BEIJING HEHUA RUIBO MEDICAL TECH CO LTD

column12: Automatic detection and repair integrated crawling robot for structural damage of military aircraft
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic detection and repair integrated crawling robot for structural damage of a military aircraft, and relates to the technical field of composite material polishing and the technical field of robots. The crawling robot is composed of a hexapod robot device and a six-axis mechanical arm device. The whole crawling robot is small, portable and convenient to use, path planning can be conducted according to programming control, the six small suction cups freely rotate and are stably adsorbed to the surface of a military aircraft with the complex curvature through the small and many suction cups, and the crawling robot can move step by step; therefore, the damage detection identification and polishing repair work of the surface composite material of the complete machine of the full-autonomous military aircraft is realized. The six-axis mechanical arm device is provided with a nondestructive testing head, a laser polishing head and a conventional polishing head so as to adapt to polishing and repairing work of damaged structures with different requirements. According to the crawling robot, the grinding efficiency and precision are greatly improved, and the overall combat effectiveness of a military aircraft is improved.

column12: Axial flux machine
column13: An axial flux machine (100) is provided, in which the rotor (104) is cooled via air cooling, provided by impeller blades (140) located on the opposite side of the rotor (104) to the stator (102). An impeller cover (142) covers the impeller blades (140) such that air channels are defined between adjacent blades. The air channels have an air inlet (146) at an inner radial portion of the rotor (104), and an air outlet (146) at the outer radial extremity of the impeller blades (140). As the rotor (104) turns, the air is drawn through the air channel from the air inlet (144) to the air outlet (146). The motor (100) may be enclosed within a housing (120), in which case air ducting (150,152) may be used to guide air to the air inlet (144), and from the air outlet (146) to the outside of the housing (120).

column12: APPARATUS FOR PERFORMING MAGNETIC-PULSE TREATMENT OF MINERAL MATERIAL
column13: FIELD: soil or rock drilling; mining.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to devices for grinding mineral raw materials by means of their magnetic-pulse treatment and can be used, for example, in mining industry. Device for performing magnetic-pulse treatment of mineral raw material comprises a structural element in the form of a thin-wall shell made of dielectric, non-magnetic, wear-resistant material separating inner surface of electromagnetic system and moving mineral raw material. Shell additionally comprises a low-current inductor system having inductive coupling with the main and additional inductors. Low-current inductor system serves as a sensor for measuring the rate of change of pulsed magnetic fields generated by the main and additional inductors. Low-current inductor system is connected to a measuring element which is part of the device performing measurement of amplitude-time parameters of the induced EMF in the low-current inductor system.EFFECT: device is characterized by long service life.5 cl

column12: Synaptic transistor based on two-dimensional and three-dimensional perovskite composite structure and preparation method of synaptic transistor
column13: The invention discloses a synaptic transistor based on a two-dimensional and three-dimensional perovskite composite structure and a manufacturing method of the synaptic transistor, and mainly solves the problem that an existing two-terminal perovskite synaptic device is inaccurate in synaptic behavior simulation. The synaptic transistor comprises a glass substrate (1), a transparent oxide gate electrode (2), a perovskite mining area (3), a source electrode (4), a drain electrode (5) and a packaging protection layer (6) from bottom to top. An ion dielectric layer is made of a three-dimensionalperovskite material, and a conductive channel layer is made of a two-dimensional perovskite material; carrier transport in the two-dimensional perovskite material is simulated by utilizing an electricfield formed by ion migration in the three-dimensional perovskite material; a device grid simulates a synaptic front film as an input end; and a device source and drain simulate a synaptic back filmto read current after synapsis. According to the invention, the two processes of carrier transport and grid control can be adjusted at the same time, regulation and control of source and drain currents are realized, the accuracy of synaptic behavior simulation of the synaptic transistor is improved, and the synaptic transistor can be used for simulating human neural synapses and constructing a neural network system.

column12: HEAD UP DISPLAY SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF, AND VEHICLE
column13: A head up display system, a control method thereof and a vehicle are provided. The head up display system includes an imaging device group, a concave reflective element, a directional imaging device and a processor, the imaging device group includes at least one single-layer imaging device; the directional imaging device includes a light source device, a direction control element, a diffusing element and a light modulating layer; the processor is respectively connected with the directional imaging device and the at least one single-layer imaging device in the imaging device group.

column12: Adsorption type broken glass cleaning machine
column13: The utility model discloses an adsorption type broken glass cleaning machine which comprises a shell, wheels are installed on the shell, a hollow adsorption roller is installed at the front end of the shell, a plurality of suction cups are arranged on the outer surface of the adsorption roller, the adsorption roller is connected with a first air suction pipeline, and the first air suction pipeline is connected with a filter. The filter is connected with an air exhaust device through an air exhaust pipeline II; an electric control valve I and a pressure sensor I are arranged on the air exhaust pipeline I; a collecting hopper is arranged at the position, behind the adsorption roller, of the shell, a glass smashing device is installed in the collecting hopper, the collecting hopper is connected with a filter through a third exhaust pipeline, and a second electric adjusting valve and a second pressure sensor are arranged on the third exhaust pipeline; the shell is also provided with a slag hopper; and the discharge port of the filter is connected with the slag hopper through a pipeline. According to the glass sheet cleaning device, glass sheets on the ground can be efficiently adsorbed, crushed and then collected through the suction cups arranged on the adsorption rollers, the cleaning effect is good, and the efficiency is high.

column12: Method and system for filtering ions defined by a targeted charge to mass ratio
column13: This invention has as its object a method of filtering an ion beam to isolate ions having a targeted charge to mass ratio, the method comprising:providing a quadrupole mass filter device (2),emitting an ion beam (1′) from a source (1) towards a quadrupole mass filter device (2),applying an electrical field between the rods (3, 3′) of each pair of opposite rods (3, 3′) of the device (2), each field being defined by combined direct and alternative potentials,calibrating each of the electrical fields in order to create at least one exact focusing point (8) at the exit (5),method characterized in that it also consists ingenerating, by means of rods (3, 3′) which are segmented longitudinally, an electrical field extending between and along each pair of segmented rods (3, 3′),calibrating said local field segments by adjusting the settings of their respective individual DC and AC potentials in order to create at least one intermediate node,creating and maintaining an unstable motion region or region of variable stability (10) in the vicinity of and at said at least one intermediate node location.

column12: Edge computing device shell with efficient heat dissipation
column13: An edge computing device shell with efficient heat dissipation comprises a protective shell, a heat dissipation module, an interface board and a graphene coating, the heat dissipation module is connected with the interior of the protective shell in a matched mode, the heat dissipation module is connected with a component, the interface board is connected with the rear side face of the protective shell, the graphene coating is arranged on the surface of the heat dissipation module, and the graphene coating is arranged on the outer surface of the protective shell. The heat dissipation module comprises a cooling fin, a temperature control fan, a heat conduction pad and a miniature suction cup. Compared with the prior art, the novel heat dissipation module is additionally arranged, the heat dissipation area of the heat dissipation fins is increased, the heat conduction performance of the heat dissipation fins is improved, the heat convection heat exchange efficiency and the heat conduction heat exchange efficiency are improved, the heat exchange efficiency is further improved through the graphene coating, meanwhile, the temperature control fan and the temperature sensor are additionally arranged on the shell, and the heat dissipation strength can be intelligently adjusted.

column12: Cap unloading machine for white spirit bottle caps
column13: The invention discloses a cap unloading machine for white spirit bottle caps, and relates to the field of liquid filling production line structures. The device is reasonable in layout and high in working efficiency, and the cleanliness of the bottle caps before capping can be effectively guaranteed. The cap unloading machine is arranged at the inlet end of the bottle cap conveying belt and comprises a roller conveyor, a four-axis robot and an ion wind washing machine, a vacuum suction cup used for grabbing bottle caps is fixedly installed at the execution end of the four-axis robot, and the four-axis robot is located among the four-axis robot, the ion wind washing machine and the bottle cap conveying belt. And the bottle caps are transferred among the three through the four-axis robot. The bottle cap grabbing device has the advantages of being convenient to operate, high in grabbing accuracy and the like on the whole, and the cleanliness of the bottle cap before capping can be effectively guaranteed through wind washing.

column12: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR PLASMA THERMAL CENTRIFUGAL REDUCTION AND SEPARATION OF CHEMICALS FROM ORE IN A GRAVITATIONAL FIELD
column13: FIELD: metallurgy.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to metallurgy and can be used for plasma-thermal centrifugal reduction and separation of chemicals from ore in a gravitational field. The device contains a plasmatron for heating the charge reagents, a cooled rotating crucible with a loading hole. The crucible is made with the possibility of separating chemicals of different chemical composition and density and their subsequent discharge into the molds through a drain hole made in the lower part of the crucible along the axis of rotation, while it is equipped with a video spectral sensor made with the ability to track the melting process inside the crucible and determine the moment of the beginning and end of the discharge of a chemical substance with a certain chemical composition and density, a plasmatron installed in the lower part of the crucible for heating the mentioned chemicals drained into the molds and a sealed chamber in which all the elements of the device are installed.EFFECT: invention makes it possible to expand the technical capabilities for the recovery and separation of chemicals by reducing energy consumption, shorten the production cycle, reduce the dimensions of the equipment.10 cl, 3 dwg

column12: Automated handling of different form factor devices under test in test cell
column13: A system for performing tests using automated test equipment (ATE) is disclosed. The system comprises a robot comprising an end effector operable to pick up and transfer a DUT in-and-out of a test slot in a primitive. The system further comprises a system controller comprising a memory and a processor for controlling the robot. Also, the system comprises a test rack comprising a plurality of primitives, wherein the primitive is a modular device comprising a plurality of slots for testing a plurality of DUTs, and wherein the robot is configured to access slots in the plurality of primitives within the test rack using the end effector.

column12: PULP HYDRAULIC TRANSPORTATION
column13: FIELD: mining.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to the mining industry, in particular to the pulp lifting and transportation during development of mineral deposits, in which the desired product is not crushed, for example, in the development of an amber deposit and, respectively, in hydrotransportation of pulp containing amber. Pulp hydraulic transport consists of pipeline and pulp separator with chamber separating pulp into transported and transporting flows, transporting flow by means of pressure pump is pumped under pressure into pipeline, providing energy of pipeline transportation of transported pulp flow. Pulp separator housing is communicated with the chamber by holes, the value of which is determined by the size of the stored target product, and the chamber itself is communicated with a storage pump feeding the pulp into a reservoir with sensors of the upper and lower levels, which control operation of the accumulating and pressure pumps, and through them with the valves of the pipeline.EFFECT: proposed hydrotransportation of pulp prevents destructive effect of booster pump on more valuable part of extracted target product and allows maintaining its quality.1 cl, 1 dwg

column12: High-stage large room real-time state intelligent monitoring device and use method thereof
column13: The invention provides a high-stage large room real-time state intelligent monitoring device and a use method thereof. Comprising an information intelligent integration device, a tail rod piece, a stress sensor, a front end rod piece, a baffle, a spring, a hinge, a circular truncated cone, a rotatable shell, a first servo motor, a second servo motor, a third servo motor, a transmission shaft, a transmission arm, an ultrasonic detector fixing body, an ultrasonic detector, a nut, a tray and the like. The deformed steel bar anchor rod, the stress sensor, the ultrasonic detector and other components are combined into a whole, so that the intelligent monitor has the functions of supporting, stress monitoring, rock stratum surface crushing degree monitoring and the like. Meanwhile, the anchor rod supporting concept is innovated, an automatic bouncing device is adopted, supporting is conducted downwards from the space of the previous stage, the baffle is bounced off through the spring, and therefore the supporting effect of the large-mining-height space roof is achieved.

column12: PULP HYDRAULIC TRANSPORT
column13: FIELD: mining.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to the mining industry, in particular to the pulp lifting and transportation in the mineral deposits development, in which the desired product crushing is not desirable, for example, during the amber deposit development. Pulp hydraulic transport consists of pipeline, pulp separator with chamber separating pulp into transported and transporting flows. Conveying flow by means of the pressure pump is pumped under pressure to the pipeline, providing with energy the transported flow of pulp via the pipeline. At that, the pulp separator housing is communicated with the chamber with holes the size of which is determined by the size of the stored target product, and the chamber itself is communicated with the reservoir by means of accumulation and pressure pumps controlled by sensors of upper and lower levels of the reservoir and control valves of the pipeline.EFFECT: technical result consists in improvement of extracted target product quality by preventing penetration of that part of target product into cavity of the blow pump, size of which is one of the main quality indicators of the extracted target product, higher efficiency of the installation, wider range of pulp hydraulic transport.1 cl, 1 dwg

column12: Automatic fragmentation device for grinding machine and control method
column13: The invention discloses an automatic slicing device for a grinding machine and a control method, the automatic slicing device comprises a base, a dovetail groove is formed in the rear side of the upper surface of the base, two dovetail locking sliding blocks which are symmetrical in position are slidably connected in the dovetail groove, slicing seats used for separating saw blades are fixedly arranged on the opposite side faces of the dovetail locking sliding blocks, and the slicing seats are fixedly arranged on the opposite side faces of the dovetail locking sliding blocks. Two positioning rods are further fixedly arranged on the base and used for limiting the saw blades, a suction cup robot used for sucking the saw blades and carrying the saw blades is further arranged on the upper sides of the saw blades, and the suction cup robot can effectively avoid the bonding phenomenon caused by oil films between the saw blades. Compared with a push rod type slicing, the surface failure phenomena of abrasion, scratching and the like caused by friction between the saw blades can be avoided; and the saw blade can be quickly positioned, and an adjustable clamping structure capable of adapting to saw blades of different sizes is provided.

column12: Cutter robot feeding and discharging production line
column13: The utility model discloses a cutter robot feeding and discharging production line which comprises a grinding machine and a machine frame installed on one side of the grinding machine, foot cups and universal idler wheels are arranged at the four corners of the lower end of the machine frame, a material disc support is arranged on the upper side of the machine frame, and a material disc assembly is arranged at the upper end of the material disc support. A robot is arranged on the upper side of the material disc assembly, a finger unit is arranged at the upper end of the robot and comprises a finger connecting assembly, a clamping jaw air cylinder, a first finger and a second finger, the finger connecting assembly is fixed to the execution tail end of the robot, and the clamping jaw air cylinder is arranged on the finger connecting assembly. Clamping fingers are arranged at one end of the clamping jaw air cylinder; by designing the robot and the finger unit, the semi-finished cutter on the tray is clamped and fed through the robot and the finger unit during use, the structure is simple, use is more reliable, and the semi-finished cutter is fed and discharged from the tray more conveniently and quickly.

column12: Electrical control system for trackless rubber-tyred vehicle
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of electrical control systems, and particularly relates to an electrical control system for a trackless rubber-tyred vehicle, which is characterized in that a mining explosion-proof lithium ion storage battery power supply is electrically connected with a generator and a control box; the control box is electrically connected with the starter and the LED lighting signal lamp, the control box is electrically connected with the protection device and the fuel injection electric control device through communication cables, the LED lighting signal lamp is electrically connected with the electronic horn through a flexible cable, and the electronic horn is connected with the control box. The protection device can monitor various parameters of the trackless rubber-tyred vehicle in real time, when the sensor in the protection device monitors that the parameters reach indexes, the electronic horn and the LED lighting signal lamp give out sound and light alarms, and therefore operators are reminded to stop the machine to avoid risks.
column14: YONGJI ZHONGAN MECH EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Non-interference heat source automatic intelligent heat exchange device
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of geothermal mining equipment, and discloses a non-interference heat source automatic intelligent heat exchange device which is characterized in that a plurality of geothermal holes are distributed at equal intervals, circulating pipelines penetrate through the geothermal holes, the upper ends of the circulating pipelines are communicated with a water inlet pipeline and a water outlet pipeline, and the outer ends of the water inlet pipelines are respectively communicated with a water storage tank; the outer ends of the plurality of water outlet pipelines are respectively communicated with a water collecting tank which is communicated with a heating pipeline through a pipeline; a water pump and a flow sensor are respectively communicated among the plurality of water inlet pipelines, and a temperature sensor is respectively communicated among the plurality of water outlet pipelines. By arranging the plurality of circulating pipelines connected in parallel, a heat source can be provided for the heating pipeline independently, the pipeline fault of a certain circulating pipeline is prevented from influencing the heat exchange function, and meanwhile, the flow of each water inlet pipeline and the medium temperature of each water outlet pipeline can be detected through the flow sensor and the temperature sensor respectively; and the on-off of the pipelines can be conveniently controlled according to the actual conditions of the pipelines.
column14: SHAANXI SIJICHUN CLEAN HEAT SOURCE CO LTD

column12: Workpiece picking and attaching mechanism
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of workpiece picking and attaching, in particular to a workpiece picking and attaching mechanism. A pressure sensor is installed on the support, a spline shaft in the transmission assembly sequentially penetrates through the pressure sensor and the spring assembly to be connected with the vacuum suction cup, a servo motor in the transmission assembly drives the spline shaft in the transmission assembly to rotate, the angle of the vacuum suction cup is adjusted, and the spline shaft generates relative displacement under stress during mounting. The compression spring assembly transmits pressure to the pressure sensor, the pressure sensor accurately controls the fitting pressure of the workpiece, and monitors and adjusts the pressure value of the vacuum chuck on the adsorbed workpiece in real time during fitting, so that the pressure control during fitting is realized, and the risk that the product is crushed in the assembly process is avoided while the process requirements are met; a workpiece picking mechanism is optimized, a spline shaft is directly driven by a servo motor to rotate, the angle deviation of a picked workpiece is accurately adjusted, it is guaranteed that the rotation angle after attachment meets the technological requirement, and the heat dissipation cover surface mounting device is suitable for surface mounting of heat dissipation covers of various different sizes and specifications.

column12: Industrial and mining dustproof mask
column13: The utility model belongs to the technical field of industrial protective articles, and particularly relates to an industrial and mining dustproof mask which comprises a cooling and dehumidifying mechanism, a filter box, a corrugated hose and a mask, the mask is connected with an air outlet pipe arranged on the top face of the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism through the corrugated hose, and the filter box is inserted into an air inlet formed in the front end of the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism in a matched mode. A cooling fan installed at the front end of the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism is connected with a heat exchange fin, a semiconductor chilling plate connected with the heat exchange fin is tightly attached to the cold water box, and a water outlet pipe and a water return pipe are arranged on the side face of the cold water box. A battery module, an isolation plate, a temperature and humidity sensor and a controller are installed in the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism, the rear end of the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism is in threaded connection with a screw plug, gas in a corrugated hose is cooled through a refrigerant flowing in a closed circuit, water vapor is condensed, the comfort degree of a wearer and the hygiene of the cooling and dehumidifying mechanism are improved, and the comfort degree of the wearer is improved. And the filter cartridge can be used for a long time.
column14: PEARL HAI TITFENG BIOTECHNOLOGY CO LTD

column12: Device for generating anaerobic micro-aerobic culture environment
column13: The utility model discloses a device for generating an anaerobic micro-aerobic culture environment, which comprises a gas distributing and discharging device, a mixed gas source, a culture vessel, a vacuum pump and a pressure sensor, and the gas distributing and discharging device is connected with the mixed gas source, the culture vessel, the vacuum pump and the pressure sensor through gas paths. The vacuum pump can be controlled to extract required air pressure through real-time detection of the air pressure by the pressure sensor during air extraction and air exchange, a required culture environment can be accurately adjusted, the CUP controls opening and closing of each electromagnetic valve to achieve control of vacuumizing, air inflation and pipeline sealing performance detection, the required culture environment can be intelligently adjusted, and the culture efficiency is improved. All the components are connected through the gas quick plugging interfaces or the threaded interfaces, the connection and installation are quick, the anaerobic environment needs to be subjected to gas extraction and gas exchange for three times, the micro-aerobic environment needs to be subjected to gas extraction and gas exchange for one time, and the time required for reaching the culture environment is greatly shortened.
column14: HANGZHOU HUA END BIOTECHNOLOGY LTD COMPANY

column12: Experiment table and experiment method for simulating conveying and laying of propping agent in reservoir fracturing fracture
column13: The invention discloses an experiment table and an experiment method for simulating propping agent conveying and laying in reservoir fracturing fractures; relates to the mining and geotechnical engineering technical field. The experiment table comprises a sand-carrying fluid preparation part, a reservoir fracturing simulation part for simulating a reservoir fracturing process, a sand-carrying fluid recovery part for realizing separation of fracturing fluid and a propping agent, and a scanning imaging part for scanning a solid form in a reservoir model. According to the method, the artificial fractures are preset in the reservoir model, so that the fracturing fracture initiation, expansion and closing processes in an experiment are effectively realized, and the method is closer to a real reservoir fracturing process; CT scanning and three-dimensional reconstruction technologies are adopted, observation of conveying and laying characteristics of the propping agent in the fracturing fracture is achieved, and comprehensive analysis of the sand carrying performance of the fracturing fluid and the sand production amount after fracturing is achieved in combination with measurement of themass of the propping agent in the flowback fluid.

column12: Testing device and method for testing mechanical sealing performance of nuclear power plant general pump
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of nuclear power maintenance, and particularly discloses a testing device and method for testing the mechanical sealing performance of a nuclear power plant general pump. A simulation medium enters a test seal through a simulation medium pipeline, a circulating medium outlet of the test seal is connected with a circulating medium outlet pipeline, and the tail end of the circulating medium outlet pipeline is connected into an inlet of a heat exchanger; an outlet of the heat exchanger is connected with a circulating medium inlet pipeline; the tail endof the circulating medium inlet pipeline is connected into a circulating medium inlet of the test seal; a measuring cup is arranged at the bottom of the test seal and used for measuring the volume ofleaked liquid. By adopting the testing device and method, the performances of key water pump equipment such as a main water feed pump, a charging pump and an electric auxiliary water feed pump of a nuclear power plant after mechanical seal repair can be verified.

column12: Testing device for testing mechanical sealing performance of general pump of nuclear power plant
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of nuclear power maintenance, and particularly discloses a test device for testing the mechanical sealing performance of a general pump of a nuclear power plant, a simulation medium enters the test seal through a simulation medium pipeline, a circulating medium outlet of the test seal is connected with a circulating medium outlet pipeline, and the tail end of the circulating medium outlet pipeline is connected into an inlet of the heat exchanger. An outlet of the heat exchanger is connected with a circulating medium inlet pipeline; the tail end of the circulating medium inlet pipeline is connected into a circulating medium inlet of the test seal; a measuring cup is arranged at the bottom of the test seal and used for measuring the volume of leaked liquid.
