column12: Active self-sensing identification pavement ice and snow melting device
column13: The invention provides an active self-sensing recognition pavement ice and snow melting device which comprises a viaduct surface, a plurality of planting boxes are fixedly mounted on the two sides of the viaduct surface at equal intervals, a control cabinet is mounted at the top of one end of the viaduct surface, and a snow depth sensor is mounted at the top of the control cabinet. Partition plates are fixedly installed in the multiple spaced planting boxes on one side, the portions, located above the partition plates and below the partition plates, of the planting boxes are provided with planting grooves and storage cavities respectively, conical hoppers are fixedly installed at the bottoms of the storage cavities, and mixing cavities are formed in the portions, located below the conical hoppers, in the planting boxes. The device can sense the depth of accumulated snow, the conical grinding base is driven by the wind cup or the motor to rotate, a granular snow removing agent is ground into powder, then the powder and collected rainwater are mixed and sprayed to the road surface, icing is avoided, snow melting is accelerated, treatment is timely, and the integrated function of self-sensing, self-grinding, self-fusing and self-spraying can be achieved; and the snow remover can be quickly sprayed to the whole viaduct surface and is high in snow removal efficiency.

column12: Full well capacity for image sensor
column13: Various embodiments of the present disclosure are directed towards an image sensor having a photodetector disposed in a semiconductor substrate. The photodetector comprises a first doped region comprising a dopant having a first doping type. A deep well region is disposed within the semiconductor substrate, where the deep well region extends from a back-side surface of the semiconductor substrate to a top surface of the first doped region. A second doped region is disposed within the semiconductor substrate and abuts the first doped region. The second doped region and the deep well region comprise a second dopant having a second doping type opposite the first doping type, where the second dopant comprises gallium.

column12: PROCESSING SYSTEM FOR PROCESSING SPECTACLE LENSES
column13: A processing system for processing spectacle lenses and a method for processing spectacle lenses are proposed. The processing system has several processing stations, in particular a milling station, a turning station, a polishing station, a cleaning station and/or a signing station. Furthermore, the processing system has a transport system for transporting the spectacle lenses and/or transport containers for the spectacle lenses. Preferably, the processing system also has a common base frame and/or a common casing for the processing stations. In the processing system and/or with the method, several spectacle lenses can be processed simultaneously in different processing stations.

column12: Fool-proof alarm mechanism and discharging equipment thereof
column13: The utility model discloses a fool-proof alarm mechanism and a discharging device thereof, the discharging device comprises a first discharging plate and a suction cup arranged on the first discharging plate and used for adsorbing materials, the fool-proof alarm mechanism comprises a pressing plate, an induction sheet and a photoelectric sensor, the pressing plate is arranged between the first discharging plate and the suction cup, the induction sheet is arranged on the pressing plate, and the photoelectric sensor is arranged on the induction sheet. The pressing plate is arranged on the first discharging plate and can move upwards below the first discharging plate after being extruded, the bottom of the induction piece is connected with the pressing plate, the induction piece synchronously moves up and down along with the pressing plate, a photoelectric sensor is arranged above the first discharging plate, and the photoelectric sensor can be arranged over the induction piece in an up-down adjusting mode. The fool-proof alarm mechanism can replace a pressure sensor structure to be used for a product fool-proof alarm function, the reset spring compresses the pressing plate, the pressing plate is located above a product, the product can be effectively prevented from being crushed in the discharging movement process, and the fool-proof alarm mechanism is low in cost, high in structural strength, simple and practical.

column12: Surgical device employing a cantilevered beam dissector
column13: A surgical instrument for treating body tissues through narrow body passages employs an elongated cantilevered beam having a proximal end supported in a rigid block and a narrower distal end extendable through the narrow passages. One or more piezoelectric actuators are fixed to the beam surface and energized from an AC source provided by an electrical excitation system through electrodes interspersed with the piezoelectric actuators to produce oscillatory motion of the beam distal end in multiple modes of movement.

column12: Sucker device and chemical mechanical grinding equipment
column13: The invention provides a suction cup device and chemical mechanical grinding equipment. The sucker device comprises a sealing protective cover, a membrane assembly, a pneumatic assembly and a detection assembly, wherein the membrane assembly is arranged at the lower side of the box-type sealing protective cover, and an inner cavity is formed in the membrane assembly; the pneumatic assembly is arranged in the box-type sealing protective cover and communicates with the inner cavity of the membrane assembly through an air pipe, and the air pipe is made of a light-transmitting material; and the detection assembly comprises a light source and a sensor which are oppositely arranged at the two sides of the air pipe, and the sensor is used for receiving light which is emitted by the light source and passes through the air pipe so as to generate a detection signal.

column12: Shaftless screw conveyor
column13: The utility model belongs to the field of shaftless screw conveyors, particularly relates to a shaftless screw conveyor, and aims to solve the problems that dust is easy to generate in a feed port, the dust can be diffused to the periphery and the surrounding environment can be polluted when dry crushed and small granular ores are fed into the screw conveyor through a feed hopper in the prior art. According to the technical scheme, the conveyor comprises a conveyor body, the conveyor body comprises a conveyor shell, a motor, a speed reducer, a spiral body shaft, a shaftless spiral body, a fixing shaft, a pressure sensor and a wear-resisting lining plate, the motor is arranged on one side of the speed reducer, and one side of the speed reducer is fixedly connected with one side of the conveyor shell; a rotating shaft is arranged on the speed reducer, one end of the spiral body shaft is fixedly connected with one end of the rotating shaft, one end of the shaftless spiral body is connected with the spiral, dust can be effectively filtered and intercepted through the filtering mechanism, pollution to the surrounding environment is reduced, and the opening and closing door can be fixed through a bolt and a nut of a second short plate.
column14: LINYI HUAZHONG MECH EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: Mining dust early warning device
column13: The utility model discloses a mining dust early warning device which comprises a safety helmet, a center control box is movably connected to the center of the top of the safety helmet, a dust concentration sensor is installed at the center of the top of the center control box, a lithium ion battery is installed on one side of the interior of the center control box, and a circuit board is installed on the other side of the interior of the center control box. An alarm, a PLC and a storage are installed on the circuit board, the dust concentration sensor is electrically connected with the input end of the PLC, and the output end of the PLC is electrically connected with the alarm. The mine safety helmet is novel in structure and ingenious in conception, the dust concentration sensor is installed on the safety helmet of a user, the dust concentration in the area of the user can be monitored in real time, the user is reminded to pay attention, the user is withdrawn out of the area in time or corresponding ventilation and dust reduction equipment is opened in time, and the safety of constructors under a mine is greatly improved.
column14: WUXI NUOYI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD

column12: High-voltage electric pulse device with thunder and lightning test effect
column13: The utility model discloses a high-voltage electric pulse device with a thunder and lightning test effect, which comprises a device main body, a feed port arranged at the upper end of the device main body, a water inlet pipeline arranged on one side of the device main body, a discharge port arranged on the other side of the device main body, and a drainage pipeline arranged at the lower end of the discharge port. An operation display panel is arranged on the front face of the device body. According to the high-voltage electric pulse device with the thunder and lightning testing effect, by arranging a current collecting umbrella, an electric conductor, a temperature sensor, a high-voltage electrode, a lifting rod, a movable plate, a sliding groove, a sliding block, a semicircular groove and a rotating base, the crushing efficiency of internal ore can be improved, and the effect of testing and adjusting the internal high voltage of the device main body can be achieved; the use safety and the use effect of the device body are improved, meanwhile, the number of internal structures of the improved device is small, the number of corresponding procedures is small, and the working efficiency of the device body is greatly improved.
column14: TIANJIN DEPOSITIVE SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for improving blasting tunneling footage by optimizing positions of cut holes and empty holes
column13: The invention discloses a method for improving blasting tunneling footage by optimizing positions of cut holes and hollow holes, which comprises the following steps of: selecting a test site: selecting the test site as Dahongshan copper ore, selecting the diameters of the cut holes and the hollow holes, the cutting holes are divided into first blasting holes, second-section blasting holes and third-section blasting holes, the distance between the first blasting holes and the hollow holes is influenced by compensation space, explosive crushing range and charging hole deflection, hollow hole model design is carried out, the hollow holes are located in the center of the model, scheme design and simulation are carried out, and the hole distance between the hollow holes and the hollow holes is determined. A cut blasting hole arrangement scheme obtained through theoretical analysis and numerical simulation is applied to field practice, and errors of the cross-sectional area, width and height of a finally obtained cut cavity and a simulation result are all within 6%, which shows that it is feasible to determine blasting hole arrangement parameters through combination of theoretical calculation and numerical simulation.
column14: YUNNAN TRAFFIC INVESTMENT HIGHWAY CONSTRUCTION SIXTH ENGINEERING LTD COMPANY;;UNIV KUNMING SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY

column12: Automatic lens taking and placing device of optical spherical surface milling and grinding robot
column13: The utility model discloses an automatic lens taking and placing device of an optical spherical surface milling and grinding robot. Comprising a horizontally arranged main shaft seat support, a milled lens storage transition disc, a milled lens storage transition disc, a lens milling clamp seat and a rotary stepping motor, wherein the milled lens storage transition disc and the milled lens storage transition disc are fixed to the two ends of the main shaft seat support respectively; the lens milling clamp seat is arranged on the side of the middle of the main shaft seat support; the encoder is connected with a driving shaft of the rotary stepping motor; the air cylinder fixing seat is connected with the driving shaft of the rotary stepping motor; the lifting air cylinder is fixed on the air cylinder fixing seat; the sucking disc frame is connected to a piston rod of the lifting air cylinder; the negative pressure pipeline is connected with the after-milling lens taking and placing suction cup and the before-milling lens taking and placing suction cup, and the air cylinder control air channel is connected with the lifting air cylinder. The double arms act at the same time, so that the lens taking and placing time is shortened, and the production efficiency is greatly improved.
column14: BENGBU ZHONGLIANG MACHINERY TECH CO LTD

column12: Ball mill sound detection sensor
column13: The utility model relates to a ball mill grinding sound detection sensor which is characterized by comprising a shell with an outer fixed disc, an upper cover, a sound processing module and a signal transmission line, and the sound processing module comprises an electret microphone, a filtering unit, a driving power supply, a primary operation amplification unit, a comparator unit and a secondaryoperation amplification unit. Wherein the input end of the filtering unit is respectively connected with the driving power supply and the electret microphone, the output end of the filtering unit is connected with the input end of the primary operational amplifier unit, the output end of the primary operational amplifier unit is connected with the comparator unit, the output end of the comparatorunit is connected with the input end of the secondary operational amplifier unit, and the input end of the electret microphone is connected with the output end of the electret microphone. And the secondary operation amplification unit outputs an alternating-current voltage signal and is connected with the control system through a signal transmission line. The method has the advantages that the operation condition of the ball mill in the ball mill process can be quickly and accurately determined, the labor cost is saved, and the detection accuracy, the quantification degree and the ore grindingefficiency are improved.

column12: Pipeline robot capable of automatically releasing jam
column13: The invention relates to the field of pipeline robots, and provides an automatic jam releasing pipeline robot which comprises a supporting wheel walking device, a control device and a driving device. The supporting wheel walking device comprises a supporting wheel walking device I and a supporting wheel walking device II; the supporting wheel walking device I is composed of a scaling mechanism and a supporting wheel mechanism. The scaling mechanism comprises a lead screw, a lead screw nut and an ejector rod I, wherein the lead screw nut is controlled by the lead screw in a transmission mode, and the ejector rod I is connected to the lead screw nut. The jacking rod I is connected with the supporting wheel mechanism, so that the scaling mechanism can drive the supporting wheel mechanism, then supporting and unclamping recovery of the supporting wheel walking device I are achieved, the situation that the pipeline robot is clamped in a pipeline during recovery is avoided, and the supporting wheel walking device II plays a walking supporting role; after a preset working time, the control device controls the servo motor to drive the lead screw to transmit, so that the scaling mechanism is driven; the driving device is composed of a set of leather cups installed on the two sides of the box body and plays a role in providing driving force, supporting and sealing.

column12: DEVICE FOR LOADING OF DRUM MILLS WITH BALLS
column13: The device for loading drum mills with balls which contains trays of a certain length with one-dimensional balls, which are located one above the other and inclined to the horizon with the possibility of free movement of grinders and provided with unloading side rotary valves installed in the upper part of the outlets, vertical ball pipe of square cross-section, made in accordance with the size of the ball, which is slightly larger than the size of the ball, does not reach the inclined transport tray with the mechanism for loading balls. The wall of the vertical ball pipe, on which the rotary valves are located, is extended to the bottom of the transport tray and on the side of the balls there is a stud with a bevel in the upper part with a height of two radii and a thickness of about 0.3 radius of balls. The bottom of the transport tray at a distance of two radii of the balls from the stud has a spring-loaded pin-electromagnetic clamp holding the lower ball, and at the level of the lower ball is a ball motion sensor. At the same time, the electromagnetic clamp is connected to the output, and the motion sensor of the balls – to the input of the control device, which is associated with a means of assessing the wear of balls and lining in the process of grinding a given ore volume by drum mill.
column15: MATSUI ANATOLII MYKOLAIOVYCH;;KONDRATETS VASYL OLEKSANDROVYCH;;ABASHYNA ANASTASIIA ANDRIIVNA

column12: Deposit removal robot for wood and bamboo processing dust removal pipeline
column13: The invention discloses a robot for removing sediments in a dust removal pipeline for wood and bamboo processing. The robot comprises a rack, a front-end walking mechanism, a rear-end walking mechanism and a material shifting component, wherein the front-end walking mechanism, the rear-end walking mechanism and the material shifting component are arranged on the rack; the front-end walking mechanism comprises a front walking structure connecting plate, a fixed walking mechanism and a variable-diameter walking mechanism; the rear end walking mechanism comprises a rear walking structure connecting plate, a fixed walking mechanism and a variable-diameter walking mechanism; the fixed walking mechanism comprises a fixed rod and a self-walking wheel arranged on the fixed rod; the variable-diameter walking mechanism comprises a rocker and a self-walking wheel arranged on the rocker, and the variable-diameter walking mechanism is elastically connected with the rack; the material stirring component comprises a material stirring motor, a material stirring disc, a magnetic suction cup and a material stirring hopper, an output shaft of the material stirring motor is connected with the material stirring disc, the material stirring disc is connected with the magnetic suction cup, and the material stirring hopper is arranged on the outer circumferential face of the material stirring disc. The robot disclosed by the invention has the effects of removing deposited crushed materials and removing magnetic impurities on the pipeline; and the self-adaptability of the robot to the pipe diameter can be met.
column15: ZHOU XIHE;;ZHOU HANDONG;;MA KANG;;LI SHAOCHENG;;WANG BAOJIN;;XIA CHANGLEI

column12: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING AN ALIGNMENT OF A PHOTOMASK ON A SAMPLE STAGE WHICH IS DISPLACEABLE ALONG AT LEAST ONE AXIS AND ROTATABLE ABOUT AT LEAST ONE AXIS
column13: The present invention relates to a method (1700, 1800) for determining an alignment of a photomask (270, 410, 700) on a sample stage (100) which is displaceable along at least one axis that is parallel to a chuck surface (195, 265) of the sample stage (100), and is rotatable about at least one axis (250) that is perpendicular to the chuck surface (195, 265), which method comprises the following step: rotating the sample stage (100) by a predefined angle and measuring a height change (1570) of the photomask (270, 410, 700) during rotation at a predetermined, non-vanishing distance (490) with respect to the rotation axis (1450) for the purpose of determining the alignment of the photomask (270, 410, 700) on the sample stage (100).

column12: Large-size cover plate glass conveying steering device
column13: The utility model discloses a large-size cover plate glass conveying steering device, and belongs to the technical field of glass steering. According to the technical scheme, the device comprises a front-section transmission line, a middle-section transmission line and a rear-section transmission line, an infrared sensor is arranged at the transmission tail end of the front-section transmission line, a motor is arranged above the middle-section transmission line, an output shaft of the motor faces downwards and is connected with a telescopic mechanism, and the telescopic end of the telescopic mechanism faces downwards and is connected with a chassis; and a plurality of vacuum chucks and an ion fan are arranged on the chassis. Steering operation in the length direction and the width direction in the glass conveying process is achieved through the motor, the air cylinder and the vacuum suction cup, operation is fast, and efficiency is high.

column12: METHODS AND DEVICES FOR CONTINUOUS TIME QUANTUM COMPUTING
column13: The present disclosure relates to quantum computing methods and devices, wherein a computation corresponding to a certain desired unitary transformation of the Hilbert space of a quantum system, such as a set of qubits, is implemented by selective application of control pulses in order realize a continuous time quantum computation rather than by decomposing the unitary transformation into a operations taken from a fixed set of gates. In this way an input matrix A is encoded in the overall Hamiltonian acting on the quantum system as an off-diagonal block connecting a first subspace with a second subspace. This achieved by means of "Hamiltonian Engineering" that efficiently uses time varying semi-classical control fields, where the values of the K control field settings at a set of n time instances provide a number of N = n K control parameters that, by the help of an optimization algorithm run in a precomputation step, are chosen such that an effective Hamiltonian with the desired of diagonal block A is obtained. The effective Hamiltonian thus obtained is then either applied alternatingly with some standart Hamiltonian in order to obtain a time evolution corresponding to a given function f applied to the input matrix A, or its time evolution is run and the canonical ensemble average sampled in order to compute arbitrary matrix elements of the given function applied to the effective Hamiltonian H. In either case the required control pulses are optimized by means of a classical compression techniques such as a deep learning neural network in order to maximize, during the information loading phase of the computation, the amount of classical information loaded into the system, and, during the computational phase, the number of elementary continuous time quantum transformations, respectively.

column12: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE
column13: The present invention relates to unmanned aerial vehicle for application of an active ingredient to agricultural crops. It is described to hold (410) a liquid comprising the active ingredient in at least one liquid reservoir housed within or attached to the unmanned aerial vehicle. At least one liquid application unit is housed within or attached to the unmanned aerial vehicle, and the at least one liquid application unit is in fluid communication with the at least one liquid reservoir. It further describes the housing (420) of at least one operating unit which is configured to enable the unmanned aerial vehicle to fly. It is further describes the housing (430) of at least one sensor unit which is configured to determine sense information comprising sensing a functioning of one or more of: the at least one liquid reservoir, the at least one liquid application unit, the at least one operating unit. The at least one sensor senses (440) a functioning of one or more of: the at least one liquid reservoir, the at least one liquid application unit, the at least one operating unit and transmits this information to the processing unit. The processing unit determines (450) an instruction to the unmanned aerial vehicle to dock with a base station and get a service from the base station. This determination step comprises utilization of sense information.

column12: Mining explosion-proof gas sensor calibration method and device
column13: The invention discloses a method and a device for calibrating a mining explosion-proof gas sensor. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, establishing communication connection with a mine safety monitoring system; then collecting attribute information of the gas sensor; a calibration request is sent to a mine safety monitoring system, and the mine safety monitoring system closes the over-limit alarm and over-limit power-off functions of the gas sensor according to the calibration request; after the over-limit alarming and over-limit power-off functions of the gas sensor are closed, zero point calibration and detection gas calibration are carried out on the gas sensor according to the attribute information of the gas sensor; and finally, after the gas sensor completes zero point calibration and detection gas calibration, a recovery instruction is sent to the mine safety monitoring system so as to recover the over-limit alarm and over-limit power-off functions of the gas sensor. Therefore, not only can the calibration work of various types of gas sensors be met, but also the calibration complexity of the gas sensors is reduced, and the working efficiency is improved. And false alarm or false power failure of the mine safety monitoring system can be effectively avoided.

column12: Power system remote monitoring device and monitoring method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a power system remote monitoring device and a monitoring method thereof. The power system remote monitoring device comprises a monitor and a power cabinet. The monitor comprises an image acquisition unit used for acquiring an image sequence, a sensor used for generating a sensing signal, an output unit and a processor. The processor is electrically connected with the image acquisition unit, the sensor and the output unit; and a power cover is fixedly connected to the other side of the power cabinet, a power rod is rotatably connected to the upper wall of the power cover in a penetrating mode, and the upper end of the power rod upwards penetrates through the upper wall of the power cabinet and is fixedly connected with a wind cup. The device has the advantages that under the normal working condition, the wind cup rotates to drive the impeller to rotate so that a liquid in the right pipe is driven to flow upwards through the bottom of the left pipe, as the aperture of the through hole in the sliding column is small, the liquid moves upwards to push the sliding column to move upwards, and the liquid finally returns to the right pipe to form a loop; and the sliding column moves upwards to drive the baffle plate to move at a high position without blocking the air holes so as to ensure a high heat exchange speed inside and outside the power cabinet.

column12: Novel falling ball testing machine
column13: The utility model relates to the field of grinding ball testing devices, in particular to a novel falling ball testing machine. The electromagnetic acceleration guide rail is arranged at the position,corresponding to the bearing part of the vertical conveying chain, of the testing machine frame body, falling balls can be accelerated and generate initial energy when passing through the electromagnetic acceleration guide rail, and a lining plate at the bottom end of a traditional falling ball testing machine is changed into a combination of non-Newtonian fluid and steel balls, so that the ore pulp environment in the mill can be simulated; meanwhile, the steel balls can be replaced with steel balls with poor surface quality or sliced steel balls, the height of the falling ball testing machine is reduced through the structural design, and under the same steel ball lifting speed, the experimental time can be shortened by more than one third; the height of the falling ball testing machine is reduced, so that the maintenance cost and the safety risk are reduced; the lining plate loss can be effectively reduced by adopting secondary utilization of non-Newtonian fluid and the old steel ball; the initial falling speed of the steel balls can be adjusted through the mills of different sizes, and the energy level of the thrown steel balls in the mills is simulated.

column12: Emergency refuge cabin for safe mining of mine
column13: The utility model discloses a mine safety mining emergency refuge cabin which comprises a safety sheltering box and a protection plate, a sponge sound insulation plate is arranged at the upper end of the safety sheltering box, a protection mechanism is arranged at the upper end of the sponge sound insulation plate, an anti-flooding mechanism is arranged at the lower end of the safety sheltering box, and a water level monitoring sensor is arranged on the inner side of the protection plate. The rubber plate is arranged at the upper end of the safety sheltering box to protect fallen broken stones, the springs at the lower end of the rubber plate play a secondary damping effect to prevent the broken stones from crushing the safety sheltering box at the lower end, and the sponge sound insulation plate can weaken noise generated when the broken stones fall. The height of the water level in a mine is monitored through a liquid level height sensor, and when it is detected that the height of the water level rises, four first motors drive four threaded lead screws to rotate correspondingly, so that the threaded lead screws drive threaded rings and connecting plates at the outer ends to move upwards, and therefore the height of the position of the safety hiding box is overall increased, and the safety hiding box is prevented from being flooded.

column12: Roof cutting entry retaining gangue blocking side stress analysis method
column13: The invention provides a roof-cutting entry retaining gangue blocking side stress analysis method which comprises the following steps: crushing and screening gangue sampled in a mining area to obtain gangue samples with various lithology and various particle sizes, and combining the gangue samples with various lithology and various particle sizes to obtain a plurality of experimental group samples; each experiment group sample is filled into a pre-manufactured gangue compression device in a layered mode, the gangue compression device comprises a simulated gangue blocking side and a loading side, loading plates with different angles are placed on the loading side respectively, loading stress is applied to the loading plates, the loading plates are used for simulating the rotation characteristics of key blocks above the top cutting entry retaining, and the loading stress is applied to the loading plates. The lateral stress generated by the gangue blocking side under the action of the loading stress is measured, and the relation between the lateral stress and the loading stress and the relation between the lateral stress and the angle of the loading plate are determined, so that the lateral action effect of key block pressure with different rotation characteristics on gangue sides with different lithology and particle sizes can be analyzed, and theoretical support is provided for accurate reinforcement design of supporting.

column12: Black-start modeling method considering that single power supply drives multiple auxiliary machines
column13: The invention relates to the field of safe operation of an electric power system, in particular to a black-start modeling method considering that a single power supply drives multiple auxiliary machines. After the black-start is successful, the auxiliary engines a nearby power plant are driven to carry out stagedmodeling , black-start scheme analysis and evaluation are carried out from three main aspects of generator self-excitation, no-load line overvoltage and low-frequency oscillation in the auxiliary engine driving process, and transient response characteristics in the black-start process are clearly displayed in an oscillogram mode; the transient response characteristics serve as a reliable powerful basis for judging whether the black-start scheme corresponding to the model is safe or not. And based on existing black-start modeling, a bus overvoltage problem is simulated and analyzed. By modeling various main auxiliary machines of a thermal power plant, simulation analysis of a power grid recovery process for driving an adjacent power plant to be started after a black-start power supply is started and has power supply capacity in a black-start scheme is added, the potential risk mining of the whole process of the black-start scheme is realized, and the comprehensiveness, the accuracy and the reference value of black-start simulation modeling are greatly improved.

column12: Mining power box equipped with high-temperature alarm device
column13: The utility model discloses a mining power box equipped with a high temperature alarm device, which comprises a battery box, a water inlet shunting pipe and a water outlet shunting pipe are embedded in the side wall of the arrangement end of the battery box, the water inlet shunting pipe and the water outlet shunting pipe are arranged in a staggered manner, and the water inlet shunting pipe and the water outlet shunting pipe are respectively communicated with a water tank and a water pump. A plurality of contact plates are arranged at the vertical end in the battery box in a rectangular array mode, condensation pipes are embedded in the contact plates, and a temperature sensor is fixedly connected to the battery box. According to the utility model, the temperature of the battery is monitored through the temperature sensor, when the temperature is too high, the water pump pumps water flow in the water tank into the water inlet shunt pipe for water supply operation of the condenser pipes in the plurality of contact plates, and the contact plates are attached to the battery, so that heat exchange between the condenser pipes and the battery can be better realized; and through modular processing of the contact plate, heat dissipation is more facilitated, and the action effect is improved.

column12: Mining anti-explosion electric butterfly valve
column13: The utility model discloses a mining anti-explosion electric butterfly valve which comprises a valve body, a connecting seat is arranged on the valve body, a shell is arranged at the upper end of the connecting seat, a gearbox is arranged in the shell, a brake assembly is arranged on the left side of the gearbox, and the brake assembly comprises a sleeve, an electromagnet, a spring and a supporting rod. Through cooperative use of the brake assembly, the brake pad and the angle sensor, when the opening and closing angle of the valve reaches a set value, the electromagnet and the driving motor are powered off, so that the brake pad is in contact with the input shaft of the gearbox, brake locking is achieved, and errors caused by rotation of the valve rod due to inertia are reduced or even eliminated; meanwhile, electric power components are sealed through the equipment box, the internal and external heat exchange efficiency of the equipment box is improved through heat conduction fins and heat dissipation fins, electric appliance short circuit caused by high temperature is avoided, meanwhile, a threaded cover and a plurality of sealing rubber rings are used for sealing wire joints, dust and gas are prevented from entering the equipment box, and then explosion prevention is achieved.

column12: Four-temperature water supply system
column13: The utility model discloses a four-temperature water supply system which comprises a cold water system and a heating system. The cold water system comprises a cold water tank, a high-low liquid levelsensor and a temperature sensor are arranged on the side wall of the cold water tank, and a semiconductor refrigeration module is arranged on the bottom wall of the cold water tank; a water inlet of the cold water tank is connected with a water inlet pipeline with a water inlet valve, the water inlet pipeline is connected with a heating pipeline with a heating valve, a heating module is arranged on the heating pipeline, the output end of the heating module is connected with a hot water pump, and the water outlet end of the hot water pump is connected with a hot water pipeline with a hot watervalve. The hot water pipeline is further connected with a heat exchange coil arranged in the cold water tank, and the water outlet end of the heat exchange coil is connected with a warm water pipelinewith a warm water valve; the water outlet of the cold water tank is connected with a cold water pipeline with a cold water valve; and a cold water pump is arranged on the cold water pipeline. The water cup can provide water with various temperatures in time and quickly, is suitable for different people to drink, and has the characteristics of convenience in use and low cost.

column12: METHOD FOR REGULATING THE OPERATING MODE OF A WELL EQUIPPED WITH AN ELECTRIC CENTER PUMP INSTALLATION IN AN INTER-WELL PUMPING SYSTEM
column13: FIELD: mining industry.SUBSTANCE: method for regulating the operating mode of a well equipped with an electric center pump installation in an inter-well pumping system is claimed. The method includes analysis of development conditions, injection of a working agent into injection wells-acceptors by inter-well pumping of reservoir water from a donor well equipped with an electro-centrifugal pump with a frequency-controlled drive, selection of reservoir products from producing wells, regulation of the injection volume. Additionally, the current and previous data for three years on the debits of producing wells, the volumes of injection of reservoir water into acceptor wells, the debits of donor wells are analyzed, taking into account the hydrodynamic characteristics of the inter-well fluid pumping system, the parameters of the optimal operating range of the pressure-flow characteristics of the pumping unit and the permissible range of the frequency of rotation of the submersible electric motor are determined, which ensures the stability of the performance of the electric center pump. The injection mode is being developed taking into account the daily production volume for each donor well and the daily volume of liquid injection for each acceptor well. The tightness of the deep-pumping equipment is checked, a pressure sensor is installed on the outlet line of the mouth and connected to the control station controller. The control station controller introduces an algorithm for controlling the installation of an electric centrifugal pump by pressure at the wellhead, the maximum permissible nominal values for pressure at the wellhead, according to which the frequency of the supply voltage is subsequently regulated. The electric center pump is started from the control station at optimal performance with a frequency of 50 Hz, the pump is operated until the working pressure at the mouth reaches a value equal to the nominal value of Pop = Pnom ± ∆, ∆ = 5%, when the pressure deviates from the working pressure in the larger direction P > Pop, the frequency of the supply voltageis reduced by ∆equal to 5 Hz, the pump continues to operate until the nominal value of the wellhead pressure reaches Pop = Pnom ± ∆, when the pressure deviates from the working pressure at the wellhead in a smaller direction P<Pop, the frequency of the supply voltageis increased by the amount of ∆, the pump continues to operate until the nominal value of the wellhead pressure is reached, Pop = Pnom ± ∆, and when the pressure at the wellhead is more or less than 5% of the nominal pressure, the cycles are repeated depending on the nature of the deviation by the amount of ∆one step less up to 4 Hz.EFFECT: increase in oil recovery of the deposit while simplifying the implementation of the method for regulating the operation of the well, reducing the risks of pump failure, increasing the operating coefficient, expanding the technological capabilities of the method for regulating the operation of the well.1 cl, 3 dwg

column12: Comprehensive mining risk pre-control visual simulation platform

According to the utility model, in the process that air in the blast cylinder flows into the second one-way valve pipe, the miniature ion fan can generate a large amount of airflow with positive and negative charges, the airflow flows into the first adapter cylinder through the second one-way valve pipe, and the airflow in the first adapter cylinder is sprayed onto the display screen through the plurality of spiral spray pipes; the air flow can neutralize charges carried on the surface of the display screen, when the charges carried on the surface of the display screen are negative charges, positive charges in the air flow can be attracted, when the charges carried on the surface of the display screen are positive charges, negative charges in the air flow can be attracted, and when the same amount of positive charges and negative charges are in contact, the electrical neutralization effect is achieved. And dust adsorbed on the surface of the display screen can be removed.

column12: Dewatering and desilting device for fully mechanized roof sandstone fracture water
column13: The invention discloses a dewatering and desilting device for fully mechanized roof sandstone fracture water. The device comprises a set of water drilling holes, floral pipes, a drainage pipeline mechanism, a silt discharging system and a control room, each floral pipe is fixedly arranged in the corresponding water drilling hole, the drainage pipeline mechanism is mounted and connected with one sides of the floral pipes, the drainage pipeline mechanism is connected with a drainage ditch, the silt discharging system is arranged at the bottoms of the floral tubes, a control signal output end provided with the control room is connected with a signal input end of the silt discharging system, and the silt discharging system is connected with a communication serial port of the control room. Thedrainage pipeline mechanism is composed of filter screens, mining high-pressure oil pipes, high-pressure oil pipe connectors, a water pipe, a fixed steel frame and a buried suction pipe. The silt discharging system is composed of a silt storage container, a first high-pressure gate valve, a second high-pressure gate valve, a silt sensor, a silt transport vehicle, a silt vehicle rail and a silt recovery room. By the adoption of the technical scheme, only one person is needed to operate an intelligent control terminal, and silt in each drilling hole can be discharged and transported out at any time.

column12: Heavy oil heating method for microsphere sand inclusion magnetic induction quick-acting reservoir
column13: The invention discloses a microsphere sand inclusion magnetic induction quick-acting reservoir thick oil heating method which comprises the following steps: installing a full anti-explosion electromagnetic generator in front of a Christmas tree for thick/thin oil exploitation, installing a temperature monitor and a temperature sensor at a thick/thin oil produced liquid outlet, and before the full anti-explosion electromagnetic generator works, monitoring the temperature of the temperature monitor and the temperature sensor; according to different underground pipe column conditions, sand inclusion microspheres are added into an oil sleeve annulus or a production oil pipe, the full-explosion-proof electromagnetic generator works to emit electromagnetic waves, the electromagnetic waves are transmitted to the underground reservoir position through the sleeve or the production oil pipe, and therefore direct heating of thick/thin oil of the reservoir is achieved, the viscosity of the thick/thin oil is reduced, and the mining rate is improved. According to the method, the temperature of oil and water in the reservoir can be instantly increased to an excellent flowing state, high-cost input into a hot injection station is not needed, compared with traditional steam accompanying production, the thickened oil recovery cost or the thin oil frequent paraffin removal and control cost is greatly reduced, and the method is a superexcellent process measure for achieving block potential tapping and efficiency increasing.

A silt discharging system is arranged at the bottom of the floral tube, a control signal output end provided with a control chamber is connected with a signal input end of the silt discharging system, and the silt discharging system is connected with a communication serial port of the control chamber. The drainage pipeline mechanism consists of a filter screen, a mining high-pressure oil pipe, a high-pressure oil pipe joint, a water pipe, a fixed steel frame and a buried suction pipe; the silt discharging system is composed of a silt storage container, a first high-pressure gate valve, a second high-pressure gate valve, a silt sensor, a silt transport vehicle, a silt track and a silt recovery chamber. column12: Acetabulum tool, acetabulum file system and acetabulum test mold system
column13: The invention discloses an acetabulum tool, an acetabulum file system and an acetabulum test mold system.The acetabulum tool is composed of a body of a bowl-shaped structure, a through hole located in the side wall of the body and a file located on the outer wall of the body; an acetabulum file system is composed of an acetabulum tool, a rod piece used for being connected with the acetabulum tool and a sleeve used for being connected with the acetabulum tool, and an acetabulum test mold system is composed of the acetabulum tool and a lining test mold arranged in the acetabulum tool. The acetabulum tool disclosed by the invention not only can be used as an acetabulum file to grind an acetabular fossa, but also can be used as an acetabulum test mold to simulate an implantation condition of an acetabulum cup, so that the number of instruments in a hip replacement surgery is effectively reduced; the acetabulum file system cannot block an opening of an acetabulum tool, so that when the acetabulum tool is used as an acetabulum test mold, a lining test mold can be arranged in the acetabulum tool; the acetabulum test mold system is provided with a lining test mold used in cooperation with an acetabulum tool.

column12: Edge grinding device for touch screen production
column13: The utility model provides an edge grinding device for touch screen production, which comprises a placing plate, a plurality of supporting rods are fixedly connected to the top surface of the placing plate, and a connecting frame is fixedly connected to the top surfaces of the supporting rods; the sliding rail sliding table is fixedly connected to the interior of the connecting frame; the placing assembly is arranged on the top surface of the placing plate and used for placing a touch screen, the placing assembly comprises a mounting block, the mounting block is fixedly connected to the top surface of the placing plate, a placing block is arranged on the top surface of the mounting block, and an adjusting groove is formed in the top surface of the placing block; after a worker places a touch screen on the top surface of a placement block by using a robotic arm, the touch screen can be fixed on the top surface of the placement block by arranging an electric suction cup, so that the touch screen can be conveniently polished by a polishing cutter in the later period; therefore, the touch screens with different sizes can be conveniently fixed in the later period.

column12: REAL TIME DETECTION OF SOLIDS CONTENT IN AQUEOUS COLLOIDAL DISPERSIONS SUCH AS OIL SANDS TAILINGS USING MICROWAVE SENSORS
column13: Industrial methods which utilize microwave-based sensors to detect in real-time the total solids content of aqueous solid colloidal dispersions such as oil sands tailings streams are provided. Optionally, these microwave-based sensors may be utilized in combination with automatic cleaning systems or filters, which prevent sensor fouling and allow for extended sensor use without manual cleaning. The output signals from the microwave sensor are used to adjust desired process parameters, e.g., the dosage of chemical additives and/or to maintain total solids within specified limits.

column12: Braking forced cooling system of mining anti-explosion diesel engine trackless rubber-tyred vehicle
column13: The utility model discloses a braking forced cooling system of a mining explosion-proof diesel engine trackless rubber-tyred vehicle. The braking forced cooling system comprises a water tank, an energy-saving mechanism is installed in the water tank, a water storage mechanism is installed on one side of the water tank, a braking device is installed on the top of the water pump, a control device is installed on one side of the water pump, and a heat exchanger is installed on the side, away from the water tank, of the water pump. The water storage mechanism is installed on one side of the water tank, the water level in the water tank can be detected through the water level sensor, when the water level sensor detects that the liquid level is low, the water level sensor sends an instruction to the control device, the control device controls the electromagnetic valve to work, and when the electromagnetic valve is powered on, the water storage mechanism is powered off. The electromagnetic coil generates electromagnetic force to lift the closing piece from the valve seat, the valve is opened to convey liquid in the storage tank into the water tank, so that the liquid in the water tank can be supplemented in time, and the cooling effect of the device is affected.

column12: Apple picking robot
column13: An apple picking robot comprises an apple collecting box, a walking assembly, a rotary lifting assembly and a mechanical arm assembly, a suction cup grabbing mechanism is driven to move through cooperation of the rotary lifting assembly and a quadrilateral connecting rod mechanism, transmission is more stable and accurate when the robot conducts lifting motion, and blocking of branches and leavescan be more flexibly avoided. In order to prevent apples from being possibly crushed during picking, a traditional three-jaw execution tail end is abandoned, a vacuum chuck type execution tail end isadopted, and four vacuum chuck seats are driven to synchronously move in a sliding groove through cooperation of a connecting rod and a transition rod, so that the four vacuum chuck seats can synchronously move to the surfaces of the apples and suck the apples; the apple picking device is simple in structure and convenient to operate, apples can be picked more effectively and quickly, unnecessarydamage to the apples is avoided, the picking efficiency of the apples is improved, the damage rate of the apples is reduced, the cost can be reduced, the picking scale can be enlarged, and the development of the apple industry is facilitated.

column12: Full-automatic ball feeding system of ball mill
column13: The utility model provides a full-automatic ball feeding system of a ball mill, which comprises a ball feeding unit, a ball discharging unit and a ball feeding unit, wherein the ball feeding unit is formed by connecting three ball feeders in parallel and is used for realizing accurate feeding of steel balls with at least three ball diameters and accurate matching of various ball diameters; the combined ball conveying groove is connected with the ball outlet groove of each ball adding machine and used for gathering the steel balls taken out by the ball adding machines to one ball channel; the photoelectric sensor is arranged on one side of the combined ball conveying groove and used for detecting the ball adding number of each ball adding machine; and the upper end of the composite material steel pipe is connected with a ball channel outlet of the combined ball conveying groove, the lower end of the composite material steel pipe is connected with a feeding end of the ball mill, and the composite material steel pipe is used for arranging the ball adding unit to a wide-space high place, enabling steel balls to automatically slide down along the composite material steel pipe through height difference and adding the steel balls to the feeding end of the ball mill. By automatically adding balls as required, the steel balls are accurately supplemented, the ore grinding efficiency is improved, the labor cost is saved, and the ball consumption, the energy consumption and the lining plate abrasion are reduced; the labor intensity of workers is reduced and the working environment of workers is improved.

column12: Pregnancy test bar convenient and rapid to detect
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of medical instruments, and discloses a pregnancy test bar convenient and rapid to detect, which comprises a transparent sterile box, a pregnancy test bar body is arranged in the transparent sterile box, the transparent sterile box comprises a cover, and a clamping block is arranged at the bottom of the cover. According to the pregnancy test bar convenient and rapid to detect, the absorbent cotton is arranged in the test head to absorb urine, the urine can be transmitted to the test paper in the shell for testing through the groove, and the test head is provided with the liquid inlet and the liquid outlet, so that the urine does not need to be independently stored in a disposable cup for measurement; the test work can be completed by directly scattering urine on the test head when a user goes to the toilet, the pregnancy test bar can be placed in the transparent sterile box to complete the recovery work after the test is completed, the test result can be sent to a terminal through the sensor and the annunciator arranged in the shell, and the test result can be known by scanning a two-dimensional code on the transparent sterile box. The use is simple and the operation is easy.

column12: Automatic mirror surface polishing device for vacuum cup bottom cover
column13: The utility model provides an automatic mirror surface polishing device for a vacuum cup bottom cover. The automatic mirror surface polishing device comprises a workbench, a disc rotationally connected with the workbench, a first industrial robot, a second industrial robot, a third industrial robot, a first motor and a second motor. The disc is provided with ten mushroom-shaped workpiece carryingseats which are evenly distributed in the circumferential direction of the disc, and the workpiece carrying seats are rotatably connected with the disc. The first motor is used for driving the disc torotate, and the second motor is used for driving the workpiece carrier to rotate. Ten stations which are evenly distributed around the disc are arranged on the workbench, one station is a workpiece taking station, and the other nine stations sequentially comprise three side face grinding stations, three side face polishing stations and three top face polishing stations from the workpiece taking station in the rotating direction of the disc. By means of the automatic mirror surface polishing device, the safety of mirror surface polishing operation can be improved, and the labor cost and the labor intensity of workers can be reduced.

column12: Fire preventing and extinguishing optical fiber monitoring system and monitoring method for mining belt conveyor
column13: The invention discloses a fire preventing and extinguishing optical fiber monitoring system and method for a mining belt conveyor, and the system comprises a ground monitoring part and an underground monitoring part which achieve the signal exchange through a network switch, achieves the remote monitoring, reduces the management difficulty, and improves the monitoring efficiency. The underground monitoring part comprises a distributed optical fiber temperature measurement host, a first temperature sensing optical cable group connected with the distributed optical fiber temperature measurement host, a fire prevention and extinguishing control box, and a detection unit and an execution unit connected with the fire prevention and extinguishing control box, the distributed optical fiber temperature measurement host is connected with the control box, the first temperature sensing optical cable group is arranged along a conveying belt of the belt conveyor, and the detection unit comprises a sensor group; the execution unit comprises a voice alarm, an electric control water medium spraying unit and an electric control dry powder medium spraying unit, the double-medium spraying unit is adopted, stage-by-stage fire prevention and extinguishing monitoring work can be carried out according to matching of different detection signals, and the selection diversity and functionality of the system are improved.

column12: APPARATUS, SYSTEM, AND METHOD FOR DETECTION OF THE PRESENCE OF AN AIR CORE IN A FLUID CONDUCTOR
column13: ABSTRACT This invention relates to a technique for optimizing the performance of cyclones, e.g., operating in a hydrocyclone battery in a mineral extraction processing system, including extracting a mineral from ore. An apparatus is disclosed that comprises a signal processor configured to: receive signaling containing information about a central air-core of an overflow pipe of a hydrocyclone where fluid flow is concentrated in an outer annular region of the overflow pipe that is against an inner wall of the overflow pipe during a normal operation of the hydrocyclone, and determine corresponding signaling containing information about a collapse of the .. central air-core of the overflow pipe of the hydrocyclone during an abnormal operation of the hydrocyclone, based upon the signaling received. Date Recue/Date Received 2021-03-17 APPARATUS, SYSTEM, AND METHOD FOR DETECTION OF THE PRESENCE OF AN AIR CORE IN A FLUID CONDUCTOR CROSS-REFERENCE TO RELATED APPLICATIONS This application claims benefit to US provisional patent application serial no. 62/112,433 (712-2.419/ICCS-0135), filed 5 February 2015. This application is related to PCT patent application serial no. PCT/U516/15334 (712-2.418-1//CCS-0134), filed 28 January 2016, which claims benefit to US provisional patent application serial no. 62/108,689 (712-2.418//CCS-0134), filed 28 January 2015. This application is related to PCT patent application serial no. PCT/US14/52628 (712-2.410-1//CCS-0124), filed 26 August 2014, which claims benefit to US provisional patent application serial no. 61/869,901 (712-2.410//CCS-0124), filed 26 August 2013. This application is related to US patent application serial no. 13/389,546 (712-2.330-1-1), which corresponds to PCT/US10/45178, filed 11 August 2010, claiming benefit to US provisional patent application serial nos. 61/232,875 (CCS-0026), filed 11 August 2009; serial no. 61/400,819 (CCS-0044), filed 2 August 2010; and serial no. 61/370,154 (CCS-0043), filed 3 August 2010. This application is also related to US patent application serial no. 13/377,083 (712-2.326-1-1//CCS-0027), which corresponds to PCT/US10/38281, filed 11 June 2010, claiming benefit to US provisional patent application serial nos. 61/186,502, 12 June 2009. 1 Date Recue/Date Received 2021-03-17 This application is related to US patent application serial no. 12/991,636 (712-2.322-1-1//00-0962), which corresponds to PCT/US09/43438, filed 11 May 2009, claiming benefit to US provisional patent application serial nos. 61/051,775 (00-0962P), 61/051,781 (CCS-0963P), and 61/051,803 (CCS-0964P), all filed 9 May 2008. The aforementioned applications were all assigned to the assignee of the present application, which builds on this family of technology. BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION 1. Field of Invention This invention relates to a technique for optimizing the performance of cyclones, e.g., operating in a hydrocyclone battery in a mineral extraction processing system, including extracting a mineral from ore. 2. Description of Related Art General Background In many industrial processes the sorting, or classification, of product by size is critical to overall process performance. A minerals processing plant, or beneficiation plant, is no exception. In the case of a copper concentrator as shown in Figure 1A, the input to the plant is water and ore (of a particular type and size distribution) and the outputs are copper concentrate and tailings. The process consists of a grinding, classification, floatation, and thickening, as shown in Figure 1B. The grinding and classification stage produces a fine slurry of water and ore, to which chemicals are added prior to being sent to the flotation stage. Once in the flotation stage, air is used to float the copper mineral while the gangue (tailings) is depressed. The 2 Date Recue/Date Received 2021-03-17 Since the volume of fluid flow of fluid through the pipe increases greatly when the central air-core collapses, the forces on the probe/sensor will also greatly increase. The probe/sensor can detect this increase in force by various means that are well known. One technique is to use strain gages to detect the bending moment on the probe/sensor produced by the fluid impact. Another example is using an acoustic probe/sensor to look at the frequency spectrum that will be significantly different depending on the presence or absence of the central air-core. An additional technique is to use a probe/sensor with one or more separate detection areas located along the axis of the probe. These one or more separate detection areas will experience significantly different acoustic signals depending on the presence or absence of the central air core, i.e. whether or not there is fluid or slurry impacting these separate detection areas. These one or more separate detection areas can be formed by creating acoustically isolated cylindrical areas along the cylindrical axis of the probe/sensor by using an acoustically isolating material such as rubber between metallic detection areas. Both the metal and isolating material should have very good abrasion resistance so they can survive the flow of abrasive particles in the fluid. The one or more separate detection areas may be coupled to individual transducers, e.g., via separate wave guides that are designed into the probe/sensor. Such wave guides could be concentric cylinders with acoustic isolation between them. By way of example, and as an alternative to the aforementioned wetted probe, the general design of such a probe/sensor could resemble, or take the basic form of, a typical audio plug like that shown in Figure 5A 9 Date Recue/Date Received 2021-03-17

column12: Industrial pool cleaning robot
column13: The invention discloses an industrial pool cleaning robot, relates to the technical field of wall-climbing cleaning equipment, and solves the problems that an existing industrial pool manual cleaning mode is high in labor intensity and low in efficiency and cannot meet the requirements for environmental protection and energy conservation. The device comprises a wall-climbing cleaning robot, a main moving trolley and an auxiliary moving trolley, and the main moving trolley is arranged above a water pool and connected with the wall-climbing cleaning robot through a sling; the wall-climbing cleaning robot moves back and forth through cooperation of a plurality of air cylinders and a linear module and steers under the action of a rotary table. column12: Lithium ion battery cell lamination machine

According to the utility model, the mounting base, the supporting plate, the positive electrode positioning mechanism, the lamination table, the negative electrode positioning mechanism, the adsorption mechanism, the connecting rod, the movable rod, the folding mechanism, the diaphragm winding mechanism, the stepping motor, the air inlet valve, the fixed block, the hydraulic rod, the centralizing bracket, the infrared sensor and the controller are matched with one another; a hydraulic rod drives a centralizing support to centralize a positive plate and a negative plate, it is guaranteed that the positive plate and the negative plate do not move in the lifting process, due to the design that a cover plate is matched with a positive plate mounting bin and a negative plate mounting bin, it is guaranteed that a suction cup does not shake in the suction process, and through connection of a connecting rod, a movable rod and a belt, the positive plate and the negative plate can be fixed. column12: Electronic devices, methods, and systems for temporarily precluding sharing of media content to protect user privacy
column13: An electronic device includes one or more sensors capturing media content from an environment of the electronic device. A location detector determines whether the environment of the electronic device is situated at a location of residence of an authorized user of the electronic device. A user interface receives user input requesting transmission of the media content to another electronic device located outside the location of residence of the authorized user of the electronic device. One or more processors preclude transmission of the media content to the other electronic device in response to the user input when the location detector determines that one or more sensors captured the media content at the location of residence of the authorized user of the electronic device.

column12: Film removing device for tempered glass production
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of glass film removal, in particular to a film removal device for tempered glass production, which comprises a workbench, one side of the workbench is fixedly connected with a first sliding rail, one side of the first sliding rail is slidably connected with a first sliding block, one side of the first sliding block is fixedly connected with a first telescopic rod, and the first telescopic rod is fixedly connected with a second telescopic rod. A motor is fixedly connected to one side of the first telescopic rod, a grinding wheel is fixedly connected to the output end of the motor, a first position sensor is fixedly connected to one side of the motor, and a second position sensor is fixedly connected to one side of the first sliding block. The glass polishing device has the advantages that the first position sensor and the second position sensor are used, the polishing thickness of glass can be adjusted and determined, the uniformity of the polishing thickness of the glass is ensured, the film removing quality of the glass is ensured, feeding and discharging are carried out through the second sliding rail, the second sliding block, the second telescopic rod, the suction cup and the conveying belt, and the production efficiency is improved. The manual material taking and unloading time is shortened, and the working efficiency is improved.
column15: CHENG JINCAI;;CHENG GUANGYUN;;WEI LEI;;SUN CHUNYAN;;TANG ZHENYONG;;SU GAOLEI

column12: Automatic embossing and spraying equipment for aluminum gusset plate
column13: The invention discloses automatic embossing and spraying equipment for an aluminum gusset plate. Comprising a rack, an unwinding frame, a rotary cleaning brush roller, a dust hood, a dust collector, an auxiliary conveying roller pair, an embossing roller pair, a plate conveying belt, an electric adsorption leather cup, a spraying protection groove, a lifting mechanical arm, a distance sensor, a paint sprayer, a paint spraying pump, a paint storage groove, a recovery hole, an adsorption pump, a paint surface detection plate, a paint make-up guide rail, an electric stroke sliding block, a paint make-up sprayer and a drying channel. And a radiation curing device, a film covering roller and a control center. The aluminum gusset plate can be subjected to embossing pretreatment through the equipment, it is guaranteed that the embossing face is clean and tidy, spraying treatment is conducted on the same equipment, paint spraying dislocation and embossing collision deformation caused by aluminum gusset plate transferring are effectively avoided, sprayed patterns are accurate, meanwhile, the paint face detection and paint make-up mechanism is arranged, it is further guaranteed that the quality of the sprayed patterns is stable, and the production efficiency is improved. The heating and laminating mechanism is arranged, so that paint surface patterns can be quickly shaped and protected, and the production efficiency and the product quality are improved.
column14: ZHEJIANG Y&G INTEGRATED CEILING CO LTD

column12: Solar energy and air energy double-source double-cylinder heat storage indirect type intelligent hot water station
column13: The utility model discloses a solar energy and air energy double-source double-cylinder heat storage indirect intelligent hot water station which is characterized in that a heat supply water tank is connected with a parallel heat collection pump and a water inlet of the heat collection pump through related valves and pipelines, and an outlet header pipe of the heat collection pump is connected with a water inlet of an electronic water treatment instrument. An outlet header pipe of the electronic water treatment instrument is connected with water inlets of the air source heat pumps through an anti-freezing emptying electromagnetic valve group, and water outlets of the air source heat pumps are connected with the heat supply water tank through an outdoor temperature sensor and an air source heat pump return water temperature sensor after being gathered; a water inlet header pipe of the heat collection pump is connected with a heat supply water tank and a header pipe from a heat exchange pipe bundle in the heat storage water tank, the heat collection pump is connected with a water inlet of the solar heat collection module, the heat supply water tank provides hot water through a hot water pump, and the requirements of schools, industrial and mining enterprises, hotels, troops, real estate and other units can be met. The system is high in intelligent control and remarkable in energy-saving effect, and the purposes of energy conservation and emission reduction are achieved through the air source heat pump and the solar heat collection module.
column14: LANZHOU SHENGYI PLUMBING ENGINEERING TECH CO LTD

column12: Steel ball diameter on-line detection structure for ball grinder
column13: A steel ball diameter on-line detection structure for a ball grinding machine comprises a material disc, a material taking device and a detection device are fixedly installed on the outer side wall of the material disc, the material taking device comprises a rotating table arranged in a reciprocating rotation mode, the outer end of the rotating table is rotatably installed on the material disc, and a suction cup is arranged at the inner end of the rotating table in a lifting mode; the detection device comprises a steel ball channel matched with a detected steel ball, an inner end opening of the steel ball channel is arranged, is located at the edge of the upper end of the outer side wall of the charging tray and faces the interior of the charging tray, and a steel ball diameter measuring device is arranged at the inner end opening of the steel ball channel; an upward placing opening is formed in the end part of the outer end of the steel ball channel, the placing opening corresponds to the sucking disc, and a pushing device is arranged at the outer end of the steel ball channel. The sucker is adopted to grab the steel balls, the grabbing effect is good, the steel balls are not prone to falling off in the transferring process, the static measuring head, the movable measuring head, the steel ball channel and the displacement sensor are matched to detect the steel balls, detection is convenient, and the detection precision is high.
column14: XINXIANG ZHIDE PREC EQUIPMENT CO LTD

column12: AUTONOMOUS UNIVERSAL DESALINATION PLANT
column13: FIELD: ventilation.SUBSTANCE: obtaining water from air and also simultaneously by desalination of sea, mineralized and contaminated water. Autonomous universal desalination plant comprises housing 1, on perforated cover 2 of which in above-ground conical part there is a pressure wind installation 3, equipped with a tube for return air outlet, and at the end of the underground tube part 5 there is accumulation tank 6 for fresh water, connected by hose 7 for supplying water to the top by means of pump 8 into a water collection tank 9. Into the above-ground part of the housing air humidifier 10 is introduced, consisting of tank 11 connected through level sensor 12 to tank 13 of mineralized water, a stationary air pumping tube 14 is also introduced to the length of the conical part of the housing, in the upper part it has regulating gate 16 covering hole 17 connected by tube 18, perforated part 19 of which is placed in the mineralized water tank 11. Housing terminal underground part is equipped with heat exchanger 20 arranged in fresh water tank 6, air return tube 4 is brought into atmosphere, and humidifier 10 is covered with reconciliation with wetted filtration material 21, suction cups 22 of which are lowered into mineralized water. To increase the effect of water vapor deposition, air is passed through heat exchanger 20, made in the form of a package of small diameter tubes filling the lower end of the underground part of the installation housing, and on the upper cover there is a low-speed rotor-type wind installation 3, which injects air through the tube of its hollow axis 15 inside housing 1.EFFECT: higher plant efficiency due to simultaneous desalination of mineralized water and water production from air.3 cl, 3 dwg

column12: METHOD AND MACHINE FOR CREATING AND SEALING FLAPS OF FLEXIBLE PACKAGES, AND VARIOUS MODELS OF FLEXIBLE 3D PLUS-TYPE PACKAGES
column13: The procedure of the invention consists in manufacturing and/or transforming flexible containers in vertical filling and sealing machines that manufacture or process English fold, stable bottom or pad type containers, by generating and sealing flaps at the top and/or bottom of the lateral sides of the previous pre-container (6a) or subsequent pre-container (6b) arranged in the vertical machine.Impact bodies (2; 3) installed in the vertical machine are used, which, when operated, hit, push and fold at least part of at least one side or lateral side on at least another part of another side or contiguous side, thus generating at least any one of the flaps such as: the plus flaps (11; 12; 13), triangular body flaps (14) manipulated triangular body flaps (15) the flap folded on itself (15a) or the strip flap (15b).Subsequently, the flaps are sealed, by means of a sealing mode like that of a resistance, in order to keep the generated flap permanently stable.Another object of the invention, devices that are installed in the vertical machine that facilitate the optimal generation of the flaps, such as:- the Rammer body (19) intended to widen and stretch the wrapper or sheet of the bottom part or / and of the lower support side of the pre-container (6a), or- Pressing platform or drawer unit (22) intended to push and crush the upper part of the pre-container (6b) against the underside of the clamp (1a), causing the pre-container (6b) to expand three-dimensionally in a cubic shape.The new machines of the invention will have at least one impact body (2; 3) or / and at least one device (19; 20; 21; 22) of the invention.The invention also protects different packaging models, such as mixed packaging: one half of the pad type and the other half of the English fold type.

column12: Personal ambient air temperature modification device
column13: A personal, portable, ambient air temperature modification heating or cooling device provides heated or cooled air flow from a modified ambient temperature source disposed inside a container configured to fit in a conventional cup holder. The device pulls in ambient temperature air into an internal chamber of the device where the ambient temperature air is cooled or warmed through heat transfer from thermal energy storage components in the internal chamber, then thermally concentrated prior to entering a motorized air movement mechanism via an air manifold, and the resulting cooled or warmed air is returned out from the internal chamber of the device and directed toward a user. The modified temperature air returned by the device provides a desired cooling or warming effect to the immediate environment nearby the user.

column12: HIGH VOLTAGE ELECTRIC FAN SYSTEM
column13: An electric cooling fan system (30; 30'; 130; 230; 330) can include a frame (32; 132; 232; 332), a first fan (38-1; 138-1; 238-1, 338-1), a first electric motor assembly (34-1; 134-1; 234-1; 334-1) supported by the frame and operably connected to the first fan, a second fan (38-2; 238-2; 338-2), a second electric motor assembly (34-2; 134-2; 234-2; 334-2) supported by the frame and operably connected to the second fan, and a liquid cooling path that passes adjacent to both a first stator (272; 372) of the first electric motor assembly and a second stator (272; 372) of the second electric motor assembly such that thermal energy is transferable from the first electric motor assembly and the second electric motor assembly to a liquid coolant present in the liquid cooling path. Other aspects of an electric cooling fan system and associated method of making the same are also disclosed.

column12: SYSTEM FOR LIMITING EXPOSURE OF A SELECTED AREA FROM CONTAMINATED AND ADVERSE ENVIRONMENTS
column13: An access control apparatus having a protective covering configure to cover at least one of a subject or an object inside said protective covering is provided, where an opening is configured to provide access to the at least one of a subject or an object and a covering element configured to selectively cover said opening. A receiving element is provided on the protective covering and an activating device with an activating element is provided external to the protective covering. A motor is coupled to the covering element, wherein said motor selectively moves the covering element to at least partially unblock the opening or completely block the opening based on a wireless activation signal and a distance between the activating element and the receiving element.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INSIDE OF CAN CURING
column13: An improved inside of can curing technology is provided. One implementation uses narrowband, semiconductor produced infrared energy which is focused into the inside of the can to affect a very high-speed curing result and will directly impact the coating covering the inside walls of the can to rapidly cure the coating. Detempering and annealing of the aluminum can body does not have time to occur, thus leaving a stronger can with the same amount of aluminum or a can of the same strength but with less aluminum. It is also possible to eliminate the natural gas fueled oven that is the current standard and replace it with a completely hydrocarbon-free curing alternative that has superior performance. This high powered radiant, narrowband energy will be digitally controlled to introduce only the needed heat and to not overheat the can.
column15: COCHRAN DON W;;JOHNSON BENJAMIN D;;KATZ JONATHAN M

column12: PROCESS AND DEVICE FOR MANUFACTURING EDIBLE AND/OR BIODEGRADABLE ARTICLES
column13: The present disclosure relates to processes and devices for manufacturing edible and/or biodegradable articles. The present disclosure also relates to the edible and/or biodegradable articles manufactured by said processes and/or using said devices. More particularly, the disclosure relates to processes and devices for manufacturing edible and/or biodegradable articles that may be, for example, kitchen utensils, tableware and/or household articles or utensils, for example, knives, forks, spoons, stirrers, chopsticks, skewers, rods, straws, popsicle sticks, cones, ice cream cornets, packaging and containers of all kinds with or without a lid such as cups, mugs, demitasses, plates, dessert bowls, trays, bowls, salad bowls, and the like. Also contemplated within the present disclosure are edible and/or biodegradable articles that may be used as sports equipment.

column12: Retrofit cover plate and assembly to adapt alternative energy supplies to electric water heaters
column13: A multi-functional retrofit cover plate assembly and method for an electric water heater to provide interconnection with an alternative energy system to heat water in a water holding tank of the electric water heater. The cover plate is adapted for replacement connection over a bottom access opening formed in an outer casing of the electric water heater which permits access to a bottom resistive heating element and electrical connections. The retrofit cover plate is shaped to define an internal dedicated compartment. A dual resistive heating element is provided for replacement of the bottom resistive heating element. An electronic switch unit is further provided and it has a power cut-off switch for connection to an alternative supply voltage. A temperature sensor is provided for mounting against an outer surface of the tank of the water heater to feed actual temperature signals of water temperature within the tank, in a lower region thereof, to the electronic switch unit which operates the power cut-off switch upon a predetermined temperature having been attained in the tank of the water heater. The retrofit cover plate and the assembly also make it possible to covert the water heater to a high temperature water heater or to adapt the electric water heater to a thermal fluid heat source.
